1b1(rgyud): //na/
1b2(rgyud): satwA s+yA par na rgyun sa/bong sa
1b3(rgyud): 'dzum dpal ye shesasems dpa'i don dem
1b4(rgyud): pa'i mtshan yang dag bar brjod pa/'jam
2a1(rgyud): /dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshalo//de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang //gdul dka'
2a2(rgyud): 'dul ba rnams kyi mchog/dpa' bo 'jig rten gsum las rgyal//rdo rje dbang phyug gsang ba'i rgyal//rnam
2a3(rgyud): rgyas pad+ma dkar po'i spyan//pad+ma rab tu rgyas pa'i zhal//rang gi lag gi rdo rje mchog/yang dang yang du gser
2a4(rgyud): pyod pa//khre gnyer ldan pa'i rlabs la sogs//lag na rdo rje mtha' yas pa//dpa' bo gdul dka' 'dul ba
2a5(rgyud): po/dpa' bo 'jigs rung gzugs can dang //rdo rje rtse mi rab 'phrog/rang gi lag gis gser byed pa//
2b1(rgyud): shes rab thabs dang snying rje che//'gro don byed pa rnams kyi mchog/dga' mgur rangs pa'i bsnams pa can//khro bo'i lus kyi gzugs ldan pa//
2b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas phrin las byed pa'i mgon//lus btud rnams kyis lhan cig tu//mgon po bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs//rdzogs sangs
2b3(rgyud): rgyas la phyag 'tshal to//thal mo sbyar ba byas gyur nas//spyan sngar 'dug ste 'di skad gsol//khyab bdag bdag la sman pa dang //bdag don
2b4(rgyud): bdag la thugs brtse'i phyir//sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon rdzogs pa'i//byang chub ji ltar bdag thob bgyi//nyon mongs pas ni sems bkrugs
2b5(rgyud): shing //mi shes 'dom du bying ba yi//sems can kun la sman pa dang //bla med 'bras bu thob pa'i phyir//bcom ldan ston pa rdzogs
2b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas//'gro ba'i bla mas bshad du gsol//dam tshig che ni po de nyid mkhyen//dbang po bsam po rig pa mchog/bcom ldan
3a1(rgyud): 'das kyi ye shes sku//gtsug gtor chen po tshig gi bdag/'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' yi//ye shes sku ste
3a2(rgyud): rang byung ba//don zab don+da ni rgya che zhing //don chen mtshungs med rab zhi pa//thog ma bar dang mthar dge ba//mtshan yang dag par brjod pa mchog/'das
3a3(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs//ma 'ongs rnams kyang gsung 'gyur la//da ltar byung ba'i rdzogs sangs rgyas//gang yang yang yang gsung ba
3a4(rgyud): gang //rgyu do chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba 'dir//rdo rje 'chang chen gsang sngags 'chang //dpag med rnams kyis dgos pa yi//gang yang yang dag rab
3a5(rgyud): gsungs pa//bdag kyang 'di ni gzung bar bgyi//bsam pa brtan pos nges 'byung bar//mgron po rdzogs sangs rgyas kun gyi//gsang 'dzin ji
3a6(rgyud): ltar bdag 'gyur bgyi//nyon mongs ma lus bsal ba dang //mi shes ma lus spang ba'i phyir//sems can rnams kyis bsam pa yi//khyad
3b1(rgyud): par ji bzhin rab bshad 'tshal//gsang dbang lag na rdo rje yis//de bzhin gshegs la de skad du//gsol btab thal mo sbyar byas te//lus btud nas ni spyan sngar 'dug/
3b2(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan shAkya thub//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog/nyid kyi zhal nas ljags bzang dge/ring zhing yongs pa brkyang mdzad de//'jig rten gsum
3b3(rgyud): po snang byed cing //bdud bzhi'i dgra rnams 'dul byed po//'jig rten rnams kyi ngan song gsum//sgying bar byed pa'i 'dzum bstan nas//tshangs pa'i gsung ni snyan pa yis//
3b4(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum po kun bkang ste//lag na rdo rje stobs po che//gsang dbang la ni slar gsungs po//legs so dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang //lag na rdo rje khyod leg so//'gro la
3b5(rgyud): phan pa'i don du khyod//snying rje che dang ldan gyur te//'jam dpal ye shes sku yi mtshan//yang dag brjod pa don che ba//ngag par byed cing sdig sel ba//nga las nyan par brtson
3b6(rgyud): pa ni//gsang po'i bdag po khyod legs so//de phyir 'di ni ngas bshad bya//khyod ni rtse gcig yid kyis nyon//bcom ldan de ni legs zhes gsol//de nas bcom ldan shAkya
3b7(rgyud): thub//gsang sngags mtha' dag rigs chen po//gsang sngags rig po 'chang ba'i rigs//rigs gsum la ni rnam par gzigs//'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i rigs//
4a1(rgyud): 'jig rten smrang byed rigs chen dang //phyug rgya chen po'i rigs mchog dang //gtsug tor chen po rigs chen no//gsung sngags rgyal po drug ldan zhing //gnyis su/
4a2(rgyud): med par 'byung ba dang //skye ba med pa'i chos can 'di//tshig gi bdag pos tshigs bcad gsungs//a A/i I/u U/a ai/o ai/aM auH/s+t+rI ta hr-i /dz+nyA na mUrti ra haM bud+d+ha/
4a3(rgyud): bud+hA nAM/t+yA d+b+ha baN+Di ni oM badz+ro tik+Sh+Na duHkhats+tshedAHbrAdz+nyedz+nyA narmAr+d+ha ya/dz+nyA nak+ShA ya/lU gI shwAr/a ra pa ts+tsha nA ya te nA maH//'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/
4a4(rgyud): po'i sangs rgyas A yig byung //a yi ge yig 'bru kun gyi mchog/don chen 'gyur med dam pa yin//srog chen po ste skye ba med//tshig tu brjod pa spongs pa te//brjod pa kun gyi
4a5(rgyud): rgyu yi mchog/tshig kun rab tu gsal bar byed//mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che//sems can thams cad dga' bar byed//mchod pa chen po zhe sdang che//nyon mongs kun
4a6(rgyud): gyi ngag che ba//mchod pa chen po gti mug tshe//gti mug blo ste gti mug sel//mchod pa chen po khro ba che//khro ba chen po dgra che ba//mchod pa chen po chags pa che//chags
4a7(rgyud): pathams cad sel bar byed//'dod pa chen po bde ba che//dga' bo chen po dgu pa che//gzugs che lus kyang che ba ste//khadog che zhing lus bong che//ming yang che zhing rgya che ga
4b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po yangs pa yin//shes rab chen po mtshon 'chang ba//nyon mongs lcags kyu che ba'i mchog/grags tshon snyan grags chen po ste//snang ba chen po gsal ba tshe//
4b2(rgyud): mkhas pa sgyu 'phrul chen po 'chang //sgyu 'phrul chen po don srub pa//sgyu 'phrul chen po dga' bas dga'//sgyu 'phrul chen po mig 'phrul can//sbyin bdag chen po gtso bo ste//tshul khrims/
4b3(rgyud): chen po 'tshong ba'i mchog/bzod tshan 'chang ba brtan pa ste//brtson 'grus chen po pha rol gnon//bsam gtan chen po ting 'dzin gnas//shes rab chen po lus 'chang ba//stobs
4b4(rgyud): po che la thabs che ba//smon lam ye shes rgya mtsho ste//byams chen rang bzhin dpag tu med//snying rje chen po blo yi mchog/shes rab chen po blo chun ldan//thubs chen byed pa chen po
4b5(rgyud): ste/rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs dang ldan//shugs chen mgyogs pa chen po ste//rdzu 'phrul chen po cher grags pa//stobs chen pha rol gnon pa po//srid pa'i ri bo chen po 'joms//
4b6(rgyud): mikhrigs shing rdo rje chen po 'chang //drag po chen po drug shul che//'jigs chen 'jigs par byed pa po//mgon po rigs mchog chen po ste//bla ma gsang sngags che ba mchog
4b7(rgyud): theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas//theg pa chen po'i tshul gyi mchog/sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad che//thub pa chen po thub chen ldan//gsang sngags tshul chen las byung ba/
5a1(rgyud): gus du sngags tshul chen bdag nyid can//pha rol byin bcu thob pa ste//pha rol phyin pa brtu la gnas//pha rol phyin bcu dag pa ste//pha rol phyin pa bcu yi tshul//sa
5a2(rgyud): bcu'i dbang phyug mgon po ste//sa bcu la nu rab tu gnas//shes bcu rnam dag bdag nyid can//shes bcu rnam dag 'chang ba po//rnam pa bcu po don bcu'i don//thub dbang stobs
5a3(rgyud): bcu khyab pa'i bdag/kun gyi don ni ma lus byed//rnam bcu dbang ldan tsho ba po//thog ma med pa spros med bdag/de bzhin nyid dag dag pa'i bdag/yang dag smra zhing tshig gzhan med
5a4(rgyud): ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed//gnyis su med pa gnyis med smra//yang dag mtha' la rnam par gnas//bdag med seng ge'i sgra dang ldan//mu stegs ri dwags ngan 'jigs byed//kun
5a5(rgyud): tu 'gro ba don yod bgrod//de bzhin gshegs pa yid ltar mgyogs//rgyal ba dgra rgyal rnam par rgyal//'khor los bsgyur ba stobs po che//tshogs kyi slob dpon tshogs kyi gtso//
5a6(rgyud): tshogs rje tshogs bdag dbang dang ldan//mthu chen gces pa 'dzin pa ste//tshul chen gzhan gyi 'dren pa min//tshig rje tshig bdag smra mkhas pa//tshig la dbang ba tshig mtha' yas/
5a7(rgyud): tshig bden bden par smra ba dang //bden pa bzhi ni ston pa po//phyir mi ldog pa phyir mi 'ong //bse ru so sor 'dren pa ste//nges 'byung sna tshogs nges 'byung ba//'byung ba chen po rgyu gcig pa
5b1(rgyud): dge slong dgra bcom zag pa zad//'dod chags bral ba dbang po thul//bde ba rnyed pa 'jigs med thob//bsil bar gyur pa gos pa med//rig pa dang ni rkang par ldan//bder gshegs
5b2(rgyud): 'jig rten rig pa mchog/bdag gir mi 'dzin dar mi 'dzin//bden pa gnyis kyi tshul la gnas//'khor ba'i pha rol mthar gnas pa//bya ba byas pa skam sar gnas//ye shes 'ba'
5b3(rgyud): zhig nges 'byung ba//shes rab mtshon chas rnam 'joms pa//dam chos chos rgyal gsal bar ldan//'jig rten snang bar byed pa mchog/chos kyi dbang phyug chos kyi rgyal//legs
5b4(rgyud): pa'i lam ni ston pa po//don grub grub pa'i kun rtog ni//kun tu rtog pa thams cad spangs//rnam par mi rtog dbyings mi zad//chos dbyings dam pa zad mi shes//bsod nams ldan pa bsod
5b5(rgyud): nams tshogs//ye shes ye shes 'byung gnas che//ye shes ldan pa yod med shes//tshogs gnyis tshogs dang yang dag ldan//rtag pa kun rgyal rnal 'byor can//bsam gtan
5b6(rgyud): bsam byas blo yi bdag/so so rang rig ma g.yo ba//mchog gi dang po sku gsum 'chang //sangs rgyas sku lnga'i bdag nyid can//khyab bdag ye shes lnga yi bdag/sangs rgyas lnga bdag
5b7(rgyud): cod pani can//spyan lnga chags pa med pa 'chang //sangs rgyas thams cad skyes pa po//sangs rgyas sras po dam pa mchog/shes rab srid 'byung skye gnas te//chos kyi skye gnas srid mthar
6a1(rgyud): byed da/ gcig pu sra mkhregs rdo rje'i bdag/'phral du bskyed pa 'gro ba'i bdag/na mkha' las byung rang byung ba//shes rab ye shes me bo che//'od tshon rnam par snang bar
6a2(rgyud): byed//ye shes snang ba lam me ba//'gro ba'i mar me ye shes sgron//gzi brjid chen po 'od gsal ba//rig pa'i rgyal mchog sngags dbang po//gsang sngags rgyal po don chen
6a3(rgyud): byed//gtsug tor chen po rmad byung gtsug/na mkha'i bdag po sna tshogs ston//sangs rgyas kun bdug dngos po mchog/'gro ba dga' ba'i mig dang ldan//sna tshogs gzugs can
6a4(rgyud): skyed pa po//mchod 'os rjed 'os drang srong che//rigs gsum 'ching ba gsang sngags ldan//dam tshig chen po gsang sngags 'dzin//gtso bo dkon mchog gsum 'dzin pa//theg
6a5(rgyud): po mchog gsum ston pa po//don yod zhags pa rnam par rgyal//'dzin pa chen po rdo rje zhugs//rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa che//rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs par byed//khro bo'i
6a6(rgyud): rgyal po gdong drug 'jigs//mig drug lag drug stobs dang ldan//keng rus mche ba gtsigs pa po//ha la ha la gdod brgya pa//gshin rje mthar byed bgegs kyi rgyal//rdo rje
6a7(rgyud): shugs can 'jigs byed pa//rdo rje grags pa rdo rje snying //sgyu 'phrul rdo rje gsus po che//rdo rje skye gnas rdo rje'i dbang //rdo rje stong po mkha' 'dri ba//mo g.yo ral pa gcig bgyings
6b1(rgyud): pa//glang chen lpags pa rlon pa 'chang //drag chen hA hA zhes sgrogs pa//hi hi zhes sgyogs 'jigs par byed//gad mo chen po gad rgyangs can//rdo rje gud mo tshar sgrogs pa//rdo rje sems
6b2(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' che//rdo rje rgyal po bde ba che//rdo rje gtum po dga' ba ni//rdo rje hU~M mdzad hUM gI gzugs//rdo rje mda' yi mtshon 'chang ba/rdo rje ral gris gcod mdzad pa//rdo rje kun 'chang
6b3(rgyud): rdorje can//rdo rje gcig pu g.yul sel ba//rdo rje 'brar ba gtsigs pa'i mig/mgo skyes rdo rje 'bang ba ste//rdo rje 'bebs pa 'bebs pa che//mig brgya pa ste rdo rje'i mig/rdo rje'i spu ni myA
6b4(rgyud): gu lus//rdo rje'i spu ni lus gcig pu//rdo rje rtse mo sen mos brtsams//rdo rje snying po lcogs pa mkhregs//rdo rje phreng thogs dpal dang ldan//rdo rje'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste//gang
6b5(rgyud): /rgyangs hA hA nges par sgrogs//yI ge drug pa rdo rje'i sgra//'jam pa'i dbyangs ni sgra che ba//'jig rten gsum gcig sgra chen po//na mkha'i khams kyi mthar thugs sgra//sgra dang ldan pa rnams
6b6(rgyud): kyi mchog/yang dag med de de bzhini nyid//yang dge mtha' ste yi ge med//stong nyid smra ba'i khyu mchog ste//zab cing rgya che'i sgra sgrogs pa//chos kyi drung ste sgra chen po//chos kyi gaN+DI sgra ngo
6b7(rgyud): tshe//rab tu mi gnas mya ngan 'das//phyogs bcu chos kyi rje bo che//gzugs med gzugs ldan dam pa ste//sna tshogs gzugs can yid rang bzhin//gzugs rnams thams cad
7a1(rgyud): snang ba'i dpalnga//gzugs brnyan ma lus 'chang ba po//snang ba med cing che bar grags//khams gsum dbang phyug chen po ste//'phags lam shin tu mtho la gaR+Sha/
7a2(rgyud): chos kyi tog ni cher 'byung ba//'jig rten gsum po cig gzhal lus//gnas brtan rgan po skye dgu'i bdag/sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang ba//sdug gu 'jig rten gsum na mdzes//
7a3(rgyud): slob dpon 'jig rten yon tan shes//'jig rten slob dpon 'jigs pa med//mgon skyob 'jig rten gsum khyab pa//skyabs dang skyob pa bla na med//nam mkha' khyab pa longs spyod pa//
7a4(rgyud): thams cad mkhyen pa ye shes mtsho//ma rig sgo nga'i sbugs 'byed pa/srid pa'i dra ba 'joms pa po//nyon mongs ma lus zhi byed po//'khor ba'i rgya mtsho pha rol son//ye shes dbang
7a5(rgyud): bskur cod pan can//yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyan//sdug bsngal gsum gyi sdug bsngal zhi//gsum mtha' mtha' yas grol gsum pa//sgrib pa thams cad nges par
7a6(rgyud): grol//nam mkha' mnyam pa nyid la gnas//nyon mongs dri ma kun las 'das//dus gsum dus med rtog par gnas//sems can kun gyi klu chen po//yon tan thod can rnams
7a7(rgyud): kyi thod//lhag ma kun las rnam grol ba//na mkha'i lam la rab gnas pa//yid bzhin nor bu chen po 'chang //khyab bdag rin chen kun gyi mchog/dpag bsam shing chen
7b1(rgyud): rgyas pa ste//bum pa bzang po che ba'i mchog/byed pa sems can kun don byed//phan thogs sems can gnyis gshin pa//bzang ngan shes pa dus shes pa//khyab bdag dram shes
7b2(rgyud): dam tshig ldan//dus shes sems can dbang po shes//rnam grol gsu mo la mkhas pa po//yon tan ldan zhing yon tan shes//chos shes rab zhi bkra shis 'byung //bkra shis kun gyi
7b3(rgyud): bku shis pa//grags pa dpal mo snyan pa dge/dbugs 'byin chen po dga' ston che//dga' ba chen po rilnga pa che//bkur sti rim gro phun sum tshogs//rab tu dga' ba grags bdag dpal//
7b4(rgyud): mchog ldan mchog sbyin gtso ba ste//skyabs kyi dam pa skyabs su 'os//rab mchog 'jigs pa chen po'i dgra/'jigs pa ma lus sol ba po//gtsug phud phud bu ral pa can//ral
7b5(rgyud): pa mgo rig cod pan ldan//gdong lnga gtsug phud lnga dang ldan//zur phud lnga dang ldan pa'i thod//mgo zlum brtul zhugs chen po 'chang //tshangs par spyod pa brtul zhugs mchog/
7b6(rgyud): dka' thub mthar phyin dka' thub che//khrus ldan gau ta me mchog/bram ze tshangs pa tshangs pa rig/tshangs pa mya ngan 'das pa thob//grol ba mthar pa rnam grol lus//rnam grol zhi ba
7b7(rgyud): zhi ba nyid//mya ngan 'das zhi mya ngan 'das//legs par nges 'byung mthar byed pa//bde ba sdug bsngal mthong byed gnas//'dod chags bral ba brtag pa zad//thub pa med par dpe
8a1(rgyud): med pa//gsal min mi snang gos pa med//cha med kun 'gro khyab pa po//phra mos sa bon zag pa med//rdul med rdul bral dri ma med//nyes pa spangs paskyon med pa//sha
8a2(rgyud): tu rab sad rnams sad bdag/thams cad ye shes kun rig mchog/rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid 'das//ye shes gnyis med tshul 'chang ba//rnam par rtog med lhun gyis grub//dus
8a3(rgyud): gsum sangs rgyas las byed pa//sangs rgyas thog ma tha ma med//dang po'i sangs rgyas rigs med pa//ye shes mig nig dri ma med//ye shes lus can de bzhin gshegs//tshig gi da
8a4(rgyud): phyug smra ba che//smra ba'i skyes mchog smra ba'i rgyal//smra ba'i dam pa mchog gi gnas//smra ba'i seng ge thub pa med//kun tu lta ba mchog tu dga'//gzi brjid phreng ldan lta na sdug/'od
8a5(rgyud): bzang 'bar ba dpal gyi be'u//snang ba gsal bar byed pa'i 'od//sman pa che mchog gtso bo ste//zug rngu 'byin pa bla na med//spyan rnams ma lus ljon pa'i shing //nyon mongs nad
8a6(rgyud): kyi dgra che ba//sdug gu 'jig rten gsum gyi mchog/dpal ldan rgyu skar dkyil 'khor can//phyogs bcu no mkha'i mthar thug pa//chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po sbreng //'gro
8a7(rgyud): ba'i gdugs gcig yangs pa ste//byams dang snying rje'i dkyil 'khor can//dpal ldan pad+ma gar dbang phyug/khyab bdag chen po rin chen gdugs//sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal po
8b1(rgyud): tshe//sangs rgyas kun bdag dngos po 'dzin//sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor tshe//sangs rgyas kun gyi bstan pa gcig/rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur dpal//rin chen kun bdag dbang phyug ste//'jig
8b2(rgyud): rten dbang phyug kun gyi bdag/rdo rje kun 'chang mnga' bdag ste//sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs che ba//sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la gnas//sangs rgyas kun gyi sku chi ba//sangs rgyas kun gyi mtsho dang
8b3(rgyud): ldan//rdo rje nyi ma snang ba che//rdo rje zla ba dri med 'od//chags bral dang po chags pa che//kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od//rdo rje dkyil krungs rdzogs sangs rgyas//sangs rgyas brjod pa'i chos
8b4(rgyud): 'dzin pa//dpal ldan sangs rgyas pad+ma skyes//kun mkhyen ye shes mdzod 'dzin pa//rgyal po sgyu 'phrul sna tshogs 'chung //che ba sangs rgyas rigs pa 'chang //rdo rje rnon po ral gri che//rnam
8b5(rgyud): par dag pa 'gyur med mchog/theg pa chen po sdug bsngal gcod//mtshon cha chen po rdo rje chos//rdo rje zab mo dzi ni dzika/rdo rje blo gros don bzhin rig/pha rol phyin pa kun rdzogs pa//sa
8b6(rgyud): rnams thams cad rnam par rgyan//rnam par dag pa bdag med chos//yang dag ye shes zla snying 'od//sgyu 'phrul dra ba rnal 'byor che//rgyud kun gyi ni bdug po mchog/me lus rdo rje dkyil
8b7(rgyud): dkrungs te//ye shes sku rnams ma lus 'chang //kun tu bzang po blo gros bzang //sa yi snying po 'gro ba 'dzin//sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po che//sna tshogs sprul pa'i 'khor lo 'chang //
9a1(rgyud): dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin mchog/dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'dzin//skye med chos te sna tshogs don//chos kun ngo bo nyid 'chang ba//skad cig gcig la shes rab che//
9a2(rgyud): chos kun khong du chud pa 'chang //chos kun mngon par rtogs pa ste//thub pa blo mchog yang dag mtha'//mi g.yo rab tu dang ba'i bdag/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub 'chang //sangs
9a3(rgyud): rgyas kun gyi mngon gsum pa//ye shes me lce 'od rab gsal//'dod pa'i don sgrub dam pa ste//ngan song thams cad rnam sbyong ba//mgon po sems can kun gyi mchog/sems can
9a4(rgyud): thams cad rab grol byed//nyon mongs g.yul du cig dpa' ba//mi shes dgra yi dregs pa 'joms//blo ni sgeg 'chang dpal dang ldan//dpa' bo mi sdug gzugs 'chang ba//lag
9a5(rgyud): pa'i dbyug pa brgya bskyod cing //rkang pa bskyod pas gar byed pa//dpal ldan log pa brgyas gang la//na mkha' khyab par gar byed pa//rkang pa gcig gis mthil gnon pa//sa
9a6(rgyud): yi snying po mthil la gnas//tshangs pa'i sgo nga'i rtse mo gnon//rkang 'theb sen mo la gnas pa//don gcig gnyis mod chos kyi don//dam pa'i don te 'jigs pa med
9a7(rgyud): rnam rig sna tshogs rang bzhin don//sems dang rnam shes rgyud dang ldan//dngos po ma lus don dga' ba//stong pa nyid dga' mchog gi blo//srid pa'i 'dod chags la sogs
9b1(rgyud): 'das//sred pa gsum po dga' ba che//dag pa sprin dkar bzhin du dkar//'od bzang ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od//nyi ma 'char ka'i dkyil ltar mdzes//'dod chags chen po sen mo'i 'od//
9b2(rgyud): zur phud bzang po mthon kha mchog/skra mchog mthon ka chen po 'chang //nor bu chen po 'od chags dpal//sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyan dang ldan//'jig rten kham brgya kun bskyod pa//rdzu
9b3(rgyud): 'phrul rkang pa stobs chen ldan//de nyid dran pa chen po 'chang //dran pa bzhi po ting 'dzin rgyal//byang chub yan lag me tog dga'//de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtshe//lam gyi
9b4(rgyud): yan lag brgyad tshul rig/yang dag sangs rgyas lam rig pa//sems can kun la shas tshor chags//na mkha' lta bur chags pa med//sems can kun gyi yid las skyes//
9b5(rgyud): sems can kun gyi yid ltar mgyogs//sems can kun gyi dbang don shes//sems can kun gyi yid 'phrog pa//phung po lnga don de nyid shes//rnam dag phung po lnga 'tshang ba//zams
9b6(rgyud): cad nges 'byung mtha' la gnas//thams cad nges par 'byung ba mkhas//thams cad nges 'byung lam la gnas//thams cad nges 'byung ston pa po//yan lag bcu gnyis srid rtsa
9b7(rgyud): bton//dag pa rnam pa bcu gnyis 'chang //bden bzhi tshul gyi rnam pa can//shes pa brgyad po rtogs pa 'chang //bden don rnam pa bcu gnyis ldan//de nyid rnam pa bcu drug rig
10a1(rgyud): rnam pa nyi shus byang chub pa//rnam par sangs rgyas kun rig mchog/dpag med srungs rgyas sprul pa yi//sku yi mtha' ni rnam sgom pa//skad cig thams cad mngon par
10a2(rgyud): rtogs//sems kyi skad cig don kun rig/theg pa sna tshogs thabs tshul gyi//'gro ba'i don gyi rnam da bye can//theg pa gsum gyi nges 'byung ni//theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas///
10a3(rgyud): nyon mongs khams rnams rnam dag bdag/las kyi khams rnams zad byed pa//chu bo rgya mtsho kun las rgal//sbyor ba'i dgon pa las byung ba//nyon mongs nye nyon kun nyon mongs//bag
10a4(rgyud): chags bcas pa rab spangs pa//snying rje chen po shes rab thabs//don yod 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa//'du shes thams cad rab spangs don//rnam shes don ni 'gog pa 'chang //
10a5(rgyud): sems can kun gyi yid kyi yul//sems can kun gyi yid gnas pa//sems can kun gyi yid na gnas//de dag sems dang mnyam nyid son//sems can kun yid tshim par byed//
10a6(rgyud): sems can kun gyi yid dga' ba//grub mtha' 'khrul pa ldan pa min//'khrul pa thams cad rnam par spangs//don gsum the tshom med pa'i blo//kun don yon tan gsum gyi bdag/
10a7(rgyud): dus gsum phung po lnga yi don//skad cig thams cad rnam sgom pa//skad cig gcig mngon rdzogs sangs rgyas//sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin 'chang //lus med sku te sku yi
10b1(rgyud): mchog/sku ni bye ba rnam par 'gyed//gzugs rnams ma lus kun tu ston//nor bu chen po rin chen tog/sangs rgyas kun gyis rtogs bya ba//sangs rgyas byang chub bla na med//gras
10b2(rgyud): sngags skye gnas yi ge med//gsang sngags chen po rigs gsum pa//gsang sngags don kun skyed pa po//thig lo chen po yi ge med//stong pa chen po yi ge lnga//thig le stong pa yi ge
10b3(rgyud): drug/rnam pa thams cad rnam pa med//bcu drug phyed phyed thig le can//cha med che ldan las 'das pa//bsam gtan bzhi pa'i rtse mo 'chang //bsam gtan yan lag kun shes shing //
10b4(rgyud): ting 'dzin rig dang rgyud rig pa//ting 'dzin sku ste sku yi mchog/longs spyod rdzogs sku kun gyi rgyal//sprul pa'i sku ste sku yi mchog/sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyud 'chang ba//phyogs
10b5(rgyud): bcur sprul pa sna tshogs 'gyed//ji bzhin 'gro ba'i don byed pa//lha yi dbang po lha yi lha//lha min dbang po sbyin byed bdag/lha yi bla ma 'tsho med dbang //rab 'joms rab 'joms
10b6(rgyud): dbang phyug po//sred pa'i dgon pa las rgal ba//ston po gcig pu 'gro ba'i bla//'jig rten phyogs bcur rab grags pa//chos kyi sbyin bdag che ba po//byams pa'i go cha chas
10b7(rgyud): pa ste//snying rje yi ni ya lad bgos//shes rab ral gri mda' gzhu thogs//nyon mongs mi shos g.yul ngo sel//dpa' bo bdud dag bdud 'dul ba//bdud bzhi'i 'jigs pa
11a1(rgyud): mthar byed pa//bdud dpung thams cad pham par byed//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'dran//mchod 'os bstod 'os byug gi gnas//rtag tu rim gro bya ba 'i na//
11a2(rgyud): bkur 'os rjed par bya ba'o mchog/phyag byar 'os pa bla ma'i mchog/'jig rten gsum pa gom gcig bgrod//nam mkha' mtha' med rjer gnon//gsum rig gcing ma dag ste//
11a3(rgyud): mngon shes drug ldan rjes dran drug/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che//rdzu 'phrul chen po 'jig rten 'das//shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i mtha'//shes rab kyi ni de nyid thaH/
11a4(rgyud): bdag rig gzhi ni rag thams cid pa//kun la phan pa gang zag mchog/'jig rten dpe las 'das pa ste/shes dang shes bya'i bdag po mchog/gtso bo che kyi sbyin pa'i bdag/
11a5(rgyud): phyag rgya bzhi po'i don ston pa//'gro ba'i bsnyen bkur gnas kyi mchog/nges 'byung gsum po bgrod rnams kyi//don gyi dam po rnam dag dpal//'jig rten gsum gyi bskul
11a6(rgyud): bzang che//dpal ldan 'byor pa kun byed pa//'jam dpal dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog/mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud//yang dag mthar gyur khyod la 'dud//stong nyid snying
11a7(rgyud): po khyod la 'dud//sangs rgyas byang chub khyod la 'dud//sangs rgyas chags pa khyod la 'dud//sangs rgyas 'dod la phyag 'tshal 'dud//sangs rgyas dgos pa khyod la 'dud//
11b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas rol la phyag 'tshal 'dud//sangs rgyas 'dzum pa khyod la 'dud//sangs rgyas snang la phyag 'tshal 'dud//sangs rgyas gsung ba khyod la 'dud//sangs rgyas thugs la phyag
11b2(rgyud): 'tshal 'dud//dngos med las byung khyod la 'dud//sangs rgyas 'byung ba khyod la 'dud//na mkho' las byung khyod la 'dud//ye shes las byung khyod la 'dud//sgyu 'phrul dra bo khyod la
11b3(rgyud): 'dud//sangs rgyas gar mdzad khyod la 'dud//thams cad thams cad khyod la 'dud//ye shes sku nyid khyod la 'dud de//lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'tshang 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes
11b4(rgyud): kyi sku dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku dang 'jam dpol ye shes sems dpa'i ma 'dres pa yongs su dag pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'o//khyod kyi bla na med
11b5(rgyud): pa'i dga' ba dang rab tu dang ba dang mgu ba chen po yang dag par bskyed pa'i don dang sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba yongs su dag pa'i phyir dang yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su ma dag pa'i
11b6(rgyud): sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa dang bsod namra dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa dang yongs su dag pa'i phyir dang bla na med pa'i don lhag por ma rtogs pa lhag par rtogs pa'i phyir dang ma
11b7(rgyud): thob pa thob pa'i phyir dang ji srid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yang dag par bzung ba'i don tu yang bdag gis bstan pa dang yang dag pa rab tu bshad pa dang rnam par
12a1(rgyud): bkrol ba dang rnam par phye ba dang rab tu gsal bar byas pa dang byin gyis brlabs pa'o//lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang 'di ni ngas khyod kyi rgyud la sngags kyi chos nyid thams cad
12a2(rgyud): kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o//'di ni 'khor lo dang po'i rjes su bsngags pa'o//gzhan yang lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang mtshan yang dag par brjod pa 'di ni shin tu
12a3(rgyud): yongs su dag pa yongs su byang ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang bar gyur pa'o//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi byang
12a4(rgyud): chub pa'o//yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi mngon par rtogs pa'o//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla na med pa'o//bde bar gshegs pa thams cad
12a5(rgyud): kyi chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa'o//rgyal ba rnams kyi bdud kyi stobs thams cad pham par byed pa'o//stobs bcu dang ldan pa thams cad kyi stobs bcu'i stobs su gyur pa'o//
12a6(rgyud): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'o//chos thams cad kyi lung ngo //sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang dag par kun chub pa'o//byang chub sems
12a7(rgyud): dpa' chen po thams cad kyi dri ma med pa shin tu yongs su dag pa bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa'o//nyan thos dang rang sang+yas tha~Md kyi rab tu skye ba'o//
12b1(rgyud): lha dang mi thams cad kyi phun sum tshogs pa'i zhing ngo //theg pa chen po'i rab tu gnas pa'o//byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i 'byung khung ngo //'phags pa'i lam yang dag pa'i mthar
12b2(rgyud): thug pa'o//rnam par grol ba rnams kyi brtag pa'o//nges par 'byung ba'i lam gyi skyed pa'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung gi rgyun mi 'chad pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i
12b3(rgyud): rigs dang rgyud rab tu 'phel ba'o//phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyi char gcod pa'o//mu stegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'joms pa'o//bdud bzhi'i stobs dang dpung dang sde rnams kyi
12b4(rgyud): pham par byed pa'o//sems can thams cad kyi yang dag par sdud pa'o//nges par 'byung bas bgrod pa thams cad kyi 'phags pa'i lam yongs su smin pa'o//tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi
12b5(rgyud): la gnas pa rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin no//sems rtse gcig pa rnams kyi bsam gtan no//lus dang ngag dang yid mngon par sbyor ba rnams kyi rnal 'byor ro//yang dag par sbyor ba thams
12b6(rgyud): cad kun tu sbyor ba dang bral ba'o//nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi spong ba'o//sgrib pa thams cad kyi nye bor zhi ba'o//'ching po thams cad kyi rnam par grol ba'o///
12b7(rgyud): lhag ma thams cad kyi thar pa'o//sems nye bar 'phro ba thams cad kyi zhi ba'o//'byor pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas so//rgud pa thams cad kyi rab tu 'joms pa'o//nga ni song gi
13a1(rgyud): ni thams cad kyi 'gobs pa'o//rnam par grol ba'i grong khyor kyi lam dam pa'o//'khor ba'i 'khor lo'i rab tu mi 'jug pa'o//chos kyi 'khor la'i ro tu slong ngan
13a2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa'i gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan rab tu sgreng ba'o//dam pa'i chos ston pa'i lhag par gnas pa'o//byang chub sems dpa'i sngags kyi sgo'i spyod pa
13a3(rgyud): rnams kyi myur du grub pa'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la mngon par sbyor ba rnams kyi sgom par lhag par rtogs pa'o//gnyis su med pa so sor rtog par sgom pa mngon por sbyor
13a4(rgyud): ba rnams kyi stong pa nyid so sor rtogs pa'o//pha rol tu phyin pa dang tshogs thams cad kyi bskyed pa'o//yongs su dag pa'i sa drang pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi yongs su rdzogs pa'o//
13a5(rgyud): yang dag pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi so sor rtog pa'o//dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi po rnams kyi chos thams cad gcig pa'i sems so sor rtogs pa'o//mtshan yang dag
13a6(rgyud): par brjod pa 'di ni ji srid sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad kyi yongs su rdzogs pa'i bar ro//'di ni 'khor lo gnyis pa'i rje su bsngags pa lnga bcu rtsa gnyis so//gzhan yang
13a7(rgyud): lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang mtshan yang dag par brjod pa 'di ni sems can thams cad kyi lus dang ngag dang yid kyis kun tu spyad pa'i sdig pa ma lus pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o//sems
13b1(rgyud): can thams cad kyi ngan song thams cad rnam par sbyong bya'o//ngan 'gro thams cad bzlog pa'o//las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yang dag par gcod pa'o//mi khom pa brgyad du skye bar 'gyur ba
13b2(rgyud): thams cad mi skyo bar byed pa'o//'jigs pa chen po brgyad nye bar zhi bar byed pa'o//rmo lam ngan pa thams cad nges par sel ba'o//mtshan ma ngon pa thams cad rnam par sel bar byed pa'o//
13b3(rgyud): lta ba ngan pa dang bgegs thams cad nye bar zhi bar byed pa'o//bdud kyi dga'i las thams cad thag ring du byed pa'o//dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bsod nams thams cad nye bar 'phel bar byed pa'o/
13b4(rgyud): tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa thams cad mi skye bar byed pa'o//brgyags pa dang nga rgyal dang dregs pa dang ngar 'dzin pa thams cad nges par 'joms par byed pa'o//sdug bsngal
13b5(rgyud): dang yid mi bde ba thams cad mi skyo bar byed pa'o//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying por gyur pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gsang bar gyur pa'o//nyan thos dang
13b6(rgyud): rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang tshon du gyur pa'o//phyag rgya dang sngags thams cad du gyur pa'o//chos thams cad brjod du med par smra ba rnams kyi dran pa dang shes bzhin yang dag
13b7(rgyud): par bskyed pa'o//bla na med pa'i shes rab dang yid gzhungs par byed pa'o//nad med pa dang stobs dang dbang phyug phun sum tshogs par byed pa'o//dpal dang dge ba dang zhi ba lags pa
14a1(rgyud): rab tu 'phel bar byed pa'o//grags pa dang snyan pa dang tshigs su bcad pa dang bskyed pa rab tu gsal bar byed pa'o//nad dang 'jigs pa chen po thams cad nye bar
14a2(rgyud): zhi bar byed pa'o//shin tu dag pa rnams kyi shin tu dge pa'o//shin tu gtsang ba rnams kyi shin tu gtsang ba'o//shin tu 'byor ldan rnams kyi shin tu 'byor ldan no//shin tu bkra
14a3(rgyud): shis pa rnams kyi shin tu bkra shis pa'o//skyabs 'dod pa rnams kyi skyabs so//gnas 'drod pa rnams kyi gnas so//skyob pa 'dod pa rnams kyi skyob pa'o//dpung gnyen mod
14a4(rgyud): pa rnams kyi dpung gnyen no//gling 'dod pa rnams kyi gling du gyur pa'o//rten 'dod pa rnams kyi bla na med pa'i rten du gyur pa'o//srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu 'gro ba rnams kyi grur
14a5(rgyud): gyur pa'o//nad thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i phyir sman po'i rgyal po chen por gyur pa'o//blang bar bya ba dang dor bar bya ba'i dngos po rnam par dbye ba'i phyir shes rab tu gyur pa'i//
14a6(rgyud): lta ba dran pa'i mun pa'i smug rum thams cad bsal ba'i phyir ye shes kyi snang bar gyur pa'o//sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang 'dod pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rdzogs
14a7(rgyud): papo'i phyir yid bzhin gyi nor bur gyur pa'o//'jam dpal gyi ye shes kyi sku rab tu thob pa'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su gyur pa'o//spyan lnga rab tu thob pa'i phyir yongs
14b1(rgyud): dag pa'i ye shes gzigs par gyur pa'o//zang zing dang mi 'jigs pa dang chos kyi sbyin pa rab tu gtong ba nyid kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa'o//bsod nams dang
14b2(rgyud): ye shes kyi tshogs dang tIng 'dzin ni yongs su rdzogs pa nyid kyis sa bcu rab tu thob par gyur pa'o//gnyis kyi chos dang bral ba'i phyir gnyis su med pa'i chos nyid do//lhag par sgo 'dos
14b3(rgyud): pa dang bral ba nyid kyi phyir de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin dang gzhan ma yin pa'i chos nyid do//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku yongs su dag pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyis yang dag
14b4(rgyud): pa'i rang bzhin nyid//lta bA ngan+da pa'i tshang tshing ma lus pa nges par sel ba nyid kyis rnam pa thams cad chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin nyid do//mtshan yang dag par brjod pa 'di ni//'di
14b5(rgyud): ltar gnyis su med pa'i chos nyid kyi don dang ming yang dag par 'dzin pa rab tu gsal bar byed pa nyid kyis chos thams cad brjod du med par gyur pa'o//'di ni 'khor lo gsum pa rjes su
14b6(rgyud): bsngags pa lnga bcu rtsa gnyis so//gzhan yang lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chung /rigs kyi bu'om rigs kyi bu mo gang la la sngags kyi sgo'i spyod pa spyod pas/bcom ldan 'das ye shes
14b7(rgyud): sems dpa'i ye shes kyi sku/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku gnyis su med pa don dam pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba 'di mtha' dag
15a1(rgyud): yongs su rdzogs pa ma tshang ba med pa dum du ma yin pa/tshigs su bcad pa dang tshig dang yi ge 'di rnams nyid kyis/nyi ma so sor dus gsum du 'dzin par byed pa
15a2(rgyud): dang brjod par byed pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang gzhan rnams la yang dus ji lta bar rgyas par ji lta ba bzhin rab tu gsal bar byed pa dang mtshan gyi don
15a3(rgyud): gzhan dang gzhan re re zhing yang 'jam dpal ye shes kyi sku mngon du byas te yid rtse gcig pas sgom par byed pa dang lhog par mos pa dang de kho na yid la byed po dag gis kun nas sgo'i
15a4(rgyud): gnas pas gnas pa dang chos thams cad so sor rtogs pa dang mchog tu gyur pa dang rnyog pa med pa dang shes rab kyis rjes su 'bigs pa dang /dad pas yang dag par bgrod pa de la ni
15a5(rgyud): dus gsum du dus med par sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yang dag par 'dus te yang dag par gshegs shing yang dag par byon nas chos thams cad kyi sgo rnams
15a6(rgyud): nye bar ston par 'gyuraro//bdag nyid sbom po nye bar ston par byed do//sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis kyang lus dang ngag dang yid kyi
15a7(rgyud): rgyud la yang dag par byin gyis rlob par byed do//sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'o' thams cad kyi rjesu 'dzin pas kyang 'dzin par byed do//chos thams cad la mi 'jigs
15b1(rgyud): pa'i spobs pa yang nye bar sgrub par byed do//dgra bcom pa dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang 'phags pa'i chos la sdug pa'i bsam pa nyid kyis bdag gi dngos po yang nye bar
15b2(rgyud): ston par byed do//gdul dka' ba 'dul ba po rnams kyang khro bo'i rgyal po chen po dang rdo rje 'chang chen po la sogs pa 'gro ba yongs su skyob par gyur pa gzugs sna tshogs pa'i sprul
15b3(rgyud): pa'i sku rnams kyis mdangs dang stobs dang gzi brjid zil gyis mi gnon pa nyid dang sngags dang phyag rgya dang mngon par rdzogs pa dang dkyil 'khor rnams nye bar ston par byed do//s+pho
15b4(rgyud): dang rigs pa'i rgyal po ma lus pa dang bgegs dang lag 'dren dang bdud dang ngagra phyir rgol ba dang gzhan gyi mi thub pa chen po thams cad kyang mtshan mo dang nyin mor bcas par skad cig so
15b5(rgyud): sor spyod pa thams cad dang lam rnams su yang srung ba dang sgrib pa dang sbed par byed do//tshangs pa dang dbang po dang nye dbang dang drag po dang sred med kyi bu dang kun 'gyed gzhon nu dang dbang
15b6(rgyud): phyug chen po dang smin drug gi bu dang nag po chen po dang dga' byed dbang phyug dang gshin rje dang chu lha dang lus ngan dang 'phrog ma dang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten skyong ba gang yin pa de dag thams
15b7(rgyud): cad kyang rtag par rgyun tu mtshan mo dang nyin mor bcas pa 'gro ba dang gnas pa dang nyal ba dang 'dug pa dang gnyid log pa dang ginyid sad pa dang mnyam par gzhag pa dang mnyam par ma
16a1(rgyud): gzhag pa dang gcig pur gnas pa dang skye bo mang po'i nang du song ba dang ji srid grong dang grong khyer dang grong rdal dang ljongs dang yul 'khor drang rgyal po'i pho brang na gnas
16a2(rgyud): pa dang dbang po'i phur pa drang sgo khang dang lam srang dang bzhi mdo dang sum mdo dang grong khyer gyi bar dang tshong khong gi nang du gnas pa dang ji srid khang stong dang ri dang dgon pa dang chu klung dang
16a3(rgyud): dung khrod dang nags tshong tshing ba yin pa dang 'bags pa dang mi 'jigs pa deng myos po dang /rab tu myos par rtag tu khams cad kyi rnam pa thams cad du mchog tu sbyid ba dang skye'i pang
16a4(rgyud): srid pa byed par 'gyur ro//rkyen mo dang mtshan mo mchog tu bde legs su byed por 'gyur//gzhan yong gang lha dang klu dang gnod sgyid dri za dang lha ma yin dang na mkha'i lding dang mi'am
16a5(rgyud): dang lto 'phye chen po dang mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams dang gzhan yang gang dag gza' dang rgyu skar dang ma mo dang tshogs kyi bdag po rnams dong gang yang ma mo bdun po rnams dang gang yang gnod sbyin
16a6(rgyud): mdang srin mo dang shaza mo rnams te de rnams thams cad lhan cig 'thun par sde dang bcas pa 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis spyod lam dang lam rnams su yang mchog tu snang ba dang
16a7(rgyud): ba dang /sba ba byed par 'gyur ro//gzhan yang de'i lus la mdangs dang steng sa rab tu 'jug par byed do//nad med pa dang stobs dang tshe 'phel ba yang nye bar sgrub par byed//'drin mo//
16b1(rgyud): 'khor lo bzhi pa'i rjes su bsngags pa bcu dgu pa'o///gzhan yang lag na rdo rdo rdo rje 'chang mtshan yang dag par brjod pa gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba 'di nyims sa ma nyams pa//
16b2(rgyud): yang dag par blangs te mgrin par gnas pa lan gsum du kha ton du byed pa dang glegs bam du chud pa klog par byed pa dang rab tu 'dron par byed pa dang bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal ye shes sems//
16b3(rgyud): dpa'i gzugs la dmigs te de'i gzugs kyis rjes su sems par byed pa dang /yang de'i gzugs kyi rje su bsam gtan byed pa de nyid sprul pa'i sku yis yun mi ring ba nyid las gdul bya'i dbang
16b4(rgyud): nye bar gzung nas mthong bar 'gyuraro//sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sna tshogs pa'i sprul pa'i gzugs kyi sku dang lhan cig gnas pa na mkha'i mthil na bzhugs pa rnams
16b5(rgyud): kyang mthong bar 'gyuraro//sems dpa' chen po de'i skye ba ji ltar gyur kyang ngan 'gro dang ngan sing du ltung ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro//rigs ngan du skye bar mi 'gyur ro//yul mtha'
16b6(rgyud): 'khob kyi skye bor skye bar mi 'gyur ro//dbang po dman par mi 'gyuraro//dbang po ma tshang bar mi 'gyuraro//log par lta ba'i rigs su skye bar mi 'gyuraro//sangs rgyas mi bzhugs pa'i sangs
16b7(rgyud): rgyas kyi zhing rnamasu skye bar mi 'gyuraro//sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang des bstan pa'i chos spong ba dang lkog tu gyur par mi 'gyur ro//lha tshe ring po rnams su skye bar mi 'gyuraro//mu ge dang nad dang
17a1(rgyud): mtshan gyi bskal pa rnams la skye bar mi 'gyur//snyig ma lnga'i dus rnams la skye bar mi 'gyur ro//rgyal po dang chom rkun dang dgra'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur//
17a2(rgyud): rgud pa dang dbul ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyuraro//mi bsngags pa dang skur pa 'dongs pa dang smod pa dang mi snyan pa dang grags pa ngan pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyuraro//
17a3(rgyud): skye ba bzang po dang rigs dang rus phun sum tshogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur//kun nas mdzes par gyur pa dang gzugs dang kha dog yang dag par ldan par 'gyuraro//'jig rten pa rnams kyi
17a4(rgyud): rdzog pa dang yid la 'bab pa dang 'grogs na mchog tu bde ba dang mthong na dga' bar 'gyur ro//'jig rten pa rnams kyi mdzes pa dang skal ba bzang po dang ldan pa dang tshig gzung bar bya/
17a5(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro//gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang der skye ba dran par 'gyur ro//longs spyod che ba dang 'khor mang ba dang longs spyod mi zad pa dang 'khor mi zad par 'gyur//soms
17a6(rgyud): can thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur po'i smon lam dang ye shes dang yang dag por ldan par 'gyur ro//rang bzhin gyis kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi yon tan dang yang dgu par ldan pa
17a7(rgyud): 'gyuraro//tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi la gnas par 'gyur ro//dran pa dang shes bzhin dang thabs dang stobs dang smon lam dang ye shes dang yang dag par ldan par 'gyur//brtan
17b1(rgyud): bcos thams cad la 'jigs pa med pa dang sgra mkhas par yang 'gyur//tshig gsal ba dang blun po ma yin pa dang blo gsal bar 'gyur//mkhas pa dang le lo med pa dang chog shes pa dang
17b2(rgyud): don che ba dang sred pa med par 'gyur ro//sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu yid brtan par bya slob dpon dang bla ma bkur bar bya bar 'gyuraro//de'i sngon ma thos pa'i bzo dang rtsis dang shes pa dang
17b3(rgyud): bstan bcos thams cad kyang don dang gzhung las rab tu gsal ba yang dag par rtogs par 'gyuraro//shin tu yongs su dag po'i tshul khrims dang 'tshe ba dang kun tu spyod pa spyod pa dang ldan par
17b4(rgyud): 'gyur//legs par rab tu 'byung ba dang legs par bsnyen par rdzogs par 'gyur//thams cad mkhyen pa nyid byang chub kyi sems rab tu brjed pa med par 'gyuraro//nyon thos dang dgra
17b5(rgyud): bcom pa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi nges pa dang bgrod pa la gnas par nam yang mi 'gyur ro//'di ni 'khor lo lnga pa'i rjes su bsngags pa lnga bcu rtsa gcig go///lag na rdo rje rdo rje
17b6(rgyud): 'chad de ltar ston dpag tu med pa dang yang dag par ldan par 'gyur ro//rnam pa de lta bu'i yon tan dpag tu med pa gzhan rnams dang yang dag par ldan par 'gyur ro//lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang ngan
17b7(rgyud): dam pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa 'di yang dag par 'dzin pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni ring po mi thogs par bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs legs par bsags te shin tu myur bar
18a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnams yang dag par bsgrubs nas bla na med pa yang dgu par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyuraro//bsgral pa mang /
18a2(rgyud): por yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba'i chos kyis sems can thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i chos ston pa po dang phyogs bcur chos kyi rnga bo che lhag par gnas pa'i chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur/
18a3(rgyud): ro//'di ni 'khor lo drug pa'i bsngags pa dpag tu med pa'o////oM sarba d+har+m+ma b+hA ba sto b+hA ba bi shud+d+ha badz+ra tsAk+ShuHa IHaM AHpra kr-i ti/pa ri shud+d+haHsarba d+harma
18a4(rgyud): ya du ta/sarba ta thA ga ta/dz+nyA na kA ya/many+dzu shrI/pa ri shud+d+hi tA/mu pa dA ye ta/a A/sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya/ha ra ha ra/oM hUM hrIHb+ha ga ban/dz+nyA na murti/wA gI shI/
18a5(rgyud): ra/ma hA bA tsa/sarba d+har+m+ma ga ge nA ma la suM bai ri shud+d+ha/d+harmA d+hA tu dz+nyA na gan+d+ha aH//de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'tshong //dga' zhing mgu nas thal mo sbyar//
18a6(rgyud): mgon po bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs//rdzogs sangs rgyas la phyog 'tshal nas//rnam mang mgon po gzhan rnams deng //gsang dbang lag na rdo rje de//khro bo'i rgyal po
18a7(rgyud): bcas rnams kyis//gsang bstod nas ni tshig 'di gsol//mgon po bdag cag rjes yi rang //legs so leg so legs par gsungs//bdag cag yang dag rdzogs pa yi//
18b1(rgyud): byang chub thob pa'i don chen mdzad//'gro ba mgon med rnams dang ni//rnam grol 'bras bu 'tshal ba yi//rnam dag logs pa'i lam 'di ni//sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i tshul bstan pa//zab cing /
18b2(rgyud): yangs la rgya che ba//don chen 'gro ba'i don byed pa//sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul 'di ni//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis bshad///rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud sgyu 'phrul dra ba stong phrag
18b3(rgyud): bcu drug pa'i ting nge 'dzin dra ba'i le'u las byung ba/'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i don dam pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub
18b4(rgyud): pas gsungs pa rdzogs so////thun mongs dang thun mongs ma yin pa'i gsung rab thams cad la dbang 'byor pa'i bdag nyid chen po bla ma dam pa chos kyi rgyal po'i
18b5(rgyud): bka' drin gyis nye bar bskyangs pa sgra bsgyur gyi lo ts+tsha ba blo gros brtan pas/bsam gtan gling gi dben gnas su bsgyur zhing dag par byas pa'o//sngon gyi sgra bsgyur chen po de dag gis/
18b6(rgyud): rgyud 'di bsgyur zhing kun la grags legs mod//'on kyang sgra don gtsug lag ji bzhin du//rgyud 'di blo brtan gnyis pas legs par bsgyur////rgya gar skad du/
18b7(rgyud): She ko tad shi/bod skad du/dbang mdor bstan pa/dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshalo//zla ba bzang pos gsol pa/ston pa dbang bskur rnam bdun dang //rnam
19a1(rgyud): gsum de bzhin bla na mod//'jig rten 'das pa'i dngos dru gIm+bi/mdor bsdus pa yis bdag la gsungs//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//nyon cig zla bzang
19a2(rgyud): dbang bskur don//rnam pa bdun dang rnam gsum mchog/rtsa yi kun spyod rtsol ba ni//mdor bstan pa yis khyod la bshad//rgyud du mdor bstan rnam gsum dang //rgyas par bshad
19a3(rgyud): pa rnam gsum 'gyur//rab tu mdor bstan mdor bstan che//rab tu rgyas par bshad pa gzhan//mdor bstan rgyas par bshad pa nyid//rgyud yang dag par bsdus par brjod//rab
19a4(rgyud): tu mdor bstan rgyas bshad pa//dka' 'grel tshig ni 'byed pa'o//mdor bstan chen po rgyas bshad pa//'grel bshad thams cad don ston byed//de ni mngoni shes thob rnams kyis
19a5(rgyud): bya yi mkhas rnams kyis min nyid//de ltar mtha' drug rnams kyis dag/rdo rje'i rnal 'byor rnam bzhi dang //rdzogs pa'i byang chub bzhi rnams dang //phung khams skye mched rigs drug
19a6(rgyud): rnams//dag pa 'jig rten khams la sogs//le'u lngar ni 'dod rnams kyis//bden gnyis dang po'i sangs rgyas 'gyur//dus kyi 'khor lo mngon brjod byed//dang par dbang
19a7(rgyud): bskur bdun po gang //byis pa rnams ni gzhug pa'i phyir//rnam gsum 'jig rten kun rdzob kyis//dam pa'i don gyis bzhi pa'o//bden pa gnyis kyi chos rnams kyi//rdo rje can
19b1(rgyud): bdag gis bstan pa//'jig rten kun rdzob bden pa dang //dam pa'i don gyis bden pas so//chu dang cod pan dang dbyangs dang //rdo rje dril bu brtul zhugs che//ming dang rjes gan du yang dag ldan//
19b2(rgyud): dbang bskur rnam bdun mi yi bdog/lus ngag sems ni legs dag pa//mngon par dbang bskur gnyis gnyis so//rjes gnang ye shes yang dag dag/gzhan pa khams sogs dag po
19b3(rgyud): las/ni chu ni khams kyi dag pa ste//cod pan phung po rnam skyong byed//dar dbyangs pha rol phyin pa dag/rdo rje dril bu mi 'gyur che//sangs rgyas skad rgyun mi 'chad pa//nyi zla cig tu dag par byed///
19b4(rgyud): yul dang dbang po legs dag pa//'pho med rdo rje'i brtul zhugs 'gyur//ming ni byams sogs yang dag dge/rjes gnang sangs rgyas nyid dag byed//dbang bskur bdun po 'di rnams yin//
19b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bzhengs nas sbyin par bya//bum pa gsang ba'i dbang bskur dang //shes rab ye shes mngon brjod pa//slar yang shes rab chen po nyid//de yi ye shes mngon brjod byed//
19b6(rgyud): 'gyur dang 'gyur ba de nas 'jog/de nas gzhan yang mi 'dzag pa'o//lus ngag sems ni legs dag pas//dbang bskur gsum po rim pa yis//bzhi pa ye shes yang dag dag/lus
19b7(rgyud): ngag sems ni dag par byed//byis pa dar ma de nas rgan//bzhi pa skye dgu'i bdag po'o//shes rab nu mar yan lag ni//reg pas byang chub sems 'pho'i bde//'o ma 'dzin pas dbang
20a1(rgyud): bskur ba//gang las bde thob de byis pa'o//yun ring gsang bar spro las skyes//byang chub sems ni 'pho ba'i bde//gsang ba'i dbang bskur gsang ba ni//gang las
20a2(rgyud): bde thob de dar ma//yun ring gsang bar spros las skyes//rdo rje'i rtse mor g.yo ba'i bde//shes rab ye shes dbang bskur ba//gang las g.yo ba'i bgrod de rgan//phyag rgya chen po rjes
20a3(rgyud): chags las//skyes pa g.yo med bde ba ni//shes rab chen po'i dbang bskur ba//gang las g.yo med rtogs pa de//ske dgu'i bdag por rnam shes pa//slob pa thams cad bskad
20a4(rgyud): mdzad pa//rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che//byang sems gnyis med mi 'gyur ba//'di ni dam tshig sems dpar 'gyur//rdo rje'i rnal 'byor rnam pa bin//dus kyi 'khor lo 'dir
20a5(rgyud): bshad pa//rnal 'byor pa yi thar ster byed//'di nyid kyi ni bsgrub pa bya//rang gsal bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i//du sogs mtshan ma de rnams kyis//shes rab gzugs brnyan
20a6(rgyud): na mkha' mnyam//yod dang med las rnam par 'das//rang gi sems kyi rkyen gyis don//rdul phran las skyes tshogs pa rnams//kun nas yongs su dor ba yis//du ba smig sgyu
20a7(rgyud): mkha' snang dang //sgron ma 'bar ba zla nyi ma//mun can cha dang thig le che//sna tshogs gzugs brnyan 'od gsal ba//bkab dang ma bkab mig dag gis//stong par 'di ni rjes pa
20b1(rgyud): mIn//rmi lam bzhin du gzugs mthong 'gyur//rtag tu gzugs de bsgom par bya//dngos med gzugs la sgom pa de//rnal 'byor pa yi sgom ma yin//dngos po dngos med sems kyi/
20b2(rgyud): min//stong par ma brtags mthong phyir ro//ji ltar bya phab me long la//gzhon nu mos mthong dngos med skyes//de bzhin 'das dang mo 'ongs chos//mkha' la de nyid rnal 'byor pas//
20b3(rgyud): 'di la dngos po dngos med 'gyur//dngos po stong pa'i don mthong phyir//dngos po dngos med don yod pa//sgyu ma rmi lam mig 'phrul bzhin//med pa'i chos can dag la chos//skye ba 'di ni/
20b4(rgyud): rab tu mthong //yid bzhin nor ltar mtha' yas pa'i//sems can bsam pa yongs rdzogs byed//pra phub pa yi gzhon nu mas//ma mthong ba yi rkun po mthong //nyi tshe ba yi mog dag
20b5(rgyud): gris//song nas sgrub pa po yis mthong //gal te yod pa'i gzugs mthong na//rang gi gdong po ces mi mthong //gal te med pa'i gzugs mthong na//ri bong rwa ni ji ltar min//gzhan
20b6(rgyud): gyi mig gis mi mthong zhing //rang gi mig gis mthong min pa//skye ba med pa mthong ba ni//gzhon nu ma yi bu ji bzhin//gzugs brnyen mthong na de nas ni//bar ma chad par srog bcom
20b7(rgyud): bya//steng 'og rtsa gsum po rnams la//lus ngag sems ni 'gog pa las//zla nyi sgra gcan bshing gci dang //khu ba 'bab pa'i lam rnams//chu me stong pas dang rlung //ye shes
21a1(rgyud): /khams kyi rnams la//gang dag zlani nan can dang //bshA gci khu bu 'bab ma rnams//zlog dang dung dpol rim pa las//wam+b+ha dag sems kyin rnams so//zlu bzlanas
21a2(rgyud): sku yin te//nyin mor byed pa shes rab gsung //shes rab sku ni bshang ba'i rtsa//ci ba 'bab ma gtso bo'i gsung //steng 'og thugs kyi rtswa gnyis dag/mun can khu ba 'bab ma'o//thaH
21a3(rgyud): kyi thugs ni mun pa can//khu ba 'bab ma shes rab kyi//steng 'og rigs drug 'di rnams ni//sku gsung thugs kyi rnal 'byor las//deshes rab thabs dngos yan lag gis//lus
21a4(rgyud): can kun la yang dag gnas//'chi ltas lus ngag rtsa dag la//steng 'og lhag pa'i rlung rnams kyis//mun can khu ba 'bab ma la//skye ba dang ni 'chi ba gnas//skye dang 'chi dang 'khrig
21a5(rgyud): pa yi//dus su khu ba 'bab pa'o//mun can ma yang steng du 'bab//nyi ma'i 'pho ba mnyam pa las//dus sbyor 'char ba'i mngon mtsham su//da bu ma nas ni mnyam pa 'bab//rkang pa dang bcas
21a6(rgyud): lnga bcu drug/'byung dang 'jug pa'i me yi bdag/bdun cu rtsa lngas lhag pa yis//drug brgya nyin dang mtshan la'o//drug brgya rnams kyis lhag pa yi//stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig po//
21a7(rgyud): 'di yos dman pa gang de rnams//g.yon dang g.yas pa'i rtsar 'beb po//phyogs gsum dang bcas lo gsum rnams//lo brgya rnams las dbu ma'o//steng du g.yon g.yas zla nyi ma//
21b1(rgyud): brkyang ma lug dang sor skya gzhan//chu dang me yi rang bzhin can//pad+ma rin chen 'dzin par 'dod//'og tu bshang gci 'bab pa dag/sa dang rlung gi rang bzhin can//dbu ma'i rtsa dang g.yon pa
21b2(rgyud): yang //'khor lo rol gri 'dzin par 'dod//steng dang 'og tu dbu mi g.yas//sgra gcan khu ba rab 'bab pa//stong pa ye shes rang bzhin cani//rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin par 'dod//zla ba'i lam gyis/
21b3(rgyud): bshang ba'i rtsa//nyi mas gci ba 'bab pa ste//skye 'chi mnyam pa chags pa la//sgra gcan khu ba rab tu 'bab//zla ba'i steng du kun 'dar ma//gang de yid bzang mun pa 'bab//'og tu khu ba
21b4(rgyud): 'bab gang de//mkha' 'gro gdong dang dung can mo//lte ba'i chu skyes snying mgrin dang //dpral ba gtsug tor 'dam skyes la//sa chu ma rlung stong pa rnams//rab tu 'bab pa sdud pa yis//
21b5(rgyud): 'byung 'gyur de ni 'jug pa dag/bskyed pas 'jug ste sa la'o//lte ba nas ni lte ba'i dbus//a ba d+hU tir 'gro dang 'ong //lte gsang nor bu'i chu skyes la//lus ngag sems rnams 'bab/
21b6(rgyud): pa ni//'byung dang de ni 'jug pa dag/sdud dang bskyed pa'i rang bzhin can//dung can skye bo thams cad kyi//thur sel rlung ni 'bab pa'o//'di rnams bud med bde ba las//khu ba khrag
21b7(rgyud): 'bab dus dag tu//shes rab thabs dngos yan log gis//steng du g.yas dang g.yon dag dang //'og tu bshang gtso 'bab pa dang //rdul dang khu ba 'bab pa dag/rdul 'bab phyir de
22a1(rgyud): gtum mo ste//khu ba 'bab phyir mkha' 'gro gdong //steng du brjod dus bud med kyi//g.yung mo skyes bu'i kun 'dar ma//rnam shes la sogs dkyil 'khor lnga//rtag tu
22a2(rgyud): g.yon pa'i rtsa la'o//sa sogs g.yas pa'i rtsa la ste//dbus su drug pa 'bab pa'o//lte ba'i pad+ma'i 'dab ma la//dkyil 'khor drug cu rnams rim bzhin//g.yon dang g.yas pa'i dus
22a3(rgyud): sbyor ni//lug sogs glang la sogs pa la//rtsa ba g.yon dang de nas g.yas//steng dang dbus su rim pas rlung //sa sogs dkyil 'khor re re zhing //dbyug gus sna bug dag la'o//rim
22a4(rgyud): pas chu tshod 'bab pa ni//drug cu dang bcas sum brgya'i dbugs//brgya phrag bco brgyad dbugs de rnams//chu tshod lngar ni 'bab pa'o//chu tshod drug cu nyin mtshan du//lus la dkyil
22a5(rgyud): 'khor rnams zhes pa'o//mdab ma'i dbus dang de nas shar//g.yas g.yon gzhan du rim pa yis//g.yon par rtag tu na mkha' sogs//g.yas par sa sogs gzhan las so//
22a6(rgyud): g.yon par rnam shes sogs 'byung ba//g.yas par sa sogs sdud pa'o//nub dang shar du 'dzin ma rlung //phan tshun shes rab thabs yin te//mthe bong mid med dag gis ni//gang phyir
22a7(rgyud): kha la dbang bskur ba//g.yas dang g.yon du me dang chu//phan tshun shes rab thabs yin te//gung mo mdzub mo gnyis dag gis//gang phyir ral grir 'gyur ba'o//zla phyed rnam pa'i
22b1(rgyud): phyag rgya ni//mche ba gri gug mthe chung ste//stong pa mi 'gyur steng 'og tu//phan tshun thabs dang shes rab po//dkyil 'khor bcu po yang dag sbyor//sor mo rnams ni phan tshun du//mgo bor lag mthil
22b2(rgyud): sbyar ba la//gri gug dang bcas rdzi gcig go/dbu mo'i rtsol mnyam pa de//bskyed dang sdud pa'i byed pa po//phung po khams dang rdo rje gsum//gcig nyid dbu mar son pi na'o//zla ba nyi ma'i rtsa
22b3(rgyud): 'gags na//bshang ba gci ba'i rtsa 'gag go/sgra gcan rtsa ni 'gag pa na//'og tu khu ba 'bab 'gag 'gyur//bskyed dang sdud pa'i byed pa can//'dri rnams grol na grol bar 'gyur//
22b4(rgyud): srog dang thur sel lam gsum gyis//'di ni rtsi yi kun spyod do//g.yon pa 'am ni g.yas pa la//mtshan mo gcig dang de bzhin lngar//lhag pa'i rlung ni rab 'bab pa//de las lo gsum
22b5(rgyud): na mchi'o//g.yas pa nyi ma'i 'chi ltas la//lnga dang phyogs tshes nyi shu dang //de nyid gcig lhag gzhan rim pas//nyin zhag sum cu gsum rgyun//gsum gnyis gcig lo zla ba ni//
22b6(rgyud): drug gsum zung zla nyin zhags chos//phyogs lnga yin tan gnyis gcig gis//lus can rnams kyi tshe 'gro'o//rtsa ba nas gcig lhag pa yis//g.yon par zla ba'i rgyu bar 'gyur//nyin
22b7(rgyud): zla nyin zhag zla ba dag/nyin zhag gsum rnams zla ba gsum//nyin la 'chi ltas zla bar dge/'phel 'grib de nas 'di dag la//dbu ma'i 'chi ba'i rgyu ba ni//lo brgya yongasu rdzogs pa
23a1(rgyud): yis//mnyam dang mi mnyam nyin zhag rnams//skye bar skyes pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis//de rgyu g.yas dang g.yon la yang //phyogs gnyis rnam par nyams pa las//gzhan du/
23a2(rgyud): 'chi bar mi 'gyur te//phyogs gnyis yang dag gnas pa na//g.yaso dang g.yon pa'i kun spyod dang //dkyil 'khor lnga rnams 'bab pa'i phyir//'chi ltas mtshan nyid shes nas ni//srog
23a3(rgyud): ni thig ler gzhug par bya//a ba d+hU ti'i zhabs brten nas//mchog tu mi 'gyur bsgom por bya//rtag tu rdo rje bslang bar bya//zla nyi'i bgrod pa 'joms pa las//gzhan du kun 'dar
23a4(rgyud): yan lag la//srog gi rlung ni 'jug pa med//'og tu'ang dung can mthur sel//de ma zhugs las 'chi ba'o//'chi ltos slu ba rnal 'byor pa'i//'di ni dga' ba rnams kyis 'gyur//
23a5(rgyud): mgo bo'i pad+ma gtsug tor las//khu ba 'ongs pa dga' ba ste//mgrin pa snying khar mchog dga'o//dga' bral dga' ba de nas 'gyur//sku tshogs dga' ba lte ba dang //gsang
23a6(rgyud): ba'i pad+mar ging 'ongs pa'o//gsang nas rdo rje nor bu'i bar//lhan cig skyes dga' mi 'phro ba//rab gnas mya ngan 'das pa min//chags tshin mi 'gyur khyab bdag po//'dod
23a7(rgyud): chags bral las 'pho med bde//de ni mya ngan las rab gnas//khu ba zlo 'char gtsug tor du//rdzogs po gsang ba'i mtsho skyes la//bcu drug cha gang de nor bu'i//pad+mar rdo rje//
23b1(rgyud): rtse mor gnas//de steng 'pho ba'i dus su 'gyur//nag po'i chos gcig 'ongs pa na//'dod chags bral bas gnam stong la//nyi ma mdzod spu'i gnas su 'gro/de yi cha shas bcu drug la
23b2(rgyud): gtsug tor pad+mar son pa'o//zla ba nyams pa zhes brjod de//chags pa'i bde la chags bral phyir//lus can thams cad 'tshe ba na//zla ba bdud rtsi 'og tu 'gro/steng du nyi ma rdul sgra
23b3(rgyud): gcan//rnami shes dngos po'i mtshan nyid la//de phyir zla ba bdud rtsi ni//steng du bgrod bya mi yi bdag/'og tu nyi ma rdul sgra gcan//rnam shes 'gyur med bde ba la//sangs rgyas
23b4(rgyud): kun gyi mdzod pu yi//pad+mar zla ba bdud rtsi nya//nyi rdul gnam stong gsang bar te//gtsug tor nor bu de dag go/ces pa ston pa'i rdo rje'i tshig/lus can kun gyi phyin ci log/rab
23b5(rgyud): gnas mya ngan 'das pa min//khams rnams phyin ci log tu 'gyur//nor bur thugs dang gsang bar gsung //lte bar sku ste bde chen las//chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sprul pa//
23b6(rgyud): 'di rnams dag pa'i sku las spro//thabs kyi 'og tu rgyal po'i dbang //shes rab kyi ni steng du 'gyur//'di yi dpral bar sku rdo rje//mgrin snying lte ba'i 'dam skyes la//gsung thugs
23b7(rgyud): ye shes rdo rje rnams//sprul pa la sogs 'di rnams spro//phung po khams rnams spro ba ni//sgrib pa med pa'i bde ba las//las kyi phyag rgya'i snyoms 'jug dang //ye shes phyag rgya
24a1(rgyud): /dmigs pa dang //phyag rgya chun+d+ra po gcig sbyor bas//mi 'gyur ba de 'phel bar 'gyur//'phel ba'i 'phel bar 'gyur ba med//nyams pa'i nyams pa/
24a2(rgyud): kyang med//nub pa de yi nub pa med//'tshor ba yi ni 'char ba medado//rab tu gsal ba'i rab gsal med//bkab pa'i bkab pa yang med//skye ba'i skye bar 'gyur nyid med//
24a3(rgyud): 'chi ba'i 'chi ba yang med do//grol ba'i grol bar 'gyur ba'ang med//mi gnas pa yi mi gnas med//dngos po med pa'i dngos med med//dngos po'i dngos po nyid kyang med//
24a4(rgyud): 'gyur ba'i 'gyur bar 'gyur ba 'dra med//mi 'gyur ba yi yang mi 'gyur//rang bzhin med pa'i chos rnams kyi//skye 'jig sgyu ma de bzhin no//'byung rnams 'jig par 'gyur
24a5(rgyud): min te//rang bzhin nyid kyis skye mi 'gyur//sna tshogs 'di ni rang bzhin med//dngos po dngos med mtshan nyid cig/rang gi shes rab la 'khyud sems//rdo rje nor bu'i pad+mar son//
24a6(rgyud): der son zla ba g.yo ba med//mi g.yo ba dang mi 'gyur sgom//lus ngag sems kyi rtsa rnams su//sku gsung thugs rnams sgom pa ste//rdo rje gsuM rnams led bsdus pa//
24a7(rgyud): shes dung can mar sgom pa'o//shes rab chags pas nu ba yi//thig le rim pas mgo bo las//rdzogs pa'i gnas su zhugs rnams kyang //'ching ba dam pa'i don bya
24b1(rgyud): d+hostU b+hU shar rim pa y-is//na rnams kyis ni rdzogs par 'gyur//grub mnyams pardzogs pa s+ho//zla brgyad dang rdzogs pa min//de zhin yo shes shar rnam pas//sa rnams na/
24b2(rgyud): rdzogs par 'gyur//nyon myongs la sogs nyams pa rdzogs//ye shes chad dang rdzogs pa smin//ji ltar ri bong mtshan mas dbus//rdzogs par ri bong tsun mi gnas//de bzhin 'gyu //
24b3(rgyud): ming bde bar sems//'khor ba'i bag chags mtshan ma yis//bskyed dang rab tu nyams pa'i phyogs//dkar po nag po rab tu gnas//de dag dbus su rdzogs pa gang //de ni rdzogs pa
24b4(rgyud): mI gnas so//skad cig gcig mngon rdzogs sangs rgyas//rdzogs pa la ni g.yo mi 'gyur//gang che rdo rje ni dpung sems//de ni skad cig thams cad rdzogs//du//po'i phyogs la 'di
24b5(rgyud): mi gnas//res 'ga' dkar mimen la me 'gro/phyogs gnyis po yi dbus gnas pa//rdzogs pa la gnas gnyisu med//gtsug tor las ni shar bi de'i/rdo rje nor bur rdzogs par
24b6(rgyud): 'gyur//de chags bral lasar+b+bA nyams pa//rdo nas nyams la rab rdzogs//slar yang gtsug tor du shar ba//slong yang rdo rje ni bur rdzogs//de chags bral le sna cha nyams pa/
24b7(rgyud): lus can ye shes nyams pa min//'di yi 'de 'i tshe rang bzhin//rdzogs pa'i sgra yis brjid par bya//dngos po bar ma gzhin thams cad//'byung dang spyad pa'i rgyu yin no//srid la
25a1(rgyud): mya ngan 'das par 'gro/de las slar yang srid par dong //rang phyogs dag las zla bzhin dang //bad+mod pa dag las snang byed bzhin//rdzogs par mi g.yo ba 'di ni//rba//
25a2(rgyud): rnams kyis ni yongs rdzogs nyid//nyi khri brgyad gnyis brgya yi dbugs//'gyur med skad cig zos rnams kyis//phyogs gnyis ying dag gnon pa ni//sa rnams kyis ni yongasu rdzogs
25a3(rgyud): bden don rnam pa bcu gnyis pa//rnam pa bcu drug 'gyur ba med//rnam pa bcu gnyis sa rnams kyis//rdzogs pa gnyi su med pa mchog/cha shas rnams kyis rdzogs pa'i sems
25a4(rgyud): rnam pa bcu drug mi 'gyur ba//don gcig gnyi su med pa chos//dam pa'i don te 'jigs pa med//rdzogs pa'i gnas skabs son pa'i sems//kun nas rab tu rdzogs pa'o//chags
25a5(rgyud): bral dang po tshogs pamo//rdo rje lus med mi 'gyur chu//yongs su rdzogs pa phyogs gnyis kyis//bge chags rnams kyis ma ma byung ba'o//ji ltar chu bo'i chu zhugs pa//de ni rgyu ma
25a6(rgyud): chur mtshungs pa//de bzhin dngos po'i tshogs 'di ni//'gyur ba med pa 'gyur med mtshungs//ji ltar khams kyi tshogs pa 'di//zos pa las ni ro nyid 'gyur//sa bon rang bzhin
25a7(rgyud): sa bon gyis//'bras bu'i dus su nga rgyal spangs//de ltar dngos po'i tshogs pa yang //mchog tu mi 'gyur zos pa yis//mchog tu mi 'gyur ba nyid 'gyur//rnam pa thams
25b1(rgyud): cad rang bzhin 'dzin//mche ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal ni//dug rdzogs gnas skabs gyur pa na//rma la rig min gzhan du min//yul rnams dbang ba'i sgo rnams kyis//de bzhin rnal 'byor dam/
25b2(rgyud): pa'i bde//sems rdzogs char gyur na rdo rje//nor bur rig min gzhan du min//yul rnams dbang po'i sgo rnams kyis//ji ltar ro chen lcags rnams kyi//phyogs gcig yang dag gnas pa
25b3(rgyud): ni ljags la drag po'i mes gdungs na//kun nas kun tu 'bigs par byed//de bzhin nyid du 'gyur med bde//phyogs gcig yang dag gnas pa yang //sems la 'dod pa'i mas
25b4(rgyud): gdungs na//kun nas kun tu 'bigs par byed//ji ltar phug pa'i lcags rnams ni//'ga' zhig du yang dri ma med//de bzhin du ni phug pa'i sems//'ga' zhig du yang bag chags med//
25b5(rgyud): lcags ni gser nyid du gyur pa//me yis dri ma med par 'gyur//de bzhin yang dang yang du sems//'dod chags me yis dri ma med//ji ltar nor bu che reg las//rdo ni rab tu 'bar bar
25b6(rgyud): 'gyur//de bzhin 'gyur med bdi reg las//sems ni bde ba nyid du 'gyur//'dir ni mang po brjod pas ci//'jig rten kun rdzob bden pa yi//lcags rnams rab tu 'bugs byed pa//
25b7(rgyud): ro yi mthu ni brtag bya man//ci zhig slar yang don dam pas//blo bur dri mas g.yogs pa yi//sems ni rab tu 'bugs byed pa//ye shes mthu ni brtag bya min//sems lo gla bur
26a1(rgyud): dri ma med//sems las yun ring dus can min//sems med par ni skye ba med//sems la mi zad gnas pa min//gal te 'di nyid blo bur ba//de tshe sngon du sems
26a2(rgyud): dri med//gang tshe sems las dus ring can//de tshe de ni ci las skyes//gal te sems med par skye na//de tshe na mkha'i me tog mtshungs//gal te sems la rtag tu gnas//de
26a3(rgyud): tshe kun tu thar pa min//ji ltar zangs kyi dri ma ni//ro yi sbyor bas nyams par 'gyur//de yi yid nyid nyams pa med//dri med nyid kyis yang dag gnas//de bzhin sems
26a4(rgyud): kyi dri ma ni//stong nyid sbyor bas rnam nyams 'gyur//de yi ye shes nyid nyams med//de med nyid kyis yang dag gnas//ji ltar bcud kyis phug pa'i lcags//lcags
26a5(rgyud): nyid du ni rjes 'gro min//de bzhin bde bas phug pa'i sems//sdug bsngal nyid du rjes 'gro min//chags bral las gzhan sdig pa med//bde ba las gzhan bsod
26a6(rgyud): nams med//dri phyir 'gyur med bde bar sems//mi bdag rtag tu gnas par bya//gzhon nu ma yi dga' ba ni//med par bde ba smra mi nus//lang tsho'i dga' ba thob pa na///
26a7(rgyud): bde ba chen po rang gis rig/de bzhin ting 'dzin dang bral ba'i//bde ba smra bar nus ma yin//'gyur med ting 'dzin thob pa na//rnal 'byor pa yis rang rig 'gyur//'gyur med
26b1(rgyud): las skyes bde rig pa//thams cad mkhyen la'ang the tshom za//de lta na yang yid bde min//chags bral nyid du mi bya'o//'phos pa las ni chags bral 'gyur//chags bral las ni sdug
26b2(rgyud): bsngal 'byung //sdug bsngal skyes bu'i khams zad byed//zad pa las ni 'chi bar brjod//shi nas slar yang de rnams kyi//srid pa'o srid las slar 'chi 'pho//de ltar sems can gyi srid pa//
26b3(rgyud): chags bral lnga 'byung gzhan du min//de phyir 'bang po thams cad kyis//'pho ba'i chags pa rnam par spang //gang gis 'gyur med bde bar 'gyur//rnal 'byor 'khor ba bcings pa
26b4(rgyud): yis//'dod ldan yang ni chags bral bar//'dod pa'i bstan bcos su mi 'dod//bdag gis brjod pa'i rgyud tu slar//rnal 'byor pa ci sdug bsngal 'dod//khu ba mi 'gyur rang
26b5(rgyud): bzhin gyis//mchog tu mi 'gyur bsgrub par bya//rten ni 'pho ba thob pa na//brten pa'i 'dod chags bral ba nyid//rten dang brten pa legs rdzogs pa//ji srid 'gyur mod nyid du
26b6(rgyud): 'gro/sems kyi 'gyur medra nyid thob na//rten dang brten pa'i mtshan nyid med//'gyur med las byung sku yi ni//mdzod spu'i 'khor lor son pa'i yang //I li kI li mnyam
26b7(rgyud): sbyor ba//hUM yig mi 'dod mi yi bdag/stong pa las byung gzugs brnyan rgyu//mi 'gyur las skyes bde ba 'bras//rgyu ni 'bras bus rgyas btab pa//'bras bu rgyu yis rgyas btab
27a1(rgyud): pa'o//stong nyid gzugs brnyan 'dzin pa rgyu//snying rje 'gyur med 'dzin pa 'bras//stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa//byang chub sems de mi 'pho bo'o//mya ngan 'das pa bra
27a2(rgyud): ba'i gzugs//'khor ba las 'das mi 'gyur ba//de dge sbyor ba gnyis med mchog/rtag dang chad las nges par grol//dngos med las byung mtshan nyid phyir//gzugs ni dngos
27a3(rgyud): po med pa min//dngos po las byung mtshan nyid phyir//'gyur ba med pa dngos po mir//dngos po dngos med yang dag sbyar//rdo rje'i rnal 'byor gnyis med mchog/gzugs dang
27a4(rgyud): gzugs min rnam par grol//pra phab me long la bzhin no//gzugs ni srid par mi 'ong ste//'gyur med mya ngan 'das ma 'gro/phan tshun mkhyud pa zhi ba ste//ma ning gi ni go
27a5(rgyud): 'phang mchog/shes rab rgyu las ma byung zhing //shes rab rgya las byung ba 'bras//shes rab rgyu las byung skyes phyir//shes rab la skyes rgyu skyes min//de phyir ye shes rgyu
27a6(rgyud): skyes min//shes rab ye shes bla na med//'bras bu rgyu yis gzhan dang gzhan//phan tshun du ni rgyas btab med//rgyu dang 'bras bu thams cad gang //de ni rten cing 'brel par
27a7(rgyud): 'byung //phan tshun rgya yis btab pa'i gzugs//skye min mya ngan 'das pa'ang min//shes rab kun nas mya ngan 'das//skye ba mchog tu 'gyur ba med//rgyu dang 'bras bu rnam
27b1(rgyud): sa grog//pan tshun dun rnas ba med//ma smyos pa dang ma zhugags pa'o/shos byu glang zhig/'di ga//den rang seMm sna gzhan ma yin//phyi shes blanam byed d+ha//
27b2(rgyud): phyir bdag gis bdag nyid la//'gar yang rgyas gdab nus ma yin//ral gri chen po bdag nyid la//bdag nyid so yis gcod dam ci//ma gsham bu mo dang 'grogs pas//rmi lam du ni bde
27b3(rgyud): 'gyur ltar//nam mkha' las byung gzugs brnyan ni//bsten pas bdag la de bzhin no//shes rab ma yin thabs kyang min//'di ni lhan skyes shes rab bcas//kun nas bde ba rdzogs pa las//
27b4(rgyud): sgrib pa thams cad spangs pa ste//na mkha' bzhin du gos pa med//yul dang dbang po spangs pa ni//kun nas 'byung po kun la gnas//bcad du med pa dbye ba spangs//rang byung rdo rje sems dpa'
27b5(rgyud): 'di//don chen mchog tu mi 'gyur ba//'dod chags chen po sems dpa' che//sem can thaMd dga' bar byed//byang chub sems dpa' zhe sdang che//nyon mongs zad pa dgra chen po//
27b6(rgyud): dam tshig sems dpa' gti mug che//gti mug blo ste gti mug sel//rdo rje'i rnal 'byor khro ba che//lha mni khro bo dag chen po//dus kyi 'khor lo chags pa che//'phro ba'i chags pa sel
27b7(rgyud): par byed//rdo rje mi phyed zhes par brjod//'dir ni ngon chen bcom ldan 'das//sems dpa' srid gsum gcig pa nyid//mchog tu mi 'gyur brjod par bya//mchog tu mi 'gyur bde ba rdzogs/
28a1(rgyud): sa rnams yongs su rdzogs pa yis//'dod chags chen po sems dpa' tshe//sems can thams cad dga' bar byed//byang chub la gnas sems dpa' ni//mI g.yo de phyir
28a2(rgyud): byang chub sems//nyon mongs la sogs zhe sdang tshogs//zhe srung chen po dag che ba//dam tshig zla ba bdud rdzi yi//khu ba 'pho med de za ba//dam tshig sems dpa'i 'o rigs 'dis//gauti
28a3(rgyud): mug blo s+t+waM gti mug sel//rdo rje thams cad gcig pa nyid//shes rab sku dang mi 'gyur bcas//khro bo chen po dgra chen po//khro bo'i gzugs can bdud rnams kyis//'gyur med bde ba
28a4(rgyud): che thabs las//nAm yang sems can don mi 'dor//sems can grol nas chags chen po//'gyur ba'i chags pa sel bar byed//'di rnams rnam pa drug tu brjod//mi 'gyur ye shes
28a5(rgyud): tshor ba dang //rnam shes gzugs dang 'du byed dang //'du shes de rnams phung po'i rigs//ye shes me drang na mkha' sa//rlung chu rnams kyi rim pa bzhin//yid mig rna ba lus dang sna///
28a6(rgyud): lce rnams kyi yang de bzhin nyid//sgra ro chos kyi dbyings dang dri//reg bya kha dog rnams kyis yang //khro bo'i rgyal po gdong drug 'jigs//rigs drug rnams kyi yongs dag pa//lus rig/
28a7(rgyud): gsang ba dbang po sems//rtag tu dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum//shes rab thabs kyi rdo rje gsum//rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur//'di ni dbang gis sgrub thabs te//mchog tu mi
28b1(rgyud): 'gyur sgrub pa'i thabs//rtsa dang rigs dang yang drug ldan//zla ba mdor bstan pa yis bshad//ces pa 'jig rten khams kyi le'ur le'u lnga pa'i mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i dbang gis sgrub thabs mdor bstan
28b2(rgyud): brdzogs so////'di ni kha che'i paN+Di ta so ma nA ba dang /bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba 'bro dge slong shes rab grags pas bsgyur cing zhus te/gtan la phab pa las/slar yang rin chen rgyal mtshan gyis/
28b3(rgyud): dpal nA rlo pa'i 'grel bshad dang 'thun par bsgyur cing /zhus te dag par byas pa'o///rgya gar skad du/pa ra ma A di bud+d+ha ud d+h+r-i ta shrI ka la tsakra nA ma tan+ta rA dzAM/bod skad du/mchog
28b4(rgyud): gi dang po'i sangs rgyas las byung ba rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal dus kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba//dpal dus kyi 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal lo//thams cad mkhyen pa ye shes sku dang nyin mor byed pa'i
28b5(rgyud): sku ste pad+ma'i mdab ma rgyas pa'i spyan//sangs rgyas seng ge'i khri la bzhugs po lha mchog rnams kyis btud la rgyal po zla ba bzang po yi//mgo bos rab tu phyag 'tshal lag pa'i pad+ma
28b6(rgyud): sbyor ba yin lag mchog la bzhag nas zhus pa ni//rnal 'byor dpal ldan dus 'khor ka phreng ldan pa'i a 'dus la ste mi rnams dgrol ba'i don tu'o//stong pa ye shes kyang ste thig
28b7(rgyud): lo mchog mchog rdo rje 'dzin pa sangs rgyas lha dang lha min yang //phyi dang lus dang gzhan la yang ste rang bzhin rnams la skyes bu nyi shu lnga pa'i bdag nyid dang //lus la sna tshogs tshad dang /
29a1(rgyud): /srid pa gsum gyi bkod pa lnga dang lha min rnams kyi longs spyad dang //dkyil 'khor dang ni dbang ste skabs gdum pa dang mi yi bla mas 'di dag yang dag bshad du gsol//zla ba
29a2(rgyud): bzang po khyod la bdag mgu gang zhig khyod kyis dris pa 'di ni rab mchog lho rnams dang //mi dang srin po lha min klu dang chags bA rtswa thub mchog rigs rnams dag gis shes pa min pas so//
29a3(rgyud): mya ngan 'das pa la sogs 'dzin ma'i mthar thag tshig gi bgrod pa dang bcus sbyor ba mtha' dag ni//lus dbus su ste dkyil 'khor dag dang dpung ni bshad par bya yis mi yi bdag po
29a4(rgyud): bzang po nyon//dus kyi stong pa rnams las rlung dang 'bar byed chu dang 'dzin mo gling dang ri bo rgya mtsho dang //rgyu skar dang ni nyi zla skar ma gza' yi tshogs dang drang srong lha dang 'byung ngo klu rnams
29a5(rgyud): dang /dud 'gro skye gnas rnam pa bzhi dang sna tshogs dang 'og tu mi rnams dang ni dmyal ba yang //stong pa'i dbus su yang dag 'byung ste tshul lan tshwa dang ni sgra nga'i dbus su sgong skyes bzhin
29a6(rgyud): lus dang ye shes no mkha' dang ni rlung dang me dang chu ngas dang brtan dang g.yo ba dang //lha ni mthong ba bskyed min dag dang srid pa rnams bcur gsungs pa rdo rje yi ni lus ngag las//sngags
29a7(rgyud): kyi skye gnas dag na 'byung bar 'gyur zhing me yi bdag po slar yang 'di nyid du grol te//de ltar gang gis yang dag rig pa de ni phyug min sems kyi kun tu rtog pa dag las grol/
29b1(rgyud): g.yon gyi yan lag du ni dkar po 'byar ba 'gro ba'i bdud rtsi'i n+da dang g.yas su dmar po mdog/sgra gcan+da dus me zla ba nyi ma ri bong can+da gyi bu dang sa skyes dkar po bla ma dang //mjug ring sa/
29b2(rgyud): dman pa char dang glog dang chu dang rtse mo can te 'bar ba rnams ni zung bdun po//'jig rten la ni gnas pa nyid de mun pa med pa zung gcig dag ni mun pa'i mtha' le'o//rgyab tu ser po yang
29b3(rgyud): ni skar ma lha gzhu se ste de ni rnam gzhi gnyis kyi dbye bas so//srog ces bya ba gcig pu'i rlung ni rnam bcur 'gyur te spyi bo rtsa ba dag dang mdun du'o//dbus kyi rdo rje'i steng du so bon rang gi
29b4(rgyud): nus pa yon tan tshigs dang bcas pa'i 'og tu gnas//kun tu ye shes dang ni stong pa'o zhi ba gnas dang bcas pa dngos po kun gyis rnam par grol//a sogs sum cu'i dbyangs gang
29b5(rgyud): he ya ra wa lar ldan de dag zla ba'i cha dang nyin byed kyang //ka la sogs pa'i sde rnams dbyangs dang bcas pa nyin zhag stong drag me yi tshad kyis spyod par byed//ha segs dbyangs rnams dag
29b6(rgyud): kyang chu tshod lha mi gdengs can 'byung po'i skye gnas dag kyang sngags shes pa//oM sogs ka sogs ldan pa dag las de ltar khams gsum dag ni nges par skyed 'gyur mi yi bdag/
29b7(rgyud): dbyangs ni ka tsa Ta pa tar ldan thA la sogs po yang dag sbyar ba rnams kyis skye ba'i gnas//mgrin rkan steng gi cha ni mkha' rlung bsreg bya las skyes mchu dang so ni chu dang sa dag go//a
30a1(rgyud): sogs rnams ni gtsug tor 'khor lo snying mgrin mgo bo lte ba'i 'khor lo dag la rim pa ste//sna tshogs gnag dmar ri bong can dang gser 'dra phung po khams kyi
30a2(rgyud): lhag pa'i lha dang ldan pa la'o//rlung gi mtha' nas lhun po'i mtshams su dmyal ba gdengs can grong khyer la ni dpag tshad 'bum phrag gnyis//lhun po'i tshad ni 'bum phrag gcig
30a3(rgyud): ste gza' yi tshogs kyi gnas nas stong phrag dag ni nyi shu lnga//mgrin pa'i gdong la lnga bcu brten pa'i go 'phangs g.yo med dag la de bzhin nyid nyi shu lnga//de yi phyi rol stong pa
30a4(rgyud): gcig tu srid pa gsum bral yon tan med cing de nyid kyis dman pa'o//rlung gi mtha' nas rlung gi mtshams dang brtan pa 'dzin ma'i gzhi la spring dang ri dang rgya mtsho rnams//gzhi
30a5(rgyud): phyed 'bum phrag gnyis te rtse mo can dang g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor dpag tshad dag ni 'bum phrag gnyis//dbus na lhun po gang gi steng du khyim gyi 'khor lo skar bcas nyin dang
30a6(rgyud): mtshan mor 'khor ba ste//cha drug la ni 'bum phrag gnyis gnyis srid gsum mtha' dag dus kyi sbyor bdag las rab tu skyes/ 'jig rten khams kyi kun nas 'khor yug du
30a7(rgyud): ni thad ka'i tshad kyi sum 'gyur du yang 'gyur ba ste//sa yi khor yug 'bum phrag gsum dang chu me rlung rnams kyi ni drug dgu nyi ma rim pas so//mi yi dbang po phyi rol srid pa
30b1(rgyud): gsum gyi gnas la dpag tshad 'bum phrag gcig nyid gang yin pa//de ni su yi skyeng gi gnas su lus la rang rang dag ni chadas yang dag khru gang ngo //phra rab brgyad rnams drug gas
30b2(rgyud): phra mo 'di gcig phra mo brgyad kyis skra yi rtse mo phra mo ste//'di rnams kyis ni ske tshe shig dang nas twe ltos 'gro nas kyis ser mo nyi ma ni//zung gis khru'o khru bzhis gzhu ste 'dir ni stong phrag
30b3(rgyud): gnyis kyi gzhu yis rgyang grags dag tu 'gyur//rgyang grags bzhi rnams drag gis dpag tshad dro yis lha yul sa dang na mkha' dag la tshad yin no//dang por chos bzang bskal pa
30b4(rgyud): zung ni zung dang ldan pa dag ste tshangs dang 'jig rten 'das pa dang //dpal gyi bskal pa dkar po'i bskal pa yang ste shin tu dbang gyur gnas nas 'dod pa bcu gcig go//gzugs
30b5(rgyud): med dag ni A sogs bzhi po ha 'khrig bral ba rnams te i la sogs pa bcu drug gzugs//ha sogs la mtha' yang ni 'dod pa rnam bcur rab tu gsal te gsal byed gcig
30b6(rgyud): pa ka sa'o//srid pa sum cu rtsa gcig dag gis 'dir ni srid gsum du 'gyur/khams kyi dbye bas khams gsum mo//srid gsum ma lus 'di yang rdo rje gsum du 'gyur te a sogs ka
30b7(rgyud): sogs rab tu dbye bas so//rin chen snang nas gseg ma'i chu ni dmyal par nges par brjod de bye ma'i chu ni gnyis pa'o//'dam gyi chu dang mi bzad du bdag dang me dang mun pa dang ni du 'bod
31a1(rgyud): bdun pa dang //lan rA rang drang chu dang ma na dang mar dang sbrang rtsi'i rgya mtshod dun te ri bo ni//'od sngon man du ra rI ni Sha Ta dang nor bu'i 'od dang dro tA bsil rdo rje'o//glu
31a2(rgyud): zla ba 'od dkar dag dong rab mchog ku shwe dang ni mi 'am ci dang khrung khrung dang //drag po yang ni longs spyod sra ste btsun pa 'dzim+bu mI rnams gnas pa drag ni las kyis//sherare du rlung nu
31a3(rgyud): tu zlum por 'gyur te mi yi bdeg po lho ru me ni gru gsum mo//byang du chu ni phyed kyi zla ba dag dang nub d+ho gser mchog sa ni chu yi gter gyi zur//ri rab lhun po stong pa'i rnam pa rdo rje mchog
31a4(rgyud): go rang bzhin dkyil 'khor rnams kyi dbus su ste//sa yi steng du dpag tshad stong phrag rnams ni re dang klu dang gza' dang phyogs rnams dag tu 'gyur//lhun po yi ni steng gi rgya dang sa gzhi
31a5(rgyud): dag gi gnas la dpag tshad rnams kyi stong phrag ni//lnga bcu bcu drug dag gro gcig ni rab mchog sa yi gzhi la khor yug dag gi yang dag ste//rA ni lnga po rnam dag steng dang sa gzhi
31a6(rgyud): dag gi gnas la phyogs kun du ni 'khor yug go/de yi phyi rol glang dang ri bo dag dang chu gter rnams te phyogs rnams kun tu me dang rlung //chu gter drug po thams cad kyang ni zla bA zla
31a7(rgyud): pa gcig gis dmin pa'i steng phrag re re ste//gling rnams dang ni ri rgyud mchog rnams dag kyang de lta'i stong phrag nye shu rtse lnga ni//'dzi m+bu'i gleng gi yangs padag dang lan tshwa'i chu yi
31b1(rgyud): gter ni 'bum phrag phyed kyi tshad sbyin te//srid pa gsum po 'dzin pa yi ni mtha' mdag gi mo dang rlung gi ched dge de bzhin no//tshangs pa'i gnas su dus kyi 'khor lo rgyal ba mchog bcas
31b2(rgyud): lha yi tshogs kyis yang dag bstod pa ste//lhun po la ni tshig mda'i tshogs dang sa gzhi'i 'og na gnas pa klu rnams dag ni rigs lnga'o//dpal ldan lhun po'i phyogs rloms kun tu sa yi dkyil//
31b3(rgyud): 'khor la son gnas rnams kun dang nye ba'i gnas//zhi dang 'dun pa dag dang 'dus pa can dang ro khang gnas ni me dang rlung gi mtshams kyi mthar/shar du brgya byin mer na mo lha gshin
31b4(rgyud): rje bden bral nub phyogs su ni gshin rje srin po chu//rlung dang nor sbyin 'phrog byed phyogs su rlung dang gnod sbyin drag po steng gi cha dang 'og tu yang //tshangs dang khyab 'jug mtshor ldan
31b5(rgyud): 'khor gyi skye bo dang bcas rang rang phyogs ni srung zhing skyong ba ste//de yi dbus su dus kyi 'khor lo rgyal ba mchog gi bskyed mdzad gzhom du med pa rdo rje'i sku//lhun po'i rgyab kyi phyogs
31b6(rgyud): rnams su ni sa gzhi dag la lha myin rnams kyis rgyal bar dka' ba 'khor//gang du chos ni rnam par nyams shing rtsod dus 'jug pa de dang dero ni rab tu baglod par byed//kla klo rnams
31b7(rgyud): kyang g.yul du bcom ste rang gi chos la dgod pa byas nas mdun du rnam par rgyu//rdzogs ldan gsum ldan gnyis ldan dag dang rtsod dus gzhan ni dus kyi sbyor po dag gis 'byung bar
32a1(rgyud): 'gyur//dum bu gang du stobs ldan 'khor lo can te rab tu zhugs pa der ni rdzogs ldan dus bgrod de//rgyal po'i rgyab tu gsum ldan rjod pa'i dus kyang mdun dag tu ste ga
32a2(rgyud): kyi bar du gnyis ldan no//dus rnams dag gi lo yi tshad ni stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig ro brgya dag dang bcas pa ste//re re dag gi tshad ni dus dang mda' yis bsgyur ba'i mi rnams dag gi la
32a3(rgyud): brgya gang yin pa'i//phra dbugs d+hu dang chu tshod nyin zhag d+hA dang dus bzhi drug ni stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcigs dang //drug brgya rnams ni rim pas lus skyes phra dang mi dang 'byung po lha dang lha
32a4(rgyud): min rnams dang ni//nus dang gtso bo'i nyin zhag gcig gi tshad des gzhi dag la ni dus bzhi nus pa'i tshad du 'jug/dum bu dum bur zhi ba'i go 'phang 'khor lo can bgrod nyin zhag
32a5(rgyud): gcig lA nyi ma bcu gnyis so//phyogs dang zla ba mtha' dag dang ni dus dang dus bzhi dang ni mo dus bgrod pa rnam pa gnyis//rgyal po lo ni mtha' dag rje su nyin zhag dus sbyor chu tshad
32a6(rgyud): dradrug dang chu yi srang rnams te//'di rnams de ltar bgrod pa lus skyes phri dang mi dang 'byung po lha dang lha min rnams dang ni//nus dang gtso bo'i zhag re la ste srid pa gsum gyi gnas
32a7(rgyud): gyi gnas dang lus kyi dbus su de bzhin no///lo 'di nas ni drag brgya'i lo yis gsal bar mi bdag grags pa sham b+hi laM zhes bya bar 'byung //de nas klu yi lo brgya rnams kyis
32b1(rgyud): nges par mkha'i yul dak+Sha k+ko'i chos dag rab tu 'jug/de yi dus su 'dzin ma la ni nyung ngu'i byed pa gsal bar mi rnams drug gis rig par bya//mtha' dag sa gzhi la ni grub pa'i mtha' rnams
32b2(rgyud): rnam par nyams pa dus kyi spyod ba la 'byung 'gyur//me mkha' rgya mtsho rnams la rab byung la sogs 'das pa rnams bsres kla klo'i dbang po'i lo ni rab tu grug/klu klo dbang po'i lo ni log pa
