32b3(rgyud): gdengs can zla bas dman po'i lhag ma dag kyang nyi mas bsgyur//nag pa la sogs zla ba bsgres te 'og tu dus kyis bsgyur ba mkha' me zla bas rnam par dbye//rnyed pa steng du bsres pa dag ni
32b4(rgyud): mi yi bdag po zla ba'i tshogs pa rnam par dag par 'gyur//zla ba gnas gsum gyur pa'i dbus mu'i phung po dag la gang gnas lag pa rtse mo can gyis bsgyur//rtsa ba dag la drug go/
32b5(rgyud): chas rnyed de yang bu lon du 'gyur dbus ma la ni sbyang bar bya//steng 'og dag las mig dang sum cu'i nor ni bsres pa gsal bar bya ste drug cu'i cha dag gis//rnyed pa steng du rab bsres thub
32b6(rgyud): pa mchog rnams dag gis bcad pa'i lhag ma dag ni gza' ru 'gyur//gnas gnyis nyi zla ba sres pa dag las dus dang nyi mas thob la 'byung ba bsres pa mtha' dag ni//de yi steng gi/
32b7(rgyud): phung por sbyin te dang po lag pas bsgyur la'o brgyad dang gnyis kyis phye ba tshogs//gnas gsum dbus ma dag ni dbang phyug gis bsgyur 'og ma dgu dang yon tan rnams kyis tshe thob par
33a1(rgyud): gnyis bsres dman pa'i dbu mar chu tshod dag gros thob pa nor te steng gi phung por gnyis kyis ni//bsgyur nas byin la skar mas bgos lhag mi bdag nyi ma'i skar ma/
33a2(rgyud): la sogs longs spyod dag tu 'gyur//gza' la gza' no rab sbyin mi bdag nyis 'gyur chu tshod rnams te 'og tu tshogs dag la yong gnyis//skar mar gnyis dang chu tshod drag po
33a3(rgyud): nor du rab gsal nyi ma'i longs spyod dag la rab tu sbyin//'di dag zla ba'i nges par 'gyur te slar yang zla ba zla ba dag la rab tu sbyin par gsungs//chos rnams sbyin dang dor dang slar yang
33a4(rgyud): sbyin pa dag ni gza' dang chu tshod rkang pa rnams su to//tshogs kyi cha la chu gter zla bas mnyam dang mi mnyam thob pa dgra sbyin dor rkang pa'i don//stong la stong po rnams dag bcu gsu/
33a5(rgyud): zla ba'i rkang par lnga ste mig dang nyi ma dag la phyogs//bcu gcig pA la ches shes bya ste bcu dang chu gter rkang par nyi shur gcig gis dman pa'o/6/lnga dang bug par nyi shu rtsa
33a6(rgyud): gnyis dus dang nor la rgyal ba bdun par nyi shu rtsa lnga ste//de la nyi ma'i rab tu dbye bos gsal byas nyi ma'i rkang pa dag ni sbyin dang dor bar 'gyur//'byung dang 'byung ba mda' dang
33a7(rgyud): rig byed ma lag ri bong can ni snga ma'i cha dang gzhan la yang //tshogs kyi cha la chu gter zla bas monyam dang minyam thob la rgyo ba rnams ni sbyin dang dor/rgya zhing yod pas lcag ma
33b1(rgyud): bsgyur ba las ni dus dang nyi mas tshe thob dag kyang de bzhi no//de nyid la ni nyi ma'i rab tu dbye bas nyi ma'i rkang pa'i chu tshod sbyin dang dor bar 'gyur//gang zhig rig byed rnams kyis chos bsgyur gsad//
33b2(rgyud): bar nor te de yi sum tshwa dag gis bsres pa'o//dus kyi rgyu skar rgung bu gsum bcas bu lon dag ste nyi ma'i longs spyod dbus nas sbyang bar bya//bya ba lhag mo mig dmar ji bzhin ro dus ri
33b3(rgyud): bong can rnams dal ba'i las la rkang pa ste//longs spyod kyis ni chu tshod bsgyur nas mnga' dang yon tan zla bas cha thobo longs spyod dang bcas pa//bgrod pa 'gro ba'i dbang gis nyi ma la ni
33b4(rgyud): sprin dang der te gzhan du dag pa yod ma yin//nyi ma lo ni dus ro sbrul dang bcu dang 'phrog byad 'phrog byed dag po phyo Ta dang klu dang dra'o//me dang na mkha' dag kyang bgrod pa'i mthar te byang dang lho ru
33b5(rgyud): nor dang bu lon dag tu 'gyur//zla ba 'pho ba'i dbye ba dag las phyogs kyi dbye bas zla ba drug ni nyin mor byed pas spyod//nyi ma la byin tshes grangs dag kyang 'og tu ro yis bsgyur la
33b6(rgyud): gza' yi longs spyod bsres pa dge/dman por gyur pa ri bo mtshan mar 'gyur te mi yi bdag po nyi zla ba sres pa sbyor ba'o//byed pa dge ni tshes la mig gis bsgyur ba zla bral
33b7(rgyud): gang zhig bdun gyi cha yi lhag ma'o//dag pa'i le la klu bsres mkha' dang ni mkha' chu gter gyis bsgyur klu bsros rnams kyis sbyangs pa dag/ri zla ma yis rab tu phye ste na mkha'
34a1(rgyud): ros bsgyur ri la sogs pas bgos pa chu chod te//gnyis dang sum cu'i gza' dang chu tshod nges pa 'dir ldan zla ba dag la lo yi 'pho ba'o//lug sogs rnams
34a2(rgyud): kyis snon byed dag la gza'i dang chu tshod rim par yongs bkod bcu gnyis 'di dag ste//zla ba ri 'byung rig byed dag dang yon tan mda'i ste ri bong can dang ri zla gsum pa la'o//rig
34a3(rgyud): byed mi 'byung zla ba mig dang lag pa dus dang rig byed mig ni drug pa dag la'o//drug dang zla ba mda' dang zla bo ri dus me dang drug zla rig byed ra dang 'jig rten dang //drug dang rig byed stong
34a4(rgyud): pa dag ste stong pa mig mda' nyi ma'i go 'phang nya yau khyim la'o//zla dag 'phel dang 'grib par 'gyur te nyin dang mtshan mo dag kyang nyi ma rab tu rgya bas so//chu gter srog dang chu srang
34a5(rgyud): me ni nyin zhag so so'i dus su 'phel 'grib bgrod pa'i yan lag gaM/lho phyogs su ni mtshan mo dag kyang 'phel bar 'gyur te kha ba'i ri yo byadang du nyin mo'o//zla ba dag la mog
34a6(rgyud): dang nyi ma bsres pa mig gis rnam bsgyur zla ba'i tshigs la gcig bsres te//mkha' dus chu yis rab phye thub pa lag pas bsgyur ba las kyang mkha' sogs cha yis skar ma'o//
34a7(rgyud): lhag ma drug nus bsgyur ba gang yin de las chu tshod slar yang de bsgyur ba las chu srang ste//thob pas dman pa'i 'khor lo gdong du 'gyur te mun can mjug ma dag kyang rgyu skar byed
34b1(rgyud): bsres pa'o//zla ba sum nus bsgyur ba nyin zhag so so dag dang bcas pa las ni ri mkha' ris thob pa//gnas gsum dbus su rnam par bsres pa las kyang chu gter ros thob dman pa mi gsa'i
34b2(rgyud): nyin zhag go//ri dus gcig gis bsres pa dag kyang gsal ba'i nyin zhag tshogs te ri k+ka dus kyis bgos pa yi//lhag ma skar mas bsgyur thob slar yang na mkha' ro yis bsgyur las ri la so Da
34b3(rgyud): pas chu tshod do//mig dmar la ni phyed bcas dgu sbyang gal te bu lon lhag na 'khor lo bsres la rnam par sbyang //phyed pas lhag par gyur na 'khor lo phyed na dor bar bya ste dor ba'i lhag ma rim
34b4(rgyud): min 'gyur//skar ma drug cus bsgyur te chu tshod dag dang rab tu ldan par gyur pa 'byung me zla bas bgo/gang thob dal po'i las dag la yang nor dang bu lon dag ni rim pa min dang rim pas so//nga
34b5(rgyud): nyid bco brgyad ri ni rab tu gsal bar ro rkang 'khor lo phyed la steng dang 'og tu ste//longs spyod kyis ni chu tshod bsgyur las mnga' dang yon tan zla bas 'khor lo phyed las cha thob pa//snga ma phyed la
34b6(rgyud): bzung byar 'dod de rkang pa'i dbang gis de bzhin phyi ma phyed la dor byar 'gyur//zos pa tshogs gcig byas nas gza' yi bgrod pa'i dbang gis sbyin dang dor po dag kyang chu tshod la'o//de nas nye
34b7(rgyud): mar so skyes rnam par sbyang te bla ma nye skyes dag kyang myur ba'i las la'o//zla skyes dkar po la yang nyi mo dag ste myur ba'i las la nges par rim pos nor du 'gyur//sbyangs pa'i lhag mas
35a1(rgyud): 'dir ni rkang pa dag ste gza' rgyu rkang pa rnams kyis lhag ma'i chu tshod bsgyur//drug cu'i cha yis thob pa gza' rgyu rkang pa dag las bzung bya dang ni dbrog bya de bzhin nyid//zas
35a2(rgyud): pa dang ni tshogs gcig byas nas gza' yi bgrod pa'i dbang gis sbyin dang dor ba mtha' dge ste//sa skyes la ni rkang pa rgyal ba sogs te rab gsal ma nu'i gnas la mtha' dag bzhag par bya
35a3(rgyud): de ltar gza' rnams thams cad kyi ni rim par yongs su brtsi ba rig par bya'o mi yi dbang //zla skyes dkar po las ni nyin mor byed pas rnam dag zla skyes dkar po dag tu yang dag 'gyur//stong
35a4(rgyud): dang na mkha' zla bas bsgyur ba'i mtha' dag nyin zhag chags la me dang nyi ma ri yis dman//r-I naMs bug pa ri dang klu yis bgo ste slar yang lhag ma skar ma la sogs dbye bas bsgyur//rab
35a5(rgyud): brjod cha yis rgyu skar dge dang slar yang chu tshod rnams ni zla skyes longs spyod dag tu 'gyur//zla skyes dor te nyi ma'i dbus nas mi bdag bzang po mi bdag skar ma phyed kyang yang dag sbrang //lhag
35a6(rgyud): ma'i bya ba nor dang bu lon dal dang myur ba'i las kyang mig dmor ji lta bzhin du 'gyur//zla skyes rkang pa dal ba'i lus la bcu ri me ste myur ba'i las la mi bdag la sogs so//nyin zhag chos
35a7(rgyud): ni mkha' mkha' ro dang mig gis dman pa byas nas so me chu gter dag gis bgo/lhag mo skar mas bsnun las skar ma slar yang chu tshod bla ma yi yang dal ba'i las la'o//rgyu skar nyi ma
35b1(rgyud): mal na ngam mthamatham chams samatham sa mthams mtha thas mthasasam a mamam mam
35b2(rgyud): sbyang sgro 'phrog byed dgu dang rno mo can ni dal ba'i las la rkang pa'o//slar yang myur ba dag la rkang pa rab gsal ma nu'i gnas la phyogs nang la sogs de dag go//nyin zhag mkha' dang zla bas bsgyur nas
35b3(rgyud): chu gtir nor gyis dman pa ri dang rgyal ba mig gis bgo/skar mas bsgyur ba las kyang skar ma'i longs spyod slar yang chu tshod myur ba'i las la pa sangs kyi//rgyu skar dus ni nyi ma la sgyid zla dusong ngo
35b4(rgyud): can ni dal ba'i las la rkang pa ste//myur la de nyid la sogs dbye bas rab gsal ma nu'i gnas dag las te sbyin dor mig dmar bzhin//mkha' mig klu dang rig byed kyis dman gsol ba'i nyan
35b5(rgyud): zhag tshogs ni drug ro ri mkha' zla ba yis//bgo zhing skar mas bsgyur las skar mar 'gyur te spen pa yi ni dor bya dag kyang bco brgyad do//rkang pa nyi shu rtsi gnyis tshes dus rab gsal ro yi gan
35b6(rgyud): la'o myur ba'i las la ro la sogs//myur dal rgyu ba dag kyang rim pas rkang pa bgrod pa la ste 'khyog po nyid ni rim min gyis//byed snga ma dang phyed phyi mar yang nyi ma 'gro ba'i dbang gis gza'
35b7(rgyud): rnams kyi ni 'byung ba yang //sum cu rtsa bdun lag pas bsgyur ba'i zla ba rnams kyis mjug rings dag ni myur dang 'khyog por 'gyur//gang dag su zhig nyi ma'i longs sgyid lA ni rab zhugs gan
35b8(rgyud): de dag kyang nges par nub par 'gyur//nyi mi btang nas 'char bar 'gyur te de yi lam yang bgrod pa 'gri ba'i rnam par dbye bas so//g.yon pa'i lam la gnas pa gang yin de ni nyi ma 'gro
36a1(rgyud): ba'i dbyung gis g.yon nas 'gro ba ste//g.yas la gnas pa dag ni gangs kyis slang yang gsal bar 'dir ni ldan tshun 'thab sto dgra yin phyir//rang gi zhing la ya
36a2(rgyud): drage gnas rnams gal te de la dgra drag gyur na nges par 'thub pa'o//skar ma lA ste grazhan la 'thab pa min pA raM nges shing 'drir ni phan tshun mtshungs pa dag tu ldan//gal te nyi ma
36a3(rgyud): yi ni g.yon du zla ba rab zhugs gyur cing 'byung ba yang ni g.yon pa yis//byang gi rwa ni mtho bar 'gyur te kha cig du ni bgrod pa'i dbang gis lho ru g.yas pa yang //tshigs mtsham su
36a4(rgyud): yang sgra gcan gdong dang mnyam par 'gro ba mngon du phyogs par 'dzin pa kho na'o//g.yon du rgyu bo dag la g.yas min du ste nyi ma'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis g.yas la g.yas pa'i
36a5(rgyud): char//de ltar sgra gcan gyis ni phyogs mtshams su 'dzin ri bong 'dzin pa 'byung ba dag ni rgyab tu yang //tha skar la sogs nag pa phyed du nyin dang mtshan mo mnyam pa'i dbus su
36a6(rgyud): go la'i ri mo'o//rgyu skar g.yos dang g.yas min dag la nges par srid bI'i gnas su khyim gyi dbye bras yang dag gnas//gzhu yi rnam pa'i dus khyim dag la dgro lA'i dbus
36a7(rgyud): nas sbyor ni me yi dkyil 'khor la gnas shing //byang du ni bsel ba'i ri ste pad 'dab bzang po bzhin du shar du lug dang srang sogs la'o//me nas bsil ba'i ri yi mtshams
36b1(rgyud): smra dpag tshad stong phrag mkha' dang na mkha' ma lda dang mda' do'o//dbus su 'khor lo byed kyi ro bo nyi ma'i bgrod pa dag kyang mtshan mo gcig ni mnyam pa la'o//phye nas g.yas dang g.yas
36b2(rgyud): smin dag tu rgyu sti nyin dang mtshan mo rgyu sgrar dbye bas rim pa yis//lam rnams mkha' klu zla ba 'dodar ning nyin dang mtshan mo dag kyang ji srid bgrod pa dag gi mi dzaru//nyi ma ri bong can gyi
36b3(rgyud): nyin mtshan gyi chud dru/r+b+ha dag las 'grib dang 'phel ba drug nus so//gang phyir ril skye bo rnams kyi nyin mtshan mnyam par 'gyur te lug nyi srung gi nyi ma la'o//de phyir gnyis brgyad
36b4(rgyud): bu dag la nges par gling la gnas dang sdig pa la glanas de bzhin no//drug pa zhes bye mi grengs dag la 'khrig pa gzhung granas phyogs kyi tshad dang bzhi pa dag la ni//nyi ma kon Ti la
36b5(rgyud): gnas pa dag dang chu srin la gnas lnga pa bcu gcig pa la yang //seng gi bum par rab zhugs bcu gnyis ro yi se de ni nya dang bu mor gnas pa dag la'o//'dir ni g.yon ba gling du
36b6(rgyud): 'gyur nyi ma chu srin gnas pa la ste bum par nyi mas gnyis pa la//nyal dum bu gsum par me rnams kyi ni bgrod pa dag kyang lug gI nyi mas bzhi par ro//'byung ba zhes byar nyim
36b7(rgyud): glang la gnas pas 'khrig par nye gnas sa ni drug pa bdun par yang //nyi ma karka Ta la gnas pas 'gyur te seng ge la gnas sa ye dum bu brgyad par ro//bu mos bug par srang
37a1(rgyud): ni nyi mas bcu par 'gyur te sdig pa yis kyang drag po'i dum bu la'o//gzhul gnas pas bcu gnyis parad+ma 'gyur mi rnams bgrod pa dag kyang bcu gnyis rtsibs /
37a2(rgyud): sA la'o//de bzhin lhor bgrod du 'gyur nyi ma bgrod pa'i dbang gisA kerka Ta sogs khyim rnams dag la'o//steng du drug dang klu yi grangs ni nyi ma'i gdung byed dag kyang byang du bgrod pa dag/
37a3(rgyud): gi mthar//de nas g.yas phyogs su yang zad par 'gyur te mi yi bdag po stong phrag dag ni drag po'i grangs//stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa gcig mda' ni brgya dang bral bar gyur pa dbus
37a4(rgyud): nas/g+ho la'i rI mo ste//de las gang zhig 'phel dang 'grib par 'gyur ba mkha' mkha' mda' drang mde' ni byang dang lhor yang ngo //lan tshwa'i rgya mtsho 'gongs nas nyin mor byed pa/
37a5(rgyud): dag ni lho ru me yi bar du 'gro bar byed//kai lA sha yi byed du 'gro ste gangs kyi ril byang du yang ni byang la gnas pa'o//mda' rnams ches kyis bsgyur ba'i dpag tshad stong phrag
37a6(rgyud): rnams ni phyogs kyis bgrod pa dag la 'gro bar byed//phyed bcas mig klu zlas thob nyin dang nyin la 'dor ba lnga dang sa 'dzin stong phrag dag laso//khyim gcig la ni nyi ma gnas
37a7(rgyud): pas mtha' dag dus kyi tshogs dang zla ba dang ni phyogs rnams byed//dum bu dum bu dag tu zla bar 'gyur te sa gzhi bcu gnyis rtsibs rnams la ni rims paso//tshad gang dum bu/
37b1(rgyud): dang du nyan mo'i dbang gis yin pa de ni bdun pa dag tu mtshan ma la'//lam spyod 'jam klag+sa gsum po dag la nyi ma'i mdun du nyin mo dang ni rgyab tu mtshan ma'o//ri yi rgyal po dag ni k+Sha dra/
37b2(rgyud): thams cad kyi yang byang na gnas par 'gyur ro mi yi bdag/nyi ma 'char ba shar du 'gyur te ri dang mnyam pa bgrod pa dag dang de ni nub pa nub/dus dang thun mtshams bzhi dang thun tshod nyin
37b3(rgyud): dang mtshan mo dus kun du ni yang dag rgya ba rnams//dus sbyor dbye bas phye bar gyur pa lhun po'i phyogs rnams su ni rab gsal nyi ma'i sa la 'khor//chu tshod dus la dpag tshad stong phrag drug
37b4(rgyud): ni rkang pa dang bcas nyon mor byed pa 'gro ba ste//drug cu la ni mo 'bum dag dang lnga dang ri bo'i stong phrag nyin dang mtshan mo dag tu 'khor//nyin dang mtshan mor go la phyed la mkha' me chu
37b5(rgyud): tshod bgrod de dgo la dag la g.yas dang ni//g.yas min dag tu 'grib dang 'phel ba lnga ste nyin zhag so sor de ni dbugs zung chu srang gsum//lug gi dus sbyor la ni chu srang du 'gyur
37b6(rgyud): mkha' dag lag ste mkha' dus mig ni glang la 'gyur//zung dag la yang mkha' mkha' gnyis te mda' ro'i chu tshod du 'gyur ku lA re dang seng ge la'o//bu mo la ni phyed bcas drug sa
37b7(rgyud): nges par srang sogs rim pa min pas de bzhin thams cad 'gyur//dus sbyor drug gis de nub gang phyir 'char ba dag kyang de bzhin nyi ma'i rgyu skar bye ba so//stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig re
38a1(rgyud): shAcha ldan pa dag las so yi na yis nges par phyung gyur pa//lus la dbugs lhag gang dag nyin zhag so so'i dus su 'byung ba ri drang dus rnams ngag gi grangs//stong phrag
38a2(rgyud): sum nu rtswa drug dag gis bsgyur ba rnams kyang la brgya'i tshad du rab tu grags pa ste//stong dus me yis rab tu phye ba dag ni chu tshod du 'gyur drug cu'i cha yis nyin zhag kyang //zla ba'i phyogs
38a3(rgyud): te nyi ma'i bgrod pa dag dang sau skyes zla ba dgu rnams dag gi mtshan mo'o//bla ma'i lo drug du 'gyur ba sangs kyi yang bgrod par 'gyur te zla skyes kyi yang bgrod pa'o//tshes zhes bya ba'i
38a4(rgyud): la ni nyi skyes kyis te de bzhin mun can gyi dgu rgyal po mjug rings dman//de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus pa nor gyis bsgyur ba'i dus kyi lo dang phyed bcas zla ba gsum//phyed
38a5(rgyud): dang btsos pa'i nyin zhig grangs dag las kying lo brgyar 'gyur te dus kyi 'khor los dman no 'di//srog ni snying stobs lnga'i bab rdul gyi bAr dang mun pa la yang lus ngag sems
38a6(rgyud): dbye bas so//lha mi leg 'gro rnams ni de nas lnga pa nyid 'gyur zla ba phyed bcas mtshan mo dag gis kyang //grangs ni shin tu nges pa 'di dag dus kyi 'khor lor rab tu grags pa
38a7(rgyud): yin no mi yi dbang //ma bcad dus kyi 'khor lo'i 'gad pa dag la bu lon dgu ni bsres par gyur pa mtha' dag rnams/kra shis la sogs gza' ni lnga po rnams kyis myur ba'i/
38b1(rgyud): las dag la yang rkang pa'i chu tshod te//sa skyes la ni rig byed dus mer rab 'gyur srid pa'i gnas rnams dag la rgyu ba'i dbye ba yis//snga phyi phyed la mtshungs par bu lon nor gyi bgrod pa dag
38b2(rgyud): las gnas kyi dbye bas nges par sbyar//dang por rgyal dbang grangs kyi chu tshod dag ste me dang mig ni rnam gsum dag tu 'gyur//gnas gnyis dag la gcig dang mig ste bco brgyad tshes dang //
38b3(rgyud): drag po me dang rtsa bar drag po dang //sum cu rtsa brgyad brgyad cu dag dang brtan pa srid pa'i gnas la 'dir ni gsum bcas lnga bcu'o//de yis nyi ma rnam dag gyur la bu lon dag dang nor yang rim
38b4(rgyud): pa min dang rim pas so//rig byed dag dang bug pa zla ba'i grangs ni gza' lag myur ba'i las la chu tshod dag tu 'gyur//gnas gnyis la ni bcu drug gzhan la tshes dang ma nu myos byed
38b5(rgyud): drag po ri dang dbang po mkha'//rtsa ba dag las rig byed drag po dang ni rab gsal nges par bcu gnyis pa la nyi shu ste//nyi shu brgyad dang sum cu rtsa bzhi dag kyang ma nu'i gnas la rgyu ba'i dbye
38b6(rgyud): bas yang dag gnas//chu gter na mkha' dag dang zla ba'i grangs te 'di dag rnams ni bla ma'i chu tshod tshogs su 'gyur//gnas gnyis dag la phyogs kyi tshad dang dgu nor dus drug lag pa
38b7(rgyud): zla ba dag dang rtsa bar ni//me drug bug pa dang ni drag po mi bdag thub pa dang te rgyu ba thams cad rim pas so//myur dal 'khyog po la yang gza' yi tshogs ni nges par nyi ma'i dbye ba dag
39a1(rgyud): gis rgyu bar byed//drug dang zla ba chu gter grangs kyi chu tshod dag ni pa sangs kyi yang myur ba'i las la 'gyur//gnas gsum dag la nyi shu lnga ste gnyis ni rgyal ba zhes da
39a2(rgyud): de bzhin lag mig rnam pa gnyis//skyon dang tshes dang brgyad de rtsa bar drug dang na mkha' yon tan dag dang gcig gis dman pa'i brgya//mthar ni ma dang ri yi grangs te brtan pa srid pa'i//
39a3(rgyud): gnas la ba sangs rgyu ba rim pas so//nyi ma'i bu la drug dang 'byung ba'i grangs kyi chu tshod tshogs pa 'di dag du 'gyur mi yi dbang //drug dang 'byung ba dag dang 'byung bar rig byed chu gter//
39a4(rgyud): mig dang zung dang stong pa rtsa bar ni//phyogs dang rig byed dag dang 'byung ba ro dang nor dang rtse mo can ni rim pas bzhag par bya//de ltar gza' rnams kyi ni rgyu ba mtha' dag dus kyi 'khor lo dag
39a5(rgyud): las shin tu nges par 'gyur//suma~M nu rtsa drug phyed bcas zla ba nges par nor gyis bsgyur ba dag ni bkra shis la sogs pa//gza' rnams dag gi dal ba'i las la rkang par 'gyur te ma
39a6(rgyud): drug mig gi glengasad+d+hi chu tshod da//dony-id btso brgyad ri dwags brtan pas yi phyi ma dang ni snga ma'i chal ste//phyogs ri me ni gza' lcag gi'i dbang phyug dgu me bla ma'i snga cha dag dang gzhan/
39a7(rgyud): la yang //dkar po'i mda' dang chu ga ter zla ba sbron pa yi yang mig bcas mi go dang nyin zhig dus su 'gyur//zla ba la ni sa skyes longs spyod chu tshod dgu bcu dge ste lde dang 'jig rten ni/
39b1(rgyud): po'o grangs//pasangs kyi spyi de bzhin gza' lag gi yang gcig tu bsdus pa mkha' ro srog za dag tu 'gyur//'di dag zla ba gsum gyis lo yi nyin zhag bu lon chu tshod longs spyod 'din
39b2(rgyud): gsum gyi'o//zla bar bla ma'i longs spyod du 'gyur rab gsal chu ched drag po'i grangs ni rkang pa dang bcas te//chu srung sum nu rnams dang gsal bar dus kyi chu tshod dog ni nyi mo'i bu yi longs
39b3(rgyud): spyod do//gcig tu gyur pa nyin zhag ces bya gsum gyis bsgyur ba de yang zla ba phyed bcas mtshan mor bcas//gtso bo'i longs spyod la ni nyin zhag rnams kyi nyi ni bzhin bu lon gza' drug gi
39b4(rgyud): yang longs spyod do//zla gcig lhag pa gang zhig dal ba'i las la khyab bdagro rje su gza' rnams kyis ni longs ma spyad//de los rab tu gsal bar phyed bcas bdun gyi chu tshod dag ni
39b5(rgyud): zla ba 'di nyid la spyod de//sgra gcan zla ba'i longs spyod nyi ma dang bac+doMs zla ba'i rkang pa chu tshod phyed kyis rnam par dmano//nyi ma'i bgrod pa dang po la gsum zla ba myos byed nyin zhag dag
39b6(rgyud): le zla ba'i chu ched lnga//gang zhig ma spyod phyed kyi chu tshod de ni dus kyi nyin zhag dus la cha dman zla ba ste//de ni nyi ma'i lhag par 'gyur te ngas par dus kyis bsgyur ba nyi ma'i zla bar nyin zhag
39b7(rgyud): de'o//skra ge can zla ba'i longs spyod mig gis rnam par bsgyur te phyogs kyi longs spyod dag gis bgos pa las//thob pa dag ni mjug rings chu tshod nyin zhig so so'i dus su sgra gca
40a1(rgyud): zla ba'i longs spyod las//chu srang bdun dang phyed phrogs nges par yon tan gyis bsgyur nyi ma'i longs spyod dag la sbyang bar bya//mjug rings nyi ma dag dang lhan cig
40a2(rgyud): rnam par rgyu ste myur 'khyog dag lnga mdun dang rgyab nas so//rgyu bar chu srang phyed bcas gnyis spyod nyi ni dang nyin la nyi ma'i longs spyod dog las rim pa ste//rang gi zla ba sum cu drug gis
40a3(rgyud): de rgya chu tsho de dag kyang 'jog rten gyis ni ches grangs bsgyur//phyed bcas zlo bar chu tshod gnyis ni nyin zhag so sor 'char te myur 'khyog dag la mdun rgyab ngu'o//phyed bcas zla ba'i bar
40a4(rgyud): dag du ni de yi 'char ba mi yi 'jig rten dag tu mthong bar 'gyur//slar yang dpal du 'khor lor rab 'jug de ni gang tshe lo yi longs spyod dag la mthong mi 'gyur//de yi 'char ba'i cha
40a5(rgyud): dag shes par gyur na de yi 'char ba mtha' yas dus kyang shes par 'gyur//lo yi nyin zhag lnga yis bsgyur te slar yang mdas bsnun bgrod pa'i nyin zhag dag gis rab tu dman//bug/
40a6(rgyud): pa bsres pa rnams ni rang gis bgrod pa'i yon tan dbang gis gzu' rnams dkyil 'khor dag tu 'gyur//swa skyes la ni rik+Sha drug gi nyin zhug tshogs su 'gyur te ri bug ri kle zlas sa
40a7(rgyud): la'o//lha ye bla me dag la so mi rig byad du 'gyur ba sangs la ni ri deng rgyal ba mig/nyi ma'i bu la drug drug ro dang na mkha'i gcig gi nyin zhag tshogs ni dkyil 'khor du 'gyur ro//
40b1(rgyud): /sas+hos la nI dus gcig kyang nges par nor du 'gyur te zla ba'i bu la brgyas brdzun pa//ma dang nyi mari yis dman nyid pa sangs drag la nyin zhag bcus bsgyur chu gtor bu rgyan kyis duman//stong ma na/
40b2(rgyud): dus mig dge dang mkha' lag gdengs can dus rnams blon po nyi skyes dag la bu lon 'gyur//sa skyes lnga ni phyed bcas dgu ste lag la phyed lhag mi bdag rgyu skar nyi ma bla ma la'o//pa sangs la
40b3(rgyud): drug nyi skyes la skyon bu lon du 'gyur mtha' dag longs spyod dbus nos sbyang bar bya//phyi nas de dag rnams ni dag par 'gyur te mi yi bdag po skye ba'i rgyu skar rgyu ba las//dma' ba rang gi yan
40b4(rgyud): lag dog las dog 'gyur ba glod pa'i dbang gis mthon po nyi ma'i dbus gnas so//zla ba drug gis zla ba'i longs spyod bsgyur ba las kyang ngos kyi khyer lI'i lo yi zla ba yis//cha ba dag
40b5(rgyud): kyang bu lon du 'gyur nyi ma ri bong can gyis rje su ma spyad chu tshod byed//slar yang mjug rings kyi ni gang zhig lhag pa nyon zhog so so'i dus su zla ba'i nyin gyis bsgyur//drug cu'i cha yis chu//
40b6(rgyud): tshod nyin zhag so so'i dus su myur dang 'khyog por 'char ba dag la yang //zla skyes blon po myur ba dag la stobs dang ldan par 'gyur tes skyes mjug rings 'khyog po la//dman pa pa
40b7(rgyud): sangs dal ba la ste rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis rgyu ba lhag ma la stobs med//myur le shar du kha phyogs 'gyur te slar yang 'khyog por rgyu la rab zhugs gzhan du mngon par phyogs//
41a1(rgyud): dal la g+ho ru bzhin phyogs 'gyur te rang bgrod yon tan dbang bris 'byung ba la yung byang du gdong //zla bu'i nyin zhag num su gang dag chu gter gyis bsgyur mkha' mig zlab
41a2(rgyud): zla ba'i rkang pa ste//khyim ni bcu gnyis po rnams dus kyis bsgyur ba brgyad dang rig byed dag kyang nyi mi'i rkang pa'o//de yi nang du 'grib dang 'phel ba dag kyang bgrod pa 'gro ba'i dbang gis rim
41a3(rgyud): min rim pa ste//'khor lo phyed phyed dag la mtha' dag nor dang dus kyi grangs rnams rig par bya'o mi yi dbang //tshigs mtshams su ni ri bong can gyi dkyil 'khor dag la sgra gcan rab tu
41a4(rgyud): 'jug ste dkyil 'khor yang //rnam dag gyur na thams cad 'dzin te ri bod ldan pa'i dbang gis dkyil 'khor chu tshod drug cu'o//phyed dag gyur na phyed 'dzin ri bong can gyi dbang gis chu ched
41a5(rgyud): dag ni ji snyed yod pa ste//gnag dang dka/ra ba'i tshigs mdzums dag la nyin dang mtshan ma'i dus su nyi ma dang ni zla ba 'dzin//mi rnams kyi ni lo brgya dag kyang gza' rnams dag gi lo
41a6(rgyud): longs spyod kyis ni bsgyur bar bya//gnas gnyis phyogs kyis chas thob de ni bu lon du 'gyur steng gi phung po dag la sbyang bar bya//'bum phrag nyi shu gcig dang khri phrag drug gi lo
41a7(rgyud): grangs gong dag rnams ni dus kyi byed la'i//slar yang phung po gnyis kyis nges par bzhi po rnams kyi li yi grangs dog du ni rab tu 'gyur//stong pa stong pa na mkha' klu dang lag pa
41b1(rgyud): man ngamamam mamanams sa na thamasamasaman thas mthathasams la lam malanamam ma mam
41b2(rgyud): thub pa ri bong can rnams rdzogs ldan dus kyi tshad//gsum ldan la ni na mkha' mkha' stong ro dang dgu dang nyin byed lo yi grangs su rab tu grags//stong pa spyong pa mkha' dang rig byed ro dang lag
41b3(rgyud): 'gro zhes pa gnyis ldan la du ni yang dog ste//stong pa na mkhe' mkha' migayon tan chu gter rnams kyi lo yi grangs ni rjod pa'i dus la 'gyur//la ni 'di dag rnams kyis dus kyi mtha'
41b4(rgyud): ru gza tshogs rgyu ba khyim ni stong pa dag la gnas//slar yang tha skar la sogs dag dang rab byung zhes dang de bzhini nag po'i zla ba la sogs dang //gza' dang sbyar ba tshes dang byed pa rnams
41b5(rgyud): kyang de bzhin dang po dag ste de yi dus su ni//lha rnams ngag dang lha min rnams kyis 'khrug pa drag pos gzhi'i gnas rnams su ni 'byung bar 'gyur//sde ba drug ni nyi ma'i dbyangs bcas nges
41b6(rgyud): par yon tan gyis bsgyur lo gsum nyi ma dag la ste//a sogs thung ngu nyin zhag ces bya sum 'gyur ri bong can cha phyed bcas zla ba zla ba la//chu tsho dra ha sogs dbyangs bcas sum 'gyur
41b7(rgyud): gang yin de dag rnams kyang sgra gcan gyi ni mtshan mo gsum//dpal ldan stong pa gzhom med la sogs su ma 'gyur gang de rnams kyang sgra gcan gyi ni dus sbyor gsum//'byung ba nyi ma
41b8(rgyud): zla ba'i grangs ni mi yi bdag po phyed bcas zla ba dag dang lo gsum mo//phyed dang bcas pa'i zla ba dor nas thub mchog rnams kyis bcad pa dag ni dus kyi 'khor lor 'gyur//zla bar
42a1(rgyud): bsres pa gza' gcig dang ni mi bdag nyis 'gyur chu tshod tshogs la gnyis dang rkang pa mda'//'khor lo dag las nges par lha mo drug cu rnams kyis rnam par phye ba dag
42a2(rgyud): ni gzur 'gyur ro//sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kyang chu tshod thub pa nor gyis bsgyur ba'i lha mo rnams las tshogs la gnyis//sbyin dor sbyin pa dag dang ri bong can gyi rkang pa drang po lnga ste/
42a3(rgyud): 'dir ni drug gis so//zla ba'i phyogs gsum nyin zhag rnams ni sum 'gyur dag kyang nyi ma'i longs spyod la ni rab tu grags//drug nus phye ba'i skar ma gnyis dang nyi ma'i nyin zhag dang //
42a4(rgyud): blo spyod ldan dbang phyug rgya chod do//dbul ldan dus kyi 'khor lo gza' yi tshogs dang bcas pa 'di dag phyi dang lus la dbyer med par//bsdu ba dang ni spro ba'i slad du srid pa gsu
42a5(rgyud): gyi gnas su nyi ma dris kyi gzugs dang nI//shrIs rab thabs kyi dbyung bye dang ni mnyam dang mi mnyam rigaso dang myur la khyog lnga sogs rgyu ba ste//tshigs bral dang ni thob mchog
42a6(rgyud): da tshangs dang drag po la sogs lha rnams kyis ni shes ma yin//oM so gos lnga yis dbyangs gang dang po'i chos grongs drobang gis dga' bo la sogs lnga dang ldan gyur pa//de dag
42a7(rgyud): 'dir ni 'cher byed mi bdag gal nyid las skyes la sogs gzang dag ma gyur na'o//oM skyes me shes sha bar gyur cing gal te slar yang smin drug dge dang sngon pa nyid gyur ro//
42b1(rgyud): da la gal tog yul dang nad du gyur na mi rnams 'chi bar 'gyur te dang po'i dbyangs ky-i'o//bzang po zla skyes dag gis gza' 'di lta ni rgyal te mchu nyid ldan na gnyis pra 'tsho bar 'gyur//
42b2(rgyud): rgyal ba bla ma dag la gal te zlog tu gyur na gsum pa dag ni 'tshe bar 'gyur ba yin//stong pa'i chos dang pa spangs dag la gal te mon gyur gyur na 'i ni padag ni 'chi bar 'gyur//rdzogs pa
42b3(rgyud): sbron pa dag dang lhan cig tu ni bra nye gyur na lnga pa 'chi ba nyid du 'gyur//nyi ma dag la dga' ba 'char ba rnams kyi rmar yang 'gyur te gzing po rnams ni nyon mongs nyid//zla ba la ni bzang po
42b4(rgyud): 'char ba rnams kyi nges par g.yul dang nad dag la yang de bzhin 'gyur//bden par 'char ba lnga po rnams kyi 'bras bu myang por 'chi ba'i sbyor bas dman pa dag la 'gyur//nad dang
42b5(rgyud): g.yul dang yul du bgrod dang bag ma dag la dag dang mi dge'i 'bras bu shes par bya//de ltar rgyu skar gza' ste dbyangs tshogs chos rnams dag ni de nyid lnga yi rab tu dbye ba yis//phyogs
42b6(rgyud): drang zla ba bgrod pa dag dang lo dang drug nu'i lo rnams la yang 'drir ni 'char bar 'gyur//nag pa sogs la 'dor ni yan lag bcu gnyis dag gis 'char 'gyur phyi kying bye ba de nyid do//
42b7(rgyud): nyin zhag dbyings rnams bdun cu rtsa gnyis dag gis 'dir ni 'char bar 'gyur te zla ba'i dbye ba la'o//zla ba drug gis bgrod pa'i yan lag dag ste rab byung la sogs bcu gnyis
43a1(rgyud): tshan mamam mnams sa na thamasamasaman thas mthathasams la lam malanamamam ma
43a2(rgyud): lo rnams dag gi lo//de ltar dbyangs ni lnga po rnams ngag 'dir ni 'char bar 'gyur te de ni phyi nas nub pa'o//dang po la ni dbyangs rnams byis pa rang ches yon tan dbang gis dpa'
43a3(rgyud): ldan gzhon nu gnyis pa la//dar bab rgan po rim pas me dang chu gter nyin zhag la ste lnga pa la ni nub por 'gyur//a sogs dbyangs lnga gang dog nges par yon tan gyis bsgyur de dag
43a4(rgyud): rnams ni rnam gnyis sum du nyid//klu sogs ste ba'i yi ge rnams la rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis mtha' dag sbyar bar bya ba ste/thung ngu rnams ni 'dir yang dkar po'i phyogs la char byar
43a5(rgyud): 'gyur te de nyid lnga yi dbye bas so//ring po rnams ni nag po'i phyogs la shin tu nges par 'gyur te spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor bas so//nyi shu rtsa bdun rgyu skar de la gsalnga bar mda' yi chu tshod
43a6(rgyud): nyi ma'i dus sbyor che dgu po//lug gi dus sbyor la sogs 'di dag rnams kyang 'dir ni rang bzhin gsum ste brtan g.yo shin tu mnyam//lug dang karka Ta srang chu sprin 'dir ni g.yo ba dag
43a7(rgyud): ste de las gnyis pa brten pa'o//lhag ma gzhan ni gnyis kyi rang bzhin de dag nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus su rtag pa nyid du 'char//de la yud tsam sum cu rnams dang nyin zhag dus la chu chod/
43a8(rgyud): dag kyang drug cu kho na ste//dang por sum cu'i dbyangs rnams 'dir ni 'char bar 'gyur ba nyid de lud tsam dag la'o//sde ba'i yi ge sum cu chu tshod rnams la rab tu 'gyur te thung dang ro
43b1(rgyud): dus na dums kyi sa 'as ba da ga dag dag da pa mu chu da pa rnams dag sa la rnags pa byu na smran nag sa tu/
43b2(rgyud): gcan me dang zla nyi zla skyes mig dmar pa sangs bla ma mjug rings spen pa 'dir lhag lha//sngar brjod dus sbyor re re de la nyin dang mtshan mo'i dbang gis chu tshod rnams ni bsgrub par bya//de
43b3(rgyud): dbus su dbyangs gang byung ba'i gza' zhes bya ba stobs ldan de yis dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya//g.yon pa dag nas thung ngu'i dbyangs rnams 'dir ni 'char bar 'gyur te g.yas pa nas kyang
43b4(rgyud): gzhan dag go/g.yon pa stong pa la sogs de nyid dag deng gza' tshogs rgyu ba sgra gcin la sogs mtha' dag ste//g.yas la de nyid 'dzin ma stsogs dang gza' yi tshogs ni nges par
43b5(rgyud): nyi ma'i bu la sogs pa nyid//phyi rol du yang dus kyi chu tshod gza' yi gnas dang mnyam pa dbyangs bcas drag ni bsgrub par bya//dris na g.yul gyi slad du'i che bar 'gyur te stong pa la ni
43b6(rgyud): dus drag shar bar gyur pa na'o//rlung du nyi ma dag la 'pham zhing me las skyes shar ba dag la rma ru 'gyur ba yin//chu dang bla ma la ni 'dum par 'gyur te sa la spen pa shar la 'khrug
43b7(rgyud): par mi 'gyur ro//'chi dang nyon mongs rmar 'gyur bde ba dag dang mnyam pa nyid ni 'dri byed nad pa rnams kyi'o//g.yul du dgra ni nges par rab tu nyams par 'gyur te sgra gcan stong
44a1(rgyud): bdag la shAr na yang //rlung dang zla bdag la 'pham dngag yul du rma yang zla skyes me lu shwar bdag la'o//tshul pas ngas lan don rnyed stsal mdzub 'as shang
44a2(rgyud): dag la dag yang dbang du 'gyur//de bzhin pagrod pa bag ma dag la g.yon gyi lam la gza'i rnams kyis ni dge ba'i 'bras bu 'gyur//ponyas brjod pa'i dbyangs rnams gang dag
44a3(rgyud): par bcu yis bsgyur te khyim gyi 'khor lo dag gis bsre//slar yang de dag 'byung bas bsnun te nye ba'i skye ba dang ldan bdun gyi tshe la lhag ma ni//zla med mda' dang ri ngo mi mnyam gan+ta
44a4(rgyud): su gyur na mi rnams la ni rnyed pa yod ma yin//mig dang rig byed ro ste shin tu mnyam pa'i gnas su gyur na bya ba dag kyang 'grub par 'gyur//lo dang zla ba phyogs dang nyin dang mtshan
44a5(rgyud): mo'i dus ni dus sbyor dbus su rab tu zhugs pa ste//dus sbyor gcig ni lha yi dbye ba gza' tshogs dang ldan dbyings dang bcas pa'i de nyid tha dad do//de nyid gcig ni dbugs rnams
44a6(rgyud): drug nu mngon lha ga yon tan brgya yi dus kyi chu tshod dag la gonas//chu ched cha shas chu snang drug cu de yi cha shas zhes pa dbugs drug rnams so mI yi dbang //dbugs 'byung
44a7(rgyud): rlig pa'i dbus su mi dge dge ba'i 'bras bu dag kyang rnal 'byor ldan pas shes par byed//lha shes rnams kyis nyin zhag 'das pa'i dbang gis nyi ma zla ba bsgrubs nas dus
44b1(rgyud): dade//dultar byung ba shes pa min par dag dang mi dge'i 'bras bu 'jig rten 'dir ni gang brjod pa na rje thob bzung nas glang chen song ges gtams pa'i thibs pa ra tu
44b2(rgyud): 'jug/phra mo'i rnal 'byor mi shes pa la gza' yi stobs dang bcas pa'i dus sbyor sbyor ba sbyin pa ni//skye dang bdun par gnas pa'i khyi ma la dus me nyi ma sa skyes nyin mor byed pa'i bu rnam/
44b3(rgyud): gyis//de la ni da na dang na dnganges par mtha' dgan ni rnam par nyams pa dag cing byed//de phyir spong bar bye ste nges par bdag gis dus sbyor gzhan ni rab tu sbyin pa ga/sgyid
44b4(rgyud): bdun par gnas pa'i khyim la sku gcan zlab zla skyes rnam pa sangs dang bcas dus//dag nyams rang nyid rgyas shing ga yul du rnam par rgya la dga' ma dang brtas n-i dga'
44b5(rgyud): 'gyur//yang dag dus sbyor thams cad kyis te slar yang gal te de lus g.yon gyi rdu las gyur byan//nges par don ni thams cad 'grub skye mtha' dag sa yi steng du dag pa'i gan
44b6(rgyud): dang chos la'o//rgyu skar rnams ni dgu dang dgu dang dgu yis chagasum byas te skyes pa'i rgyu skar dang po las//gadrug pa rnams ni zla ba dag dang lhan cig mi mnyam gnas gyur nad pa
44b7(rgyud): rnams ni 'chi ba nyid//the skar la sogs rnams kyis rtsa gsum sprul yang spros par gyur pa na me gru nyid kyi bar du ste//sdig zla skyes pa'i rgyu skar gal te rtsa gcig dag la grur
45a1(rgyud): na mi rnams drug ni rnam par nyams//drug dang tshes drang brgyad dang ri zla bcu dang bcu dgu nyi shu gcig gi lo bzung rnams//nyi zla mig dmar gza' lhag nyi skyes
45a2(rgyud): bla ma lag 'gro dkar po rnams kyis de dag rim pas spyod//de dang nang gi gnas skabs la yang de las sde pa brgyad po rnams kyi yi ge dag la ni//drag po rnams kyis zhi ba min pa byed
45a3(rgyud): cing mchog tu bde byed zhi ba'i rang bzhin gza' gang dag/rgyal gyi zla bar nyi ma chu srin la sngon ma rig pa ste bum par nyi ma mchu la yang //'du byed du 'gyur mi yi bdag po nya ru nyi ma dang
45a4(rgyud): dag la ni rnam par shes pa ste//lug tu nyi ma nag pa la ni ming dang gzugs so glang 'khrig la son sa ga snron dag la//mag sogs dang ni rig pa dag ste nyi ma karka Tar gnas chu zla la
45a5(rgyud): ni tshor bar 'gyur//seng gar nyi ma gro zhin la yang sred pa bu mo dang ni srang du son pa khrums dang ni//tha skar zla ba dag la len pa nyid dang srid par 'gyur te smin drug sdig par nyi ma la//
45a6(rgyud): skye ba dang ni gzhu la nyi ma gnas pa mgo dag la yang de bzhin rga shi rim pa ste//de ltar nyi zla'i dbye ba dag las gnyis ka bgrod pa'i dbang gis rgyal po yan lag bcu gnyis so//
45a7(rgyud): rgyal dang mchu yi mtshams su chu srin dag la nyi ma gnas pa'i gza' de la na ma rig pa//de nas gnyis pa la ni shi bar 'gyur te mi yi bdag pa de bzhin skye ba gsum pa la'o//de
45b1(rgyud): bzhin srid pa la sngogs thams cad yan lag bcu gnyis bar du rim pa dag gis yongs su 'gyur//de nas me dang chu gter mda' ste chu srin bgrod pa'i dbang gis res 'ga' yan lag drug pa'o/
45b2(rgyud): tshes shes bya ba'i gza' yis phyogs te nyi ma rgyu ba'i dbang gis res 'ga' yan lag bcu drug gis//'du byed mchu yi mtshams dag du ste bum par nyi ma son pa de la 'du byed kho na'o//
45b3(rgyud): de nas gnyis pa la ni rnam par shes par 'gyur te nyin zhag gsum pa la ni ming dang gzugs//de ltar zla ba gnyis la yan lag du gyur nyi ma'i dbang gis spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor bas so//
45b4(rgyud): de la ma rig la sogs yan lag mi mnyam pa yang bya ba kun la dge bar 'gyur ba ste//gang zhig 'du byed la sogs mnyam pa dag kyang rtag tu dbang bgrod bag ma dag la dge ba min//
45b5(rgyud): de bzhin phyogs kyi dbye ba drag la ri bong can gyi bgrod pa'i dbang gis yan lag bcu gnyis gang //dkar dang nag po'i phyogs la dang po'i tshes grangs dbang gis spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor
45b6(rgyud): ba dag gis so//Dom mig dmar mjug rings spen pa g.yas sam rgyab tu yang dag gnas pas dgra ni 'chi bar byed//g.yon dang mdun du zhi ba'i rang bzhin gza' tshogs mtha' dog
45b7(rgyud): g.yul gyis sar ni de bzhin kho na'o//rnal 'byor ma dang biSh+Ti drag po rlung dang bcas pa g.yas dang rgyab tu bde bo sbyin pa ste//g.yon dang mdun du 'chi ba'i rang bzhin mnyam dang mi
47a1(rgyud): mnyam gyur pas gnyis ka'i dpung ni 'joms par 'gyur//tshangs ma drag mo gzhon nu ma dang mkha' 'gro'i bdag gis 'gro'i bdag gis 'gro ma phag mo rdo rje la
47a2(rgyud): ma dang //tsa muN+DA nyid dpal mo dag ni nor gyi tshes la 'gyur te drang po'i tshes dang dgu pa la//brgya byin du ste gnod sbyin mi zur lha min gshin rje chu lha rlung dang dbang ldan sa la'o//
47a3(rgyud): 'di ni 'char bdag tu byed de slar yang chos rnams la ni brgyad gnyis dbye bas tha dad do//biSh+Ti rnams ni dkar po'i phyogs la ba rgya byin gra shin rje chu dang gnod sbyin du yeng 'drir 'cha
47a4(rgyud): 'gyur//slar yang nag po'i phyogs la rtse mo can dang lha mi nu rlung dang dbang ldan zur du rim pos//drag po shar nas gzhan phyed du 'gro nyin zhag dbang gis byang du yang ste byang gi nyi ma
47a5(rgyud): la'o//chu nas me ldan drag tu do ni nges par 'gro ste lho ru lho yi nyi ma dag la'o//shwar nas thun phyed dag la rlung du rab tu 'jug ste de bzhin du ni lho ru 'gro bar byed//dbang ldan tshwa dang me dang
47a6(rgyud): gnod sbyin lha min grong khyer du 'gro rlung du nyi ma nub par 'gyur//dpal ldan rtsa ba'i sgra gcan dor nas rlung dag las kyang rnam par rgyal 'gyur mtshan ma'i 'thab mo dang //'khrug pa
47a7(rgyud): dag la rtsa ba'i sgra gcan gyis ni dag yi rtobs 'joms de dang mtshungs pa gzhan yod min//dbyangs dman 'thab mo pa ni mnyam dang mi mnyam g.yul la lhag pa dag gis 'joms par
47b1(rgyud): byed pa ste//dbugs la gnyis kyi min gang snying la rab tu 'jug na de ni 'khrug pa dag las rgyal bar 'gyur//pho nyas brjod pa dang po'i ming de rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur te phyis kyi ming de pham par/
47b2(rgyud): 'gyur//'du ba kha dog dbyings la sogs pa mnyam dang mi mnyam gyur pa rnams kyi 'bras mod ston pa nyid//dus ni 'thab mo'i sa la mi bdag rnams kyi g.yas dang gal tog yas min dag la
47b3(rgyud): mun can 'gyur//g.yul du lha yi mgon po dag ni 'phrog byed drag po dang bcas mi rnams kyis kyang 'joms par 'gyur//de phyir dpal ldan rtsa ba'i sgo gcan 'khyog po drag po lha min rnams
47b4(rgyud): las srid gsum rnam rgyal ba//g.yul gyi dus su sa yi dkyil 'khor la gnas shes par bya ste gzhan du dgra ni nyams pa med//sa la rgyu skar byas nas thub pa dus kyis bsgyur ba dbang po
47b5(rgyud): gnod sbyin tshwa dang gshin rjer ni//de yi 'khor lo 'khor bar byed de nyin zhag bgrod pa'i dbang gis mtha' dag rnams ni rig par bya//rgyu skar gang la dus dang mun can du yang rab gyur lta
47b6(rgyud): ba lhung na gnyis po dag la yang //g.yul du dgra yi sde rnams drug ni 'bral la nges par lhung ste yi dbus su rgyal bar 'gyur//sgra gcan dus la gnas pa rnams ni 'ching
47b7(rgyud): btsas par 'gyur zhing dpung rnams mnyam du lhung ba ni//lta ba'i tshal nges song rnams te brang 'gro 'gro ba'i dbang gis der ni sde rnams bcom par 'gyur//lte ba'i cha ni spangs
48a1(rgyud): pa rnams dag rnam par rgyal byur 'gyur te bar rdugastsal gnyis po yang //de ltar dpal ldan rtsa ba'i sgra gcan zla gsung la gnas pa dusak+to 'khor por shos/
48a2(rgyud): par bya//rnal 'byor ma dang biSh+Ti drag po gza' tshogs dang bcas dbyings ni 'char ba dag dang bcas gyur pa//de dag thams cad btang nas rgyal rigs rnams kyi sa srid gsum rnam rgyal
48a3(rgyud): gcig pu gzung bar bya ba ste//gang gis zla ba nyi ma za zhing skabs gsum pa dag 'jigs byed drag po'i gzugs can mig sman mdog/sa la gang zhig nyin dang mtshan mor shar
48a4(rgyud): dang nub dang lho dang byang du yang ni 'khor ba'o//g.yul du 'pham pa'i dgra bo dag ni gal te 'phral la rdzong gi rlung du zhugs par gyur pa na//phyi rol du ni 'khrul 'khor bya ste rgyun chung
48a5(rgyud): med par rdo dang mo mda'i rab tu 'bab pa dang //ral gri laM sogs gcod pa'i 'khrul 'khor dag dang se gzhi'i gnas la gur dang cog ni dbye ba yis//de yi rjod ni phyi mar byis te
48a6(rgyud): nyin zhag nyung zad dag gis gdug pa de ni bsgrub par bye//kA ba bzhi ni brgyad gnyis khru ldan mnyem dang mi mnyam gnas nas gnas po rgyud du ni phug gyur pa//tha dad rnams
48a7(rgyud): ni sdang bu chu gter dus dang dus rnams kyis te rgyab tu yang ni gcig gis so//rtsa bar 'khrul 'khor tshad ni lag pa bcu ru 'gyur te steng gi tshe dag la ni de yi phyed//rgyags
48b1(rgyud): mdang khru gnyis dag gis dman par 'gyur te ma log bcu yi steng gi cha ni lhag pa'o//rnam par byed bcas khru gnyis dag skye sor mo thub pa ma nur nges pa'i bug pug cig tu ni/
48b2(rgyud): khru gang de nas rgyags mad rab tu gzhug ste oM log bcu yi rgyab kyi tshal gzir gyis gang gi/mgo bor a l+r-ing dag la thagr-I pa lnga bcu bdags par bya ste stang gi rnyed ni rnam pa byed/
48b3(rgyud): rgyags mda'i mthar ni mdzub mo dang bcas rab tu 'jug ste gnya' non zlum po dag ni mtho gang ngo //tshogs mda'i mdzub mo la ni 'ur mthil thag par bcos paM dag la nges par khru gsu
48b4(rgyud): dag tu 'gyur//de yi nang du rdo ba rab tu bcug ste stobs ldan 'then byed rnams kyis 'phen par gyur pa dag/btang ba myur du na mkhar 'gro ste 'phrul la nges par ltung zhing khang stang sa glai/
48b5(rgyud): dang lamra srad du//mtha' dge phye mar byas nasaM saM yi 'og tu 'gro ste rdo rje 'bab pa ji lta ba nyid bzhin//de yi mdzub ma zla ba phyed pas goni yuM gnas su tshangs pa'i ri mo ngos gnyis
48b6(rgyud): dag tu ni//brgyad gnyis btang ba'i gnas rnams dag ste lag pa gnyis ka'i khu tshur bcings las btang bar bya//gting po sa la reg pa nyid mnyam dang mi mnyam rkang pa 'khrul
48b7(rgyud): 'khor nang du gnos pas ni//rang 'dod rdob ldeng ste rnam gsum bgrod pa'i dbang gis rdzong ni rnam par gzhom pa'i don du'o//gang zhig bsnun pas glang chen 'phral la nges pa
49a1(rgyud): ltung ba dri la srog chags bra mo dag ni ci//rdzong gi steng khang la gnas dgra dpung ma lus gang dag phyi ro ba gnas par ltung bar byed pa ste//sa stangs gnas su rdzong gi 'thab
49a2(rgyud): mo la ni gzhu 'dzin rnams kyis de dang lhan cig su zhig 'gran//gang du 'khrul 'khor rab bskrun rjong der dgra ngo su zhig zhugs pa dag ni gi shin rje'i khu ru'o//ka ba dpung pa drug drug dag
49a3(rgyud): gis gnyi ga' nang ni mnyam pa khru ni zung gi bar dag la//snying por re'i nyi ma'i khru ru 'gyur te ga nyi ge nang ni mnyam pa lhag chad med pa nyid//so sa'i ri mig kun la sbrang leb dag dang lpa Da
49a4(rgyud): pa spra tshil gos rnams kyis kyang g.yogs pa ste//snying po dus dang brgyad dang skyon dang sum 'gyur nyin byed kyis kyang 'khrul 'khor gcig ni rab tu bya//gnyis gnyis snying po'i bar du 'khrul
49a5(rgyud): pa dag kyang dpung pa rnams kyis rgya yis btab pa 'am kun nas so//rgyab tu skyo ba 'dzin pa drug ste mdun nas dpung pa gnyis ka mnyam pa 'khrul 'khor 'dren pa 'am//ka ba'i khung bur
49a6(rgyud): rab tu btsugs pa'i g.yo ba'i rlung gi dar rnams kyis ni rlung gis bskyod pa ste//de la zhon pa rang gi sde ni chu yi rdzong dag nyams pa'i don du tshu ya gter la 'gro/chu gter zur ldan stegs
49a7(rgyud): bu gcig la goyo ba'i rlung gi der dang rgyal mtshan bcas pi ka bar gdags//rgyab kyi phyogs nas mi rnams dag 'i drangs shing si las theg pa dag gis steng du 'gro ba ni//rlung
49b1(rgyud): gis rab tu bskyod par gyur pa nges par blag gi rdzong gi steng du mkha' la 'gro ba ste//de nas myi yi 'bru mAr 'phangs pas dgra yi dpung dang rdzong ni thams cad kun nas sreg par byed//'khor/
49b2(rgyud): lo'i rtsa bar gnam gdon rtse gcig pa ni gzhug cing stang du yang ni 'khor lo dag lA ni//sor mo gnyis gnyis par du rtsibasu 'gyur te zlum po'i mtha' ma ma lus par ni bgrad par bya//
49b3(rgyud): 'khor lo khru ni phyed dang gsum par 'gyur zhing gnam gdan steng du gzhan yang der ni srog shing ste//srog shing steng du ral gri rnon po myur bar 'khor te 'khrul 'khor gyi ni rtsa ba 'khor
49b4(rgyud): bas so//theg pa yis ni rlung gi 'khrul 'khor na mkha' dag la 'gro ste rung gi phyogs na snga rim pas so//rdzong gi steng dang dgra yi khyim du so sor 'gro bar nges pa nyid du thag pa drangs
49b5(rgyud): byas nas//sa la chud kyang de yis brjod par 'gyur te dgra rnams kyi ni rdzing gi rtse mo 'byed pa yis//rtse la bkod de dgra yi khang po'i gzhi dang 'dun sa dge la me ni rab tu sbyin par bya//
49b6(rgyud): 'khor lo rnams kyi steng gri cha la lcags dang shing rnams drag gis khyang pa chen po bAkod pa ni//spang lab dang ni ma he'i lpags pa rnams kyis kun nas g.yogs par gyur pa zlum po rnam
49b7(rgyud): pa ste//mi rnams dag gis bskyod par gyur pa mnyam pa'i sa la 'obs ni ji srid nyid du 'gro bar 'gyur//'obs de bkang nas 'khar gyi rtsig pa dang ni lam srang dag tu 'phral la rab
50a1(rgyud): tu 'jug par 'gyur//stegs bur phyur ba gnyis la nges par rgyud dang bcas pa'i gzhu ni glayo ba med par btags byas nas//rgyab tu lcags kyi phur pa gnyis/
50a2(rgyud): la legs bkod 'khrul shing la ni sor mo lta bu phyed 'khyogs rnams//sor mo'i rtse mo dag la gzhu rgyud kyis ni mang zhing mnyam pa'i mda' 'am lcogs mda' rnon po rnams/
50a3(rgyud): g.yul gyi dus su 'phangs pas goHdang btsas glang chen lus po phug nas rab tu 'gro bar 'gyur//kau ba~M gnyis ni sa yi nang du brtan par btsugs pa thag pa rnams kyis bkres
50a4(rgyud): par gyur pa ste//thag pa'i dbus su ral gri'i chang gzung chud pa zlum po dang bcas bskor ba du mas bskor gyur pa//de yi dbus su ral gri'i chang gzung nges par g.yo ba med
50a5(rgyud): par gzer gyis btab par rab tu 'gyur//gzer dang thug par btsos pa g.yog par bya zhing ral gri'i so yo rtse mo'i cha yang mnan par bya//de yi steng du bug pa'i re kha can gyi
50a6(rgyud): spangal ba las ni bskul bar 'gyur ba 'thon pa'o//ral gri'i steng du zla ba'i dbus kyi cha la lpagros las byas pa chung ngu gcig kyang bzhag par bya//zla ba'i steng du gang gi rkang pa bzhag pa
50a7(rgyud): de ni 'bral la ral gri yis kyang gcod par byed//mkhar gyi sgo mo mtha' rnams dang ni mi yi bdag po'i khang par 'khrul 'khong kho na mtshon cha'o//srog shing steng du nyi ma'i lag sa/
50b1(rgyud): rtsa ba'i gnas su 'gyur te 'khor lo'i tshod la dgu cha'o//zur druka ba phrod rdang mnyam dang mi many+dzam shIng t+ta gnas las gnyis dang byed kyi tshod kyis so//cha phyed dag la 'thad mo pa mis
50b2(rgyud): mnyam dang mi mnyam 'dron byed rta 'am glang po rnams//de nas 'khor lo'i byed kyi sa la steng du me long do sha la rgyal mtshan la sogs bkod pa'o//gcig phyod che gnyis dag ste zla ba lag/
50b3(rgyud): pa rtse mo can rnams rtswa bi'i gnas dang gdan rnams kyi//zlum po phyed bcas gcig chu pad+ma'i shing rta'i sa ni dga' ba'i dbye ba dag la mnyam par 'gyur//rten dang bcas pa 'khor lo'i
50b4(rgyud): tshad ni rta dang glang po'i dbang gris phyed dang bcas pa rnams gnyis kyang //lha rnams kyi ni pad+ma'i rigs te lha yi bu yis bkod pa dga' ba'i rigs ni me rnams kyis//brgyad dang chu gter
50b5(rgyud): srog shing 'khor lo rnams kyis rnam gsum 'dir ni shing rta chen po phyed dang mnyam//nyi ma'i shing rta mchog ni 'khor la gcig pa mi mnyam rta yang lha ma yin rnams rnam par 'joms//
50b6(rgyud): g.yul du phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba mi mnyam mnyam pa'i shing rta chen po rgyal rigs rnams kya'o//steng dang mngon du phyogs pa 'joms te mnyam dang mi mnyam g.yul du rgya ba ni 'joms
50b7(rgyud): pa mnyam por 'gyur//drug lnga chu gter mi yi cha rnams dag gis ka ba'i rtse mor bug pa mnyam par rab tu 'gyur//rtsa ba dag las steng du byed kyi cha ni rtseg ming dbang gis 'gyur
51a1(rgyud): te lha rnams gzhal myed khang //de bzhin sa la mi bdug rnams kyi rnam gsum rtse gra ma'i dbang gis yul gyi lhud mo dga' ston la//khru nas khru yi phar dag gis ni phyogs
51a2(rgyud): rnams kun tu 'khor ba dang ldan chen po rab tu 'gyur//'khor lo'i steng du ka ba'i rtse mo dag la rnam gsum rtseg ma'i dbang gis khyogs rnams phyogs kun tu//brgyad gnyis brgyad dang
51a3(rgyud): de nas phyed de phyogs dang dus dang dus dag lag pa rten nyid sa gsum la//steng dang 'og tu 'khor bar byed pa lag pas gzung ba'i 'khrul shing li ni bu mo rnams kyi stan//nang dang phye
51a4(rgyud): rol dag tu gnas pa 'og dang steng du son cing phyogs brgyad du ni 'khyag pa rnams//steng dang 'og tu sbubs ni 'khyog por 'gyur te kun nas sbubs kyi rnam pa dag gis 'khrul 'khor
51a5(rgyud): ro//sbubs kyi rtse mor bum pa'i gzugs la bug pa yang na sbubs kyi bug pa dag gi tshad du 'gyur//chu ni 'dren par byed cing drangs pa'i chu ni btang bar gyur pa dag kyang bum pa'i
51a6(rgyud): bu ga nas//bskyed mos tshal dang ldum ra dag gi mnyam pa'i sa la gang du grangs pa der ni 'gro bar 'gyur//rab mchog sa gzhi dag la gdugs pa can rnams sgrub pa'i don dang
51a7(rgyud): chos dang ldan pa rgyal don du//dang po'i sangs rgyas su ni srid gsum bla mas zla ba bzang la thams cad sngon du gsung pa gang //de yi nang nas cung zad tsam zhig 'dir ni di ring yul
51b1(rgyud): 'ding khyod la bdag gis gsal bar bstan//rang gnas srung ba'i don du 'di dag mtha' dag gyis shig zhe sdang chu gas pas min no nyin kye//chang dang lan tshwa'i chu gter dbus su thub pas
51b2(rgyud): yi dkyil 'khor la ni las sa yang dag gnas//dpag tshod 'bum phrag gsum la nyi ma'i dum bu rnams su mi yi bdag po rim pas 'khor bar 'gyur//dum bu gcig la dpag tshad
51b3(rgyud): stong phrag nyi shu lnga ste nor gyi mdab ma dag dang bcas pa'o//dri yi dbus na kaM lA sha ste mchog gigri grangs ri yis ni phyogs rnams kun tu bskor ba'o//sa la ka la sha ye dum bu gangs kyi ri
51b4(rgyud): drang bcas pa de ni kun nas sum che ste//phyi rol du ni ma bu ma re re dag kyang nyin byed yul dang gleng gi yul rnams dog gis brgyan//g.yas kyi phyed na sham b+hu lar grags thub mchog
51b5(rgyud): gi gnas grong ni byi ba lhag par gnas pa ste//bye ba'i grong gis nges par btsongs pa yul du 'gyur te rgyal khams grong ni 'bum phrag rnams kyis so//gcig gnyis gsum dang chu
51b6(rgyud): gter dbye ba meda'i raM thub pa lnga dang 'jig rten la sogs dbye ba yis//phye ba myi dbang 'khor lo can no sa gzhi dag la'akhor te rnam shes ldan pas btsal bar bya//'khor lo can dang
51b7(rgyud): tsan du mo bu can ni yul gyi mi bdag phyag rgya'i lag ni de las gzhan//phyi rol du ni dus kyi dbye ba nges par 'gyur te ji ltar 'jig rten mgon gyi de bzhi no//'od zer bdun dang rig rna
52a1(rgyud): thub rnams 'dir ni de bzhin snying stongs ldan pa l+lA yi skye gnas te//nya dang ru sbrul phag pra mi yi steng ge dang bcas mi'u thung dang yA mad Ag ni dang //rA ma nag po de
52a2(rgyud): ltar brgyad ni lha r-in+di rigs la 'jigs ster rdul gyi 'byung po'i skye gnas so//sum cu rtsa gnyis gdan gyi mthar nI lha myin drag po che lo brgya pa phyag na 'khor lor 'gyur//A dra a na
52a3(rgyud): g+haM dang phog ldan lha min lag 'gro'i rigs la mun pa can ni gzhan yang lnga//byi ba dbang po gas dkar can dang sbrang rtsi'i blo gros 'joms byed brgyad pa gang de mun pa cen//gsil bA
52a4(rgyud): mkha'i yul gyi bA ga da sogs grong khyer du ni bdun pa yang dag skyes pa ste//gang du 'jig rten lha min yan lag stobs dang ldan par gnas shing brtse ba med pa kla klo'i gzugs//
52a5(rgyud): rnga mo rta dang ba lang bsad nas khrag dang bcas pa'i shin cung zad btsos pa 'ba' zhig dang //ba lang sha dang dngul chu chu dang mar dang tshwa ba mnyam pa 'bras dang lo ma besres pa ni//gcig
52a6(rgyud): tu me la bcos pa nags kyi 'bras bu dag drang bcas pa gang du mi rnams dag gi zas//btung ba bya rnams dag gi sgo ngar 'gyur mi yi bdag po de ni lha min rnams kyi gnas//thig le
52a7(rgyud): nus ma mig sman dag dang mkha' lding lha yi chu bo mi sbyin dang ni 'dod 'jo dang //rdzong dang glog dang rig pa bzang po 'gyur med mchog gi cha dang lha yi skad dang lus med de//yang dag
52b1(rgyud): rgyu ba'i gzugs 'di rnams kyis sa la 'jug par 'gyu ro rgyal ba yi ni ye shes sku//byung bar gyur dang byung dang 'byung 'gyur rig byed rtog ge la sogs bstan bcos mtha' dag rab tu smra//
52b2(rgyud): dpral ldan rgyal po nyi ma 'ga' zhig drag gis sham b+ha lo zhes rab tu grags pa'o kaM lA pa//phyogs bzhi dag ni ro yis bkrori zhing mda' yis bsgyur ba brgya yi dpag tshad rnams kyi tshod
52b3(rgyud): duni//lha yi dbang po rab mchog mi ye bdag por bzhag nas khyod ni rang gi gnas su 'gro bar gyis//dpal ldan shAkya'i rigs la rab gsol mi yau bdag po bdun te brgyad pa
52b4(rgyud): dpal ldan grags pa yang //'di ni dpal ldan 'jam pa'i rdo rje lha yi mchog gis btud pa rdo rje'i rigs kyis rigs ldan te//rdo rje'i dbang bskur byin nas mtha' dag thub pa'i
52b5(rgyud): rigs rnams dag ni rigs gcig dag tu byed par 'gyur//yang dag theg par mngon 'dzegs lha min rigs la 'jigs skor dpal ldan grags pa phyag na mdung thung can//sems
52b6(rgyud): can rnams kyi thar pa'i slad du sa la dus kyi 'khor lo rab tu gsal bar byed par 'gyur//de yi dbus su gdan ni nyi shu rtsa lnga rim par yongasu be grangs po dag gi dus kyi mthar//ri Na
52b7(rgyud): ldan rigs la lha yi dbang po lha yi mchog gis btud pa drag po'i rigs ldan 'byung bar 'gyur//dam pa rnams la zhi ba'i gzugs te bde ster zhes pa de bzhin kla klo'i rigs
53a1(rgyud): la mthar byed nyid//rdo yid+hU bcibs 'khor lo can ni phyag na mdung thung mtha' dag dag la snun byed nyi ma'i gzi//rigs ldan rigs kyi dbus su lag pas pa/
53a2(rgyud): ba'i dus kyi bu dang tshe blo drug ni 'odas gyur pa//de yi dus su nges par mkha'i yul du klu klo'i chos ni rab tu 'jug pa dag tu 'gyur//ji snyed kle klo'i dbang po gdug pa ji snyed lha yi mchod/
53a3(rgyud): gis btud pa drag po'i rigs ldan ying //de yi dus su gnyis po dag kyang sa yi snying gi gnas su 'khrug pa drag po 'byung bar 'gyur//g.yul du kla klo dag la snun byed mtha' dag
53a4(rgyud): sa yi steng du rang gi dpung ni yan lag bzhi//dus mthar kaM la sha yi ri bo lha yis bkod pa'i grong nas 'khor los bsgyur ba 'byung bar 'gyur//dreg pa phung po tshogs kyi dbang
53a5(rgyud): po 'phrog byed dag kyang rigs ldan la ni grogs dag sbyin 'gyur te//rdo rta glang po'i dbang po gser gyi shing rta mi bdag phyag na mtshon ldan dpa' bo rnams kyang ngo //rdo yi rta ni
53a6(rgyud): rlung gi shugs can gyis bsgyur yon tan bye ba kha dag smra tshogs pa//chang gis dregs pa'i glang chen rig byed ces pa'i 'bum phrag grangs dang shring rta 'bum phyug 'byung ba dang //
53a7(rgyud): ek+She hi n+do drug dang mi yi dbang po cod pan bcings pa'i rigs ni ro dang dgu bcu ste//rigs ldan khyab 'jug 'phrog byed dge dang bcas pa sde 'di dag gis kla klo brlag pa
53b1(rgyud): spyod par 'gyur//mchog tu cha ba'i dpa' bo rnams kyis klu klo'i tshogs la bskrun pa gla nga'i dbang pos glang po la//rdo yin+d+ha yis d+ha rnams la skye mnyam dang mi mnyam g.yul dus rgyung
53b2(rgyud): rnams kyis sa skyong la//dz+ha la gnas pa zla ba chen po'i bu ni ha nu mAn da rnon pa'i mtshon gyis bsnun par 'gyur//drag po kla klo'i dbang mgon mtha' dag lha min bdag pa byis po'i
53b3(rgyud): bla la drag po'i rigs ldan gyis//dpung ni thams cad dag gis g.yul du kla klo bcom nas khyib 'jug drag po dang bcas rigs ldan ni//kai la sha yi ri bo lha yis bkod pa'i
53b4(rgyud): grong khyer gang du 'khor la can dag gnas par 'gro/de yi dus su 'dzin ma dge la mtha' dge skye bo'i rigs ni chos dang 'dod pa nor rnams rdzogs//'bru rnams dgon par skye ba
53b5(rgyud): dad no shing rnams 'bras bu brtan pos dud pa de dge 'byung bar 'gyur//kla klo'i tshogs ni 'khor gyi skye bo dang bcas rab tu bcad nas mi yi lo ni brgya phyed ni//rigs ldan gru
53b6(rgyud): par 'gyur te lha yis bkod pa'i pho brang mtho ba kai lA sha yi rgyab tu'o//lha dang mi yi bla ma'i sras ni tshangs pa lha yi dbang po zung gi chos la 'byung ba dag/tshangs pa rgyab tu dumi
53b7(rgyud): bu gcig la mi yi bdag por 'gyur te sa kun la ni lha yi dbang //rdzogs ldan mchim su kla klo'i chos rnams mtha' dag srid pa gsum gyi bla ma dag gis bcad bas te/
54a1(rgyud): bcad nas lo ni brgyad brgya rnams su tshangs pa bzhag pa mdzad nas bde ba'i gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur//slar yang de nyid dbus su mI yi bdag po sras rnams dag gi ri
54a2(rgyud): kyekyi dbye ba dag tu 'gyur//de rnams dbus su lha mini dbang po mi bdag thub pa rnams ni phal pa gzhan rnams 'byung bar 'gyur//kla klo rnams ni gzhom pa'i slad du lha yi bdag po///
54a3(rgyud): dbang po bcu gnyis dag dang ldan par 'gro/dum bu dum bu dag tu kla klo'i chos ni bcom nas 'khor lo can yang bde ba'i gnas su 'gro/skabs gsum pa dang mi yi bla ma'i sras ni
54a4(rgyud): tshangs dang lha yi dbang po rgyab dang mdun du ste//rgyab tu tshangs pa la sogs rigs rnams rnam pa sna tshogs sa yi steng du dbye ba du mar 'gyur//tshangs pa sogs la mi rnams lo ni
54a5(rgyud): brgya phrag bco brgyad dang ljon 'di dag mi rnams dag gi tshe//de yi phyed ni 'od srung gi 'o rab mchog sa yi steng du dpal ljon mi yi seng ge'i phyed//drug cus dman pa de bzhin nyid
54a6(rgyud): du dus bzhi so so'i dus su mi thung sogs la 'phrog byed kyi//rigs ldan mthar ni ji srid brgya phrag gcig gi la yi grangs kyi skye bo'i tshe ru rab tu 'gyur//de ltar dum bu thams cad
54a7(rgyud): du yid dus bzhi'i dus su kla klo'i chos ni rab tu 'jug pa ste//lo ni brgyad dang brgya phrag gcig tu nges par gnas te de nas klo klo'i chos ni nyams pa'o//de nas la ni stong phrag
54b1(rgyud): nyi shu lag pa brgya dang bral ba sangs rgyas chos ni rab tu 'jug/rdzogs ldan gsum ldan gnyis ldan cod pa'i dus ni nus pa'i tshad kyis sa gzhi dag la nges par rgyu//'jig rten khams
54b2(rgyud): bskyed pa dag dang gza' yi rgyu ba mnyam pa 'khor lo can ni 'byung ba dang //klakl-i rnams kyi chos ni nyams shing mchog gi bde ba'i gnas la rigs ldan gyis ni lam sbyin pa//'di
54b3(rgyud): dgo thams cad bdag gis khyod la don ni ji bzhin bshad zla ba bzang po dus gsum lngas//slar yang khyod ni skye bo kun lnga phan pa'i don dang thar pa'i slad du bdag la ci zhig 'dri//
54b4(rgyud): dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas chen po las phyung ba dpal dus kyi 'khor lo las/'jig rten gyi khams rnam par bkod pa'i le'u ste dang po'o////mi shes sna tshogs tshad ni gang
54b5(rgyud): ngag rgyal ba bskyed mdzad khyod kyis bstan pa dag kyang bdag gis te//slar yang bdag ni mnyan par 'tsha lo srid pa gsum po mtha' dag lus kyi dbus su ji ltar lags//zla ba bzang
54b6(rgyud): po'i tshig dag gsan nas bde bar gshegs pas legs zhes bya ba byin nas rab gsungs pa//sems can rnams ni thar pa'i slad du mchog gi thugs rje sna tshogs tshad rnams dag
54b7(rgyud): kyang lus la'o//sa dang chu me rlung dang rdo rje lha yi gzhu dang rlung rnams dang ni khyim gyi 'khor lo dang //zla ba nyi ma sgra gcan lhun po gdengs can mo dang lha yi gnas dang 'khyog po sgrur
55a1(rgyud): mAr bcas//'phob zla ba dag dang phyogs dang sbyin dang mtshun mchos rnams mtha da//lus kyi dbus su ni//rang rang yi ges shes bya rnam gsum khyab dang /
55a2(rgyud): 'grod pa rnal 'byor pa yis stong pa'i dbye bas so//lus 'dri la ni khams kyi tshogs su mtha' dag ro drug zos shing 'thungs pa dag las 'gyur ba ste//ro drug rnams kyong 'byung
55a3(rgyud): ba les te rab gos la nges par 'byung po'i tshogs kyang na mkha'i khams lnga'o//stong pa la ni ye shes rnam par bsres pa ro mnyam 'gyur med rtag par yang ni 'gyur ba ste/
55a4(rgyud): ltar 'byung ba la gnas zhi ba rnam gsum sbrid pa la gnas rang gi lus la rig par bya//sa bon pad+mar gnas pa drug ni 'dzin mas 'dzin te de las chu yis sdudado phyi nas ni//me yis/
55a5(rgyud): smin par byed cing ro dang ro ni za bar byed 'di yi 'phel ba rlung gis so//namakha' dog kyang 'phel ba'i go skabs sbyin byed mI yI bdag po dus las dri ltar grub po ste//bca' bur
55a6(rgyud): gyur pa'i dus dang byis pa la sogs dus drug du yang lha yi glenas skabs rnams byed//sa bon dag gis ni gsol bar lci zhing slu ba nyid byed chuni de bzhin gshor ba nyid//me ni
55a7(rgyud): smin par byed cing rab mchog rnam pa bcu yi rlung rnams dag ni 'di yis 'phel ba'o//'phel bdag la slar yang na mkha' nyid ni go skabs sbyin byed dus las de ltar bskyed pa ste/
55b1(rgyud): sna tshogs dngos po du ma dag gis lus bcas sgra dang yid dang nus pa rnams ni spro bar byed//gsang ba'i pad+mar khrag gi nang du gang tshe lhung ba'i byang chub sa bon srog dang bcas pa dag/1
55b2(rgyud): ding ru sbal pag par 'gyur te mi yi seng ge mi thung rA ma rA ma dag dang ni//nag po sangs rgyas mi dbang rnami bcur 'gyur te 'di dag rnams kyang gnas skabs rnam pa bcu yino//mngal
55b3(rgyud): du gsum ste de bzhin ga tsa' ba'i dus su gcig dang byis pa'i dus drag du yang rnam pa gnyis//gzhon nu ljang 'tsho dag la gzhan du rab tu 'gyur te rgyas pa gcig dang yang dag de bzhin
55b4(rgyud): gcig/rgan po nyid la zhi ba gcig ste mngal skyes rnams kyi srid pa 'chi ba nyid ni mtha' ma'o//nya la nya yi rnam par 'gyur ba nyin zhag 'ga' ste ru sbal la ni ru sbal dngos po yang
55b5(rgyud): pagru pa la yang de yi skye mched nyi ma 'byung ste mi yo seng ge la ni rab tu skye//mi thung la ni byis pa'i dngos po rna ma la yang mi bdag gnyis kyis rnams 'byung bar 'gyur//slar yang rA
55b6(rgyud): la ni lgang bar 'gyur te de nyid nag po la ni gsol bar sgyu dag byed//sangs rgyas la yang zhi ba dang ni brtul zhugs nges pa byed de rigs ldan la ni 'chi bar 'gyur//khu ba las ni rkang deng
55b7(rgyud): rus pa rgyus par 'gyur te rdul las lpags pa khrag dang sho nyid//mngal gyi nang du zla ba gcig ni khrag dang sa bon bdud rtsi'i ror gyur rab tu skye ba ste//phyi nas sa bon myu gu rang gi
56a1(rgyud): snying khar rnam pa bcu yi rtsa ni shin tu phra ba'o//lte ba la yang brgyad pa brgyad ni gzhan te rkang lag gdong rnams la ni gyen du bskyod par byed//zla ba gnyis par rdzogs/
56a2(rgyud): par gyur pa dag la 'dir ni rkang lag gdong gi mtshon pa cung zad//zla ba gsum po rdzogs pa na ni lag pa rkang pa mgrin pa dag gi mgo bo mnyamo par 'gyur//phra mo'i rtsa rnams zla ba
56a3(rgyud): bzhi pa la ni rkang lag gdong dang mgrin pa dag gi phyogs su te//lnga pa la ni sha dang khrag dang rus pa mkha' ro sreg ze drug ste tshigs rnams dag kyang //zla ba drug pa la yang sha dang
56a4(rgyud): khrag tu 'gyur te tshor ba bde ba dang ni sdug bsngal yang //sman ma skra dang spu dang bug pa rnams kyang thub mchog le ste rtsa ni lhag mar gyur pa rnams//zla ba'i mjug tu nyin zhag so so'i
56a5(rgyud): dbang gis stong pa stong pa mig gi grangs ni skye ba ste//gnas dang rus pa rkang du 'gyur te ro 'dzin dang ni gci ba bshad ba brgyad pa dag la yang //bug pa zhes la gtso' ba'i dus su
56a6(rgyud): skye gnas kyis ni pa tsi ri ba dag gis sdug bsngal drag po'o//mngal du mngal na gnas pa'i sdug bsngal btsa' ba'i dus dang byis pI dus dang byis pId sgrol yA sdug bsngal te//gzhon nu
56a7(rgyud): dang ni lang tsho dag la bud med nor dang 'byor nyams nyon mongs sdug bsngal chen po gang //rgan po nyid la 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal slar yang 'gro ba drug tu 'dzegs ster du 'bod la ser
56b1(rgyud): to//skams rmongs par byas pa'i mtha' dag 'gro ba 'di ni gA bsnga lnga dag las sdug bsngalnga 'dzin par byed//'khor bar mi nyid du ni 'gyur ba dag kyang 'ga' zhig du ste chos kyi rlan
56b2(rgyud): res 'ga' na//de bas sangs rgyas la ni rjes chags dge ba'i dbang gis 'gyur zhing dang pi'i theg par rab tu 'jug/de bas dpal ldan rdo rje theg pa sgom pa la ni blo gros ma lus brgya
56b3(rgyud): lam dag na 'jug/de las sangs rgyas nyid 'dod mchog gri bde ba'i go 'phang dag la 'jug pa e ma shin tu dka'//mngal du yang dag dag pa'i sku ste btsa' ba'i dus na sa nI skyes po
56b4(rgyud): dag kyang chos kyi'o//so rnams rab tu lhung bar 'gyur ba mi yi bdag po rgyal ba yi ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku//de nas sprul pa'i sku ni rab tu gsol zhing nges par 'chi ba'i mtshams
56b5(rgyud): te ma rnams dag gi'o//mngal dang phyi rol dag tu slar yang 'di ni ye shes rnam shes dbye bas rnam pa bzhi ru 'gyur//rnam shes zla bo'i nyi ma dag kyang pad+mar gnas pa de ni mngal
56b6(rgyud): du dag pa'i sku yin te//khams dang phung po rab tu 'byung ba rnam pa bcu pa gang yin rgyal ba yi ni chos kyi sku//de nas ston dbang gis rna ba smra sogs skyes pa dag ni longs spyod
56b7(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sku ru 'gyur//de nas sgra la sogs pa skyes te rab tu bca' ba'i dus kyang 'dor ni sprul pa dag gi sku///skyes pa na ni nges par dbugs dag gang zhig rab tu 'brungad
57a1(rgyud): par 'gyur ba de nyid dag pa'i sgra//de nas sa nI rab byung gang zhig rlig nI gsal min dag kyang ni bzhin nyid du chos kyi sku//de nas gnyis skyes rnams ni byung ba
57a2(rgyud): 'gyur ba me yi bdug pa rgyal ba'i longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku//sa rnams dag las 'chi ba'i mtshams ni phye rgyal ba'i bdag po dag gi sprul pa'i sku ru 'gyur//mngal du 'di ni dang /
57a3(rgyud): padapal ldan sgra yi rdo rjer 'gyur te gsung gi rang bzhin skyes pa'o//thugs ni so dag rab tu skyes pa nyid ni'i blor yang lhung nas ye shes rdo rje rab tu 'gyur//ye shes rnam shes
57a4(rgyud): shing nyi ma re bo de can dang bcas pa ye shes rdo rje la sogs kun//mngal na gnas pa dag ni sgo yi rdo rje la sogs rim pa yis kyang stobs dang ldan par 'gyur//sa yi snying po dag ni sdig
57a5(rgyud): zlar 'gyur te 'dzin ma dang ni rlung dag stong pa'i snying po'o//rlung dang sa yi snying po dag ni chu nyid du 'gyur rang bzhin med pa dang ni rang bzhin no//sa yi rten ni chu gter 'bar byed dag kyang chu
57a6(rgyud): yi rlung ni dag par byed pa dag go'o//rlung gi stong par rab tu 'gyur te mi yi dbang po 'byung ba'i rten dang rten pa ji lta bzhin//phung po'i rten ni 'byung ba rnams su 'gyur to lus mchog
57a7(rgyud): dag la 'byung ba'i tshogs kyi rtsa rnams//rtsa rnams kyi ni srog rlung rnam pa bcu por 'gyur te srog gi rlung rnams dag gi sems yin//sems de gnyis kyi rang bzhin du 'gyur
57b1(rgyud): yon can dbang gis rang bzhin can dang rang bzhin med pa'o//de dag gi yang rten ni gtso bo srid pa gsum gyis btud cing gzhom med kun tu 'gro ba gang //dri ni 'dzin mA dag las 'byung
57b2(rgyud): ste ro yang rtse mo can las gzugs kyi khams ni chu las so//rlung las reg par 'gyur te zhi ba las kyang sgra dang chos kyi khams ni na mkha' dag las//stong pa sgra ni 'dzin par byed nges
57b3(rgyud): par rgyal ba bskyed mdzad chos kyi khams dang rlung dag ni//dri dang me yang gzugs te chu dag kyang ni ro'o de bzhin 'dzin ma dag ni reg bya'o//grub pa gzugs ni 'dzin ma la sngo srid pa
57b4(rgyud): gsum gyi gnas su tshul yang ni 'du shes grub//me la nges pa nyid du tshor bar 'gyur te rlung la yang ni phung po 'du byed kho na'o//rnam shes ye shes bsres pa na mkha' dang bcas
57b5(rgyud): rdo rje dgu la grub pa nyid de lus 'dri la//khams dang phung po la sogs thams cad 'gyur ba dug kyang rdul dang byang chub sems sogs sbyor bso//rna ba rdo rje'i rang bzhin du 'gyur mi yi
57b6(rgyud): bdag po sems ni na mkha' dag gi rang bzhi no//sne ni sa yi rang bzhin dag ste de bzhin kho na lce ni mi yi rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur//mig ni chu yi rang bzhini dag ste srid pa gsum gyi
57b7(rgyud): gnas su lus kyang rlung gi rang bzhin no//de ltar rna ba la sogs thams cad ston dbang gis 'gyur te ye shes sbyor bas//ser sna ye shes khams la 'gyur te lus mtshig dag
58a1(rgyud): la na mkha' la ni zhe sdang rdorje'o//rlung la phrag dog rdo rje me la chags pa'i rdo rje rab tu gsal mdzad de bzhin nyid du ni//tshul dbul ldan du rgyul rdo rjes la gti dun
58a2(rgyud): rdo rje rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis so//ngag deng lag po rkang pa bshang lam thams cad rlung me che dang sa rnams dag las 'byung bar 'gyur//thub sel ye shes khams la rnam gsum
58a3(rgyud): zhes par 'gyur te srog gi rlung yang stod pa dag la'o//rlung gi dbus su mnyam gnas rtse mo can la slar yang gyen rgyu chu la khyab par byed pa nyid//sA la klu ste de nas ru sbal rtsengs pa
58a4(rgyud): dang ni lha sbyin nor las rgyal ba dag gi rlung //bzhi po rlung dang me dag drang ni chu dang sa rnams dag la rim pa yis ni yang dag 'gyur//gtsug tor stong pa'i khams la 'gyur te lha dang mi
58a5(rgyud): rnams kyi ni ye shes khams la gsang ba'o//snying gi pUd rlung gi khams la rab gsal rtse mo can la mgrin pa'i 'khor lo gsal bar ro//chu la smin ma'i nang gi pad+ma nor ni nor gyi
58a6(rgyud): medab ldan lte ba'i pad+ma sa la'o//rkang pa lag pa dag gi tshogs drug sa dang chu dang sreg za rlung rnams dag le gsum gyi grangs//sa sogs khams lnga dag la rnams gsum ston
58a7(rgyud): dbang gis 'byung ba rkang pa lag pa dag gi ni//mthe bong la sogs sor mo bcu ni gsum gyis bsgyur ba'i tshigs kyi gzugs dang ldan pa mtha' dag ste//de dag sen mo'i mthar
58b1(rgyud): thug yang dag gzung bya slar yang so rnams de nyid rab tu dbye ba so//gzhan gang spu yi mthar ni lus mchog la 'gyur de dang de ni de bzhin du yang khams la'o//gsang ba gtsug tor lte ba la yang //
58b2(rgyud): lhon cig skyes pa rgyal ba'i sku ste rang bzhin med rang bzhin//snying khA'i chu skyes la ni chos skur 'gyur te mismin dri'i chu skyes la yang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku//thig le la yang sprul pa'i
58b3(rgyud): sku ni ston+do dbang gis lhag pa'i lha ru rim pa dag gis 'gyur//snying kha'o 'khor lo mgrin pa'i 'khor li spyi bo'i pad+mo chos dang longs spyod rdzogasnga dang dag pa'o//lte ba mgrin pa dag dang //
58b4(rgyud): gsang ba'i spyi bo dang ni snying kha de bzhin gtsug tor dbus su ni//yum dang gtso bo'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje rnam pa gsum po dag kyang rim pas 'gyur//'khor lo rin chen
58b5(rgyud): mkha' yi pad+ma chu skyes ral gri mchog dang rdo rje dang ldan rigs drug go//de dag steng 'og rtsa gsum rnam gsum lem la gnas pa rnams te nyi zla me yi dbye bso//lus la bsam
58b6(rgyud): pa rab tu zhugs pa no mkha' bzhin du ro mnyam bsam pa'i dbus su lus dag kyang //rnal 'byor ldan pas shes bya rang bzhin yon dbang gi khams kyi kha dog la sogs bya ba ste/
58b7(rgyud): ser po nag po dag dang kha dog dmar po zhes dang dkar pos rlung ma dang tshu la'o//ye shes ni mkha' la yang sngon po ljang kur 'gyur te ru sa dang bsam pa'i rab tu dbye bas so//shes
59a1(rgyud): rab thabasu ni ngus pa sha dang chu dang bcas pa'i khrug dang me dag dang ni lci ba nyid//rlung dang bya shang ba stong pa khu ba mchog gi lus la dpal ldan rdul dang sems nyid
59a2(rgyud): dag tu 'gyur//rna ba sgra tshogs gzhan rnams rang gi rgyal bya'i rigs kyi drung du gis ngag gi rang bzhini la sogs kyang //de ltar lha mo sangs rgyas dang bcas yul dang yul can
59a3(rgyud): rnams kyi dkyil 'khor dag la rig par bya//rtsa rnams stong phrag drug ni nyin mor byed pas bsgyur ba mngal gyi dbus dag tu yid 'phel ba ni//byas nas lho na rdzogs pan
59a4(rgyud): yang gtong ste ri bong 'dzin pa nyi ma dag kyang 'phel bar byed//pa ni bcu gnyis dag ni nyin byed khams ni 'phel ba gtong ste rang gi lus po drag la'o//rtsa ni 'chad pa rab tu
59a5(rgyud): skyes nas nyin zhag nyin zhag dag la rim pas zung gri grangs su 'gyur//dpal ldan 'byung ba dang ni dbang po rnam dag bcu ru rab 'gyur las kyi dbang po lnga rnams dang //de tsam
59a6(rgyud): lho ru brjod pa rnams dang yon tan bcas pa dag kyang yid dang blo dang der 'dzin mchog/'di dag de nyid rnams te lus dang srid pa gsum gyi granas su 'di ni longs spyod gtso bo dag/
59a7(rgyud): phreng po lnga yi bdag nyid rnam gsum srid pa la gnas bdag gi las ni bsags pa dag gi'o//sa ni sreng tshuni go shing ba maM yang tshi ba rmu ni yang ba nyid drug pa ni//stong pa
59b1(rgyud): dag ste bstan pa'i rus pa chi myed ri ngo mchog dang chur pa 'dir ni bdud nir 'gyur//rdo rje sgra dang gzhu yang bshang ba dag ston tshod rnams ni dbugs dang dbugs 'byung zung dag go/zung rnam
59b2(rgyud): dgu brgya nyis 'gyur dag gi 'pho ba gcig ste skar rtses pa rnams bug pa'i dbye ba'o//rgyu skar dag ni so yi phreng ba rje su nyin zhag chu tshod rnams na tshigs kyi dbye bar 'gyur//rtsa rnams chu
59b3(rgyud): bo rgyu ma smin te ri bong can gyi cha gzhan khams rnams gnyis kyi rang bzhin no//spu dang shig dang khu ba srin bu'i rigs dang bcas pa rnams ni 'byung po skye go nas rnam pa bzhi//dga' ba
59b4(rgyud): la sogs mthe bong tshigs rnams spyi bo'i pad+ma lte ba'i pad+ma dag kyang nus pa'o//tshangs pa'i yul sa mtho ris 'jig rten lag mchog rkang pa dag ni mi yul sa 'og 'jig rten no//
59b5(rgyud): chu gter gling dang ri bo rnams ni gshor dang 'jim pa sra ba gsum gyi rang bzhin khams rnams so//lan tshwa'i chu gter gci ba 'di dag rnams kyi me rlung dkyil 'khor rgyal po khrag
59b6(rgyud): drang lpags pa'o//skra rnams grub pa mtha' dag sred pa gsum gyi gnas su du ma'i dbye ba dag gis grub pa'o//snying mgrin lte bA pad+ma dag la rdo rje nyi mo can rnams rab 'phro
59b7(rgyud): rim pa yis//gzhu yi rnam pa zlum po dang ni nyin bzhin sreg byed chu gter zur gyi thab khung dag la yang //de dag gong na me gzhan dri med 'od zer 'phro ba ye shes gzugs ni
60a1(rgyud): mun pa dag gi mthar//gang zhig nyi ma klog gis mi gdung ri bong 'dzin pa gza' dang skar ma la sogs med pa na'o//gza' ni snying kha'i pad+ma la ste rab tu gsal byas
60a2(rgyud): chu tshod drug cu lci ba'i mad+ma la//smin ma'i dbus su nyin zhig rkang pa ma nu slar yang mi bdag longs spyod 'khor lor skar ma'o//slar yang lte ba'i pad+mar rgyu skar rnams kyi chu tshod rnal
60a3(rgyud): 'byod ldan pa dag gis rig par bya//chu tshod chu srang gsal bar mtha' dag lus la lag pa rkang pa la sogs dag gi tshigs la'o//lte ba'i chu skyes nyi ma'i mdab ma dag la6
60a4(rgyud): 'khod te mchog gi cha ni 'pho ba rom pas so//srog zung dgu brgya nyis 'gyur dag gis 'phro bar 'gyur te dus sbyor karka Ta nas mi ya dbang //dus sbyor gang la nyi ma gnas pas
60a5(rgyud): nyin dang mtshan mor 'khor ba de la de ni rig par bya//dus sbyor tshad dang nor dang bu lon mnyam pa dag kyang bgrod pa g.yas dang g.yon la shes par bya//re re'i pad+ma'i mdab ma
60a6(rgyud): dag la rab tu 'bab ste nub tu 'dzin ma dang ni byang du chu//lho ru me dang shar du rlung ni rab tu 'bab ste mang ba ma'i dbus dag du yang stong pa'o//dbye ba lnga yis 'pho bar 'gyur te mnyam/
60a7(rgyud): pa rab tu 'bab pa dman pa'i dbugs ni drug cu'o//de ltar 'pho ba'i dbye ba rnams ni nyin zhag so so'i dus su dus sbyongar dbye ba dag gis 'gyur//stong pa la sogs de nyid lnga ni//
60b1(rgyud): nges par byang du rab 'babs la sogs pa g.yas su'o//sgra gcan dus me zla ba nyi ma dag dang gza' lags skyes lha min blon po bla ma dang //mjug rings spen pa 'di bcu drug ni na mkha
60b2(rgyud): la sogs dkyil 'khor rnams la bdag po zhing can no//zla ba drug la zla ba dbang phyug du 'gyur byang dag tu ste mi bdag lho ru nyi ma'o//de steng snying kha'i phyogs su pad+ma nor gyi mdab ma/
60b3(rgyud): dag la rtsa yi 'khor lo yang dag gnas//srog la sogs pa rlung gi tshegs te zla ba nyi ma me rnams g.yon dang g.yas dang dbus su'o//g.yon du rtsi ni ri bong mtsha ni ma 'bab ste nges
60b4(rgyud): par dkar po g.yas su dmar po nyi ma'o//dbus su dus me'i gzugs ni rab tu 'bab ste mnyam pa dag la dman pa'i dbugs ni drug cu'o//srog dang thur sel mnyam gnas pad+ma nong
60b5(rgyud): gyi mngab ma dag la rlung ni gyen du rgyu ba dang //khyab byed klu dang ru sbal dag dang rtsangs pa'i rlung dang lha spyan dang ni nor las rgyal zhes pa//rlung ni rnam pa bcu po 'di rnams lte ba'i 'khor
60b6(rgyud): lo la ni las kyi dbye bas yang dag gnas//dung can mtha' yang i Da la sogs rang gi snying ka'i pad+ma rtsa yi 'khor lo mtha' dag go/srog ni nyi ma zla ba'i lam la gnas pa dag kyang srog/
60b7(rgyud): byed gza' dang btung ba ma lus pa//de dag thur sel gyis ni 'og tu 'dren te mtha' dag ro mnyam lus la mnyam gnas dag gis tshol//lus la gyen rgyus g.yo bar byed de kha
61a1(rgyud): dang lag pa nang pa rnams kyis g+ha dang zlos par byed//khyab byed kyis ni nang dag byed de rang bzhin yon tan dang dwags las ni 'jog pa de lta nyid//klu sang sgrubs/
61a2(rgyud): pa nyid de gsal bar lhag pa rkang pa bskum pa dgun du sbal rlung gis//khro dang gseng ba mtha' dag de ni rtsangs pa'i rlung dag gis te glal ba dag kyang lha sbyin gyis//lus ni /
61a3(rgyud): panyid gyur gtong bar mi byed mi yi bdage po rlung gcig nir las rgyal ba'o//de ltar srog la sogs pa'i rlung rnams thams cad rang bzhin gyis gnas yon tan dag ni gtong mi byid
61a4(rgyud): dmar sing phra mo dag kyang oM Da la sogs rnam gsum lam bgrod slar mA dang ni lag lhun rtse//drug pa rgyal dang ri yang rgyal ba nor dang dgu pa a lam bu Sh+Ta dpal ldan ku ts+tshal//
61a5(rgyud): phyogs kyi grangs ni dung can ma gang mi yi bdag po byang chub sa bon bde ba'i mthar zag byed//dpal ldan rtsa ba'i 'khor lo 'di ni rnam pa mang por 'gyur te tshigs kyi dbye ba dri mas//
61a6(rgyud): dbang po me dang gshin rje lha min chur bcas rlung dang gnod sbyin dang ni drag po dag gi dadus/gnas ni 'di dge rnam su de yi rang bzhin sten zhing nus pa nyin dang mtshan mor 'khor bar byed//
61a7(rgyud): de yi steng gi mgrin pa'i phyogasu gza' yi tshogs dang bcas pa'i rgyu skar 'khor lo yang dag gnas//tshangs pa'i yul sa dpal ldan dpral ba dag gnas dbyangs kyis yongs su
61b1(rgyud): bskur ba'i thig le dkar po zug/rtsu bar sa ste g.yon du chu dang g.yasu sreg za dag ni rab tu 'bab ste steng du rlung //gnyis kyi dbus su na mkha' dang ni mnyam pa rab tu 'bab ste
61b2(rgyud): sna bug dag las rim pas so//'di dag rnams ni dbugs te nus pa mchog gi gnas dang bcu gnyis mtha' dang cha yi mtha' ru 'gro/zhing la sogs pa lag pa rkang pa log pad
61b3(rgyud): spyir bdag la mthe bo'i mtha' thug mtha' dag go/'khor lo can ni rang gi lus la rdo rje can te lho mchog bdag rnams yan lag bcu gnyis 'gog/rigs ldan dag ni yang dag
61b4(rgyud): /ye shes glang po rta dang shing d+hA mungag gzhug 'phags pa'i tshad med rnams//drag po rang rgyal meng can dag tu 'gyur te ha nA mAn ni nyan thos gdug pa kAk+ko'i dpung //srog chags
61b5(rgyud): rnams kyi sdig pa dag ste gang zhig byed pa'i blo gros sdug bsngal sbyin byed mi dgo'i lam//rta la gnas pa ma rig pa ste lha min dpung rnams mtha' dag bdud kyi phyogs ni rnam pa bzhi//
61b6(rgyud): deye yul la sdud pa srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms paM dag sti dpal ldan rgyal ba thar pa'i lam//ki la shang ni chos dag sbyin pa srid pa'i 'jigs 'phrog yin tas ni rdzas kyis ga
61b7(rgyud): ba yang //skabs gsum pa dang mi ye bla ma'i sras po tshongs dang lce dbang dag ni rgyu ba dang mdun du gang //'jam dpal 'jig rten mgon po srid pa gsum las rnam par rgyal
62a1(rgyud): dpal ldan rdul dang byang chub sems//rgyab tu sna gzhi dag la tshangs pa la sogs sna tshogs rigs rnams du ma'i sangs rgyas rnam dag pa'o//de ltar kla klo'i dbang po'i 'khrug
62a2(rgyud): par 'gyur te nges par lus can rnams kyi dbus su'o//sgyu ma'i gzugs kyang phyi rol du ni nges par mkha'i yul du kla kl-i 'khrug ste 'khrug pa min//dus kyi la ni mi grangs lo yi nyen
62a3(rgyud): zhag tshogs kyis bsgyur te rigs drug bgrod pa'i yan lag gis//zla ba'i dbye bas sum cu drug ste ro yis bsgyur ba'i ro ni rnal 'byor ma rnams dag gi rigs//gzu' yis bcad
62a4(rgyud): pas thob pa rab tu gsal zhing nges par dus kyi 'khor lo dag gi lha rnams so//phyogs kyis bcad pa dag gi lha dang lha mo rnams kyis mngon par brjod par 'gyur mi yi bdag/
62a5(rgyud): 'phrul dra ba rnam pa gsum yang nyin zhag yan lag las 'gyur yang dag drug par rig byed dang //slar yang 'byung ba rgya mtsho me dang chu gter gyis 'gyur dpal ldan 'dus pa dus
62a6(rgyud): kyi dbye ba ni//de nyid ces bya gzhan yang drug gis rnam dman de dag phyed kyi dbye bas rnam par phye ba ste//slar yang bsres pa dag ni dbye ba gnyis te bcu gsum bcu dgu dang ni dus
62a7(rgyud): pa de nyid bcas//zla ba'i tshe shas su nges nyin zhag tshigs las gza' yis cha yis thob pa gang dag nyin zhig drug/de dag rdo rje can gyi phyag rgya drug ste gzhon pa'i nyin zhig tshe
62b1(rgyud): ni sku gsung thug kyi rgyu//shes rab sku la dus sbyor gsum rnams dris par gsal byasman khyor ma dang rna khyor rgyud lag/nus ma khro bo rnams ni rim pas bcu ru rab tu 'gyur te lnga ni sangs rgyas lha ma
62b2(rgyud): rnams//gzugs sogs mig la sogs pa drug ste slar yang mi yi bdag po lha yi tshigs ni drug gnyis so//rnal 'byor ma dang klu dang gtu mo mo brgyad ces bya ste srid pa 'di dag thams
62b3(rgyud): cad nyis 'gyur ro//'di dag dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo bzhi lhag brgya ste de yi phyed kyang khams gsum dag tu'o//nyi ma'i cha las nyin zhag so sor chu tshod 'gyung ba gang zhig zla ba'i
