62b4(rgyud): dbus su drug cu ste//de dag mtha' dag rnal 'byor ma ste srid pa gsum gyi gnas su dus sbyor bsres pa'o nyis 'gyur rnams//nyi ma'i cha las nyin zhag rab phye nyis 'gyur dag kyang
62b5(rgyud): gang zhig 'dir ni rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs//mtha' drug bsdus par gyur pa mngon brjod rnams dang bcas pa dag ni nyi ma'i nyin zhag gsum 'gyur 'gyur//nyi ma lo yi rib dbyer
62b6(rgyud): 'gyur ta ri bong 'dzin pa la ni mtha' dag phyogs kyi dbye ba'o//de ltar dang po'i sangs rgyas rgyud la mkha' lag mi bdag rnams te lha dang lha mo rnams kyis ni//shes rab thabs dag
62b7(rgyud): mtshan mo nyi mor 'gyur ba mnyam pa'i cha ste mtshan mo byed dang nyin phyed la'o//gang gis rang gi lus la nyin mtshan dus dang zla ba 'pho ba'i dbye ba dag gis shes gyur pa//de ni
63a1(rgyud): dpal ldan 'dum pa'o rdo rje srid pa'i 'jigs 'joms sangs rgyas skye ba du byed dag 'a'o//sum bu'i tshe yis de las thob pa gsum gyis bsgyur ba smad du /
63a2(rgyud): kyi 'khor lo'i lha rnams dpe//phyi rol gyi ni phyag rgya drug ste slar yang de las 'khor lo dag gi rtsa rnams de bzhin nyid//gtsug tor la ni chu gter snying khang brjid de spyi bor mi
63a3(rgyud): mgrin pa la yang sa yi grangs//lte bar brgyud ni ba rgyud kyis bsgyur ba dag ste nyis 'gyur mi bdag gsang ba'i dbus su rab tu grags//rtse drug rnams ni 'khor lo 'gog cing
63a4(rgyud): bdun yul rnams 'phrog pa 'dus pa dag gi rang bzhin te//snor yang yang nas yang du nyis 'gyur bsgyur ba dag kyang bad kan rnyed dang mkhris pa dag gi rgyu//'di dag nges pa
63a5(rgyud): 'tsho ba stir byed bla ma'i nges pa'i dbang gis tshe dang nad ma dag kyang stir//'khor lo drug la dus kyis rnams 'chi ba'i 'jigs 'phrog rnal 'byor rnams kyi 'di la ngo mtsha med/
63a6(rgyud): gtsug ti rol ni chu gter dpral bar rgya mtshos bsnun pa'i dus rnams pad kan khams ni rlob 'khrugs pa//mgrin par so dang snying kha'i chu skyes dag la mig gis bskyar ba
63a7(rgyud): dus rnams mkhris pa'i khams rab 'khrug/lte ba gsang ba dag la chu gter drug cu mi bdag dag kyang de bzhin rlung gi khams rab 'khrug/gsang bar gzhan ni phyogs
63b1(rgyud): /dang drug kyang rab tu gus la byas nges par 'dus pa dag ste 'gog pa'o//drug gi rtsa ni 'khor lo 'gog pa zla nya me yi dbye rdzas rnam gsum lam la gnas pa dang //srog chags rna
63b2(rgyud): la 'chi ba ster ba de ni bla ma'i nges pa'i dbang gi lus la bsrung bar bya//drug la gal te srog ni rabazhugs gyur na de tshe mi rnams kyi ni 'chi ba 'joms par nges//phra mo la ni mthu
63b3(rgyud): pa na rnal 'byor rnams kyi 'chi ba'i yul ni gang du gcod par byed//srog ni gal te rtsagacig nyid la nyin dang mtshan mor 'bab na 'tsho ba dag ni dus kyi lo//gal te phyogs gcig
63b4(rgyud): rnam par ma chod 'bab na mi rnams kyi ni 'tsho ba phyed dang bcas pa ma/zla ba gcig tu rnam par ma chad 'bab na mi yi bdag po 'tsho ba dag kyang zla ba gsum//de ltar rnal 'byor
63b5(rgyud): nirang lus dag la zla bgrod 'i'ache ba'i dus kyi 'khor par shes par bya//ldanas nyi shu rtsa lnga'i nyin zhag bgrod pa skye ba lnga ni 'phel bdag gis skye ba ste//de nas ri re lhag pas btsun ga
63b6(rgyud): gyis bskur bdag kyang gsum ni lhag pa ji srid nyid//dus ni rdzogs ni'o lo rnams gsum mig zla ba de dag rnams dang drug gsum zung dang blo dang zla ba gang //zla ba de dag rnams dang nyan
63b7(rgyud): zhag chos phyogs mda' ring yon tan gnyis zung che ba'i lhag ma'o//rang gi nas nas mchog gi tshe yis khyim gyi 'khor lo 'dor te nyams dang lkog ma mtshungs pa yi//lo dang zla ba
64a1(rgyud): zhag gris kyang ste gsum mig ri bong can dang drug gsum zung dang zla bas kyang //rdzogs pa nas ni lhag ma mtshungs pa'i tshe sa phyogs mda' dang yon tan rnams dang lte
64a2(rgyud): bar rab bzhugs pa'i//sum cu rtsa drug gis te nyin zhag mthar ni nyin mor byed pa'i 'chi ltas sbyor bas 'chi bar 'gyur//sngon du nyi ma'i lo gsum dag gi nyin zhag tshogs ni mad
64a3(rgyud): dang me drang 'jig rter 'dor bar byed//de nas rgyu ba dang bcas mda' dus rtse mo can dang mkha' ri zla ba dag ni gsum pa la'o//mig sbrul ri bo mda' dang nor dang lag pa gzhan te bdun/
64a4(rgyud): pa la ni rgyu ba dag kyang ngo //de nas tshes la sogs pa'i nyin zhag tshogs pa thams cad drag kyang gang zhig lte ba ji srid nyid//dus kyi lo yi bar du nges par nyin zhag bgrod pa'i dbang
64a5(rgyud): gis 'pho zhing rgyu bar byed pa ste//zla ba zhes dang nyi ma'i lam la mi mnyam mnyam pa'i nyin thag re re 'phel bas rim pas so//slar yang 'pho ba'i dbye ba mi mnyam mnyam pa'i nyin /
64a6(rgyud): zhag rnams kyi bcu gnyis rtsibs la byed pa ste//phyed dang bcas pa'i zla ba ji srid gzhan ni sum cu dag dang 'tsho ba dag gi mtshan mo gsum//dbugs dang chu srang dang ni chu tshod
64a7(rgyud): nyin mtshan dus rnams de ni rim pa dag gis rgyu ba ste//bgrod pa'i yan lag las ni lo bdun dag gis bgrod pa 'gro ba'i dbang las lo ni drug nus kyang //zlo ba gsum las
64b1(rgyud): sum cu'i lo yis nyin zhag bgrod pa'i dbang gis dus kyi lo dang phyogs kyis kyang //dus kyi 'khor lo dag la byed bcas sum cu gnyis kyis bgos pa'i nyin zhag tshogs kyis rgyu bar 'gyur/
64b2(rgyud): phyogs dang phyogs la rtsa ni dgu yis bsnun pa'i lag 'gro lte ba'o 'khor lo dag la gcod par byed//las kyi 'khor lo bya ba zhes bya'i tshigs las nyin zhag rtse mo can gyi rtsa ni re re 'dor//mgri/
64b3(rgyud): bo dag las rgyu skar rtsa ni nyin dang nyin la zla ba'i nang du rim pas 'dor ba ste//thig ler gnas pa zla ba'i rkang pa phyogs kyi nang du 'dor te gza' yi rtsa dang gsang bar gnas//sde pa dbyangs
64b4(rgyud): dang bcas pa rnams las nyin mor byed pa khyim gyi dbye bas bgrod par rgyu ba ste/phyi nas re re lhag pas nyin dang nyin la ldog par 'gyur te dus kyi lo ni ji srid nyid//lo ni ched na phyogs
64b5(rgyud): kyi nang du dbyangs kyi nyin zhag dbang gis rgyu ba dang ni zad pa yang //nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus su dbugs ni 'byung dang 'jug pa nyams pa 'tsho ba dag gi mtshan mo gcig/lte ba mgrin pa
64b6(rgyud): dpral ba rong gi snying kha'i pad+ma dag la rtsa ni lhag ma dang bcas pa//nyi ma ro dang me dag gnas te rang gi snying khA'i pad+mar phyed bcas rtsa ni de bzhin nyid//lag pa rkang pa'i tshigs la
64b7(rgyud): chos kyis bsgyur ba'i dus rnams nyin zhag drug ni ji srid nyid du ste//mthar ni kun tu phra mo rab tu 'bab ste nyin zhag snying gi chu skyes yang dag stong par byed//sum cu drug stong phrag
65a1(rgyud): d+hU brgya'i nyin nag tshogs rnams dag gas dus kyi rtsa ni rgyu sa//nyin mnan dus 'aM nyi m+b+ha zla ng+yas rang rlung rtswa dag gis gang gang rdzogs par mi nus pa//ny-im+bu rgyan
65a2(rgyud): zhag nyi ma rgyu ba la yang bu lon du 'gyur de byed zla ba'i rgyu ba la//rgyu skang nyin zhag rab tu dbye bas 'chi ba'i nyi zla chub stong po'i zla ba dag pa'o//srog ni lus la lhag pa gang zhig rAb
65a3(rgyud): gsal mtshoms su rig byed ning chud kyis min drug cu ste//'pho ba'i dbye ba dag gis thoms cad nyin zhag so so'i dus su rtsa ni zung drug nges par 'joms//yang dang yang du lo mi
65a4(rgyud): dbus su nyi zla rgyu ba dag lngas stong pa mig dang rI yi grangs//de ltar rang rang tshad kyi lo brgya dag gis lha mi rnams kyi rang gi tsho la dus bgrod do//zos dang nad dang bsnun pa gral te
65a5(rgyud): res 'ga' mi rnams la ni dus kyi rtsa la gyur pa na//gzhi de yis ni 'phral la myur bar rtsa ba'i 'khor lo drag la dus ni rab tu 'jug par 'gyur//'khor lo ngag gi rtse 'di 'gog/
65a6(rgyud): ste nyi ma ri bong can gyi bgrod pa bcad nas rim pa yis//dbu mar phra myo la ni rten pa gang zhig 'phrog pa mi bdag srog chags rnams kyi 'tsho ba'o//snying kha'i pad+ma dpal ldan dpa/
65a7(rgyud): ber 'byung ba phyogs dang nyin zhag ces pa zla ba'i rkang pa rgyu//langs spyod lte ba'i 'khor lo dag la dgu ldan bcu dang drag po zung dang rgyal ba zhes bya dang //de nyid ces bya zhig
65b1(rgyud): bdun dag nas slar yang ri bong mtshan ma gang 'dir rim pa min pas 'dor//thig le dag la rdzogs par byas nas snying khar rab 'jug dkar po'i phyogs la nor gyi slad du'o//slar yang
65b2(rgyud): nagra po dag la de bzhin 'gro ste rkang pa'i dbang gis lte ba'i pad+ma dag gi bar//snying khu de bzhin mgo bor rtsibs brgyad rtsibs bcu drug la gau nagA dang dkar ba dag gi chu skyes ming //
65b3(rgyud): mgrin pa lte ba dag la sum cu rtsa gnyis rtsibs dang nyos 'gyur gzhan te dmar dang ser po'o//brgyad pa gnyis ni lte ba mgrin pa la ste mgo dang snying kha la yang dkar nag rdzogs pa'o//
65b4(rgyud): a sogs sum cu'i dbyangs gang ha ya ra wa lar ldan thig le dpal ldan rnam par bcad pa yis//phye ba drug cur 'gyur te de dag dus dang mi bdag nor dang so rnams ge sar rtse mo la'o//
65b5(rgyud): thig le'i rnam pa dang ni rnam par bcad pas pad 'dab mchog la ka sogs sde rnams rnam phye ba//nyi shu dang ni brgya phrag gcig kyang thun gyi bgrod pa'i dbang gis nyi ma rgyu zhing nyams par/
65b6(rgyud): byed//phyogs la zla ba rung gi chu bas nyin zhag ces bya'i rkang pa dag kyang bu lon drag tu byed//slar yang zla ba gnyis kyis gzhan pa dag kyang nyin zhag lo yi spor ba dag las 'phel ba/
65b7(rgyud): ni//rdzogs pa'i lo la nyin zhag drug tu 'gyur te gzhon yang de bzhin 'chi ba dag gis mtsham su 'phel//rgyal po de ltar nyi ma'i bu lon nyes 'gyur 'di ni l-i yi sbyor ba dag gis
66a1(rgyud): 'phel bar byed//dbugs drug gis ni rgyu srang gcig tu rab tu 'gyur te chu srung drug cu yis kyang chu tshad do//chu tshod drug cu nyin zhag du 'gyur gsum gyis bsgyur
66a2(rgyud): ba bcu yis nyin zhag dag gis zla ba gcig/zla ba drug gis kyang ni bgrod par 'gyur te gnyis kyis bskur ba bgrod pa lo gcig du rab grags//skyes bu rnams kyi tshe la/
66a3(rgyud): brgya las bu lon bgrod par gyur pa dus kyi rtswa yi dbang gis so//'jig rten gsum na lha min lha mi rnams las gang zhig rang gi lus la zla ba nyi ma dag/rdzogs par nus pa'i
66a4(rgyud): rnal 'byor ldan pa mede zla bas rang gi rgyu bas nyin mtshan rgyu ba dang //srid par lo yi nang du rim pas nyi mas kyang ni rgyu skar thams cad rgyu ba min pa nyid//lo dang lar ni bu lon dag
66a5(rgyud): gis de ni srid pa za ste dus kyi 'khor lo dpa' bo gcig/chad pa gal te rtsa gcig yin na mi yi bdag po gci ba dag ni sgyur ba nyid du 'gyur//de tsam rnams ni nyin zhag lnga
66a6(rgyud): nas mchog gi cha yis 'dor te gong bu 'chad pa'i dus su'o//sgra ni rna ba las te ro yang nges par khwa las 'dor zhing mig 'bras mig gi dbus naso//dri ni sna las mi rnams
66a7(rgyud): dag gis lag pa rkang pa'i lus las dro ba'i dngos po rim pa yis//sna yi rtse mo 'phyang ba dang ni spyi bor lag pa bzhag pa de yi rang bzhin dag tu mthong //lag pa gnyis
66b1(rgyud): ka'i mthil la rgya skyegs tshon gyis rab tu byugs kyang dmar po nyid du byed ma yin//nyi ma kha dog nag pa dang ni yongs su gyur pa'i ri bong 'dzin pa khwa dog ser por mthong //gaN+DIn dang
66b2(rgyud): lus kyang bsil bar gyur na mi yi bdag po de yi nyin zhag la ni 'tsho ba nyid//lce 'og nag po'i thig tu rab tu 'gyur te mag la tshedra pa'i ri mo shin tu phra mo dang //dbugs ni zla ba ti/
66b3(rgyud): ma'i lam du 'phro ste mi yi bdag pa 'khur chos gnyis po de bzhin nyid//nu ma'i steng ni mtshan khung du zhugs gza' yi tshogs rnams mtha' dag mo stag dag dang bcas par mthong
66b4(rgyud): mgrin pa lus dang bcas pa rengs shing 'khor ba yang ni lus la 'chi ba'i mtshan nyid dag tu 'dod//skye ba dang ni btsa' ba'i dus dang byis pa gzhon nu dag gi gzugs ni byed pa
66b5(rgyud): gang yin pa//de nyid 'jig rten dag tu slar yang sdud par byed pa dus kyi 'khor lo can te nyi ma mIn//zla ba nyi ma la sogs lha rnams 'byung ba dang bcas mtshan mo'i cha la bcom
66b6(rgyud): ldan de yis zos//slar yang nyin ma'i dus su mtha' yas rnams kyang gtong bar byed bskyed pa'i rgyu ni rim pas so//sgra la sogs pa drug po rnams ni las su 'gyur te dbang po
66b7(rgyud): drug po dag kyang byed pa'o//lo dang zla ba phyogs dang nyin dang mtshan mo chos dang zla ba nyi ma dog kyang byed pa po//de dag sdud pa'i byed po gzhan du 'dir 'gyur bskyed pa'i byed pa po ni byed
67a1(rgyud): bsgo ma yin//mkha' khyab mkha' yi rdo rje can te yul dang rnam bral yon tan med la rang bzhin med pa'o//dri dang kha dog dang noraro dang reg pa zhes dang 'dzin ma dang na rmu/
67a2(rgyud): dang me dang rlung //nges par gzugs can brgyad po rnams ni mtha' dag yul gyi tshigs pa dag ste gcig ni gtso bor 'gyur//'jig rten gsum po mtha' dgra 'di ni spro ba dag dang /
67a3(rgyud): sdud par 'gyur te dus kyi mthu las//sgra dang stong pa dang ni chos kyi dbyings dang yid kyang mi yi bdag po gzugs med du 'gyuraro//bdag nyid 'ching ste rang bzhin le gnas ston
67a4(rgyud): rnam rtog rnams kyis dar gyi srin bu ji bzhin nyid//bdag nyid bdog gis nges par slar yang rnam par rtog pa med pa'i yid dag las ni gtong bar byed//de phyir rgyal po
67a5(rgyud): raring las rang bzhin yon tan la gnas sdug bsngal dang ni bde ba byed pa ste//rang bzhin rnam par bral ba su zhig byed po ci zhig byed de mi shes 'jig rten rmongs par byed//sa dang chu
67a6(rgyud): dang me dang rlu drung na mkha' dang ni yid dang blo dang der 'dzin dag gau sems//rags dang phra mo gzhan yang rnam gsum ston la gnas yi ge thig le la sogs dbye bo yis//rags
67a7(rgyud): pa rags pa'i dbang po rnams la rang bzhin gyis kyang gnas te phra mo'i sems la phra mo yang //ye shes la yang ye shes sku ste rang bzhin rnam 'gyur med pa'i 'tsho ba 'byung ba 'byung
67b1(rgyud): min//a sogs stong bu lda ni rang bzhin rnam par 'gyur min dpal ldan cha dang thig lenA da dang //dus dang sems dang tha m+b+ha rang bzhin dag kyang de bzhin bzhan pa'i sh+ya ba'i rlu
67b2(rgyud): sogs pa'o//rags pa sde ba'i yi ge rnams ni gsum gyis bsgyur ba'i bcu ste bcu drug gzhan ni rnam 'gyuraro//de dag dbus su rdo rje can ni rang bzhin min cing rnam 'gyur min to khyab
67b3(rgyud): byed rang bzhin med//'khor bar bde dang sdug bsngal rang bzhin ston la gnas las las skyes pa de ni ze re ste//mi rnams kyi ni las 'di dag kyang rnam pa gsum du 'gyur te rags dang
67b4(rgyud): bro mo zhi ba'o//bdag ni byed pa po yang khyad par les te gzhan pa phyogs bdag kyang yod byed po zhes pa las//byed pa de dag gam gzhan pa min te rang byizhin rnam par bral ba
67b5(rgyud): pa de ni las ma yin//de phyir byeng po 'gre' yang srog chags rnams kyi byed dang sdug bsngal dag ni mi sbyin mi 'phrog ste//'khor ba dag tu rnam pa gsum po gang byas sngon gyi las ni
67b6(rgyud): 'bras bu rab tu smin par 'gyur//bskyed dang srung ba'i byed pa po 'di skyer zhing de na zlog po mongs pa rnams kyi blo gros te//lus la dpag med dge ba 'phrog par byed pa'i bug pa rang gi
67b7(rgyud): dbang po ga gis mthong ma yin//'dod pa'i nus dang bye ba dang ni gsum pa ye shes nus pa 'phro ba rang gi yid la skye//dngos po gsal ba dang ni 'jug pa dag dang ro mnyam cur ni
68a1(rgyud): don la nye bar dmigs par byed/slar yang gtong ba dag ni bzhi pa srid gsum gyis btud gnyis med kyi kyang nges pa rim paso//de dag rlung nas rdo rje can nI ma
68a2(rgyud): yi bdag po cung zad mi zla btong ba min pa nyid//bdag ni byed po sdug bsngal bde ba rab tu sbyin por mi yi bdag po dar ni 'gyur ba min//'ga' yang bcings dang grol bar 'gyur min
68a3(rgyud): mi li bdag po sems kyi nus pa rnam par spangs nas so//nam mkha' bum pa'i dbus nas chu ni len par byed pa nA yang 'gro ba min pA ni lta ba//mkha' khyab mkha' yi rdo rje can ni
68a4(rgyud): yul dang rnam bral las kyi dbus dag du yang de bzhino//de ltar las ni yod par smra ba por 'gyur bcom ldan ston pa gcig tu de ni byed po min//kun mkhyen dang po'i sangs rgyas
68a5(rgyud): srid gsum gyis btung dus kyi 'khor lo can te 'khor lo can ma yin//tshangs pa khyab 'jug drag po dag kyang gang gi zhabs kyi chu skyes drung du lhag par skyabs 'gro ba//dus kyi
68a6(rgyud): 'khor lo rgya po pa n+de chog bskyed yon tan med rnyed rnam rtog med pa de la phyag 'tshalo//zhi ba'i bsam pa la ni lha nyid du 'gyur mi yi bdag po mun po la ni dmyal ba nyid//rdul dag
68a7(rgyud): la yang dung 'gro nyid de rab mtshig sa yi steng du ma nyid dag ni 'dres pa lo//'byung ba nyid ni rnam pa gsum ste rdul dang mun pa dang ni snying stobs phan tshun 'dres pa la'o//'tsho
68b1(rgyud): dus su yid kyi bsam pa gang shig dran par gyur pa de ni skye bo yang dag ste//lha nyid brgyad kyi dbye ba dug gis lha yi martag gi gnas mi nyid gcig ni ji lta ba//dud 'gro dag kyang chu
68b2(rgyud): gter rnam pa nges par dmyal ba'i 'gro bar dmyal ba nyid ni de 'dzin gcig/gnas 'di rnams su ro yi 'gro bar skye bo 'khor te las kyi zhags pas nges par bcings pa dge/skye ba 'dum
68b3(rgyud): phrag du mas thar pa mchog gi bde ba'i go 'phyang du ni 'gro zhing grol ba min//phung po khams drang dbang po dang ni rnam gsum srid pa 'jigs pa las kyi dbang po lnga drag dang //de tsam dang
68b4(rgyud): ni las kyi skyon dang ston dang bcas yid dang blo dang ngar 'dzin la sogs te//'di dag gis bcings 'tsho ba dag ni ro yi 'gro bar 'khor te phra mo'i dngos po drag gis slar//dngos po
68b5(rgyud): btang na mi zad mchog gi gnas su rab tu 'gro ste gang du slar yang skye ldan min//yan lag dang bcas rig byed dran pa'i gzhung dang bcas dang rtog grub pa'i mthar ldan 'jig rten du//
68b6(rgyud): snyan dngags mkhan po rgyas pa me la sogs pa rnams kyis byas pa'i bsnyen bac+doMs gzhan yang rig pa min//rig pa zhes pa nang rig 'gyur med kyang ste 'jig rten 'dir ni thub pa rnams
68b7(rgyud): kyis rab gsungs nyid//gang du 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag du 'gyur mi yi bdag po slar yang gang du thim pa'o//rnal 'byor dbang po rnal 'byor ma thob rab tu g.yo ba'i yid kyis
69a1(rgyud): gal te shi bar gyur pa na//dpal ldan mi yi 'jig rten du ni rab mchog thub pa'i rigasu rnal 'byor ldan pa skye bar 'gyur//sngon gyi goms pa de yas slar yang
69a2(rgyud): ye shes rnal 'byor yangs pa dag ni kun tu 'dzin par 'gyur//ye shes thob na mi zad mchog gi gnas su rab 'gro gang du slor yang skye ba ldan pa min//ye shes skye ste rgyal ba
69a3(rgyud): rnams kyi nyi ma ny+dzan mo'i dus su mtshan mo phyed dang mtshan mo'i mthar//lha min rnams ni zla ba mtshan mo'i dus su nyi ma phyed dang nyani mo dag gi 'jug tu'o//yang drag yo shes rnams
69a4(rgyud): nyams dag pa tshig ni legs sbyar tha ma lo dag tu rab tu 'gyur ba ste//zhe dang drag po las te srid pa gsum gyi gnas su skyes bu nyid dang tha mal dag kyang //nyi ma gung dang mtshan
69a5(rgyud): mo phyed na nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus su de dag gi na ze ba'i dus//bza' ba zan dang ba lang she sta btung ba rnam mang bcud ster dag dang sga nga'i khu ba'o//gos ni dmar dang dkar po
69a6(rgyud): drag dang nyi ma zla ba'i bgrod pa bzhin du mtho ris sa 'og gnas//chos ni 'tsho med 'tshe ba yang ste bla ma'i nges pa'i dbang gis rdo rje lha min gdun yang //'byung po rnams kyi las
69a7(rgyud): ni 'dren mar rab tu 'gyur te tshig kyang 'dres pa sha za dag gi'o//chos ni 'tshe med 'tshe ldan nges par bla ma'i nges pa'i dbang gis srog gcod la sogs skyon dag la//
69b1(rgyud): mchod sbyin la sogs don du rab tu 'jug 'gyur ma yi bdag po rem+b+ha 'ga' dag ni ldog pa 'am//gza' ba btung ba dag kyang 'dres pa nyi zla'i bgrod pa dag las lam ni 'dren ma gzhan du/
69b2(rgyud): 'od zer lam ni nyi ma'i snang ba dkar po nyi na mo bgrod pa byang dang lo yi phyed dag kyang //zla ba'i snang ba mtshan mo dag dang draka rI ma ni bgrod pa 'di ni lho ste du ba drag gi lam//'od zer lha rnams/
69b3(rgyud): mtho ras su p+ta dkar mi ni dag kyang de bzhin lha min klu yi 'jig rten du//kun tu 'dres pa mi bdeg mi yi 'jig rten du ni ya dregs drud 'gro me rnams dag gir 'gyur//gang zhig gang gi
69b4(rgyud): dbus su rab zhugs brtul zhugs nges pa la dga'i lus kyi zhags pas nges bcings pa//de yi dbus su rlung rang bsam pas mi bdag de yi rigs su de yi 'dzin pa dag gis 'gyur//
69b5(rgyud): ji srid sems kyi rang bzhin dag ni rnam gsum sred pa'i dbang gis tshor ba bde dang sdug bsngal bya//de srid 'jigs rung 'khor ba 'dir 'khyam mi yi bdag blo mtho ris mi yul dag dang 'og
69b6(rgyud): tu yang //ka sogs sde rnams dbyings dang bcas pa drug kyang yon tan gyis bsgyur gang yang phyogs gsum dag gi dbyangs//nges par sum cu'i gsal byed de dag rnams la rnam gsum/
69b7(rgyud): bgrod pa'i dbang gis 'chi bas rgyu ba ste//bza' lnga'i rkang pa nyi ma ri bong can gyi rkang pa dag dang sgra gcan mjug rings rkang pa dang //sum cu rtsa gnyis la dang phyogs kyang yon tan
70a1(rgyud): gyis bsgyur zla ba nyi ma me yis phye ba'o//lo gsum gyis ni phyogs rnams dag drang ri dong can gyi yon tan dus kyi me yi phyogs gnyis dag/lo brgya las ni dman byung
70a2(rgyud): lhag ma'i phyogs ni nyi zla ga gi mnyam dang mi mnyam dgrod pa lnga//'jig rten mig dang mi mig grangs de nyin mtshan dus rnams gtso bo dag gis dman pa mtha' drag ste//gsal
70a3(rgyud): byed la sogs sde pa dbyings rnams dag ni nyi ma zla ba'i bged pa'i dbang gis 'chi bas zos//phyed bcas 'khor lo'i chu ched ri bong can gyi rkang pa dang bral gza' yi chu tshad rnams
70a4(rgyud): doman pa//de dag rnams kyang shes rab thabs kyi rab tu dbye ba dag gis nyin mtshan dus kyis 'chi bas zos//de ltar sde pa dbyangs bcas dbyangs kyi tshe ga dang bcas pa gsal byed
70a5(rgyud): rnams nyid dag dang rnying pa n+ti//dman dang bar ma dus 'tsho zlo ba nyi ma'i 'chi ba dang ni gsal byed lhag pa'i lha la'o//sume cu gnyis dang nyin zhogro gcig kyang ri bong can bcas nyi rlon
70a6(rgyud): glai la ni garjod pa 'di//skyer ya sum nu ma tshan mo gsum gyis rje dang r+b+has thong hU~M khams dang dbang ba la srogs 'dod/ba nyi ma'i ma dag drong nas drung can mngon
70a7(rgyud): srog gi rlung dag nyin gcig rab 'jug ste//so dang mye sreg za rlu dang ni mkha'i khams ni rnam par ched po ji srid nyid du'o//dang po mtha' dag rgyal ba'i lus ni dngos grur/
70b1(rgyud): rgyu ru sngags pa dag gis yang dag bsrung bar bya//lus med na ni dngos grub med cing skye ba 'di la mchog gi bde ba thob par 'gyur ba'ang med//de phyir lus kyi don gyi rgyur ni nyin zhag so so'i
70b2(rgyud): dus su rtswa yi sbyor ba bsgom par bya//lus ni grub na gzhan pa'i dngos grub srid pa gsum gyi gnasu mngag gzhus nyid du rab tu 'gyur//stong pa la ni du ba sogs lam bla ma'i nges pa'i
70b3(rgyud): dbang gis gzugs brnyan mtshoms su bsgom par bya//de nas rtswa yi 'khor lo rnams su srog dang thur sel rlung ni brtan pa dag kyang byed pa ste//phyi nas zla ba nges par 'gog pa gza'
70b4(rgyud): bzhin byed de byang chub sems ni rnal 'byor pa yis so//de nas gang zhig cung zad 'dod pa dag ni nyin zhag 'ga' yis skye ba 'di la thob par 'gyur//nyi ma zla ba 'gog pa mnyam dang mi
70b5(rgyud): mnyamo bgrod pa la skye dbu ma mi la rab tu zhugs//srog dang thur sel gnyis pa dag kyang nyin zhug dang po sang na dus min 'chi ba slu ba ste//lag pa dang bcas rkang pa'i sor mo'i tshogs
70b6(rgyud): dang sen mo'i mthar ni srog gis kun tu gang byas nas//'khor lo drug la sangs rgyas lha mo 'jigs med lag pa'i pad+ma rnal 'byor pas ni bsgom par bya//thur sel bskum na 'dod par
70b7(rgyud): 'gyur te lus mchog dag la rlung gi nad ni ma lus dag pa'o//srog rtsol dag ni bad kan la 'gyur slar yang de dag gtong po mkhros pa dag gis skyon la'o//steng dang 'og ni yang dag
71a1(rgyud): mal na mamamathamathamachams sa mtham sa mtham/a mtham thas mthamathasamam mams mams ma maya ya malamamam mamam
71a2(rgyud): 'gog pa ri dab byed par 'gyur te 'dus pa dag dang rims pa'o//lte bu'i steng du srog gi rlung ni mtha' dag nad 'phrog lte ba'i rtsa bar gzhan pa dag kyang //bsum/
71a3(rgyud): ste thur sel rlung ni rnam pa gsum gyi lam du bgrod pa dag dang srog nyid steng nas kyang //ji srid yang dge phrad do me nI stobs dang ldan zhing lus kun la ni khyab par rab 'gyur ba/
71a4(rgyud): dmu chu skran dang gzhang 'brum nad rnams dag kyang lto bar son pa zla ba'i sbyor bas 'joms pa ste//dbugs lud dang ni glo dang rnam pa gsum gyi dug dang mig gi nad la sogs pa ngag
71a5(rgyud): kyang ngo //mtshan khung g.yas dang g.yas min las ni nu ma dag kyang stobs ldan mnan te srog ni bkag pa las//g.yas nas g.yon pa'i rtser ni 'phral la rab tu 'bab ste g.yon pa'i
71a6(rgyud): mtshan khung las kyang g.yas su'o//zla ba phyed kyis kyang ni 'chi ster 'chi ltas 'phrog ste rnal 'byor ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa yiso//rdo rje skyil krung du gnas rkang pa gzung ba lag
71a7(rgyud): pa'i pad+mo dag ni rgyab kyi zung rngu 'joms//steng du rkang pa dag dang 'og tu mgo bo lus la badra kan nad rnams mtha' dag 'phrog par byed//srog 'gog pa las nyin zhag 'ga' zhig
71a8(rgyud): gis ni rab 'khrug gci bo'i nad dag nges par 'joms par byed//tho rangs ming med dag gis chu dang bral ba'i khar ni so yi 'phreng ba dag la rab bdar ba//mig rnams dag gi
71b1(rgyud): mig sman du 'gyur slar yang nad ni bzlog pa shu yis gtor bdag kyang //gan t+ya la nyal nas lte ba lag pa'i pad+mas gzung ba dag ni ma zhu yi zung rngu 'joms//'bras rnams 'byung ba/
71b2(rgyud): las n-i des par ma dang bcas de'i tshe yis bdug sun 'phel ba 'joms byed byung //de nas ar+g+ha'i 'o mra byugs pas kyang de'i'agrwa'i lkog rje nas srin zug rngu bcu ste gyur ma//rtag
71b3(rgyud): ldan gyi ni sra bon du brlabs la sogs pa dag gis 'did zung srin bu la sogros 'joms//lo byed kyis ni sngags pa rnams kyi mchog gi lus la dkar ba'i mdze 'phrog de las
71b4(rgyud): gzhan lta ni//shes+ye rab 'dus la rang sems lhung ba dag kyang rtag tu srog gi rlung gis 'grogs po dag lngas te//bdun nu'i lo yi rga ba skra dkang gcas pa dag kyang lo gnyis rab
71b5(rgyud): tu rdzogs nA nges par 'phrog/nyi ma 'ga' yis lam dang sems ni rab tu 'grogs pa dag ldi de stang phyag rgya'i dngos grub 'gyur//srog rtsol rab tu bya ste snying kha de bzhin mgo bo dag
71b6(rgyud): ni ji srid me yis gdung 'gyur ba//de las sted dag du ni bzang po'i pad myur brgyal bar 'gyur te ma bsdoms pa 'am stobs dge gis//gtsug tor rdzog cing phung po dag dang khams
71b7(rgyud): rnams rnam par spangs nas 'chi ba nyid du 'gro'i gyur to//phyag rgya 'grogs pa rab nyams skyes bu rnams kyi skye ba 'di nyid la ni bde 'bras sbyor ba med//phyag rgya sgom pa'i don dugatu
72a1(rgyud): nyan mtshan dus su rgyugs pa dngad pa 'don ni min pa nyid//gsung gi/rdo rje mchod pa'i dran ti ngas par sngags pa rnams la myos byed gsungs pa nyid ma yin//5
72a2(rgyud): thams cad byed pa'i don te nyin zhag so so'i dus su ma zhu'i rgyur yang ma gsungs//dpal lhun spyod pa dengs grub rgyur te mtshan mi dur khrod 'o khyim pa dag kyang rtsed mo'i don ma yin//
72a3(rgyud): mi bskyod pa ni cung zad dro ba kha nang zhi bar byed ste so yi zug rngu nyid kyi yang //tho rangs mi bskyed rngubs pa dag ni mgo yind 'phrog de bzhin nyid du tshun rngubs pas so//rna ba dang
72a4(rgyud): dang myig tu gcin ni dro dang grang mo rab byugs gnyis ka dag gin du 'dreg go/'byung pos gzir la tsha ba gsum bcas mi bskyed rngubs na bad+ma stor te zas pa nyid la yang //bshad
72a5(rgyud): ba gcin dang khu ba khrag ni mi yi sha dang bcas pa zos pas tshwa ni ster bar 'gyur//bsamya gtan bcas par me tog rngubs no skra dkar dang bcas rga ba dang ni lus skyes rnams kyang
72a6(rgyud): 'phrog/sgron ma lnga po sbrang bu'i sgrubs pa dag dang bsres 'azos pas mthong dag nang ni 'phrog pa ste//bud med me tog khu ba dag dang bsres pa la gcig zos ni rga ba nges par
72a7(rgyud): sel bar byed//rlung 'joms len tshwa sbyar ba dag tu 'gyur te mngar dang ska ba dag ni mkhris pa'i dge/bang ki na 'joms pa kha ba kun dang de bzhin che ba dag kyang sman rnams sam//
72b1(rgyud): nr-i khu ba 'am//bad kar+b+ba 'joms par ye to mtsho ba gsum bcus dag sta mA ho'i 'o ma mkhris pa'i dgra/rlung 'joms dag kyang rnga mo'i 'o ma rnams gsum nad 'phrog pa yi Sh+yo ma dang /
72b2(rgyud): nide bzhin mar/d+hU ti bskol ba'i chu ni dbu kha nad zhi bar byed so yi zug rngu nyid kyang //ti le myur dngos po'i chu bskol chu ba gsum dang lan tshwa dag gis rna ba yi ni nAd dag 'joms//
72b3(rgyud): mar dang 'o ma bskol bar gyur pa klu dang dmar po dag gis rtog tu sna yI nad dag 'dzums//karko nI dang lAM ga li dang in+d+ri bong bu'i chur bcas byugs pas 'bras kyi phreng ba 'phrog
72b4(rgyud): lag pa dag ni rab 'phyang rkang pa'i pad+ma mnyam pa dag dang srog go rlung ni 'gog bya ste//ji srid lus ni sa la rab tu myung 'i bar ma gyur pa dang tsha ba dag ni grol bar yang //yang dang
72b5(rgyud): yang du ting 'dzin la'i 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa byed pa'i tsher ma can ni nges 'joms te//sgying khe'i pad+mar zla ba'i gzugs can dri mAd ri bong can mtshungs sna tshogs yum ni bsgoms
72b6(rgyud): pas so//sran chung btags nas 'thungs pas tsha bas rnam par bsnun pa'i mi rnams kyi ni tsher mA 'joms par byed//tsha bai ri mAthar ni thod pa bdar ba mi bskyod bsres pa yis
72b7(rgyud): kyang 'jigs par byed pa 'phrog pa ste//sngags kyang chu mi rlung rnams dag gi sngon du oM yig dang ni badz+ra snga ma dag gi ming //de nyid kyis ni bsrung bar bya ste mgo mgrin snying ga
73a1(rgyud): lte ba gsang ba la sogs rnams su'o//mnyam pa d+hA tri d+hA n+yA dang ni gzhan yang de bzhin ti n+ti yi mdab ma'i phye mA dag/nyi zla reg pa'i chu ni nges par dri ma bral ba dag
73a2(rgyud): la rkang pa'i lhag mur bskol bar bya//de yi khu ba ka ra dang bsres gzhan pa'i nyin zhag dag nas zhag gsum 'thungs pa 'di yis na//saM ka nyi ma'i 'od zer dag gis bsregs
73a3(rgyud): pa'i tshe ster 'phrog ste khams bdun song ba dag kyang ngo //gser la nyi ma khab len lcags dang pa Ta las skyes lcags ni mA k+Shi ka yis gdab par bya//sa bon phyed kyis kyang ni/
73a4(rgyud): /dri ma dag dang bral ba'i dngul chu bsgongs pa srang ni drug tu bya//ba yi dar ba drag po'i rtse mo can gyis bsad nas 'dir ni dang dri ma bzung bar bya ba nyid//dpal ldani gong bu khab
73a5(rgyud): smin snod du slar yang bskol ba dag kyang ji srid phyed kyi tshod du'o//rab tu blangs te dag pa'i ka ra srang brgyad yang na dgu ni de la bsre ba nyi du bya//de ni thams cad dus su bza'
73a6(rgyud): bar bya ste kha zas rnam srungs bgrod pa ji srid nyid du'o//zla ba drug gis lce yaM lus te skra dkar gnyer ma dang bral 'di yis 'chi med nyid du 'gyur//de phyir de nyid nyi ma so so'i
73a7(rgyud): dus su bza' bar bya ste 'on kyang gong bus rnam par dman//sngar brjod sa bon rgyal po mnyam pa dag ste gzhan yang dngul chu la ni blugs pa phyed tsa mo//lan tshwa skyur po dag gi/
73b1(rgyud): mnyes nas rnam pa mang po'i sman gyis ji srid gcig nyid du 'gyur ba//mkhris pa bsgyur pos mu zi sogs dang da ra dwa dang shi la dag kyang dngul chu mtshungs par mnye//de yis dngul gyi
73b2(rgyud): mdab ma thugs pa gser nyi 'gyur smin ma dag kyang phyed dang ldan paso//rnon po na mkha' las skyes a la len tshA ya ba k+Sha rA dang ni sA rdza rim pa yis//'phel ba dag kyang nyi mo nyis
73b3(rgyud): 'gyu ro mnyam byed pas nyi mo'i lhag mi dag ni bri sreg par bya//slar yan lan tshwas dag pa dang ni de bzhin pa las byung ba la sogs kyis bran 'jam par 'gyur//dngul lo sum cha
73b4(rgyud): byin zhing bkang sti bsnun pa dag kyang dag pa yi ni mA tog nyid du 'gyur//e la ge bur phreng ba dag pa dang ni g.yo ba g+ha na 'bras bu can dang bya rog ri skyes dang //kAk+ko la dang sing hA mU
73b5(rgyud): tr-i ut+pal 'bras g+ha ri dwags skyes dmar de t+ya b+hU tI dang //klu dang bsil ba ra NA mdab ma pA la chu dang 'khri shing nu mi khya' 'khyog po 'di dag ni//rdzas lnga dag gis dri mdzod
73b6(rgyud): dwadrugs ri bong can sogs bdug po me tog chang la sogs pas so//mig zla me dang rgya mtsho mda' dang ston chu gter ro dang lagro pA zla ba mda' dang mig/zla me rgya mtsho zla ba dus mnga'
73b7(rgyud): mogo dang chu gter mda' mig zla ba 'jig rten rnams//e la la sogs cha shas grangs rnams rim pas yongs su bkod pa re mig lnga lnga dag la ste//rdzas ni le tshe sbyar ba'i
74a1(rgyud): grong khyed la gnas dag pa'i chu shas nyin zhag ces byas drir 'gyur//d+hU tI la sogs e la 'khri shing ma ba ma ko lA shA yi grong du rim pas dgod bya ba//rgyu
74a2(rgyud): sgyogs sngar rdza 'o ma pu ro si ta dag ste badrug pa'i bya ba rnams la bdug pa bye//ga pur kI ri me tog ro dang ldan pa dag dang sen mo dag ni me yi cha shes kyis//de dge sbrang rtsi dang
74a3(rgyud): drol dri yi chu yis sbyar ba dag kyang spos kyi rang bu rab tu bya//lte ba dang pi sing ha mU tra ri bong can dang na mU khe'i'u grong du khrus sbyor la dgod bya//gran thi stag dang hi ri N+ya dang haH/
74a4(rgyud): gzhan yang de bzhin dung ltar shun pa dag gi cha//d+hu n+yA mud+d+hi brgya yis mtshan dang da ma~M me d+hu ri ni de bzhin dril phyis dge la yang //sngar brjod ma bzlog pA la chu skyes bzhin
74a5(rgyud): du lus dang gran thi par+N+Na dag kyang til mar la'o//phyi ma dag dang gran thi dri bzhin 'gyur te lus dang ha ta btung bo bsgo dang kha la yang //shun+da pa po la gran thi 'bras bu mdab ma
74a6(rgyud): sbyar ba'i sprin dang ba sogs la yang //de ltar rab dbye sum cu dag gis legs smras rnam mang dri dang spos la sogs pa'i sbyor ba bya//rdzas ni rnam par dreg cing 'bras bu sbyar ba
74a7(rgyud): smin dang bigs pa dag ni phug pa dag gis kyang //dang por brgyad cha mdab ma'i dbang gis ska bar 'gyur te de yi nyis 'gyur dag ni drag po'i spos//phyi nas rdzas kyi tshad skye
74b1(rgyud): ram dag kyang bsreg par bya ste so ka'i sbyor bu dag lngas 'phel//rkang pa'i cha shas dung gri badrug pa smang rtsi dkar po dag kyang rdzas dang mnyam pa nges par sreg/gong bu dung gi chu ma la/
74b2(rgyud): ya dang yong dang g.yo ba zlo ba ldan pa de bzhin//smin pa'i dri ni me tog bzang po rnams kyis nyon zhag 'ga' zhig ji srid 'dod par bsgo bar bya//phyi nas 'bugs pa brgya yi rgyu shu
74b3(rgyud): 'bras bu gsum dang zla ba ma de tshang dang bcas pas bya//shi gro'i chu dang tshA gra mu tra me tog bcud mnyam me togra les skyes mthar ni bskol bar bya//zla ba gcig ni so ba'i smin
74b4(rgyud): par 'gyur te ri dwags dang mAnyam chang dang lte ba 'bigs pa'o//gsang ba dri la sU ti ra sa sen mo g.yo ba spos kyi sbyor ba rnams la gsang ba ste//de bzhin bsil ba rab tu ru ki dang
74b5(rgyud): gu ru ri bong can yang bsgo ba'i bya bar me tog go/dbugs pa la ni ga pur lte ba 'bras bu gsum dang ma da'i chang ste yod dgra khrus sbyor la//gsang ba shun pa gran thi paR+Sha nag su
74b6(rgyud): rgyu ba dang bcas gran thi dril phyis dag la yang //chu skyes dag pa rdzas kyis dman+da zhing mngar ba dag dang rnam par bral ba dri yi chu yis btags//spos kyis smin po ska bu drag po sbrang //
74b7(rgyud): tso dang bcas lag skyes dag gis kham bu rim pas 'phel//kham bu gnyis ni ka ra bsregs pa dag ste ma la ya dang g.yo ba lcags dang ga pur yang //kham bu'i thog ma tha
75a1(rgyud): tha mar sbrang rtsi dag dang dkar po nges par sreg ste dang po spos las//nyin zhag 'ga' zhig me tog bzang po rnams kyis bsgo bu byas nas dri yi chu yis bsres pa drag/
75a2(rgyud): 'jim pa'i thod pa 'dzag pa min pa pra tshe la dang ni gos kyi sa bcings te brtan par kha bcad la//shin tu che ba'i snod dam yang na sa 'og du stau bye ma dag gis gang bar byas nas ni//
75a3(rgyud): zla ba drug spyod pas smin par 'gyur te chu la gnas pa de ni lte ba'i gtso bo'i dri//til rnams mdab ma bskol ba'i chu dag dang ni spos dang byugs pa la sogs rnams kyis dag byas nas//
75a4(rgyud): phyinas dz+haiM ta~M la sogs me tog rnamam+b+hi nyon zhaga' gA zhig ji srid 'dod par bsgo bar bya//rA khrul 'khor dag las til mar blangs nas me yi bdag po mkhas pas 'ching bu'i snod du
75a5(rgyud): bozhag par bya//khrus sam yin lag byug po dag lus myos byed me tog ti la mar nyid ni smin par min par 'gyur//sa 'dzin nyi ma zla ba ma nu mig dang 'dod pa nor dang drag po rgyal
75a6(rgyud): po me dag dang //phyogs dang 'byung ba phug pa drug dang tshes dang chu gter dag ni mtha' yi re mig la bzhag bya//grangs ni re mig bzhi yi chu yi gter dang rtse mo can te dpal ldan
75a7(rgyud): 'khor lo mtha' dog ni//tshad kyi rgyab tu bris nas rab tu bci' bar 'gyur ba'i dus su sbrum ma rnams la bskrun par bya//rnal 'byor ma rnams gang dag rab gsal sa gzhi dag
75b1(rgyud): la brgyad pa brgyad kyi ma mor rab tu grags//mngal zhes bya da byin zhag ces bya sum 'gyur dbu dang bcu ste bcu gcig gzhan ni lnga pa gsum//zla ba zhes dang lo zhes bya ste mthar/
75b2(rgyud): dgas yi steng du de dag byis pa rab tu 'dzin//mngal du zug rdo dang ni rab tu bca bo'i dus+yai pra d+h+r-i gnas la yang zug zang byed pa nyid//skyes pa rnams la byis pa'i rgyud du 'gyur te nyon nag
75b3(rgyud): rlubyung dang zla ba lo yi rab dbye las//ma rungs gzhon nu m+bu rnams rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis tshogs mtshams dag la yong dag gnas gyur pa//thams cad rang gi tshes la 'jigs gyur
75b4(rgyud): skyes pa 'dzin par byed rgyal po des par gtong mi byed//de dag zhi pa'i don du 'dir ni rnam mang dkyil 'khod khrus dang sbyin sre dag tu 'gyur//ru Ne u s+thi ka sai ru ste ta kar dang ut+pal
75b5(rgyud): 'dam skyes ge sar ni//bsil ba'i chu yis btogs shing rdo rje yis ni bsngags pa drag kyang mngal gyi zug rdul rab sbyin//mngal ni rengs na nu ku la dang gtsug phud can gyi spu brgyad
75b6(rgyud): btag sa nas rab tu sbyin par bya//Do ma mar dang thug pa zan ne zho dang blar me bcas pa nyan zhag ma rnams dag lce sbyin//sbyin pa'i zas lta thu dang hUM dang bur ma dang bcas po la~M ki dang mi
75b7(rgyud): dka dag dang //dri dong me tog mar me bkru ba dag kyang mdab ma rnams kyis mtshan mo lnga ni rab tu bya//ba langs dang lug gau rA dang ri dwags sen mo sgra dang sbrul gyi shun pa dag gi spos
76a1(rgyud): byis pa zla skyes rnams ni rgyus pa'i don du mtha' dag badzad pa rnams kyang gtor ma dag la'//gza' ba lnga dang bcas pa lnga dang tshul rgyub sha dang dri dang me tog mAr me/
76a2(rgyud): dang /na chang dang sngar brjod spos dang bkru ba dag dang de bzhin phyogs kyi gtor ma dag ni phyogs kyi char//byis pa lor ni skyes pa rnams dag rab tu gsal ba des la rgyas pa'i slad mi yi dpa
76a3(rgyud): mngal nas lo ni lji pa gsum du nges par rnal 'byor ma rnams rab tu mchod pa dag tu 'gyur//yan lag skyong zhing migo dag na ste kha dang lag pa rkang pa ser po nyid du yang dag 'gyur//
76a4(rgyud): gcin ni kha dog ser po drag dang tsha ba zhes pa dang ni smyig dang skam dang brgyal bar 'gyur//mtshan ma rnams ni shes par gyur nas de rnams kyi yang mi bdag rgyur ni dekyil 'khor sbyin
76a5(rgyud): bsreg bya//ma byin na ni gtod par mi 'gyur rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis 'byung ba la skyes ma mos kyang //gang gi yan lag thams cad dkar por 'gyur dang mi yi bdag po
76a6(rgyud): 'brum po shin tu phra mo dang //mgrin pa lus dang bcas pa 'khyog cing kha dang gseng po bshang lam dag las khrag ni zag gyur pa//de la mchod pa bya ba min te sngags pa
76a7(rgyud): rmongs pa rnams ni chung ngu nyid du rab tu 'gyur//de ni 'chi bar 'gyur te nges par lha dang mi dang lag 'gro rnams kyis srung bar nus pa min//klu dang gnod sbyin gang yang gza'//
76b1(rgyud): dang lha min rigs skyes srin po dag dang sha za rnams dang ni//sU kin+ya dang bdug pa'i l+h+wa ma mi khrag la dga' mkha' 'brum dudrung gzugs can ma dgu dang //grul bum dag da nong srung /
76b2(rgyud): rnams dang tshogs kyi bdag po yi dwags ra lings dge deng grub pa dang //brjid byed dang bcas mkha' 'gro'i dbang rnams dkyil 'a khang dag la mched pa byas nas mchog padi byed
76b3(rgyud): gyur//ma rungs pa rnams mchod pa'i don du dkyil 'khor du 'gyur mi yi bdog pa grong gi phyi rol du//shing gi gnas dang dur khrod dang ni lha mchog khong pa drag gam chu bo'i dus pa
76b4(rgyud): rnams su tA//khru gang dag gram gnyis dang bzhi ni dgu dang bcu gsum mi bdug lnga rnams drug gi rgyud kyiso//dbus su rtsibs brgyad 'khor lor 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis
76b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dag las phyed kyi cha shaso//sgo ni 'khor lo'i brgyad cher 'gyur te dris par de yi phyed kyis kha khyer dag dang do shwa lo//re ba dag ni kha khyed phyed de rta babs drag kyang sgo
76b6(rgyud): tshad las sum 'gyur drug tu 'gyur//zlum pa'i thab pa ni chu gsum pad+ma dkar po'i rang bzhin dkar bri'i tshon rnams dag gis bgrang ba ste//dpalo ldan chen lnga dag gis m+b+ha rnam
76b7(rgyud): kyis ni rang phyogs rigs kyi dbang gis rang gi mtshan ma bya//rdo rje dbus dang ral gri dbang por 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis lhor ni rin chen dmar po'o//g.yon du mdab ma ba
77a1(rgyud): dang bcas pa'i pad+ma dkar po dag dang nub tu 'khor lo'i mtshan ma dang //me ru ni gri bug nges par pad+ma'i mdab ma la gnas lha min zur du lcags kyu dag tu 'gyur/
77a2(rgyud): rlung du rdo rje zags par 'gyur te mi yi bdag po drag po'i mdab ma dag la rtse gsum//shar gyi sgor na rol gri nag po'i sprin dang mtshungs pa dag ste lhor ni rdo rje'i dri byug pa'o//chu/
77a3(rgyud): rarA dang lde muna? btson dag tu rab tu 'gyur te nges par byang du tho ba dag kyang //sems kyi rjes 'brang shes nas shin tu rnam pa mang po dus kyi 'khor lo dag ni ji srid par//mo ga shr-i//
77a4(rgyud): rnams kyi bu yi don dang gdon gyis bcom pa'i ming rnams zhe rgyas don du 'di dag mdzod//bum pa brgyad ni rin chen dang bcas adab ma pad+ma'i kha dang so ma btang ba'i kham phor ni///
77a5(rgyud): bdun gyis chu dang bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pas bkrus te slar yang cings kar sogs kyis nges par bya//dri dang bdug pa mar me rnams mang 'bras bu ro dang me tog dkar po dag dang gros
77a6(rgyud): rnams kyis//rnam par bkru ba'i mchod pa byas te slar yang de nas zhi ba'i bsreg bya dag ni sbyin bsreg bya//'o ma sngo ba til la sogs dang 'o ma'i rkang 'thung lnga rnams ngag gi yan/
77a7(rgyud): shing mda' brgya dang //mchod yon dag dang spyan drang zhal bsil dang ni de bzhin nyid du rjed dang mchod pa 'di dag ni//rab mchog sa yi steng du ma mo rnams kyis gzir ba rnam
77b1(rgyud): dag zhi ba'i don du bya ba skye//sum cu rtsa drug rnal 'byor ma rnams mi yi bdag po dus kun du ni mchod pa nyid du 'gyur//bdag med las kyi rnam smin sred pa gsum dang dus kyi 'gro ba
77b2(rgyud): yan lag bcu ga nyos rten 'brel las//yang dag byung dang reg byed byeden pa gnyis kyis bsgyur ba'i dgu ni ma 'dres sangs rgyas chos rnams te//phung po lnga dang sku gsum lhan skyes
77b3(rgyud): shes dang de bzhin nyid du blun pa ma yin stong pa nyid//'di dag gang du brjod pa de ni nges par rdo rje can gyi bstan pa dag tu rab tu 'gyur//gang du rig byed rang byung khe dang log pa rkang pa l-i sa//
77b4(rgyud): ngadag kyang skye bo'i skye gnas te//A shwa ma d+ha dag lngas gzhan pa mchog gri chos med ces pa de ni tshungs pa'i bstan par 'gyur//byed po bdag dang las dang dus dang rang bzhin dang ni ston
77b5(rgyud): stong pa nyid ni mnyam pa'i chos//byed po 'bras bu'i rgyu ste rab tu gsal zhing nges par bstan pa de 'dir khyab 'jug dag gi'o//lam drug rnams dang de nyid lnga drang mchog gI go 'phang ma
77b6(rgyud): lus pa yang gzhan ni sngags kyis lus//rig bdag dam pa'i zhi ba nyid dang rnam gsum gnas na gau nus pa dag gi sbyor drang gtong ba'i dngos//thig le'i dbye ba zhi pa nyid dang maH
77b7(rgyud): dag lus la gnas pa bcu gnyis mdud pa'i dbye ba ste//'di dag thams cad gang du rab tu gyur pa de ni nges par zhi bo ba yi bstan pa'o//dbang phyug med cing las kyi rnam smin dag/
78a1(rgyud): kyang yon tan yul rnams 'byung ba'i tshig ni langs spyod pa//de med pa na 'bras bu med pa gsalnga bar lha yi bla ma dag gis bskrun par rig par bya//byed pos rgyu/
78a2(rgyud): dang mi rgyu las skyes mtha' dag bskyed cing stag gzig rnams kyis thar po dag gi rgyu//de mnyes pa las nges par mi rnams mtho ris su 'gyur de ni ra hA NA ya~M bstan pa'o//dus
78a3(rgyud): gsum nyid dang rje spu ni drug skye tshig dgus bsgrubs dang srog ni drug gi lus la chu shes so//gzhan ni yod pa'i lus lnga brtul zhugs sdom pa 'gro dang ye shes spyod pa dag gi dbye
78a4(rgyud): ba rnams//srog ni lus kyi tshad de dpag tu med pa'i srid pa dag gis rtag pa'i srog gis thar pa'o//gang du thar pa'i ched ni steng du nges par brjod pa de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi bstan pa'i
78a5(rgyud): rig byed 'di ni rang byung min te srid pa gsum gyi gnas su rig byed sgra ni dron brjod byed//tshangs pa'i gdong bzhi dag gis sngon ni rig byed sgra dag gis kyang don ni rab tu gsal ba
78a6(rgyud): byas ci ste sgra dang don ni tha dad min na me sgra brjod pa dag gis kho ni cis mi sreg/de phyir nges par ston pa po yod rig pa'i yul dang ma 'ongs dron dang 'das pa dag la yang //rig
78a7(rgyud): byed na mkha' mtshungs min 'dir ni gnas kyi dbye ba dag las kha yis rab brjod byas pa'o//rigs pas gnyis skyes kha yis bklags pa nyi tshe ba ste kun tu 'gro ba gzhan rnams
78b1(rgyud): zlog pa'o//gang phyir dmangs la sogs pa'i rigs ni kun 'gro min pa'i rig byed 'di dag klog dang 'dri ba min//de phyir shes ldan mkhas par gyur pa'i mi rnams dag la rig byed dag
78b2(rgyud): tshad mar mi 'gyuraro//gal te thams cad byed po dbang phyug yod na de yang 'gro ba'i las longs spyod po gzhan ma yin//gal te dbang phyug las kyi byed po min na de yang kun nas tha~Md byed//
78b3(rgyud): por mi 'gyuraro//'di ni gal te byed po gzhan dag bsku ldan 'di ni byed po dag gi mchog tu gzhan dbang nyid//de phyir dge dang mi dge'i 'bras ster byed po dbang phyug mede srog chags
78b4(rgyud): las ni dor nas so//sa dang tshu me rlung gi rdul phran 'diri ni gal te mkha' la byed po'i dang por yod pa min//rdzas ngag med pa la ni yul dang rnam par bral ba'i thams cad byed po
78b5(rgyud): sna tshogs mi byed//yul dang rnam par bral ba byed po 'di yo ched ma mngon sumo dang ni lkog tu gyur pa med//yang dag sbyor ba nyid las thams cad du 'gyur mi yi bdag po 'dod pas ma
78b6(rgyud): yin las kyi gzugs//yang dag sbyor ba las ni chu shel las kyang chu ru 'gyur te me long dag las dngos po'i gzugs//sbyar ba'i rgyu las lce 'jig rang gi sgra las gcig sh+lo
78b7(rgyud): dag pa'i sa bon las ni myu gur 'gyur//khab len las kyang lcags kyi thur ma dag ni g.yo bar 'gyur te 'dod pas 'di la ci yang min//dngos po rnams kyi nus pa 'di ni srid pa
79a1(rgyud): gsum gyi gnas su zhig gis kyang sprul pa min//gal te bdag ni kun tu 'gron gnyen dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal ji ltar nyams myang bar 'gyur//gal te 'ang /
79a2(rgyud): nirtag par gyur na 'dod pa'i mda' yis bsnun pa'i gnas skabs nyid du cis rab 'gyur//gal te bya ba dang bcas gyur na ga nyid lag dus su 'di ni rmongs pa nyid ji ltar 'gro/
79a3(rgyud): ltar nges par bdag 'di kun 'gro khyab pa dag dang ni ston gyi bya ba dang ni bcas pa min//bdag med 'byung ba yod cing dge dang mi dge'i 'bras bu yod byed pa po yis rnam par dman/
79a4(rgyud): 'gro ba po med ma lus thar ba'i slod 'gro ba yod cing 'tshong ba yod bcings pa med//dngos po dngos med dag kyang yod skad cig rnam bral rang bzhin med pa dag gi srid pa yong//
79a5(rgyud): di dag bdag gi bden pa'i tshig ste lha dang gdangs can rnams kyi don bcas tshig gis 'joms mi 'gyur//gang zhig de nyid gang zag ces bya lus la gnas par smra ba de ni rang bzhi
79a6(rgyud): dag kyis nyams//kun hU~M b+ha dag gis don ni smra ba bo yang don dam ma rig med pa dag tu 'dod pa'o//srid gsum mtha' dag rnam par shes pa nyid du smra ba po yang rnam pa shes
79a7(rgyud): ba 'dod par byed//gang zhig snying rje stong nyid gnyi su med pa smra bo phyogs nyams de ni ma nyams par 'a'i 'gyur//skye bo sngon gyi las rnams nyim su myong 'gyur 'di la byas
79b1(rgyud): parnarnams ni skye ba gzhan la'o//gal te de lta yin na lus ni 'jigs par mi 'gyur mi rnams skyo ba gzhan dgags//dpag mong srid pa dag gis 'khor ba las ni 'byung bar 'gyur/
79b2(rgyud): dang thur par 'jug pa med pa nyid//'di dag stag gzig rnams kyang nges par 'dod par 'gyur te bzhan pa'i rigs kyis rab tu dmen pa'o//bral te 'byung ba gcig tu gyur pas
79b3(rgyud): chang gi nus pa bzhin du dbang bcas sem su rab 'gyur na//shing rnams dag la ci phyir mir 'gyur sA dang chu dang sreg za rlung dang na mkha' sbyor phyir ro//'di dag rnams la skye bo'i
79b4(rgyud): nus pa med na 'byung ba yang dag sbyor ba'i nus pa mchog tu brdzun//tshu rol mdzes po'i tshig 'di drag ni mi rnams ngag la bde ba'i 'bras bu ster min lam nyamaso//srog ni lus kyi
79b5(rgyud): tshing dag yin na gal te lag pa rkang pa bcad pas nyams par 'gyur ram tsA//rtag pa dag ni lus kyi mthu las phra mor 'gyur zhing sbom por yang ni rab tu 'gyur ram ci//'khor
79b6(rgyud): ba'i las las grol ba gang zhig 'jig rten steng na gnas pa bde ba dag gi gan su 'gro/'jig rten gsum yang phra rab dag gis gang zhig bkod pa de ni dus kyis rtag tu rtag pa
79b7(rgyud): min//zhes pa la sogs ye shes slad dus kyi 'khor los sa la bstan pa rab tu gsol mdzad pa//'jam dang sre dang gzhan pa'i bag chags stobs kyis skyes bu rnams kyi
80a1(rgyud): sems kyi rjesu 'brang ba ste//sems ni nges par dngos po'i tshon gyis nye bar bzhag pa dag las shel bzhin/tshon ldan nyid 'gyur ba//gang yin dpyir
80a2(rgyud): rang gzhan rigs su gyur pa'i chos ni 'ga' yang rnal 'byor pa yis sun mi dbyung //chos ni sems can phan pa yul dang rnam par bral ba dag ste chos min dag kyang gdon pa'o//
80a3(rgyud): 'tshe ba rig byed tshad ma n+dan ni bde ba'i 'bras bu'i steng dus kun du ni sdug bsngalnga ster//dam pa'i byams ldan rmongs pa'i tshig las mchog gi bde ba byed cing sems can dang
80a4(rgyud): la rje su cha gos//de phyir sems can don ni gtsug pu dag dang mi bdag yid kyis rang bzhin med po sgom par gyis//lha mi bla ma du ni mtho ris 'jig rten dag tu dbang po sa
80a5(rgyud): steng du ni 'khor los bskor//sna 'og dag tu klu ri rgyal po gdungs rnyan rigs kyis btung dang kun tu 'gro dang mchog nga ste//ye shes sangs rgyas thub dbang 'gyur med ma
80a6(rgyud): drang khyab bdag rnal 'byor rnams kyi rdo rje rnal 'byor dang //rig byed oM gyi yi ge gtsang ma dag ste rgyal po dngos po kun gyis bdag la skyabasu song /khyod ni ma dang khyod
80a7(rgyud): ni pa ste khyod ni 'gro bo'i bla ma khyod ni gnyen dang grogs bzang yang //khyod ni mgon po khyod ni byed po phan dang sdig 'phrog khyod ni go 'phang phun sum tshogs pa yang //khyed//
80b1(rgyud): ni 'ba' zhig gnas dang khyod ni son tan mchog gi gnas te skyon rnams bcom po khyod nyid//khyod ni dman pa rnams kyi mgon dang yid bzhin nor bu rgyal ba'i dbang po khyod la bdag
80b2(rgyud): skyabs mchi//dpal ldan dang po'i sangs rgyas las phyung ba dpal dus kyi 'khor lo chen po las nang nges pa zhes bya ba'i le'u gnyis pa'o////lus la sna tshogs tshang dang /
80b3(rgyud): nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus dang zla ba 'pho ba'i dbye ba rnams dring ni//rtswa rnams kyi ni phra mo'i grangs dang rang bzhin dag lo skyes bu mu stegs rnams kyi 'dod pa dang //rig byed dang ni byed po la
80b4(rgyud): sogs dbye ba bdag gis thos pas dkyil 'khor dag ni bstan du gsol//zla ba bzang po'i tshig dag gsan nas bo bar gshegs pas dus kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor rab tu gsung
80b5(rgyud): dang por yang dag bstan bya bla ma dag kyang dam tshig ldan zhing rdo rje theg par lhag par gnas//de nyid bsgoms shing ma chags dri ma dgu dang rnam par bral zhing bzod pa'i ngang tshul lom lo
80b6(rgyud): zhugs//slob ma rnams la lam ni sbyin byed dmyal ba'i 'jigs pa 'phrog cing de nyid las ni tshangs spyod ldan//bdud rnams la ni rdo rje dbyug pa de yang 'dzin ma'i gzhi la rdo rje sems
80b7(rgyud): dper rab grags pa'i//nga rgyal dang ldan khro bos zil mnan dam tshig rnams bral rdzas la brkam zhing thos pa dag kyang med//slob ma rnams ni slu ba don du gnyer zhing mchog gi bde
81a1(rgyud): pa'i gnas las sems nyams dbang ma bskur//longs spyod dag la kun chags bag med rtsub mo'i tshig dang bcas shing dbang po'i don du 'dod ldan pa//de nyid dmyal ba//
81a2(rgyud): bzhin du slob ma mkhas pa rnams kyis rdzogs pa'i byang chub rgyur ni spang bar bya//zab cing rgya che la sems bla ma'i nges pa la dga' gtong ba'i ngang tshul dang ldan ston shes//thar pa
81a3(rgyud): don gnyer rgyud la gus shing g.yo ba min pa'i sems ldan de nyid thob pa shin tu sbeng //gdug pa rnams kyi grogs nyams slob ma de nyid bla ma shin tu mkhas pa rnams kyis bsdu bya
81a4(rgyud): bAdA/shes rab dbang la sogs pa'i rgyur te gzhan zhes bya ba slar yang 'dring po bsod nams dag gi rgyur//nag pa'i mthar ni dkar po'i tshigs la gzhan la phan pa'i bla mas
81a5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dag ni bzhengs byas nas//sdig pa'i dri mi 'phrog pa'i dbang bdun rnams ni bsod nams don du bu rnams dag la sbyin par bya//yang na mtha' dag ston gter ni
81a6(rgyud): bstan pa'i sladu rnal 'byor ma rnams dag la michod par bya//mchod pa med na lo gcig du ni rgyud kyi rgyal po dag las bla mas bstan par mi bya'o//dbang gi don du sa ni yongs brta/
81a7(rgyud): nags dang grong khyer grong rdal grang gi phyogs kyi cha dag dang //thab khung rnams kyi mchin nyid dang ni bum pa dang bcas rdul tshon sbyin sreg pur bu la sogs dang //slob ma rnams
81b1(rgyud): ni baspu bdug dang gang yang rgyal ba'i bdag po mchog gi dkyil 'khor bri ba dag/shes nas slob dpon gyis ni dge dang mi da'i 'bras slad zhi ba la sogs mtha' dag rab tu bya//sa ma
81b2(rgyud): rigs ni stan dbang gis rnam bzhir 'gyur ba dmangs rigs rjeru rgyal po bram ze ste//gnag dang ser dang dmar ba dang ni ri bong 'dzin pa dkar ba'i kha dog rnams kyis rig par bya//rul
81b3(rgyud): pa chu skyes pad+ma'i dri dang mchog gi dri rnams rim pas nor gyi blo gros dag tu 'gyur//skyur dang lan tshwa dmangs rigs mdur dang tsha bA rje dang mi bdag gzhan pa dag ni gnyis skyeso//dkar po
81b4(rgyud): dag ni zhi dang rgyas pa la skye sprin nag dang mtshungs bsad dang bskyed pa dag la yang //dmar po dbang dang dgug pa la ste mchog gi gser dang mtshungs pa rings dang rmongs pa la yang
81b5(rgyud): 'gyur//las kyi cha ni thams cad dag la ljang kur gyur te lnga pa dang ni mtha' ma dag gi rigs//ro dang dri rnams thams cad dang ldan mtha' dag ston gter ni rnal 'byor pa yis rig
81b6(rgyud): par bya//dbang ldan dang ni byang gi sa gzhi dag la zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dag tu 'gyur ba ste//me yi mtshams dang shwar gyi char ni rab tu gsal zhing nges par bsad pa dag dang bskrad pa'o//
81b7(rgyud): bden drol dang ni lho phyogasu yang gsal bar rtag tu dbang du bya dang dgug pa dag kyang //rlung gi mtshams dang nub kyi phyogasu nges par mchog gi mi bdag rengs pa dang ni rmongs pa'o//
82a1(rgyud): thab khung phreng gi phyogs brgyad dag tu sa par rab tu 'gyur te zlum pa dang na /rA d+hA //rgyu kham tha rdza bya dang rlung ban nA bang gis rlung bdun pa dang /
82a2(rgyud): zung ni gsum pa dang //byung drug pa dang zur brgyad par 'gyur rigs kyi dbang gis de dag rnams kyi snying ngo'i mtshan ma ni//pad+ma 'khor lo gri gug ral gri mda' zhes bya dang rdo rje lhag
82a3(rgyud): kyi lcags sgrog dag dang sbrul//gcig gnyis byed dang gcig ni khru ste mkha' dus mkha' mig mkha' me mkha' dus dag ni sor du 'gyur//phyed kyi yan lag drug gi cha shas
82a4(rgyud): nyi ma nyi ma'i cha shas ngag gos zabs dang kha khyer dang //mchu dang mtshon ma'i phreng bar 'gyur te kha khyer dag gi steng du rigs kyi dbang gis kun nas so//kha khyed phyi rol du yang
82a5(rgyud): chu skyes mdab ma rnams mdzod mi bdag zhi rgyas la ste gzhan la mi ni//yang na las ni thams cad lnga yang rdo rjer 'gyur te sa la phur pa dag gi dbye ba brgyad//n+ya gro d+ha dang a
82a6(rgyud): shwed thaM ka rus lcags seng ldeng las skyes ts+tshi ta bi la ba arga skyes//de bzhin shel gyi bum pa dang ni dngul mchog rang bzhin dang lnga ldan thod pa dog dang lcags kyi dang //zangs
82a7(rgyud): zhes bya dang gser gyi bum pa rab gsal nges par shing las skyes dang sa yi rang bzhin no//zlum po brgyad gnyis sor du brjid gnyis kyis bsgyur ba'i bo nu yis dpangs dang sor
82b1(rgyud): gnyis dag ga mchu//drug gi mgrin pa sor brgyad khwa ste bong 'dzin pa ltar dag/ni rgyas dag la'i gzhan la min//snga dz+nyAnas na thun bajud po rnams nyin nags sa dus su ni dar+b+ha/
82b2(rgyud): byasogs la 'gyu/ nAd ma thun byed dag la nyin du na de'i la sa brgyad dun ni badz+ra/nyi mthong ba mchen byed dag ni nyini dang mtshan me 'dus su ni bdag la
82b3(rgyud): N+Te ba smyeng+gA rnaM sa nas pa da da na tu du / ky-i zhing meng bad+d+hA ni de sa pa da sa da/
82b4(rgyud): pa lo na ma sa/dbye ba la ni phyug mjug ma sang da sas skyes kyi sh+'u ni da'i na brgya byed dgi khyu byung mda' ba'i grwa sa rnams ras pa na
82b5(rgyud): dgu sa s+ho//'am mong dang khrag nag dang rdul da su ma la ma nyid rjerjes sreg bya ste//rdud pa 'du shi nga ga dong baHsa pa dag sbyi me to ga mau ba
82b6(rgyud): skye ba d+d+ha 'i byung ba dang ni gas me tog d+hAs ba la stsogs rnams la/nI ni snrel zung dang rje bcus nA ga ni ni shu po dang phyi dag du /
82b7(rgyud): //rmab dan dag gi na du gyu mo yi dag pa ni pa'i sogs las rnams dgal // na lami ga sa dgu la'i gyur te ci bar pang+gA mi ying / nig nyi mas
83a1(rgyud): phyi rol du ni sangs rgyas dbye bas lha dang gshin rje chu dang byang rnams dag tu tshon gyis//thab khung dag gam dkyil 'khor la ni rigs kyi dbang gis phyogs rnams yang /
83a2(rgyud): tshen ni gdab par 'gyur//dgod po la sogs bsang gtor lnga sog sngo rang gi snying kha'i rdo rje dag las lha rnams spro ba'o//shel la sogs pa'i mchod yon snod la pad+ma nor gyi
83a3(rgyud): mdab ma mthe bong dag ni bcu gnyis kyang //yu ba'i rtse mor snyim pa'i snod khyor ba dag kyang sreg bya dag la'o//zhi dang drag po chags dang bcas par 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang
83a4(rgyud): gis lha ni rengs pa dag gi sku//de bzhin las gnyis dag la rab tu gas lo zhing nges par dkyil 'khor la yang lhag pa'i lhar 'gyur ro//rnam pa lnga ni rgyal ba'i dbang po gang
83a5(rgyud): phyir rnam gsum srid pa la gnas phung po khams sogs kyi//dbye ba yi te de las kyang ni lha rnams dkyil 'khor dag la rdul tshon rnam pa lnga ru 'gyur//thig skud khru ni brgyad
83a6(rgyud): por 'gyur te sum sbrel slob dpon gyi ni lag pa'i mthe bo'i nas gtsog gis//sbom su 'gyur ba rnam pa gsum gyi lam na gnas pa thig skud gcig ste gzhan pa mu yin//
83a7(rgyud): zhi baM la sogs dag la ram pa yongasu bkod pa skyel krung rdo rje lha min tsog pu dang //skyil krung byed pa dbye ba gnyis dang bshang lam rkang par gnas pa dag kyang las kye dbye bla
83b1(rgyud): gdan//shel dang mu tig dang ni mi drang bong bu'i so 'am rus pa dag dang po de tsa dang ni//pad+ma zhes bya dbang mig lung tang bde gshegs rigs kyi dbang gis sngags bzlas pa la phreng bar
83b2(rgyud): 'gyur//dri zhim me tog dkar po dang ni tsha ba dang bcas nag po dag dang dmar dang ser pos mchod//bsil dang bshang ba sha yi spos ni sbrang rtsi khrag ldan dag dang drag po'i spos dang
83b3(rgyud): ba'o//'khrul 'khor n+ya gro d+ha mdab dur khrod ro yaM ris dang gro ga'i bdab dang arka'i mdab ma la//shi rI khaN+Da sA li btags pa dag dung dur khrod sar gnas sol ba khrag dang dug dang
83b4(rgyud): ni/kha che tsan dan dmor dang 'bras bu gsum gyi khu ba yung ba bab blas bri bar 'gyur ba ste//dur ba bsil rus mjug sgro gser dang seng ldeng las skyes bil ba skyes dang ar+k+ka skyug
83b5(rgyud): gu'o//kham phor dpal ldan thod par mngar gsum khrag dang spra chel gong bu so phrag dag gi dbus su ni//brlan dang bcas pa'i gnas ni gtsang ba dog dang ro khang sa gzhi me yis
83b6(rgyud): gdung dang sa dag la//'khrul 'khor bzhag par bya bar 'gyur te dge dang mi dge'i dbang gis sngags pa yis no rig par bya//zla ba glang chen yi dwags rnga mo ri dwags rta dang phyugs
83b7(rgyud): dang ru sbal lus la rim paso//dpal ldan rdo rje rnams kyis phyogs kun tu gnas mtha' dge bdud kyi tshogs ni nges par bsreg bye ste//phyi nas 'khor lo rtsibs bcu dag la bya
84a1(rgyud): dang phyogs bral du gnas khro bo'i tshogs ni bsgom par bya//'khor lo'i dbus su gnyis lhag rgyal pa'i phyag dang dus kyi zhal ldan khro bo'i dbang po rdo rje shugs//
84a2(rgyud): de nas bla ma'i nges po dang ldan gang zhig cung zad 'dod pa sgrub pa po yis bsgrub par bya//rdo rje gsum gyis sa yi dkyil 'khor la gnas rab gsum ni ring du mthong ba'i mtha'
84a3(rgyud): ru ste/tho rangs nas ni grib ma'i mtha' ru sa gzhi'i gnas las na mkha'i ngag la rdo rje brtsegs pa'o//dbus su chu skyes nyi ma'i khru ste lte ba gdan dang bcas pa dag kyang dus kyi
84a4(rgyud): khrur 'gyur ro//de yi stang du bdag nyid nyes pa dag dang rnam par bral ba rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya//swa yi phyogs rnamasu 'dir dang po rdo rje gsum gyis zhing skyong rnams la
84a5(rgyud): gtor ma sbyin bya ste//phyi nas rdo rje bzhi yis phyogs dang phyogs brel du gnasde bdud kyi tshogs ni nges par bsreg por bya//sa yi lha mo spyan drangs chu dang bcas po'i me tog dag
84a6(rgyud): gis 'di la mched yon rab tu sbyin//de la gsol ba bautab ste phyi nas sa yi gnas la dag pa dag ni ji ltar 'dod pa mdzod//rgyal bso lha yi bdag po dang bcas bdud ni
84a7(rgyud): bcom pa dag la lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur//de phyir khyad ni mchod par bya zhing lha mchog gsi btud bzhes nig bzhes shig bdag gi mchod yono//ji ltar rgyal bas byang
84b1(rgyud): chub slad du bdud rtsi sde ni stobs ldan dag kyang rab tu bcom gyur pa//de bzhin bdag gis kyang ni slob ma rnams la dbang bskur slad du bdud rnams nyams pa dag tu bya//gang dag phyogs
84b2(rgyud): rnams kun na sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' nyes pa rnam bral btsun mo dang bcas pa//de dag rnams kyi mchog gi snying rjes dkyil 'khor du ni dbang bskur sla du bdag la bskyang du
84b3(rgyud): gsol//de dag kun la gsol ba btang nas seng ldeng rang bzhin sra ba'i phur bu dag gis sa la gdab//phyogs kyi khro bo mtshon cha ldan pa rnams ni phyogs kyi tshe ru bsrung ba'i don du
84b4(rgyud): dgod par bya//zug rngu sol ba dang bcas rA ni 'chi ba'i 'jigs byed sa yi snying por nges par zhugs gyur na//gnas de dag tu ljon dbang gis rnam par nyams par 'gyur te de yis
84b5(rgyud): phyir na sbyang bar bya//sa la rin chen dung dang mching bu dag ni rnam rgyal bde byed dkyil 'khor dag gi don du ste//khang bzang don dang khyim gyi don dang rab gsal nges par 'dir ni
84b6(rgyud): mchod skyon la sogs slad duro//rdzogs pa dag la sa ni sbyang dang gzung po dag kyang de bzhin bu rnams dag ni yang dag bsdu//bcu gnyis pa la thig gdab 'dod pa ma nu'i nyin
84b7(rgyud): zhag dag la dpal ldan rdul tshon dgye ba nyid//dbang la sogs pa nyal mchog gi bla mas sbyin te bdud ni bcom pa'i nyin zhag dag la yang //de yi mtshan mo rgyal ba'i rigs
85a1(rgyud): la rab tu gnas par 'gyur te mtshan mo gzhan la rab gnas min//dug pa'i dus skyor gza' la stsogs pas mi yi bdag po mchen mo gzhan la rab tu gnas par 'gyur
85a2(rgyud): srog drang pa sangs nub par gyur na de tshangs par bag ma rab tu gnas par mi 'gyur//slob dpon dag gis sa gzhi'i gnas su 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa dag kyang mtha' dag shes
85a3(rgyud): nas ni//bya ba gang gang byed pa de de mtha' dag de ltar 'bras bu dag ni rab tu sbyin par 'gyur//slob ma'i mgo bo snying kha de bzhin gtsug tor lci ba mgrin pa dpal ldan gsang ba'i
85a4(rgyud): pad+mad ni//rgyal ba la sogs gnyi ga'i rigs su gyur pa sku gsung thugs kyis phye ba dag gis srung byas shing //de bzhin sku gzugs sogs dang glegs bam rnams ni rab
85a5(rgyud): gsil nges pa'i dpal ldan dbyangs rnams dag gis te//sems can rnams ni thor pa'i sladadu che ge bdag kyang gtso bo'i dkyil 'khor dag ni bzhengs par bgyid//dag pa'i gan
85a6(rgyud): ni legs par gang zhing shin du mnyam par bkod pa ru sbal rgya bzhin mthi ba dag/khru tshad gcig la sogs pa dus dang nor dang mi bdag dri bzhin stong phrag dag gi tshad la nI/
85a7(rgyud): thog skud rdo rje rdul tshon lha dang ga shin rje chu bdag du ste byang du rdo rje dril bu dag/bkod nas mtshan ma rnyed na dang pa dang ni phye ma'i phyogasu dkyil 'khor jig ni gdab par bya//ji
85b1(rgyud): sgyu chud par gyur na bla ma nyams shing yongs 'dzums 'gongs par gyur na bu rnams dag kyang //gal te rdul tshon rlung gis khyer na 'jigs pa gsal byed yul 'khor dag tu rgyal po
85b2(rgyud): 'jogs pa yang //mtshan ma ngan pa de dag mthong nas slar yang gtso bo dag gi sngags kyis bzlas pa rab tu bya//slong yang ma chen ma rnyed na mnyam dang mi mnyam rkang pa dag gis theg ni
85b3(rgyud): gdab pa bsgrub par bya//shes rab thabs kyi yan lag dbus su yongs 'jom su 'gyur de ni dkyil 'khor dog la spang bar bya//sa la g.yul gyi dus su rtse mo can dang rlung du gnas pa'i sde
85b4(rgyud): yi dbus su gdengs can bzhin//g.yul du sde ni nyams par 'gyur te sa gzhi drag tu maurnon mo'i thub mo la ni bsnun pa'o//de phyir g.yul dang dbang dag la yang yongs 'joms shin tu skyeg
85b5(rgyud): dang ldan par sngags pas rig par bya//a sogs ka sogs rdo rje ldan pa dag gis rang gi snying kha'i pad+mar zla nyi mo steng du//dang ldan dus kyi 'khor lo ri bong can 'dzin 'dod pa mnan pa'i
85b6(rgyud): g+ha yis btung zhabs ni bsgoms byos shing //shes rab gtso bo'i thugs ka'i pad+ma nyi zla sbyar ldan la ste ring rang rdo rje lcags kyu yis//sangs rgyas lha mo rnams bkug rdul tshon dag la
85b7(rgyud): ro mnyam bkod cing thig skud la yang bsgom par bya//thig ni ro dang dgu bcu 'di dag tshangs pa'i thig las phyogs kyi cha rnams dag tu rab sbyin bya//sor phyed brjod pa nor dang dus kyi
86a1(rgyud): thig rnams dgags dbus su skyeng po'i dkyil 'khor dag tu 'gyur//snying po las ni phyi rol mtha' dag rnams kyisku bkod pa dag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po sgo ma
86a2(rgyud): rabarta babs la sngogs rtse mo can de g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor phyi rol sa la blta bar bya//gtso bo'i 'khor lo chu skyes lha la sogs pa'i gdan las rdu ma 'byung dag kyang tshangs pa'i gnas/
86a3(rgyud): su ni//nyi ma'i re mig drag gis 'gyur te slar yung ri bong can gyi ka ba rdo rje'i phreng por 'gyur//bzhi yis sangs rgyas la sogs pad+mar rab 'gyur dbang can gyi byero la rdo rje phreng bar yang //
86a4(rgyud): lha mo sangs rgyas dag gi bang du bum pa 'am ni thod pa'i gdan du myig gsum gyis 'gyur//gnas de nas 'dir ji srid re khrod bung du nyin mor byed pa dag gis rje chen gyi sar
86a5(rgyud): 'gyur te//phyogs zur rnams su chu gter re mig dag gis dril sogs pa rnams kyi zla nyi pad+ma nyid//byed dang bcas pa'i gcig gis raM khA gsuMm skye dus dang ro rnams kyis kyang
86a6(rgyud): sgo dang sgo khyud dang //de bzhin lho dang 'gram pa dag ste gsum gyis kyang ni khi khyer chen po dag dang ka ba byed//de nas phyed dang gnyis dang dus kyi nor bu'i rang bzhin snam bu dang ni ngo
86a7(rgyud): shel sa ru 'gyur//sgo yi rtsa ba'i dang po nas ni gsum gyis bsgyur ba'i bcu mos rta babs ka bar bcos par 'byung //thig phyed steng du do shal phyed pa dag gi mthar ni ba rmi
86b1(rgyud): ling yang rang tu 'gyur//ri mig drug gi r+N+Na babs 'og tu nod kyi pad+ma dang ldan rnal 'byor ma rnams rnam bu'o//de nas rlo ros bsgyur ba'i dus kyis dpal ldan tshon gyis ste re khyA lparmA/
86b2(rgyud): bar du'o//phyogs zur rnamasu nyi ma rI pad+mo nyis 'gyur ma nu'i 'dab ljin nyi ma'i rI migo dag gis bya//snying po'i sgo ni nyis 'gyur rnam pa gsum gyi ston dbang gis 'dir ni phyi rol sgo
86b3(rgyud): dag kyang //ra ba sogs dang de bzhin nyid du dkyil 'khor gsum bkong rnams ni brgyad pa gsum gyes rab tu bya//de dag rnams kyi thog mtha' cha la nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor dang ni phyi rol
86b4(rgyud): rdo rje'i phreng ba yang //de phyed re mig dag gis bya ste 'khor lo gang yan dkyil 'khor mtha' yang rlung gi dkyil 'khor la//ka ba'i 'og tu gdengs can rnams kyi dkyil 'khor du yang rab
86b5(rgyud): tu 'gyur te lha rnams shing rta ni//nyi ma dag gis sgo yi dbus drad maN+Da' drang sa gzhi dag lA shur gyi cha drang nub la yang //rdo rje la sogs rin chen lce dang gser dang ma ra ka taM byi ru mu
86b6(rgyud): tog la sogs dang //dbye ba lnga yi 'bru 'am rnam mang nor bu dang ni de bzhin nyid du btags pa'i tshon dag gis//phyogs kyi cha le tshon gyis sar ni mi yi bdag po sangs rgyas dbye bas
86b7(rgyud): rdul tshon gdab par 'gyuraro//ser dang dkir dang dmar ba sogs kyis sa chu'i dkyil 'khor dang ni me rlung dag la rims paso//shar du dpal ldan nag po'i sa ru 'gyur zhing lho ru
87a1(rgyud): mu mtshungs pa drug ste nub tu yang //gAser mdog byang du gzhan te ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar rdo rje can gyi zhal gyi dbye ba so//dkar dang dmar dang nag po rim par yongasu bkad
87a2(rgyud): pa'i rnam bu dang ne do shal dag gis so//pad+ma zla nyi'i kha dog gos te dro med rI bong can mtshungs dmar dang sgeg pa'i ri mo gsum//dbus su pad+ma 'dab brgyad ljang ku dag ste bung ba//
87a3(rgyud): dang mtshungs ka ba rdo rje phreng bar 'gyur//dbang ljin lha min me rlung dag tu zla ba nyi ma'i lus dang nag po ser po rim pa yi//dung dang gaN+DI nor bu dag dang ljon pa zhes bye de bzhin bum pa
87a4(rgyud): dkar po mtshams brgyad du//zla ba chu skyes dmar po'i steng du rab tu 'gyur te nyin byed pad+ma dkar po'i steng du yang //chu skyes dmar pa'i lte ba la nI lha mo rnams kyi ri bong 'dzin pa
87a5(rgyud): dag gis gdan du 'gyur//chu skyes dkor po'i lte ba dag la lha rnams kyi yang nyin mor byed par 'gyur te phyogs su'o//phyi rol du ni gtso bo'i pad+ma'i dbang gis rdo rje phreng bar 'gyur
87a6(rgyud): te kha khyer kha dog dkar//ka ba sdor po byA ku lI ni kha bi'i mdog tu rab 'gyur rta babs kha dog sna tshogs so//dkar po'i mdog ste rnal 'byor ma rnams dag gi nor gyi pad+ma'i snam bu
87a7(rgyud): dag kyang phyogs kun tu//phyogs kyi char ni pad+ma dmar por 'gyur te rgyal ba'i dbang gis pad+ma dkar po zur du yang //zla ba nyi mas rnam dpon de bzhin nyid du 'chi med rnams kyi nyis
87b1(rgyud): 'gyur ma nu'i mdab ldan//mkha' sogs re khA lnga po gang yin de dag rang bzhin ston dbang gis sum cha bar du gnas//ka ba'i 'og gi sgo'i mtsham su gdangs can rnams kyi rlung srog
87b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor drag tu rab tu 'gyur//dbang ldan dang ni lha min zur dus yi dkyil 'khor la gnas zla nyi dag go mi yi dbang //phyi rol sgo yi steng gi char nI r-i dwags dang bcas chos kyi
87b3(rgyud): 'khor lo sprin gyi mdog tu 'gyur//g.yas su bum pa dmar por 'gyur te nor sbyin drang bcas chur nr-i rje bo che dang byang chub shing //dril bu me long ba dan ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar rta badra
87b4(rgyud): dag las 'phyang ba gyur pa dang //do shAl phyed pa kha dog dkar por 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis shing rta sgo yi dbus su'o//'khor lo dkar dang dmar po rang gi rgyal ba'i rigs kyi
87b5(rgyud): dbang gis rlung la sgo yi phyi rol du//rdo rje 'bor ba 'phro ba dag gis mi yi bdag po phyi rol rdo rje phreng ba dag tu'ang 'gyur//sbom pas nad dag byed cing phra dang re khro ngan pas rdzas ni
87b6(rgyud): nyams pa rab tu gsal bar byed//chad pas 'chi ba dang ni 'khyig pos mi yi bdag po dang bcas grong rdal de bzhin nyi du spyong//mtshan ma nyi ma zla ba chad na sngags pa rnams
87b7(rgyud): la srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa'i dngos grub med//rnam par 'dres pas rigs rgyud 'cha de rgyal ba'i rigs kyis rdul tshon dkyil 'khor dag la rig par bya//gang zhig rgyud
88a1(rgyud): kyi nang du rgyal bas gsal bar ma gsungs mtshan mde ni mdzes pa'i don gyi rgyur//dkyil 'khor dag la dgod par mi bya de nyid bdud kyi mtshan ma'o rgyal ba bskye
88a2(rgyud): mdzad rigs la ni//de phyir rgyud las gsungs pa'i mtshan mar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis sgo yi mtshams nas dkyil 'khor la'o//do shal phyed pa'i mthar ni sa yi dkyil
88a3(rgyud): 'khor gzhi la pad+ma bum sogs mdzes pa rab tu bya//nag po la sogs rkang pa 'phel bar 'gyur ba dag ni rdul tshon dpyangs te nas gcig dag nas kyang //rab rnams ni sum 'gyur
88a4(rgyud): nyin mor byed pa ri bong can dang chu skyes re khA nyis 'gyuraro//snying po dag las phyi rol dpangs ni nyis 'gyur du 'gyur me yi bdag po dkyil 'khor 'di la ste//do shal phyed pa'i mthar
88a5(rgyud): ni nas gcig sa chu sreg za rlung dang rdo rje phreng ba rnams la'o//dbus nas sgo yi dang po'i mtshams ni nor gyi blo gros mar gyur 'jig rten khams kyi dkyil 'khor la//sgo nas tsa rtsi ka/
88a6(rgyud): mthar sum 'gyur gdengs can ri mig dag gis lan tshwa'i rin chen gan su 'gyur//de nas rgyal ba'i dbang po'i re mig gis kyang me yi dkyil 'khor de nas de bzhin rlung du 'gyur//
88a7(rgyud): yi phyi rol du ni de dag rnam par dag pas se chu breg za rlung rnams blta bar bya//gtsug tor zhal dang mgrin pa sum 'gyur gdangs can re mig dag gis dkyil 'khor la ni sbyang bar bya/
88b1(rgyud): de nas lhun po mtha' dag sum 'gyur gdengs can re mig dag gis sa ni ji srid nyid ste//re mig drug drug dag gis rim pas gsal byar klu yi srid pa dang ni sa 'og bdun po nyid//de ltar
88b2(rgyud): sa la sogs pa thams cad slar yang de bzhin rang gri lus dag la ni sbyang bar bya//gnyis dang chu ge tAr gcig dang chu gter gcig nyi dus ro rtse mo can gnyis dus bye dus phye dang /dus dang dus ni rab
88b3(rgyud): phye drag dang dus dang ro dag kyang ste skyon gyi cha rnams rim pa yis//snying por lte ba rtsibs sam pad+ma'i mdab ma dag dang de nas ka ba rdo rje'i phreng ba dang //pad+ma rdo rje'i phreng bar 'gyur te sa dag
88b4(rgyud): dang ni de nas sgo dang sgo khyud la sogs dang //ka ba ra ba kha khyer dag dang slar yang de nas snam bu dang ni do shal sa dag dang //ma long sa ya snam bur 'gyur ro mi yi bdag po rta babs
88b5(rgyud): rab tu gsungs pa'i cha rnams kyis//phyi rol du ni sgo sogs thams cad nyis 'gyur du 'gyur phyi rol du yang de yi nyis 'gyur ro//phyi rol du ni pad+ma 'khor lo rnams dang shing rta'i
88b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor rnams ni nyin byed dag giso//oM yig ye shes las skyes rgyal ba mchog ga pad+ma zla ba nyi ma dag gi gang ni steng du//a sogs ka sogs stong par bcas pa dag dang
88b7(rgyud): srid gsum bskyed par byed po'i yum ni bzhag par bya//stong pa oM yig rnam par bcad pa dbyings dang bral ba mchog las sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje na//yang dag 'byung ba sngags
89a1(rgyud): TIg mtshan na sa spyon /la smra slong sa / spyo//skyongs
89a2(rgyud): po bus stong pa phyogs thas 'dab mo 'i yang rgyas /skyeng brna pa ///dbang rji 'dren rnaM mun du du su dang gi suMng dang rdzogs rje tshigs pa/
89a3(rgyud): la sos m+bu pa rnams kyi n+de hA da/klu da// ste du sa mi mi sbyin rje rdul gyi nas A hU~M klu rgyu ba nyid
89a4(rgyud): ge shin rje lta min du ni l+le dag sbyin de sbyin 'phrog byud du gnas theng su yig dang//chu dang rlung gr-I dz+haiM d+ha da kA du ya pad+ma laM gnas rje ring po dag gi lI yig+sa ste//nigapa
89a5(rgyud): dmar po dag rlung dkar po gser mtshig dngo mtshungs zhal gyi dbye ba dag gis dgad par bya//shing b+h+yo ske ye lha dang me yo pad+ma la gAnas thung dang ring bdag ni de bzhin nyid//dra
89a6(rgyud): bzhin a yig zung ni ga shin d+d+ham+b+ha min+d+ra dag N+DI gnas te nAbAt+tu a lA yig zung dag go/a oM ga da sbyin drug bai ru ste m+b+ha tshig shin rje gni sbyin dang banas sgyu su byed du ni/
89a7(rgyud): oM AH sogs pa? mos ni skyer ma ser wa la lci sogs sgra ye n+do//shAr du 'dzid pa deg kyang khri ba ni ga gadren du 'jung gaste//
89b1(rgyud): no tu rgyu mang dun ba tu pa dag gi gdun ngas par rabatu 'gyu//shes rab thabs kyi ba du bye ba dag gis pad+mad na pa ma du/nga gA na du 'gyur//snrums dang rgyu
89b2(rgyud): yi bdag pa nod sbyin du yang zla de'i gdan du 'gyur//thig pa'i rnam pa dag gis rnam phyi ngos par bad+ma la gnas kyi sogs rje yi yi ge yang //rtsa ba snod bu dab ma dngon
89b3(rgyud): gsong lci ba dag la dam ngas su suM bkade ba ste//seM sogs rnam pa'i mtha' nI ka khA ga b+hU nga zhes byung nga rnying po ring gis la'o//thipA le zla ba rnam par bcad pa nyin byeng 'gyur grang na/
89b4(rgyud): yang lce ba drug gi skyed //sde d+hIH m+b+hi rnams nga zhin ma nu bang gi kha khyu dkri laklu pa'i dasngoni//dri la sogs rnams rim pas ring rigs sa lA gnas te shang
89b5(rgyud): nas ringag phyogs rnams suphyirol dzini thig lI la stsogs kyis phyi sum 'byu nyims kha khyur dag lji na rnyed//'dod ma thams cad kun nas rang rigs phyogasu gnas
89b6(rgyud): rgyal bya rnams kyi kha dog dbyi bsas//thung da ring 'i ha phyag dag ni lha dang nir sbyin nupa dang na cika sogs kyi//khyab 'jug ma sogs dag gi kA yIg oM sogs kyis
89b7(rgyud): mi dang 'phrog byed rlung dang lha mon du//hi la sogs dang kI la sogs pa grangs brgyad pa d+ma'i 'dab ma la gnas mdun rgyab ring phyogasu//ya sogs thung dang ring ba drug rnams
89'a1(rgyud): bad+ma dang m+bu yi pad+ma dgu la rim pa yis//de banan ga shrIn+da m+b+ha min pad+mo 'dab mar sgru rab tu bskur sngags///gnad sbyin drug por wu na sogs dang /
89'a2(rgyud): chu gaN+Di dang bcas rlung gi pad 'dri ba rnams la la la sogs//shar gyi sgo yi lho dag du yang pad+ma'i 'dab ma la gnas dbyings kyis phye ba tsa yi sde//thung ngu lce min gyi ste ring ba rnams
89'a3(rgyud): kyang me yi zur na gnas pa rlung gi yin par 'gyur//de bzhin gshin rjer me dang ra yi gdong pa dag gi Ta sde thung dang ring po'i rab bye yis//g.yon dang dbang ldan du yod pa sngar
89'a4(rgyud): 'gyur te chu gter dang ni ring po'i dbye bas tshogs kyi'o//brgya byin dang ni tshangs pa dag gi chur bcas rlung du thung ngu ring po ta yi sngo pa'o//shar gyi sgo yi byang du pad ma'i mdab mang
89'a5(rgyud): lha men dag ya~M ka sde thung ngur 'gyur ba ste//lho ru gshin rje dog gi ring por 'gyur te me yi badreg po byang dog dang ni nub tu yang //phyugs kyi bdag po dzaM b+hA la yi thung dang ring bas ster
89'a6(rgyud): 'gyur ba nyid rgyal po kye//lha min la sogs rnams kyi rang gi sa bon du 'gyur 'dab ma lA ni rang rang ste mtha' dbus//'dab ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad la yang nyin nag dbang gis rang
89'a7(rgyud): sde pa dag gi yi ge rnams//yA rA wA lA haM haHdrug kyang nges par shing rta dag la steng dang rtsa ba lha sogasu//sgo las g.yas dang g.yon du gdengs can rnams kyis ya sogs
89'b1(rgyud): /la gnas ha yig dag tu ra 'gyur//sngo drug brtsegs pa'i gzugs dang slar yang hA ya ra wa la dang k+Sha sogs ldan pa'i ya sogs ni//phyogs kyi 'khor lor ka sogs sde rnams
89'b2(rgyud): g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas ci stsogs gzhan la lugs mthun te//shing dang grwa shin rje byang drang chu dang me dang lha min dang ni dbang ldan rlung gau zung ngu'o//AM aHzla ba nyi ma dge gi
89'b3(rgyud): dur khrong sa gzhi la gnas 'byung po'i tshogs kyi sngags rnams so//hUM gi yi ge chos kyi 'khor lo dang ni de bzhin aHyig bum pa'i sa bon dag tu 'gyur//oM yig rnga bo che yir 'gyur te chu//
89'b4(rgyud): h+ya yid byang chub shing drug gor ni rab tu 'gyur//zhes pa de ltar dbyangs ldan rnams ni rigs kyi dbang gis dkyil 'khor dag la sngags kyi dbye bar 'gyur//phyag rgya mtshan ma rnams kyi kha
89'b5(rgyud): drog mtha' dag rdo rje can gyi zhal gyi dbye ba dag gis 'gyur//thab tu sbyin sreg dag kyang de bzhin 'gyur te slar yang 'jug dogs pa rnams spyan ni dang pa dang //dpal ldan sa la bsang ba dang
89'b6(rgyud): ni mchod son cho ga dri bzhin bdud ni gau rlom pa dag kyang //sgo rnams srung ba'i don du brtul zhugs nges pa dang ldan dag pa'i slob ma rnams ni rib dgad bya//dpal ldan bum pa dag gi rnakhyo
89'b7(rgyud): ma rnams me dang lha min rlung dbang zur du rim pas so//slob dpon dpal ldan tshogs kyi dbang por 'gyur te mi bdag las kyi rdo rje can dag rab byas nas//slob ma med na tshogs kyi dbang ngo po/
90a1(rgyud): rang gis kyang ni sbyin smrig las lnga sogs pa dag kyang bya//zlum po 'am ni rig byed zlar dag rigs kyi dbang gis zhe dang rgyas pa dag gi thab tu 'gyur//byang ngam drag por zu
90a2(rgyud): dang gzhan yang dkar po'i sa la rtse ba'i pad+ma dag ni nyis 'gyuraro//zabs ni pad+mo'i tshang du 'gyur ti de yi nang du rtsa ba'i pad+ma mtshan mar bcos pa'o//pad+ma phyed la pad+ma'i phyi ri bum pa dang bcwa
90a3(rgyud): ral gri rin chen sogs kyi mtshan mar 'gyur//de yi phyed kyis kyang ni mchu ste de las nyis 'gyur dag kyang kha khyer dog gi rgya yi cha//steng du rdo rje phreng po dag kyang mtsho yi phyed kyis dbang
90a4(rgyud): dag tu ni nges par rab tu 'gyur//phyi rol 'og tu pad+ma'i mang ba ma rnams dang ku sha'i bkod pa phyogs rnams kun tu rab tu bya//de yi mthar ni nub phyogs dag tu nges par rAM kha gsum
90a5(rgyud): gyi b+h+rUM gcig tu ni rab tu 'gyur//slob dpon dag gi gradan ni nges par mnyam par 'gyur te snying po'i pad+ma dag las nyes 'gyur ro//g.yon du mchod yon gdan du 'gyur te mi yi bdag
90a6(rgyud): po sbyin sreg snod dag gi yang g.ya su 'gyur//kun gyi rdo rje'i mtshan mar 'gyur te rgyal ba'i byedag po'i yang na mkha' ya~M pad ma yum gyi'o//zhal dang gsang pa dag kyang thab khung
90a7(rgyud): rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur te rgyal po phyi dang lus la'o//thabs kyi phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor dag la khro bo'i rgyal po lha mor bcas pas srung ba byas nas ni//dpal ldan rdo
90b1(rgyud): dag gos sang bsogs dang tshur bcos me tog rnams kyis mo lnga mchod yon nyid//de yi rnal 'byor ldan pas smin par byos te rang snying pad+mad zla ba'i stong du bsgoms nas so//zhal gcig
90b2(rgyud): dog dkar po dus kyi phyag gi pad+ma g.yon na ril pa chu skyes dag pa ni//g.yas na dbyug pa bgrang phreng rol pa shin tu sir skya mor ser mig ldani gos dang bcas pa ste//me yi snying khar zla ba'i steng
90b3(rgyud): du dri med 'phro b+h+ring dzaM las lcags kyu nges par bsgom por bya//dri yis bkug pa'i kun 'gro ye shes sems dpa'i rang gi lus la shin tu mnyam dag tu mdzod//de ltar thab la yang ni yang dag
90b4(rgyud): 'gyur te mi yi bdag po de bzhin ma ni spyan drang ngo //ma chog sbyin lag pa dag gi mthe ba yis kyang me yi zhal du sbyin bsreg dag ni rab tu bya//gtso bo'i rdo rje yan lag gis kyang mda'
90b5(rgyud): brgya'i yam shing 'bru dang dung bla mar dnga' ma yis//skyil krung du gnas rab tu zhi zhing g.yo ba med pa'i sems ldan gsang sngags rig pa sngags kyi sku//slob dpon las kyi rdo rje can
90b6(rgyud): gyis slar yang mi la bsgra gzugs dag ni nges par sbyin por bya//rim pa yis ri sbyin sdug byas nas 'phor 'thung dag kyang de bzhin me dang bdeg nyid dag la yang //dri la sogs
90b7(rgyud): spos dag phul nas rang snying pad+mar ye shes me ni gshegs su gsol bar bya//phyi nas slob mo la ni dbang bskur dpal lngar bla ma mtha' dag stan gter gyis nges par sbyin//dang
91a1(rgyud): bdud rtsi lnga ni rgyal ba mchog gi rdo rjes byin gyis brlangs pa dag pa'i smradu'o//rang gi sngags kyis sbyin sreg byud cing rdul tshon btab ste sngags kyi mtshon ma rab tu ga/
91a2(rgyud): pan//zur du shel gyi bum pre dkar po skud pa lnga yis dkris pa rnams ni yang dag bzhag par bya//slob dpon shar gyi zhal du/rdo rje pad+ma las skyes rab bgrad khro bo'i rgyal po rnams
91a3(rgyud): ngag gis//spyan drangs nas ni ye shes 'khor lo rdul tshon dag la ro mnyam du bya dbang gi don du'o//lha dang lha mo rnams ni thams cad bdag gi ming gi sngon du oM zhes bya bar 'gyur ba
91a4(rgyud): ste/sbyin sreg la ni swAhA'i mtha' sngags snying po de bzhin nyid mchod pa dag la na maH'i mtha'//dzaHhUM baM hoHlcags kyu la sogs rim pas yongs su bkod nam so spyan drang gzhug
