91a5(rgyud): dang bcing ba dang //mnyes la'o mchod yon sbyin pa la yang i daM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na Ar+m+ma kaM me zhes par 'gyur//rgyas pa la ni swAhA'i mthesangasu 'gyur te mri bdag zhi pa la 'di na maH'i mthur
91a6(rgyud): dbug pa la nai baM Sha Ta mtha' ru 'gyur te ba ShA To mtha' yang dbang la de bzhin nyid du ni//hI yig mtha' can mngon spyod la s+thi rang bzhin yin dab du gis phaT mthu' phung bus gdab so
91a7(rgyud): la'o//dkar dang dmer dang nag po mchog gi ges dang mtshungs pa dag ste las kyi ribye ba dag gis sngags//shar du dpal ldan thugs kyi rdo rje dag ni sprin nag dang mtshungs
91b1(rgyud): byung du su mo rdo rje dang //sgro r+ya gsung ga rdo rje na du yang nA rang rigs phyu su gnas pa yA shrIs na rta s+ho//dgar dang dmar dang sor po drug ni rigs kyi dbang gis su yin la khyab par byed par
91b2(rgyud): 'gyur//rlung me chu dang si yi lha rnams dge gri skye ba'i gnas ni mo bdag i dri u li'o//oM A/hUM ni phyag rgya gsum ste spyang+ge'i tshig dang bcas pa ring po'i dbye ba las kyang ldo//hUM AH/
91b3(rgyud): aM hau rAng gri zhal rnams gzhan pa dag kyang de bzhin gzhom du med pa lnga par 'gyur//a sogs dang bac+doMs hraM yig drug sta ro rkong na maHsogs kyi dpal ldan yan lag drug tu 'gyu/
91b4(rgyud): phrem gi yi ge sna tshogs yum gyir 'gyur te rnam bcu brdegs pa'i sngags ni rgyal ba dag gi'o//hUM yig ye shes sa bon snying po dag kyang brtsegs pa chen po'i sngags ni zhal dang
91b5(rgyud): bcas pa ste//hUM yig la sogs yan lag drug po sku yi rdo rje dang por ldan pa 'di ni nye snying ngo //lha dang lha mo rnams kyis phreng ba'i sngags ni de bzhin gzhan te las kyi dbye ba du ma yis
91b6(rgyud): rnam mang du 'gyur shes par bya ste dus 'khor dkyil 'khor 'dir ni rang bzhin ston dbang gis so//rin chen gser zla ma tog dang ni rnam pa mang po'i gros dang dri dang spos dang mar me dang //
91b7(rgyud): dril bu me long bla re dang ni rnam mang 'bras bu ba den sogs dang gar dang rol mo yis//rnam bkra mchod pa byas te gzhan pa rnam bcu dag kyang bdag nyid nus pas ji ltar gsungs pa
92a1(rgyud): yizhin//slab dpon dag gi zhabs kyi rtsa bar mchog gri bu yis yon ni dag pa'i slad dbul bar bya//dag pa gsum b+hi rdzas dang bdag nyid du dang bu mo dang bcas rigs
92a2(rgyud): las skyes pa'i gzhon nu ma//rdo rje nyid nas mi bzad 'khor bas 'jigs pa dag ni rgyal ba rnams la skyabasu ldog par mchi//khyed kyi zhabs kyi chu skyes nges par srid pa'i 'jigs
92a3(rgyud): 'phrog dag la lus dag sems ni drag pas so//zhes pa gser bcas me tog dag gris maN+Dal byas nas bla ma lA ni gsol ba gdab par 'gyur//'dod pa'i rdo rje dril bri phyag rgya
92a4(rgyud): zlu ma dag kyang spyi bos gzung bar bgyi//rin chen la ni sbyin pa sbyin bgyi 'khor lo 'di la rgyal ba mchog gi dam tshig bskyang bar bgyi//ral gri la ni mchod pa byegyi ste gos /
92a5(rgyud): byer chu skyes rigs la sdom pa dag ni bskyang bar bgyi//sems can rnams ni thur pa'i sla du rgyal ba bskyed mdzad rigs la byang chub bdag gis bskyed par bgyi//slob ma khrus byas
92a6(rgyud): dri yis rjes blugs brtul zhugs nges pa dang ldan shar gyi sngar ni bzhig byas te//dngos grub don du sau shred rgyu lnga ba mchog gi rdo rje dag gi mngon par bsngags pa rab sbyin pa/
92a7(rgyud): le'ang 'dud rtsi nges par rgyal ba mchog gi dmachog dag gis spros ni dbab pa'i don du//sngags ni hU~M ba~M yi ge gcig ste e ra la dang bcas pa khri bo'i gtso bo bskul
92b1(rgyud): da rgyal pa ban namatshan na sna mas lag padas smos nachags su zlogs na stong //dadu byung ngas nams na ma nang song bdan nan du
92b2(rgyud): gar gyi gar byed//bzhud dang smyigi yi blo 'dres pa dpra la 'jigs pa skyeng bdud ni rdo rje'i rgyu yong byed//rdo che med cing dgas pa med par 'gyur ten dbang gis rtswa gzhan dag kyang zhi nga//
92b3(rgyud): smyusbu phebs pas ni rnal 'byor ldan+da pA rang bzhin ston dbang gis sku yi bya ba byed pa ste//gsung phebs pas ni lha dang 'byung po lha min rnams las rnam pAr rgyal ba'i smra ba pa ru 'gyur//
92b4(rgyud): rdzogs phebs pas ni bzhin gyi snying la gnas pa dag dang byung dang 'byung ba thams cad shes par 'gyur//ye shes phebs pas sangs rgyas bla ma yi yang bla ma rdzu 'phrul ljon pa'i skyon
92b5(rgyud): pa gcig pur 'gyur//sa phebs pas ni rnal 'byor pa dag re dang mtshungs par 'gyur te chus kyang bsil bar rab tu 'gyur//me phebs pas ni sreg par 'gyur te rlung gis kyang ni
92b6(rgyud): de bzhin snyam pa dag tu rab tu 'gyur//sdud pa phe bos pas mi snang bar 'gyur sa stongs du ni mkha' la spyod pa nyid du rab tu 'gyur//du bzhin gzugs la sogs pa thams cad
92b7(rgyud): rang bzhin sgron dbang gis rim pa yis ni rig par bya//dbab pa la ni nges par 'gyur te mi yi bdag po sdigs pa rnams kyis sgrim pa'i stobs dang ni//bsten pa'i dbye ba dang
93a1(rgyud): /nang dam tshig rtags kyi bzlas pa snos kyis 'bru' jig dgu sa//sbya rgya m+WAd na byed pas du m+b+hi dang las wu nga ga zhig du ni myudag gar+dz+dza /
93a2(rgyud): rang byin rlabs pas dman pa rnams mang srid pa dag gis sngags pa rnams la dngos grub yod pa mon//phobs pa baSh+Tang+ge ste phyi nas mgo ba dang ni sgying kha spyi gtsug lci ba dag dang mgrin pa
93a3(rgyud): dang /gsang bar rgyal ba dang ni reng gi rigs kyi sar gnas rang gi rdo rje gsum gyis bsrung bar bya//lus la ser mo'i gos dog byin te mig ni bsgribs par gyur pa'i slob ma 'dir ni gzhug/
93a4(rgyud): par bya//kun rdzab don du brtul zhugs rab mchog bgrod pa dag la bgrod pad+ma dag nyid ni ljin par bya//'tsho dang mi badren gzhan gyi bud med spang bya guzhan gyi nor dang cheng gi btung ba'i
93a5(rgyud): bzhin nyid//'khor ba rdo rje'i zhugs padag ste rang gi dge ba 'jom su byed sdig pa lnga po 'di dgag/gang zhig gang gi dus su byung lci dang mo yi bla ma dri yi mtshan gyis rabu sbyin
93a6(rgyud): sna tshogs gtso bo'i bkru' 'di srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa dag ste khyed kyis kyang ni bskyung bar bya//chol kha na ma tho bcas pa'i zlas dang tshig den klog dang 'byung po lha min da
93a7(rgyud): po'i chos//ba lang dbyis pa bud med skyes pa rnams dang lha mi'i bla ma gsod pa lnga na mi bya'o//grogs po rje ba rnams dang lha dang mi yi bla ma dge 'dun yid brtan rnams la la dri
93b1(rgyud): nga //dbang ngo rnams ni chags pa dag dang do spyod pa'o bdug po dag gogardul zhugs s+ho sh+'uSh+Ta//dra la ldan sngags kyis mngon par bsngags te lag pa'i pad+ma s+yA bu me tog
93b2(rgyud): gaN+DIg ni rab sbyin bye//dang por ldan gsum bskor te lag pa'i pad+ma sbyar ba drag las dkyil 'khor du na me tog der//gang gi gnas su me tog bzang po ltung ba de ni mi yi bdag po
93b3(rgyud): dri yi rig sung so//byi na sna bang ni bdun pa dag dang rnam gsum 'di ni ji zhin bla med yang dag rab sbyin bya//klu dang ban la nor bugs kyi bum pa dag gi N+Dal po sa la rang bzhin
93b4(rgyud): rlon chen bcas//sngon dang dri dang ldan pa'i rgyal dang rnam rgyal bum pa dag gis lha mo rnams kyi khrus 'o//sangs rgyas rab tu dbye bas cod pan sbyin te mchog gi bla mas nus mnam+b+ha
93b5(rgyud): kyi dang dbyangs nyid//rdo rje dril bu nye na las ta ba rtul gas dag kyang daphung por bcas pa'i yul gyi suM sbyang bar dbya//khro ba rnams kyis byams sogs mying ste gsal bar rgyal ba'i
93b6(rgyud): bdag pos rjes gnang 'dogs bcos rab tu sbyin//rdo rje dril burab tu byin nas rab mchog snying rje dadrug gis dag pa'i chos ni bstan par bya//nges par rdo rje'i rigs dag la ni srog
93b7(rgyud): gcod bya ster ma grol yang bden pa min pa'i tshig/rin chen la ni gonan nor drug byam tshig gi pad ma'i rigs nyid la yang gzhan gyi bud med byug/chang dang sgron ma sangs rgya
94a1(rgyud): rnams dang bzang po'i yul rnams mtha' dag 'khor lo la ni byasten par bya//gdol pa mo saglas mtha' dag bud myong rnams ni gri gug la yang mkha' yo pad+mar smad ma
94a2(rgyud): bye/sems can don gyi slad du nor dang bcas pa'i lus 'di sbyin par bya ste khyod kyis bsrung mi bya//rigs kyi bu kye sangs rgyas nyid 'gyur ba gzhan du mtha' yas bskal pas min
94a3(rgyud): por rgyal bas gsungs//chun sgrol ma la sogs lha mo cod pan zhes pa rgyal ba dpa' blo'i de dbyangs nus ma rnams//rdo rje dril bu nyi zla dag dang brtul zhugs dag kyang yul slos
94a4(rgyud): mAm gzhug par bya ste//khro bo'i phyag rgya go cha byas pa sngags 'dis dbab par bya'o//oM bi sh+ya kr-i d+ha hU~M hUM A dz+wa la/ma la a ku li/b+hI Sha Na badz+ra A//'di brjod pa tsam/
94a5(rgyud): gyegyis phyi rol gyi dbab pa dang /dgug pa dang ltung bar bya ba rnams nus par 'gyu ro//de nas 'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud chen po las khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas par bshad
94a6(rgyud): baHoM b+hA shI si ha d+hA dzI d+hi ri hIHkhro bo'i mdun du'o//oM hUM b+h+r-i/ma hA pad+ma pa ti d+hu nur ban d+ha ra hUM/rgyab tu'o//oM hUM baM hUM tI/aM ku sho d+hA ri Ni hU dzA/lho ru'o//hUM
94a7(rgyud): bu su ra hA ro Ni tsin+da maM Ni d+hIH d+hir Ni su~M/g.yon du'o//oM shrI bar hi Ni puSh+Ti hir hUM/me tog dbang ldan gyi grA dzu//oM shrI rat+na shwa ri d+hU pa his+t+wa~M hUM/spos ma'i
94b1(rgyud): /oM shrI b+hU Shi Ni gAn d+ha ha ste hU~M/dri bden dral bu'o//oM shrI dza gad pA li ni A dI pa te hU~M/mar me rlung ngu'o//de nas 'byung mo brgyad kyi phyag rgya'i cho ga rgyas par bshad pa/
94b2(rgyud): khu tshur phan tshun bcangs te/mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni seng ge'i rgyal mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'o//lag pa g.yon pa khu tshur bcangs te/gung mo brkyang ba ni yid bzhin gyi
94b3(rgyud): nor bu'i rgyal mtshan gyi phyag rgya'o//phyag rgya 'di nyid skyid pa'i phyogasu bzhag pa ni gzhu dang mdi'i phyag rgya'o//lhag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs te mdzub mo brkyang ba nas dkyil ba ni/
94b4(rgyud): lcags kyu'i phyag rgya'o//thal mo mnyam par byas te/mdzub mo gnyis bkug pa ni me tog gi phyag rgya'o//sor mo rnams phan tshun mkhyud de/mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni spos kyi
94b5(rgyud): phyag rgya'o//lag pa so sor brkyang ste/dpung pa'i rtsi ba gnyi su bzhag pa ni dri'i phyag rgya'o//lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs te gung mo'i sor mo rab tu brkyang ba ni mar me'i phyag rgya'o//
94b6(rgyud): 'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa'i le'u'o////de nas 'byung po brgyad kyi sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga rgyas par bshad pa/oM shrI
94b7(rgyud): dzaHgzhan gyis mi thub pa'i'o//oM hU~Mdz+nyAHrgyal ba'i'o//oM hUM dzaHrdzogs byed kyi'o//oM suM dzaHdur khrod kyi bdag po'i'o//oM ruM dzaHrigs sngags kyi dbang phyug gi'o//oM
95a1(rgyud): d+hU/thung po'i dab gas//A A dzaHma sha gzhug sa ngag gra//'byung po gzhan gyis mi ba gi sna pa'i thabs bshad paSh+T+r-i n+d+ha cha na khyim dus /sbyin du
95a2(rgyud): 'dum brngub te sngon du bstan pa byas par 'gyuraro//de nas zla bany+tsa la mched pa rgya chen pa byas te ltang gsungs po'i 'bras tshin dkar po dang /b+hu N+DI dang /rko dang /bu rim dang /'i ma
95a3(rgyud): sharnams kyis mchod cing gri gul gyi bdug po byin nas mtshon thog thag bzlas na tho rangs nges par 'ong //gA le te ngas par ma 'ongs nu skad cig de la mtsho'o//'ongs na bsgre bdon med/
95a4(rgyud): pad+ma mi byed//sgrub pa pos mngag gzhug gyis shig ces bsgo nA de phan chad mngag gzhug gi las byed la rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal srid steng bar byed cing dag thams cad tshar gcad par
95a5(rgyud): byu //zla ba'i lha mo blangs nas skye zhing rgyab tu zhon na/rgyu'i 'jig rten du yung khyer bar byed do//ba byin nyid kyang steng bar byed cing bskul pa bdun 'tsho'o//de nas rgyal ba'i sgru
95a6(rgyud): po'i thab mi byA shud pa/mtshan mo sbyin byed m+bu'i mdun du spyod ste/nyi ma rI ri stong smrig bad+mod brgyad ba zlas ni nya ma bdun te phreng ni byams sogs sbyor ba'o//rjes gnang rdzogs pa'i byung /
95a7(rgyud): chub dpal mo srid pa 'jam dzas dus kyi 'khor lo rje su rig paste//sgeb pa'i dri ba 'phrog pa'i dbang bsgyur bdun po 'di dag dkyil 'khor dri ni yang dag reb sbyin gyi//dbang
95b1(rgyud): dag gis mngon par dbang glos bdun kye ni dbang phyug nyid du 'gyur//bum pa gsang bas mngon par dbang bskur slar yang phyir mi ldog pa sogasu nges par rab tu 'jug/shes rab ye shes dag
95b2(rgyud): gis mngon par dbang bskur srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa'i 'dzam dbyangs nyid du 'gyur//gal te g.yo skye'i dbang gis rtse ba'i ltung ba byung na dmyal bar 'gro ste 'di dag sdug bsngalo//
95b3(rgyud): rtsa ba'i ltung ba rnam par dag par 'gyur te ston ldan pa dbang bdun la gnas dag gi'o//bum pa gsang ba la ni gal te brtul zhugs nges pa'i dbang gis gong ma la ni dag pa med//rtsa ba'i
95b4(rgyud): ltung ba byung ba gang zhig dag pa'i slasar lnga dkyil 'khor 'drir ni 'jug bya ste//rje su gnang ba thob nas slar yang tshogs kyi 'dus par thu bo'i ming ni chung ba nyid du 'gyur/dpal ldan bla
95b5(rgyud): me'i thugs dkrugs pa las bu rnams kyi ni rtsa ba'i ltung ba ri bong 'dzin por 'gyur//de yi bka' la 'gongs pas gzhan du 'gyur te nges par de bzhin spun la khros pas gsum pa'o//
95b6(rgyud): byams pa btang bas bzhi par 'gyur te byang chub sems ni rab tu nyams pa las kyang mnga' ru 'gyur//drug pa grub pa'i mtha' la smod pa ri bo dag kyang ma sman mi la gsang ba byin laso///
95b7(rgyud): phung po nyon mongs pa las klu ru 'gyur te slor yang dgu pa dag pa'i chos la ma dad gang //sgyu yi byams pa dang ni mang sogs bral ba bde ba ster la rtog pa phyogs dang drag po'o//dag pa'i
96a1(rgyud): sems can dag lo sbyin brjod pa las nyi ma dam tshig thob pa gtod pA las kyang gzhan//bud med thams cad la smod nges par ma nur 'gyur te rdo rje'i theg par gnas pa rna/
96a2(rgyud): lnga'o//klu dang bzhi ye nor bu gsor gyi bum pa dag gam rgyal po sa yi rang bzhin rin chen bcas//sman dang dri dang ldan pa'i rgya li dang rnam rgyal bum pa drag gis gdan gyi dbus su khrus
96a3(rgyud): bya ste//klu dag gis ni dpal ldan cod pan bcing ste nor 'dab pad+mar bzhi yis dang dpyangs bcing par bya//phyag rgya la ni dpal ldan bum pa yis te 'dir ni pad+ma dang bral re khA lnga po
96a4(rgyud): spangs//dang po chu la ni dge bsnyen nyi du 'gyur te bum pa la yang dge tshul dag tu 'gyur//gsang ba'i dbang la dge slong dang ni gong ma'i byed pa la yang gnas bstan zhes par 'gyur
96a5(rgyud): ba ste/phyag rgya dar dpyangs cod pan ngag dadrung rdo rje mchod phyir thogs ni bla me mchog gis sbran par bya//de dag slob dpon sla du rang gi rgyal po'i rigs kyi dbang gis phyag rgya rnam par
96a6(rgyud): dag pa nyid//steng du blo re bkod cing sa yi mthil gyi gronas dag tu yang ri mo gsum ni kun naso//de rnams zer du nor bu ga sngar gyi bum par chur bcas skud pa dang ldan pad+ma'i
96a7(rgyud): kha rnam so//dung sogs gser gyi snod dang yang na dngul gyi rang bzhin dag tu dri yi chu ni bsgrub par bya//snying por gser gyi rang bzhin gsal ba'i gdan dag rab tu bkode de la khrus
96b1(rgyud): nibarnam par bya//me tog sogs dang de yo ti la mar nyi n+ya me yIs smin pa dag gis b+hA la byug d+har+ya byA//phywa ma rnams kyis dril phyis byas nas sbrang n+ye mar dang zho dang 'o ma tshu mas babru bar bya//
96b2(rgyud): rin grub rnams dang mar me dag dang rnam mang 'bras bu mchog gis 'di la nges par byabs nas ni//baM ye gnas nas bskyod par bya ste sku yang dmar po'i gos dag gis ni yang dag gi lags
96b3(rgyud): pa'o//dpal ldan dkyil 'khor mthar ni mnyam pa'i sa yi gnas la rgyal ba'i cha yis re khA lnga byas te//dbus su pad+ma bdab ma brgyad pa rang rigs phyogs gnas pa'i mtshan ma lnga yi
96b4(rgyud): rgyan po'o//de yi dbusu bzhag par bya ba zhal gyi pad+ma nub tu phyogs pa'i lha dang lha mo 'am//mchod rten sogs dang glegs bam dag gam thang sku zhes pa'ang de bzhin de la mngon phyogs
96b5(rgyud): bsngags pa'o//rgyal ba mchog dang bcas pa sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje stong pa'i rang bzhin dag tu byas nas ni//phyi nas sngar brjod sbyor ba dag gis zla nyi rdo rje las skyes dus kyi 'khor lo
96b6(rgyud): bsgom par bya//reg pa'i lha mo sogs dang sangs rgyas a li ka le ri rigs skyes rang rang sa bon gyis bskyed rnams//snying mgrin lte ba gsang ba mgo drang gtsug tor 'khor lo dag la rig
96b7(rgyud): kyekyi dbang gis bsgom par bya//de ltar nges pa nyid bsgom par bya ste slar yang mtha' dag lha rnams dag gis lus la yang //khro bo'i rgyal po dag gis srid med sred mnyam ye shes sems
97a1(rgyud): pa 'a/m+b+ha gang+gAg pa d+man pa m+b+haHsa n+do mnyam smye pa da du myu dus n-i lus la bya//denas slong rdzunad+d+he sgyul rlob tu gastsa
97a2(rgyud): par byas pa'i lha la phyag dag 'tshal bar bya//a sogs ka sogs dag las lha dang lha mo rnams kyi rang rigs ston la gnas sa bon gang //rang gi sa bon de ni snying gi dbus zla nyal
97a3(rgyud): sbyor lo gnas skye gsong brags ldan par//mtha' dag lus la gnas pa'i sum nu d+ha gnyis mtshan me yan la gyi dpe byad mkha' dang brgyad kyis d+d+he/yi ga rnams kyis phye bye
97a4(rgyud): rab gsal 'ang be ma 'dab mar glegs bam rnams la bsgom par bya//mchod rten snying por dpal ldan 'khor lo rdo rjen bu pad+ma dag dang byang rdural gri nyid//bgrang phreng la ni hU~M
97a5(rgyud): yi ge nor bu yongasu bgrang ba rnams ni mtshan dang dpe byad rnams//dril bu'i sku la dbyangs ni gsum gyis bsgyur ba'i bcu rnams dag dang ka sogs sde rnams rdo rje la//de dag kho na
97a6(rgyud): mchod phyir thigs la bAn+d+ha yis bsgyur ba nor m+b+hi pe byung rnams ni stong g.yog ste la/ke sogs rdzi pad+ma sa dang bcas pa mkha'i ro sbyin rnams ni bres maldang dag la bsgom par ga
97a7(rgyud): te ta lngar rgyas skye oM la zhes pa gzung mi mgrol rkyen sgra rags dgala'o//de bzhin du la pe ma yog chung ni gdung bu dag la 'byor terkang bdu pa li h+Na trA yang /ma
97b1(rgyud): ngag lus la gnas pa stong pa'i rnam pa lnga po dag ni thal ba dag la bsgom par bya//rang lus ye shes rnam par dag las rdo rje gsum dang bcas pa'i phung po khams la sogs pa kun//
97b2(rgyud): rnams kyi ni reng gi snying kha'i pad+ma rang rang sa bon dag gi rim pas dgod par bya//sa bon bkod na rab tu gnas par 'gyur te mI yi bdag po mchod rten sku gzugs sogs la'o//nye bar ba
97b3(rgyud): ba'i dus su lag pa'i rdo rje dgI d+hIni lus las sa bon gzhug par bya//'di dang dang po ru yang ri mar bris pa'i thang su rnams kyi me long la ni khrusu 'gyur//phyi nas dri dang spos dang shin tu dri
97b4(rgyud): bzang me tog rnams dang glu dang rol mo dag dang ni//gar dang rnam mang mchog gi gos dang rnga yab dang ni gdugs rnams drag gis lha la mchod par bya//de ltar rab gnas byas nas rnam mang mchog
97b5(rgyud): be ro rnams dag gis dge 'dun mchod ston rab tu sbyin//khron pa rdzing dang mtshe'ur phyogs dang phyogs bral du ni klu yi rgyal po nor rnams dgod par bya//chu gter bdun po rang gi sa bon gyis
97b6(rgyud): te sbrang rtsi chu dang ldan pa'i dri lnga gzhug par bya//skyon sreg mthar ni rdzing bu la sogs dag la chu lha dkar po phyag na zhugs pa bsgom par bya//skyed mos tshil du shing gcig dpag bsam
97b7(rgyud): ljon pa mtha' dge shing la gnas par dbang ni bskur naso//cod pan dang dpyangs dag dang do shal gdub bu dang ni de bzhin rna cha ska rags la sogs pa//slob dpon la ni rab tu sbyin par
98a1(rgyud): 'gyur te mi yi bdag po yon yang bdag nyid nus paso//sbyin bdag gis ni bsong nams slad mtha' dag tshogs kyi rigs la gzhan don du gnyer bya ste//bsod nams 'di
98a2(rgyud): yis rnam gsum srid pa la gnas sems can rnams ni bla med byang chub thob par shog/ji srid phyogs kyi lo ni gcig pu rnam pa bcu ru 'gyur te blta ba dang ni reg par bya//de nas
98a3(rgyud): 'khyud par bya ste ro dang bcas pa'i chu gter g.yo ba la sogs rnams ni bsten par bya//lo ni nyi shu yan chad phyag rgya mchog tu 'jigs byed ma ste khro bo 'byung po lha min cha//dbang
98a4(rgyud): gi den du drug dang bzhi ste bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba gzhan ni sgom pa'i don du'o//dpal ldan shes rab nu ma la yang dang por reg pa gang yin bum pa'i dbang ni de nyid//gsang ba
98a5(rgyud): dag las ri bong 'dzin pa myang ba dang ni blta ba dag gis gsang ba'i dbang du 'gyur//shes rab ye shes dbang la mtha' dag rgyal ba'i rigs kyi yan lag zhal gyis sbyang ba byas
98a6(rgyud): nas ni//rgyal ba dag kyang 'dir ni bla mas dbang por byas nas slob ma la ni phyag rgya sbyin par bya//rgyan rnams thams cad dang ldan zhun ma'i gser dang mtshungs shing bcu gnyis lo
98a7(rgyud): lon mdzes pa'i bu mo ni//khrag dang ldan la shes rab thabs kyi bdag gis rang gi rdo rje nir bus 'dod spyad nas//sa bon dang bcas rdo rje dag kyang slob ma dag par shes nas kha
98b1(rgyud): 'phang ba byas nas ni//phye nas rang gi phyag rgya sbyin bya de nas slar yang gzhan ni du ba'i lam sogs ldan pa'o//skrag dang rnam par 'khrul pa'i sems ldan ga po sgyu gzhan dbang 'gro ma nad dang
98b2(rgyud): ldan dang bu skyes ma//khro khangs nor lo srid dang mi bdun rtsod pa la dga' rang gi yan lag dman dang rnam dag min//shes rab 'di dag dbang la shin tu mkhas pa'i bla ma dag gis spang bar byed/
98b3(rgyud): ma yi dbang //sngar brjed sangs rgyas la gus bla ma'i dam tshig 'dzin ma rnams ni phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod par bya//'dod pa bskyed par byed pa 'gro ba rang gi yid la'o gang ba dag ni gang ba
98b4(rgyud): nyi du 'gyur//gang ba yan lag mchog dag las ni ri bong 'dzin pa khu bar byas nos thig le bzang po 'jig/r-i.oM Tas bkug po mchog gi bde ba rang bzhin gyis star thig le grol ba dag
98b5(rgyud): ni gsum gyi mthar//blta dang reg dang 'grogs la 'dzag pa'i bde ba 'di dag dga' ba'i dbye ba la sogs dag gis so//'dod pa dga' bar byed dang po dag kyang mi rnams kyi ni mig gis/
98b6(rgyud): blta ba dag la'o//phyi nas gang ba rab tu sbyar ba la lte slar yang mchog gi dga' ba nyid rang lus la//'bar ba thig le 'dzag pa dang ni dga' ba yang ste khyad par dga' ba rdo rje pad+ma pa/
98b7(rgyud): o r+tha thig le gsum gyi mtha' ru 'gyur ba la gnas lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba rdo rje byed//'dod dang dga' ba dang ni 'dar dang 'gyur med dag dang bzhi po yis ni sbyor ba de gcig ste//
99a1(rgyud): glang ba dang ni nas dang skye badrug dang mjug gi dgASh+Ta N+Di nI Sh+T+ri A b+hu ngas par 'gyur//'byung ba dang ni smig khye brgyal ba dang dung m+WA yang khyad par shASh+Ta na
99a2(rgyud): gam pa'o//oM da ninA de dag deng ba nyid dang ldan cig skyes pa'i dga' di nyid ni bzhi par 'gyur//sems kyi bas me pi yis ni mdu 'gyur te rig pa dang ni rdo lta ba dag gis sri
99a3(rgyud): mi'i na rdo rje zhugs pas bu mi byed pa dang bcas shin tu dgo' bas tshi mo dag ni de bzhin nyid//thig le lhung na chung ma gzhan gyi rigs la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor ma ni 'dod chags
99a4(rgyud): nyams la sa//'di dag rnal 'byor phyag rgya drug ste si chu sreg za rlung dang mkha' dang chad pa'i dngos rnams so//chu skyes la ni rdo rje bzhugs rtse mo can la rlung dang thig le'i lhung gsuM
99a5(rgyud): papo'o//'di dag rnal 'byor gsum gyis rab tu gsal zhing dris par sgra dang gsung dang thugs kyi phyag rgya ste//chags dang chags bral mthar gyur dang po mchog bde'i gter ni ni myo
99a6(rgyud): rnams kyis rtogs bya bzhi pa'o//phyug rma rnams las de ni legs pa'i ma ru 'gyur ternam po mal ldan bla m+bu'i zhal 'dir//shrIs yum ni mchog gi yum ste srid ga
99a7(rgyud): da pa sbyi la sogs pa sa slo ma'o//de rkyen tshe ma rnams te blugs kyi 'i sa kyi gsags pa mo//'kho la la gnasadus na tshu
99b1(rgyud): sa la gnas rnams rnal 'byor pa yis bstan par bya//zhing dang gnas dang dur khrod skye bo dang bcas skye bo med par nam yang dor bar mi bya'o//dpal ldan rdo rje can ni dang ldan yab ste srid
99b2(rgyud): gsum skyed mdzad sangs rgyas thams cad meng po'o//spyan la sogs pa ming po'i bu ste gzhan ni rnam mang yang cha rnams dang yang che'i bu rnam so//'khor lo la gnas rang rigs slar
99b3(rgyud): gnas rab dga' rnams ni rnal 'byor ma rnams dag gis bsten par bya//zhing dang gnas dang dur khrod skye bo dang bcas skye bo med par nu ma yang dor bar mi bya'o//bud med zla ba'i bzhin
99b4(rgyud): dang ut+pal migra can mchog gi dro yis rje su byugs pa gang su dag/bsod nams dag gi rgyu ngu dag pa gsum gyis slob dpon la ni rdo rje mchod pa 'bul byed na//sa gzhi sbyin dang
99b5(rgyud): glang po rta dang shing rta du ma'i bu mo rab tu sbyin las bsod nams gang //bstod nams de dag thams cad de las 'gyur te mi bdag mkhar gnas zla ba nyi ma'i mtshams su'o//
99b6(rgyud): sgrol ma rmongs mi rnam pa bzhi ru sa yo steng du 'gyur te gas dkar mo ni rgyal rigs ma//sa ni rje'u rigs ma rnams rnam gsum mA ma kI ni gnyis skyes skye bo'i rigs skyes rnam bdun
99b7(rgyud): 'gyur//sgra zhes bya ba mkhar ba mkhan mo nges par ro yi rdo rje chang 'tshong gzugs kyi rdo rje ma//yang dag nges par gser mkhan mir 'gyur mo yi bdag po 'dzin pa dgra la
100a1(rgyud): namamamams sa nathasama.am thas thas la sa mnamam
100a2(rgyud): rgyu/rAT+TA//myong ba m+b+ha nA sh+tsa d+d+ha blag+sas na//na dAn rab byung rduzags mkhanas// ma rnams kyi smyos nan bram lan mar gyur ba
100a3(rgyud): 'jig rten du ni rab tu grags//nA mur+d+ha ne shA 'tshong mar 'gyur rlung banini sbyin teng gis khyab 'jig ma ni rdza mkhan ma//big mo khur ba mkhan du ngos 'gyur gdang drug ma ni slong 'tshong
100a4(rgyud): ma sgyu dbang me tshem bum//char sti ma nye ba mor 'gyur sa gzhi'i gnas ngag du yang dbang phyug ma ni gar mi ldan ma ru 'gyur//dpal ma zla ba gang po'i zhal ni brgyad po chos mkhyen mar
100a5(rgyud): yang 'gyur te 'byung ba'i skye gnas//rmugs byeng mini mya stegs mkhan mor 'gyur te mi bidag rangs byed ma ni sbyin pal mkhan ma'o//'angs ma zhes byA ti la mdo'i dri ma rab phye shin tu
100a6(rgyud): skyobs ni lcags ma khan mo ste bzhi pa'aM//'od zer can no kaM lpags mkhan mar rab 'gyur khro gnyar can ni shing mkhan ma dag de bzhin nyid//dpal ldan nun+da nI 'breg mkhan ma ste
100a7(rgyud): so me srid pa gnas lcags sgyug m+b+ha ni skyug ma ma khan//drag spyan ma ni ldan pa byad ma 'gyur te nu ba rjid ma'i pa ma shin tu sbyin man//khwa d+ma'i mi shes khri ba las skyes
100a8(rgyud): med bcu pa rnams ni rnal 'byor pa yis mchod par bya//dpal ldan khyi gang na ni k+sa kl-i mar 'gyur mi yi bdag pa phag gi ding ma ni 'phyag pa mo//lce spyang gdong ma gtum rmi
100b1(rgyud): ngag dang sa yi gzhi yi sdig gdong man sgrub gzig ma//bya rog dadrong ma bston thabs ma g+ha rab tu gsal zhing nges par bya rgod gdong ma ro srog ma//mkha' lding gangang ma dpal ldan b+hil+lIr 'gyur
100b2(rgyud): te brgyad pa 'ug pa'i gdong ma dag kyang ri khrod ma//sum cu rtsa drug rigs kyi dbye bas sa gzhi'i gnas su rnal 'byor ma rnams dag gi rigs rnams te//zhing dang gnas dang nye ba'i gnas dang yul
100b3(rgyud): dang grong mchog dang ldan na gsu yang dag gnas pa ni//rmongs rnams 'ching bar byed cing rab mchog sa yi steng du rnal 'byor pa rnams dag la dngos grub ster//bzhi dang drug dang de bzhin brgyad
100b4(rgyud): dad bcu dang bcas pa'i nor dang gcig pu gci ba ni rim paso//bzhi ni sangs rgyas dbye ba rnams te slar yang dus ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu dbye ba rnams//khro bo rnams ni phyogs kyi rabang bya
100b5(rgyud): sa stangs gnas su yi dwags dbye ba rnams ni de bzhin brgyad//lha min dag kyang brgyud kyi dbye ba gdengs can srid par gnas rnams rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya//gcig pu gcig ni sno
100b6(rgyud): tshogs gtso bo srad gsum gnasu dpe ldan rigs rnams dag gi khyab bya'o//sa 'og rnamasu ga tu mo brgyad sti mi yi 'jig rten phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor lo ni wa skyes gnas//yi dwagra
100b7(rgyud): zhes pa yi dwags 'jig rten du ste lha mchog gnasu swa yi rdo rje la sogs drag/tshangs pa'i yul sar dpal ldan bzhi sta rab mchog zhi ba'i grong du khams gsum dog gi yum gcig mo
101a1(rgyud): rub tu khros pa'i nalnga rnams sna tshogs yang dag spyang byed dgyes pa rnams ni rkyong bar byed pa nyid//bu mo rgan mo dang ma rnams dang lus ni dri ma dang bcas bram ze mo dang rgyal
101a2(rgyud): mo//rje mam sdom ma par skye rnams sa ma mig dang la phyi da rnam ni mnamadig hU~M shi sa mched pa shA rgyal ba
101a3(rgyud): //bcos de'i thubs ldan dri ma dab dung rnam par dral zhing byang chub skyed la rnaMs kun pas so//dang bar bla mid gsang de'i byug rgyur 'gyur d+he ma tshig la ni dang la rdzun
101a4(rgyud): mchog blag rgya//rtsed ma'i yin ldog las kyi phyag rgyur 'gyur te dbang po gnyis kyi bde mnyam drug gis chos phyug rgyu//phyi nyi ma rnams dag gi dri lnga lus dang pad+ma la gan
101a5(rgyud): de dag nam kyi gis lnga ste//rang b+h+yonan snron dang gis ni dun bdug na sha dang ba'i rnamam//dang loldan ma bu rkyen du mi 'gyur che lo d+hA me sna tshogs med
101a6(rgyud): sbyide che nam//dang lnga ldan sgrol mgos dar zhes byad 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis m+b+ha mAk+saM dang sgron ma yang //rnal 'byor pa ni sa de dgas te ma gyur tI b+hU mi chag blang po
101a7(rgyud): bya ba las//mi ba skyed pa dpodzin yod grub pa dri me ni rje'i phyag dang phyag na pa 'i lar mo cin//yan lag tha ldan sgra rnams blo zhing kyang lag 'dzam la meHsa
101b1(rgyud): na shin tu bzang mo'o//cung zad phra ba dang ldan ring zhing mig ni g.yo ba med la skra ni 'khyog pa pad+mA tsun//ngo tsha med cing 'dod pa drag la rtsod mngal dgu' sgra ni shin tu chung ba dang can ma/
101b2(rgyud): ring zhing ldan lag thams cad rdzogs la dris par yang ba'i yul dang sgra ni ring ba sna tshogs ma//sbom zhing thung la yan lag shin tu sra bA'i yul dang sgra ni sgom pa glang chen mo/pi nya ma rnam
101b3(rgyud): dadrag pa'i rigs ni 'ga' zhig dag tu 'drir 'gyur dus kun du ni 'dres pa'i rigs//seng ge drag kyang 'brog na gnas shing yul dang rnam bral 'jigs pa med la gtong pa'i ngang tshul can///
101b4(rgyud): ri dgas mgyogs 'gro dang ldan 'gyur zhing yang ba'i yul dang skrag pa'i sems te shin tu 'jigs pa'o//rta ni nges par 'dod la srid par 'gyur te gzhan dbang gcin gyi dri dang gzhan dron
101b5(rgyud): gnyer ba'o//khyu mchog rings pa'i mig dang dman par 'gro ldan rang bzhin ston blun po nya yi dri ru 'gyur//glang chen 'dod ldan nges par dal bar 'gro bar 'gyur te rul pa'i dri dang shin
101b6(rgyud): tu rmongs pa'o//sum cu rtsa drug dbye bas phye ba sa yi steng gi gnasu rigs kyi dri yI rang bzhin no//mchod pa'i don du 'dod pa'i bstan bcos ston meng po'i gnas ni rnal 'byor pa yis
101b7(rgyud): rig par bya//shin tu dga' ba byos kyang rnal 'byor pa la rnal 'byor ma yis mchi ma dngos grub sbyin mi 'gyur//mdzes ma lha mo dang ni sha za mo dang mi mo dang ni srin mo klu mo dag tu
102a1(rgyud): 'gyur//mdzes ma dpalnga ldan chos kyi dbyings su 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis lha mo/la rdo rjem/shu za mo na dra ya rdo rjer 'gyur te mi mo dag kyang gzugs kyi rdo rje
102a2(rgyud): ma yi dbang //gdugs pa srin mo gang yin de ni nges par r-i yi rdo rje rmA mo reg bya rdo rje ma//mdzes mya sems can byin pa byed ma brtul zhugs deswa pA la dga' sdom dang bsam gtan
102a3(rgyud): nga tshul can//lha mo longs spyod lnga ni rjes chags 'gyur te dri mI ldan zhing lhag myi la chags sha za mo//mi mo 'dod la rjesu chags ma srin mo mri yi khrag la dga' zhing gsod pa'i
102a4(rgyud): sems ma ste//klu mo dag kyang 'o ma'i zas can rab mchog sa yi steng du rnal 'byor pa yis mchod par bya//de bzhin gzhan du rang bzhin rnams ni rang bzhin ston dbang gis rnal 'byor
102a5(rgyud): pa yis rig par bya//swa yi steng gi gnas mkha' spyod sa spyod rnams ni sum cu rtsa drug dbye bas phye bas phye ba'o//chang ni shes rab rang bzhin sbrang rtsi dang bcas bu ram las skyes
102a6(rgyud): 'bras las skyes sam shing skyes te//phyag rgya dang bral gang zhig 'thung byed ni yul can du 'gyur bdud kyi tshogs kyis bskor ba'o//de phyir shes rab lhag ldan sdig pa'i dri mo 'phrog
102a7(rgyud): cing sngags po rnams la dngos grub sbyin par 'gyur//phyag rgya gang su rung ba 'dir ni dam tshig rnam par bral ba btung ba'i ska du rab tu bya//rgyal po ri bong mtshan ma gcig pu zad
102b1(rgyud): dus su bstan pa 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'brog byed na//shes rab chos 'byung la gnas nyin mor byed pa dang bcas rnal 'byor ldan pa dag ni smos ci dgos//mi bskyod don yod grub pa rgyal ba
102b2(rgyud): mchog bcas khyi dang rta dang ba lang glang po dang ldan pa//nyon mongs rnams kyi rdo rje dbyug pa phyugs kyi skye bo 'jigs sbyin brgyad pa gzhan ni shin tu drag/khyi rta ba lang glang po lug dang ro dang ri
102b3(rgyud): drags bong bu phog dang rnga mo 'di dag phyogs//kuM b+hI ra dang 'gron bu ku li ra dang nya dang ma ka ra dang sbal pa ru spel dung //bse ru stag dang do ma dang ne'u la bac+doMs 'bri dang lce spyang dang ni sram dang
102b4(rgyud): byi la dang //'brog dgon khyi dang sing+gi dang bcas nor dang bcu ste 'di ni 'byung po skyes dang khra bo skyes//gaud+hA byi ba shA li d+hI ta spre'u dang ni ri bong gzungs mo i shu rtsangs pa brgyad//khengs ldan
102b5(rgyud): 'dab chags dang na ni tse khu byug dag dang ri skyegs rab tu gsal bar chu y-i gter//lA ba phug rlon gzhan ni bye dkar zhes bya tsa Ta ka dang ngur pa dang ni rang pa dang //dpral ldan khrung khrung khu
102b6(rgyud): byug mig dang ra dza ka dang b+ha ga ba trIta tirI dang bzhad//chu la 'jug pa dadung ni chu skyar ro dang bcas pa'i noraR+Ya rnamasr-i rim pa ya sau nI rig par bya//bya rog bya rgod 'ug pa ri dwags dgra dang gtsug
102b7(rgyud): bud can dang bya gag b+hi dra g+hA ra dang //hor pa ldan shing dgra ni gzhan te bcu po khro bo las skyes khro bo yi ni rig su 'gyur//mag sngon dang ldan tsa kor dang a ni la dang gu da mu kha bug gi
103a1(rgyud): twa skaM ny+dza la//b+hai ru NA dang aM ba ri ka brgyad pa martog gyi bdab chagasu 'gyur mi yi bdag po kye//sum cu rna drug rigs kyi dbye bas sa yi srid pa la gnas swa skyong mkha' la
103a2(rgyud): spyo rnams kyis//rigasu gyur pa'i dam tshig mtha' dag rnams ni mchod pa'i dus su rnal 'byor pa yis bza' bar bya//rmongs pas gti mug dag lngas gal te spangs nu mi yi bdag po
103a3(rgyud): myur du nyams par rab tu 'gyur//sngo dang sgra dang lpags pa la sogs sha bcas chu rgyus dang bcas rus pa snying dong pad+ma dang //shig dang ba spu srin bu dag dang rab mchog mi yi bad
103a4(rgyud): po glo ba sgyu ma chu so dang //bad kan mkhris pa chu dang rnag dang sna tshogs lus la gnas pa khrag dang rdul dang tshil bu dang //mchi ma dag dang mchil ma snabs dang dri chu chu ser zhag
103a5(rgyud): dang kha dog dri dang bshad pa dang //lce dang mig dang rna ba sna dang ri bong can bcas nyin byed rnams kyi lha rnams mchod par bya//sum cu rtsa drug yi ge rnams ni rang bzhin ston da
103a6(rgyud): gis byang chub phyogs kyi chos rnams kyang //sum cu rtsa drug khams kyi dbye ba mtha' dag lus la gnas pa'i rigs dang mtshon ma phyag rgya dang //sum cu rtsa drug rnal 'byong rgyud ni
103a7(rgyud): sa gzhi dag lo gnas rnams 'dir ni rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi//chu dang mchod yon dri dang spos dang me tog dang ni 'bras bu ma nyams pa dang mar me dang //lha ba shes dag dang 'dir//
103b1(rgyud): ni na bzar 'gyur te bcu po rnams ni 'khor lo 'dus pa dag la yang //khu ba gcin drang rkang dang bshang bdag dang sha dang mchin pa dgu dang ma bris pa khrag dang ni//sgyu ma lpags pa rnams
103b2(rgyud): ni rgyal po rnam pa bcu ru 'gyur te 'khor lo 'dus pa dag la yang //rdo rje dang ni ral gri mda' dang pad+ma mdab ma brgya pa lnga pa 'khor lo'i mtshan ma ste//rgyud mangs dang ni me long snod 'gyur//
103b3(rgyud): tA mi yi bdag po me tog phreng ba dag dang gos//drug pa chos 'byung nges par lag pa'i mthil du 'gyur te sgra yi rdo rje la sogs mtshan ma'o//de bzhin gri gugs la sogs bum pa
103b4(rgyud): zhus dang de bzhin du ni bcu ga zlar gos ni ser po dang //khab bam yong na tho ba rab tu gsal zhing nges pa dag tu nya yi rgyu dang rtse gsum ste//dpal mo'i mtshan ma brgyud pa rdo bar 'gyur te
103b5(rgyud): mi yi bdag po 'byung po las skyes rnams kyi'o//rmugs byed la sogs rnams kyi dmar snod nyin mor byed pa dang mtshungs dar gyi srin bu ku sha dang //chu gri dang ni mthil lham dgo dang spa
103b6(rgyud): gri zhes bya de bzhin shing lham dag dang gdugs dang ni//rtog rtse dang ni 'od ma'i dbyug pa khro skyes rnams kyi rang gi mtshan ma bcu ru rab tu 'gyur//ba lang ra dang kham phor rgyud ldan
103b7(rgyud): 'phangs dang sha yi gsal shing lag pa'i mthil du 'gyur ba ste//rgyud mangs nye ba'i yan log dang ni mda' dang gtsug pud can gyi mjug ma 'dir ni brgyad par 'gyur//sum cu
104a1(rgyud): drug mtshan ma'i dbye ba rab mchog sa yi steng du rnal 'byor pA yis mchod par bya//slar yang dmangs rigs la stsogs mtshan mur 'gyur te yon dbang gi ut+pal 'am/
104a2(rgyud): /shol li//rgyal rigs ma yi rin chen dang dbyangs su 'gyur mo yi bdag po smug gu rin cheni phreng ba ni//rje rigs ma yi de bzhin du ste de bzhin chu ni rgyu ba dang bcas zas
104a3(rgyud): snong gnyis skyes ma//yum gyi mtshan ma rnams po bzhi swa Da mai ru dang rnga chen cad pa ni nyod dang bgrang drongango //bai shang ba gci ba dang ni khra ga dang sha dang btsos pa lha mo rnams ni
104a4(rgyud): bani par 'gyur ba skye//rna ba sna dang mig dang lce dang bshang lam dang ni b+ha ga stA yI rdo rje la sogs drug/rnag dang bad kan dang ni shig dang srin bu chu ser zhag dang ba spu sgra dang brgyad
104a5(rgyud): yang //sgyu mo mkhris po rus pi sA pa rkeng dang sna tshogs lus la gnas pa mchin pa dang ni glo ba dang //rtsa dang lpags pa rnams dang snying dang tshol bu ldan pa drag ni bcu ru 'gyor
104a6(rgyud): mye yi dbang //rna ba dang ni sna dang mig dang kha dang bshang lam dbus dang byug dag dang mtshan khung sogs//lus kyi yan leg brgyad la gnas pa'i dri ma mi yi bdag pa min
104a7(rgyud): mo rnams brgya du 'gyur//sen mo dang bcas so dang yan lag bcu gnyis thod pa rnal 'byor ma rnams brgyad pa brgyad du 'gyur//bshang ba gcib khrag dang shan sna tshogs
104b1(rgyud): lus la gnas pa gnas kyi dbye ba dag la bzhi//rna ba sna dang mig dang lce dang bshang lam dag dang b+ha ga'i zhing gi dbye ba la yang drug/rnag la sogs pa skra yi bar ni sa yi steng gi gnasu chan
104b2(rgyud): do ha yi dbye ba brgyad//sgyu ma la sogs tshil gyi bar ni phyogs zhes bya ba mi bdag 'dus pa'i rab tu dbye ba rnams//rna ba la sogs yan lag brgyad kyi lus la nges par rnam mang dom
104b3(rgyud): dur khrod rab dbye rnams//dus me zla ba nyi ma sgra gcan rab tu gsal zhing nges par gnas kyi dbye ba dag la bzhi//sa skyes zla skyes sngags pa pa sangs spun pa gdengs can rnams ni zhing gi/
104b4(rgyud): dbye ba la yang drug/sa dang chu dang me dang rlung rnams dang ni sa skyes chu skyes rlung las skyes pa dog/brgyad ni tshan do hi yo byebye ba rnams te slar yang de bzhin ro drug dri dang kha dog dang //rag
104b5(rgyud): d+yo sgra ni de bzhin nyi du rab tu gsal bar 'dus pa bcu yi rab tu dbye ba rnams//sa dong chu dang me dang rlung ni zad pa dag kyang mdun dang g.yon dang g.yas dang rgyob tu ste//kha dog la soDa/
104b6(rgyud): bzhi po rnams ni phyogs bral dag tu thim pa dur khrod brgyad kyi dbye ba rnams//gnas ni sgro la mA la sogs khyim ste gsal bar sgra yi rdo rje la sogs de bzhin zhing du brjod//tshan do hA
104b7(rgyud): ni tsartsi ka la sogs par rab tu 'gyur te mi bdag 'dus pa rmugs byed sogs//dur khrod khyi gdong ma la sogs pa mchog gi sar gnas rtsa ba'i gnas dang gsang bar bcas pa ni/
105a1(rgyud): /yum gyi khyim rnams gnyis te de dag rab tu gsal bur sa la mthar skyes ma dang mthar skyes ma//gnas ni bud med gsang ba'i pad+ma rab 'gyur dam tshig dag la rdo rje nyid ni nye/
105a2(rgyud): ba'i gnas//zhing dang chen do hA dang 'dus pa dag dang dur khrod sa gzhi de bzhin de lta ro mtha' dag go/gnas ni g.yon gyi yan lag dag dang mdun te gzhan dang de bzhin g.yas pa dag
105a3(rgyud): kyang nye ba'i gnas//de ltar zhing la sogs pa thams cad lag pa rkang pa la gnas sor mo'i mtha' yi mtshams su'o//dran pa nye bar gzhug pa rnams kyang lha mo chu gter du 'gyur
105a4(rgyud): dus kyi 'khor lor rab tu grags//shes rab byang chub yan lag yum ste gzhan pa dag kyang sgra yi rdo rje ma la sogs pa drug/chu gter yang dag spong ba rnams dang gzhan pa chu
105a5(rgyud): gter rdzu 'phrul rkang pa rnams te brgyad du 'gyur//khro bo lnga ni stobs rnams dag ste rab tu gsal zhing nges par dbang po rnams ni lnga nyid//yang dag yan lag brgyad kyi
105a6(rgyud): lam ni mi yi bdag po lce min dag lus skyes pa brgyad du 'gyur//sum nu d+hU bdun rab tu dbye bas srid pa gsum gyi gnas su byang chub phyogs kyi chos rnams te//de dag
105a7(rgyud): mtha' dag rnal 'byor ma rnams sa yi stong gi gnas su rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya//de ltar gnas la sogs pa thams cad mi yi bdag po phyi dang lus la yang ni
105b1(rgyud): de bzhin 'gyur//sangs rgyas pa dang zhi ba 'am gcer bu skal ldan zhes dang de bzhin gcing gnas bram ze'am//thod pa can dang skra 'bal dang ni gos dkar dag dang zhing skyong rigs can dang ni thub
105b2(rgyud): pa dang //smyon pa'i gzugs can dag dang sdig pa med pa'i sems ldan mkhas pa dang ni grwa pa nyid 'gyur te//rnal 'byor pa ni dngos grub don slad mtha' dag stan gter te de nyid thob pa mi yi
105b3(rgyud): dbang //mthe bong dag ni mdzub mo dag dang slar yang de bzhin du ni gung mo dang ni ming med dang //dri yi mthar ni nges par mthe'u chung mtha' dag ston gter du rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya//phyag
105b4(rgyud): rgya'i don du ming gi dbye bar 'gyur te snron dbang gis sdor mo rnams kyi rim paso//bcing ba brjod na rdo rje bcing bar 'gyur te nges par khu tshur bcing ba la yang de bzhin no//khu tshur baR+Ya yau steng
105b5(rgyud): du rdo rje gdan la gnos pa rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rdo rje'i phyag rgyar 'gyur//skyil krung la ni lag pa g.yon par 'gyur te g.yas pa pus mo'i phyogs nas sa la son gyur pa//sa la reg
105b6(rgyud): pa mi bskyod phyag rgya slar yang lag pa g.yas pa mchog sbyin phyag na rin chen gyis//g.yon gyi steng du lag pa g.yas pa gan+d+ha rgyal mnyam por gnas pa phyag na pad+ma dag gir 'gyur//
105b7(rgyud): g.yon po skyil krung steng du gzhan pa lag pa'i mthil ni 'jigs pa med pa phyag na ral gri yi//g.yas kyi khu tshur g.yas mnal ste nges par slar yang gzhan bya mi dzub mo khu tshur
106a1(rgyud): pa la//gsal ngar snying khar son pa rnam par snang mdzad phyag rgya gzhan pa chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya ni//mdzub mo mthe bong sbyar ba gdub du bzhin du gyur pa dang ni gung mo
106a2(rgyud): la sogs brkyang ba'o//lag pa g.yon la shin tu gang dri'i dri medar bod 'dzin pa grayas la rdo rje nyi ma ste//nyi ma zlang sbyar ba la gnas 'jogs byed rdo rje khro bo lus skyes rtse mo lbu pa ni
106a3(rgyud): bsgoms nas yan lag la ni reg bya cod pan dang bcas mgo nas brtsams te rkang pa'i mtha' nyid du'o//'di ni rgyal po dus kyi 'khor lo'i dpal ldan mchog gi phyag rgya sdig pa'i dri ma
106a4(rgyud): 'phrog pa'o//gang zhig cung zad bzung bar bya ba'i dngos po sa skyes chu skyes mngal skyes drod gsher skyes sogs dang //bza' ba btung ba brtson 'grus dang bcas bla ma dang ni zhabs ngag la
106a5(rgyud): yang phyag rgyas reg par bya//grang gdu bya ba nyi ba sbyong bar 'gyur ba yon dbang gis de la de ni sbyar bar bya//sa la sogs la dkyil 'khor don drang rkang pa bgrod pa la yang rnal 'byor pa yis
106a6(rgyud): brgyun par bya//lag pa dag gis rdo rje bcings pa yasi ni nges par khro bo'i mgon po chen po'i phyag rgyar 'gyur//mdzub me thog mtha' bcings shing khu chur bcings pas gtso bo srid
106a7(rgyud): pa gsum las rnam par rgyal ba yi//mtshan ma'i rnam pa dag kyang lhag ma rnams te rab gsal nges par lha dang lha mo rnams kyi'o//lag pa dag gis rdo rje bcings la g.yo bI
106b1(rgyud): gledangs kwa'i rnam pa gdengs can rnams kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur//mthe dong drag dang mthe'u chung d+hA rab pad+ma'i mdad ma dang mtshungs grung mo dag ni brlu ba dang //mdzub mo gnyis ni zla du phyed pa
106b2(rgyud): niming med 'og tu bskum pa rang gi lag mthil son gyur pa//phyag rgya 'drin rdo rje can d+hi rdo rje rtse mo lnga par 'gyur te bstan par bya ba'o//rtsibs kyi rnam pa so ma rnams te lag pa gi nyis ga'i
106b3(rgyud): mthil du mthe bong la sogs mtha' dag rnams//lag pa gnyis ni rdo do te rdo rje khu chu re dag gis dril bur dracas//khu tshur phyed pa mdzub mo dang ni gung mo mda' dang mtshungs pa
106b4(rgyud): dag kyang ral gri rnon por 'gyur//mdzub mo la sogs rtse gsum slar yang bkram pa dag ste khu tshur phyed pa yis ni rtse gsum la//dpal ldan gri gug kha tshur bcings shing dang ldan
106b5(rgyud): mthe chung zla ba phyed pa 'jigs pa byed par 'gyur//rna ba'i steng du khu tshur bcings shing mthe bong krung mo'i steng du 'gyu rI te mda' yi mchog lnga'o//khru tshur bcings shing mdzub mo shin
106b6(rgyud): tu lo byag par 'gyuraro ming bdag de bzhin nyid lcags kyu la'o//rtsa bar mdzub mo ming med du 'gyur mda' dang mtshungs pa'i steng du bung mo yang ni mdung la ste//thad kar khu tshur dbyug pa
106b7(rgyud): la'o lag mthil shin tu mnyam la mthe bong brkyang ba dgra sta la//steng du khu tshur gnyis dang mdzub mor 'gyur te lha min bdag po glang chen lpags pa dag la'o//mche ba la ni lag
107a1(rgyud): pa gnyis ka'i mthil du khu rgyur bcings shing mthe'u chung zla ba phyed pa'o//khe Ta ka la dpung pa g.yon pa rab tu brkyang zhing lag pa'i mthil ni steng du ston par 'gyur/
107a2(rgyud): kha T+wAM ga la khu tshur bug par 'gyur te nges pa nyi du phrag par mthe'u chung ngarkyang ba'o//sor mo bug pa med pa'i lag pa pad mdab lta bu steng du byas pa dpal ldan thod pa la//gzhul
107a3(rgyud): lagrI pa gan rgyal khu tshur du 'gyur nges par dpung pa g.yon pa rab tu brkyang ba'o//gung mo dag ni mdzub mo 'khyog po kun tu brten par 'gyur te nges par rdo rje zhags pa la//rin chen
107a4(rgyud): la ni sbyar ba'i sor mnga'i gyur tI mi bdag de dag rnam par bye ba pad+ma la//chun rgyu ba lce ni mdzub mi mthe bong sbyar bar 'gyur tI mthe bo'i 'og tu khu tshur ro//me long la ni shin tu mnyam
107a5(rgyud): pa'i log mthil sor mo bug med dang bcas mngon du phyogs par 'gyur//mthe bong la ni mdzub mo la sogs steng du 'khyog po rim par yongs su bkod pa lcags sgrog lnga'o//
107a6(rgyud): mgo bo la ni mthe bong la sogs bzhi po gdong dang mtshungs shing 'og tu mthe'u chung bskum pa'o//cod pan la ni lag pa dag gis dung gi phyag rgya mdzub mo gnyis po sbyar ba nyid du 'gyur//
107a7(rgyud): lag mthil dag gi rgyab tu sor mo lnga po rnams ni gcig tu sbyar ba dag kyang rna rgyan la//lag pa'i rgyab tu sor mo rnams ni rim par yongs su bkod cing bcings pa mogul po'i rgyan
107b1(rgyud): la ste//lag pa gnyis ka'i sor mo gsum ni phan tshun sbyar cing thog mtha' bskum pa dag ni ske rags la//khu tshur bcings nas mthe bong dag dang bung mo gnyis po zlum skor lta bur byas pa
107b2(rgyud): rkang gdub la//de bzhin du ni dpung rgyan zung dang gdub bu lo yang mdzu mo phan tshun sbyar ba dag tu 'gyur//mthe bong mkha' 'gro ma rnams dag gis mchog gi rig su 'gyur te mdzub mo
107b3(rgyud): gsang ba pA rnams kyi//dri za rnams dang gdengs can rnams kyi gung mo ming med dag ni rim pa yongs su bkod pa'o//'byung po rnams kyi dpal ldan mthe'u chung rab mchog lag pa'i
107b4(rgyud): mthil ni srin po rnams kyi rigasu 'gyur//grub pa rnams kyi khu tshur bcings pa mchog gi rigs te tshogs kyi mtshams ni lha rnams dag gi'o//lag pa gnyis kA'i mthil du sor mo
107b5(rgyud): lnga po phyed 'khyog rigs kyi phyag rgya sder mo can rnams kyi//khu tshur bcings las mdzub mo gnyis po phyed 'khyog nges par mgo bor son pa rA can rnams kyi'o//mi mnyam lag pa'i
107b6(rgyud): mthil la mtho chung phan tshun bcings shing bshog pa sbyar ba sgong skyes rnams kyi ste//sor mo lnga po rtse mo 'khyog pa gdengs can rnams kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya khyad par 'phags par
107b7(rgyud): 'gyur//nyin zhag so so'i gtor ma la ni midzub mo'i mtha' rnams rab brkyang gzhan la 'og tu sbyar byas pa//'bar ba dag la mthe bong sbyar te mchog gau la go mthil dag gi mdzub ma
108a1(rgyud): brgyud ba gzhan pa'o//mdzub mo bstan na legs par 'ongs sam dag kyang nges par brjod par 'gyur te rnal 'byor pa la yang //gnyis kyis shin tu logs par 'ongs//
108a2(rgyud): dang ska la bzang dge ba mthe bong bcings pas rab tu brjod par 'gyur//ser mo'i se gol rdebs pa khyod ni 'di ru sngags pa mchog ces par ni brjod par 'gyur ba ste//mthe bong dang
108a3(rgyud): ni ming med dag gis dam tshig bcas pa'i chang gis khyed ni tshim par byed pa'o//sor mo thams cad rtse mo brkyang pas skal bzang legs par 'ongs pa brjod 'gyur rnal 'byor pa la
108a4(rgyud): yang g.yon gyi yan lag reg pas rtag tu khyod ni bdag gri gnyen gcig pu dag rab tu gsal bar byed//skye gnas dag la reg pas gtso bo mchu dang nu ma zung dang nges par sen
108a5(rgyud): mo 'debs pas kyang //sor mo sor mo phan tshun bcings shing gung mo dang ni mthe bong brkyang pas dam tshig brjod par byed pa yin//mchu dang smin ma mig dag yo zhing mgo la/
108a6(rgyud): 'khrub par byed na shin tu rmongs pa brjod par byeng //mche ba'i dbusta su mthe chung dang nAM snying kha kha ru mdzub mo 'jigs pa rab tu gsal bar byed//mthe bong khu tshur bcings pa
108a7(rgyud): dang ni lag po rkang pa sa la rdabs na nga yis bza' bar bya//lce la reg na zos pa dang ni lha dang so dang bsnun pa dag gis ma zas pa nyid//log pa'i rgyab kyis song cig nges par
108b1(rgyud): rab tu brjod mngon du phyogs pas 'dug gcig 'dug gcig go//byin pa brlal nyid na skal bzang khyod ni de ring kho na ngal so nges par brjod par byed//rkang pa rab tu skyong bas gnyid dang pus
108b2(rgyud): mo zung dge skyong ba bdag la bdag la shin tu dga' ba gyis//yan lag kun la reg par byed cing kha ru lag pa gnas pa bdag la 'dus pa med pa'o//phan tshun lag pa bcings pas bdag
108b3(rgyud): gi khyim du de ring 'khor lo 'dus pa dag ni brjod par byed//mthe bong ming med rtse mo dag gis rnam mang dam tshig rnams kyis ji ltar 'dod par mchod par bya//rkang pa la ni 'khrug par byed
108b4(rgyud): na de bzhin du ni phyi rol 'dus pa dag la 'gro ba yang //mdzub mo phan tshun bcings na rdo rje'i grogs po khyod ni dri ring 'jigs pa 'phrog par byed pa'o//sgra ni rang gi so yis gcod na mi yo
108b5(rgyud): phyugs khyod 'dir ni ltung bar bya ba brjod par byed//sa ni phan tshun 'da' bar byed na khyod kyi sha ni 'di dag bdag gis di ring bza' bar bya//lce mchu g.yo bar byed na khyed kyis lus las khrag
108b6(rgyud): ni btung bar byo'o dris par brjod par byed//mchu la so ni 'dri bas par byed ni khyod kyi sgyu ma lci bar gnas 'di bdag gis bza' ba bya//sgegro pa'i sbyor ba yis ni sgog par 'gyur te mi yi
108b7(rgyud): bdag po bzhod pa'i sbyor bas bzhad pa'o//gar gyi skyer ba yis ni gar du 'gyur te rnam pa mang po'i rol mo'i sbyor bas rol mo'o//glu yi sbyor ba yis ni glu ste mchog gi ston rnam mang
109a1(rgyud): tshal na ngam mthas bamatshams samathams mthamasamamam thasamasam mamala' malan mal tham mamam
109a2(rgyud): dI y-i sbyor ba dag gi sna dri//phreng ba'i sbyor ba yis ni phreng bar 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis spros kyi sbyor ba dag gis spros//mar me'i rnam pas mar me nges par mun pa
109a3(rgyud): bcom pa dang ni snod kyi phyag rgya bdud rtsir 'gyur//zhes pa de ltar phyag rgya thams cing slar yang de nasA lnga yi dbya bso rnam par phye ba ste//gzhan pa phyag rgya mtha' yas rnams kyang mtha'
109a4(rgyud): drag lus la gnas pa rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya//gang gang dngos po'i rang bzhin du 'gyur sa yi steng du de yi rang bzhin dag kyang phyag rgya rnams//pho nya mo ni phreng la blta bas khyod
109a5(rgyud): ni gang zhig nas 'ongs skal+la bzang la brjod par byed//mgo bor lag bzhag de yi phyogs su nges par bltas pa rnal 'byor pa yos lon ni smras par 'gyur//steng du blta bas
109a6(rgyud): khyod ni dge 'am sa yi steng du gnas pas khyod ni 'dug la ngal so cig/yon por lta bos khyod song chags pa'i lta bas pho nya mo ni shin tu dga' ba brjod par byed//zhi ba'i lta byas/
109a7(rgyud): bdag gi grogs po khA ge nyer khro bo'i lta bas 'jigs pa rab tu gsal bar byed//sgra la lta bas bdag ni ma rungs par brjod skal bzang la ni rang gi rang bzhin zur gyiso//mdzod
109a8(rgyud): spur lta bas bdag mchog rnal 'byor ma ni sna la lta bas ston rab tu gsal por byed//mchul lta bas skal pa bzang ste nu ma zung la lta na bdag ni phyag rgya bzang mor brjod//
109b1(rgyud): khang lta bas bsgoms pa'i bdag nyid lag ba zung la spyan bdag ba tu gtu song god//phrag pa sgru bas bdag ni dus mas na mo dang bcas lag pa'i mthil la ldan srin ma/
109b2(rgyud): chub tu ldan lag 'gam s+t+rai m+b+ha ba swA sa maM yi dbang po dag ni dematshig can//gsang bye b+hU sa ba dag ni dag pa ba 'i bsgru bas bdag ni shin tu dga' la gdul ba /9/
109b3(rgyud): snro l-I byas bdag ni grub pa nges par brjod byang rkang par lta bas rdzu 'phrul sbyin pa mo//rkang pa'i min bong nges par ldan bdag ni srid par rdo rje'i sku ste dpa' mo gcig pu dang //sang po kun
109b4(rgyud): gyirtse mo sgru bas srid po gsum g+hi gnas sa kun tu 'gros sna tshogs sdom//pa nya mi rnams lha stang sa nyid ni su mo steng gloganas rdul byo las rig par bya//drug lus
109b5(rgyud): nang nas lhag pa rkang pA lus dag gon yan ldeg mchog kyang sbyin pa ste//las kyi dbang po rnams rdzi ngag dang dbang po rnams kyi nang ni yi na dang po nas yid dag kyang //khams kyi cha shes
109b6(rgyud): khams kyi nang na rkang gnyis pa dang phyugs kyi tshogs kyi de nyid tshe mas gzhan//mchog gi phyag d+herjesu rig pa slob dpon la ni rashA tu phul nA dad pa'i gnas 'gro/sems can gang
109b7(rgyud): ngas rnam gsum srid par gnas rnams 'jog rten khams las ye shes rdo rje lcags kyu laso//bkrig snyed dge mthe'i dag mchog gi snying rje dkyila'i khor du na sangs rgya rnam
110a1(rgyud): dang rdo rje yi//bdud rtsi mngon par dbang bsgyur nas ni dri med bang can lus rdo rje can gyisku lam thob pa//dri ma rnam par bral zhing byang chub spyod la rjesu gnas rnams
110a2(rgyud): rang gi gan su btang bar bya//rdzas rnams med pa'i mngon par dbang bskur rgyal ba'i bdag po'i bka' yis kun spangs la ni sbyin par bya//de bzhin du ba lo sogs lam dang mtha'
110a3(rgyud): drag ston gter ni rtsa yi rnal 'byor ldan pa ste//bsten pa'i don du lag pa'i phyag rgya rang gi snying gi dbang son skyon rnams kun los rnam par grol//gzhan rnams la ni rgyal ba mchog
110a4(rgyud): gi snying po yum gyi mchod pa rnams dman sbyin pa nyid mi bya//dbang gi mthar na dpal ldan bum pa rnams kyi 'jam zhing lus la bad ster stod kor ges zung dag/dpal ldan rna myong
110a5(rgyud): ma rnams dag la sbyin bya gzhan yang de bzhin stod kor dang ni gos zung dag/sgo na gnas pa rnams la rab sbyin mtha' dag ston rigs la bdag nyid nus pas de bzhin gzhan//mthu/
110a6(rgyud): ni sbyin sreg byas nos rlung gi snying khi'i pad+mar ye shes sems dpa' rab tu gzhug bya ste//'jig rten pa rnams rang gi gnasu mtha' dag rdul chen dag kyang dag pa'i klung la spyan
110a7(rgyud): drang bya//tA~M bu la dang dri spos me tog 'bras bur bcas dang ras yug dag ni gzhon nu ma rnams la//byin nas slob dpon slob mar bcas pas mtha' dag tshogs kyi rigs ni
110b1(rgyud): lhor 'dod par mchod byan te//slob ma la ni gnang ba rab byin rab mchog tshogs kyi rigs ni rang rang gnas su gsheg pu gsol//dgra dang seng ge glang chen dbang po me dang lto 'phyo'i ba /
110b2(rgyud): mA rkun zhags pa sgo'i ching ba dang //chu ga ter la khrugs pa dang nu sha za 'che ba'i 'jigs byed nad dang dbang po'i nye bar 'tshe ba dang //dbul dang bud med bral dang me bdag 'khrugs
110b3(rgyud): pa'i 'jigs pa dang ni rdo rje snang dang don nyams pa//gang zhig rnal 'byor ma rnams zhabs ni nyin 'ogaso se dran byed la rab tu nyams par 'gyur//dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas chen
110b4(rgyud): las phyung ba'i dpal dus kyi'i khar la las//mngon par dbang bsku rA bi rI li'u ste gsum pa'o//rgyal ba bskyed mdzad bdag gis dbang bsgyur bdun po rnams dang bum pa
110b5(rgyud): dang ni gsang ba'i dbang dag dang //shes rab ye shes dbang bskur srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa rnal 'byor dag gis bgrang bya bzhi po thob//slar yang rgyal ba mchog dang bcas
110b6(rgyud): pasna tshogs gtso pA'i sgrub thabs yang dag par ni bdag zhi'o//zla ba bzang ste mig gas na nas ni rgyal ba'i bdag pas rdo rje can dag gi yang sgrub thabs gsungs//zla ba'i sgra dang /
110b7(rgyud): zung gi zhabs te me ye mgrin pa chu ga tar dpal ldan nas ni sna tshogs mdog/phrag pa drug dang nyi ma'i dpung pa rgyam pa'i phyag gi pad+ma stong pa drug dang mo yi tshogs//zhabs de//
111a1(rgyud): gis ni zla ba nyi ma slob dzA dIkyil 'khor dag lta bdud dang drag po smug bzhin pa//rol pas mnan pa'i srid med srid pa mAny+tsam pA dus kyi 'khor lo gcig phung
111a2(rgyud): ni bsgrub par bya//bskyed mos tshal la ma ri bo dang ni rgyal ba mchog gi gnas dang lha yi gnas nI stong pa dang //grub pa'i gnas dang dur khrod dang ni mtsho dang bzang po'i gnas dang
111a3(rgyud): de bzhin nyi du spros pa'i ste//gang du sems ni rab tu tshim par 'gyur ba der ni bsgrub par bya'o mi yi bdag po ste//nges par 'jam pa'i mal stan dag dang gdan la nye bar 'dug nas/
111a4(rgyud): sdesdang brjod srung ba byas nas ni//dang por snying khar zla ba'i dbus su de nyid 'od zer sna chags rnams ni phyogs bcur bsgom par bya//kha la sogs pa dag pa byas nas slar yang na mkha' dge
111a5(rgyud): desmras po'i rgyal ba rnams la ni//mchod pa rnam pa sna tsho gos byas nas sdig pa nim pa mang po gsogs pa dag ni bshags byas te//sgrub pa po yis lus dang ngag deng sems rnams
111a6(rgyud): dag pa yis ni gsum la skyabasu 'gro ba bya//rdzogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang 'phags pa'i tshogs kyis rnam mang dge ba gang byas pa//de dag mtha' dag la ni sdi
111a7(rgyud): pa rnam bral byang chu spyod la rjesu gnas po rjes yi rang //sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun srid pa'i 'jigs 'phrog la yang byang chub bar du bdag ni skyabasu mchi//rdzogs sangs
111b1(rgyud): rgyu su bdag rgyung cogaces 'dodun smon lam sems can don gyi nga bdug bstod//stong pa dngos po'i ngo da'i rang bzhin 'gro mA ThAr dag 'di ni dngos po dag gis rnam par dman//de bas spangs rgya/
111b2(rgyud): byang chub med cing gzhan phran snying rje dag dang mtshan mi 'dam bci'i med pa ste//ma tha' dge de ltar shes nas de lta na yang mI yi bdag po sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni//dpag med ston dkyil la
111b3(rgyud): dbang po dkyil 'khor la ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bsgom par bya//chu yis me ni rnam par nyams pa dang por 'dir ni lus kyi dbus su sdom brtson dag gis bya//phyi nas 'dzin ma
111b4(rgyud): dag ni chu ru 'gyur te lan tshwa bzhin du chu yi dbus su rab tu zhugs//rlung ni chu bo de dag de skams nas na mkha' la ni snang ba min par myur du 'gro bar 'gyur//sems ni mAM dang mun pa'i mahA
111b5(rgyud): mu yul dang rnam par bral ba dbus kyi sa la bzhag par bya//stong pa rlung me chu dang sa dang lha yi ri bo chu skyes zla ba nyi ma me rnams ni//khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas dri med 'od zer 'phro ba 'am/
111b6(rgyud): ni rdo rje las skyes gur dag go/de yi dbus su rdo rje'i so la nor bu'i 'od zer tshogs kyis dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phro ba ste//oM yig ye shes las skyes rgyal ba mchog gI pad+ma zla ba dang /
111b7(rgyud): ni nyi ma dag gi gdan//phyi rol du ni gsung gi dkyil 'khor nor gyi pad+ma 'di ni zla ba nyi mas rnam par dman//phyi rol phyogs dang zur gyi char ni nyin mor byed pa'i pad+ma sgo yi da rus su
112a1(rgyud): /sha rta rnams//nyi ma'i sgo rnams su ni rgyal po nor bu gser gyi rang bzhin rta babs rnams dang dur khrod dang //skyeng por brgyad gnyis ka brdo rje'i rang bzhin shin tu longs
112a2(rgyud): spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo rgyal ba yi//zla ba nyi ma la yong a sogs ka sogs rdo rje dang bcas me long la sogs lnga rnams kyis//'od zer lnga rnams 'gyid par byed cing dri ma med pa'i
112a3(rgyud): 'phro dus kyi 'khor lo bsgom par bya//rdo rje'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i lus dang rgyal ba'i phyag gI pad+ma nyi ma'i dpung pa dus kyi zhal//mgrin pa gsum dang nyi ma'i spyan te rnam par rgyas
112a4(rgyud): 'al yang mche ba byed ni gtsigs pa'o//dpel ldan aM yig las skyes rgyal ba'i bdag po'i pad+ma zla ba nyi ma mo ya~M steng du ni//drag po lus med gnyis kyi snying khang rgyal ba'i da
112a5(rgyud): pre shin tu rol pa'i zhabs ni g.yas brkyang stabs//g.yas pa dmar po'i mchog gizhabs kyi 'og tu bdud sde dkar po g.yon par yang ni drag po'o//dbus dang g.yas dang g.yas
112a6(rgyud): men mgrin pa dag kyang byung ba nyi ma dang mtshungs zla ba dag gi mdog/'phrug pa sngon po dang ni dam dang ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar po glayas pa dang ni g.yon du yong //g.yas dang gas
112a7(rgyud): min dpung po gnyis gnyis dag ni gnag dang nyi ma'i lus dang zla ba'i mdog rnams te//de bzhi ni nges par mtshon cha dang bcas pa'i phyag rnams dag kyang brgyad gsum gyin
112b1(rgyud): so//phyag gi pad+ma ri bong can la tshogs gsum sor mo lnga po rnams ni kha dog lnga rnams 'phro//gnag dang dmar dang dkar po'i rab mchog phyag gi mthil du mtshon cha'i tshogs na yang dag
112b2(rgyud): gnas pa yang //rdo rje ral gri drag dang rtse gsum pA dang srid pa 'jigs byed glu gug+sa dang ni mi yi mda'//dri nas rdo rje lcags kyu nges par sgra drang bcas pA'i Da ma ru dang tho ba 'khor lo nyid//
112b3(rgyud): mdung dang dbyug pa dgra sta rnams ni rdo rje can gyi nyi me'i phyag gi pad+ma g.yas la'o//dril bu phub dang kha T+wAM ga nI rnam par rgyas pa'i kha dang khrag gi sdu gang ba'i thung pa dang //gzhu dang zhags
112b4(rgyud): parin chen prang+ga chun rgyu baM dag dang me l+r-ing dang ni lcags sgrogs dang //tshangs pa'i mgo bo pad+mas brgyan pa rig byed gdong ldan gang yin rgyal ba'i g.yon gyi phyag na'o//bdud dang drag
112b5(rgyud): lha mo dag ni zhabs kyi mthil la 'dzin cing gdong ni dman pa dag tu byed//gser mdog reg byed zhal ldan nor gyis phyag gis d+mas 'khyud pa dag ni sna tshogros yum yin te/g.yas
112b6(rgyud): ni gri gug lcags kyu nges par sgra dang bcas pa'i Da ma ru dang bgrang 'phreng rim paso//g.yon na thod pa zhags pa dang ni 'dab ma brgyad pa'i pad+ma mchog gri rin chen de bzhin nyid//g.yom
112b7(rgyud): brkyang nyi ma'i spyan dang rgyal ba'i bdag po'i cod pan phyag rgya rnams kyis rgya yis btab pa'o//mdab brgyad la ni lha mo brgyad rnams nor gyi phyag gi pad+ma rig byed zhal dang nyi ma'i sman//
113a1(rgyud): dri dag rnams las bzhi ni sbrul gyi rnga yab 'dzin te zung ngu rgyal ba 'i zhal gyis dbye bas//dbang ldan byedren bral drung ni tse mo can dang rlung gi zung du chos kyi drung dang gaN+DI
113a2(rgyud): dang /de bzhin yid bzhin nur bur 'gyur te nges pa de bzhin du ni de ge thosam shing du rim pasngo 'gyur//nan mo y-i ni dang po'i phyag gi mthi len sa kyi snod drung gnyis pa
113a3(rgyud): na bsil ba'i snod//dmar po sbyar ba gsum pa na ste myos byung dang bcas ri bong 'dzin pa g.yas kyi phyag bzhin//g.yon ni dril bu pad+ma lha yi shing gi me tog deng ni me tog phreng
113a4(rgyud): rim paso//dmar mo'i g.yas na mar me dro shal dag dang cod pan dang bcas gdub bu rnams te phyag g.yon na//gos dang ske rags dang ni dri ma med pa'i 'od zer 'phro ba'i rna rgyan
113a5(rgyud): dang ni rkang gdub po//ser mo'i g.yas kyi phyag na dung dang gling bu nor bu dang bcasA DA mA r+ya ni rim byas te//g.yon na rgyud mangs dang ni rnga dang sil sil rab tu sgrogs pa'i mkhar ba
113a6(rgyud): dag dang zangs dung ngo //'o mchu dang sman dang tshong dang bdud rtsi ro dang 'bras bu zan gyi snod ni dkar mo yi//phyogs kyi pad+mar chu gter sangs rgyas rnams ni nges par spyan dgu ma yi zhwa
113a7(rgyud): dang dus kyi phyag/zur du sgrol me l-i sogs lha mo rnams dang slar yang de dag mtshams brgyad du ni bum pa brgyad//lha dang lha mo gnag dang dmar dang ser ba dang ni ri bong 'dzin
113b1(rgyud): ts+tsha pa lta bur da//ra ba ste//nag po da// po zla ba'i steng du yang ni phyogs bral du gnas dmar po ser po nyi mu'i steng //mkha' snying la sogs rdzogs pa la ni phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas ran/
113b2(rgyud): bya rdo rje ma la sogs//shar dang phyogs gzhan gyi na ge yAs dang g.yas min pad+ma dag la kun tu bzang po de bzhin nyid//dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje ma dang chos kyi dbyings ni rim pas//rmugs
113b3(rgyud): byed rengs byed khengs byed dag ste shin tu stobs shes gang yin sgo skyod de ni shar du'o//shes rab phreng bar thabs ni ri bong 'dzin pa'i pad+ma lnga ste lha rnams kyi yong lha mo'o//gnyis pa dag
113b4(rgyud): no rang gi byog gi chu skyes rang rang mtshan mas mtshan ma dag gis phrin tshun 'khyud//mtshan ma gang zhig gang gi g.yas kyi dang po'i phyag mi thil na sta de yi phyag rgya chu skyes dman//shes
113b5(rgyud): rab thabs kyis 'khor lo mchog ge bde bar gnas pa pad+ma dang ni rdo rje'i gdan gyis bzhugs//nag po rnams kyi g.yas kyi phyag na ral gri gri gug dag drang srod pa'ajigs byed rtse gsum
113b6(rgyud): ste//g.yon pa'i phyag gi mthil du phub dang thod pa dag dang kha T+wAM ga ni da//rA po nyid 'gyur//mnga' dang rdo rje lcags kyu sgra dang bcas pa'i Da ma ru ni gra yas kyi phyag na rim pa yisi//gzhu
113b7(rgyud): dang zhags pa dag dang dri med 'phro ba'i nor bu dmar po rnams kyi g.yon na de bzhin nyid//ser po rnams kyi g.yas kyi phyag na 'khor lo dbyug pa dang ni 'jigs byed rdo rje rim pas te/
114a1(rgyud): gosngon du dpal ldan dung dang lcags sgrog dang na nges par sgra dang bcas pa'i rdo rje dral bur 'gyur//ri bong 'dzin pa lta bur da//ra ba rnams kyi gla mas na dpal ldan thob
114a2(rgyud): mdung dang rtse gsu pa ste//g.yon na pad+ma dkar po mdab ma brgya dang ldan pa dag dang me long dang ni bgrang phreng ngo //ljang ku rnams kyi g.yasu rdo rje gri gug dang ni dgra star rim pas rab tu
114a3(rgyud): 'gyur ba ste//g.yon du dril bu dang nr-i thod pa mtha' dag ston gter dang tshangs pa'i gdod pa de nyid//lha mo sngon mo rnams dag gi ni rang bzhin lhan dbang gis de bzhin du ni rig par bya//
114a4(rgyud): gnag dang dmar dang dkar dang mchog gi gser dang mtshungs pa shar gyi sA la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams//du ba la sogs lha mo brgyad po dor nas rgyal ba'i bdag po'i pad+ma dag la
114a5(rgyud): res 'ga' ni//dang ldan 'khor lo snying po'i dbus su mi yi bdag po nyi shu lnga yi bdag nyid du yang 'gyur//rang gi sems kyi nus pa shes nas bcom ldan 'di yang rnal 'byor
114a6(rgyud): pa rnams dag gis bsgom par bya//dbang gi don du dkyil 'khor dag ni rigs kyi dbang gis phyi yi dkyil 'khor rab tu dman par 'gyur//phyi rol du ni brgyad pa brgyad kyis pa
114a7(rgyud): 'dra ba brgyad po rnams la phyagaso brgyad lha ma rnams dang ni//tsartsi ka sogs rnal 'byor ma rnams zla ba nyi ma dang bral rig byed phyag dang spyan gsum ma//shar gyi pad+ma tsartsi ka
114b1(rgyud): ste mer ni mkha' 'gro'i bdag pos 'gro ma phag mo gdong drug ma//gshin rje bden bral zur dag tu ste chur bcas rlung ngu rdo rje lag dang chu gtor gdong ma'o//drag mo dpal mo byang dang dbang ldan
114b2(rgyud): duM skye mtshon cha dang bcas thabs kyi sku la 'khyud pa'o//brgyad pa brgyad kyi rnal 'byor ma gang pad+ma'i 'dab ma la gnas ga tsA mo'i kha dog zhal rnams so//shar la sogs par drang po'i phyag gi
114b3(rgyud): mthil na gri gug dang ni rtse gsum 'khor lo pi con dang //dbyug pa ral gri dang ni mdung mthung lcags kyu dag ni g.yas kyi phyag gi pad+ma zung la'o//rdo rje mda' dang pad+ma dang ni dri med glog mchung
114b4(rgyud): tshangs pa'i dbyug pa dag dang rtse gsum dang //sna tshogs rin chen gyis bcings sgra dang bcas pa'i Da ma ru dang pad+ma nyid dang bgrang phreng ste//g.yon na thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM ga dang pad+ma dung dang lU
114b5(rgyud): sgrog drag dang phub dang ni//nges par rin po che dang zhags pa sgra ni rab tu sgrogs pa'i rdo rje dril bu gzhu dag dang //spyi blugs snod dang kha T+wAM ga dang sbrul dang de nas chu las skyes dang rin po che nyid//
114b6(rgyud): /pad+ma nor bdab la ni brgyad pa brgyad kyi rnal 'byor ma yi phyag gi mtshon chad bzhin no//'jigs ma drag mo dus kyi nitsha ba me 'bar gdong ma rlung gi shugs ma dang ni rab go tum ma//drag
114b7(rgyud): spyan ma dang sna chen ma rnams tsa rtsi ka yi pad+ma nor 'dab la ni phyogs rnamasu//g.yang mo sgyu ma grags dpal rab mchog rnam par rgyal ma dpal ldan rgyal ma dpal ldan rgyal byed ma//
115a1(rgyud): brgyud pa dpal ldan 'khor lo can ma nor 'dab pad+ma la ni bya ba 'jug ma pi phyogs kyi char//kong rus ma dang dus kyi mtshan mo rab tu khros pa'i gdong ma dus kyi lho dang ga
115a2(rgyud): swA dang //nag mo 'jigs rung gzugs can ma rnams nor mdub pad+ma la ste phag mo'i 'dab ma'i lha mo la'o//pad+ma lus med gzhon nu ma dang ro dregs bdag pos 'gro ma rin chen phreng
115a3(rgyud): bla myog bzang ma//rul ma phrag mo gang na gtso mo mchog gi rma byas 'gro ma'i chu skyes 'dab la rgyal po kye//rdo rje 'od dang rdo rje lus dang mchog gi gser ldan ur ba sde dang bkra ba'i
115a4(rgyud): ri mo dang //ri b+hA zug med shin tu sgrol ma pad+ma nor mdab rdo rje lag mo lhag phye de lha can la'o//swA pi tI deng pad+ma'i mig dang nges par chu skyes can ma blo dang ngag gi dbang phyug ma//gU ya
115a5(rgyud): tI dang glog nyid dran ma dag kyang pad+ma rog byed gdong ni lhag pa'i lha can la//gau rI gang gA dang ni rtag me shin tu mchog tu myur ma to ta lA dang mtshon byed ma//dra mar ser nog mo brgyad ni da
115a6(rgyud): bzhin glang na drag mo gtso mo'i pad+ma nor gyi 'dab ma la'o//dpal lhun dbang mo zla ba'i ri mo ri bong 'dzin pa'i gdong ma dad pa'i mdog dang 'dzin ma dang //pad+ma'i dbang mo skar mig dri med
115a7(rgyud): ri bong 'dzin ma dbang ldan pad+ma dag la mtshan mar bcas//de yi phyi rol nyi mo'i pad+ma la ni lha min ga yo dang gshin rje me dang gdong drug dang //gnod sbyin brgya byin chug ter gdong
115b1(rgyud): sa chogs nga pa rdzu 'jug /ral gri gro grug sngon glid dbang po skye mi shing gi ma tog byug par ma gro shig da //dag pA shAg+h+ra trU~M s+yA nga ng+ku nga /
115b2(rgyud): nor bu da ni ci chen rdo rje nyid du ma yi medar//'byu nga bgrong phreng dag ni byug gi mthi la du 'gyur ti gsum pa dang mda' dang zhugs pa dang //rin chen dag sta~M rdo rje dang ni 'a khor la dbyugapa
115b3(rgyud): drug byed dag gi gi mos kyi phyag tu 'gyur//g.yon du phun drung zod pa dro/ po min pa'i nir b+h+ri dad da~M ut+pa le dang lhag ste srog dang //zhugs pa chu skyes skye blugs drug ni ngas pa drug can
115b4(rgyud): mangs rgyu ma po na na du sa rnaMm du dz+haiM dzin/ ni sa nga de ldan
115b5(rgyud): dog na chen da //zhags pa rin po che dang pad+ma skye ba lnga pa'i dung ni lha ma ni dge bo dag gor 'gyur//'du'i 'dab ma dag la nag pas gas kyi na leg chos rnams lte bi la ni rdzogs
115b6(rgyud): bi gin+ti ste//mchog gi na pa'i rgyu rnams thams cung snod dus 'jig rten drug tu mi sti sbyor bas dag par bya//sgor ni lha mo shing rtu la gnas lnga gri rdo rje 'dzin dang lcags kyu dang bcas
115b7(rgyud): mang yi phyag/dpal ldan 'khor lo dbyug pa'i phyag deng rang bzhin sbyin ribang gis za ba dang ni mdung gi phyog/dpal spyan gri gug rdorje'i phyag dang nges par phyog na rigs phyag na
116a1(rgyud): rtsi gsum g.yas na ste//g.yon gyi phyug na phub dang sprul te rang bzhin ston dbang gis zhags pa dang ni gzhu yi phyug/dngul ldan dung dang rin mon phyag dang pad+ma bong
116a2(rgyud): 'dzin pa me long phyag kyang de bzhin no//dpal ldan dril bu thod pa'i phyag dang nges par phyag ni lag 'gro nyid dang kheT+wAM ga yai phyog/'od zer can la sogs pa zhal gcig dus kyi
116a3(rgyud): phyag gi pad+ma rnams ni rim pas rig par bya//k+She ba'i 'og tu klu brgyad rnams kyang bum pa rdo rje'i phyag dang pad+ma nor bu dag gi phyag/rlung la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la ni pad+ma
116a4(rgyud): rko Ta stsogs dus kyi phyag gi pad+ma rnamaso//khyi gdong phag gdong ma dang lce spyang gdong ma nges por g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor lo ni phyogs rnams//stag gdong ma ni byang drug rnaMs
116a5(rgyud): tedur khyod sa gzhi lo gnas gri gug dang ni thod pa'i phyag/b+ha rog gdong dang byargod gdong dang mkha' 'gro bdag po'i gdod dang 'ug gdong ma ni zur du'o//rdo rje myog dang shi
116a6(rgyud): tu sngon mo sa 'og namakha' la glen sa 'byung ba'i skye gonas g.yo ba'i mthar//yi dgas dmar dang mkha' 'gro'i dbang po mA hi r+m+ma bya glang po dang ba glang dang ni gdong lnga pa/
116a7(rgyud): rim pas nr-i muN+Da la sogs pa'i pad+ma'i gdan du po 'gyur phyogs dang phyogs bra ba rnams su'o//lce min la sogs rnams kyi bapon ning bdag rtsa mi can dang chub ti rme /
116b1(rgyud): tshedus cani///nga ngo'i dadang po dang lug dang /chu sbyin nas dang ri da smra dung ni byi rim pa so//d+he dur+N+Na dang khyung khyung rig snod ba shadang+ga pam+ba gdod ni bya ba gdong la stsogs paSh+Tar+ya/
116b2(rgyud): du ste/sa dang ngos dang seng ge g.yag ni b+h+yo gdang ma la sogs pa yi ste phyogs su rab tu 'gyur//rdo rje mgag tid pa bached pas ye sheng d+ha la gnas mkha'i la sngon ma'i shing
116b3(rgyud): mkhang bgrod khyo ba dang btsas kha dag ba lus rgyas mig gsum ldan pa oM ni la zhes pa//'odadi zer can du nAn lcags sgrog ma dang gtor can gyi shing nirnams la
116b4(rgyud): pa ni//d+hA dang glang po seMng+ge bdun gyi grangs su 'gyur tem+b+ha dang gshin rje chu dang byung du'o//shAr du dri dang phreng ba ma ste gau shin rje tshul gnas pa smras ma mar ma sgeg mi dang //ban
116b5(rgyud): me'o gdu ma rol ma ma ni nur sbyi nas gzhi la sti mkha' lha glu ma 'dod ma'i//stong po de brgyad ni kha khyor la ste mkha' dang 'og na gan suM pA rta babasu zhig tu nges par byed//grwa rgyas ma/
116b6(rgyud): rnams ni snam bu la m+me gdang ni rten rigs dang bcas pa'i phyir 'dod mi rnam su kha khyer ma//dbye ba dod ni bskyod pa 'dod mar 'gyur te mi yo badrag po de byizhin rgyas po mes 'dzud pa/
116b7(rgyud): ma rmil ma yis nis rig pa 'im te rmad gsum byed mo gsod pa dngon spyod 'a ma//rim ma 'dang medani rkyeni 'di ming 'gyur mi yi bdag po 'is 'di ma dang pan
117a1(rgyud): dri 'dod ma dang gos ni 'dod mar 'gyur te nges par 'khrig pa 'dod ma dag gi drug pa'o//lus la 'khrug 'dod ma dang kha na gnas pa'i mchi la ma 'dor dang lus kyi
117a2(rgyud): dri ma 'dod ma dang //gar 'dod ma dang stan 'dod ma dang chu dang mal stan dag la rkyal dang bsnyes par 'dod ma dang //tsa muN+Da sogs brgyad kyi bya ba rnams te de bzhin su la khri skyes
117a3(rgyud): rnams kyi 'dod mi yang //kun tu gdung dang 'ching 'dod ma dang nges par 'jam por smra ba dang ni skems dang skrod 'dod ma//reg dang dgug po dag dang 'ching dang mi yi bdag po bur
117a4(rgyud): bu 'debs dang rgyug pa 'dod mar 'gyur//yan lag thams cad bskyod par 'dod mi rab tu gsal zhing nges par bshang gci zag par 'dod ma dang //sems can rnams la slu/
117a5(rgyud): 'dod ma dang nges par rtsod pa mang po lnga pa lhag ma za ba dang //g.yul-i 'dod ma dang sbrul 'ching ma dang byis pa khro bar 'dod ma rnams ni lha min rigs la 'gyur//sum cu rtsa bdun
117a6(rgyud): phyir 'dod ma rnams slar yang de nas phyi rol dkyil 'khor dag gi kha khyer la//nyon zhag so so'i dus su gang zhig cung zad sems can bya ba rnal 'byor ma ya bya ba 'dir/
117a7(rgyud): zhes pa de ltar rdo rje can gyis srid pa gsum po mtha' dag rnams kyang dkyil 'khor rnam par gsungs//phywa dang lus dang gzhan la yang ni spro dang rjud pa dko la dngos
117b1(rgyud): skye ba yang dag gnas//de la rtag pa mkha' yi rdo rje rnam gsum srid pa la gnas mi rtag nyid du 'gyur ma yin//'thung ba'i tshogs ni rtag pa min par 'gyur te mi yi bdag po mig
117b2(rgyud): 'khrul ji bzhin nyi du'o//rtag dang mi rtag mthong ste de lta na yang blun po'i blo can sems na drug pa'i don slad du//sgrubs thabs dag ni brjed par bya ste snying por gyur pa 'ga' yang
117b3(rgyud): 'dir ni bsgrub par bya ba med//gang zhig bsgrub bya sgrub pa po de'akhrul pa zhes pa rdo rje can gyi sgrub thabs mtha' dag gang //de byer rgyal po rang sems dri me rnam par bral ba dag ni
117b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dbang por rab tu bya//dpal ldan rdo rje can ni thugs kyi rdo rjer 'gyur te mi bdag dkyil 'khor sku yi rdo rje'o//lha rnams 'khor lo a li ka li'i rigs skyes gsungs niH
117b5(rgyud): zla pa nyi ma'i steng du'o//rtsa bo sdong bu dgu ni e yig 'dab ma dag ni de bzhin ge sar rnams kyang u yig go/dbus su dpal ldan lte ba dang ni zla ba nyi ma rnams gnyi sde rgong pa'i gnas dge
117b6(rgyud): ma yi go/ho yig thog ma tha ma'i snying po bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ste//de ni shes rab chags pas zhu ba khyab bdag rdo rje can yang ri bong 'dzin pa bzhin bltas
117b7(rgyud): na/lha mo rnams kyis glu dag mdzad bcom ldan khyod ni sems can kun la phan par mdzad pa po//bdag cag bsrungs shig lha mo'i bla ma rdo rje ldan pa 'dod pa don gnyer rnams la 'dod
118a1(rgyud): pa mdzad//rdo rje can des glu dag gsan nas srid pa gsum po mthu' dag rnams kyang mig 'phrul lta bur ni//gzigs nas bskyed pa mdzad dri ma med pa'i 'od zer 'gro
118a2(rgyud): ba rang gi mtshan ma spros byas nas//rdo rje'i rgyun dang ldan zhing rgyal ba'i bdag po'i cod pa ni shes rab kyis ni 'khyud par gyur pa yang //shes rab zabs kyis rgyal po slar yang dkyil
118a3(rgyud): 'khor ma lus pa ni rab tu spro ba dag kyang //'od zer sngon po 'jigs pa'i sku ste rab tu bzhad pa'i zhal dang mche ba phyed ni gtsigs pa dang //sgra drag sgrogs byed nyi ma'i spyan dang ging+ga
118a4(rgyud): lhag rgyal ba'i phyag ste/rig byed zhal dang zhabs gnyis pa//shes rab thabs la rab byung mtshon cha rnams dang bcas pa rkang pa brgyad pa'i shing rta drag la gnas//rgyal
118a5(rgyud): ba'i dgra ni 'joms par byed pa rdo rje shugs te ye shes 'khor lo'i slad du bskul bar bya//dri med 'od zer 'phro ba ye shes 'khor lo'i dbang phyug dag ni lte bar ljags kyus bstan/
118a6(rgyud): byas shing //phyag rnams rang gi rdo rje gdangs can dag gis de bzhin rab bcings mtshon cha rnams kyis 'jigs byas te//mtha' dag bsgrub byar byas shing 'khor la bzang po
118a7(rgyud): bskyod par byas nos 'di ni slar yang 'gro ba skye//gzhug dang ba cing dang mnyes pa dang ni ri mnyam byed pa dag ni rmu gos byed la sogs rnams kyis myed//rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor
118b1(rgyud): dag la sems ni na mkhal dang bcas snying po'i pad+mar mo yi steng du 'gyur//shar du dbul ldan nag mo 'bar ma mchog gi pad+ma la ni g+ho ru dmar mo 'bar ma ste//byang du dngal ldan gang
118b2(rgyud): me 'bar mar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis nub tu ser mo 'bar ma'o//mer ni dung rdo ru'i bu yo phyog su smig rgyu mA dang dbang ljin phyog/suM mkha' snang ma//rlung ngu dngul ldan mar ma ma
118b3(rgyud): ste nor bu dang ni shing dang chos kyi gaN+DI dag dang rung //me dang rlung dang lha min dang ni 'brog byed phyogs su ngo bzhin par byi zur gyi chu la'o//shar du 'du byed dang ni sa dedag nges par
118b4(rgyud): pad+ma la gnas lho ru tsher ba chu dag go/byang du 'du shes dang ni mi ru 'gyur te nub tu yung ni rlung dang bcas pa'i gzugs nyid//me yi phyogasu rlung dang gzugasasu 'gyur te lha min bdag
118b5(rgyud): por mye drang 'du shes gnyis pa'o//dbang ldan du ni chu dang tshor ba dge ste rlung du 'dzin ma 'du byed phung por ldan pa'o//lha mo sangs rgyas par rnamasu ni le tshe brgyad kyi gnas su dadu
118b6(rgyud): rtsi'i ro yi bum pa rnams//slar yang 'phar me phyi ma la ni shar du sna dang dza s+t+rai m+b+hi ru mig dang gzugs dge 'gro babyang du lce dang ro ru 'gyur te chur ni dri bzhin nyid du lus dang rag bya
118b7(rgyud): ngag tu 'gyur//sa 'og tu ni ni bsla ru 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis lha yi sgra yi ga yan du'o//namakha' la ni ngas der sems dang chos kyi dbyings su 'gyur te sher gyi
119a1(rgyud): yi g.yon du'o//dang por thabs ni drug po drug kyang rgyal ba'i dbang gi sgra dkyil 'khor gyi ni lhag pa'i lha ru 'gyur//phyi nas shes rab la sogs drug ni rab tu
119a2(rgyud): gsal bar bdag po rang rang pad+ma'i gdan la'o//shar gyi sgor ni rab gtum ral gri 'dzin pa shin tu stobs te de yi phyag rgya rengs byed ma'o//g.ya su rmugs byed dang ni nga
119a3(rgyud): rgyal mar 'gyur nor sbyin du yang khengs byed dang ni rmugs byed ma//chu ru rangs byed dang ni mtha' yas brtson 'grus mar 'gyur sgo yis dbus na gnas pa'i pad+ma la'o//dbyug
119a4(rgyud): sngon 'od zer can dang mi g.yo zhes dang khro gnyer can ma brtson 'grus mtha' ya so lcags sgrog ma//'dod pa tsun+d+ha shing rta lnga gnas lha dang nor sbyin gzhan drang lho yi sgo yi
119a5(rgyud): dbus su ste//gnod mdzes drag spyan ma ni 'og tu 'gyur zhing mkha' la gtsug tor+ya dang ni shin tu ston mo nyid//shar gyi sgo yi steng dang gzhon du yang ni nges par 'gyur te/
119a6(rgyud): gnyis pa dag gi shing rta yang //gsung las skyes po'i dkyil 'khor la ni nor gyi phyogasu 'byung po las skyes rnams kyi gdan du 'gyur//shAr du tsA muN+DA dang dbang por
119a7(rgyud): 'gyur te rtse mo can du khyab 'jug ma dang rig byed gdong //gshin rje phog mo drag por 'gyur te lha min bdag por gdong drug ma dang bgegs kyi mgon po'o//nub tu dbang
119b1(rgyud): mo bridon bral du 'gyur rlung du nges pa dus kyi gdod ma dag ni khyab 'jug nyid//gnod sbyin du ni drag mo gshin rjer 'gyur te byugs kyi bdag por dpal mo nyid dang gdod drug pa//phyi rol
119b2(rgyud): gyi ni dbang po'i sgo yi g.yas su lha min bdag dang de yi phyag rgya srin mor 'gyur//mer ni rlung dang rab gtum ma ste me dang chu lha mo yang lho yi sgo yi g.yas su'o//lha min bdug por
119b3(rgyud): dang ldan gdong drug pa dang dpal mor 'gyur te nub tu dbang po rlung lha mo//rlung du tshangs pa dang ni glog mar 'gyur te nor skyon du yang rgya mtsho dang ni phag mo'o//dbang ldan du ni cho gas
119b4(rgyud): kyi dbang po gzhon nu ma ste nor sbyin gshin rje'i sgra yI g.yon gyi cher//drag po dus te khyab 'jug drang ni nor sbyin zhes pa lho dang nub kyi sgo yi g.yon du'o//de dag rnams kyis phyag rgyar
119b5(rgyud): rab grags ri sras gshin rje ma dang dpal mo nor gyi dbang mor 'gyur//phyi rol du n-i lha dang gshin rje nor sbyin nub kyi kha khyer dag la klu rnams mtha' dag ste//pad+ma dang ni stobs kyi
119b6(rgyud): rgyu drag g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor lnga gnas nor rgyas bu dang dung skyong ni//me la gnas pa dag ste chu yi steng du rigs ldan mtha' yas klur ni rab tu grags par 'gyur//de bzhin sa yi
119b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor la gnas rigs kyi dbang gis 'jog pa dang ni pad+ma chen por 'gyur//de rnams shes rabar pa gtum mo rnams dur khrod sa la gnas pa khyi gdong ma la sogs pa ste/
120a1(rgyud): de rnams thabs ni pad+ma la sogs gzhan gyi rigs kyi dbang gis bde ba dam pa'i don du 'gyur//shar gyi 'khor lor rtse mos 'bigs pa'i dur khrod du ni g.yo ba'i
120a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor la gnas khyi gdong ma//gshin rje dag tu nges par ro ni sreg par phag gi gdong ma byang du rul pa dang bcas par//stag gdong ma ste chu ru rnag gi drir ni de bzhin nyid
120a3(rgyud): du lce spyang dag gi gdong mor 'gyur//me dang lha min bdag por lhag ma dang ni mi bzad g.yul du bya rog gdong ma bya rgod bcas//rlung du sbrul gyis zos par mkha' 'gro'i
