120a4(rgyud): bdag po'i gdong ma dbang ldan du yang byis pa shi bar no//'khor lo la gnas 'ug gdong ma ste so yi dkyil 'khor la gnas zla nyi dag kyang bsgom par bya//g.yon brkyang ba
120a5(rgyud): ni yum gyir 'gyur te mnyam pa'i stobs ni bdab ma dag gi lha mo'i tshogs kyi'o//bcu dang nor gyi tshogs dag gi ni g.yon brkyang sa ga lha min mo rnams kyi yang zlum po'o//
120a6(rgyud): g.yon brkyang dag la gnas pa rnams kyi snyoms par 'jug pa g.yas brkyang stabs su nges par 'gyur ba ste//sa ga la ni so ga nyid ces bya bar 'gyur zhing dreng du rgyan po la yang
120a7(rgyud): sku 'o//dkyil 'khor du yang lhag ma'i lha rnams rab tu gsal zhing nges par rdo rje gdan gyis gnas pa ste//rang rigs phyogs gnas lha mo rnams ni rang rang pad ma'i gdan
120b1(rgyud): gyis gnas//gdangs cani rigs dang bcas pa rang rang phyogs kyi gzhon par gnas pa'i lha rnams rdo rje gdun gyis gnas//lha rnams mdab mang lha mo rnams ni rol pa'i stabs
120b2(rgyud): to 'byung pa las skyes rnams kyi de bzhin nyid//g.yas po bskum pa dag kyang sa gzhi la ni nges par bkod cing rkang pa g.yon pa rkyong pa dag/phyed dang bcas pa'i khru gnyis pa
120b3(rgyud): ste mi yi bdag po de ni g.yon pa brkyang ba'i stab su 'gyur//g.yon pa'i sbyor ba yis ni g.yas brkyang du 'gyur rkang pa zung ni mnyaM pa bdag kyang mnyam pa'i stabs//ston dbang gis
120b4(rgyud): dbus mo zung ni rab tu brkyang bdag las sa ga drang ni zlum por 'gyur//cung zad dbus mo phyed ni 'khyog pha rol par 'gyur te lhag ma dag ni rab tu grags pa nyid//slar yang rnal 'byor
120b5(rgyud): pa yis b+ha ra ta las shes par bya ste rdo rje gar gyi slad du'o//cod pan ngag la phan tshun rdo rjer 'gyur te sangs rgyas lnga rnams ro 'ga' na//gzugs kyi steng du mi bskyod pa ste gsal bar
120b6(rgyud): pad+ma 'dzin pa'i rnam par snang mdzod nyi du 'gyur//rin chen dbang po'i chu skyes 'dzin dang don yid grub pa'i cod pan+de la ni rab mchog nor du'i phyag/drug gri cid pa no ra l+le zhes byung 'gyur
120b7(rgyud): ston dbang gis lhag ma'i 'khor lo ya~M yang gzhan//sa las 'khor lo rab tu skye bar 'gyur te tshulas pad+ma dang ni me las nor bu'o//rlung las ral gri dang ni snang pa dag las rje
121a1(rgyud): mtshan ngamathathamamasas mthamasam a mthas mthaHthas a mam bas mkhanamam
121a2(rgyud): 'gyur te 'gyur medo lngas ni gr-i gug go//gos dang bdud rtsi'i snod du 'gyur te nges par me long dang bcas phreng ba dang ni rgyud mangs dang //drug pa chos 'byung nges par
121a3(rgyud): sa drang chu dang sreg za rlung dang na mkha' ni bdag las//phub dang mdung dang mda' dang dgra sta drong ni DA ma ru dag mtshan ma lnga ste de bzhin du//dbyug pa zhags pa lcags kyu dag dang nges
121a4(rgyud): par de bzhin tho ba dang ni rtse gsum dag tu 'gyur//gzhu dang ut+pa la dang slar yang de bzhin mgo bo dang ni kha T+wAM ga dang dril bu dang //de bzhin lcags sgrog la sogs chu na rgyu ba thod
121a5(rgyud): pa stag lpags dang ni glang po'i lpags pa ste//'dir ni lhag mo nye ba'i mtshan ma sa drang chu dang sreg za rlung dang na mkha' las skyes pa//de dag rang bzhin ston dbang gis shes par
121a6(rgyud): bya ba nyid lha dang lha mo rnams kyi'o//gang zhig l-I la sogs pa sum cu'i dbyangs ni sa chu sreg za rlung dang na mkha' las skyes pa//thu du ring po'i rab dbye rnams kyis rim pas

121b1(rgyud): 'gyur te slar yA ri yig dag ni phyug na rin tsho no//u yig thung ngu srung ba mtha' ya su 'gyur slar yang 'dri ni lI yig rnam par snang mdza do//bsam pa'i rab tu dbye bas dbyangs kyi tsho gsA dA li po

121b3(rgyud): lI thams cad rim pas gnas par 'gyur//mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po sna tshogs yum ni bde ba'i don du phan tshun lus dang bsam pa ste//mi bskyod stong pa'i khams dang phyag gi/
121b4(rgyud): pad+ma ral grwa dang ni spyan ma lus dang bsam pa'o//rin chen dbang po mA ma ki dang gsal bar pad 'dzin gos dkar mo ni lus dang bsam pa ste//de bzhin 'khor lo can dang sgrol mo rang bzhi
121b5(rgyud): sto ni dbang gis thung dang ring ba'i dbyangs kyis so//oM yig kun tu bzang por 'gyur te stona? dbang gis a yig dag kyang phyag na rdo rje'o//e yig thung ngu na mkha'i snying po ar yig
121b6(rgyud): dag kyang de bzhin yang dag sa yi snying por 'gyur//o yig 'jig rten mgon popa a yang de bzhin 'dir ni rnam par sel bar 'gyur te lus la'o//a yigra chos kyi dbyings su 'gyu
121b7(rgyud): te nges par de bzhin AHyig las skyes sgra yi rdo rje ma//oM yig reg bya rdo rje ma s+t+waM lus kyi dbye bas Ar yig las skyes ro yi rdo rje ma//oM yig gzugs kyi rdo rje mar 'gyur ngas
122a1(rgyud): pA da bzhin a yig las b+h+ya sA ng+ka yi rdo rje ma//dpral ldan bzang po chos kyi dbyings dang phyugran rdo rje dang ni sma rdo rje ma dag zung //na mkha'i snying po dri la rdo rje ma dang 'jig
122a2(rgyud): rten mgon po ro yi rdo rje ma dag rdung //sa yI snying po gzugs kyi rdo rje ma dang reg bya rnam par sol ba dag ni zung du 'gyur//de ltar rig sde ni drug po rnams dag rang bzhin ston dbang gis/
122a3(rgyud): yang dag par ni rig par bya//haM yig gtsug ter 'khor lo can 'gyur lus kyi dbang gis 'dir ni hAHyig shin tu sngon mo'o//ha yig zung gnod mdze su 'gyur nges par de bzhin

122a6(rgyud): rtson 'grusu 'gyur lus kyi dbang gis lha mo rnams kyi ring po ste//yA wAr-I lde de bzhin glang po rta dang seng ge dang ni phag gri shing rta dag la 'gyur//dathug sngon 'od zer nan dang

122b1(rgyud): dra/dang ya dung rnam par bcad bah+ma nga \u0f7fdang hA las skyes nus ma brgyad //rngam pa rnams pa de bzhin te ba chud me pa chu nga sa yi sh+tsa sa kyis phye byar 'gyur//oM tsu hU~M AHd+ha dang //

122b7(rgyud): dbang po dag dang rlung //kau raHkhyab 'jug du to'i phrag byed ces dang nor sbyin dag kyangs dang 'dir ni zhwa nyid//tsa sogs sde pa byings dang bcas pa rnams ni g+ha yi pad+ma modang ma
123a1(rgyud): lha mo rnams kying 'gyur//nag pa'i zla ba sogs kyi chos rnams dus kyi nges pa'i dbang gis stong pa drug dang mye yi grangs//de nyid la zhon ha yog rlung me dang sa rnams
123a2(rgyud): drug la shar la sogs pa'i klu rnams kyi//sde bdun brtsegs pa la gnas k+Sha yA ra wa lar ldan dur khrod du ni lha ma ni mo rnams kyi//shes rab thabs kyi lus dang bsgom pas rigs
123a3(rgyud): dbang las 'dir ni gang ni gr-i dbus su mngon phyogs 'gyur//dpal ldan rdo rje can dang kun bzong rigs kyi dbang giste rdo rje 'dzin pa phyag na rdo rjer 'gyur//don yod grub dang rna

123a6(rgyud): de gzugs zhes grag s+ho pad+ma 'gyur ti rigs kyi dpyod gis spun mA dri yordo rje ma//khro ba'i dbang po rdo rje shog+sas dang rgyal ba'i bdag por 'gyur te kun tu bzed po de nyid/
123a7(rgyud): ga ter mi bskyed pa nyid 'dir ni slang yang shin tu ste bas dang don yid grub par rab tu grags//rmu gas byed dang ni phyag na rin chen du 'gyur rigs kyi dbang gis khengs byed
123b1(rgyud): dang ni 'do dpag mod//rengs byed dang ni rnam byar snang mdzod du 'gyur skyobs ldan phyag na rdo rje dag dong gnod mad so//mkha' snying dang ni dbyug pa rnon po rang bzhin ston dbang gis su yi snying/
123b2(rgyud): pa 'dod pa'o//rnam par sel dang shin tu brtson 'grus su 'gyur rigs kyi dbang gis 'jig rten mgon po mi g.yo ba//yum dang khro bo'i deb po'i phyag rgyar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis
123b3(rgyud): chos kyi dbyings ni de bzhin nyid//stong par grags pa shin tu sngon mo rlung me chu dang sa la sogs pa mtha' yas brtson 'grus dang //rmugs byed mo dang khengs ma rengs byed mar ni rim

123b6(rgyud): shin tu stobs dang bag ges dgrar rab tu grags//rma gau se byed shes rab mthar byed dag tu 'gyur te de bzhin khengs byed dang ni pad+ma'i rigra/rlung mA tshu sa tsI muN+DA dang phab mo dbang phyug ma
123b7(rgyud): dang de bzhin dbang mo bzhi pa ste//dri dang gzugs dang ra dang rig bya zhes pa g.yo ba 'phrog byed lho min mer ni gnas pa yang //tshanges pa dang ni rnam par snang mdzad 'gyur rigs kyi
124a1(rgyud): dbang gis rgya mtsho dag dang 'od dpog med//me dang dang la ldan byug nI rin chen du 'gyur rlung dang don yod grub pa dang ni de bzhin nyid//mi bapyod pa dang /mri dag bor 'gyur
124a2(rgyud): tergyal ba'i bdag po dang ni bAde byed rab tu grags//rnam par silba ba gang de bo rgyu byin du 'gyura'ajig rten mgon po tshogs kyi bdag po de bzhin nyid//sa yi snying po gding drug pa
124a3(rgyud): 'gyur dngal ldan mkha' snying du nu'i bdag par rab tu grags pa yin//dpal sngon phyag ni rdo rje dus su 'gyur te drug pa kun tu bzang po nor gyi bdag po'o//rig ma drug deng phyag tu
124a4(rgyud): drug ni rang bzhin ston dbang gis dri rnams rang rang phyag rgya ste//phyag rgya rig ma la sogs nyi ma lha yi mchog gi bdag rnams dkar po nag po rdzogs pa'o//de dag rnams kyi pa
124a5(rgyud): 'dab la ni nor lag ches te mchu yi zla ba la sogs gang de rnams//zla ba drug ni snga ma drug tu 'gyur te rigs kyi dpung gisna lha mo rnams kyi phyi ma yang //klu brgyad gang dbum pa/
124a6(rgyud): rnams te / ba bdag pad+ma'i lang ba ma nus ma de rnams rabyu gi tum ma//dpal ldan du bo byA ga gdong mdu 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis bya rgod gdong ma smig rgyu ma//mkha' snga
124a7(rgyud): me ni 'ug po'i gdong ma dpal ldan mer me mkha' 'gro'i bdag po'i gdong ma re rab tu grogs//nag mo 'bar ma khyi gdong ma ste dmor mo 'bar ma shin tu rnam 'gyur bzhini
124b1(rgyud): ldan phrag gdong ma//dkar mo 'bar ma stag gi gdong mar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis ser mo 'bar ma lce sbyang ma//de bzhin sgeg mo la sogs thams cad rab tu gsal ba rnam bcu sna tshogs
124b2(rgyud): yumra ni lhag ma'o//lha mo sangs rgyas rig ma shing dang bcas shing bum pa dang bcas rgyal ba yi ni dag pa'i sku//khro bo'i dbang po byang chub sems dpa' nges par ro yi rdo rje ma ni chos kyi sku
124b3(rgyud): de nyid//rnal 'byor ma rnams longs spyod sku ste rab mchog shing rta la gnas lha ni nyi mar rab grags pa//klu ni brgyad po rnams dang rab gtum ma rnams 'khor dang bcas pa sangs rgyas
124b4(rgyud): kyi ni sprul pa'i sku//de bzhin sgyur yang rgyal po'i sku ni dbye ba gnyi su 'gyur te phyi rol dag dang nang na yang //mngal nas skyes pa ji lta ba nyid de bzhin kho na dkyil 'khyod la ni nges par
124b5(rgyud): rab tu 'gyur//ston pa lha mo sogs dang bum pa lha ni skyos rgyal ba'i sku ste dkyil 'khor snying pa'i dbus su'o//sangs rgyas la sogs chos kyi sku stenges par ro yi rdo rje ma sogs
124b6(rgyud): longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku//khro bo sprul pa'i sku ru 'gyur to stan dbang gis dkyil 'khor gyi ni snying por yang dag gnas//phyi rol du nin+ta muN+Da la sogs pa lha mo brgyad po 'khor dang
124b7(rgyud): bcas pa dge ba'i sku//lha la sogs pa chos kyi sku ste mtha' dag gdangs can rigs kyang 'dir ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku//gtu mi rnams ni sprul pa'i skur 'gyur mi yi bdag
125a1(rgyud): pasams nan kun ni ma du'o//shA y-i rdorjespyan cigan+d+hes pa'i ni drung du 'gyur te gzugs ni rdzogs pa'i smad nga//gsung bang rjod ni nas kyi sgra yang chung du/
125a2(rgyud): 'gyur te chos nyid bstan pa'i don du'o//thugs dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yang zung du 'gyur tAM sems can kun gyi don ni byed pa po//ye shes dang ni sprul pa'i sku dge zung du'i
125a3(rgyud): tI srog chags rnams la thar pa myu ba nyid//shes rab thabs b+h+rUM lus drang bar ma pa mnyam dang mi m+b+hanyam rigs ni nyi zla oM sogs ka sogs dang //rnam gsum srid pa la gr-in+d+he
125a4(rgyud): ye shes rnam shes dbye ba dag gis rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya//rdo rje swA hA'i mtha' ldan dag gis mgo dang mgrin pA snying kha lta ba gsang ba spyi bor te//'di dag gis ni byin
125a5(rgyud): rlabs yan lag rab mchog rgyal ba'i bdag po lha mo rnams kyis bkru bar bya//stong pa chis kyi dbyings dang rdo rje gsum gyi dus dang ye shes mchod pa rje su chags pa la//myang
125a6(rgyud): 'gro ba gsum nas sgrub pa po yi mr-i tAd sta b+hA ba At+ma k+Sho ho brjod par bya//bum pa rnams dang du ba la sogs bskyed pa rnams kyis spyong khar chos kyi 'khor lo d+ha rab tu 'gyur/
125a7(rgyud): rigs ma rnams dang sangs rgyas nyid kyis mgo bor rtsibs bcu drug po lhan cig skyes par rab tu grags//byang chub sems dpa' la sogs nyis 'gyur mi bdag rnams kyis
125b1(rgyud): mgrin par longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lor 'gyur//'jigs ma la sogs nor ni gdung sna n+dan dag gyis bstar ba rnams kyis lte bAr sprul pa'i 'khor lor 'gyur//lag pa rkang pa/
125b2(rgyud): tshigs la lha rnams kyi ni las kyi 'khor lo dgu bcu dus kyis bsnun pa ste//klu dang gtum mo mi yi bdag po rnams kyis sor mo'i tshigs kyi mchims la bya ba zhes byar 'gyur//dus kyi dag bas
125b3(rgyud): /dpal ldan rdo rje can 'gyur mi bdag lo dang zla ba la sogs dbye bas so//thugs kyi rnam pa nyi ma ma yin nyin zhag so so'i dbang gis sna tshogs yum ni rnam par dag/rlung gi dag pas du ba la so/
125b4(rgyud): rang gi snying khA'i pad+ma rtsa yi 'khor lo lnga gnas rnams//nyon mongs rnams kyis drag po chung mar bcas pa khyab bdag zhabs kyi 'og tu bdud kyi tshogs kyis bdud//dung dang gar+b+ha mya ni ldan pa zhe
125b5(rgyud): ba dag kyang de bzhin sku yi rdo rje la sogs kyis//bum pa brgyad ni bdud rtsi'i yan lag gis te rgyal dang rnam rgyal bum pa byang chub sems sogs kyis//'du byed don yang grub pa
125b6(rgyud): tshor ba dri med nor bu'i phyag dang 'du shes snang ba mtha' yas te//gzugs ni 'khor lo can no ri bong can dang stobs khrag bshad pa gtso ba rnam par dag pa'o//lha mo drug na khams rnams kyis
125b7(rgyud): te yul dang yul can rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag rgyar bcas//khro bo lnga ni stobs rnams kyis te nges par slar yang gzhan pa lnga ni dbang po gzhan rnams kyis//tsa muN+DA sogs
126a1(rgyud): thun brgyad kyis twe pad+ma'i 'dab mar gnas rnams nyi ma'i dus spyod chu tshod kyis//lha min la srogs nyi ma'i zla bas pad+ma'i 'dang mAr gnas rnams chu tshod dbus kyi grangs kyis//gsang
126a2(rgyud): bar mi bdag nyis 'gyur chu tshod rnams kyis klu rnams dang ni gtum mo rnams kyang rnam par dag/de bzhin 'dod ma la sogs de dag rang bzhin ston dbang gis lus kyi bye bas rnam par dag/
126a3(rgyud): sgra rnams kyis ni grub pa mtha' dag ba spu rnams kyis dur khrod sa gzhi la gnas 'byung po'i tshogs//de nyid rnams kyis gtso bo'i mtshon cha rang bzhin ljon dbang gis khams kyi phyi yi phyag
126a4(rgyud): rgya'o//rdo rjes nang gi phyag rgya rdo rje 'dzin pa'i thugs ker zla ba'i steng du yang dag gnas pa'o//dpal ldan rdo rje can dang sna tshogs yum ni rnam gsum srid gnas 'gyur med ye shes dbya
126a5(rgyud): ba las//dpal ldan dag pa las ni chos skur 'gyur te chos las nges par longs spyod rdzogs sku bzeng po'i//longs spyod las ni sprul pa'i sku ru 'gyur te rgyal ba'i bdag po'i sems
126a6(rgyud): tsan+da kun don byed pa po//bzhi pa'i gnas skabs shin tu gnyid log nges par slar yong gzhan dang lus kyi dbye bas sad pa skyo//de ltar lus kyi rab tu dbye bas srog chags rnams kyi lus
126a7(rgyud): la yid ni rnam pa bzhi ru gnas//sprul par yid ni longs spyod byed pa po ru rab tu 'gyur te lus dang ngag gi dbang poso//longs spyod rdzogs la ma mthong sems par 'gyur te ston dab
126b1(rgyud): gis chos kyi sku la gnyid kyang //dag pa la ni bde bar rab 'gyur 'drir ni nyin mtshan dus su thig le grol ba gsum gyi mthar//de phyir de ni nyin mtshan dus su rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya ste 'gyur/
126b2(rgyud): med don du'o//g.yon du srog ni rab tu rgyu bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du ni g.yas pa bskum pa gang yin pa//de ni g.yon brkyang stabs te mnyam pa'i stabs dang gzhan po g.yas brkyang me dang nyi ma'i rgyu ba
126b3(rgyud): las//sa ga dang ni zlum po nyid dang mchog gi rol pa'i stobs dang pad ma dang ni rdo rje'i gdan//na mkha' sogs la rab tu rgyu ba mnyam dang mi mnyam bgrod pa dag la srog rlung rnam pa lnga//
126b4(rgyud): gtum mo lte ba'i 'khor lo dgu yis bsnun pa'i lag 'gro tsartsi ka sogs lhag pa'i lha dang ldan//ho yig ye shes snying po la ni dri med glog dang mtshungs pa'i ye shes me ni rab rgyas pa/
126b5(rgyud): lte bar rnam par snang mdzad la sogs sreg cing mi yi bdag po spyan ma mig la sogs pa rnams//thams cad bsregs nas mgo bor zla ba bzang las thig le'i gzugs ni mdzeg pa gang/
126b6(rgyud): de rdo rje can//shes rab chos 'byung drag la gnas pa mtha' dge slar yang spro ba byas te nges par thig le yis//sna tshogs rgyan dang ldan zhing me long drag la gnas pa lta bu'i ye shes
126b7(rgyud): 'khor lo rang byung ba//'dod pa dang ni gzu dang 'azab med srid pa rnam pa gsum po dag kyang rim pas sbyangs byas te//phyi nas ye shes ma lce dag gis srid pa gsum po mtha' dag dus
127a1(rgyud): gcig du ni dgug par bya//zla ba nyi ma a sogs rnams kyi sku rnam gsum bgrod gnas sku yi rdo rje sogs bzlas pa//so sor spyad pa la sogs drug gis gasror bzang
127a2(rgyud): pad+ma la ni sku gsung thugs kyi rnal 'byor to//dga' ba la sogs rnams kyis rdo rje chu skyes dge lar mnyam gyur pas rlom pa rdo rje gsum//shes rab pad+mar sems kyi thig le dag
127a3(rgyud): la lhun skyes bde ba'i dbang gis sgom pa gzhom med 'gyur//bdud rtsi lnga la sogs dang chu gter rdo rje rnams dang sngags kyi bzlas pa sogs kyis bsnyen pa ste//so sor sdud pa sogs
127a4(rgyud): dang rdo rje pad+mo las skyes bdud rtsi yis ni nye ba'i sgrub par 'gyur//dga' ba la sogs rnams kyis rdo rje gsum dang chu skyes ro mnyam gyur pa sgom pa sgrub par 'gyur//shes rab sbyar la
127a5(rgyud): gang tshe 'phro med phra mo'i rnal 'byor dag las nges par sgrub pa chen por 'gyur//dang por stong nyid byang chub nges par slar yang de nas zla ba thog le dag ni yang dag 'dzin//de na sngo gzuT/
127a6(rgyud): dradrugrag bskyed cing rab mchog ro yi rigs rnams dag gis yi ge bgod pa nyid yin te//'di ni spyi yi bsnyen pa chu yi gter gyi rdo rje rnams kyis sgrub pa dag ni 'bring po yang //'di la thibs
127a7(rgyud): ni rnam bzhir 'gyur te dman dang brtan pa bsgrub pa'i yan lag dag la de bzhin nyid//so sor sdud pa rgyal ba'i dbang por 'gyur zhing rnam pa bcu ste bsam gtan mi bskyod pa nyid//
127b1(rgyud): / blanan d+ha d+ha yang rnam b+h+ya la nu phyugan na//gdas pan la rnam dran pa da na pa smra gyu/rlu la ldan ting 'dzin 'ab sa nan//r-i sh+miSh+Tas+sa /
127b2(rgyud): kyis te slar yang gang las a sogs ka sogs rnams kyis phye ba'o//so sor sdud pa lus la yul dang yul can bcu po rnams na rab tu 'jug pa med pa'o//bsam gtan dag kyang shes
127b3(rgyud): rab rtag dang dpyod pa dga' dang groyo med bde brtse gcig sems dpa'o//srog gi rtsol ba dag kyang lam ni gnyis po bsgyel zhing dbu mar srog ni zhugs pa dag tu 'gyur//thig ler
127b4(rgyud): srog ni rab tu zhugs shing gnyis ka'i bgrod pa bcom ste rtse gcig sems pa 'dzin pa'o//gtum mo'i smra bar gang zhig gyur pa nges par lus dang na mkha' la yang rje su dran par 'gyur
127b5(rgyud): shes rab thabs kyis bdag nyid kyis ni 'gyur med bde ba'i dbang gis ye shes gzugs la ting 'dzin//'di dag dman pa la sogs dbye ba rnams kyis sna tshogs gtso bo'i sgrub thabs
127b6(rgyud): rnam pa gsum du 'gyur//phyag rgya gsum dang gnas skyabs gsum ni rnam gsum bgrod pa'i dbang gis lus dang kun rtog mchog rnamaso//so sor rjod pas rnal 'byor pa ni yul
127b7(rgyud): dang rnam par bral ba sngags rnams kun gyis byin gyis rlob//mngon par shes pa lnga ni thob par 'gyur te mi yi bdag po bsam gtan sbyor bas dag pa'o//srog gau rtsol bas dag
128a1(rgyud): pa ri bong can dang nyi ma dang bral byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mchod//bdung dang nyon+da mong pa la sogs nyam shing stobs bcu la ni 'jug par 'gyur te 'dzin pa'i stob
128a2(rgyud): kyis//rjesu dran pa legs par dag pa dri med 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dag kyang ye shes gzugs las so//de nas ting 'dzin gyis dag pa nyin zhag 'ga' zhig dag gis ye shes lus
128a3(rgyud): neni 'grubya bar 'gyur//so sor sdud pa la sogs rnams kyis gal te sngags pa rnams kyi 'dod pa grub par ma gyur ni//nU da goms pas bcan thabs chu skyes su gnas rdo rje nor bu
128a4(rgyud): thig l-I bkag nas bsgrub par bya//bsnyen pa la ni dang po'i rnal 'byor rnam bcu mkha' la 'khor lo can gyis khro bo'i lta bso//bgegs mthar byed pa'i lte ba bdud rtsi'i lta ba
128a5(rgyud): bdud rtsi'i lam du son po yis kyang nye ba'i sgrub la yan lhag drug/shes rab la spros zla ba thig le rdo rje nor bur gnas pa'i 'gyur med gsum ni sgrub pa la//bde ba mi nyams
128a6(rgyud): gcig pu zhi ba'i lhan skyes ye shes rnal 'byor 'dir ni sgrub pa chen po la//srog gi rtsol ba kun nas bde mnyam 'bras bu ster bA ji srid mgo yo bar du 'dod pa ste//de las
128a7(rgyud): steng du 'dod pa ma yin 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa byed pa phung po nges par 'jigs pa'i rgyu//gtsug ter sgo na phug nas 'gro na mchog gi bde ba'i go 'phangs dag la nges par sbyar bar
128b1(rgyud): byadadapung po med kyang rnal 'byor ba ni bde mnyam 'jug ste 'on kyang 'jig rten du ni grags pa min//dbus su srog ni rab tu zhugs pa sna tshogs yum la yul dang rnaM bral bde 'khyud pa ste/
128b2(rgyud): pad+mar zhugs pa'i rang gi rdo rje skyo ba dag kyang de bzhin zla nya'i dbus su rab zhugs pa//bde ba sa bon ma lhung bra la rab dga' dga' bar gnas pa rnal 'byor rnams kyi rnal 'byor 'di//phyag rgya/
128b3(rgyud): dngos grub don slang khyab bdag gi ni dpal ldan gsang ba las kyang mchog tu gsang ba'o//gtsug tor du ni rdo rje rtse mo lnga par 'gyur te phyi rol rtse mo dag ni nyis 'gyur gyi//rdo rje chos kyi
128b4(rgyud): 'khor lor 'gyur zhing nyis 'gyur gzhan me dang ni de yi nyis 'gyur dag kyang gzhan//de ya yang ni nyes 'gyur gzhan du 'gyur te lhan skyes longs spyod rdzogs dang sprul pa'i 'khor lo ro//
128b5(rgyud): de yi snying por rtse mo gcig pa bde mnyam 'bras ster gsang ba'i pad+ma'i khongs su gnas pa'o//rnal 'byor pa yis nyin dang mtshan mor srog gcod pa dag bya ba de ni srog nyams par gsu
128b6(rgyud): te/sgra ni gang zhig zhal gyis dman pa dag kyang snying la gyur pa de ni brdzun du smra ba nyid//gang zhig thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sA ni 'dzin pa dag kyang rnal 'byed pa yi rku bar
128b7(rgyud): gsungs//thig le ma lhung ba las bde bar 'gyur ba chags bral min las gzhan gyi bud med bsten pa'o//srog gi rtsol ba'i me yi ri bong can ni zhu ba dag kyang btung ba chang ni 'thung
129a1(rgyud): ba'o//mthe bo'i tshogs nas gtsug tor dag tu nywa yi mthur ni rang sems 'gro ste chos kyi dbang gis so//gtsug tor nas ni sor mo rnamasu slar yang 'di nyid 'gro ste nag
129a2(rgyud): po'i phyogs kyi mtha' ru'o//rnal 'byor pa rnams spyod pa gang de nyin zhag so so'i dus su 'dod pa'i dngos grub rab ster ba//bsam dang 'dod dang lus la rims dang kha mchog pad+ma skam
129a3(rgyud): dang zos la rab tu mi 'jug drang //'dar dang smyo dang rab tu rmongs par 'gyur dang yid ni rnam par 'khrul dang drag tu brgyal ba dag/rdo rje can gyi ngu ba la sogs rab gsal rnam pa bcu
129a4(rgyud): ste srog chags lus la 'jig rten du//rab tu gsal zhing nges pa de rnams yid bsrubs gnas skabasu zhig rgyal ba 'dod pa de ni su//nyin dang mtshan mor thig le dag las
129a5(rgyud): dkar po'i rgyun 'bab gang zhig mA mra kI te chang ma yin//go ku la sogs mig la sogs pa nyin zhag so sor spro ste sha gzhan res 'ga' dag kyang min//rang rigs sa la gnas
129a6(rgyud): pa'i lha rnams dag gis dag pa'i lus la bdud rtsi lnga rnams bsnyen pa ste//stong par sems ni rab tu zhugs pas ro mnyam byed pa 'khrig pa de ni skye gnas la ma yin//nor ni
129a7(rgyud): gtong pa sbyin pa yid dang bud med 'grogs pa las kyang 'pho ba med pa tshul khrims te//bzod pa sgra la sogs pa mi 'jug pa ste rlung gi gnyi ga'i bgrod pa 'jig pa brtson
129b1(rgyud): 'grus nyid//bsam gtan shes rab dag kyang lhan skyes bde la gnas pa'i sems dang kun tu 'gro ba kun gyi skad//de las sems can don dang rdzu 'phrul srid pa mthar byed mi skye 'thob ste gzhan
129b2(rgyud): pa bzhi rnam so//gcig pu'i sku ni nus pa dang ldan gnas dgu dang bcas nyi shu lnga yi bdag nyid la sogs pa//bsgoms na phyag rgya la sogs grub pa rnamasu nges par nyin zhig 'ga' zhig/
129b3(rgyud): dag gis yang dag 'gyur//rengs pa dang ni zhi dang dbang dang srid pa 'jig pa dag ni zhal gyi dbye ba rnams kyis byed//'byung ba rnams kyi dkyil 'khor la gnas lha min lag 'gro'i rigs
129b4(rgyud): 'di bsgoms pa yis na bsgrub par bya//dkar po yis ni zhi dang rgyas pa bya rang gi yid la domar po yis ni dgug dang dbang //ser pos rengs dang rmongs pa dag ste nag po'i sprin dang mtshung
129b5(rgyud): pas bsad pa dang ni bskrad po'o//sgom dang bzlas pa de bzhin nyi du rang gi yid la byed sku gsung thugs dang rdo rje ni//'byung ba rnams kyi dkyil 'khor la gnas srid pa gsum po mtha'
129b6(rgyud): dag las kyi dbye bas bsgrub par bya//phyogs ni lhag pa las byung bung ba dang ni gsor dang mtshungs pa g.yas dang gcig shos dag dang ni//phung po'i bdud lta glang chen lpags pa dag
129b7(rgyud): kyang ma lus pa shus te rkang pa zung zhig dog nas 'dzin//lha min dbang po'i khrag gi thod pa rab mchog phyag mthil na ste 'chi bdag bdud kyi gdong gi phyag/nyon mongs bdud ni zhabs kyi
130a1(rgyud): bsnol ba gnyis lhag rgyul de'i phyug ni gzhan gyi ngan du bsgom par bya//de lnga yum nonal gcig zung gi phyug gi pad+ma dag la gri zug dang lnga ldan thod po ste//nyi ma las na
130a2(rgyud): zla ngas rang gi rgyu ba bcu gnyis lhag pa'i gcig rgyung spyod pa'i dbang gos//de phyir lus kyi rab tu dbye bas rgyal ba'i bdog par 'gyur te sna tshog sa yum ni de bzhin nyid//shes rab
130a3(rgyud): kyi lus dang bsam pa bde mnyam 'bras ster zla ba nyi ma'i rab tu rgyu bas s+ho/gocig la sogs pa mtha' yos zhal te phyag drang zhabs meng du ma'i kha dog mun pa dag gi mthar//
130a4(rgyud): rab thabs kyi bdag nyid nges par bde mnyam ster te thA ni zla ba nyi ma 'gog pa las//sa la sogs pa rnams ni kun nis 'bregs byed dri med nor bu dang mtshungs stong pa gcig pu
130a5(rgyud): thog ma med cing mtha' med dbus kyang me la tshwa'i mad kyi di bsgribs pa dus kyi 'khor lo'o//khro bo'i dbang po rdo rje shugs ni gnyis lkog rgyal ba'i phyag dang rig byed zhal dang zhabs/
130a6(rgyud): gnyis pa//dmAr seng sbyin dang dbu skye dmar ser rgyal ba'i bdag po'i cod pan ni rgyu ba rnon po gtsigs pa ste//sbrul gyi rgyan dang rab mchog stag gi lpags pa'i sham tha
130a7(rgyud): dadangani gtso ba'o bzhin du mtshon che'i phyog/skye bar mtha' dag rgyal ba'i rigs kyi thod pa kha dog lnga rnams dag gis phreng ba nges par bcings//dri med 'od zer 'phro ba sna
130b1(rgyud): chu skyes nyi ma'i steng du dkyil 'khor sna tshogs mdog la ni//zhabs gnyis dag gis 'byung po'i mgon po lhag pa'i stobs kyis mnan cing g.yas brkyang stangs kyis yang dag gnas//
130b2(rgyud): 'byung po rnams dang lha mo gdengs can lha rnams skrag par byed cing ye shes sems dpa' gtsog gyur pa//bsgoms na zla baM gracig nyid kho nas dung khrongs la gnas pa 'byung ngo tshogs ni
130b3(rgyud): bsgrub par bya//klu rnams chu skyes 'dab brgyad la ste rgyal dang rnam rgyal dag ni nyi ma'i skyeng du bsgyel byas nas//zhabs dag gis ni gdengs can bdag po zung dang pad+ma'i 'dab mar gnas pa
130b4(rgyud): rnams kyi mjug mo yi//rtse mo thams cad mnan nas sprin gyi rigs ni lto ba dag nas nges par kun tu sgo byed pa//de ltar khro bo'i dbang po bsgoms pas nyin zhag dag gri sprin gyi tshogs ni bsgrus
130b5(rgyud): par bya//zhes pa la sogs mi yi bdag po lha rnams dang ni lha mo rnams kyi sgrub thabs so so ru//dkyil 'khor 'dir ni rang gi rgyal ba'i rigs kyi dbang gis las kyi dbye ba mtha' dag
130b6(rgyud): rnams kyis 'gyur//rengs dang zhi ba dus dang dbang dang gzhan nor 'phrog dang bsad pa dang ni bskrad pa dag la yang //sum cu rtsa drug rnal 'byor ma rnams 'gyur te slar yang bzlas dang sbyin
130b7(rgyud): sreg rang gi sa bon gyis//zhi ba la ni bsam gtan dag kyang zhi ba ri bed 'dzin pa ltar dkar lha ni ni ba'i gzugs//drag po la yang bsamo gtan drag po dang ni sbyin nag dang mtshungs kyi
131a1(rgyud): rnams drug pa nyid kyi gzugs//dbang du bya ba bsam gtan chags pa dang bcas nyin mor byed pa'i sku ste lpA na chags pa'i gzugs//ro A pa la ni bsam gtan rmas
131a2(rgyud): pa dang bcas mchog gi gser dang mtshungs pa'i lha rnams rengs pa'i gzugs//zhi dang rgyas pa dag kyang sras bcas rgyal ba'i rigs dang rgyal po lha mo rnams kyis 'grub par 'gyur//dbye

138a1(rgyud): /la sogs bcu drug la ste ka sogs gsum gyis bsgyur bu'i bcu dang hak+Sha gnyis skyes la//thun mtshams mdab ma rnams la bsgrub bya ches kyis bsgyur ba'i dus
138a2(rgyud): la la mtha' dbyangs dang bcas pa rnams//A sogs dbyangs ni re re dag gis chu srin bum po'i dbang las ring po zung ngu dag kyang lnga//phyi rol byu ba ma sum cu gnyis
138a3(rgyud): la bdag gi dang po badz+ra tIk+ShA la sogs yi ge rnams//de dag rnams kyi phyi rol du yang zhi sogs las la wa ya ra la dkyil 'khong rnams nyid do//snying por yi ge yan lag
138a4(rgyud): mchog dang rtse mo can dang g.yo bar rkang pa dbang dang dgug pa la//zhi bo sogs la snying por rkang pa dang ni me dang rlung du mgo bo sngags pas bri bung bya//zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa srid
138a5(rgyud): pa gzhom pa dag dang bskrad dang dgug dang dbang du bye ba dang //rengs pa dang bcas rmongs pa dag kyang srid pa gsum gyi gnasu 'khor lo 'di ni byed 'dir//sngor brjod pa

138b6(rgyud): dpal ldan nyi ba sogs la bskul//de bzhin sngar brjod 'khor lo rnams dag lnga yang rtag tu bsgrub bya'i ming ni bye bai bye bar 'gyur//'di dag thams cad bdag gi drin las rgyal
138b7(rgyud): ba'i bdag po'i bka' yis mi rnams kyis ni 'grub par 'gyur//sgra ni gang zhig snying kha'i phyogs ni yod pa mi mchog rnams kyi rna ba'i bugs thos gyur pa//de la mi yi sems na
139a1(rgyud): gcig tu gyur par myur ba dag kyang ron mnyam par 'gyur ba ste//'jig rten kun tu sgra ni gang zhig srid par skyes pas brjod pa de dang de ni de bzhin thos//khyab bdag gin
139a2(rgyud): rnam shes nyid dang ring du thos pa dag kyang rnal 'byor pa yis dasgom par bya//skyil krungs da cing ba byas nas phan tshun saM dag rog pa min par kha ni rnam par phye ba yis//phyi rol 'du dag
139a3(rgyud): bkug ste de dang bdud rtsi bcas pa lte ba'i dbus su rab tu bcug pa yis//kun tu gdung po dang ni bkres dang skom pa 'phrog cing mchog gi lus la dug kyang yang dag 'gog/de
139a4(rgyud): bar thig le dkar po dbyangs kyis yongs su bskor ba bdud rtsi spro bar byed pa yis kyang //kha yang bkab sti sna yi bu ga rnam pa gnyi ga dag nas phyi rol dag gi rlung ni ma lus pa

139a6(rgyud): 'gyur//lus la zas la sogs pa dang ni bkres dang skom pa 'phrog ste 'chi ba med pa nyid kyang ster//nyi ma las ni gzhan du phyogs te nyid 'od la gnas rang gi grib ma
139a7(rgyud): brtan pa'i mig gis blta//phyi nas na mkha' dag la mngon par brtags na ro mnyam skyes bu du ba'i kha dog mthong bar 'gyur//zla ba drug tu goms pa'i sbyor ba dag las
139b1(rgyud): sa la gnas pa'i gter ni sA yi bu gar mthong //yang na shing gi grib mur rab tu zhugs te na mkha'i mthil du thog le'i phreng ba bsgoms pas//nus ma gang zhig lte ba'i dbus nas
139b2(rgyud): gzhan gyi gnas su bcu gnyis mtha' dang cha yi mthar 'gro ba//de ni lte bar 'gog pa dang bcas dri med klog dang mtshungs pa dbyug pa'i gzugs can langs pa yang //'khor
139b3(rgyud): nas ni 'khor lo'i bar du nges par dman zhing rol pa'i bgod pas dbu ma'i rtsa la bskyod//ji srid gtsug tor bug par bcan thabs nyid kyis phyi rol gyi ni lpags pa dag la khab bzhin

139b7(rgyud): pa'i 'od zer du ma 'phro bar byed/bye dang lus lo dbyer med yul dang rnam par bral ba snang ba tsam ni mkha' la gnas pa yi//sems dang sems byung ba ni bdag gis 'khyud
140a1(rgyud): 'gro ba du mI'i gzugs kyi de ni gcig du'o//snying ni rnyog pa dang bcas las kyi phyag rgya 'di dag brtags pa'i ye shes phyag rgya btang bya ste//yang dag rdzogs pa'i/

140a5(rgyud): rnams kyis ni stong pa nyid bzung nas stong par lta byed pa//de na gtso bos gang zhig 'phro med lhan skyes lus kyi bde ba dag ni sngags kyi theg par bstan//bu led bas rta gleng ngo
140a6(rgyud): mgon stong mchod sbyin dus su lus kyi yul la khyod kyi dbang po ni//bde bar gzung bgyi gang de yulo dang yun n+dan rnams ni ye shes sbyor ba dag la 'gog pa ste//bslab ldan
140a7(rgyud): rnams kyi ba glang lpags par som pal+la'i btu bo khrag dang bcas par 'gyur ba gang //de ni spyi bo'i zla ba'i bdud rtsi b+ha ga'i rdul la gnas shing kun tu 'gro ba dge'adri'i
140b1(rgyud): gzugs//chungs pa srog chags rnams kyi lus dang 'phrog byed drug ste khyab 'jug kyang yod de dag reg byed gsum//oM yig de dag yi ge gsum sde zla nyi srog za de dag rnams dang /

140b3(rgyud): pa'i 'gyur mdo//rigs byed mtha' las gsang ba 'di dag tshangs pa yis ni rnal 'byor pa rnams dag la sngon brjod//dus kyis shes pa rab nyams thub pa rnams kyis 'dir ni srog cha/

140b5(rgyud): zla ba'i mdog tu 'gar yang 'gyur ma yin//sbyor ba med pa'i rig byed tshig ni dam chog rnam par bral ba dag gis bslus pa'i mi rnams gang //de rnams gzhan gyi bu ni mi bskyed
140b6(rgyud): don du nyin mtshan dus su rang gi bud med srung byas nos//bu yis byin pa dag kyang yi dgas kyi ni 'jig rten du song ba yi smyon par 'gyur rolo//des na bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba 'dod
140b7(rgyud): pa'i sbyin pa 'di ni gdug pa'i bram ze rnams kyis sbas//gal te rigs kyi rta yis rgod ma bzang mo la ni rta mchog skyes bu gzhan du 'gyur pa na//dpal yang 'di yi mthu las
141a1(rgyud): sgyur yang 'gyur te bdag po yi ni rnyed pa dag kyang cis ma yin//gang gis tshugs pa can rnams nyin zhag so so'i dus su rang rang bud med dag gi srung bar byed//shi ba
141a2(rgyud): gyur na khyod sul khyod kyi rang gi bud med su ste kye mi me dge'i lus kyis bcings//ba lang sbyin drang sa gni sbyin pa de bzhin gnan yang mi yi 'jig rten du ni longs spyod stong //sman dang
141a3(rgyud): kha zas sbyin pa dag ni mtha' dag nad 'phrog bkres pa dang ni skom pa dag kyang 'phrog/'dod pa'i sbyin pa thams cad du ni bde mnyam 'bras ster 'khor lo'i dus su smos kyang ci zhig/

141a6(rgyud): gzhan gyi bud med bcu drug lo//rang dbang lo ni nyi shu lon pa bu mo dang bcas rang gi chung ma sum cu la ru gyur//sngon tshe sangs rgyas rnams kyisna 'dzin mu dang ni glang chen
141a7(rgyud): rta dang shing rta du ma ga ser gyi khur//sangs rgyas nyid kyi slad du byin zhing slar yang mgo dang khrag dang sha rnams dag kyang rab tu byin//'di rnams kyis ni bzhed pa'i sangs
141b1(rgyud): rgyas nyid du ma gyur de nas 'dod pa'i sbyin phra rab tu byin//gsang ba'i sbyin pa de yis skye sna ba rnams ni rgyal ba bskyed byed rigs lnga sangs rgyas nyid du 'khrungs//zangs ma yis ni gasngar/

142b1(rgyud): mdang dge du stan yang //bstod nams ye shes don gyi smang rtag par mchog tu 'dod pa'i sbyin pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyang //nyan thos rnams la mchod ston la sogs rnal 'byor pa la/

143a3(rgyud): 'dod du ma'i mtshon dang me la 'tshong bas so//bdud rnams dag gis khrag ni btung biSh+pa slad du 'di dag mtha' dag sngon gyi tshe yang bkod pa ste//'jug ngogs bsnyung gnas
143a4(rgyud): dag gis shri bar gyur drang g.yul du bsnun pa nyid dang bo lang nyi ma ni//grol ba'i don dang khyim drang nor gyis yul dang bram ze'i bya ba dag la shrI ba mtho ris so//de yi phyir na rang

143b1(rgyud): /dang bzod pa brtson 'grus rdzogs pa dang //bAsam gtan shes rab dang ni thabs dang smon lam dag dang stobs dang ye shes rdzogs pa chung ma yis//sbyin pa 'di yis myur du rab tu
143b2(rgyud): dga' ba'i yid can rnal 'byor pa yi skye ba 'di la ste//gang zhig rmongs pa'i mi de rnams kyis de la rje su 'ching ba byas nas dmyal bar nye bar 'gro/sa dang dpal 'byor skad shin
143b3(rgyud): g.yo ba'i snying ldan sngar ma yis ni ral gri rnon po dag/bzung ste kun nas 'thab mo pa yis dkrigs pa'i yan log bzhi ldan g.yul du rab tu zhugs pa na//gling chen tsha

143b6(rgyud): pa sbyin sreg dag gis kyang //dag pa'i rim pas dbang ste sngags pa yis ni rgyun tshad med par dga' bo chen po'i sems kyis//ye shes yad bzhin nor bur gang zhig rab
143b7(rgyud): tu gyur pa de las kyang ni rgyal ba'i lam 'di'o//me ni dngul chu'i ngag nyid yin te me dang rnam par bral na nam yang dngul chu 'ching ba med//ma bcings na ni gser dang bral na
144a1(rgyud): smra bo rnams la langs spyod med pa nyid//de bzhin bud med myod pa bral na rtag tu rnal 'byung ba rnamasu dag gi sems ni 'ching mi 'gyur//bcings pa med na
144a2(rgyud): lus 'bigs med ma phrug lus kyis 'dor ni lhan skyes bde ba ster ba min//bskyed mos tshal lam ri bo dag ni skye bo ri dgas bral brla zhi ba'i sngags rnams bsgrub par bya//
144a3(rgyud): drag po rnams ni drag po'i dur khrod du ste lha mchog gronas su rangs pa dang ni rmongs pa yang //dbang dang dgug pa sngags pas mchog gi sa la bde ba phyag rgya kun dang rab tu sbyor
144a4(rgyud): ba la//gnas gzhan dang ni skye gnas gzhan du mi rnams kyi ni skye ba 'bum phrag gis kyang 'grub mi 'gyur//khyim dang grong du bgrang phreng dag gos nyin dang mtshan ma
144a5(rgyud): dus su sngags kyi bzlas pa byas nos ni//ngal zhing rmongs te chags pa dang bral slar yang 'di ni sngags kyi dngos grub med pa brjed par byed//gnas dang snang pa dus dang
144a6(rgyud): mchog gi mtshan mo la go nas yang dag par ni shes pa min pa nyid//rkang pa'i ser mo rnams kyi nad la spyi bor sman rnams kyis ni rab tu byug pa byed pa bzhin//bsam
144a7(rgyud): gtan dang ni sngags kyi bzlas pa byed pa dag dang dkyil 'khor chen po rnams dang gdan rnams dang //sbyin sreg sngags kyi rab gnas rngub chen lo ni rgyal ba'i rigs rnams
144b1(rgyud): skyon drang bdu lnga ba med par yang //bud mod sbyor ba rnam par spangs nas rab mchog khyab bdag byed pa phyag rgya'i dngos grub stor bar byed//de phyir do ni nyin nag so so'i dus su na khyod pa/
144b2(rgyud): los thar pa'i slad bsgom par bya//rang gi sems ni rgyal dang gnyid la rab tu zhugs pa mi yi bdag po rang bzhin med par 'gyur//sad la rang bzhin dang bcas gsal bar byed do//
144b3(rgyud): dag srog chags rnams kyis thar pa'i lam ma yin//dngos dang dngos med kyis phyi sems kyi rdo rje rnal 'byor pa rnams dgra la bde mnyam ster ba min//gang zhig mkha' ye shes
144b4(rgyud): la 'khyud lhan skyes bde bar gnas pa'i rang sems de ni thar pa sbyar//oM AHhu~M ho rim par gnas paso dang por 'dir ni rtag tu chang ni sbyangs nas rtogs par bya//rab tu 'bar bar
144b5(rgyud): byas te ri bong can ni zhu ba bzhin du rim pas bsgom pa byas nas ni//snod de nas ni thig le dag gis lag pyad ri bong can gyi mang med rtso mos sa dag la//phyi rol du ni zur gsum
144b6(rgyud): byas nas de ye dbus su nyin mor byed pa dang mtshungs zlum pa'o//de yi dbus su 'di yi ye shes 'khor lo srid gsum gnas pa dag kyang sngags pas bsgrims byas nas/

145a2(rgyud): po rdo rje rnams kyis sbyin//'byung ba rnams la zos pa'i lhag ma slar yang dge ba'i don du sbyin pa'i tshigs bcad 'dri bklag go/mgo dang mgrin pa snying khe lce gsang ga drug tor

145b1(rgyud): Ad+hA tu gyur//rgyu rgyal po ma sa nadu lus ni nges par dang /tshan 'dun la 'gyur ba rnams dag lnga gsus//byas pa rnams ni smin par byung ba'i don du mchog sa

146a1(rgyud): yi re khA sa dang chu dang sreg zla rlung dang na mkha' las skyes rnams kyiso//dus kyi rtsa yis gtso bo'i chu skyes g.yo ba me yi dkyil 'khor la sogs lpags pa la sogs/

151a2(rgyud): dbang byed thim pa zhes 'dir mdun du de nyid lnga yi rang bzhin rnams kyis te//rlung dang dbang ldan lha min maM dang 'og dang mkha' dang lha dang gshin rje gnod sbyin nub tu yang //gi hUM/
