151a7(rgyud): pas thog ma dbus dang mtha' mar phye ba bzlas bya ste//srog gis byin gyis brlabs pa gang zhig gnyi ge'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis rang rang las kyi rjes 'thun pa'o//ro yi 'gro
151b1(rgyud): rnams la gnas mkha' 'gro ma dang rdo rje mkha' 'gro rnams ni myur du 'grub par 'gyur//dbugs rnams gang dag skye ba'i dus su dbu ma lnga ni rkang pa dang bcas ro dang mngar gyur pa/
151b2(rgyud): brgyad rnams kyis 'khor lor 'gyur te 'og dang mkha'i yi dbang gis sgo yi dbus gnas lha mo rnams//rkang pa gcig gis bai skyed pa srid pa gsum gyi yum ste phyag na gri bug dang ni
151b3(rgyud): thod pa can//bdud rtsi bde ba'i cha yis 'khyud pa nyi ma zla ba'i steng du g.yas brkyang dus kyi 'khor lo'o//lnga gsum me lce yul dang ston dbang gis zla ba nyi ma'i gdan rnams chu gtar
151b4(rgyud): rkang pa las//gza' bdun dang ni rtogs pa nyi ma nyin mor byed dang ri bIng can gyi gdon ni gzhan pa rnams//nag po dkar po'i rdzogs pa nyi ma nyin mir byed dang ri bong can gyi gdan na
151b5(rgyud): gzhan rnams te//'di nyid la ni ri bo'i gza' rnams mnyam dang mi mnyam gnas la nyi ma zla ba'i gdan rnamaso//zla ba nyi ma'i rkang pa rtsibs rnams dang ni pad+ma'i 'dab ma sgo bzhi
151b6(rgyud): zur gyi ro rnams te//slar yang rkang pa gnyis 'gyur de dag rnams ni nyin mor byed dang ri bong can gyi gdan rnams nyid//rtogs pa gza' dang nyi ma'i rkang pa ma nyi ma dang mi mnyam
151b7(rgyud): gnas la chu gter rkang pa gdan rnams te//nyi ma 'am ni gang pa'i zla ba la 'gyur rigs kyi dbang gis gtso bo yang na kha sbyor la//rlung la reg bya'i zhal gcig dang ni ston gzhan
152a1(rgyud): /b+h+rUM dang blos rgyu sa ga nal na sa sa pa'o//tsam can lug rgyus da ba bya zhal na gronyas 'gyur ta rgyus gang zhalda no gsum par//tshul zhal yang
152a2(rgyud): byung nga gzugs par yin pa d+har+g+has 'di zhes ni ban pa'o/sa l+le dri la sags pa 'i rgyu maH dz+nyA nan ma hU~M pa~M dang nas ni y-i hU~M//rnamakha'i la ni zhal yang /
152a3(rgyud): spyo ba rnam pa rdzi ste rgyu yis gdab pa'i zhal ni drug pa'o//de bzhin du ni ye shes khams la 'byur to/na dpying las stong ba drug gi zhalda rnams//gcig ni bzhi la bslus pa
152a4(rgyud): bde ma ma 'dres blo sted ba dag ste gnyis dang gsum nI bsreg pa ste//shes rab thabs ni zhal ba rgya sbyin rnam pa gsum gyi dbang gis zhal ni bcu gnyis rnam pa ban/
152a5(rgyud): blublanu ma sems dbye bas rnam pa de ni sgra rnam pa gsum gyi zhal yang dus sbyor dbya bas khu dog gsum//dus sbyor byed pa phyug gi dbye ba me mnyam mnyam pa 'khyud pa dag /
152a6(rgyud): kyi lus dang sa mas lani//thun mchi mas chu shis s+t+rai phywa las te zhel gsu ma yi phyag ni 'a khyud pa tshe shes so//sa rab sgyur dang snyoms par rigs
152a7(rgyud): dab kyang dgod pa la sogs rnams ni thun gyi mngon mtsha mas la'o//shes rab yan log dpar dang ser po la ni ngas par dus kyi 'khar lo'i bsam pa rab tu 'jug/
152b1(rgyud): can gyo g.yon bdun yan lag ga/ dung sbyin nag mtshungs pa dag la shes rab bsdam pa'o//mchog smras la shes rab bsdam pas phye ba g.yon dang mdun gyi yan lag drug ni zhi bang
152b2(rgyud): 'gyur// drug pa g.yas dang rgyab kyi yan lag mtshig gi rgyal ba'i bdag po'i bsam pas phye ba de bzhin nyid//shes rab kyis phye rgyal ba dag gi rab mchog tshogs kyi rigs
152b3(rgyud): gnyis kyi rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur//shes rab kyi ni gtso bos phye ba nges par phyogs bral du yang rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs nyid//g.yas dang g.yas min nyi ma dang ni ri bong can gyi
152b4(rgyud): sku dag zung ste shar dang nub nyid kyang //nag po ser po dag ste sngon po ljang ku dog kyang de bzhin mkha' dngos 'og yang dag gnas//dkar po rnams kyi shes rab dmar po dmar po//
152b5(rgyud): rnams kyi ri bo 'dzin pa ltar dkar de bzhin nyid//ser po rnams kyi khe dog nag mo dkang min rigs rnams kyi yang mchog gi gser dang mtshungs pa'o//sngon po rnams kyi
152b6(rgyud): kha dog sna tshogs slar yang ljang ku rnams kyi sngon po rnamasu de bzhin gsungs//de bzhin nges par lha mo rnams kyi rang rig phyogasu gnas pa'i lha rnams dag tu rig par bya/
152b7(rgyud): shes rab rgyud ni shar nas sled yang rnal 'byor rje su rigs pa nyid ni nub kyi zhal nas so//g.yas kyi zhal nas rgyal ba'i bdag pos rnal 'byor rgyud gsungs g.yon
152'a1(rgyud): nas bya ba la stsogs so//shang na sa nal khyod spyod pa nyid do smrar yang chub rkyen nas nges par dbum+b+ha mtha' dag go/nodro sde pa ni g.yas kyi zhal nas gsus/
152'a2(rgyud): te da/ po'i zhwalda nAs dag pa'i bye brag skye bo'o//nub kyi zhal nos dri mi brjod dag byed dang ni rgyal ba'i dbang ngos g.yon gyi zhal nas mchod sbyini gsungs//g.yas kyi zhul
152'a3(rgyud): sman tshig rig byung mchog gi dusrog bya'i rigs la srod srung shar gyi zhal nas//shar gyi zhal nas rigs can rgyud slar yang nub kyi zhul nas mkha' lding dang ni 'byung
152'a4(rgyud): rgyud//g.yon gyi zhal nas zhi ba'i mtha' ste nyi ma 'char ka dang mtshungs g.yas pa nas ni khyab 'jug chos//rgyo ba nas 'phrul la ldog pa mchog tu da/re bi'i zhal nas
152'a5(rgyud): g.yon gyi lha drang rab tu gnas pa ste//g.yas nas rig pa drag po min dang slar yang rlu shrI gau A s+ye sa zhi ba dag/stong pa'i zhal nas stong pa dbang phyug dag ni srid gsum
152'a6(rgyud): drudag pos 'jig rten pa yi don du spyos//rdzogs ldan gsum ldan gnyis ldan dang ni gzhan partsod dus rgyub kyi tshul la sogs pa'i ts+tsha ba las//de bzhin dpa
152'a7(rgyud): rim pa sogs dang nyi ma'i bgrong po'i dbang gis thun mtshams bzhi po nyid dag //kha zas dag ni g.yas kyi zhal nas mchog tu 'jigs pa dag kyang rgyab kyi zhal
152'b1(rgyud): nas smyos pa ste//mdun gyi zhal nas la khrig pa nyid du mchog tu dkar ba'i zhal nas rgyal po rmi lam dag dang gnyid//rgyab nas rje rigs gnyis rgyus mi yi bdag po dang ni de banan
152'b2(rgyud): dmings rigs dag kyang rim pas 'gyur//rgyal ba'i bdag pos mdun nas thams cad yod par sgru ba gsungs te g.yas nas mang pos bgyur ba'o//rgyab kyi zhal nus gnas brnyan
152'b3(rgyud): byeste smrang yang dge 'dun pal chen po ni g.yon gyi zhal nas//mdun gyi zhal nas mi rnams dang ni sbyar yang rgyo kyi nal nas dung 'gro rnams ni ngas par spros//g.yas kyi nal nas 'byur
152'b4(rgyud): pom+b+ha rnams mchog tu da/ ba'i zhal nas dmyal ba rnams dang lha min rnams//mdun gyi zhal nas spros pa dag kyang snying khe'i 'khor lo nas 'gyur rgya ba zhal lte ba'i 'khor lo nas/
152'b5(rgyud): g.yas kyi zhal nas lings spyod rdzogs pa nas 'gyur kun tu g.yon gyi zhal nus lhan cog skyes pa nas//'kho l-i rnams kyis zhal gyi dbus nus lus la dngos po spro ba dang ni sbyang
152'b6(rgyud): panyid 'gyur//'jig rten gyisum po mthu' dag rnams kyang rgyal bye ba skyed byed zhal gyi dbyi ba rnams kyis yang dag go//dpal ldan zla ba zla ba rje shil rnam par rtog pa med pa'i rang dzin
152'b7(rgyud): las ni tshwa byung ba//de bzhin 'jig rten du ni rgyal ba'i bdag po'i phung po yi rten tham sa cad mkhyen pa'i chos 'jig ste//tshun sa pa ni khams la kun tu bton nas ri mnyan
153a1(rgyud): 'gyur ba ji bzhin nyid du chos dag ni//sems can rnams kyi dag pa'i snyoms kyis rnam pa mang por 'gyur te sngon gyi las kyi mthu la so//srid gsum gnas na sems/
153a2(rgyud): can don gyi byed po dang ni yid bzhin nor bu lnga yang bsam pa med//sems la gnas de mi dge 'bras bu'i dbang gis sdig pa'i lngas can sems can rnams kyis mi mthong ste//yid
153a3(rgyud): bzhin nor bu'i skyon min mi dge ba dang dge ba'i 'bras bu sems can thams cad rab tu sbyor//sems de dag na mi de yang ni rgyal ba'i dbang por 'gyur te rgyal po gzhan gyis ci zhig bya///
153a4(rgyud): gang gis myu gu 'di bskyed bskyed par byed pa de ni dngos po bskyed nas rnam par nyams por 'gyur//nyams pa d+yA yas skyes pa rab tu 'gyur te slarar+ya yang sa bon rgyal po dag gi bskyod
153a5(rgyud): byed do//snga ma gang de bzhon gyi dngos las shi ba zhes pa'i tshig ste rang gi ngo bos skyes pa min//gang gis stong pa nas ni sa la 'ongs pa bde ba'i skad cig de yis stobs bcu 'gro/
153a6(rgyud): bar 'gyur//pade nas bde la rjes chags skad cig 'dir ni lhan skyes dngos po gzhon la rjesu chags pa min//phung po gang dag de yis bskyed rnams slar yang bde ba'i skad cig
153a7(rgyud): de yis bskyed par byed pa ste//dag pa las chos de las gzhan te slar yang de las gzhan dang de las rnam par dag pa'o//dag pa'i sa la sa bon btab pa las ni rtse ba
153b1(rgyud): rnams dang lo ma me tog 'bras bu bzhin//sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang ro dang mchog gi ro ste phra rab dag ni rnam pa drug/dri la sogs pa re res dmar zhing yul dang rnam par bral ba mtha' ma
153b2(rgyud): ye shes lta bya rnams//'dod pa gzugs dang gzugs med rnams ni zung dang zung dang ri bong can te mthi mchis kyi dbyings//rnam pa kun ldan de dag kun nas rtag tu 'pho med bde ba
153b3(rgyud): lhan skyes rten du gyur pa'o//skur yang sa sogs khams la phan tshun du ni gtso bo'i dngos po dag la chung ba'i dngos rnams gnas//phun tshun phung po 'byung ba dang ni yul dang yul
153b4(rgyud): can rnams dang pha ni tshun bdud dang ma rig pa//phan tshun rjes chags lnga ni ro yi 'gro rnams la gnas sdug bsngal dang ni bde ba'i skad cig gis//rnam pa thams cad pa rnams
153b5(rgyud): kun nas gzhan gyi stan mi dga' mi byed rdo rje yang dag gnas//de dag rnams kyis dus kyi 'khor lo rdzu 'phrul rab tu gsal byed chen po du ma sprul pa'i sku//rdo rje 'bar ba 'phro//
153b6(rgyud): ba rnams kyis 'dod pa'i khams na gnas pa lha min dang ni mi rnams dang //longs spyad rdzogs pas gzugs can rnams dang mkha' la rgyal ba'i sras sogs dgra bcom rnams/
153b7(rgyud): la chos sku yis//stong pa'i cha yas srid gsum mtha' dag stong pa'i zad par rlung rnams kyis ni rlung gi zad par ste//me yi cha shas rnams kyis me yi zad par chu yang 'gro la
154a1(rgyud): spros pa'i chu cha rnams kyis//'dzin ma'i chu shas rnams kyis sa yi zad par tshogs pa'i yul rnams kyis ni dngos po'i rang bzhin kun//kun nus na mkha'/
154a2(rgyud): dag dang mtshungs pa gcig gi bdag nyid 'di ni dge pa'i sa la ston par byed//de ltar sangs rgyas skur 'gyur bde ba gcig pu'i rang bzhin phyir na 'tsho bar yang ni mi 'gyur//
154a3(rgyud): degacig pu la sa rnam pa lnga ste mtha' dag rgyal ba mchog rnams kyis ni mngon rdzogs byang chub 'di//rnam pa nyi shu'i rang bzhin dung ni slar yang de nas sgyu 'phrul du ma'i rang gi
154a4(rgyud): ngo bo'o//de yi skad cig gcig ni bde mnyam 'bras bu ster bar 'gyur te las gzhon gyi ni rang bzhin min//'dir thabs 'pho med skad cig gang yin 'dir ni lhan skyes/
154a5(rgyud): chos kyi dbyings su rab tu zhugs pa lnga'o//mtha' yus sangs rgyas zhing rnams dang ni dpag med ston rnams dang na mkha' la sngogs khams rnams dang //gnas dang ste
154a6(rgyud): dang nyam smra pa rnams gsam+b+hi zhes pa'i srid pa dang ni 'gro ba drug tu snyoms can kun//sangs rgyas khre bI l+yA sa gas rnams dang sgying rje'i thugs ldan byeng chub sems dpa'i
154a7(rgyud): btsun mor bcas rnams te//'di dag rnams ni srid pa gsum gyis phyag byas rgyal ba bde'i byung gcig pu'i 'khor lo gcig yin no//spro dang lpags pa she
154b1(rgyud): khyog r-i dang bcas pa dag kyang de bzhin rus pa dang nI rkang dang rtsa//de dag rnams la sr-ig+ma so gas rlung ste kun nas rlung gi dbus su nyi ma zla ba'i bgrod pa'o//zla ba'i da du su dri med nor bu bzhin du
154b2(rgyud): dngos po kun gyis 'khyud pa'i rnam par shes pa ste//de ni dngos dang dngos med gnyis med nyid dang mchog gi bdud rtsi'i gi 'phang khyab byed gzhom med de//spu la sogs pa zla ba'i
154b3(rgyud): mtha' ni mtha' dag lus la gnas rnams gang zhig sa bcur gsungs pa rnams//sde pa drug dang la sogs gzhan rnams de dag dus kun rnal 'byor rnams la bde mnyam 'bras/
154b4(rgyud): bu ster//de phyir bla ma'i zhabs la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis ni thar pa'i slad bcil bar bya//lus las ma gtogs gang zhig khyab byed thar pa ster ba'i sangs
154b5(rgyud): rgyas gzhan ni 'ga' yang yod pa min//sems can rnams ni sangs rgyas yin te sangs rgyas chen po gzhan 'dir 'jig rten khams na yod ma yin//de rnams mnyes par
154b6(rgyud): byas pas dpag med srid pa gcod de rnam par mi rtog pa las so//rnal 'byor pa ni 'khu bar byed na dmyal ba ngu 'bod la sogs chen po'i mtha' ru 'gro bar 'gyur//de phyir/
154b7(rgyud): sems ni dag pa na yang mkhas dang mi mkhas skye bo rnams la 'gal ba mi bya'o//sems can dag dang 'grogs pa thob nas mi yi bdag po dag pa'i byams pa la sogs semasu
155a1(rgyud): 'gyur//mi dge'i ston dang ldan 'khor ba pa ni drug po rnams kyi zhe sdang chags sogs semasu 'gyur//dus kun du ni byang chub sems kyang 'gro ba dang ni 'gro bar
155a2(rgyud): 'dod pa rnam pa gnyi su 'gyur//thar par 'jug pas dman zhing smon pa rnam par spangs pa dag ni thams cad dus su bdud kyi sems//srid pa gsum gyi gnas su bdud
155a3(rgyud): rnams zhi ba min pa dI ni byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba byed//bdud kyi dbang po rdzu 'phrul gyis dman mchog du 'jigs byed yin te ston pa gcig pu rdzu 'phrul ldan//bdud rna
155a4(rgyud): kyekyi ni bdud kyi blo dang skyob pa rnams kyi bde ba'i blo gros gzhan gyi snying la 'jug/de phyir sangs rgyas mthu rnams kyis ni srid pa gsum po mtha' yas dus su 'jug par 'gyur//
155a5(rgyud): rgyal ba rnams kyis 'jig rten khams la chung gsungs gang yin de yang mi rnams ye shes nyid ma yin//sangs rgyas rnams la lhan skyes lus kyi dbang gis khru ni gcig
155a6(rgyud): dang du ma dag gi tshad med//las kyi sar ni srog chags rnams la sems can rjes 'thun chud dag rtag tu rab tu gsol bar byed//grol te tshad 'di dag gi 'dod pa brjod na
155a7(rgyud): lha rnams kyis 'di med pa pa zhes brjod par 'gyur//gang gis rgyal ba'i dbang po bskyed cing nyin zhag so so'i dbang las gang gis mngal nas nges par 'byung //
155b1(rgyud): skad cig gang gis 'gyur ba dag dang rnam par bral ba grub cing g.yo ba g.yo ba med gyur pa//sangs rgyas bya ba de spangs nas ni bde mnyam dang bral stong pa gzhan dag gang zhig sgom
155b2(rgyud): byed pa//de yi bskal pa bye da du ma rnams kyis sangs rgyas nyid dang lhan skyes bde ba dag kyang ring //nom po'i shing las rgun 'brum min te dug las bdud rtsi dang ni tshangs pa'i shing
155b3(rgyud): las 'dam skyes dang //stong pa las ni myang 'das badri ba mi dge'i dang ngo las dge ba srog chags gsod las grub pa rnams//mchod sbyin dag las phyugs rnams mtho ris
155b4(rgyud): mchog tu zhi bo'i go 'phang dbang po rnams ni 'gog lus min//rig byed las ni kun mkhyen gsung dang 'gyur med bde ba g.yo med 'gyur ba mi dag sems las min//san
155b5(rgyud): rnams kyi sdig pa'i sems ni mi yi bdag po bdud kyi tshogs kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur//bsod nams ye shes rjes chags bde ltar dag kyang rtag tu byang chub sems
155b6(rgyud): dpa' rnams kyis byin rlabs pa'o//gang phyir bde ba'i dam tshi go dbang gis bdud dang nyon mongs bcom nas mya ngan 'das par 'gro byed pa//de phyir bdud rnams nyi ma so
155b7(rgyud): dus su de dag rnams la du ma yis ni bgegs rnams byed//rgyal ba'i lhan skyes bde ba 'di ni 'phel ba'i don slad dang por las kyi phyag rgya bsnyen por bya//de nas nyi ma'i
156a1(rgyud): gzugs ni lus dang dod dang rkang pa gtsug tor yan lag thams cad rdzogs pas//zlog gi dbyug pa'i rjes 'thun 'phro med bye ba skyed par byed ma mtshan nyid
156a2(rgyud): yan lag rab tu rdzogs//rdo rje rnams kyis rab tu snang bar byed ma srid na gsum gnas lus kyis dbyings ni de nas 'gyur//'gyur ba med pa'i bde tso bris stor phyag rgya ban pa
156a3(rgyud): 'di rnams grong dang 'brog dgon dur khrod dang //mr-i gtsang bya dang gcing ba'i gnas dang khyim dang lha yi khang pa thams cad du ni dus kun du//shin tu dga' bo nyi dga' ba la ga
156a4(rgyud): 'jig rten lam las rab grol rigs dang rigs min mngon spyod cing //lus stobs bde ster bza' ba btung ba lta sogs longs spyod dang ldan rnal 'byor rnams kyis bsgom pa/
156a5(rgyud): bya/rlung ni yang dag drad pa rnams kyis glog gi ma yi rtse mos spyi bo'i zla ba zhu par byed //thig le glang gung nub 'di las mgrin pa snying khA la son+da lte ba gsang ba dgel
156a6(rgyud): gag/thig le lus ni g.yo ba'i khu ba rdo rje nor bu la gnas rgyal mtshon rtse la 'god pa gang //de ni shes rak+ShAM ye shrIs skud cig gal te thig le'i phreng ba 'pho ba med pa
156a7(rgyud): bde na'o//de phyir g.yo med bde ba'i skad cig lhan cig skyes pa 'dir ni chos kyi dbyings kyis stir byed de//srog gis ro yi 'gro ba rnams la gnas pa thams cad bkug cing
156b1(rgyud): nyon mongs bdud rnams bcom byas nas//rdzu 'phrul kun mkhyen sa dang sring gsum bla ma nyid ni rnal 'byor rnams kyi skyo ba 'di la sna to//gal te lam du rab zhugs 'tshob
156b2(rgyud): 'gyur na de tshe de yi 'dzin pas skyo ba gzhan la'o//gang zhig ston med cing dngos chud yul dang rnam bral dri ni sku yi phyag rgya rnam pa gnyis//de nas chags pa rjes chags dang ni
156b3(rgyud): ston gter gzhan dag kyang gsung gi rang bzhin rnam pa gnyis//gnag dang dkar la rjes chags yul gyi ston la dga' thugs kyi phyag rgya rnam pa gnyis 'gyur te//brgyad dang gnyis
156b4(rgyud): dang lnga dang lnga dang gsal bar mkha' dus dang ni stong pa rig byed dag gi lo//rin chen dbang po mi 'byung bar du rgyal ba mchog bskyed ma ni rnal 'byor pa yis bsrung bar bya//rin chen
156b5(rgyud): dbang po rab tu 'byung ba'i dus su mtha' dag ston gter gyi dkyil 'khor bzhengs byas nas//sangs rgyas byin rlabs sngags rnams kyis ni gsong ba'i pad+mar bde mnyam sngags dang
156b6(rgyud): bcwasu pu spro bya ste//gsang bar bsrung ba rab tu byas nas rdo rje nor bu la gnas byang chub sems ni myang bar bya//de le gang zhig bu ru gyur pa rgyal ba bsgying byed sras po de ni 'jam
156b7(rgyud): pa'i rdo rje nyid//shes rab lhag pa las ni 'go'o zhig tsho na bu mor 'gyur to nges par sangs rgyas yum du 'gyur//de nas gzhan ma me tog gsum gyis pad+ma dkar 'dzin ji
157a1(rgyud): b+ha la dang phyag na rdo rje ste//me tog brgyad kyis gzhan brgyad phyobras dang phyogs bral du gnas rdzu 'phrul tshe ldan khro ba'i rgyal po rnams//zla ba de la rdul gang /
157a2(rgyud): rab tu byung ba de ni slar yang 'jam dbyangs rab tu bskyed pa ste//lo ni nyi shu dog gi bIr du so so'i rdul la byang chub sems dpa' snying skyobs chen po ste//de nas stong pa dang ni rig
157a3(rgyud): byed par du cung zad snying stobs cha shos dman par rab tu 'gyur//slar yang lo ni nyi shu'i bar du de bas kyang ni snying stobs chung zhing brtson 'grus chung ba'o//de nas skye gnas la
157a4(rgyud): ni rdul med yul ni rab tu bcom pa'o de nyams pa las dbang ma yin//'on kyang sa bon nyams pa la ni shes rab dbang bskur rgyal ba'i bdag pa'i gsung gis sbyin par bya//
157a5(rgyud): de dag rnams kyi sde chu me rlung na mkha'i ljon rgyal ba'i yan lag dag gris btsal bar bya//byang chub sems kyi bsnyen pa 'di ni sems can don gyi byed pa mo ste 'bras bu mang por
157a6(rgyud): 'gyur//gang zhig khrag ni 'thung byed rab mchog lta mi rnams kyi sbrang bu de ni bdud rtsi gcig pu ste//skyugs pa snying kha gsad pa'i kha nas rdo rje nor bu la gnas chu skyes
157a7(rgyud): nang du rab zhugs min//bshong ba gci ba khrag dang shi ni mchog tu ro mnyam skyugs pa'i dbus su rab tu zhugs pa ste//'di dag rnams ni ye shes bdud rtsi srid
157b1(rgyud): pa gsum gyi bla ma yis kyang rgyud rnams kun tu bstan//shes rab chos 'byung la ni grang zhig lhung gA'i bde ba dag kyang rab tu 'bad pas bsung bar bya//de yis sems can gang
157b2(rgyud): su zhig 'byung ba de ni rgyal ba'i rigs la byang chub sems dpa' nyid//de phyir de ni nyin zhag so so'i dus su bdud kyi pho nya srin po rnams kyis za ru 'jug/shes rab me tog dang ldan
157b3(rgyud): zos pa zhi ba bde ba'i 'bras bu ster bar don du 'jug par byed//mchog gi bde ba la gnas rdo rje ma 'khums nyid kyi bar du chu skyes las ni dbyung mi bya//gang tshe 'dod pa grub pa/
157b4(rgyud): de yi tshe na 'di ni sangs rgyas byin gyis brlabs par rab tu 'gyur//rdo rje chu skyes dag nas gzhug bya rang gi rdo rje'i snying khar ye shes 'khor lo rabo bcug ste//'di yi 'od
157b5(rgyud): zer rnams kyi gnyi ga'i lus ni gang bar byas nas rnam pa thams cad pa nyid byed//gal te 'di ni grub par ma gyur rdo rje nor bu la ni yang dag gnas pa bza' bar bya//shes
157b6(rgyud): rab kyi ni chos 'byung gnas la mtha' dag rgyal ba'i rigs ni dasrung ba'i don du dgod par bya//shes rab ldan pa la'o de nas gtsug pu la ste slar yang gsung ni rab gsungs sangs
157b7(rgyud): rgyas sku//gang su 'di ni nyams la mngon par dga' byed g.yon can de ni rdo rje can gyis gsod par byed//srid pa gsum gyis bdag pas drag po'i las kyi rang bzhin du ma'i/
158a1(rgyud): sngags rnams rab tu gsungs pa gang //de dag thams cad bdud kyi phyogs nyams 'jigs pa skyeng byeng srog chags rnams la nam yang ma yin//gang zhig dran
158a2(rgyud): pa rnams kyi byed po g.yul gyi yul la dga' zhig gsod byed gzhan yang mu stegs po//de rnams la ni mchog gi rgyal sras rnams kyis srog chags bsrung ba'i don du de dag sbyar//
158a3(rgyud): bar bya//mkha' 'gro rdo rje sngon rnams phyugs kyi skye bo gsod la sangs rgyas pa yis gsol ba gdab mi bya//sems can rnams ni srung ba'i don du srid pa gsum gyi bla mas
158a4(rgyud): 'jig rten khams su spros pa ste//de phyir de rnams nyin zhag so so'i dus su srung bar byed cing sgrub pa po lo sdang bar byed/bsgrub bya dag ni las kyi mthu yis shi bar gyur na
158a5(rgyud): 'di ni sgrub pa po yi bdud yino//skyes bu rnams kyi sems ni kun nas mi dge'o 'bras bu'i dbang gis phran tshegs rig pa la rjes tshogs//rig pa 'di yis srid pa gsum
158a6(rgyud): po mtha'i dgra skad cig gis ni bdag dbang du bri ba'o//zhes pa'i bsam pa rkam chags sems kyis ye shes sbyin pa rnam par spangs nas dmyal bar rab tu 'jug/rgyab tu rdzas
158a7(rgyud): dang rang gi khyim thab gzhan gyis dbang 'gyur kye ma ngan pa'i chos la rab tu 'jug/shes rab ma yin thabs kyang min pa 'di ni lhan cig skyes pa'i sku ste chos kyi skur gyur pa/
158b1(rgyud): shos rab thabs kyi rang bzhin nges par mun pa dang bral ye shes dang ni rnam shes dbye ba las//'di ni ljongs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ste sgra brnyan lta bu sems can du ma'i dron ni byed pa po/
158b2(rgyud): sems can rnams ni smin pa'i sladu slar yang 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprul pa'i sku ru 'gyur//rdo rje sems dpa'i gcig pu 'di ni dus mtha'i sprin drang mtshungs pa he ru ka ni byung bar
158b3(rgyud): gyur//gdug pa rnams ni smin pa'i don te de yang dam tshig rgyal ba rmongs pa rnamago ni byed ba'i don//rin chen dbang po sdug bsngal ldan pa rnams kyi de yang pad 'dzin chags can rna
158b4(rgyud): kyi chags pa'i slad//bge gis rnams dag ni gzhom pa'i don du phyag gi pad+ma ral gri dron yod grub par byung bar gyur//zhe sdang les ni sna tshogs yum gang dus mtha'i rtse mo can
158b5(rgyud): mtshungs de ni mkha' 'gro mar byung gyur//gti mug dag las spyan ma zhes byi mchog gi snying rje mA ma kI na~M nga rgyal rgyu la so//chags las de ni gos dkar zhes bya mtha' dag ston
158b6(rgyud): gter te sgrolA ma yang ni phrag dag las//sna tshogs gzugs can glanyis po 'di dag yul dang yul can gzhan rnams thams cad du yang byung bar gyur//phung po lnga yi rAng
158b7(rgyud): bzhin rnams kyis rdo rje btsun mo ri b+ha ga rnams la bzhugs pa brtse ba yis//nges pa rnam par ma bsgrubs bsod nams min pa bsags pa'i sems can rnams ni smin pa'i
159a1(rgyud): don du ste//gtsang ma'i gnas la sogs par bcom ldan gang zhig rnam par bzhugs pa nyan thos rnams kyi slanga'o//gang zhig e waM yi ge la gnas mchog gi nga/
159a2(rgyud): pa can rnams mchog la dgod pa'i don du'o//sems can rnams ni smin pa'i slad du sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dbye ba rnams kyis dus kun du//nges par rdo rje can gyi bzhugs pa//
159a3(rgyud): rnams gsum phye dang nang dang gzhan du yang ni rab tu 'gyur//phyi rol sna tshogs phyogasu 'gyur te mchog gi lus la srog gi rlung na rib tu rgyu ba'o//khyab bdag gi ni sa sogs
159a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dag la rab gyur gang de rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la//sgra li sogs la gang zhig rang sems 'gro ste yul med pa yang gzhon ni de bzhin kho na'o//grang zhig aM
159a5(rgyud): waM yi ge las gnas mchog tu bde ba'i gnas lnga sku gsung thugs ni zhugs pa'o//gcig bu rdo rje can ni dbye ba gsum ste yul dang yul can khams kyis kyang bsgo
159a6(rgyud): ba'o//dus gsum gnas gsum du zhugs srid pa gsum du'ang gnas pa sems can du ma'i don gyi slang du'o//rgyud rnams dag las 'di skad bdag gis thos she/
159a7(rgyud): gsungs pa gang de 'di ltar bdag gis shes pa ste//rdo rje can ni zla ba zhu las rdo rje gang zhig spyi mgrin snying /be'i chu skyes lte gsang dang //bud med rnams kyi b+ha gar de ni
159b1(rgyud): /thig le grol /sum+b+ha gyis mchog gi pad+ma la gnas pa//de 'drir sangs rgyas zhing du rab tu zhugs pa bcom ldan 'das su rnal 'byor rnams kyis rig par bya//skye ba spu mur rang gi
159b2(rgyud): stesnying gis bskyed pa'i zhi dang chags pa la sogs dngos po rnams kyi ni//bag chags stobs kyis 'khor lor gnas pa gcig ni du mar mthong ste smon lam ston dbang giso//don
159b3(rgyud): gcig du ma'i skad ni rang rang dngos po rnams kyis srog chags rnams kyi snying la rab tu 'jug/gnas can rnams kyis dasod nams sledadu 'khor lo la gnas bsod snyoms la ni rnam
159b4(rgyud): pAr rgyu ru gshegs//dud 'gro yi dwags lha min rnams dang lto 'phye lha dang mi ni 'phags pa bod la sogs rnams la//byang dang 'byung 'gyur dwa ltar byung ba rnam pa gsum dang rtag tu/
159b5(rgyud): bden po'i chos ni gsung byed cing /rang rang skad gzhan dag gis srid pa gsum po mchong med pa lam la yang dag 'god byed pa//'di ni bde mnyam 'bras bu sbyar ba tha~Md
159b6(rgyud): mkhyen pa'i gsung ste lho yi skad kyang ma yi no//sangs rgyas rnams kyi'ang rtogs bya min pa dpag med lhan dang ldan sangs rgyas sprul pa sgyu ma ni//srid pa gsum gyi gnas su
159b7(rgyud): bdag nyid ston par byed brgya byin gzhu ni ji bzhin nyid du'o//sna tshogs dngos rnams kyis phye rgyal ba dang bcas lha mi rnams kyi rang rang sems la rab zhugs pa//'di ni ma skye
160a1(rgyud): chos te tshul na mkhar duzhin du 'dir ni skye bar 'khrul pa snad du'o//rgyal dun bu ya rdo rje yul dang yul can rnams sgro bgrod bya min pa rnam pa thams cad/
160a2(rgyud): gsung gi rdo rje sems can thams cad rang snyid //de rnams dag bris rje s+t+waM ni go bdu byed pa'o//rdo rje can gyi thugs kyi rdo rje sems can rnams kyi sems kyi rang bzhin mtha' dgus la
160a3(rgyud): gnas//dri med nor bu lta bu dngos po rnams kyi 'dzin byed gang yin de nyid ye shes rdo rje'o//sbyin pa la sogs bde mnyam 'bras steng drug dang bzhi rnams nus mya bcu po deng
160a4(rgyud): rnams su gsungs//de dag rnams kyi thabs ni dag po mchog gi rnam bcu sems kyis gang po'i bum pa de dag rnams//bdud dang nyon mongs nyams pa 'dod pa zhes dang
160a5(rgyud): 'phrog byed rdo rje'i tshogs ni ldan pa la sogs rnams//phyag rgya drug rnams stong pa drug ste srid gsum bskyed par byed pa ye shes rnam shes gcig pu'o//'khor la
160a6(rgyud): srid gsum grin nus dang bzhis pA bde ba rin chen 'di yi tshogs pa nyid drug ni//pad+mA nyi ni mengs zad po del gi rdo rje dag kyang ye shes sku chen rnam par mi phyed ba'o//
160a7(rgyud): shes gcod pa gri gug mchog gi rigs drug rnams te 'di dag rnams kyis bskyed pa gang yin pa//phung po khams dang dbang po la sogs mkha' bzhin ra mnyam do//
160b1(rgyud): mkhan ngamathamapa thamamams sa mthathabasamatha a mthamatha.a mthathaHThas bamaH/'ams mal bas man/mamam/
160b2(rgyud): dag rnams kyang du bzhin rig par bya//bad dru ngas par rigs kyi gzugs ni nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de ni tshun po'i gzung su gsungs//gang du 'khor bu'i sdug bsngal nyams pa nyid gyur
160b3(rgyud): pa de ni tshor ba chen por gsungs pa ste//gang du 'khor ba'i 'du shes nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de ni rdo rje'i 'du shishes chen pa'o//gang du 'khor ba 'phel bi nyams pa nyid du gyur pa
160b4(rgyud): dag ni rdo rje 'du byed kho na'o//gang du gnyid la sogs pa'i gnas skabs nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de yang rnam par shes par gsungs//gang du shes pa min pa'i dngos po nyams
160b5(rgyud): pa nyid gyur pa de ni thub pa'i ye shes nyid//'di dag rnam par snang mdzad la sogs mchog gi rgyal ba mchog ni rnam pa drug ste rigs drug rnams//gzhan ni khams drug dbye ba
160b6(rgyud): rnams te sa dang chu dang me dang rlung drung na mkha' zhi ba rnams//gang du gti mug mtha' dag nyams po nyi du gyur pa spyanA ma yin ti da ni 'dzin pa'o//gang du nga rgyal mtha' drug nyams pa
160b7(rgyud): nyidu gyur pa mA mA k+Sho ste de ni chu nyid do//gang du chags pa mtha' dag nyams pa nyi du gyur pa gos dkor ma ste de ni me yin//gang du phrag dog mtha' dag nyams pa nyi du gyur pa
160b8(rgyud): sgrol ma yin te de ni rlung yang //gang du zhe sdang mtha' dag nyams pa nyi du gyur pa rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma ste mkha'//gang du ser sna thams cad nyams pa nyid du gyur pa sna
161a1(rgyud): tshogs yum ste de ni 'gyur med//mthong dang ma mthong gzugs ni yid dang rnamapa' la yang lta bar byed pa gang yin de ni mig/ring nas sku ni rab tu gsal ba
161a2(rgyud): bzhin du thos pa 'di ni rgyal ba'i rna ba chen po'o//mchog gi bde ba byed pa'i dri ni thams cad 'dzin pa de ni khyab bdag gi yong sna bzang po//rang gi zla ba'i bdud rtsi bde ster dag kyang
161a3(rgyud): rtag tu myang bar byed pa gang yin de ni lte//rdo rje'i reg bya kun nas 'phrogs pa gang yin de ni rtag tu rdo rje lus kyi dbang po ste//thabs dang shes rab rab tu 'grogs las bde mnyam
161a4(rgyud): la 'jug yid gling yin pa de ni 'di yi chos//dbye bo drug gis phye ba'i yul dang yul can 'di dag byang chub sems dpa' btsun mor bcas pa rnams//gzugs la gzu
161a5(rgyud): la sogs pa 'di dag rgyal ba mchog gi yul rnams rnam pa drug ste kun nas ni//dang zhing ma skyes ma 'gags mchog gi bang byed gos pa med cing ye shes kyis ni rtogs /
161a6(rgyud): bya ste//khams gsum dag tu gzhan gyis gzung bya dang ni mtha' drag 'gro ba'i dbang po'i sgo yis rtogs bya min//ye shes dgug pa byed pa 'dir ni slar yang shin tu
161a7(rgyud): stobs te de ni gzhug pa rmugs byed kyis//rengs byed de ni bcing ba nges par mchog gi bde ba'i dbang gis khengs byed kyis ni mnyes pa yang //ye shes 'khor lo dag
161b1(rgyud): la 'khor lo de ni mnyam par byed pa rdo rje shugs kyis byed pa ste//de bzhin khro bo'i sgyu mo rnams ni rab gsul nges par rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud kyi su la'o//srid pa gsum gyi gnas su
161b2(rgyud): bdud rnams dag la bsnun pa nges par de byug pa sngon pos byed pa ste//bcing ba khro ba mi g.yo dus mtha'i nyi ma dang mtshungs mtha' yas brtson 'grus kyis ni phur bus gdab//'dod
161b3(rgyud): pas de yi brtson 'grus nyams pas sa gzhi le gnas rings par byed pa gnod mdzes nyid kyis so//gtsug tor gyis ni rdzu 'phrul nyams pa rab tu gsal zhing nges par sngar bzhin
161b4(rgyud): khro bo'i lha mo rnams//yi dgas rnams ni smin pa'i don du de nas rtsa rtsi kA la sogs pa spros par gyur pa ste//skye bo rnams ni srung ba'i don du dbang po la sogs lha rnams de bzhin
161b5(rgyud): phyogs dang phyogs bral du//klu rnams smin par bya ba'i don du gdengs can rigs ni mtha' dag rdo rje can gyis nges por spros//lha min rnams ni smin par bya ba'i don du khyi yi gdong/
161b6(rgyud): mau chen mo l-i sogs rnams kyang spri ste//gzhan gong cung zad skyes pa yod pa dag kyang khyab bdag/dkyil 'khor la ni 'byung po las skyes mthar//sems can kun
161b7(rgyud): gyi don du mchog gi ston rnam mang 'di dag rang gi lus la rig par bya//de bzhin rgyud dang sngags ni rnam mang rigs la gnas rnams rnal 'byor ma dang rnal 'byor dbye ba ste/
162a1(rgyud): 'dir ni da dang bskur rnam pa gnyis kyang bu yi ston dbang gis 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das par//gang zhig shes rab kyi ni nus la reg gzhan pa bdud rtsi myang dang
162a2(rgyud): 'khyud pa gang yin dang //shes rab dang 'grogs byang chub sems ni zhu ba dag la bzhi pa'i skad cig bdud rtsi rtogs pa gang //de dag thams cad nges par 'jig rten po ste
162a3(rgyud): mchog gi snying rje yis ni lam gyi chu ru bstan//'jig rten 'das pa'i dbang gang mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po'i phyag rgya mchog la rje su sbyor ba'o//sems kyi snang ba tsam
162a4(rgyud): ste rang gi yid las skyes pa me long gi ni gzugs brnyan lta bu nyid//gang zhig mtha' dag rgyal ba'i sras dang sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan pa rnam 'byor dbang pos bsten/
162a5(rgyud): bya ste//ye shes me lce rab tu rgyas pa de ni bdud tshogs yul drang bcas pa mtha' dag sreg byed cing //lus la chags pa la sogs kyang ste rnal 'byor rnams la l-i
162a6(rgyud): yi sbyor bas bde mnyam ster bar byed//shes rab ye shes dag ni sems dang de yi snang ba dag kyang rnam pa bcu po nyid du 'gyur//dbang ni dri med ri bong can mtshungs me long
162a7(rgyud): gzugs brnyan lta bu 'di la zhugs pa gang yin pa//de las mya ngan 'das pa'i bde ba 'pho med lhan cig skyes pa gyur mod nyid ni bzhi pa ste//sangs rgyas zhal 'di gang
162b1(rgyud): hU~M d+hA dang khru la glanas pad gyur ba don drangul wAn zla ma'o//namakha' na nas glen pa'i sems dang miganI moSh+Ta chu rdzu rdzu ro lum du rab tu zhugs pa yis//stong pa las ni du ba smrig /
162b2(rgyud): rab gsal dri ma med pa'i mkha' snang nyid dang mer mi dang //'bar ba dong zla banyi ma rdo rje rnams dang mchog gi tshwa da thig le maHdI bad+mo 'gyur//de yi dbus su sangs rgyas gzugs//
162b3(rgyud): /ni yul dang rnam par bral ba du ma lings spyod rdzogs pa'i sku//na mkha' chu 'dzin bral ba dag ni rnal 'byor pa yis/bgrad pa'i mig gis blta bar bya ba ste//re khA nag po dri med
162b4(rgyud): 'od zer 'phro ba dus kyi rtsa la mthong bar gyur gyi bar du'o//de la kun mkhyen gzugs ni tshul nyi ma lta bu gos pa med pa kha dog sna tshogs te//rnam pa kun ldan rang sems yul
162b5(rgyud): dang rnam par bral ba dag go sems ni gzhan pa myin pa nyid//gzugs ni mthong bar gyur na nyin zhag so so'i dus su srog gi rlung ni 'gog pa rab bya ste//'od zer 'khor lo rang gi lus la/
162b6(rgyud): yongasu bskor cing 'khor bar byed pa mthong gi bar du'o//zla ba drug gis+dza sdom brtson rnams kyi reg byas dman pa'i bde ba mnyam pa lam gyi sems 'gyur//chagasna dang chags bral
162b7(rgyud): mtha' thog la gnas skad cig ma yang khyab bdag gi ni dbugs kyi grangs 'phelo//oMT+Ta 'bar po'i bar dang khyad par dga' ba lhan skyes dag dang ye shes dag gi dbus//gnyid dang /
163a1(rgyud): gnyid yur 'tshams su rdo rje pad+ma dag gi gnyis gnyis sbyor ba la ni bdo ba gang //de yi 'phel ba rab tu bya ste bla mA'o nges pa'i dbang gis 'bol 'gyur 'di la
163a2(rgyud): dro mtshar med//rkyen mongs bdud rnams bcomi nas rgyal ba'i bdag por 'jug ste lo yi sbyor bas rnal 'byor bzang po'o//sa yI rnam pa sra ba min zhing zhu ba chu lus khu ba
163a3(rgyud): min te gsher ba nyid min phyir//me yi rnam pa me mi ni g.yo ba rlung gi lus ni gang zhig g.yo ba mini pa rlung ma yin//stong pa'i rnam pa yon yang blta bye dkar dang ljang dang /
163a4(rgyud): kha dog sna tshogs chen po kha dog min//rnam pa thams cad pa yang blta bya min te rang snying dri ma nyon mongs dadud kyi mthu la so//nA da thig le tshwa dang ye shau sa bdud rtsi'i gnas/
163a5(rgyud): su son pa lugu rgyud du bcings pa'i rtse//srog dang thur sel lam gsum rnams te rdo rje dang bcas pad+ma rdo rje chu skyes ldan pa nyid//rlung gnyis yang dag phrad pa'i dbus
163a6(rgyud): su yul rnams yul can rnams ni 'byung dang rab tu 'jug pa ste//du ba la sogs rnams kyi mtshan ma 'dzin po dag kyang gang zhig 'di dag thams cad gsang bar bya//
163a7(rgyud): dbu mar sreg ni rab gzhug nyi ma dang becas ri bong can gyi bgrod pa g.yas dang g.yon la bcing //phyag rgya rab tu 'grogs la sems dang mchog gi bde ba la gnas
163b1(rgyud): rdo rje yang dag bslang ba yang //pad mar rdo rje'i sgra 'am+bu rang gi lag pa'i chu rgyas dag gis gsor ba 'de ba'i ska ste//sa bon+da rkyong ba min pa'i bde ba de ni 'chi ba'i 'jigs 'phrog
163b2(rgyud): ni dang ldan bla mi'i zhal//sa ni chu la rab tu 'jug cing chu yang 'bar byed la sto gtsang bar byed pa rlung la'o//rlung ni stong pa lnga ste stong pa nges par mtshan ma rnam pa bcu ru 'gyur zhing
163b3(rgyud): mtshan ma ni//rnam pa thams cad pa ru 'gyur te mi zad mchog gi bde ba gzhom du med pa ye shes sku//ye shes las ni rdzu 'phrul dngos grub du 'gyur mi bdag skyes bu rnams kyi
163b4(rgyud): skye ba 'di nyid la'o//'dod pa skal pa'i skur ni nges par rab tu 'gyur te rdzogs pa dag ni de ye gsung nyid do//'brar ba sprul pa'i thugs te 'di yi mchog gi bde ba byed pa'i swe shwa/
163b5(rgyud): dag ni o T+Ta nyid//dga' ba longs spyong rdzogs pa'i sku ste mchog dga' dang bcas khyad par dga' ba rim pas 'di yi ni//gsung dang thugs so lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba nyid//
163b6(rgyud): kyang bde'i'abyung 'di yi ye shes rdo rjer 'gyur//'dar ba nyid ni srid pa gsum gyis btud pa chos kyi sku ste 'byung ba de yi gsung du 'gyur//gnyid yur gnyid ni chos kyi thun
163b7(rgyud): te gnyid ni 'di yi srid pa'i 'jigs 'joms ye shes kho na'o//yi ge nyid ni dag pa'i sku ste dbyangs dang bral ba'i cha dang thig le nA da ram pa yis//bde 'byung dag pa'i sku
164a1(rgyud): yi da rung dang thugs dang ye shes rdo rje rnam go du ma srid byar gla nas pa'o//sad pa dang ni rmi lam rang bzhin slar yang gzhan pa 'di ni gnyid dang bzhi pa'i rang /
164a2(rgyud): bzhin ni//lus la gnas dang dbugs la zhen pa yul rnams rnam par spyod cing g.yo myed sems lnga zhen pa ste//ye shes la gnas bud med rab tu 'grogs las byung
164a3(rgyud): chub sems ni zhu ba la yang skad cig 'gyur//sprul pa la sogs dag go sems kyi rdo rje rnam pa bzhir ni rim pas nges par rab tu 'gyur//de ltar sems ni rnam bzhi srid
164a4(rgyud): papra gsum la gnas pa'i srog chags rnams kyi thig le'i dbus su te//rnal 'byor dbang po rnams kyis bde mnyam 'bras ster khyab byed dag ni thar pa'i slad du bsrung bar bya//
164a5(rgyud): thig le btang na rnal 'byor rnams kyi skye ba'i sa bon mchog gi bde ba seng la thar pa gang //de phyir 'khor ba'i bde ba'i skad cig 'dar ni sdom brtson rnams kyis thams cad dus
164a6(rgyud): su dor bar bya//gang phyir a sogasau ka sogs ri bong can dang nyin byed gcig nyid rdo rje can gyi gaudan min zhing //hUM yig nyid kyis mtshan ma dang ni yongs su gyur pa gzhan
164a7(rgyud): pa kha dog gzugs dag mi 'dod do//'gyur med dag gis bskyed cing 'gyur ba nyams par gyur pa mchog gi dbang po dag dang ldan pa ni//rnam pa kun ldan thig le mtha'
164b1(rgyud): dag rgyal ba'i bdag po sna tshogs sgyu ma 'dzin pa 'dri la'o//l+r-i sogs dbyangs brgyad gang dag yul gyi ston du gyur dbyangs phyed kyis ni rnam par dman pa rnams//phan tshun dbye
164b2(rgyud): bas phye ba rkang pa dang bcasi ro dang mdo'i rnams dbu ma'i dbugs ni 'bab pa ste//duso sbyor gnyis pa la ni yul gyi lha no dbang gis ring po phan tshun dbye bas phye ba rnams//slar
164b3(rgyud): yang thun mtshams gsum pa lnga ni shin tu ring po yul gyi stan dbu ma'i dbugs rnams 'bab//de ltar thun mtshams bzhi la mda' dang bcas pa'i ri bai ro rnams dbu ma yi ni dgu
164b4(rgyud): kye dbyangs//ka la sogs pa'i yi gsum cu sum cu'i rab tu dbye bas rab tu gsal bar dgu brgya nyid//dbyangs drug gi ni dbye bas phye ba mkha' mkha' dus dang mda' rnams
164b5(rgyud): dus sbyor gsum gyi rtsa gsum la//de bzhin ring pos rab tu phye rnams phyi ma'i nyin mo'i bgrod por dus sbyor gsum gyi rtse gsum la//slang yang dbyangs drug dag gis phye ba
164b6(rgyud): rnams ni mtshan mo'i dus su dus sbyor gsum gyi rtsa gsum la//de bzhin ring pos rab tu phye rnams phyi ma'i mtshan mo'i bgrod pa dus sbyor gsum gyi rtsa gsum la//nyon
164b7(rgyud): zhag so so'i dus su dbugs ni 'byung dang 'jug pa mkha' mkha' drug dang zla ba mig rnams 'bab//snga ma stong pa rnams brdzus nas ni mnyam dang mi mnyam bgrod par
165a1(rgyud): dbu ma dag la sbyar bar bya//phyi rol du ni gang zhig chu tshod brgyad pa'i phyed gyur sgra gcan longs spyod dag las gzhan du gnas//de ni rang gi lus la
165a2(rgyud): dbugs phyed nges par mun pa dang bral 'jig rten thams cad snang ba ste//snga mo phyed ni mun pa dang bcas srid pa gsum po mtha' dag stong pa dag tu thim pa'o//de phyir
165a3(rgyud): de ni phug nos dus kyi 'khor lo rnal 'byor ldan pa gcig pu mun pa bral bar 'jug/zla ba dman zhing nyi mar lhag gang khyab bdag mchog gi cha de 'dir ni thun mtshams bzhi
165a4(rgyud): lu ste//thun dang thun la nyin dang mtshon mo'i dbang gis bgrod cing dus sbyor phyed pa'i rab tu dbye ba yis//sum cu rtsa drug dus kyi pho nya nyis 'gyur mi bdag gzhan rnams
165a5(rgyud): tshes ni brgyad gnyis dbye ba la//gza' rnams kyi yang brgyad kyi dbye bo la ste slar yong gzhan rnams du mi tshigs kyi tshogs la'o//rigs byed dus kyi dbugs kyi
165a6(rgyud): lhag mA srid gsum skyed par mdzad pa mkha' 'gro ma ni sna tshogs gzugs//zla ba'i dbus su dman pa gang de mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rang gi phyag rgya
165a7(rgyud): rnam gnyis 'gyur//gang zhig nyi ma la gnas de ni brgyad dbya phyogs dang phyogs bral mdab mar thun tshod longs spyod mtha'//lhag ma'okhar
165b1(rgyud): lho lha mo mchog tu 'jigs par byed pa gzhan rnams mtha' dgu phyi dang lus la'o//sbyin par bug pa mun can nyin zhag ces byu lha yis/bla ma'i phyed bcas
165b2(rgyud): mig dang mig gi grangs//phyed bcos drug dang rig byed du 'gyur de rnams mchog gi rgya lte ba'i bdag po'i thugs rdo rje las skyes//sa skyes
165b3(rgyud): stong pa sbrul zla nyi ma gze' lhag pa sangs mjug rings lnga yang stong pa sbrul mkha' gcig/mkha' mig mig dang gcig tu gyur pa de rnams mchog gi khyab bo dag
165b4(rgyud): gi ni dge pa'i gsung las byung //gang zhig zla ba'i dus kyi longs spyod mkha' rom da de rnams sku yi rdo rje dag las byung //mtha' dag gcig tu gyur
165b5(rgyud): pa ro drug sbrul deng dus rnams dag ste phyed kyi chu tshod de bzhin nyid//mkha' 'gro dus kyi gzugs can mtha' dag lus la gnas shing sreg tshigs/
165b6(rgyud): rnams kyi srog ni 'phrog byed ma//de phyir nyin zhig so so'i dus su rang gi lam ni dgag pa byas nas/de rnams bsgrub par bya//ji srid
165b7(rgyud): gza' rnams dag gi longs spyod rang gzhan bgrod pa la gnas dbugs 'byung rgyu ba las//de srid dus kyi pho nya khyab byed ma gang khams
166a1(rgyud): gru sum du ni mdzu ba dang sbyor bar 'gyur ram+b+ha ni//pho nya phra mo rab tu rgyu ba bla ma'i gsung la gnas pa byang chub sems dang 'gyur
166a2(rgyud): med ladz+hasgrib bla la rnal 'byor ldan pa rnams kyis shes par bya sti gzhan du 'dod chags sems kyiso ma yin no/nyi ma dang ni zla
166a3(rgyud): ba'i rkang pa rnams la gnyis ga'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis sredapas bsnun pa rnams//yan lag rnams kyis/bgos pa'o lhag ma'i
166a4(rgyud): rkang pa de ni sgra gcin 'jug pa la yang mjug rings za//thu ni mtshams kun dang thun brgyad nyin zhag so so'i drisasu sgrog
166a5(rgyud): chags rnams kyi yan lag bcu gnyis rnams//dus sbyor re re la ni dbugasarnams dag kyang nyos 'gyur dgu brgya'i smi
166a6(rgyud): rnams 'bab pa yan lag gsungs//yan lag gnyis gnyis rnams la thog ma'o nyon zhag dbang gisadeng po ma rig
166a7(rgyud): yan lag bcu gnyis par//de phyir dus la sogs pas yan lag rnams te bzhan ni dgu pa sngar bzhin gang yin
166b1(rgyud): donams s+ho// stan rnam pa lnga po rnams kyis dus su nga na kun nam+b+har+m+ma d+ha gnyis gnyis dag las 'gyur/gang du zla ba'i cha gcig nyams pa nyid du gyur
166b2(rgyud): dang po'i zla ba de nyidakhan/zla ba drug dang dus gsum gyis ni 'dzin para'agyur terten cing 'brel pa yan lag blan gnyis kyis/d+h+r-ig rje
166b3(rgyud): nyi ma'i dus kyi dbye ba rkang pa'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis zla ba'i dbus su rab tu zhugs//reg pa'i yan lag dbus der sgra gcan gyis ni zla ba nyi maM dag gis rkang
166b4(rgyud): pad 'dzin no/nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus su sgra gcan dag gos bltas pa'i sman rnams gang yin de dag ba pa steng/sa skyes khu ba gza' lag zla ba nyi ma gzi
166b5(rgyud): lhagrI pa snang+yas su ma sngags pa nyi skye sbyin/sdugs pa lug la sngags pa khyim li sbyi na nag/so se'i dus su ning can rnamasadus sun
166b6(rgyud): hU~M r+m+mA bya tsho li g+hAb+hA sangs skye skyes/sngags pa ti skyes khyim ni rgyas pa dang / dang gu'i pa 'dulas
166b7(rgyud): da 'i rgyur gal te nin can /ni pags ta nga ba rgyas pa la ni gsangs kyis chu tshong na

167a3(rgyud): la mtshon pa'i mnar//sI nu mra rlung ri byed ci na danyo ma m+b+ha ste 'dri rna mas soku ni longs spyod byed ba man//'di rnams srog ni khyangs

167a7(rgyud): dbang gis ma gsum grangs 'gyur//de yang yul rgyuyon tan dbang gis chos zhes bya bar 'gyurate de rnams slar yi
167b1(rgyud): snyom gyur ni//'byung ba chu gter grangs 'gyur skar yang de nas rgyu ba'i dbye ba rnams kyis bstan pa de dang rnams//chu tshod phyed kyi dbugs kyi grangs rnams dag ste slar yang nyis 'gyur chu tshong dang /
167b2(rgyud): kyi grangs rnams//gnyis gsum chu gtor mda' dus ri brgyad gza'o dang bcu rnams kyis ni dus kyi rtse 'di 'phel po ste//de nas sde yi rab bye rnams kyis rnam gnyis lam la gnas
167b3(rgyud): dus kyi rtsa ni 'jig rten gsum//kun nas gang bar byed bdo mnyam 'bras bu ster ba zla ba nyi ma'i rab tu rgyu ba las//ji srid rig byed sbrul dad mi ste nges par phyag na gri gug thod pa can
167b4(rgyud): drub tu gyur//'khor lo mda' dang chu gter grangs ni yul dang yan tan dang gis sku gsung thugs kyi rabang bye yis//gtso bo srung bar byed pade mnyam 'bras bu steng bdu ma la som+ba/
167b5(rgyud): lha mo bairgyad rnamaso//de ltar nyi ma la gA nas gtso ba mchog gi ri bong can gyi cha yis 'khyud pa sna tshogs gzugaso//lha mo sangs rgyas 'tsho meng rnams dang yul dang yul can skrag ci
167b6(rgyud): zla ba nyi mos phyag 'os pa'o//gtso bo yi ni phra mo'i ngo bo mchog gi yon tan yul te ni dang phyi rol phyag rgya gang //de rnams khams gsum du ni mchog tu 'jigs byed khro ba'i sem
167b7(rgyud): les rab skyes mkha' 'gro ma rnamaso//gtso ba'i dbang po gang dag rnams dang rnam gsum srid po la gnas sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ste//de rnams rang gi yul bcas yon tan gyis mthu
168a1(rgyud): bkra shis la sogs mkha' 'phro 'di rnamaso//gzugs dang sgra dang ro dang dri dang gzhan pa dag nang ngan pa rab byang brdul dang ni//snying dbas sems la rims pas ra/
168a2(rgyud): tu gsal bar yang ni de bzhin sgra can gyis kyang 'khyud pa ste//de dag rnams kyi del rkang drug dang myur 'khyog la sogs rgyu ba las ni rnam mang bzod pa 'di//brgyad po rnams kyi rkang pa
168a3(rgyud): drug la yul dang yon tan brgyad rnams yang dag gnas paM 'khor lo'i tshul//dang po'i dbugs ni dbye ba brgyad yul dang yon tan la gnas kun nas dra ba la sogs pa//mkha'
168a4(rgyud): 'gro ma rnams dag gis bskor zhing rnam gsum bgrod pa'i dbang gis 'khyam ste 'gro ba drug tu gnos//de yi dngos su dus kyi 'khor lo bdud rtsi 'phro ba'i cha yis 'khyud par gyur
168a5(rgyud): pa dag pa'i sku//gang zhig dbugs ni bcad nas rgyal ba'i sku la 'jug pa de nyid kho na dus kyi 'khor lo'o//dbugs ni chad pa'i mtha' ru rnam gsum bgrod pa 'di dang rnam pa dru/
168a6(rgyud): kyang yod pa ma yin te//thig le bkag par gyur na kun nas mchog gi khyab bdag badri ba mtha' yas dus su 'jug par 'gyur//'khor ba dag gi bong ba spangs nas mchog gi bla ma
168a7(rgyud): zhal ni rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya//spyod pa sgrog pa'i gzugs dang mchog tu 'jigs pa byed la rnal 'byor ma rnams degyes pa ma yino//gtso bo'i dbugs la gza' yi tshogs
168b1(rgyud): hrIrkang pa mtha' dag dus kyi sbyor ba dag gis thim gyur te//dbugs ni mkha' mkha' na mkha' mkha' mig mi dang chug ter sadran thams cad rtang par bskul bar byed//la'ang rnams kyis
168b2(rgyud): phyi rol tu ni mchog gi khyab bdag rkang pa spro dang sdud pa'i ngo bo la//rang rang tshad kyis rgyal ba'i bdug po'i rkang pa dbugs kyi dbusu 'gro dang gnas pa shes par bya//stong pa li ni sbyin pa
168b3(rgyud): 'jug pa rang gi nyin zhag bgrod pa'i dbang gis dus kyi mthar 'gyur te//stong pa na mkha' mkha' mtsho chu gter zla ba'i nyin zhag longs spyod lcug ma rnams kyis nam gro'o//rang gi bgrod pi 'gro ba'i nyin/
168b4(rgyud): zhag mkha' mkha' namakha' mkha' mtsho mig gi der ni sgra gcan 'jug/rang gi bgrod par 'gro ba'i nyin zhag mkha' mkha' na mkha' mokha'i dus dus kyis lha yi blon po 'jug/na mkha'
168b5(rgyud): mkha' dang stong pa mkha' brgyad sbrul dang mig nyin zhag rnams kyis bkra shis 'jug pa ste//mkha' mkha' na mkha' mkha' mig me dang chu gter grangs kyi nyin zhag rnams kyi.e nyi ma la
168b6(rgyud): sogs 'jug//mkha' mkha' na mkha' mkha' mtsho brgyad dang zla ba mda' yi nyin zhag rnams kyis zla ba der 'jug ste//de yi dus su rgyal po 'gro ba dag ni rang rang tshad kyis rnam par
168b7(rgyud): nyams par rab tu 'gyur//de nas zla ba nyi ma shar ba la yang rtsa yi kun tu spyod pa 'di ni rab tu 'gyur//gcig gnyis gsum dang chu gter mda' dang ro dang ri bo nor rnams 'phel
169a1(rgyud): /bar gyur pa gsang ba'i rtsa//bug pa ces bya sgo yi rtsar 'gyur bcu pa phra mo'i rtsa ni slar yang steng gi lam du'o//de ni sde yis phye ba yon tan dang bcas yul dang bcas pa'i
169a2(rgyud): 'khor lo'i rtse rnams dag tu 'gyur//gtsug tor snying kha'i phyogs dang mgo bo ri bong can gnas mgrin pa phyogs te nyi ma'i rgyu ba dang //lte bar 'kho lo'i rtsa ni dus dang lag
169a3(rgyud): 'gro mi bdag sum cu rtsa gnyis de yi nyis 'gyur rnams//zla ba'i rkang pa rnams kyis tha dad ma yin mtha' dag nyid rkang bsres pa yis kyang tha mi dang //brgya dang brgyad cu rtsa
169a4(rgyud): gcig gang zhig lag rkang la gnas tshigs kyi rtse ni gnyis kyi dbye ba rnams//gtsug tor snying kha'i phyogs dang ri bong can dang nyi ma'i rkang pa mgrin pa'i 'khor lor lkog ma rnams//
169a5(rgyud): brgyad cu rtsa gcig mtha' ma rab gsal rnam bcu gang yin de dag zhi dang drag po'i gza' rnams te//de dag rnams kyi thog mtha'i cha ni khyab bdag zhabs la gnas pa dus kyi rtsa
169a6(rgyud): yis long spyod cing //gza' yi mtha' yang srid pa gsum gyi bskyed ma rdo rje sku yi mkha' 'gro ma yis long spyod do//dang por gang zhig stong pa'i ngo bo yul dang yon tan la gnas de//
169a7(rgyud): yi rang bzhin dag tu 'gyur//khams dang phung po rnams la rab zhugs slar yang mig la sogs pa'i dbang po rnams la mnyam pa ste//sang dang rmi lam la sogs la zhugs
169b1(rgyud): mchog gi bang mnyam gzhom du med par yang dag rab 'a byas pa//rig ma sangs rgyas yun+da de rdo rje yi ni tshigs lnga gnas pa rnal 'byor pa yis btsal bar bya//gtso bo'i sku yin du
169b2(rgyud): las rnal 'byor pa rnams ngag gi mchog gi lus la lha yi spyan du 'gyur//de yi gsung gi mthu las rna ba de yi thugs las gzhan gyi snying la gnas pa shes par 'gyuraro//shes
169b3(rgyud): rab pa yi mthu las rnam gsum srid pa la gnas sngon gyi skyo ba rjesu dran par 'gyur//shes rab kyi ni gsung gi mthu las mkha' mnyam thams cad dus su kun 'gro'i rdzu 'phrul/

169b5(rgyud): spyod pa rnam pa gsum yang mthong bar 'gyur//lha yi rna ba dag gi mthu las srog chags kyis brjod snying dang kha yi sgron thos par 'gyur//de bzhin sku gsung thugs kyi
169b6(rgyud): sbyor ba drug las mi yi bdag po reg bya la sogs thams cad 'gyur//rtsan gang zhig thur sel dbus su rnam gsum lam gnas gtso ba bshang ba khro ba 'bab pa rnams//
169b7(rgyud): srog ni de dag rnams kyi rab tu rgyu ba rnam pa dgu ru 'gyur te mtha' ma sangs rgyas zhal//rna ba sna dang mig la rnam gnyis shes par 'gyur te lce'u chung ni lce dang bcas
170a1(rgyud): dang / thig le gtsug tor bug par 'gyur te ban pa shes pa min pa rnams la rgya yis btab ba gang //srob dang thur sel 'gags par gyur na ri bong 'dzin pa bstod pa nyi ma'i
170a2(rgyud): gzungasu rab tu 'gyur//rdo rje pad+mas rab tu sad na slar yang 'di ni nyi ma'i gzugs kyi ma lces zhu bar byed//rlung dang zla ba nyi ma 'gugs par gyur na rnam par shes pa dang ni ye shes gcig/
170a3(rgyud): tu 'gyur//de ltar de ltar dang na de bzhin de ltar rnam gsum du 'gyur gzhan ni cung zad yod ma yin//zla ba nyi ma'i gzugs ni zos na mkha' la nyin mo dang ni mtshan mo nam yang min pa
170a4(rgyud): nyid 'thun mtshams de ni lus kyi dbus su rnal 'byor rnams kyi dus kun bdud rtsi'i go 'phang la gnas pa'o//phyogs zad zla ba mkha' la gnas pa nyi ma'i gzugs la ro ni mnyan
170a5(rgyud): par 'gyur ba ji lta bar//srog dang thur sol zang bar gyur na gsal bar yang ni lus la dngos grub dus su de 'gago/zla ba nyi ma'i rgyu ba nyams shing lam ni gnyi ga yi yang srog
170a6(rgyud): gi rlung ni chen po 'gags//chu skyes rdo rje rab tu sad cing ri bong can zhu nyi ma'i gzugs chen la ni rab tu zhugs//dngos dang dngos med gcig gyur rnam gsum srid pa la gnas
170a7(rgyud): gzhi ma meng legs par rab tu rtog grar pa//de yi dus su rnal 'byor pa ste gang la gnyis ni cung zad ming pa mchog gi go 'phang 'gro//khro ba sangs rgyas lha mo dang bcas nges par
170b1(rgyud): yirdo rje rnams dang sa mi snying po sogs//rab tu dga' ba'i thugs rnams rnal 'byor pa la grub pa'i dus su na mkha' la ni mngon sum 'gyur/de yi 'drod pa'i dngos grub ri bong can gyi zhag gi tho
170b2(rgyud): rang si dang ni mtshan mo phyed la 'gyur//rin po che'am me tog char ni mchog gyur dus kyi sbyor bas sa yA steng du 'bab par 'gyur//lus ni dang zhing rdul phran nyams pa na mkha' dang natshungs
170b3(rgyud): mtshan la sogs pa rnams kyis rab rdzogs 'gyur//sna tshogs 'jig rten gsum po nyid ni dang zhing sgrib pa rnam par bral ba rmi lam bzhin du snang //skad ni kun nas chad pa med cing /
170b4(rgyud): du ma'i skad gzhan dag gis gzhan gyi snying la 'jug pa ste//sems ni dam pa'i bde bas gang zhing mi g.yo thams cad dus su ldan cing skyes pas 'khyud pa'o//sa las chu dang rtse mo

170b6(rgyud): mo can dag phye nas las kyi rlung yang stong pa la//rnam gsum srid pa'i dbang gis glong zhig las kyi rlung gis bstan pa gzhan rnams zhing gzhan dag tu 'gro/sangs rgyas zhing na/

171a1(rgyud): kyis bskor ba ste//so so re re'i ro yi rdul la gnyis ka'i rigs kyi dbang gis rdo rje'i sras po rnams kyis bskor//sa la sogs pa'i rdul la ma lus rigs la gnas pa
171a2(rgyud): mtha' yas mi g.yo sogs la rab zhugs rnams//dri dag rnams dang thabs gcig rdo rje sems dpa' 'chags pa'i dus kyi bar du mkha' la rnam par bzhugs//yang dag 'dzin par
171a3(rgyud): byed pas sa dang chu dang sreg za rlung dang stong pa'i rang bzhin rdul phran 'dzin//srub par byed pas thA dang rdul phran mtha' dag gcig tu gyur gyi bar du srub par byed pa ste//slar yang de
171a4(rgyud): dog rnams ni phan tshun skyer bar 'gyur te gtso bo'i dngos la chung ngu'i dngos rnam so//dbyibs kyi rlung ni chen po thams cad dag gis sangs rgyas zhing rnams mtha'i ngag rnam par
171a5(rgyud): 'gad par byed//'jig rten khams ni so so dag la slar yang khor yug ri bo chen po dag ni kun nas so//de yi dbu su las kyis ni chen po dag gi rang bzhin 'jig rten khan su rab
171a6(rgyud): tu 'gyur//lhag ma longs spyod rung bzhin yul gyi bde ba byed pa rin chen kun gyis rab tu gang ba rnams//mtha' dag ri yi bdag po'i shar ni dag pa'i in+d+ra nI la lho ni pad+ma rah+mas
171a7(rgyud): nung ni kar ki ta na ser po byang ni ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar zla ba chu she lo//dbus ni ljang ku de yi snying por de yi nang du chud pa 'dir ni dkyil 'khor chen po ste//dang por thugs
171b1(rgyud): rang bzhin de nas dbu ma las ni nyis 'gyur dag kyang gsung gI rang bzhi no//de nas gzhan ni nyis 'gyur dag ste mda' lnga bcu yis brgyad du gyur pa'i dpag tshad stong phra'o//de yi phyi rol dus/
171b2(rgyud): rnams ngag gis 'khor lo'i ngo bo de nas 'jig rten khams kyi rang bzhino//'khor lo drug dang rigs drug gis te rigs byed 'butshom gyis rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas dkyil 'dzir
171b3(rgyud): ro//brgyad gnyis ka ba mi bdag ri dong can gyi cha yis khang pa brtsegs pa zlum po skye gnas gzugs//rgyal ba'i bdag po'i gtsug tor nas ni mdzod spu'i dbus su phyeng dang bcas pa nyi/
171b4(rgyud): ma'i sor du 'gyur//de nas mgrin pa'i chu skyes de bzhin snying kha dang ni de nas lte gsang chu skyes de bzhi no//zhabs kyi 'og dang rdza drar brla dang dpyi yang ma nu de nyid de nyid rig byed
171b5(rgyud): rnams kyis te//brang byed phyed bcas nyi mas rad dpung dpung labla rnams ni mkha' mig rgyal po nyi ma'i tshad kyiso//nyi shu 'ga' zhig lhag pa'i brgya phrag gang zhig dus dang dgu
171b6(rgyud): yIs mi rnams kyi ni 'jig rten tshad//rig byed phyed dang bcas pa'i bzhi dang chu gter chu gtor phyed dang bcas pa'i rig byed rAg byed kyis//gtsug tor mgo be 'og tu 'gyur te n+ya
171b7(rgyud): ba'i bdag po'i dpal ldan dpral ba dag dang shangs dang ni//shangs kyi 'og tu ko k+ko'i mtha' dang de nas mgrin pa dag ste mgrin pa'i chu skyes dbus//de nas snying kha lte ba gsang
