178b7(rgyud): phyogs gtsog gis na nyis 'gyur 'dzi bar 'gyur te srim ya dron de bzhi nas bon rnam par dag/de sa sanyis gsum brgya 'gyur 'ju bar 'gyur te sla ming 'i
179a1(rgyud): da rgyug rgyunas ma//ma nan na rgyu 'byung//ga tshug spya rmA sa /
179a2(rgyud): sa me la gnas pa ltad tsher lcigs ni/ myod 'dzi byer 'gyur//lteng tshar dag 'i su~M lcags ni brgyud 'gyur stobs 'gyur ti nI nu nA yang brgya de'i gyu re//de mi
179a3(rgyud): sathon la yang brgyad 'gyur yin te slar yang de lus rdo rje rin chen brgyad 'gyur//de ltar lcags dang rin chen rnams dang nye ba'i rI dang ro rnams ji srid khol pa de rgyu
179a4(rgyud): ba//me yinang du bsgril bar byeste/de nas de ni 'bum phrag du ma 'thugs par rab tu 'gyur//reg rdo sman dag med na mchog gi bI De ma nyi bdag dang dag rnams kyis
179a5(rgyud): kyang 'ju bar 'gyur//'drar ba med pa ji srid nyid de de nas sgra byed gser ni mnyam pa dag tu rab tu 'gyur//slar yang gzhan ni nyes dang gsum 'gyur gser zhu
179a6(rgyud): thub 'dri myur da la chung ga la zhugs paso//rdzas kyi don du na nye brgyud cha gas zhun zhu ba drug le rab tu 'bade nas blugs par bya//gser dngul bya ba dag lags
179a7(rgyud): rnoni sbrul zangs zhe nya mchil dang lding ngos mu zi dag gis dang //ga sha'i tshe zla ba de bzhin lcang tshor skyes kyang babla dang ni ba sreg bya dag gis bsang byis nas//mnyam pa
179b1(rgyud): 'gyur byed drug dang lan tshwa tsA ba'i ro rnams dag dang lcag dang mnyam pa'i dngul chu ni//mkhas pa skyur po dag gis nyin zhag bcu mnyes nas de ni rdo ba dbus su dugs byas te//sa
179b2(rgyud): yi nang du rje ba drug tu steng du me dang brjes pa thams cad lung dugs gyur pa//pA la chu de ni bcu drug cha yis dbyangs rje sde pras pa 'bugs par byed par rab tu 'gyur to s+phar//
179b3(rgyud): dang zla ba gser mnyam dge ba'i gser 'di gser 'gyur mkhan rnams ngag gi sdug bsngal 'joms pa ste//dngul ni brgyad kyi cha shes byin na dge pa'i zangs ni phug pa dngul du
179b4(rgyud): yang ni 'gyur ba yin//'dzin ma la ni rdo ba gang dag 'bras bu'i lus dang mtshungs shing dung dang mgo la sogs pa'i gzugs//de yi skye gnas de rnams la byin mAr dang sbrang
179b5(rgyud): dadrang bcas drag po'i rlung gis bzhu bar bya//de nas slar yang btags pa dang ni tshal 'gyur byed sde tshan rnams kyis dag par byas nas ni//lcags kyi skye gan sa de ni shes nas
179b6(rgyud): nyis gyur dag kyang ro la gser dgyur mkhan gyis bzhu bar bya//nyin zhag bdun du snong ni dag par 'gyur te 'bras bu gsum po ro mnyam bskol ba'i chu dang ni//sman gyis pas
179b7(rgyud): pa'i lcags kyi phye ma mar dang sbrang rtsi dag dang bcas pa phul chu dang bcas dang //bai yaM 'o ma gsar po snying pas li lo ma skyur pos dman zhing lan tshwa dang //rnam dril nya dang
180a1(rgyud): na dmathamathamams sa mthasamatha/a ma thas la la
180a2(rgyud): 'bru mar sogs lus grol ba zos pa dag gis phyogs kyi nang du mi rnams kyi'o//stong phrug 'bugs pa brgya yis bsgyur ba'i brgya dang bye ba 'bugs pa ji srid par
180a3(rgyud): yod shes byas nas//nyin dag so so'i dusu bza' bar bya ste ru ngas kar chu las mtha' ma skye tshe cha shaso//khung bzang dang no swa ye khe pa glang po rlung drong tshad pa dag dang bral bar
180a4(rgyud): rab tu 'gyur//'bring po 'di ni zla ba drug gis lha yi lus po skra dkar ga he ra ma dag dang bral bar byed//karko TI dang de ba dA li tsha gsum br-i ha ti dang ni ma pa ka rA ta tek+ta//bskol
180a5(rgyud): bra 'thungs te slar yang ma zhu ba la nyin zhag gsum du bsrung bar gnas pa rab tu bya//de bzhin zlo gA'i chu la sogs pa mi dang dug gi chu dang rdo dang b+ha wA ta yai chu//ngan par
180a6(rgyud): dIdwi dang sa dang rdo bdug gi shi dang brtag pa gzhan rnams la yang sngags paso//gang zhig zos ni drag tu brgyal ba ster byed dug dang mtshungs pa de rnams mtha' dag rlan
180a7(rgyud): yin te//phye mer byas nas de ni cung zad mar dang sbrang rtsi dang bcas bza' bar bya ste de bzhin nyid//gsal ba mi phyugs sems can rnams kyis gang zhig za bar byed pa de ni
180a8(rgyud): grub ster sman ma yin//de dag rnams la 'chi ster mchog tu 'jigs byed gang yin de ni rnal 'byor rnams la bdud rtsir 'gyur//daN+Dod pa la sA lI par+t+ti chu skyes pA ri/
180b1(rgyud): dag gi rang lus pa dang ma'i bu ba yis//ro dang mu zi mnyam pa kha pa lan snod du lcags kyis nyon zhags gsum dag du yang mnyes byas nas//gang zhig zla ba drug tu nyan zhag
180b2(rgyud): dus su Takra'i rkang pa'i chad ni za byed pa//de ni mdzel sogs pa'i nad las grol zhing skra dkar gnyer mA dang brel brgyad gnyis lo lon dbyings//bauk+Sha Na dang bar snang shAt+tha te
180b3(rgyud): ro'i mchu yis rab g.yo dngul chu dag kyang bsad par bya//sman gzhan dag gis bsad pa la ni dmar rang lhang cher skyes dang gser dang kho ba len mnyam pa dang //gcig
180b4(rgyud): byas nas srog bcas dri ma rnam bral dngul chu dag la slong drug gis ni gong bu ste//sngar brjod kheb len snod chur khu dog gis bskol bar gyur pa gnyer ma dang ni skra dkar 'phrog
180b5(rgyud): zla ba drug dang gnyis gcig zla ba mi bdag dang blas nyin zhag bcu dang zhig bdun zhig gsum dang //zhig dang skad cig gcig gis 'di yi mthu drug las ni lus la dngos
180b6(rgyud): grub tu yang rab tu 'gyur//thun mong pa dang 'bring po 'jig pa dag dang rnam par bral ba mchog nI ye shes grub pa ste//mchog sman skyes bu'i rang gis byas pa'i dge dbang
180b7(rgyud): las te skye ba gcig gi rjes 'bugs dag las min//gang na 'khri shing ljon pa gzhan gyi dngos dang nyin zhig so so'i dus su de 'gro rnam par rjong //ral gri dag la pa
181a1(rgyud): sdud pa'i sdong bu mi yi snum gyi mar mes gter ni gsal bar byed//der ni nyin zhagro sa so'i dusu 'byung ba bai dgra bong gi sngags kyi bzlas pa rab tu bya//ji srid brko
181a2(rgyud): ba'i mtshan mar gyur gyi bar te de nas sngags pa rnams la rdzas kyi dngos grub bo//dang por rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa skyes gnas drug gi sngags rnams
181a3(rgyud): bsgrub par bya//gnod sbyin mo rnams bsgrubs nas slar yang sa gzhi la ni zhing du smra ba rnams kyang bsgrub par bya//klu mo rnams ni sgrub pa byas nas bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu'i ro dang
181a4(rgyud): sman de rnams ni bsgrub par bya//mkha' 'gro ma rnams sgrub pa byas nas mchog tu 'jigs par byed pa'i lha min rnams kyang bsgrub par bya//klu la sogs rnams sgrub pa byas
181a5(rgyud): nas rab mchog lha dang mi rnams rnal 'byor pa yis bsgrub par bya//du ba la sogs sgrub pa byas nas 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa byed pa'i dbu ma dag ni bsgrub par bya//srog la//
181a6(rgyud): sogs rnams sgrub pa byas nas ri bong 'dzin pa zhu ba'i thig lo rnams ni bsgrub par bya//dam pa'i bde ba bsgrubs nas lhon cig skyes pa rgyal ba'i sku ni kun tu 'gro ba
181a7(rgyud): bsgrub par bya//sems can rnams la 'chi ster gang de grub pa'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs pa mtha' dag bdud rtsi ste//'dod pa'i dngos grub gang zhig bgrod
181b1(rgyud): bya myon pa de yang srid gsum gan su bsam gad+hAn bzod bya'o/ye shes gang zhig rnyo dngaka' dag kyang rdo rje pad+mar bde bas byin rlabs rnyed pa sla ba nyid//de ltar de ltar rdo rje can+da
181b2(rgyud): te srog chags rnams la thams cad dus su bdaM mnyam ster gyur cig/sgra can me dang zla ba nyi ma bzhi por brjod des chu sreg za rlung dang steng pa gang //lnga po dag go gza' yi//
181b3(rgyud): tshugs pa gcig shos dag ni drug pa lhun po 'di yi phyogs rnamasu//gling rnams dag ni bzhi por rab tu 'gyur te yul rnams dag ni lde por phyi rol dag tu gsungs//
181b4(rgyud): snying stobs la sogs yon han rnams ni gsum pa gzhon pa 'di'o lus kyi dbus su de bzhin nyid//pad+mar rna ma shes dga' ba khrag dang bdud brtsi zhes pa dang por bzhi/
181b5(rgyud): po dag gro de las ni//gang zhig rus pa la sogs rnams kyang lnga po de nas mig la sogs pa drug po ste//lag pa rkang pa dgra ni bzhi po lag pa rkang pa la gnas sor mo
181b6(rgyud): rnams ni lnga po'o//de rnams tshigs ni gsum po gang zhig 'dir ni rim pa mtha' dag rigs 'di la ni rig par bya//sa 'dzin de nyid rnam dbye rnams dang ro yis bsgyur
181b7(rgyud): ba'i ro dang nyi ma nyi shu zhes pa dang //dbye ba dug cu mi rnams dag gi mtha' dag lus la gnas pa bug pa drug dong zla ba'i grangs//de dag thams cad bsdus pa su ma
182a1(rgyud): 'gyur dgu ru 'gyur te lnga bcu rtsa bzhi srog gi rgyub dang //gza' rnams ngag gis rgyu bu gang de slar yang gcig shos rnams kyis rnal 'byor ma
182a2(rgyud): yi rgya ba brjod//ye shes na mkha' gnyis dang slar yang gzhan pa 'di ni theg pa dag dang dkon mchog gsum po yang //nyon mongs bdud dang gnas rnams dang ni slar yang nges
182a3(rgyud): par rdzu 'phrul rkang pa zag pa rnams ngag dang //mi 'jigs pa dang bden pa rnams dang slar yang de bzhin dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yang dag par//bsdu ba bzhi yi mtha' rnams rgyal//
182a4(rgyud): ba'i bdag po'i rdo rje rnams kyi rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya//mngon shes lnga dang stobs dang lta ba rnams dang rab mchog rgyal ba'i bdag po dag gi spyan lnga dang //de bzhin
182a5(rgyud): phung po dbang po dran pa zhes pa drug dang byang chub yan lag bdun dang mchod pa ni//bdun ti lam gyi yan lag brgyad rnams so so'i legs 'jug gzugs can rnam par thar pa
182a6(rgyud): brgyad rnams dang //bug pa zhes bya yan lag dgu ni gsung rab mchog stes rnams dag ni phyogs kyi tshad yin//sangs rgyas rnams kyi phyogs kyi stobs dang gsal bar
182a7(rgyud): dbang bcu dang ni yan lag bcu gnyis rten 'brel dag/skye ba dang ni 'gog pa dag go de bzhin nyis 'gyur dgu ni ma 'dres pa yis sangs rgyas chos//rab mchog rgyal ba'i
182b1(rgyud): bdag po'i mtshan ni sum cu rtsa gnyis dag dang dpe byad rnams kyang brgyad cu ste//khyab padagA mchog bI go 'phang 'di dag mtha' dgra sngags pa yis ni lus la bsgom par bya ba yin/k+Sha
182b2(rgyud): ba'i rang bzhin gcig ste zung dang lag pa mig dang 'khrig pa phyogs dang bgrod pa dag ni gnyis//'jig rten dus dang yon tan me ni gsumo chu gter dus dang rig byed dag ni bzhi ru
182b3(rgyud): brjod//mda' dang 'byung ba dbang po rnams ni nges par lnga ru rab tu 'gyur te ro dang dus ni drug/gza' dang ri ba thub pa zhes pa bdun gyi grangs te de bzhin klu dang nor ni brgyad yino//rtsa
182b4(rgyud): dang bug pa gza' dang gter yang dgu ste phyogs ni bcu dang dbang phyug dag ni bcu gcig/nyi ma lus med ma nu srid pa gang dang tshes drang mi bdag bcu gnyis nas nI re re 'phel//
182b5(rgyud): nyes pa 'di dag bco brgyad yin te rgyal po mchog ni ma lus de rnams nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o//de nyid ces grangs nyi shu rtsa lnga yin te gnyis skyes ces pa sum cu rtsa gnyis nyid 'gyur/
182b6(rgyud): rgyud kyi rgyal po thams cad dag tu nges par rdo rje'i tshig ni rdo rje can gyis sbas pa ste//dang po'i sangs rgyasu ni srog chags rnams kyi thar pa'i slad ma lus pa yang mngon sum gsungs
182b7(rgyud): de phyir 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa dag las mtha' dag ma tshad med pa'i rgyud ni bla ma ste//dpal ldan rgyud ni dang po'i sangs rgyas mtha' dag rgyal ba'i bdag po'i mngon par
183a1(rgyud): brjod pa zla ba bzang //gang la thog mtha' dbus med gnas dang 'chi dang srid pa dang ni sgra dang dri dang ro dbu dang //reg bya gzugs dang sems med rang bzhin dang ni smras/
183a2(rgyud): bu med cing 'ching dang grol dang byed po med//sa bon dang ni gsal ba'i dus med mtha' dag srid par sdug bsngal bde ba nyid kyi rang bzhin med//mya ngan 'das pa mtshan ma med cing
183a3(rgyud): byed pa rnams bral yon tan mong pa de la phyag 'tshalo//dus dang sna tshogs la sogs rdo rje skyes bu dI pa zla med cing thams cad du 'gro spros pa med//brtsegs pa la gnas rna ba//
183a4(rgyud): sna dang kha dang mig dang mgo ste thams cad nas ni phyag dang zhabs//'byung ba'i mtha' ste 'byung po'i mgon po srid pa gsum po mchog 'dzin rgyu rnams dag gi rgyur gyur pa//
183a5(rgyud): reg pa la sogs rnal 'byor dag gi bgrod bya mchog bde'i go 'phangs dus kyi 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal//spo byed nus pa'i ngo bo glog gi me dang mtshungs shing nyi me bcu
183a6(rgyud): gnyis dug gi gzi brjid can//yaM shrIs rdo rje'i snang ba mchog gi go 'phangs bgrod byed rnam par btsud pa de lta phyag 'tshalo//dkar po 'jig rten gsum gyi mgo
183a7(rgyud): re bong 'dzin pa las 'dzag 'jig rten spyi bor yang dag gnas//bdud rtsi 'chi ba sil zhing srid pa'i 'jigs pa'i 'joms par byed pa thig le'i gzugs la byag 'tsha
183b1(rgyud): sems tsam sngags kyi ngo bo lha yis yongasu bskor ba sdug bsngal dang ni bde ba'i rang bzhin te//dam pa rnams la zhi ba'i gzugs ni rang gis byas pa'i nyams myong mi bzang rnams la
183b2(rgyud): mi bzang pa//gang gis las gang rab byas rang gi sems la cho ga bzhin du de yi'abras bu de bskyed pa//'jig rten dbang po sna tshogs gzugs can srid gsum skyed mdzad rdo rje sems
183b3(rgyud): dpa' la yang phyag 'tshal lo//gcig dang du ma dag kyang gcig cing mnyam dang mi mnyam mnyam pa g.yas dang g.yon dang mdun dang rgyab//steng 'og kun nas dkar ljang sna tshogs
183b4(rgyud): kha dog chen po gcig gi gzugs te thung ring po dang //shin tu ring po yon tan med ces yon tan dang bcas bud med skyes pa'ang skyes pa bud med min//gang zhig kuni gyi rten
183b5(rgyud): gcig b+ha ga bzang mo mchog gi b+ha ga khyod la 'dud de khyod la 'dud//gang zhig mi yi 'jig rten dag na dpal ldan bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa sdig bral de bdag ste//de la gnod pa
183b6(rgyud): byas pas srog chags rnams ni nges par dmyal bar 'gyur te 'di la ngo mtshar med//de mnyes pa yas bdag ni mgu sti de la khro ba'i me yis khros pa zhes pa chen po'o//de nyid
183b7(rgyud): sems can rnams la thar pa bde mnyam 'bras ster bu rnams dag gi phyag 'os mchod 'o so//sdig can gang yin gang zhig dpal ldan bla ma'i zhabs pad bzang po dag la dus
184a1(rgyud): gsum phyag mi byed//mi shes gang yin gang zhig rnam mang me tog rnams kyis dus gsum du ni man+ta la mi byed pa//myur du ma nang med 'gro ba gang yin gang zhig bdo//
184a2(rgyud): mnyam ster byed bla ma skyo ba skyed pa po//shes rab ye shes 'thob pa gang yin ma nyams gang zhig mchog gi bla ma'i zhabs ni mi spong ba//nyams pa gang zhig rtse gsum dag
184a3(rgyud): la gnas po'i rlung ni mtha' yas dus su bsad pa'o//dpa' bo gang yin gang zhig mnyam dang mi mnyam lam la srog dang thur sel rlung ni gsod byed pa'o//sbyin bdag
184a4(rgyud): gang yin gang zhig dpal ldan bla mar rang lus bu dang chung ma la sogs thams cad ster//ma rabs gang yin gang zhig slu byed rang gi snying gi sdig pas drangs pa'i sem+ba dang /
184a5(rgyud): g.yo sgyu can//dpal ldan dpal ni chos kyi 'khor lo lha yi mchog gis btung pa'i gdan ni kha dog sna tshogs pa//de la sangs rgyas lha dang mi yi bla ma nye bar
184a6(rgyud): bzhug swa pas zla ba'i zhu ba rtogs pa na//sems can don gyi slad du mi yi bdag po rgyud kyi rgyal po dang po'i sangs rgyas gsungs pa gang //de yang da lta ba dag gis de rnam
184a7(rgyud): I l-i kA li nyung ngu'i rgyud du bkod do nyi ma kye//sangs rgyas kyis ni gsungs pa dag le sa dus kyi 'khor lo bdag gis phreng 'dzin sde ba sbyor bcing bas brjod/pad+ma dkar
184b1(rgyud): ba rdo rje 'dzin pa khyod kyis 'di ni sngags pa rnams la bstan pa nyid du mdzad//ji ltar nyi ma dang bcus thub pa'i rigs ni shes rab ye shes thob pa'i dra las byung gyur pa//rnam gsum srid//
184b2(rgyud): pA la gnas sems can rnams ni dus kyi lde khor lo'i drin las de bzhin 'gyur bar shog/nyi ma khyod dam mi dbang phyi mar gyur pa'i srid par dus kyi 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor gcig las
184b3(rgyud): ni//tshangs pa'i rigs 'di las skyes mi yi bdag po glags pa bdag ni 'jam dbyangs bdag gi dga' ma ni//dang ldan sgrol me pad dkararu can ni yon tan kun gauter 'jig
184b4(rgyud): rten mgon po chu skyes mtshan ma cano//ut+pal sdong bu yis ni rang gzhan la gnas stong pa thams cad don ni ji lta bzhin du ltos//ut+pal sdong bu yis ni rang gzhan lnga gnas snyid/
184b5(rgyud): pa thams cad don ni ji lta bzhin mthong nas//thub pa'i dbang po rnams dang lhan cig nya mas cod pa na bcas pa'i mgro dang log pa dag gis ni//rigs ldan zhabs kyi pad+mar phyig/
184b6(rgyud): dag 'tshal nas smras pa ston pa gcig pu mchog gi thugs rje yis//thub pa'i rigs ni 'jigs rlung 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dag las phyung nas ye shes lam la bzhig/
184b7(rgyud): par mdzod//khyod ni rgan yang gzho nu mtha' dag rgyal ba'i sras po yin yang thob mar dang po'i sangs rgyas khyod//bud med sbyor zhing tshangs par spyod ldan mchog gi thugs
185a1(rgyud): rje dag gis 'jig rten gnyen te gshin+da rje'i dgra//khyod ni ni yang rdo rje bzang po 'tsho ba'i 'jigs pa 'azlog pa khyod ni rtag tu bdud kyi bdud//khyod ni grong
185a2(rgyud): yang srid pa 'dir ni 'gro ba smin pa'i dron du grags pa khyod ni rab tu 'jug/tshangs pa'i rigs las nyi ma bdag ni thub pa'i rigs kyis btung bar gyur pa zhabs kyi rtsa bar
185a3(rgyud): lhung //sems can rnams kyi thar pa'i slad dus kyi 'khor lo mtha' dag sa la rab tu gsal bar byas//rigs ldan rigs la khyod ni nyi mas bdag gis btung dang ldan
185a4(rgyud): grags pa dang ldan ka lA par//khyod kyi zhabs kyi pad+ma dag la 'jigs rung 'khor bas 'jigs po dag ni skyabasu lhag par mchi//sa ga'i zla ba'i nya la mtshan mo'i dus ni
185a5(rgyud): 'das shing nyin par rab tu ma zhugs pa dag la//thub pa'i skye bo dang bcas nyi ma sna tshogs gtso bos byin gyis brlab pas phyag rgya'i dngos grub thob//sems can rnams kyi
185a6(rgyud): thar pa'i slad du bdag gi thugs kyi rdo rje mtha' dag sa la granas pa bzhin//dus kyi 'khor lo'i mthu las sems can nyid rnams dag gi rnam gsum srid pa dag la gnas gyur
185a7(rgyud): cig sems can kun don mdzad pa po yis mchog gi thugs rje dag gis rgyud kyi don ni bstan mdzad nas//sras po pad+ma dkar po rab mchog yon tan dag gi gtor//
185b1(rgyud): la gnang pa stsal pa nges par ni//dang por khyod kyis rgyud kyi rgyal po mtha' dag ma tshang med pa glegs bam dag la gnas pa dang //de nas rang gi 'dod pas 'grel bshang byas nas
185b2(rgyud): gzhan gyi gnasu bgrod par bya'o 'jig rten gnyen//gang dag steng na bdud kyi phyogs gnas lha ma yin rnams mchog tu 'jigs byed byang chub sems dpa' rnams//ma yi/
185b3(rgyud): 'jig rten dag na phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas khro bo'i rgyal po btsun mor bcas pa rnams//gang dag sa 'og dag na gdengs tson dbang po gdon tshogs mi dge thams cad
185b4(rgyud): dus su 'ching byed pa//de dag thams cad nyin zhag so so'i dus su mi shes 'jig rten kun nas skyong bar byed gyur cig/rgyud ni dpa ldan dus kyi 'khor lo shin tu bslus pa ma lus
185b5(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa'i lhag pa'i lha//thabs dang shes rab gcig sbyor rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rdo rje dag gis de nyid rnam pa bcu druge phyi//sems can rnams kyi thar pa'i slad du
185b6(rgyud): rgyal ba'i bdag pos gsungs shing bdag gis kyang ni bstan pa gang //bsod nas de yis sems can thams cad 'gyur med mchog gi bde bar gyur cig de la 'dud gyur
185b7(rgyud): co gi/dang po'i sangs rgyas stong phrag bcu gnyis pa las phyung ba dpal dus kyi 'khor lo las//ye shes kyi le'u lce lnga pa'o///mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas las
186a1(rgyud): phyung brgyud kyi rgyal po dpal dus kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba rdzogs///bzo'i paN+Di tA sa ma nA tha dang bo k+Shi l-its+tsha ba 'bro dge slong shes rab glags kyi//
186a2(rgyud): bsgyur cing zhus te gtan laM phab pa las/dus phyis yon tan phul du byung ba dpag tu med pas spras pa'i bla mya dam pa chos kyi rgyal po'i bka' lung dang //dpon chen shA
186a3(rgyud): de zang po'i gsung bzhin du//mkhas pa chen po zhang stong mdo sde dpal dang //dus kyi 'khor lo'i tshul khong du chud pa'i dge slong tshul khrims dar gyis don gyi rgyal
186a4(rgyud): legs par dpyang ning bsku ba te//legs pa sgreng brda skyed pa'i bsnyen bcos rig pa'i dge slong shong ston gyiste//dpal sa s+t+rI'i gtsug leg khang chen por/
186a5(rgyud): yul dbus kyi rgyu dpe gnyis la gtugs shing legs par bcos te gtan la phab pa'o//gang gis thugs dgongs rnam par dag pa yis//'di la bskul zhing
186a6(rgyud): 'thun rkyen bsgrubs pa dang //badrug gis 'bang las bsod nams gang thob des//kun gyis 'di rtogs sangs rgyas sur gnas shog//rgya gar skad du/
186a7(rgyud): shrI ki lI tsakra ut+ta ra tan+t+ra ra dzA tAn+ta hri da ya nA ma/bod skad du/dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i phyi ma rgyud kyi snying po zhes bya ba//'jam pa'i dbyings la phyag
186b1(rgyud): 'tshal lo//'di ltar chos dbyings pakyil 'khor dri mod su la 'jam dpal gyis ni dge dung mi dge bas//sangs rgyas pa dang mu skyegs pa drug lha rnams dang ni dmyal ba nyid ce/
186b2(rgyud): gang thob pa//rgyal mchog pho brang shaM b+ha lar grags krol pa ru ngag gi dbang phyug sang+ge yi//gadran la bzhugs nas rgyal pos rgyud kyi rgyal po slar yang thub pa rnams la
186b3(rgyud): gsal bar bstan//byung gyur zhes sogs bden te lha mchog bla ma khyab 'jug lha yi dbang phyug lha yi dbang po dang //zla ba nyi ma sgra gcin mo lha sa stengs lha yul namakha'ang
186b4(rgyud): bsod nams sdig las 'byung //mi rnams pha rol srid par yi dgas dmyal ba gang zhig bkag pa shA yi dam tshig can//rig byed pa dang thod pa can gyi rgyud kyi sdig pa'i bya ba de ni/
186b5(rgyud): brdzun pa ste//gang du gcan chen bdun la sogs pa dge dang mi dge'i dbang gis bram ze rnams kyang der//skyes la sngar gyi lus po spangs nas lus gzhan bsam pos nges/
186b6(rgyud): par 'dzin par 'gyur ba ni//thub pa shed bu'i tshig las srog chags rnams kyi gsong byed za ba'i mthar thug brgyad du 'gyur//sha zos pa las bram ze rnams kyang lha lhas sa/
186b7(rgyud): sbyangs 'dir Sh+Tang de ni bden pa ste//bzang po tshangs pa dbang phyug khyab 'jug rnams kyi rigs byed zhi chos khyab 'jug chos bla ma//sha yi kha zas bkag le sha yi dam tshig
187a1(rgyud): can la rnal 'byor ma dang rnal 'byor rgyud//rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bco lnga sogs par bde gshogs dmachog can la sangs rgyas byang chub na/
187a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas pa yis kun nas sho mi bza' zhing bdog gi ba yis rtag tu bsrung mi bya//srog cha blo rnams la srog chags 'du shes gsod pa'i yid kyis nye bar brtsams
187a3(rgyud): pas 'di nyams pa//yan lag lnga yis srog gcod 'gyur gyi na mkha' tsam ni srog tshegs rnams kyi byed pa min//srog gcod lus dang ngag dang yid kyi rgyu rnams
187a4(rgyud): gsum gyis 'grub la de la longs spyod cing //skyed byed bdag nyid sems kyi rgyal po srog chags rnams ni las longs spyod pas 'jig par 'gyur//sang+ge sbrul dang ne le/
187a5(rgyud): stag dang bya rog skye gnas yan lag lnga yis srog gcod 'gyur//rgyal po dang ni skye dgu rnams ni byed dam byed du 'dug dang yi rang gi sum gyis 'gyur//dge
187a6(rgyud): srang snying rje med pos lce la sha yi ro myong ro la rje su tshel byed tsang //bdag nyid gsod pa la sogs skyon gyis dge slong rnams dang dge tshul yang nI dmyal bar 'gro
187a7(rgyud): dge slong nid pa la ni smin pas sha bstan na yang bye khra rnams kyis bsad pa dang //pha yi ched du bsad dang mchod sbyin thog dang me dang chu dang ma zhu'i skyon gyi shi ba rnams
187b1(rgyud): sbyor ba 'di rnams med par gyur na gang du de tshe bza' bar bya bar gsungs pa rnams//dge slong rnams la sha gang de ni stobs bcu ldan pas nad 'joms phyir yin 'chi bsrur min//
187b2(rgyud): shaM la sogs pa zos na nges par sa yi 'og tu lus chen rnamasu sdug bsngal 'gyur//srog chags yi dgas la sogs skyes gnas dka' thub khyim pa rgyal po nges par
187b3(rgyud): rang khyim du//gzhan gyi khyim dang chung ma longs spyod dang ni bu mo gnyen 'dun tshogs dang rang khyim rnams//shi ba rnams kyi lus ni gang yin chung ma bu dang bu mo gnyen
187b4(rgyud): 'dun tshogs ni gang //'dir ni rdo la gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya nyid ni rnam par blta//mtho yor shes pa yod la rang gzhan rnam pa bral ba nyid las rdo
187b5(rgyud): ba'i mtho yor phung por 'gyur//sa stengs gnasu srab chags rnams kyi rig pa nyams pa'i lus la'ang yod pa nyid//srog chags rnams kyi srog rgyu ba ni rang gzhan rnam par
187b6(rgyud): bral bar legs par sad las shes//sha b+ha la yi nyi ma'i shing rta la sogs phung po khams dang dbang po 'gro ba rnams//'gro ba'i gzugs kyi khams la sogs pa
187b7(rgyud): phung po thams cad rdul phran rnams kyi rnam 'gyur te//longs spyad byed pa rnam por reg pa tsam ste rang gzhan bral te rtog med rnams kyis//longs spyod byed min srog
188a1(rgyud): chags rnams kyi snang byed gang gis mun pa bral nas sad 'gyur ro//za ba nyi ma sgra gcan dus kyi mo dang mun po gcig pu snang bar byed pa yang //sa sogs dri sogs/
188a2(rgyud): mig la sogs dang gzhu dang char pa glig dong rlung srogs drug pa gnyis//de ni lus la phung po drug dang yul dang yul can de yi bya ba drug pa gnyis//de rnams longs spyod byed po srog
188a3(rgyud): chags phung po gnyid log gyur 'dir snang byed kyis brlang po//phye yi bdag drang nang gi bdag dang gsum po mchog gi bdag rnams bzhi pa las rab byung //sbrul sku longs sku dang ni
188a4(rgyud): de bzhin chos kyi sku rnams byin pa las ni rab tu byung //khong stong min ning gcig su mchog gyur 'byung ba las gyur tsam gyis gsum sogs thim par 'gyur//de bzhin gsum
188a5(rgyud): la sogs pa gcig pu mchog gyur chos kyi dbyangs nges par thim par 'gyur//phung po khams dang dbang po'i yan lag skye mched mun pa stug po snang ba 'od kyi mdog/rnam par//
188a6(rgyud): shes pa srog gi de nyid srid gsum 'gro bar gtogs pa'i mtha' yas byang chub chos//dri rnams na mkha'i me tog bzhin du yod mAn mkha'u tsa mi rdul phran chos kyi dbyings la
188a7(rgyud): gnas//gang phyir 'gro ba 'di rnams bdag dang gsum la sogs pa sangs rgyas sku gsum la sogs pa//yan lag nang nis nyon mongs ma rig par 'gyur slar yang len pa//
188b1(rgyud): ni srid pa yang //las ni 'du byed srid par 'gyur la 'dir ni gsum po zung bcas rgyu chos sdug bsngal no//rnam shes la sogs rnam pa lhur 'gyur de bzhin bcu gcig pa dang bcu
188b2(rgyud): gnyis pa yang yin//gsum las zung la phreng las dpag tu med pa'i smod par chos bduna'i bras buri yan lag rnams//shing las me tog me tog las kyang 'bras bzhin gang zhig
188b3(rgyud): 'gro ba'i nyon mongs pa las las//de las sdug bsngal sdug bsngal de las nyon mongs mtha' yas 'khor lo ma lus rgya las byung //chos rnams 'gag pa med pa na mkha' tsam
188b4(rgyud): las 'byung ba'ang med pa nyid pas de yi phyir//srog chags srog go rdul phran phung por bcas shing 'gro ba gzhan du rtag min mi rtag min//sbyin pa la sogs gang zhig dge bcur
188b5(rgyud): ldan pa gtong zhing byang chub phyogs kyi stong pa nyid//gang zhig de dag byed pa por 'gyur rgyal mchog sras bcas srog chags rnams kyi bdud kyi ris//de las phung po rnams las de las
188b6(rgyud): skyer yang srid gzhon 'pho mon phung po'i mtshams sbyor ni//mir ma kha ton rgya dang dri med chu dang skra dang nyi ma chu shIl sa boni skAr//gang du rgyal ba rnams kyi chos su dkar po'i chos
188b7(rgyud): kyi tshogs las byung zhes pa bden//chos las longs spyod rdzogs sku mtshan dang dpe byad ldan pa ma lus sgra yi tshogs rnams te//phung po sprul pa'i sku la mchog tu 'gyur med bde
189a1(rgyud): bachos rgyu na na zhing du yi ra//gang zhig zla yi mtshan nyid 'dor ni sang+yas rgyas pa yi slob dpon nu yis gang gsungs pa//gang zhig pa cig min du ma man la rang /
189a2(rgyud): dang bdag gzhan la phan phrin tshegs chen po'i rten gyur pa//dngos med dngos po med min no mkha' bzhini du ro mi nyi ma rnam par dpyid dka'i rang bzhin nyid//gos med rnam par
189a3(rgyud): 'gyur med zhi ba mtshungs pa med pa mnyam zhing khyab la spros pa med//dpe med so sor rang gis rig bya rgyal ba rnams kyi chos kyi sku la bdag phyag 'tshal//gang zhig 'jig
189a4(rgyud): rten las 'das bsam mi khyab pa legs spyad 'bras bu bdag nyid phun sum tshogs//blo ldan chen por gyur pa mnyes pa'i rgyur bu rA 'khor gyi dbusu sna tshogs gsung
189a5(rgyud): mdzad cing //'jig rten kun la khyab pa rgyun mo 'chad pa rgya che'i dam chos sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs//longs spyod rdzogs sku chos kyi rgyal po chen por gnas pa de la 'dir
189a6(rgyud): na bdag phyag 'tshal//gang zhig sems can rnams kyi smin pa'i rgyur gyur la la ma bzhin gsal bar snang ba dang //slar yang la lar mngon par byang chub chos kyi 'khor la
189a7(rgyud): rab tu zhi ba gang mthong ba//rnam pa du mar 'gro ba'i gzugs kyi thabs kyis 'jug cing srid pa gsum gyi 'jigs pa 'joms//phyogs bcu'i rjesu 'jug pa don chen chen rna/
189b1(rgyud): thub pa rnams kyi sprul pa'i sku la phyag 'tshalo//khams gsum spyod pa las grol mkha' dang mnyam par gyur pa dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin nyid//dag cing zhi la rnam dben mchog tu/
189b2(rgyud): zhi la rang bzhin rnal 'byor nyid kyis rtogs bya ba//rtogs dka' brtag par dka' la zhi ba mi mnyam mnyam par khyab cing mtshan ma med pa nyid//mi mnyam bde ba rnam par mi rtog
189b3(rgyud): sku gcig rgyal ba rnams kyi sku la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas zhing khams mtha' yas rdul phan yon tan las byung ma lus 'jig rten khams rnamasu//zla ba nyi ma la sogs skye gnas
189b4(rgyud): lha yul sa stengs na mkha' rdo rje btsun mo'i mthar//bud med skye gnas chos kyi dbyingasu bde 'gro ngan 'gro dus kun du ni rnam par bzhugs//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas srog chags
189b5(rgyud): phung po yul gyi yon tan ldan pa bsod nams sdig pa'i mthus//khu ba khrag dag rig ma'i b+ha ga'i pad+mar chud cing srog gI rlung dang rtsol ba'i rlung //de ni ye shes lnga yi rang
189b6(rgyud): bzhin can du 'gyur ba'i skyes bu rig ma yang dge ldan//yul gyi yon tan las byung de longs spyod pa'i gzugs sku mA yI khams la rab brten pa//skyes pa bud med ma ning /
189b7(rgyud): lha klu khyab 'jug rgyal ba thub pa rang las mthu las byung //gang gi de nyid de nyid lnga dang rigs gsum go 'phang yang ni gcig tu gsang ba yi//zhal brgya rigs 'dzin dpa
190a1(rgyud): po zla bas sogs yul dang yul can+da bdag po chos kyi dbyings//zhal brgya pa de rgyu las gnyis rgyas lag pa rkang pa'i yan lag sor mo'i tshigs rnams la/de
190a2(rgyud): la tshor ba gsum la sogs pa nub par 'gyur ba sgra bzhin myur du 'gro bar 'gyur//gang zhagri lnga drang gsum las yul dang yul can dri dang lus la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur///
190a3(rgyud): sa la sogs pa lnga dang zla ba nyi ma mun pa rnams kyis khams rnams rgyas bta ba des//gcig gi du ma'i khams las gnyis skyes lag pa rkang pa sor mo'i tshogs rnams
190a4(rgyud): gang zhig du//thams cad zla ba'i rgyu las mchog gi rigs brgya rgyas btab skyes pa dang ni bud med dgra/rten gyi 'byung ba'i tshogs ni rang bzhin yon tan yang ni 'jin
190a5(rgyud): med rdul gyi phung po ste//srog gi rgyu ni dbyangs yig la sogs rang bzhin kyang ni 'jig pa med pa srog gi khams//khu bo'i rten ni zla ba nyi ma yang ni las yin rdul ni srog chag
190a6(rgyud): phung po yi//de yi thabs kyis sad par byas pas bsod nams sdig pa'i mthu las 'bras bu sa gzhan du//rang gi lus kyi phung po lngar ljongs spyod cing slar yang gzhan
190a7(rgyud): du slar yang sogs par byed//de yi dkar po'i bsam gtan bstod pa nges par brgya yis las kyi phung po zad pa min//gcer bu la ni las kyi phung po rnam par
190b1(rgyud): 'jigs 'gyur srog byed mo ni 'ba' zhig gis//dkar po'i bsam gtan dgra bcom sngags dang bstod pa nges pa brgya phrag sems can lus ngag las//pad+ma khyad byed snying po'i za
190b2(rgyud): 'bru'i dbang phyug dgra bcom thig le bzang po sgrim par byed//dbus lus po sbas pa be rtse mo brgya praMg 'bar ba kun nas gsal bar byed pa can//lha rnams gsang ba'i mdzod
190b3(rgyud): gyur mchog gi go 'phang 'di ni brgya byin rgyal po mchod 'os pa//bsam gtan 'di ni sreg lugs za bas ma lus las kyi phung po srog par 'gyur ba mthong //gang zhig gnod
190b4(rgyud): po'i bsam gtan la zhugs gyur pas nyon dang mtshan du de yi sdigs 'phel 'gyur//gang zhig gnod pa'i bsam gtan las ldeg gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig nyams
190b5(rgyud): 'gyur/gang zhig drag po'i bris ma gtan la zhugs gyur pas nyin dang mtsha ni du de yi sdig pu 'phel//gang zhig drag po'i bsem gtan las ldog gyur pas nyin deng mtshan du/
190b6(rgyud): de yi sdig pa rnams//gang zhig chos kyi bsam gtan la zhugs gyur pas nyin mtshan du de yi sdig pa nyams//gang zhig chos kyi bsam gtan les ldog 'gyur bas nyin dang
190b7(rgyud): mtshan du de yi sdig pa 'phel//gang zhig dkar po'i bsam gtan la zhugs gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig pa nyams//gang zhig dkar po'i bsam gtan las ljon
191a1(rgyud): gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig pa 'byol//bang zhi ba nyon dang mtshan du 'tsho ba la zhugs gyur pa de rnams sdig pa 'phel par 'gyur//gang nag
191a2(rgyud): nyin dang mtshan du 'tshe ba ldog par gyur pa de rnams kyi ni bsod nams 'bel//de bzhin sha dang chang dang gzhin gyi nor 'phrog pa dang 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang //'dod
191a3(rgyud): chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams dang nges par khro ba nga rgyal 'dod pa rnams kyis 'gyur//gang zhig sbyin pa la zhugs gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi bsod nams 'phel
191a4(rgyud): bar 'gyur//gang zhig sbyin pa las ldog gyur pa nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig pa 'phelta bar 'gyur//de bzhin tshul khrims bzod pa nyin dang mtshan du 'gyur la rdo rje'i
191a5(rgyud): brtson 'grus de bzhin du//shes rab thabs dang smon lam stobs kyi sbyor bar ldan zhing stong nyid ye shes rdo rje rnams//dngos dang dngos med byed po bsgribs dang na mkha'
191a6(rgyud): 'phrog par byed pa dang ni mchog gi bradag/na mkha' med na byed po gnas min 'dir ni gang zhig stong nyid smra ba rnams kyi tshig/sems can rnams kyi byed por ma byas bsod/
191a7(rgyud): nams sdig pa dus rnams kun tu rnam par 'phel//rgyal ba stobs bcu ldan pa ye shes can dang lha rnams longs ma spyad par 'jig pa min//so sor sdud la sogs pa/
191b1(rgyud): drug po skyabs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pas stong nyid sgom par gsungs//mtshan mo du ba la stsogs sbyor bsA slar yang nyin mo na mkha' 'bar ba la stsogs pas//so sor sdur pas
191b2(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa yis dus gsum dngos po ni mkha'i dkyil du son par mthong //bsam+b+ha gtan gyis kyang de lta shin tu sems brtan+te byas pas phyi rol dngos po rnam par spong /slob/
191b3(rgyud): rtsal gyis ni srog gi rlung dag nyi ma zla ba bral nas mun par rgyu bar byed//dbugs kyi 'byung 'jug bral zhing slar yang 'dzin pa'i yan lag gis ni thig le 'dzin par byed //rjesu
191b4(rgyud): dran pas rang gi gzugs las zla ba bzhin du na mkhar 'od mang 'phro bar byed//ting 'dzin gyis lu ba rdo rje nas brtsams mgo bor dri med bde bas rab gang 'gyur//na mkha' re
191b5(rgyud): bltas pas gti mug rnam par 'jig par 'gyur te sna tshogs stong pa nyid mthong bas//nang gi bdag nyid bltas pas 'dod chags 'jig par 'gyur te srog gi rlung dag bkags
191b6(rgyud): pas so//yan lag med par bltas pas zhe sdang 'jig par 'gyur te khu ba dri med bde ba yis//sna rtser bltas pas nga rgyal 'jig par 'gyur te gzhom du med pa tshangs pa'i//
191b7(rgyud): dasung las so//srog dang rtsol ba bkag pas sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan dri ma bral ba'i dkyil 'khor yang dag pa//gsang ba lte ba snying kha mgrin pa mgo bo rdo rje rnams/
192a1(rgyud): smra rim bzhin sa zung //khu byA b+hin+ta du song zhing khAg+na kyang 'ob tu 'gro lha tshad sa dbyangs gzhom du med pa las//s+yA b+hA sung thugs kyi rdo rje dri ma gsum
192a2(rgyud): drung bral ba gung gis rten pa sangs rgyas nyid//khyo la sogs pa'i sha yo mig ded rang bzhin yon tenA dbang gis lce la sogs pa'i l-I yi skyon//rang rgya la nyin thos dag
192a3(rgyud): gis gzhan gyi sems rtogs shes pa sangs rgyas sbyin te gsum pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dri ma bral ba rnams dag bzhi pa shes rab spyan du 'gyur//sangs
192a4(rgyud): rgyurgyas rnams kyi thams cad gzigs pa dri ma gro sum dang bral ba lnga pa ye shes spyan//rgyu 'thun dga' ba khu ba rdo rje yang ste de 'dzin pas na nges par rdo rje 'dzin//lus kyi
192a5(rgyud): sngo boni khu ba phab skye 'khor lo 'dzin pa ste bla'i 'khorar+ya lo'i bde ba gang //mtshon bya de nyid mtshon bzhin pA yi s+yA khA sgra bcus bde ba mgon po 'kho ba 'jig/gung
192a6(rgyud): gis mgrin pa de rig g.yo med byed pa 'dzin pa de ni tshor byed rin chen 'dzin//gang gi sku mgo bor zla ba 'dzin pa 'di ni khu ba d+hi bral bde ba shes rab 'dzin//gtsug tor
192a7(rgyud): tshangs pa'i bu gar 'gyur med mchog gi bde ba dga' ba bcu drug rab gang ba//gang gis shes rab rang bzhin med pa mchog gi zla ba cha shas bcu drug rdzogs pa'i
192b1(rgyud): muthu'/d+hIn+ti dpag mau brang gis rig pa mgo ba rdo rje dang bcas drug pa rdo rje sems//snang ba ye shrIs khamasu 'gyur te gang zhig spyi bor 'gyur med rdo rje skyes bu lA/
192b2(rgyud): dribral su yaM thig le mgo bo'i skyes bu de ni chu dang nyi mu mgrin par yang //sge ga can me dang rnam smin snying kha spu bcas bde ba rlung dang lto ba mjug rings te//gsang ba
192b3(rgyud): 'khor lor mun can+da bcom pa'i bde ba stong pa can ni stong pa mun pa'i khams//gang zhig mig la sogs pa yul can drug po lha mo rnams las su sgying la sogs gang /
192b4(rgyud): gzugs ni phung po la sogs gang zhig yul drug rnams kyang lha ru brtags pa de rnams kyi//dag pa'i dbang po la sogs yul can drug po gang zhig snod mdzes rgyal po
192b5(rgyud): la stsogs pa//de rnams khu ba mi 'pho la sogs yul drug rnams kyang sngon mo la sogs de rnamaso//gang zhig khro bo gshin rje gsheng ni zla ba dang bcas srog rlung rab tu
192b6(rgyud): bcom gyur pa//nyi ma dang bcas srog rlung rab tu bcom 'gyur gang zhig khro bo pad+ma mthar byed do//sgra gtsun dang bcas srog rlung rab tu bcom pa gang zhig khro bo bge gas
192b7(rgyud): mthar byed pa ste//mjug rings dang bcas srog rlung nges par bcom pa gang zhig khro bo shes rab mthar byed//srog rlung 'gags pas phyag gnyis dgyes rdor zhi ba 'dir
193a1(rgyud): nang rgyal 'joms pa rdo rje sems//srog rlung bkag pas phyag bzhi pa yi dgyes rdor byin zan sdang 'joms la byang chub sems//dgyes pa'i rdo rje/
193a2(rgyud): 'dod chags 'joms pa zhol gsum phyag drug dbang phyug sems dpa' chen por 'gyur//zhalnga brgyad po la zhabs be zhi gti mug 'joms pas tshangs pa bde ba dang
193a3(rgyud): bcas dam tshig sems//lte bar srog rlung bkang bsra dri ma gsum bral rdo rje sems dpa' de ni sangs rgyas nyid//snying khar bkag pas dri ma gsum bral byang chub
193a4(rgyud): sems dpa' rang rgyal de ni sangs rgyas nyid//mgrin par nyi ma de ni dri ma gsum bral sems dpa' chen po nyan thos nyid du 'gyur//dpral ba rlung gi dbang po 'gags
193a5(rgyud): pas bde ba dang bcas dam tshig sems dpa' ston pa'i sras//lte ba'i 'khor lor mi 'gyur mchog gi bde ba gang zhig khro bo'i dbang po'i rtswa bzhi dang //sum cu rtsi
193a6(rgyud): gnyis dang ldan ro la ro yis bsgyur bu gang zhig bde mchog 'khor lo gsum//lag pa rkang pa'i rus pa'i dum bu brgya dra dang lag mthil sor tshigs dum bu rnams//
193a7(rgyud): 'khor lo drug gi rtsa rnams 'di ra ni nyis 'gyur bde mchog chen po'i rnal 'byor ma rnams la//gtsug tor rtsa bzhi rnamasu 'pho ba rnams par bral dang de bzhin chos
193b1(rgyud): kyi 'khor ldor brgyad//mgrin+da pAr sum cu rtsa gnyis rnams su 'gyur te drug cu rtsa bzhi lte ba'i 'khor lo ru//gang zhig zla bra'i tshe yis gang ba mgo bor dkar po dang 'dir gsang bar
193b2(rgyud): dkar po'i che//'khor lo'i rtse rnams kyang na mchog tu mi 'gyur ba debo dus kyi 'khor lo lhag pa'i lha//dus ni drug cus lhag dang bcas pa'i brgya phrag gsum ste tshigs
193b3(rgyud): mtsham rnams kyang rdo rje'i sku//rgyu skar rnams kyi dbyug gu nam mkha' lag pa rgyal po de yang dang po'i sangs rgyas gsungs//zla ba'i cha shas sum cu namA mkha' na mkha' gdeng
193b4(rgyud): can zla ba'i rtsi ni zla bzang po//rtsa dang ba puM gang zhig maM lus lus la gnas pa rdo rje myu gu'i ming can te//rdo rje chu dang shang ba khrag rnams lus kyi stong pa nyid kyis lce yis lhag
193b5(rgyud): par 'gyur//byams pa'i tshems kyis gtong dang lag pa rkang pa'i sha rnams zos pas nges na drag po la//mngon shes lnga yi zhal chen yul gyi phyug kyi tshogaso rnams zos
193b6(rgyud): pas des na se ge ste//bsod nams ye shes tshul khrims dam pa dri ma gsum bral dus kyi 'khor lo spyan gsum+b+ha pA//dpal ldan 'dres par sku rnams gang zhig yul
193b7(rgyud): dang yul can srog tshigs las kyi mthu las byung //der ni 'ga' zhig khams rnams de dag lha du rtag tu bdud kyi rigs la gsal bar mdzad//rtsa dang sha dang rus pa khu
194a1(rgyud): bya khrug rnams rdul phran 'dus pas lha rnams kyi ni gnas//srog chags so so'i sangs rgyas lha yul byar snad su stongs dang rang gan sugatso bo'i gnas/
194a2(rgyud): mdor byas brdzun gyi rim pas 'gyur la yul dang yul can sgrub byed rdo rje'i bzlas pa yin//rang byin rlangs pas srog rlung ri dong can+da du bzhi pa'i der ni mngon par byang chub
194a3(rgyud): 'dod//'dir ni lnga bzung 'jug rim pa mchog tu gyur pa dang ldan gsang ba 'dus par yang //da dung rnams yang dag bzung phyir srid pa gsum gyi bla mas lha yi
194a4(rgyud): bskyed pa'i rim+bu pa gsungs//gang zhig byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba bcu yi lam dang sbyin drang tshul khrims sogs las skyes//skyes pa skye bar 'dod par 'gyur
194a5(rgyud): b+hi yid tsam min la btags pa dang ni bdag kyang //bdud kyi tshig 'di dag ni rang gi yid la byed cing de 'dra'i khyab pa'i rang bzhin gyis//bsam gtan rje bo 'ga' yang yod
194a6(rgyud): min+da lha yul sa stengs bsod nams tshul khrims rnam par dman//stobs bcu mchog dang ldan pas rdzogs po'i lha dag chos kyi dbyings la yang drag gnas pa dri//brten par
194a7(rgyud): bya yi lcags kyu rdo rje mda' gzhu dril bu ral gri zhabs pas sgrub pa min//bkug cing 'dir ni gzhug dang mchog tu 'jigs par gyur pa brdung zhing lag pa bcing ba yi//
194b1(rgyud): bsam gtan 'dis ni dge ba rnam par bral nas bdud rnams shi nas ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur//sangs rgyas pa yi lha rnams dri ma gsum dang bral zhing sems can kun gyi don mdzad pa//
194b2(rgyud): de ni shin tu dri zhim me tog dri dang spos dang mar mAM dang ni lha ba shos dang //gsang sngags bzlas dang bstod pa nges pa brgya yis bsten bya sgrub pa po la rab dgyes nus//sa 'og 'jig
194b3(rgyud): rten lha yul sa stengs par snang rnamasu grub pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa ster//zla ba nyi me'i rtse dag bkag cing nyin mtshan dus su srog gi gsang sngags gang zhig ni//zla ba gcig la
194b4(rgyud): na mkha' na mkha' stong pa brang 'gro dus re mun par dbyer med bzlas//steng dang 'og gnyis 'dzin pas lan gsum bral nas srog rlung gadra bas rlung dag khyer bzhin pas//grub par
194b5(rgyud): 'gyur te ri bong 'dzin pa lta bur na mkhar 'gro bas rig pa 'dzin pa de//bsod nams dron du byang chub sems dpa' thugs rjes rgyal srid chung ma bdag gi sha yang gtong //ye
194b6(rgyud): shes don du dus gsum dngos po stong pa'i gzugs brnyan mig g.yo dri bral blo byed cing //tshul khrims don du khu ba rdo rje mgo bor khyer la mgro nas tshangs pa'i bu go ru//bskyod
194b7(rgyud): nams ye shes tshul khrims yang dag dri ma rnam par bral nas rdo rje sems dpa' 'gyur//shin tu skyon can skye bo gang zhig rgyal srid sems kyis ster ba len pas long mi spyod//
195a1(rgyud): yon tan ma lus ldan pa'i chung ma sems kyis byin yang gang zhig len pas longasu spyod minA//shwa dag sems kyis byin yang gang zhig sha yi dam chog
195a2(rgyud): can gyis len pas longs spyod min//de yis byang chub sems dpa' gal te stobs bcu ldan pa de tsho dman rigs cis mi 'gyur//byams pas dka' thub mchog ni tho rangs
195a3(rgyud): dusu chang gi don du chang 'tshong khyim du 'gro//nyin phyed dus su mchog gi thugs rjes nya yi don du nya pa rnams kyi tshong dus su//dgongs kyi dus su bud med la 'jug phyir
195a4(rgyud): du dga' bas bran mo rnams kyi khyim du 'gro//chang nye bud med rnams kyi dri ma gsum bral a ba d+hU ti dman rigs cis ma yin//gang dag dngos po du mar gyur pa ser skya
195a5(rgyud): pa ni gcig pu nyi du dam 'cha' la//gang gis bsgrub bya med pa nyid la brtan g.yo'i 'gro ba yod pa nyid du dam 'cha' bu//gang tshe gtan tshigs bsgrub bya dang mtshungs
195a6(rgyud): gyur pa de tshe sgrub pa po yis bsgrub bya min//gale to bsgrub bya gzhan la gtan tshigs kyang gzhan gyur pa de tshe de yi dam bca' nyams//sgra rnams rtag par dam
195a7(rgyud): bca' na mkha'i lta bur byas pa'i lus med par grub de bzhin du//sgra rnams mi rtag dam bca' bum pa lta bur byas te shin tu stsol bas byung ba'i phyir//nam mkha'
195b1(rgyud): las ni rtag par grub kyang khyod kyi kha las sgra rnams mi rtag nges par grub//gzugs dang reg bya dri dang ro yi yul rnams bzhin du lnga pa sgra yang cis ma yin//de ni gang gis thog mar/
195b2(rgyud): rtogs pas sa stongs par snang khamasu smai des slar yang ni//rna bas don rnams rab tu rtogs par 'gyur ba de ni sgra rnams rtag pa nyid yin lo//gang gis theg mar ngon rtogs
195b3(rgyud): g+hur pas sa stengs par swA kham su slar yang de tshul gyis//rna bas dron rnams nges par rtog par gyur pas de ni gzugs rnams rtag pa nyid yin nam//rtag pa gsal bya gcig pu
195b4(rgyud): yon tan mA lus rang bzhin sgra zhigra rno ba'i bug par gnas//mgrin pa nas brjod gsal byed sgra yi tshogs rnams slar yang rtag par gyur pa ma yin la//gong zhig
195b5(rgyud): brjod pa gcig gis nyan byed rno ba'i bu gar sgra yi ku cor 'gyur min nama?//rtag par mngon par gsal bya de ltar 'gyur gyi gzhan la ltos pas nus pa'ang min//dngos po'i /
195b6(rgyud): byed po'i rgyu ni slar yang mun pa gsal bar byed pa gzhan na gnas pas ni//rtag pa mngon par gaskul bar byas pa glang zhig rgyu yis bskyed pa 'dir ni byas pa ste//bsra pa dang
195b7(rgyud): ni gzhan po gang dag chos mi thun pas grub par 'gyur ba nyid ma yin//chos mi mthun par de phyir byas pa rnams ni yod pa ra 'gyur lo gcig shos ngo medo//gang zhig na'o//
196a1(rgyud): par gastsal bya'i rgyur gyur mngon par gsal byed do ni ci yis rgyu ma yin//mun par rim par gyur pa gang dag de yis mngon par gsal byas de yi 'bras bu
196a2(rgyud): ces ma yin//sgra dang don drug gal te gcig par gyur na de che dron nyams pa na sgra nyams 'gyur//spyi dang gsal bla'ang de bzhin 'gyur te na mkha' tsam dang gzhan pa
196a3(rgyud): nyid dang gcig pa nyid//stong pa sgyu dang ldan par gyur na de tshe 'jig rten gsum por rtag tu sgyu med 'gyur//gang gis na mkha' yod pa nyid na brtan dang g.yod 'i
196a4(rgyud): 'gro ba des na med pa nyid//gal te na mkha' dang ni 'byung ba'i tshogs kyi rgyu dag chos mi mthun las grub gyur na//de yi rgyu las sgra dang sgra min dman par nges par
196a5(rgyud): sgrub pa po la nges par 'gyur//na mkha' su stengs dag tu gza' dang rgyu skar dag dang byol srong dang ni mi rnams dang //lha dang srin po dang ni rang gi rigs kyi dram tshig
196a6(rgyud): con gyi yi dgas lha min klu//sngags kyi yi ge rnams kyi rang bzhin yon tan dbang las dbyibs dang kha dog rang bzhin gyi//don gcig du ma'i sgra yis kha cig du yang
196a7(rgyud): don rnams mang po de ni sgra gcig gis//dngos med stong pa'i rgyu las brtan dang g.yo ba'i dngos po rgyu rnams las ni grub pas na//dben ni mkha'i me tog dang ni sed
196b1(rgyud): shing dang me tog de deng dang rang grub/sa gsham bu mo na mA kha' tsas las skyes du nu mkha' 'gyur la bu ldan las smras pa//bun 'gro ba ma lus par 'gyur shin tu phra ba'i rdul
196b2(rgyud): phung po'i sa bon las//sa drang chu dang mu rnams lha yid nyid khyad par rnam sa ni phyi dang tha dad na ni//ba le te l+yA T+wA~M ga rab tu 'jig par gyur na de tshwa thu dang gzugs dang lhan cig /
196b3(rgyud): sa dang chu dang mi rnams lta yi de nyid gcig pa nyid rab tu 'jog pa min//srog chags so so'i lus ni 'jig pa rnam par bral ba'i 'byung ba'i tshogs kyi lha rnams te//sa dang /
196b4(rgyud): rluchud de b+hin+da Te rlung drung na mkhye sbyor bas gang zhig rnam lnga'i bdag nyid lus//lus can rnams la yon tan bral ba'i lha rnams rnam lnga der ni mthong min yid ces grag/srog
196b5(rgyud): rnams ni stan gyi lhas po sbyangs nus skur yang lces gle zhan bsam byas 'dzin par 'gyur//gang zhigs la sogs pa'i lha rnams de yi sngun gyi lus pa zhig pas rab
196b6(rgyud): 'jig 'gyur//srog chags gzugs gzhan glog gi phreng ba chen po bzhin du rab tu rmyi chen gzugs rgyun te//sbyinu bar nas ni bar snang dag la phyogs dang phyugs mtshungs
196b7(rgyud): rnam su mgyogs pa'i shugs kyis 'gro//srog tshigs sreg dang lhan cig dmas pi ro lus dang bral ba char ba la sogs rab ldan pa//srid pa sum cu rtsa cig rnamasu dge
197a1(rgyud): dang mi dge'i dbang gis gcig pu kho nar 'gro//gcig min rnam pa lnga po yul dang bral ba nang gi bdag dang mchog gri bdag nyid ni//na mkha' las
197a2(rgyud): 'das mi gsal min zhing me gsalnga 'bras bu myed min nus pa de man pa min//sems las 'dod pas rang bzhin skyes bu 'byung ba min cing srog rlung med na sems med
197a3(rgyud): la/srog chags sems dang lhan cig bde 'gro ngan 'gro dag tu las kyi 'brel pas 'jug/phan tshun ltos phyir rig pa dang nI bems po dag dang rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid dag//
197a4(rgyud): dag phan tshun ltos phyir gang tshe 'byung ba'i tshogs rnams yongasu gyur par rab tu 'byung bas na//ther zug po yang 'gyur ba nyid pas de tshe 'byung ba'i chos rnams 'gyur/
197a5(rgyud): par nges pa yin//thams cad 'gyur med rtag pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur yung na gang zhig rtag pa nyid ni 'gyur ba med//ther zug pa dang thar zug dman pa'i skyes bu
197a6(rgyud): khyab bdag gis ni srid sgrub la bshod//phan tshun ltos phyir rig pa dang ni rigs bdag kyang ni rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid 'gyur//phan tshun ltos phyir byas pa min dang byas pa/
197a7(rgyud): dadog kyang rgyu dang 'bras bu nyi du 'gyur//phan tshun ltos phyir byas pa dag kyang bya ba yang ni rgyu dang 'bras bu nyi du'agyur//thams cad rnam pararo rig pa tsam ste sa dong chu//
197b1(rgyud): dang mo dang rlung dang rnamakha'i khams//gzugs dang reg b+hu sgra dang dri drang bcas pa'i bde ba rdul phun phung por gyur pa min//rnam par shes las 'bras bu'i dngos par
197b2(rgyud): byubye ba las min zhing mi dang 'drernams min//sa blon las ni myu gu bzhin la sogs par 'gyur gyi rang las min zhing rgyu med min//rkang dang rus pa chub sha dang khu khrag tshil
197b3(rgyud): bri lpags pa rdul phran phud bro min//rnam par rig pa tsam zhig spangs nas slar yang srid pa gzhan du rnam rig tsam zhig 'gro//der nA lus len slar yang srid pa gzhan
197b4(rgyud): du de yang rnam rig tsam pa de nyid de//'dod chags ga nyid log gyur nA rang gzhan bral bla rnam rig tsam po rnam par nyams//glal te 'gro rnams rig tsam du gyud na 'di
197b5(rgyud): ni dren+d+ra gzhan rnam par rig tsam du//de 'gyur gal te 'gro ba rnam so rig tsAm+ba na de tshe gnyis med min te de gnyis phyir//gang zhig 'di yi ma rig blo bur ba ste lton skyes gyur
197b6(rgyud): pa de ni rnam rig min//sngon du rnam par dgu pa lhun skyes bems po yang ni rig pa rnams dag 'gyur//bems po ma lus rnam par rig pa tsam du 'gro bas sang pa'i
197b7(rgyud): tshen rab tu rtogs pas grub//de yi rnam reg mi snang bar 'gyur yang na rang gnas tshangs pa dbang phyug la sogs 'gyur//bye brag par gyur yang na ser skya'i 'dod par
198a1(rgyud): 'gyur te sa bon nang na myu gu sogs//gcig phyir 'bras bu yod par smra bar 'gyur te rgyal rtag pa cung zad yod ma yin//thog mar phra rab rdul gyi phung ba
198a2(rgyud): 'gro ba'i chu med gang gi rdul phran na mA ba' li//phra rab rdul rnams 'dus pa'i 'gro ba las kyang 'gro ba'i sre pa rdul phyun phung po min//rdul phran bral te nam par gnas pa las
198a3(rgyud): gzhan 'gro ba rnams kyi rnam par 'jig pa min//gal te lus po rdul phran phung por gyur na de tsha su yi lus pa 'jig par 'gyur//'byung ba brtags pa med las gzhan
198a4(rgyud): du rdul phran bral min gang gi rdul phran de rdul kyang //sdud dang skyed pa dril bas ni mapa'i dkyil la gnas te rlung dang ldan dang mi ldan pas//phra rab rdul rnams che shas drug
198a5(rgyud): la slar yang che shas drug ste slar lhung gang gi cha shas drug/de yi tshe shas phra rab cha yis namA pa'i khams 'di grang bar cis mo 'grub//dngul tshu nor bu'i rdul phran
198a6(rgyud): bcas rgyu med rdzu mad cheng mI dag gis bsgrub bur gyur pa min//cha dang bcas na zungs ma 'bugs min rdo yang min la rdul phran phung po che maud mi ni//dngul tshus zungs
198a7(rgyud): ma rag cing gnyis skyes nor dus rdob lnga yirin po che 'gyur lo//rnam par shes pa rnam rtog drug gi nye bar rnams pa rdul phrini phreng po'i rnam 'gyur mi rmos
198b1(rgyud): sngon po'i gzugs lnga gang zhig rdul phran phung por de yi tshung mas grub pa min//rnam par shes pa'i ngag chags dag las na mkha'i dkyil du rmi lam dang mtshungs mthong
198b2(rgyud): zhes grag/gang phyir rmus long mig med yid kyis de ni mig dang ldan zhing ma yin de phyir min//mig gi rnam shes khams las mig drang bces pas phyi rol gzugs las
198b3(rgyud): yin gyi bag chag sgo min//gang zhig sgra rnams ma lus rna bas thos pa de yang 'on pa rnams kyis thos pa min//sna nang bcas pa gang zhig dri yi rdul phran 'dus pa min zhing/
198b4(rgyud): nad med pas de 'dzin//lce yi nAng tsan+da raM mi myong la de nyid la yang nad med lce yis myong bar byed//rnam par shes pa skye mched bcu gnyis rnam par bral ba tshad mas bsgrub/
198b5(rgyud): par bya ba min//rdul phran 'dus pa'i 'gro bas kyang ni 'gro ba mthong nas mi shes pa yis tshad ma yis//drag po dang ni chongs pa'ang seng+ges kyang ni shes par rig pa tsam
198b6(rgyud): du byaso//rdul phran rnams kyi bral ba mthong nus thim par 'gyur ram bsdus sam yang na 'gags par 'gyur//skye ba med cing 'gag pa med lnga mang po 'dus sam 'dus pa min
198b7(rgyud): par rab tu byung //'di ni thub pas na mkha'i tshad ma byas la rgyal ba rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis yang //rang rgyal rnams dang nyan thos lha dang lha min klu dang bdag lta bu yi rgyal
199a1(rgyud): smras rnams//ban dang d+hA sgyur rnams da rnam pa'as steng dag tu skyes pa byung snod dang srong rnams//khro bo rnams dang srin po shA si ma smyig rgyan m+b+ha stu hA/
199a2(rgyud): gcig byo ba stong dkyil ba rnams//gang zhig rnam par me tog dang ldan dag na~M bral skyong nyi sa gsu meng pa nyid//rnam pa rnams cad rdul phran gyis stong na
199a3(rgyud): dal myong son pa'om N+Di lem+b+ha sgyu ma bzhin//gang zhig thams cad mi khyen pa gzigs pa dri ma gsum bral rnam par mi rtog de ma yin//glang gis de rtogs sems ma
199a4(rgyud): dri med drim ldan pa mkhyen pa nyid ni sangs rgyas te//gang zhig sbyin pa la sogs la m+bu dang dge bcu lam dang byang chub chos sogs chos rnams dang //byams pa
199a5(rgyud): la sogs gnas dang rang bzhin bral bstod pa la sogs rnam par thor pa dang //tshul khrims lnga sogs phung po gong zhig yul dang bral ba'i rnam pa kun tu mi rtog pa
199a6(rgyud): de rnams byed pa gang zhig stobs bcu'i stobs lhan+da nyan thos rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' min//glang zhig gzugs sogs khams drug dang ni yul drug kyang
199a7(rgyud): rdul phran phung po'i rnam 'gyuraro//phyi ro la sngon po'i gzugs la sogs pa'i yul can rang lus sa dang dri la sogs pa drug/spyod pa snang dang mun pas gsum gan
199b1(rgyud): rnam kun nas rnam par mi rtog pa//snang bas rab tu sad pa rab rid rnam par bral ba 'gro drug granas pa'i srog chags min//'phags pa'i yul gyi rgyal po bde gshegs
199b2(rgyud): dam tshig ce nA la sangs rgyas las ston mdzad pa baM//klu sgrub rdo rje can kyang sred pa grasum gyi bla mas chos kyi dbyingasu lung bstan cing //nyams pa rnams kyi gos sngon n+dan la
199b3(rgyud): shi yi dam tshig can gyi ston pa byang chub rdo rje ste//ye shes mtha' can nag po'i ming can gzhan yang ma d+hu ma ti srin po'i dbang po 'byung //ye shes ming can rdo rje dril bu//
199b4(rgyud): lag rngub dag kyang de bzhin thod par chang 'thung zhing //kha T+wAM gA dang rus pa'i rgyan chu chang smad cung te'u ste ri ba nag po'i ming ca no//slob ma rnams la gos sngon dang nI kun/
199b5(rgyud): tu rgyu ba ster ba na bza' sngon po can//sha ya dmA tshig can gyi thod pa can la rdo rje'i phyag rgya ster ba byang chub rdo rje'o//gos sngon can ni rta mchog bdag po dpa ldan ha la sogs
199b6(rgyud): pa'i ming tsar gyis bsnun 'gyur//ye shes rdo rje'i skyon gyis slob dpon rab tu 'khrugs pas mi gnyis sa la ltung bar 'gyur//rab tu khros pa'i kha can thod pa can gyi pho nya
199b7(rgyud): gzhon nus nag po'i khrag 'thung byed//sha yi dam tshig can gyi spyod pa 'gal ba de dag sangs rgyas pa rnams spong mi 'gyur//mchog gi thugs rje can gyi 'jigs
200a1(rgyud): khyed kyis bstan thod pa can gyis rgyal po la 'doms//glang gi mying gis rnam rnyog yid kyis thugs rje min zhing sems can phung po byams pa min//
200a2(rgyud): de rnams bzang po'i thabs ni sna tshogs shA yi khA zas gzhan b+hi nor 'phrog 'dod pa ni//ldog par g.yem pa dge ba rnam par bral bas skye ba 'dri nyid la ni 'gru
200a3(rgyud): par 'gyur//skyes bus mab+h+yo ris gnyis skyes 'jigs byed la sogs phyugs kyi she yis mchod pa'i mchod sbyin gyis//de thos sangs rgyas lam ni sad+d+hi 'phrog
200a4(rgyud): khyed kyis bshAng tshangs pa'i chos ni rnam par spangs// bo'i dbang po srin po'i dbang po gnyis skyes phyugs kyi shwa yis rgyal pos mchod par 'gyur//gang
200a5(rgyud): yang rung ba blo gros dman pa dge ba rnam+bu bral de ni bdud kyis bslus par 'gyur//khro bo'i dbang pau srin po'i sha yi dam tshig can gyi rgyal pos mchod par
200a6(rgyud): 'byun/mtho ris dbang phyug 'dod phyir gnyis skyes phyogs kyi shi dang khyag po sa bgos pa'i mgo bo yi//nges par mnar med dmyal bar rtog tu'ang sdug bsngal
200a7(rgyud): dmyal ba pa la ster bar 'gro bar 'gyur//dang las bskal pa'i rgyal po stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug rnams kyis nges par 'thon par 'gyur//bdud kyis sha yi dam tshig can
200b1(rgyud): pI dgas mkha' 'gro rnams la sgyum byed par 'gyur//sems can dbu phyir 'jig/dun 'ji bsdu pa min par bdag/nyid gzugs ni ston par byed//lha rnams sha yis rngam
200b2(rgyud): tshig can gyi lha ma yin rnams za rnyed par bye phyir skye ba byed//sems can rnams ni bsgred phyir kha cig du yang bdag nyid gzugs ni 'jig byeng ston par byed//long ba grag phyir
200b3(rgyud): 'jig pa'i dus kyi me lnga'i 'jig byed du seni mo lha rab tu byung bde byed kyis bsang lha ma yin te khrag kyang srin po rnams kyis 'thungs par gyur//nye dang ruso sbal phag rgod me yau seng ge
200b4(rgyud): lha ma yin rnams brlag phyir khyab 'jug skyes//nya dang de bzhin ro dgas la sogra 'o ma nags tshal dgon par khyab 'jug gse mi bze'//sa gsum bla mas yi dgas mkha' 'gro
200b5(rgyud): rnams ni smin phyir he ru ka yi ga zugasuM byas//mtshan po rgyu ba'i bdug bros ra ma nr-i yi chung mar brogu phyir gnus 'jog gzugasasu byas//'jigs sde meng pas skyabs seng bu rnams she/
200b6(rgyud): yI dam tshig can gyis bram ze'i gzugs kyis bcings//kir mi ri yis sha yi chang du sum nu'i stobangs dran po'i rigs kyi chos byed cing //lha dang klu yIng bang po rnams kyi de ma
200b7(rgyud): 'dir ni rgyal po chen po rig par byos//lha bshos 'bras chan bur ba zho dang 'o mo mar dang bces pa'o thug sha khar rnamaso//khro bo rnams dang srin po rnams la phyugs
201a1(rgyud): sha yi gtor ma 'bras chan khrag dang chang //sangs rgyas rnams la snying po lha dang bu ramya zhor bcas 'bras chan lhung bzed dka' thub la//khrus bcas sbrang rtsi
201a2(rgyud): mar sar za zhing tsan dan me tog dag gis mgon por bcas pa mchod //gang gis chung sogs mchod pa de dag lha dang 'jigs byed dam ni he ru ka la min//srin po'i dbang po
201a3(rgyud): mtshan mo rgyu ba'i dam tshig dpal ldan rgyal po zla ba seng ges spyad//mdung can ma dang dr-i pa ti dang 'di dag rigs skyes bud med min tre khyo mo lnga//gzhan yang thod pa can gyi chang
201a4(rgyud): slong nang gi chu yi gtsang sbra an+ta la sogs yul//sin d+hA'i yul na ba glang sha Ta kha ba chen skyes rgyal po'i mi rnams chang 'thung zhing //gA re sogs nA ma he d+hu sha ma khu bar
201a5(rgyud): mi se ren rta glang sha/do dzid steg dang mi sha zal po kAr yul na bong bu rnga mo khyi yI sha/bram ze la sogs rnams kyis sha mi bza' ba yul 'khor chen po kad+b+ha ra yi yul//
201a6(rgyud): b+hin dang mtshon gyi dus su dmangs rigs la sogs khyim du chung 'thung bkag lo rigs skyes 'thung //bud med rnams kyi dbang po skyes pas mo rtags 'jib par byed cing
201a7(rgyud): gnyis skyes kyis bshad pa'i//khrus dang gtsang sgo mo byed 'dir ni chags pa spyod pa'i po ra'i yul la sogs pa rnams//pha dag shi na ma dag bu yi chung mar bag ma
201b1(rgyud): lon+do ba nges par go kha'i yul//rug mar spun zla'i tshwa mo rin la mkhar yang ni spun zla'i bu myo rang gi bus//sor me dang tsam pa ka logs par cha mo'i bu mo dang ni tsha mo'ang yin//spun
201b2(rgyud): zla'i bu mo chung mar len pa'i yul 'khor pon po kan+na tA la sogs par ro//ma yi tshi mo chung mar len la mA la yang ste khol mo len pa ra ra'i yul//bong na khrus dang gtsang sbra med
201b3(rgyud): le ba ru lan tA re go stan rigs ngan yul//skyes pa'i bka' yis gdengs can dbang po nyin dang mtshan gyi dusu chu yi tshwar 'bebs byed//gal te yul chos spyod pas grub par
201b4(rgyud): gyur nad tshe rig byed ngag dag bden pa min//sh+lo yi dam tshig can gyi sha za'i yul can phru gu sha dag spong bar 'gyur ba yin//grang zhig reg byed byed pa drang srong mchog gi bkan
201b5(rgyud): thub can gyi rig byed ngag de gnyis//mtho ris don du mi dang ba glang gsod cing b+ha gar bkrugs pa'i zhi ba'i btung //zhi ba'i rig byed ngag de dag gis sems can sun
201b6(rgyud): 'byin pa la rab tu mAkhas pa rnams//ba glang lpags pa'i zhi ba'i btung ba b+ha gA mchog bkrugs rta yi pho rtags bcad pa la//khu ba khrag gis rnam par bgos pu sbrang dang
201b7(rgyud): mar du bcas pa lci yis ldag par byed//de lta'i sha za'i spyod pas gal te mchod sbyin rig byed dag gis gnyis skyes rnams kyis grub//nges pa dang ldan zhi ba'i sems
202a1(rgyud): dang snying rje ldan pa'i daN+Di mtho rnyis rnam par nyams//phra la sogs pa'i don du 'tshe ba byed cing khyim pa mchod sbyin dus su phyugs dag gsod//dka' thub rnams/
202a2(rgyud): ni'atshe ba spong zhing dka' thub nges par gdung zhing gong ma goms sogs yod//daN+Di dka'i thub rnams kyis mtho ris mchod sbyin 'gogs par 'gyur te de yang gang gi phyir/
202a3(rgyud): shes pas grol bas de phyir sna tshogs phyugs dag gsod pa gnyis skyes rnams ni ngu 'bod 'gro//lha la sogs pa mchod pa nyid pas gal te sha zos pa la nyes pa mau s+yA
202a4(rgyud): na/bcu gnyis pa dang nya dang bcu bzhi klu yi tshe sna dang nyi ma 'phro ba'i dus dag tu//khyab 'jug lha sngogs mchod phyir 'di rnams nyi ma bram ze rnams kyis ci phyir sha mi
202a5(rgyud): bzal phal gan su sha dang rnam par bral bu'i chang bu ci phyir sbyar byed mkhas pa rnams//'tsho ba'i pha dang ma dag gang zhig shi bar gyur na sngon gyi rigs brgyud rnam
202a6(rgyud): par sbyangs//bsod nams sdigs pa'i mthu yis mtho ris don song dog tu rab tu skye la lus bsregs nas//gnas dang glan su rus pa'i dum bu 'jog cing chung bu dag
202a7(rgyud): kyang ster byed su zhig ni//ma ya ni su zhig pa yin de ni lus dang bral nas gang zhig skye gnas gzhan bzhugs pa//bram ze la sogs mchod pas gal te de yi pha ma
202b1(rgyud): mchod par rig byed las grub na//bram ze la sogasu mazhu ba yis de tshe shi ba la yang ma lus gnod par 'gyur//gang gi pha dag dag dang mI dge'i dbang gis yi dwags skyes nus
202b2(rgyud): drad pa'i kha zas slong //nges pa'i bu yis rab tu byin pa'i chung bu len par 'gyur la chu yang len par byed//tshangs pa la sogs gtso bo nyi ma lha mchog bdag po nyi ma de ni
202b3(rgyud): yis bza'//sems can rnams la sdug bsngal steng 'chi ba'i 'jigs skying lha rnams ci yis zhi bar 'gyur//zla ba lha min dbang po'i gtso bo sems can dang bcas gtso
202b4(rgyud): bo ci zhig zla ba bza' de ni//sems can rnams la bde ba ster zhing mchog tu 'jigs 'joms ci yis lha ma yin rnams skrag/gang zhig mtho ris lha rnams mi dang phyugs
202b5(rgyud): kyi shwa yis bram ze rnams kyi mchod bya ba//gang zhig yi dgas sa yi khor yug gtogs par yod pa de rnams gnyis skyes spyong yul min//sA la sogs pa lha yi de
202b6(rgyud): nyid nye bar zhig par gyur pa dbang po'i spyod yul min//tshangs gzugs sna tshogs na mkha' tsam yang seng ge dbang sgrog gtso bo tshangs pa de nyid te//yi dag sA la som/
202b7(rgyud): rlung gi lus po rang bzhin yon tan dbang las rags pa'i kha dog dan na//si dang chu dang me yi lus can sa dang bar sna de dag tu kha dog rags sogs ldan//rlung gi reg
203a1(rgyud): bya'i lus can sa dang chu dang mo rnams mig gis bzung bya'i kha dog gzugs//dri ni sna yis bzung bya 'dir ni lce yis ro myang dag pa'i rna bas sgra rnams so//
203a2(rgyud): rig byed tshig las gal te rlung gi gzugs ma grub cing rig byed rtog go'i tshad ma yis//gzugs med de yis sa dang bar snang dag tu de tshe 'byung ba'i tsho gas rnams bskyod pa
203a3(rgyud): min/mo bsham bu dang mtshungs pa na mkha' tsam ldan mkha'i rgyu tsam yon tan med pa gang //gzhan dag gzugs can bzhi ste sa dang chu dang byin za rlung rnams ro yi dbang po
203a4(rgyud): gnyis/bram ze sogs kyis mthong 'gyur khyim ni mun pa can du mtshan ma mar me med na yang //bye ba la sogs phyogs dang mtsham su son pa'i gzugs kyi dngos po ma lus
203a5(rgyud): snang bar 'gyur//srin po dang ni yi dgas la sogs tshogs pa mtshan mo'i dus lha rnams ma lus kyang //bram ze la sogs rnams kyis de ni mthong zhing nyi ma shar na skar ma/
203a6(rgyud): mi lus kyang //bya rog srin bya lce spyang khyi rnams ma lus 'byung dang 'byung gyur byung ba ma lus ston//de bzhin lhag pa'i chang bus sgrub pa'i thob brang dag gis skyes bu rnams la
203a7(rgyud): yang //byol song rnams ni gang du ring gi sems la bab pa'i sa phyogs der ni gnas 'cha'i la//de dag shes pa bram ze rnam sa la srid pa gang las mig gis bzung
203b1(rgyud): bya'i rgyu gzhan min//lha mo gzhon nu ma la zhugs na byung dang 'byung 'gyur 'byung ba ma lus ston par byed//bram ze shI nas yi dgas gyur pas rmongs pa'i lus la zhugs nas rig byed 'dod/
203b2(rgyud): par byed//sbyin bdag srin por gyur na khyim du bong ba so pag rus pa'i dum bu 'phen par byed//blo dang ldan pa'i spyod pa can rnams nye bar nyams par 'gyur ba'i yi dgas spyod pa
203b3(rgyud): ltos//mun pa gsal ba min par gyur la mun las khA ta de yi bshang ba lAs byung ba//mya ngan med skyes khyab 'jog 'phrog byed skyed byed des na mes po khA ta mchod par 'oso//
203b4(rgyud): glang rgyab dang ra yi kha dang gnyis skyes bong bu'i rkang pa bud med b+ha gar phyag byed cing //khams rnams gtong la gnyis pa mar dang sbrang rtsir bcas pa ldag pa gang zhig bram ze rnams//sgra
203b5(rgyud): med yi ge med las na mkhar 'gyur te nA mkha' rlung gri rten du gyur pa los//rlung las me la mI las chu yin chu las sa ste sa las 'bras bu'i kha zas rnams//zas dang chu drug zos dang //
203b6(rgyud): 'thungs las rdul phran yon tan rang bzhin g.yo ba'i lus 'di dag/bsod nams sdig pa'i mthu yis bde 'gro rnams dang ngan 'gro'i srog chags phung po rab tu 'byung //mo bshan du
203b7(rgyud): yi thu bo mchog las mchog gyur mchog gang rdul phran 'bum gyi cha ltar phra//nam mkha' las ni mchog gi bdag nyid yul dang bral zhing yon tan med pa na mkha'i rtags//rtags
204a1(rgyud): gnas ni sa dang chu dang mo dang rlung dang na mkha'i dngos pod+mo rnam so//gang yang 'di dag kun nas thim zhing na mkha'i sa stengs rtag tu zhing bya'i grub mthar ldan//
204a2(rgyud): gang zhig de yis nus pa b+ha ga zhes bya rnams gsum lam ldan srur mo 'jigs byed ma//de ni nam mkha' las 'das na mkha'i dbang phyug mchog gi mchog gyur rtsa bcings
204a3(rgyud): 'khyil pa can//na mkha'i mtha' can thig le'i phreng ba mgo nas bA shang lam bar du ba thag dang mtshungs ma//'chu 'phyang skur ma'i mig ca n+da gnas dang 'jigs pa skyed byed za byed
204a4(rgyud): rnams kyi za byed ma//gsal dang mi gsal cig ma rigs las rigs min gzhan yang gcig tu mkha' spyod 'khor lo ma//rig ma'i 'khor lo'i dbang phyug rigs dang
204a5(rgyud): rigs min gyur pa'i thar pa ster ba'i dbang gis 'byigs//mi gsal bya rog rwa yi gzhu lnga 'dir ni rang gi yon tan ru sbal spu yis byas//na mkha'i me tig lcags mda'i
204a6(rgyud): mda' gzhus gang dag 'bigs pa des ni rgyal po dbang bskur 'gyur//gal te skye dang 'jig pa'i rgyu ru sgyu ma chen mo byid ngam he ru kar 'gyur na//sangs rgyas pa dang mu stag+sas
204a7(rgyud): pa dag khyab 'jug gam ni rtag pa'i sgyu ma ji ltar min//'di na thub pa'i tshig las srog chags srog ni rdul phra ni byed dam byed 'jug pa meng //sems can rnams kyi bsod nams
204b1(rgyud): sdig las bde dang sdug bsngal rang bzhin 'bras bu 'byin par 'gyur//gang zhig srin po yi dgas mkha' 'gro bdud kyi rigs kyi sha yi ngam tshig can gyis bsgrubs//grub
204b2(rgyud): pa'i tshig gis skye bo gzhan rnams kyis yid rnaMs nges par 'bebs par byed pa ste/stag la sogs pa 'ges la chu la me 'bar glang chen rengs byed mtshon cha sog sa kyis ma ni//
204b3(rgyud): sngags kyis the brang la sogs rnams kyisra sa yi 'khor yug rtogs par rje bo'i bye ba byed//byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten dbang phyug lha min lha klu rnams ni sangs rgyas
204b4(rgyud): pas bsgrubs nas//gang gis grub pa'i ngag gis de rnams sa yI steng du 'dod pa'i dngos grub skye bro rnams la ster//skal ba ngan dang nad kyis sdug bsngal 'chi ba'i 'jigs
204b5(rgyud): pa byed pa thams cad 'joms par byed//seng ge la sogs 'jigs pa rab tu dang ba'i yid kyis zhi ba la sogs byed par 'gyur//byang chub ngon du gcig tu sbyin pa
204b6(rgyud): la sogs lam ni dge bcu ldan la so gzhan ma gsungs//dbu ma'i dga' ba gcig pu b+ha gar bkrugs pa dang ldan 'grub 'gyur lam gzhan gyis ma yin//badra
204b7(rgyud): gshegs dam tshig can gyi rdzogs pa'i byang chub rdo rje'i sa gzhi byang chub shing las gzhan du min//sha yi dme tshig can gyi grub pa yi dgas sa gzhir shing cig
205a1(rgyud): las ni gzhan du min//bde gshegs dam tshig can gyis byang chub lha las gshegs nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba 'jug/sha yi dam tshig can gyis
205a2(rgyud): grub pa'i yi dgas 'jug pras phran tshegs lus la rab tu 'jug/sangs rgyas g+has 'jug pa na bA gshegs dam tshig can la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar ston//grub
205a3(rgyud): bapa'i yi dgas 'jug pa sha yI dam tshig can gyi ma mo'i 'khor lo la ston byed//sangs rgyas rnams kyi stobs bcu bskyed par mdzad pa bya rgod phung po las gzhan ri la
205a4(rgyud): min/grub pa rnams kyis ri dgas rigs bskyed ston pa 'jigs byed ri las ri gzhan la ma yin//dang ldan 'bras pung chos kyi dbyingasu stobs bcu'i stobs mnga'
205a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas pa yi rgyud rnams bstan//gang zhig drag po dur khrod dag tu phyugs kyi skye bo stobs can thod pa can rgyud ston//rgyal po'i rgyal sring lha khang sa stengs las ni
205a6(rgyud): 'byung ba de rjes lci yi rgyal srid do//gsal bar mgon po'i 'khor lo legs por bzhag par gyur pas thar pa rab tu 'byung ba ru 'gyur//rgyal po srog gcod pa
205a7(rgyud): las dmyal bar 'jug par 'gyur gyi gzhan du sangs rgyas bka' ma yin//rgyal po bram ze la sogs gsod pas mtho ris 'jug gi gzhan du grub pa'i tshig ma yin//
205b1(rgyud): shA yo kha zas longs spyod byed pas slar yang srid pa gzhan du lha mr-in rigasu skyes//sha yi khyAdzas ljongs spyod byed pas sbyar yang sdig gzhan lha yi rig su 'dri skye'o//
205b2(rgyud): mgo zlum dang ni yugs sa mngon spyod byed pas slar yang bong bu nyid du rab tu 'gro//mgo zlum dang ni yugs so mngon spyod byed pas slar yang skyid gzhan 'jigs byed/
205b3(rgyud): nyid du 'gro//sems can phan pa byas pas bsod nams nyid la gnod pas sdig par blade bar gshegs pas gsungs//sems can gnod pa byas pas bsod
205b4(rgyud): nams nyid la phan pas sdig pAr na mkha' tsam pos ston//sangs rgyas rnams dang 'jig byed skyes pa bud med gradengs can rnams kyis bstan pa lho rten gang //
205b5(rgyud): g.yul du zhugs pa'i stag gzig rnams kyi rta yi tshogs kyis de rnams ma lus 'jig par byed//de rnams rigs bzhi gzhan gyi nor mi len+da cing bden par sku
205b6(rgyud): dang gtsang sbra rab tu 'jug//gzhon nu gzhan gyi chung ma spong zhing dka' thub nges pa dang ldan rang gi chung ma bsten//khrus byas gang zhig 'dod pa'i sgra gcan mtshan
205b7(rgyud): mo so so'i dus su nyin gung phyed yol dang //srong dang thun gsum dag dang nyi ma ri la sha rare bar gyur nas ldan lngar phyag byed cing //sa steng lha yul dag tu stag
206a1(rgyud): gzog mu stegs dag lA mun n+dan dbang pos gcig tu skyob//drag po'i grwa yul dor pa ltar skyob par byed cing bu dang bran bzhin 'gyur la rgyal ba ni//rgyal ba//
206a2(rgyud): thab mo yin pas gnyis skyes phyugs kyi sh+ya yis 'jigs byed la sogs mchod na su//sna tshogs sems can gnod po byed cing gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa yis gdung po rgyud
206a3(rgyud): 'chang par 'byung //grub pa bye DI dbang po sbyin pa mi phyugs zhabs dang dum bu zhes bya thod pa can//dge slong klu sgrub zhes bya yon tan ma lus 'byung khungs sems can
206a4(rgyud): kun la phan 'dogs pa//slob dpon 'od brtan zhes bya gcod byed chu yis grub pa stong phrag bcu drang bcas pa rnams//gzhan yang de ltar rab tu grags kyang kye mra de
206a5(rgyud): lha dam par gyur pa rmongs pa yod//dge bcu lam gyis grub par gyur pa 'phags pa'i lha dang la ba'i na bza' rta dbyangs dang //phyogs kyi glang po gzhan la phan pa'i
206a6(rgyud): bsam pa btsun pa pad+ma'i myu gu zhes//bang go sa la rtog pa'i rgyal po ma lus nag po rgyal po in+d+ra bo d+he dang //de bzhin gzhan dang de rnams mthong yang mi bdag 'jigs
206a7(rgyud): byed 'phrog byeng sogs kyis byin gyis brlabs//sa dang chu dang byin za rlung dang na mkha' tsam gdong lnga pa la yang yan lag drug/de yi dbyangs yig ring dang bung bas
206b1(rgyud): dublashAn ma byungs yon tun spyongs nan//nya ma dang ngan+ya snang dus can nyi stsa lad par 'a rlung dro na dus d+h+ya myu //sa ga zhi stong du mtsho dun 'dor ni g.yul dang /
206b2(rgyud): kA shri dang ni mr-id+h+wi ga so 'jig par 'gyur//drung dang rnyi ba lnga rna ring bzhin leni te na mchu pa blangs yig yain+na tA ni la sogs min//oM sogs mya ni pyi sa yig nga
206b3(rgyud): bcu mnga' byas gsung ste nyi ma 'thub mo zang phyir ro//ring dang thung ba mtshungs pa gang du a ko ki ni rlung po phyugs dag tshig las 'gyur//de phyir mA ning yod la oM ka ya na tsam
206b4(rgyud): nga ba'i phyogs nas nges par bstod//thog ma'i le nas rnam par mkhye' dang gzhan yang na badzin+da tsa ni yi dbang phyug 'byung //de yi bkA ye swA yi dgus dbang bsgyur
206b5(rgyud): lA k+Sha sogs grog sa ldan+da sgur mor byin rlabs pa//phyi nas sa stengs son de'i gnas dang zhing gi lha gang dag cu rtsi brgyang ga klo yi//mgon po ma dA mya ti bu dang nu ma ci
206b6(rgyud): rgyu skyes pa rnams rjes 'jigs par byed//der ni'i ni brgyad mi la~M bar+g+ga yis brgya pa 'i rgyu bas mkha'i sa 'ogs bu'i yul//k+ko rnams kyi wA da munanan
206b7(rgyud): mau rtogs pa gang deng gis brlag par bya//sangs rgyas chos dang dag 'dun rnams la skye sa gsuM ma tshigs skye dbun med ni de de'i dag nas//bang la bkong de ki la pa nga
207a1(rgyud): wAg+hA nas dpa' ldan mchog tu nyim 'gro ba da//namadu' mnga' dU rasna dang dbang ba mig seng+yas ng+yas son pa lnga mdzad//skur yang skyo bo rnams na smra/
207a2(rgyud): klor 'jug ste ji srid bco brgyad lo la bsgyur ba'i bar//yang nas yang du ngu yis rtsod pa'i dus der byung nas de rnams gzhig par bya ba nyid//ji srid sa dang chu dang mi rlung nam
207a3(rgyud): yon tan na mkha' nyi zla skar ma rnams//phyogs skyong phyogs kyi gdon dang phyogs lhu na mkha' sa gzhir yi dgas bram ze ba glang sogs//sa 'og klu dang lha mi rnams nas
207a4(rgyud): yi bdag pos zhi ba'i don du 'di rnams mchod//don kun grub phyir rtag tu rgyal po mi dang bcas pas sangs rgyas pa dang rgyal ba rnams//sa dang chu dang mi dang rlung dang stong pa nye
207a5(rgyud): mAmar bcas pa mchod rdzasA rnams kyis mchod//slob dpon mchog la gzhol bas srung ba lnga po rab tu dri zhim me tog rnams kyis mchod//sngon du khrus byas gos sngon snga
207a6(rgyud): dro gso sbyong blangs pas nyin dang mtshan du nges par gdon//klog mkhan bzhi dang lnga pa gang zhig zhi bar byed pas nyin dang mtshan du bya bar 'gyur//slar yang de la bsrung ba
207a7(rgyud): bya zhing nyi ma bcu ru zhi dang rgyas pa dag kyang bya//zho dang 'bras chan nyi mar rta dang glang po'i gtor ma 'bros chan 'o ma zla ba la//'bras chan la sogs mig dmar gza'
207b1(rgyud): lA me tog bcud dang bcas pa'i 'bras chan gza' lag la//'bras chan sor pa bu ram stsogs kyi gtor ma l+yA oM gtor ma ny+dza yi bla ma'o thug sho khar gyis//pa ba sangs la ldan
207b2(rgyud): dron mar nag ban+de pu spen pa'i nyi ma bdun par de ston la//nyi ma slar yang phyog su glang po rnams kyi gtor ma byi zhing khur ba'abras chen gyis//gling po rta mchog rnams kyis zhi dang /
207b3(rgyud): rgyus p+ta'i ngan du sbyin sreg nyi ma la sogs gzer//'bru dang mer ser 'o mdur ba mda'i yi yam shing brgyu dang 'i ma'i mched yin gtung //sbyin sreg r+b+hesi la drang phor gi
207b4(rgyud): ba'i zhi ba'i chu yis r+N+Na dang glang po khrus bya'o//yi dgas la sogs gtor mye sran chen sha drang chang rnams nyin mtshan dus su sbyin par 'gyur//srin pa la sogs yung

208a3(rgyud): gang zhig snying po yang ni de bzhi ni gnyis pa gsum pa re de//de ltar pad+ma gnyis la gyur te nye ba'i snying po chu skyes 'dab ma rnam gnyis der//klu rnams zung gi bar du
208a4(rgyud): phyogs dang mtshams kyi 'dab mar de bzhin lha dang lha min dang //gnod sbyin rnams dang gza' dang ma lus 'jigs pa 'joms pa'i ma mo rdo rje mkha' 'gro rnams//

212b1(rgyud): ba'i dbang du rab tu 'gyur ba'o//mtha' dag rgyal ba'i rigs kyis yar log kha rnams sbyang bar bya ste shes rab ye shes dbang sbyin bya//rgyal ba dbang por byas te slob ma'i don du phyag rgya sbyin
