214b6(rgyud): 'gyur ba'o//ji srid nges par rang gi lus la 'od zer 'khor los yongasu 'khor bar byed pa mthong ba'i bar//chags dang chags bral mtha' dang dang por song ba'i skad cig ma
214b7(rgyud): nas khyab bdag dbugs kyi grangs 'phe lo//mtha' dang 'bar ba'i dbus kyang khyad por dang ni lhan cig skyes dang ye shes dang ni rnam shes dang //gnyid dang brgyal ba'i dbus
215a1(rgyud): su gnas pa'i rdo rje pad+ma dag gis gnyis sbyor bde ba gang yin pa//de yis 'phel byar rab tu bya ba bla mA'i nges pa'i stobs kyis 'di nyid 'phel par the tshom med//
215a2(rgyud): bdud dang nyon mangs 'joms shing rgyal ba'i bdag po laM gnas rnal 'byor pa yis lo gcig sbyor ba yis//sa yi rnam par snang yang sra ba min drang chu yi gzug su snang yang
215a3(rgyud): chu mi ni ga sher ba med pa'i phyir//me yi rnam par snang yang me ma ni rlung gi gzugasu snang yang g.yo ba med pas rlung ma yin//stong pa'i rnam pa yin yang mthong ste dkar dang
215a4(rgyud): sngo ba la sogs mthong yang sna tshogs kha dog min//rnam pa kun ldan yin yang mi mthing rang sems dri ma nyon mongs dang ni bdud kyi mthu stobs kyis//sgra tsam thigi le cha dang //
215a5(rgyud): ye shes rnams ni bdud rtsi gan su 'gro dang lcags sgrog bcings pa'i rtsa//srog dang thur sel lam gsum rnams nas rdo rje pad+mar bcas dang pad+ma rdo rje ldan pa yis//dbus
215a6(rgyud): su rlung dag 'gro dang 'jug pa yang dge 'dus pa yul can med par 'gyur ba dang //du ba la sogs mtshan ma rnams ni gang zhig gzungs drang 'di rnams 'dzin pa thams cad
215a7(rgyud): gsang ba chen po'o//dbus su srog gzhug/pa na nyi ma dang bcas zla bar gyur pa g.yas dang g.yon pa bcing ba dang //phyag rgya dang ni sbyor ba'i sems kyis mchog tu
215b1(rgyud): bde gyur pa dang rdo rje yang dwag sad pa dang //badre ba dam pa'i don du pad+mar rdo rje bskyod dam rang bri ldag pa'i pad+mas gsor ba yis//sa bon ma btang bde ba de ni 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa
215b2(rgyud): 'joms pa deng ldan bla ma'i zhal nyid do//sa ni tshul 'jug 'gyur chu yang me la de bzhin me ni rlung la 'jug par 'gyur ba'o//rlung ni stong pa la ste stong pa mtshan ma rnam pa
215b3(rgyud): bcur 'gyur mtshan ma rnam pa kun ldan du//rnam pa kun ldan ma 'gyur bde ba dam pa gzhom du med pa ye shes sku ru 'gyur ba'o//mi yi bdag po ye shes las ni rdzu 'phrul
215b4(rgyud): dngos grub 'gyuraro skyes bu rnams kyi skye ba 'dir//'dod pas sbrul po'i sku re nges par 'gyur te gang ba rdzogs pa gsung de rab tu 'gyur ba'o//'bar ba sprul pa'i thugs twa in+d+ra
215b5(rgyud): las ni mchog tu bde bad mdzad pa'i ye shes zhesu brjod//dga'i ba longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ste mchog dga' khyad par dga' dang bcas pa dag gi ri ma pa yis//gsu
215b6(rgyud): dang thugs te lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba sogs las ye shes rdo rje lA so smos 'byung bar byed//g.yo ba nges par chos kyi sku ste srid gsum phyag byas pa dang 'byung bar 'gyur ba/
215b7(rgyud): de yi gsung //gnyid ni nges par chos kyi thugs te tur+ya de yi ye shes nyid yin srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms//yi ge nges par dag pa'i sku ste dbyangs dang bral ba'i cha dang thig
216a1(rgyud): DA sman rim pa yis//gzung dang thugs dang yo shos rdo rje srid pa rnams gsum la gnas dag pa'i myur spyod par byed//mdu dang rmilam rang bzhin /
216a2(rgyud): dang gzhan yang de bzhin gnyid ldog pa dang tu r+ya'i rang bzhin rnams//lus gnas pa dang dbugs nyid thim pa rnam par rgyu dang yul las bskyod pa med pa'i sems thim pa/
216a3(rgyud): ye shes gnas kyang bud med dang ni rab 'dus pa las byang chub sems zhu gyur pa'i spyad cig ni//sprul pa lnga sogs rim pas thugs kyi rdo rje rnam pa bzhi ru nges par rab tu
216a4(rgyud): 'gyur ba yi//de ltar sems ni rnam pa bzhi rnams srid pa rnam gsum gyur pa'i srog chags rnam sa kyi thig le'i dbus//khyab byed bde mnyam 'bras ster thar pa'i rgyu ru
216a5(rgyud): rnal 'byor dbang po rnams kyis bsrung bar bya ba ni//rnal 'byor rnams la mchog gi bde ba bskyed par sa bon thig le btang na thar par ga la 'gyur//de phyir 'khor ba'i bde
216a6(rgyud): bskad cig ma 'di brtul zhugs can rnams kyis ni rgyun du spang bar bya//dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i tshogasu bcad pa sum cu lhag pa'i stong phrag gcig pa las mdor bsdus
216a7(rgyud): pa dbang rab tu byed pa rdzogs s+ho////rgya gar gyi bIN+Ta Di ta mkhas pa chen pos man ta shrI dang /lo tsha ba dge slong chos rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la
216b1(rgyud): phab pa'o////rgya gar skad du/shrI sArba bud+d+ha sa ma yo gA na ki nI dza la so ba da nA ma ut+ta ra tan+t+ra/bod skad du/dpal sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par spyod
216b2(rgyud): mkha' 'gro rgyu ma bde ba'i mtshig ces bya ba'i rgyud phyi ma//dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo//sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos//rdo rje sems dpa' bde pa'i/
216b3(rgyud): mchog gsang ba mchog gi dbyes pa na//thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs//'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das//gcig pu rab tu tsha ba'i lha//sangs rgyas thams
216b4(rgyud): cang mnyam sbyor ba//mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/chags ming tshogs dang bral ba min//dbu mar yang ni mi dmigasaso//bud med kun gyi sgyu ma'i rgya//'di ni gnyis
216b5(rgyud): med theg pa'i mchog/sgyu ma dge ni thams cad pas//bud med sgyu ma khyad par che//ngo bo nyid kyi mthu dag gis//rang bzhin gyis ni de 'grub pa'i//'jig rten gsum
216b6(rgyud): 'dir bud med 'dis/gus par byed pa dag tu 'gyur//rnyed dang po de dang dga' kun gyis//ngan par spyod pa'ang 'grub par 'gyur//rang gi ngo bo yongs bsgyur na//
216b7(rgyud): bud med kun gyi snrums 'grub//ngo mtshar sgyu ma'i phyag rgya 'di //mkha' 'gro ma zhes brdar bstan to//DA ni na mkha' 'gro ba zhis//khams las mngon du bdags
217a1(rgyud): pa ste/nam d+ha'i kun tu spyod 'grub ba//mkha' 'gro ma zhes rab tu grags//thams cad ma lus phyag rgya yis//thams cad ma lus bde mchog gis//
217a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba//mkho' 'gro ma zhes rab tu grags//de ni na mkha' 'gro ba zhes//sangs rgyas khams las rnam par btags//kun tu 'gro bar grub
217a3(rgyud): pa ni//sangs rgyas kun bdag mkha' 'gro ma'o//shaM zhes bya ba bde bar bshad//sangs rgyas kun gyi bde chen yin//sgyu ma thams cad rab sbyor ba//mchog tu bde bas
217a4(rgyud): bde ba'i mchog/kun tu kun nas thams cad ni//bdag nyid rtag tu rnam pa kun//sangs rgyas la sogs brtan g.yo sa ni//kun gyi dngos por bdag gyur to//sems
217a5(rgyud): dang sems pa'i ting 'dzin dang //drung chub spyong ba sna tshogs nyid//de bzhin bdud drung bdud las rgyal//de ni byang chub sangs rgyas yin//rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin nyid dang //
217a6(rgyud): bzhin pad+mo pad mo 'chang //nor bu nor bu 'dzin nyid dang //de dag gi yang rigs yin no//de nyid 'dod chags 'dod chags bral//'dod pa dang ni grol ba'ang yin//dus
217a7(rgyud): gsum sring gsum mchog gsum dang //'jig rten gsum dang khams gsum dang //rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad pa'i//gnas pa thams cad de nyid do//'gro ba dag ni mi
217b1(rgyud): lus kun//thams cad du ni 'di 'gyur ro//de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchod//chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa//na mkhye' dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i//dngos po thams
217b2(rgyud): cad de yin te//na mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal//rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegaso//sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba//mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog/bskal pa
217b3(rgyud): bye ba grangs med par//sangs rgyas thams cad ma thob pa//phyag rgya'i cho ga gang dag gis//tshe 'di nyid kyis thob 'gyur ba//de ni bdag gi brtag pa'i bya//sangs rgyas kun bdag
217b4(rgyud): bde ba'i mchog/bdag nyid shin tu bsgrubs pa las//sangs rgyas kun bdag bde mchog go//rnal 'byor yang dag ma yin sems//lha la dmigs par byed pa dang /rnal
217b5(rgyud): 'byor gzugs brnyan rang bzhin te//lugs ma la sogs rnal 'byor skye//yang dag mchog sems rnal 'byor pa//lha la dmigs par byed pa dag/rang gi dam tshig bdag
217b6(rgyud): sbyor ba//mi 'gyur dam pa 'grub par 'gyur//gzugs brnyan lugs la sogasra pa la//rnal 'byor skye bor mi 'gyur gyi//byang chub sems la rab brtson na//de las rnam
217b7(rgyud): 'byor ltar 'gyur ro//byang chub sems ni rdo rje ste//sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid yin//de bso thams cad bdag sbyar bso//sangs rgyas thams cad thob par 'gyur//
218a1(rgyud): /dad da pa sa smras rgyun mnA dung//d+ma sa m+bu nga dag yon//de bas 'dun sbyid ltar myongags/dag rlo tu gasgrub ba rgyu/du
218a2(rgyud): rgyus thams na du dang//dpe ba rnams kyang thams cid dang //de 'dzin pa bum cang du//'di nyid la m+b+ha b+hAr gyur//zhes bcom ldan 'das dang
218a3(rgyud): dengasu dbus de sa gaslong //sang+yas rgyas thams cid nyes pa skyed ma pa'i 'gro sam 'di pa'i mchog la Sh+Ta snang bang mi de'i rmyi dun
218a4(rgyud): sa rgyu smigs pas ga//don na su bru nan ldan 'das//de rjesems dpa' de bzhin du shen sa//sang sa rgyas thams cad
218a5(rgyud): smyo nga sgyug //dengs pa //sa u d+g+has hU~M na shA //sbyangs nas rnams ma gyu //la 'byung
218a6(rgyud): 'od lajus dang rnam mi dgas//da 'thub dpa'i 'i rgyu mi dgas//dkar gyi rdzi ma med pa dang //bde ba dang ni dka'abos 'grub//mas ci ster da nga /
218b1(rgyud): kun na de bzhin thams cad stor//sdud ba ji ltar 'dod par byeng //g.yo ba dag kyang ci dag byed//langs pa dang ni drug pa'am//'jug gas ji ltar gnas kyang rung //
218b2(rgyud): dmarab tu sgra yang rung //gang na ji ltar skyed sna //dkyil 'khor du yang ma zhugs pa//rgyu bo kun dang ldan pa 'ang drug//dang gi ltar ni bdag sbyor na//bsod nams chung yad/
218b3(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur//de nyid rnal 'byor 'di yis ni//thams cad sgru par byed pa na//ngan zos ngan spyod thams cad kyis//nyes pa dag tu yong mi 'gyur//bskal pa byi bar mi
218b4(rgyud): 'thob pa//sangs rgyas dam pa thams cad de//phyag rgya'i cho ga dag gis ni//bsgrubs na kun du 'thob 'gyur ba//bdag nyid grub par byed pa'i mchog/'di ni bdag gis brtag
218b5(rgyud): bya bya//sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba//mtho' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/rdo rje sems dper podag sbyor ba//tsha lugs ji bzhin bsgyur ba yis//thams cad sna
218b6(rgyud): cho gas phyag rgya'i bdag/bsod nams chung yang 'grub par 'i gyur//rgyu 'di bsrubs pa tsam gyis ni//sangs rgyas thams cad byin gyis rnyog/shin tu byin gyis brlab
218b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad 'du bar 'gyur//sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor bas//sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par 'gyur//sangs rgyas kun dang mnyi ma pa'i phyir//sangs
219a1(rgyud): rgyas thams cad 'grub par 'gyur//gang gis ldan pa 'di mthong zhing //rnam pa kun tu mchod byed na//de yis sangs rgyas thams cad kyang //mthong zhing //
219a2(rgyud): mchod pa byas par 'gyur//'di dang sangs rgyas thams cad la//mthong ba dang ni reg pa yis//dkyil 'khor dag tu ma zhugs pa'ang //bden pa drag kyang mthong ba
219a3(rgyud): 'gyur//mthong ba dang ni reg pa dang //thos po dang ni dran pa yis//sdig pa kun las rnam grol zhing //sangs rgyas dngos grub thams cad grub//'di dang sangs rgyas
219a4(rgyud): thams cad la//rnal 'byor thams cad mnyam sbyor bas//bud med dag kyang rnam grol zhing //sangs rgyas byang chub rig par 'gyur//kun tu kun nas thams cad ni//
219a5(rgyud): badrag nyid rnam pa thams cad du//sangs rgyas thams cad dngos grub par//de yis bdag nyid mthong bar 'gyur//'di ni bdag nyid kun gnas pas//mchod
219a6(rgyud): pa'i sprin chen thams cad kyis//bkod pa rob 'byam tshogs dgra gis//de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa mdzad//thams cad bdag nyid sbyor mchod dpal//rdo
219a7(rgyud): rje sems dpa' mchog gyur pa//sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin te//bde ba'i mchog ni thob par 'gyur//rnal 'byor kun la nyer sbyor bas//dpal ni bzhir
219b1(rgyud): 'gyur grub par 'gyur//rnal 'byor kun ni bcom ldan 'das//rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs//de yI nye bar sbyor ba ni//khams gsum ma lus thams cad do//rnal/
219b2(rgyud): 'byor ku ni gyi longs spyod kyis//ci ltar bde bar bsten byed cing //rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor gyis//bdag nyid rab tu mchod par bya//rjesu sbyor bas mchod byed cing //
219b3(rgyud): 'byir kun gyi bde ba dog/bdag nyid kun tu myang byed no//shin tu sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyu//sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid kyi//ri so ya na bde ba 'dis//rdo rje sems
219b4(rgyud): dpo'i 'dril tshe dang //yang mi na ming thod mi tshiga'i sgrug//kun tu kun nas thams ca da //sangs rgyas pad mnyes sbyar ba//mkha' 'gro snya ma bde ba'i mchog
219b5(rgyud): rtag tu de ni 'grub par 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas de skad gsungs so///sangs rgyas thams cad dang me nyam par sbyor ba
219b6(rgyud): shrI gas ma ma sa/na b+h+yog pa sa sa don nu l+le na na sa
219b7(rgyud): sems dpa'o de bzhin gshegs//sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba//mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor pa//dpe ldan pa
220a1(rgyud): dam tshig bde//sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i//rnal 'byod dbang phyug bde ba che//rdo rje sems dpar sbyor ba yi//mthu nyid kyis ni thams
220a2(rgyud): cad du//phyag rgya bde ba chen po kun//so so rjesu rang grub 'gyur//rdo rje sems dpa' sbyor ba yi//mthu nyid kyis ni thams cad du//na mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' yas
220a3(rgyud): pa'i//bud med mchog rnams skye bar 'gyur//dwe yi dam tshig de byung ba//sdug bu'i dam tshig bdag rjes 'brang //shin tu sbyor dang sbyor chen po//thams cad/
220a4(rgyud): bdag nyid dam tshig mchog/gcig bzhin du ni gcig spyod pa//lhan cig spyod pas rjes spyod sdug/sangs rgyas thams cad mnya ma sbyor ba//mkha' 'gro rgya
220a5(rgyud): mu mchog tu 'bar//thams cad dga' ba ma lus pa'i//phyag rgya thams cad bde ba che//rtog pa dam pa lha mo yis//rgyal mos mchod pa thams cad mchog
220a6(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' sbyor ba dang //tha ma swa na dra lha mo 'dus pas ni//ma lus skal ba bzang po kun//bde ba so so rje su 'gru ga/phyag rgya 'di yis btab pa las//
220a7(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' che ba'i lha//na mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' blas pa'i//lha mo bde ba chen mo kun//thams cad rnal 'byor bde bas myos//sdig med stobs kyis
220b1(rgyud): de 'bon du//phan tshun du ni rab dga' bas//skyes bu'i tshul gyis dga' bar byed//dbang po kun nus byung ba yi//mchod pa'i sprin chen thams cad kyi//bkod pa rab 'byam
220b2(rgyud): tshogs rnams kyis//thams cad bdag nyid mchong par byed//rnal 'byor bde ba thams cad kyi//dbang bskur bde chen las byung ba//rin chen tshogs rnams thoms
220b3(rgyud): cad kyis//rab tu rmongs pas dbang bskur 'gyur//lha mo kun gyi longs spyong la//ci bde bar ni bsten bya ba//bdag ni che ba'i lhar sbyor bas//bdag la bdag gis
220b4(rgyud): rab tu mchod//rnal 'byor thams cad bde ba yis//rje su sbyor ba mchod byed cing //rtag tu myang bar byed pa na//shin tu sbyor bas rab 'o grub 'gyur//sangs rgyas
220b5(rgyud): thams cad bdag nyid kyi//ra sa ya na bde ba des//rdo rje sems dpa'i dpal tshe dang //lang tsho nad med bde mchog 'grub//sangs rgyas kun gyi sku chen dang //sangs//
220b6(rgyud): rgyu snga kun gyi gsung snyan pa//sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs chen po//sangs rgyas kun gyi mchod pa me sangs rgyas kun gyis rgyal chen po//rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi bdug
220b7(rgyud): 'jig rten dbang phyug kun gyi gtso//rin chen dbang phyug kun gyi bdag/de dag dang ni dga' spyod na//'dod po bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding //lha mo thams cad grub chen po//
221a1(rgyud): 'khor lo sgyur ba rab tu 'grub//chos dbyings mnyam dang mo mnyam pa//na mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas par+ya//dngos grub kun gyi bod mos pasmra//
221a2(rgyud): de las rgyu chen mchog gzhi nA med//sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba//rnal 'byor dbang phyug bde chen des//'di la tshwa 'di nyid kyis ni//rnam pa kun tu mi
221a3(rgyud): 'grub pa'i//dngos grub kun gyis bde mos pa//chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam po//nam la'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i//dbang phyug kun gyi bde mos pa//
221a4(rgyud): dam pa rgya chen gang yang med//sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba//mkha' 'gro rgya ma bde mchog nges//'di la tshe 'di nyid kyis ni//rnam pa kun tu mi 'grub med
221a5(rgyud): ces bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas de skad gsungs so//sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde 'di mchog las/lha mo
221a6(rgyud): thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba bskal pa mchog bzang po dpal rdo rje dam tshig gi rtog pa ste gsum pa'o///'di ni rnal 'byong bcom ldan 'das//rdo rje
221a7(rgyud): sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs//sangs rgyas thams cad mnyame sbyor ba//mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/lha mo kun dang mnyam sbyor ba//skal pa bzang
221b1(rgyud): mchog 'dod pa ste//yang dag sbyor ba'i bde myong ba//'dod chags ther zug brtan pa'o//sangs rgyas kun gyi gzugs che dang //dbyangs dang dri dang ro dag dang /sangs
221b2(rgyud): rgyas kun gyi reg bde mchog/rang gi spyod par de spyod do//sangs rgyas pha rol phyin grub pa/gzungs dang sa rnams de bzhin du//dga' bar spyod na lha dang mi'i//skal bzang //
221b3(rgyud): bud med ci zhig smos//lha yi dngos grub dga' ba dpo/sangs rgyas byang chub bde chen po//skal pa bzang po bde myong pas//so sor rje su rang 'grub 'gyur//dngos grub
221b4(rgyud): thams cad las byung ba/de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi dpa'o//bskal ba bzang po longs spyod kun//rang gis spyad par nga sbyong ngo //rdo rje can gyi grub mchog dang //
221b5(rgyud): 'jig rngan dang po mchog gi dpal//sangs rgyas dga' bas bde dam pa//phrogs nas nye bar spyod par byed//khams gsum dag na ma lus pa'i//sangs rgyas rgyal
221b6(rgyud): srid chen po kun//rtsal gyi stobs kyis ngo 'thon du//phyogs nas nye bar spyod par byed//sangs rgyas kun gyi grub chen po mchog gi dbang phyug dam pa dgra/kun+da nas
221b7(rgyud): phrogs nas de spyod na//longs spyod gzhan lta ci zhigi smos//mthu chen las ni bkra shis brtan//phrogs las grub dang dran las dga'//de 'thon stobs kyis phrogs
222a1(rgyud): nas kyang //de ni dad la sbyin par byed//ma lus 'jig rten gsum rgyal srid//'jig rten dbang phyug kun dang bcas//ngo 'byon stobs kyis phrogs nas kyang //
222a2(rgyud): de ni dad lha sbyin par byed//tshangs pa 'jug sel dbang chen gyi//mchog gi dbang phyug dum pa drag/kun nAs phrogs te myur sbyin na//longs spyod gzhan lta ci zhig smos//
222a3(rgyud): de yis mi sbyin ci rdo srung med//sangs rgyas don du bya ba kun//mi bya ba ni gang yang med//sbyin pa dang ni byed pa'ang yi ni//sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yid//
222a4(rgyud): 'phrogs nus kyang ni sbyin byed na//las mchog dag ni rab 'byam dang //dngos grub gzhan lta ci zhig smos//dngos grub mchog ni gdon ma za//sde rnams thams
222a5(rgyud): cad rab 'joms pa//sangs rgyas kun gyi grub chen po//'khor los bsgyur ba rab grub pa//sangs rgyu sa thams cad mnyam sbyor ba//mkha' 'gro sgyu me bde mchog
222a6(rgyud): gis//sangs rgyas kun gyi rdzu 'phrul tshe//rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu 'o jug/lA lar byang chub sems chen po//la lar spyod pa 'thun par 'gro//la lar dga'
222a7(rgyud): ldan lha dag las//dam pa shin tu 'pho ba'o//la lar skye ba rnam par dag/la lar nges po 'byung bar gsal//la lar byang chub chen por gshigs//la lar
222b1(rgyud): bdud las rab tu rgyal//la lar byang chub mngon 'tshang rgya//lnga lar chos kyi 'khor lo bskor//la lar pha rol mu stegs rnams//chos dang 'thun par tshar gcod do//la
222b2(rgyud): lar 'jig rten gsum rgyal ba//grub pa kun gyi dbang phyug nyid//la lar rtog pa thams cad mchog/grub pa'i dbang phyug bla na med//de la stsogs pa mtha' yas
222b3(rgyud): mchog/sangs rgyas kun bdag bde mchog gis//'dul ba'i thabasu nges pa'i garu//rnam par sprul pa dgyes shing rol//dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog/brtan
222b4(rgyud): pa dbang phyug chen po'i bdag/gzugs dang tshe dang kha dog stobs//dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' bzhin//'gro ba dag gis bsnyen bya zhing //de bzhin gshegs
222b5(rgyud): pa kun gyis mchod//lha mo kun gyi dpal ldan mchog/rdo rje sems dpar rab tu 'grug/sems can khams ni du ma dag/mu lus par ni phyag rgyas 'debs//lha dang/
222b6(rgyud): byang chub dka' ba rnams//brtan par sems can dag la smin//sangs rgyas kun bdag bde mchog gis//sems can kun gyi don byed cing //ma lus lus pa med pa
222b7(rgyud): yi/bskal pa kun tu srid par gnas//zhes bcom lda ni 'das rdo rje sems dpas de skad gsungaso//sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ga/mkha' 'gro sgyu
223a1(rgyud): ma bde ba'i mchog las sna tshogs thams cad kyi skal pa bzang po mchog gi dngos grub ces bya skye//dpal dam tshig gi brtag pa ste bzhi po'o////
223a2(rgyud): 'di ni rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das//rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs//sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba//mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/yang dag
223a3(rgyud): grub pa gcig pu nyid//ci ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sbyar//rtog pa'i cho ga thams cad lo//grub pa dam pa mchogo gi mchog/sna tshogros las kyi sbyor ba yis//cho ga
223a4(rgyud): sna tshogs 'dod pa yi//sems can rnams ni 'dul ba dang //bde ba thams cad 'grub pa'i phyir//bcom ldan rnal 'byor de nyi ni//sangs rgyas thams cad rnal
223a5(rgyud): 'phrul pas//sems can kun don rnams sprul na//myur du shin tu 'grub par 'gyur//nyin re 'am yang ni zla re'am//yang na de bzhin lo re ni//ci bzhin byin gyis/
223a6(rgyud): brlabs nas kyang //sangs rgya sra bde mchog gaur bya'o//khams kyi ngo bo thams cad dang //de bzhin srog dang rtse las 'byung //rang gi lha yi cha lugs su//bsgrub
223a7(rgyud): pa'i phyag rgya ro rab tu bya//dkyil 'khor gang dag mi bsten pa//sna tshogs phyag rgya'i mchod pa yis/slob ma'i tshogs kun de dang der//mchod pa byas nas nges
223b1(rgyud): sgrub po//de las gzhan yang rtog kun gyis//sangs rgyas thams cad rnam sprul pa//ci rigs par na skul byas pa'i//gtam dag rab tu bshad par bya//sems dpa' sangs/
223b2(rgyud): rgyus kun gyi dngos//rdo rje sems dpa'i bde ba'i mchog/gAsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na//thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs//'di ni rnal 'gyur bcom ldan 'das//rtag
223b3(rgyud): po dam pa brtan pa ste//rtag tu dwa ltar 'byung ba bzhin//ngo bo nyid ni 'da' bar dka'//cho ga sna tshogs 'ding rnams la//las kyi sbyor ba sna tshogs kyis//sangs rgyas rdo rje
223b4(rgyud): 'dzin la sogs//'dul ba'i phyir ni byas pa yin//sangs rgyas la sogs brtan g.yo ku ni//kun gyi dngos por 'di 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor gi/
223b5(rgyud): mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/sgyu ma'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni//rnam pa sna tshogs kun gyi mchog/sems can kun gyi don mchog rnams//sangs rgyas la so gos 'dul
223b6(rgyud): bsra 'brug/dpal rdo rje sems dpas dbugs phyung ba'o//'das pa'i dris na sngon byung ba//bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi//de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la//'gro
223b7(rgyud): ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba//de tshe sems can thams cad ni//shin tu ston pa nyid le brtson//'gog pa'i chos nyid la sbyor bas/'gags shing yongasu mya ngan 'das//rnal
224a1(rgyud): /d+hau du ny-id bcom ldan 'das//rdodz+ha snyoms dpa' de bzhin ga she gas//grol ba thams cung rnam sbyang phyir//sangs rgyas sprul pa kun tu
224a2(rgyud): bskyed//stong pa ma yin mi stong min//dbu mer yang ni mi dmigs te//shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba//thabs kyis snying rje bdog nyid rnams//do bas de ni snying rje'i thab/
224a3(rgyud): shos rab pha rol phyin par gsal//rtog pa med pa'i chos rnams la//sems can don du yos brtags pa//rnam par mi rtog la mos pas//thams cad rtog pas
224a4(rgyud): brtag par bya//brag cha yi ni sgra 'dra ba//chos kyi tshig tu de 'gyur te//de las theg pa chen po yi//yang dag yon tan rgyas pa'i glus//dus gsum pa yi dam tshig
224a5(rgyud): gsum//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bstod//mAnyam ming mi g.yo mnyam med mchog gi chos nyid can//thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel bar
224a6(rgyud): mdzad do yon tan mtha' yas dngos grub thams cad sbyin mdzad pa//dri med mi g.yo mnyam med dam pa'i mchog chos can//yon tan shin tu phye ba'i cha la'ang tshad
224a7(rgyud): med de//dbeni na mkha' dang yid spyan du yod pa'ang mini//dngos grub mtha' med dpe dang bral ba rnams//sems can khams la dngos grub mchog rnams nges par
224b1(rgyud): rtsol//rtag tu dri ma med pa'i thugs rje shugs las byung //smon lam grub pa 'gag pa med pa'i chos nyid can//'phro ba'i don grub rab tu brtson pa mtha' yas pa//thugs rje chen po'i
224b2(rgyud): bdag nyid rtag tu rnam par snang //tshad med tshad dang bral bas shin tu rdzogs pa yi//bde bar gshegs pa'i go 'phang dam pa brnyes gyur kyang //khams gsum kun la rtag tu
224b3(rgyud): dngos grub mchog rtsol mdzad//thugs rje spyod pa mi g.yo 'gag par yod mi 'gyur//e ma'o shin tu bzang po'i chos nyid mchog dang ldan//mchog sbyin rnams kyi nang na go
224b4(rgyud): 'phang dam pa brnyes//khams gsum kun la rtag tu dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad//mgon po dus gsum sgrib pa med par rab mkhyen pa//dam tshig mchog gsum dngos
224b5(rgyud): grub dam pa bdag la stsol//'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//yang dag yon tan rgya chen te//len cig tsam ni brjod pas kyang //sangs rgyas thams cad grub par 'gyur//
224b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun bdag nyid sbyor bas//bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di nyid kyis//dus gsum pa yi rgyal ba kun//dam tshig gsum gyis 'grub par 'gyur//sku ni lta bas mi ngom
224b7(rgyud): bdud thams cad bdag nyid bskrun nas kyang //leg so zhes nas dngos grub ni//mchog rnams kun ni rab sbyin mdzad//thams cad bdag nyid 'grub dga' dang //bsam pa
225a1(rgyud): thams cad yong su rdzogs//sangs rgyas 'grub pa mchog kun dang //rnal 'byor dam pa'ang sbyin par mdzad//de nas de yis sgrub pa dang //shin tu brtag/
225a2(rgyud): pa'i dngos grub dag/gang gis skying pa 'di nyid la//dngos grub shin tu rtag theb bshad//rdo rje se gol gtogs pa yis//srungs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya//thal mo
225a3(rgyud): ldan gsum rnam par sbyar ba yi//thal mo lan gsum rnam par brdob//dbang po gang dag gang lam gyur//de dang de yi do byor bya//shin tu mnyi ma gzhag sbyor ba
225a4(rgyud): yis//sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor zhing //ji ltar mos pa'i tshogs pa dang //Sha Da ba la sogs pa yi//ci nas yongasu ma skyo bar//rtag tu tshad med pa
225a5(rgyud): par bya//kun tu kun nas thams cad ni//bdag nyid rtag tu rnam pa kun+da//sangs rgyas kun tu dngos grub pa//rab tu mthong zhing mchog grub pa'o//'di yis sangs
225a6(rgyud): rgyas thams cad dang //de bzhin dpa' bo thams cad dang //rdo rje 'dzini pa thams cad du//tshe 'di nyid kyis 'grub par 'gyur//sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan bsdug/
225a7(rgyud): pargya che ba//bstod pa'i rgyal po mchog ni lan gcig glu blangs pas//kun tu 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor dam pa rtag pa'i mchog/dngos grub mi zad bde ba'i mchog nyid
225b1(rgyud): par 'gyur//bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis ni//thams cad bdag nyid dbang phyug mchog/sna tshogs kun gyis rnam 'dul ba//de bzhin gshegs pa kun grub ste//de bsda ma tshig
225b2(rgyud): gsum la sogs//rtog pa bla med thams cad kyis//na mkha' dbyings kyi mtha' klasde pa'i//sems can khams ni rnam par dkrol//dpral rnam par snang mdzad kyis dbugs
225b3(rgyud): phyung ba'o////'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba//bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yis//de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la//'gro ba'i tshul du sngon byung ba//de tshe sems
225b4(rgyud): ts+tshin thams cad ni//shin tu khro gtum gdug par gyur//shin tu gdug par khro ba yis//'o dong 'bod par lhung bar 'gyur//de nas 'phos nas sems tsun de//bag chags
225b5(rgyud): kyis ni mtshams sbyor bas//shin tu gdug pa chen por gyur//blo ni bdud kyis byin rlabs nas//rims dang dug dad dbyig dug nad/phra me na ma dang gnod byed gadron//bdud
225b6(rgyud): dang rnam par ldog 'dren nyid//shin tu gdug pa chen por gyur//gsum nyid po ni 'jigs byed cing //sgrub pa po rnams la yang nga//lha la sogs pa'ang 'pho bar byed//bstan
225b7(rgyud): pa dge kyang 'jig par byed//de nas dbang por bcas pa'i lha//tshangs pa drung du nye bar dong //tshangs pa'adi lha dang dbang por bcas//'jug sel la yang skyabasu dong //rmongs
226a1(rgyud): 'jug sel lha rnams byung //lha tshon drung du nye dar dong //tshangs par 'jugs la dbang chen dang //rdo rje can la skyab su drong //de nas bcom ldan rdo rje
226a2(rgyud): can//rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis//rdo rje se gol phyag rgyas ni//sangs rgyas thams nAd bslu bar mdzad//rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis//dpung pa gnyis ni rdo rje
226a3(rgyud): bcings//rdo rje se gol brdabs pa yis//sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu mdzad na//de yi bka' tsam gyis bsgrag nas//'khor dang 'khor lo'i tshogs bcings pa//sang+yas
226a4(rgyud): thams cad gshegs 'gyur na//gzhan lta smos kyang ci zhig dgos//rdo rje se gol gtogs pa yi//'jig rten khams ni ma lus pas//sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bcas//
226a5(rgyud): pa//kun gyis tel 'bru bzhin tu rgyas//shin tu 'jug par gtum po la//zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te//shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo yi//khro bor de bzhi nag
226a6(rgyud): kun mdzad//khro bo'i tshul can khros pas kyang //'jig rten gsum dag sreg byed na//sangs rgyas thams cad khros pa yis//khams gsum ma lus smos ci
226a7(rgyud): dgos//de nas sna yi rtse mo la//yid ni brtan par yang dag gzung //sna yi dbugs ring dro ba las//rgyal bas phyag rgya'i sbyor ba byung //bcom ldan de nyid rnal
226b1(rgyud): 'byor pa//rdo rje khro bor gyur nus byung //dpal chen rdo rje he r+ya ka/'byur bas thal bas rab tu 'jig/sems dpa' sngon por 'bar ba'i dang //'od kyi dkyil 'khor dmar par
226b2(rgyud): 'byor/'jig pa chen po'i dus ltar drag/dur khrod kyi ni me dang 'dra//'bar ba chen po sgra 'bar ba//thod pa mang po'i dbu rgyan can//'jigs pa chen po dus ltar drag/dud
226b3(rgyud): khrod bzhin du rab tu 'jigs//khro la sogs pa'i tshul ldan pa//zhal rnams sna tshogs 'gyur ba dang //smin ma khro gnyer bcas par 'gyur//'bar ba'i lta bas gar byas
226b4(rgyud): pras/gu ldeng dbang chen nye dbang bcas//nyi zla gshin rje tshangs par bcas//gnas gsum dag ni 'bir byas nas//thal ba bzhin du rab tu bla shig/rdo rje rdo rje kha T+wA~M
226b5(rgyud): dril bu'i sgra ni bsil ba yis//thams cad phab nas slar yang ni//thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tshe bar byed//de yi 'bar ba nyi ma las//byung ba'i grib ma mi bzad pa//
226b6(rgyud): bskyed nas ma lus bdud la sogs//bdug pa rnams kyi khrug zu nus//rgyal po de ni de dag dang //lhan cig dur khrod rnam par rol//thams cad rdo rje mnyam sbyor ba/
226b7(rgyud): mkho' 'gro dkyil 'khor 'bar ba yis//shin tu gdug cing khro drag pa'i//sems can khams ni rnam sbyangs nas//dag pa'i sangs rgyas zhing rnamasu//sangs rgyas
227a1(rgyud): byang chub dag la bkod//rdo rje 'dod khrol sogs kyi//rtog pa bla med thams cad kyis//na mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i//sems can khams ni rnam
227a2(rgyud): par sbyangs//dpal he ru kas dbugs phyung ba'o////'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba//bdag nyid chen po rtog pa yi//de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la//
227a3(rgyud): 'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba//de tshe sems can thams cad ni//log par lta la gnas par 'gyur/shin tu lta ba ngan pa yis//'o dod 'bod pa chen por lhung //rnal//
227a4(rgyud): 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das//byang chub sems ni rnam sbyang phyir//pad+mo chags par sbyor ba yis//rdo rje tshesuM gnas par gyur//ci ltar pad+mo dmar po 'di//tshon
227a5(rgyud): gyi nyes pa mi gos pas//de bzhin bag tshogs khams gsum gyi//nyes pa sna tshogs rnam par dag/'dis ni kun tu gzigs pas na//rgyal ba dbang phyug nyid du
227a6(rgyud): 'gyur//dpal ldan spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang //rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs//'dod chags thams cad dag pas na//mchog sbyin dam pa bcom ldan
227a7(rgyud): 'das//'dul ba'i thabs ni sna tshogs kyis//sna tshogs pa ni 'dul bar spro//kun tu spyan ras gzigs dbang rgyal//pad+mo gar gyi dbang phyug gyur//pad+mo'i rgyal
227b1(rgyud): po mnyam sbyor ba//mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog des//pad+mo klar dbang la sogs kyi//rtog pa bla med thams cad kyis//na mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i//sems can
227b2(rgyud): khams ni rnam par sbyangs//dpe la pad+mo gar gyi dbang phyug gisra dbugs phyung ba'o//'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba//bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi//de bzhin gshegs pa'i//
227b3(rgyud): gsung rab la//'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon bying ba//de tshe sa ni thams cad ni//shin tu/ni cing ba'ab bar byud/shin tu 'jungs par gyur pa yis//yi dgas rnams dang dmyal bar ltung //de nas
227b4(rgyud): 'phos nas slar yang ni//shin tu dbul por skyes par gyur//bkre sa dang skom pa'i skyon rnams kyis//de dag phan tshun gsod par byed//shin tu gadrug pa sbyang ba'i
227b5(rgyud): phyir//rnal 'byor de ni bcom ldan 'das//dam pa'i don gyi nor chen po/rdo rje nyi ma byung bar gyur//na mkha'i snying pos thams cad phyogs//kun gyi ra ba yongs
227b6(rgyud): rdzogs mdzad//bud med la sogs rin chen mchog/mkha' las rin chen thams cad 'bebs//shan tu gdug cing khro ba la//zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te/
227b7(rgyud): shes rab thabs kyi nyi ma ni//rab tu gdung ba kun bsgrubs pas//bya ba dang ni bzlog pa dang //dbrog pas kyang ni khyad par du//rgyal bar byas nas gnas gsum gyi//
228a1(rgyud): nor gyi tshogs kun sdud par byed//'jig rten gsum rgyal la sogs kyi//rtog pa bla med thams cad kyis//na mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'o//
228a2(rgyud): sems can kham+b+has ni rab tu bkrol//dpalnga rdo rje nyi mas dbugs phyung ba'o///'das po'i dusu na sngon byung ba//bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi//de bzhin
228a3(rgyud): gshegs pa'i gsungs rab lnga//'gro ba'i tshu la ni sngon byung ba//de tshe sems can thams cad ni//brtson 'grus shin tu chung bar 'gyur//shin tu brtson 'grus/
228a4(rgyud): chung ba yis//mnar med pa yi dmyal bar lhung //rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das//rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs//drag shul sbyor ba'i tshul
228a5(rgyud): dag tu//rta mchog dpal ni byung bar gyur//thams cad dag par mos pa yis//sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du//pha rol gnon pa'i rtsal dag gis//shin
228a6(rgyud): tu gdug cing khro ga tum pa'i//sems can rnam pa mang po'i khams//'jig rten thams cad rab tu 'jig/byi ba rkun po chom po yis//thams cad rnam par spyong
228a7(rgyud): bar byed/khrid pa dang ni skya dag dang //ngo 'thon stobs kyis de bzhin du//dgra tsha lnga yis bsgral nas ni//de tshe 'jig rten gsum las rgyal//skye 'gro gnas pa
228b1(rgyud): 'gro ba rnams//mtha' dag brtul nas 'grub par 'gyur//'dul ba'i thAbasA rnams sna tshogs kyis//rang gi tshul srid rtag tu spyong //g.yem pa rnams
228b2(rgyud): lo g.yem par gyur//khro ba rnams la khro ba'i mchog/zhi ba rnams la zhi ba'i mchog/drag shul can lnga drag pos gnon//sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du//dbade phyug
228b3(rgyud): dam pa dang mAn na nas//lha mo b+hi mo phrogs nas ni//de tshe longs spyod rang gir spyong//sdig med stobs kyis do 'thon du//mthu bo che yang rab mnan nas//rug mI ni ya
228b4(rgyud): phrogs nas ni//de tshe longs spyod rang gir spyod//sdig med stobs kyis do 'thon du//skye dgu'i bdag po rab mnan nas//lha mo rab tu zhi ba phrogs//de tshe longs spyod rang gir
228b5(rgyud): spyod//sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du//'dod pa'i lha ni rab mnan nas//dga' sdug mi yi dbang phyug ma//phrogs nas de tshe nye bar spyod//de la sogs pa mtha' yas
228b6(rgyud): mchog/chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa//na mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas par//rdo rje las mchog rnam gnon pa//na mkha'o kun gyi skabs na dpal//rdo rje
228b7(rgyud): sems dpa' rab tu gnas//thabs dang rtsal gyis grub pa yis//drag shul sbyor bas bsgribs na ni//khams gsum rgyal srid ma lus par//rdo rje 'dzin pa des thob
229a1(rgyud): /nas//byung du bus ma skad pa' mtha' yas mchog/drag shul stong bas grub par byung //thams cad dag par mos pa yis//sdig byud stobs kyis
229a2(rgyud): ngopo na du//rgyal gyis pha rol gnan pa yis//sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu 'grel//lha yi dngos grub de/'a bu dang //sangs rgyas byang chub dade chen po//go 'phang
229a3(rgyud): mchog gi rtag pa dag/rang gi rnal 'byor gyis thob nas//sems can khams ni du ma~M dag/ma lus par ni rgyas 'debs shing //'chi med byang chub dka' ba dag/
229a4(rgyud): sems can rnams la brtan par sbyin//rta mchog rnam par sprul pa yis//ma lus lus pa med pa yi//bskal pa kun tu srid par gnas//sems can kun gyi
229a5(rgyud): don kyang byed//de ltar rta mchog dpal la sogs//rtog pa blo med thams cad kyis//na mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'o//sems can khams rnams rab tu bsgrubs
229a6(rgyud): dpral rta mchog gi dbugs phyung ba'o///de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa//na mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas
229a7(rgyud): pa'i//rang byung rnams kyi gtim gyi rtags//na mkha' kun gyi skabs ni dpal//rdo rje sems dpa'o rab tu gnas//gruba'i dbang phyug rab grub pos//thams cad
229b1(rgyud): dag nyid 'jug par byed//sa sa rgya sa rnams cad panyam sbyar ba//mkha' 'bru snum bdapa'i mchog las gat+tam phyug rgya sa pa rjo pa lbu ba'o//dadang
229b2(rgyud): gzhan yid thams cad de//rnam pa sna tshogs mchog 'byong ba'i//sangs rgyas thams nad mnyam sbyor ba//mkhar 'gro sgyu ma'i bde mchog bshad//dpal ldan pa
229b3(rgyud): rgyab kun gyi dngos//rdo rje sems du bde 'byung ba//gsung ba mchog gi dgyes pa na//thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu btsugs//sangs rgyas kun+da gyi dmatshig dpal
229b4(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' snang ba dade//de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha rdzas mchog/rin chen rgyan la sogs pa smras//dril du rgyal mtshan mchog ldan pa'i//bla re dam pa
229b5(rgyud): dris pa na//rdo rje glu dang mchod la sogs//glu dang sil snyan rnam par 'phrul//me tog bdug pa'i sbyor ba dang //mar me dro dang sogs ldan pa//sangs rgyas thams cad
229b6(rgyud): mnyam sbyor ba//mkha' 'gro sgyu mya bde mchog sgrub//yid ni bdag gi glo nas dag gam//skyed moso tshul la sogs pa sgrub//der ni dang por gdun bshams te//'jam
229b7(rgyud): zhing rig ni bde 'gyur ba//sna tshogs padrang ras kyis g.yogs/de ni thams cad dag pa'i gdon//sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba//sbyor ba'i dbang phyug rnam
230a1(rgyud): 'phrul pas//rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha//de ni rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad//stanA de dag ni thams cad la//ji ltar gnas bu bzhin du dgod//gru bzhi pa
230a2(rgyud): la sgo bzhi pa//rta babs bzhi yis mdzes par byas//rdo rje rin chen pad+ma sogs//sgo srung dang ni ldan par byas//rang gi lha dang 'dra ba yis//bud med dag ni legs
230a3(rgyud): bsgrubs pa//skal bzang rang gi phyag rgyasu mtshan//tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor brtag par bya//mi yi tshal ni grub pa la//dmar chen po zhes bya bar bshad//ngo bo
230a4(rgyud): nyid kyi mthu dag dang //rang bzhin gyis ni de grub pa'o//rdo rje'i chu dang rdo rjerarwa bcas//mtshal chen po dag sgrub pa ni//mthu yis rab tu grub pa ste//pad+mo'i snod kyi nang du
230a5(rgyud): bzhag/chags pa chen po bcom ldan 'das//rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs//sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje'i thugs//dam tshig 'di ni 'da' bar dka'//de yi
230a6(rgyud): mtshan dang khu ba dang //mtshal chen po ni bsgrubs pa dag/chags pa chen po las byung bas//dmyur chen po zhes bya bar bshad//dmar chen dang ni gu bur bcus//
230a7(rgyud): tsam dan dmar por sbyar ba dag/tshogs kyi dbus su bzhag pa ni//ra sa yan kun slong ba//rang gi lha yi sbyor ldan pas//srin lag dang ni mthe bo'i rtses//zhi ba'i
230b1(rgyud): btung ba bzhin myangs nas//rtag pa yi ni dngos grub thob//sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid kyi//ra sa ya na bde ba 'dris//rdo rje sems dpa'i tshe dang gzhan//nad med pa dang bde/
230b2(rgyud): mchog 'grub//sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba//mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog gis//'dus pa der ni zhugs pa dag/'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding //kun tu
230b3(rgyud): kun nas thams cad ni//bdag nyid rtag tu rnam pa kun//sangs rgyas la sogs brtan g.yo kun//kun gyi dngos por de 'gyuraro//'dis ni srung ba byas pAs dpal
230b4(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' bzhin du 'gyur//rnal 'phyir mkha' 'gro ba de mchog gis//sangs rgyas thams cad bdag nyid 'grub//de nas khrus byas dri zhim lus//ci 'byor pa yi
230b5(rgyud): glos dang rgyan//sna tshogs gis bzang bgos dang ni//me tog phreng ldan pa dri zhim//sna tshogs kun gyi skul bzang pos//smod pas del gyis dral gyi su//gos dgab pa
230b6(rgyud): yi sbyor ba yis//bdag gi 'byung ba bskul bar bya//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla rnams//shar ba dag ni mthong ba yis//sdig pa kun las grol 'gyur zhing //bsod nams
230b7(rgyud): thams cad 'grub par 'gyur//nges po'i lam dang kun ldan pa//rnam par 'das pas rnam par rgyan//brtan zhing grub pa slob byed pa//kun nas slong ba'i bde ba ni//stong pa
231a1(rgyud): mkhan mamamam tsham sa a na thams mtham a nathanatha.a mthamam thas natha mam thas mams yam khas yan thas/gakhas ka tham mas bam yam ma thal thamasams kas mam
231a2(rgyud): shin tu rnal 'byor yod med mthus//namakha' nyid du dam chog nye bar gnas//bde ba shegs bde bar gshegs pas bzhengasu gsol//rdo rje sems
231a3(rgyud): da' sprul bzang dang la byung ba dag/'di dag nyid kyi glung blangs na//shin tu mya ngan yongs 'das pa'o//shi ba'ang skar ni slongs 'gyur na//yang srid pa la
231a4(rgyud): zhig smos//lam bzhi dang ni mnyam ldan pa//rnam par 'dus pas mdzes par byas//sna tshogs 'brang ba rab tu 'grub//'jig rten gsum ni rab sgrub pa//
231a5(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum gyis phyag byas pa//'jig rten gsum gyi ston pa'o//'jig rten gsumi la sgyid sbyin pa//'jig rten gsum po bdag la bsgrubs//rdorje
231a6(rgyud): sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba//lha mo kun dang 'grogs pa yis//sna tshogs kun gyi skal bzang po//a ro li ni kun 'grub 'gyur//namakha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas
231a7(rgyud): pa'i rje/lha mo kun dang bde mos bya//rdo rje semasna par yang dgra rdzogs//nyi ma zla ba gsal bar 'char//rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag sbyor//mkha' 'gro sgyum
231a8(rgyud): bde mchog 'byung //lan cig dmigs pa tsam gyis kyang //bde ba'i dngos grub kun 'byung ba//brtan zhing grub pa slong byed pa//sna tshigs 'brang bas de
231b1(rgyud): bzhin du//krAn+d+har ba dang shad pa la//glu dbyungs sna tshogs glus sgrub pa//de nas de nyid dam pa yis//thar pa thams cad rmongs pa yi//rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag lda/
231b2(rgyud): ladu glu 'di mi sa ni bskul bar bya//rnaMs chags pa'i rnam ming dga' bya'i pad+mo rnam dag pa'i//mchod pas gsal bar rjesu mchod byas nas//mchog tu rtag pa
231b3(rgyud): rna myor bdeHbde ba grub par mdzod//kye ma'o mchog tu bde ba'i dam tshig ngo bo nyid//mchog tu bde ba shin tu rnal 'byor skal bzung mchog dgyes pa//rang gi dam
231b4(rgyud): rmug spyan med dag le rol cig 9 to//sgyu ma mchog tu gsang ba'i bdag po rang gi dam tshig yin pa'i phyir//rab tu gsang ba'i lha mo mchog rnams//'gro ba'i rgyud
231b5(rgyud): ni rnam po sna tshogs 'dul ba gsal bar mkhyen//dam tshig thams cad da ngos pa brtan g.yo kun gyi ngo bor gyur//rgyal ba kun gyi bdag nyid rnal 'byor bde ba mkha
231b6(rgyud): 'gro sgyu ma ho//kye ma dam pa rtag pa'i dngos grub chen po rab tu bsgrubs la ston//dzaHhUM ba~M haM/e ma'o bde mchog bde bar drongs//rnam par sprul hUM snang bar
231b7(rgyud): mdzod//a la la ho//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi//mkha' 'gro sgyu ma sna tshogs kyis//slob ma dag ni gzhug tu gsol//glu yi rgyal po 'di dag ni//
232a1(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' dpal la gnas//kun gyi sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ma lus zhum pa med par 'grub//glu 'di dag ni len pa na//dkyil 'khor sna tshogs
232a2(rgyud): thams cad du//sangs rgyas thams cad rnam 'phrul gi/ lus lus pa med par snang //rnam pa mang po'i 'dod rdzogs rgyud kyi sems can ma lus lus pa med du
232a3(rgyud): 'dul mkhas pa//de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sgyu ma bde mchog sgyums thams cad de sprul rnam par sprul//te ne te te hU~M/rnam mang rab tu dga' ba'i rgyud kyis sems
232a4(rgyud): tsan ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa//de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi skye ma ba de mchog sgyu mas thams cad dbye sprul rnam par sprul//hUM hUM hU~M/rnam pa mang
232a5(rgyud): po khro ba'i rgyud kyis sems can mi lus lus pa med par dul mkhas pa//de bzhin gshegs pas kun gyi sgyu ma bde mchog sgyu mas thams cad rab sprul rnam par sprul//
232a6(rgyud): ru lu ru lu n+d+ri b+h+yo m+b+ha/rnam pa mang po srog N+DI rgyud kyi sems nan ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa//de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi skum bdi ma tshig sgyum
232a7(rgyud): mas ci de 'i hU~M'i rnam par sprul//hUM gau/hU~M ga hUM//de la sogs te mtha' yab mchog/chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam po'o//namapa'i nga
232b1(rgyud): mankhams sa nasam/a ma/thas nathamathas mayam khas na sa/gsas ka tham mal \u0f7fla ma
232b2(rgyud): mtha' klas pa'i//rab byung rnams kyi glu yi rgyu//nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal//rdo rje sems dpa' la ni gnas//grub pa'i dbang phyug rab grub pas//thams cad bdag
232b3(rgyud): nyid grub par 'gyur//glu 'di dag ni blings pa dang //lha mo kun gyis rab bskul nas//mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog gis//sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid 'grub//dbang //
232b4(rgyud): baM kun las byung ba yi//mchod pa sprin chen rnam bkod pa//rab 'byam tshogs rnams thams cad kyis//kun gyi bdag nyid mchod par byed//sangs rgyas thams cad
232b5(rgyud): mnye ma sbyor ba//mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog gis//dngos po kun gyi bdag nyid lus//ma lus lus pa med par 'grub//ston pa'i phyag rgya phab pa yis//bud
232b6(rgyud): med dag kyang bsgrubs nus ni//rdo rjer bcas pa'i mtshan ma 'dzin//rnal 'byor mar ni rab tu 'gyur//de dag rang gi lha rnams dang //'dra bar byin gyis brlabs
232b7(rgyud): bsgrubs nas//sngon mang rol mo'i sel snyan dang //rnam par 'phrul pas 'grub par 'gyur//lha yi gzugs dang sgra drang dri//ro dang reg pa'i bode mos pas//bdag
232b8(rgyud): nyid rang gi lhar mthong zhing //mchod pa dag kyang byed par 'gyur//lha yi mchod pa mnyam sbyor ba//skal bzang mchog gi 'dod chags can//rnam pa kun tu rnal
233a1(rgyud): 'o bya'o//bde ba yang dgu grub par byed//sangs rgyas snrums smras pas//rdo rje sanas dpa' monam sbyor 'o//de m+b+ha sgrub dun chud/
233a2(rgyud): brnams//dkyil 'khor mthong dka' myong bar 'gyur//rdo rje sems dpor mnyam sbyor ba'i//mahA nyid kyis ni thams cad du//s+t+waM tshogs ku gyi skyil po ga
233a3(rgyud): rang gi bang pa nyid kyis 'grub//sangs rgyas kun gyi gzugs chen dang //dbyangs dang dri dang ro bde bas//rdo rje sems dpa'i bdug nyid du//de mos rab mnod ma
233a4(rgyud): par byed//mchod pa thams cad mnyam sbyor ba//skal bzang mchog gi 'dod chags can//sangs rgyas thams cad nyid kyi ni/dngos grub ma lus lus med 'gru
233a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i//mda' 'gro sgyum pa de mchog gis//sadus rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid kAr//rnam par ril pa ma chog tu byung //de nas
233a6(rgyud): dag rab bsad pas//bud mdo dag ni bzhi rnams dang //gar m+b+hi b+hag rgya mchod pa yis//mchod pa rnams cad du bul ba bya//rab tu dka' ba'i lci la byag+ma'i rgya mo/
233a7(rgyud): ga shenyis pa'i dam pa'i bye par ma / rdzog dmapa ba lung dugs / ban po nas cang par mdzugan su
233b1(rgyud): mchod pa chen po thams cad grub par mdzod///glu yi phyag rgyu dadi ni dpal//rdo rje sam+bas dpa' la gnas to//mchod pa ma lus lus med pa'i//rab 'bum lus la'ang sbyar du
233b2(rgyud): rung //gang ba grub par ma gyur dang //mched po dag ni mi 'byor pa//phyag rgya 'di yis mchod byas nas//mchod pa thams cad myur du 'grub//mchod pa'i sbyor ba'o
233b3(rgyud): ngag dang //lha mo bzhi po dag gis ni//me tog la sogs mchod byas nas//slob ma thams cad brjong bar bya//dngos grub 'dod pas ci 'dod par//snyim pa'i gang ni kun bskyod
233b4(rgyud): nas//de dag gdong ni mdzes pa yi//ras kyis g.yogs te gzung par bya//dngos grub ci ltar 'thob 'dod par//slob ma me tog 'thor du gzhug/lha mo gang la lhung ba ni//lha dang
233b5(rgyud): la 'grub par 'gyur//de nas gdong ni bkrol nas kyang //yon gyi mchog ni blang bar bya//sangs rgyas rin chen dbang bskur bas//ji lta brwa ni dbang bskur ro//dmar chen
233b6(rgyud): po dang ga bur bcos//tsan dan dmar po sbyar ba'i rnams//tshogs kyi dbus su bzhag pa la//g.yon pa mtshan 'dzin rdo rje bcas//rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor ldan//srin lag
233b7(rgyud): dang ni mthe bong rtses//zhi ba btung ba bzhi no myangs na//rtag pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur//sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i//mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i tshogs kyis/
234a1(rgyud): //rgyumana'i ngas shAd rkyod //de la gan pa 'gyur ro//don sa Sh+Ta ni na ba zlas nas//sangs rgyas thams cad 'thun pa yis//
234a2(rgyud): mchog tu rtag pa'i bka' stsal pa//dam tshig sdom pa byin par bya//sangs rgyas thams cad dri nyi ma sbyong ba'i//sdom pa nyams par khyod byed pa//ji snyed sangs rgyas
234a3(rgyud): thams cad dang //byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje 'dzin//lha dag dang ni mi rnams dang //de bzhin rnal 'byor grub bye bo//de dag la ni ste rings nas//snying las
234a4(rgyud): khrakhrug chen 'thungs pa bzhin//sems can khams ni ma lus don//srid pa'i shin tu dag bya'i phyir//mi 'gog chos nyid sbyor ba yis//rtag pa nyid du grub bya
234a5(rgyud): /bdag gi rdo rje yongs skyes shing //da'athub kyis ni bla zing ni /ci bya ba ni ba por spyod//'di ni byi dus sangs rgyas yin//rnal 'byor longs spyod
234a6(rgyud): thams cad la//nis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis//TIg pa mod kyis khyed ma 'jigs//dmi tshig 'di' bor dka' ba'o//grub pa gcig pu gcig la spyod/
234a7(rgyud): lhan cig spyod dang rjes spyod sdug/sangs rgyas byang chub pa med yin//yang dag nyid kyis rtag tu rten//rje rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs//de skad bka' stsal
234b1(rgyud): drug kun pos//sod dag rdzogs pa sangs rgyas dang //rdo nan rjes bka' stsal to//nas 'byor bcasna dang gsang bcas pa'o//dag ga yo shos rgyu ba smranas//
234b2(rgyud): ji lha'i tshubo bzhin par byed par//slob ma rnams la bde byar sbyin//slob ma dam pas da byin cid//pyug+ha d+hA'i ye shes rjes bzung nas//rnam par snang mdzad mi chog
234b3(rgyud): bzhin du//sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid grub/de nas ro dang zas dang gnas//gru dang sil sbyin la sogs pa//de dge mgan pa rnams lce dngul//rdo rje rje mA tshan+d+ra po dang /
234b4(rgyud): bdug de gzhan la 'di dgus ni rjod//'dud de ni 'bras bu phun tshogs khrug//de nas bdag nyid rab bsgrubs nas//kun ni slob dpon rab gnas pa//de lta'i
234b5(rgyud): bzhin 'jug pa yis//bden pa'i chos ni brjod par bya//rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi tshul//rtog pa thams cad rab bsgrubs shing //rtog pa kun rab sbyor ba yi//ji
234b6(rgyud): nyid phyir chen po'i mchog/sna tshogs las kyi spyod ba dang //'dul ba'i bdag nyid sna tshogs pas//sems can rnams ni 'dul ba'i phyir//de las gzhan pa'i tshul
234b7(rgyud): du bstan//rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das//rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs//thar pa thams cad rnam sbyang phyir//grol ba'i mkha' 'gro byung bar gyur//
235a1(rgyud): rang gi lha dang 'dra ba yis//rang gi byin rlang pA sgrub pa'o rgyus//phyag rgya ji bzhin rjes 'thun pa'i//sangs rgyas sgrol pa bsgrub par bya//gzhan yang/
235a2(rgyud): rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das//dam tshig la sdang rnam skyed phyir//thams cad rnal 'byor dbang phyug mchog/rdo rje mkha' 'gro byung bar 'gyur//gzhan yang shin
235a3(rgyud): tu rnal 'byor pa//ma lus pad+mo rnam sbyang phyir//skal bzang dam pa mi 'gyur ba//pad+mo sgyu ma 'byung bar 'gyur//gzhan yang rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das//nor//
235a4(rgyud): gyi mchog gis rnam sbyang phyir//ni mkha'o kun gyi bdag po che//rdo rje nyi ma dpal 'byung 'gyur//rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das//drag shul sbyor ba sbyang ba'i
235a5(rgyud): phyir//rta mgrin pha rol rab gnon pa//rta mchog rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur//rang gi lha dang 'dra ba yis//rang gi byin rlabs bsgrub pa'i phyir//gzugs
235a6(rgyud): brnyan ngo bor sbyor ba yi//phyag rgya'i sbyor bas gar bya'o//dam tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyis//de ltar rnam par spyod na no//srungs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/

235b3(rgyud): ston//lha mo kun dang 'dus pa yas//sangs rgyas zhing ni ma lus pa//sangs rgyas sprul pa grub par byed//sangs rgyas sprul pa sgyu ma yas//sangs rgyas rnams

235b5(rgyud): pad+mo sgyu ma rnam 'phrul pas//sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin la sogs//sna tshog sa gzugs byed rim pa yi//'gro ba thams cad mgu bar byed//khams gsum pa
235b6(rgyud): yi rmyi la srid che//'jal du ma g.yul 'byed grub pa dag/rgyal srid sgyu ma rnam 'phrul bas//bya ba thams cad ston par byed//khams gsum pa yi rgyal srid che//
235b7(rgyud): bdag rtul phod pas mnan nas ni//'gro ba thams cad rab 'joms par//rta yi gar gyis ston par byed//de la stsogs pa mtha' yas mchog/chos dbyings
235b8(rgyud): mnyam dang mi mnyam pa//na mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i//sna tshogs kun gyi bde mchog gis//na mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal//rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin
236a1(rgyud): //gshegs//dngul dkyis rdol pa rnam 'phrul ga/sna rmugs rgya na rnam par rol//rnam par sna tshogs skul bzang po//rnam pa sna tshogs
236a2(rgyud): bde mchog gis//'dul ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis//sems can khams ni rab tu rgyug/de la sogs pi mthu' yis mchog/chos dbyings mnyi ma dang mi
236a3(rgyud): mnyam pa//na mkha'i dbyings kyi mthi' klas pa'i//sangs rgyas thams cad 'byung ba'i mchog/nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpral//rdo rje sems dpa' la gnas
236a4(rgyud): te//grub pa'i dbang phyug rab bsgrubs pas//thams cad bdag nyid grub par byed//bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas de skad gsungaso//sangs rgyas thams
236a5(rgyud): cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma bde ba'i mchog las sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba mkha'i 'gro sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor brtag pa ste drug pa'o///
236a6(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang bshod bya ba//rdo rje sems dpa' dpal b+hi lha//rnam pa sna tshogs kun mi mchog/'khor lo thams cad rnam sprul pa'o//gsang ba mchog gi
236a7(rgyud): dgyes pa ni//thams cad bdag nyid rje su sgrub//dben pa yi ni gnas dag gam//rang gi bskyed mos tshal sogs par//kun tu sna tshogs bskal bzang po//
236b1(rgyud): kun tu sna tshogs bde mchog gis//kun tu sna tshogs dgos pa'i rnams//ci bde brla ni bsgrub par bya//rten dang dgon pa gtsug lag khang //ri yI rtse rnams thams cad du/
236b2(rgyud): rnam pa dri ma sna tshogs pa'i//sangs rgyas dgongs pa bsgrub par bya//dur khrod dang nI lha rte na dang //ma mo'i grwanas la sogs 'dug na//rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dgos pa dag
236b3(rgyud): rnam pa du mar 'grub par 'gyur//pad+mo'i bskyed mos tshal dga' dang //chu bo dag gi mdo dag tu//pad+mo 'dzin pa'i dgos pa rnams//yang dge par ni 'grub par 'gyur//
236b4(rgyud): rgyal po'i pho blang dga' ba dang //rgyal po'i bskyed mos tshal dag tu//rnam pa sna tshogs du ma yi//rgyal po'i dgos pa bsgrub par bya//mkhar ni rnam pa sna tshogs dang //
236b5(rgyud): dri bzhin chu bo'i 'gram dag gam//rgyal khams gzhan las grub par ru//rdo rje rta ni bsgrub par bya//cha lugs rnam pa sna tshogs dang //sgrub pa rnam pa sna tshogs
236b6(rgyud): kyis//rdo rje sems dpa'i dgos pa la//dkyil 'khor lnga sogs rab tu sgrub//sangs rgyas rnams kyi pad+mo dmar//phyag na rdo rje sna tshogs la//'jig rten dbang gI lA/
236b7(rgyud): dog dkar//rdo rje nyi ma dpal gyi ser//kha dog kun dang ci 'byor pa//bla bro rgyal mtshan rgyan gyis rnams//thams cad rab tu sgrib pa dpal//rta mchog rdo rje can gyi/
237a1(rgyud): gnas dang 'khor rnams ci 'dra dang //bkod dang 'gro ba ci 'dra dang //'khor rnams bkod pa ci 'dra bar//dri 'dra'i 'khor lho mchog gisku mdzad//
237a2(rgyud): drapal rdo rje sems dpa' lha rnams kyi//'khor lo mngon sum mthong ba las//bstod nams brtags pa ci 'dra bya//byis bris pa yang de bzhin no//dkyil 'khor/
237a3(rgyud): thig bte ba shes rab can//phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid sgrub cing //shar nub byang gi phyogs dag tu//thig bzhi btabo pas dkyil 'khor brgyad //dkyil 'khor/
237a4(rgyud): yang dag ci 'dra bar//rab tu brtog par su zhig nus//rang gi lha yi rang bzhin gyis//dkyil 'khor brtag pa 'grub par 'gyur//bdag nyid rang gi lhar sbyor bas//
237a5(rgyud): dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par bya//cho ga lhag gam ma tshAng na'ang //nyes pa med de 'grub par 'gyur//kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang po//kun tu sna tshogs
237a6(rgyud): 'khor li can//kun tu sna tshegaso 'grub pa'i phyir//dkyil 'khor kun tu sna tshogs pa'o//dkyil 'khor zlum po sangs rgyas kyi//rdo rje can gyi zla gam bzhin/
237a7(rgyud): pad+mo'i dbang gi pad+mo'i dbyibs//rin chen mchog gi rin chen dbyibs//dze ldir 'dod pa ci 'byor pa//ji lta'i dus dang ci bde bar//dkyil 'khor kun tu gaR+Sha
237b1(rgyud): /par dbul//rta mchog phyag rgya rdo rje'o//dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs shing //dram tshig rnams na spangs pa drag ko gsang ba yang dag myi shes pas//bsgrubs kyang ci yang mo
237b2(rgyud): 'grub po//srog chags bsad par mi bya zhing //dkon mchog gsum ni yod mi spang //byang chub sems ni mi btang ste//slob dpon skal bzang yong mi btang //kun tu sna
237b3(rgyud): tshogs skal bzang por//bdag rang bsgrub pra skal ba bzung //bdag med chos nyid dang ldan pa//dam tshig la sdang skal ba ngan//srid pa shin tu bsgrubs pas na//skal bzong //
237b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das//skal don nyan thos 'jig rten na//shin tu yongasu mya ngan 'das//rtog pa thams cad bsgrubs pa'i phyir//skal bzang phyag na rdo rje dpal//
237b5(rgyud): stong pa nyid la rab sbyor bas//rang rgyal rnams ni skal ba ngan//'dod chags thams cad rnams dag pas//skal bzang spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang //log pa lta dang ldan pas
237b6(rgyud): na//skal ngan 'jig rten mu stegs na//dam pa'i nor mchog sdud pa'i phyir//skal bzang rdo rje nyi ma dpal//bdag gi bu yang ma chags pas//skal ngan dka' thub spyod
237b7(rgyud): pa kun//rgyal srid mchog rnams kun bsdus pas//rta mchog dpal ni skal ba bzang //bdag med yongasu 'dzin med pas//drug pa thams cad skal ba ngan//bde ba tham
238a1(rgyud): cad bdag sgrub phyir//kun gyi slob dpon skal pa du zang //lta ngan dam tshig la sdang ba'i//slob ma thams cad sbrul byangan//gsad pa'i don ni yang dag nyid//
238a2(rgyud): 'di ni gsal bar shes pa yis//sangs rgyas kun gyi bka' bzhin du//sangs rgyas kun tu'i grub par 'gyur//kun gyi slob dpon lag nus pas//'khor lor 'jug
238a3(rgyud): par byed pa na//dkyil 'khor 'dod pa'i slob ma la//gsang ba yang dag mtha' yas mchog/thog ma nyid du gsang brjod pas//kye khyod ci la dga' zhes dri//ska
238a4(rgyud): ba bzang la bdag dga' zhes//'jug pa pos kyang slu bar bya//gsang ba'i yan lag 'di shes na//ji ltar 'dod par rab tu gzhug/gsang ba yang dag mi shes te/
238a5(rgyud): g.yas pa yis ni gzhug par bya//de ltar dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas//de bzhin shin tu yon 'bul to//gseng ba'i tshig nyid shes pas//mi 'gyur ba yin
238a6(rgyud): 'grub po//kun tu sna tshogs bla ma la//yon mchog dag ni dbul bar nges//gang la yongasu btang dka' gang //de ni mchog tu bshad pa yin//gang dang gang ni
238a7(rgyud): sdug pa'i mchog/yang na shin tu khyad par can//de dang de ni tha ma la//de nyid mi zad 'dod pas dbul//yang na ni 'dod 'gyur ba 'am//'on te sems la
238b1(rgyud): dgos pa dag/de sbyin yang na dgos pa bya//de ni chung yang mchog yino//de la gal te mchog bdog la//de yang ngan pa'i yon 'bul na//kun gyi slob dpon brnyas pas na//
238b2(rgyud): de ni rtag tu sdug bsngal 'thob//bu mo shin tu rgyan pa 'am//de bzhin chung ma sdug pa dag/phul nas rin gyis slu ba ni//sangs rgyas byang chub mchog gri yon//mtshan
238b3(rgyud): dag ni phul nas su//slar yang rin gyis slu ba ni//rdo rje 'dzin dpal sbyor ba yi//'on te mchog gi yon yin no//mu tig bzang dang nor bu dang //shin tu dkar ba'i
238b4(rgyud): ras zung dang //de bzhin rta ni dkar po dag/pad+mo can gyi yon mchog yon//rgyal srid longs spyod gter rnams dang //gos dang rgyan gyi tshogs rnams dang //de bzhin mchod
238b5(rgyud): pa thams cad ni//rdo rje nyi ma'i yon yin no//shin tu rgyan pa'i rta dag dang //glang po shin tu rgyan pa dang //shing rta rin tshon gang ba dag/rta yi rgyal po'i yon yino///
238b6(rgyud): khams kyi rang bzhin thams cad dam//srog dang rtsa ba'i de bzhin te//sangs rgyas rin chen dbang bskur ba//mkhas pas rnam pa sna tshogs brtag/spyi bo dang ni dpral
238b7(rgyud): ba dang //ldan pa gnyis dang lhag pa ru//sangs rgyas rin chen thams cad kyi//dbu rgyan mi 'gyur dam pa'o//khams kyi rang bzhi ni thams cad dam//srog dang rtsa
239a1(rgyud): ba de bzhin te//thod pa rin chen dbu rgyan nam//sangs rgyas gtsug gi nor bu dag/kun tu sna tshogs bla mar ni//kun gyi slob dpon kun la bya//rgyal sring
239a2(rgyud): thams cad rnam dag la//ma lus lus pa meng por 'grub//rin chen ngo mtshar gcig las b+hi sI//de bzhin sna tshogs rkyen gyis spras//sangs rgyas pad mo'i
239a3(rgyud): dbang bskur bas//slob ma thams cad dbang bskur ro//sangs rgyas rin chen rdo rje phyed//rdo rje rigs la rdo rje yin//spyan ras gzigs kyi sangs rgyas sku//nor bu
239a4(rgyud): 'dzin gyi nor bu yin//sangs rgyas rin chen pad+ma dang //rdo rje nor bu de bzhin du//thams cad mchog na rta mchog la//rang gi dbang bskur bsdus pa'o//blugs pa//
239a5(rgyud): dang ni byas pa 'am//brdungs pa'am yang na byis pa'ang rung //sna tshogs rab tu legs pa yi//mtshan ma'i phyag rgya rab tu brtag/kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang po///
239a6(rgyud): rang byung rnams kyi mtshan me'i rgyu//na mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' kris pa'i//lha mo rnams kyi bde ba'i mchog/gzho dang mda' dang de bzhin du//skal ldan de bzhin//
239a7(rgyud): skal ba bzang //thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM ga/rdo rje rgya grom de bzhin no//pad+mo rgya gram dpage med che'i//sangs rgyas kun gyi tshe sgrub pa//lha mo tshogs rnams thams cad kyi//
239b1(rgyud): mtshan ma phyag rgya tshogs sgrub bzhin//mda' dang de bzhin tshangs pa'i mgo/de bzhin 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dang //rdo rje tri shUl phyag rgya'i mchog/dpag bsams shing /
239b2(rgyud): dang lcug mo dang //pad+mo rti mgrin 'phang mtho ba//rta mgrin ljang ku de bzhi no//phag gi mche ba grub po dang //zla bA nyi ma de bzhin no//rin chen sna tshogs snod chen du//sangs
239b3(rgyud): rgyas gzugs kyi ra sa yi//thams cad bdag nyid myong skal bzeng //mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'i tshogs gzhano//gling bu dang ni pri bang kun//ku mun da drang mu ra dze//me tog
239b4(rgyud): bdug bla mar me dang //sna tshogs dri rnams de bzhin no//de la sogs pa mtha' yos mchog/chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa//na mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha'
239b5(rgyud): klas pa'i//mtshan ma'i phyag rgya dam pa'i tshogs//nam mkha' kun gyi skabs nA dpal//rdo rje sems dpa' nyid la gnas//grub pa'i dbang phyug ra bo grub pas//thams
239b6(rgyud): cad bdag nyid grub par 'gyur ro//chos gos dang ni lhung bzed dang //de bzhin du ni 'khrure sol dang //dam pa'i chos ni glegs bam dag/mtshan me'i phyag rgya'i
239b7(rgyud): tshogs gzhan//de bzhin rtse yi phyag rgya dang //tshe ling dang ni rnga dag dang //rdo rje dang ni rin chen snod//mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'i tshogs gzhan//de bzhin sangs rgyas
240a1(rgyud): gzugs brnyan dang //me long dang ni rlud yab dang //rdo rje sor ba'i sprin dang bcas//de bzhin mig gi phyag rgya dang //rdo rje 'bar ba khaT+wA~M ga/thod pa
240a2(rgyud): khams phor de bzhin//dum ru tshon dang ni snying rje dang //shi chen+da dang ni de bzhin te//rnon po meda' dang de bzhin 'dren//tshong dang chu dang dri byizhin te//lcug mA rlung gis
240a3(rgyud): bskyod pa dang //ras dang de bzhin me dang ni//rdo rje khro bo rgyal po'i dpal//gdug pa thams cad za ba yi//mtshan ma'i phyag rgya grub pa'i tshogs//rnal 'byor dngos
240a4(rgyud): grub rab sgrub pa'o//pad+mo sna tshogs dmar po dang //ljang ku de bzhin dkar po dang //mthing ka ser po le rgan dag/pad+mo mtshan mchog rnam pa bdun//pad+ma sbyang
240a5(rgyud): po bud med chu//de bzhin chos kyi 'khor lo dang //gsel shing dpal bskyed rdo rje dag/pad+mo mtshan ma'i tshogs gzhano//gzhu dang mda'i dang ral gri dang //de bo shin
240a6(rgyud): duni 'bar ba'i me//dbang bsgyur gter dang rgyal mtshan dag/mchod pa'i mtsho ni ma bsdus pa'o//de bzhin sna tshogs pad+mo dang //rdo rje rgyu gram de bzhin te//mtsham/
240a7(rgyud): ma'i phyag rgya grub pa yis//rgyal srid thams cad 'joms pa ste//sangs rgyas thams cad la sogs pa//dngos po brta ni g.yo ma lus kun//rang 'byung rnams skye
240b1(rgyud): mtshon ma'i rgyu//na mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'o//de skad bcom ldan de bzhin gshogs//rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyis gsungs//sangs rgyas thams cad
240b2(rgyud): dang mnyam par sbyor ba//mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i bde ba'i mchog las dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes pa'i rtog pa ste bdun pa'o///de nas gzhan
240b3(rgyud): dge bshad pa ni//rdo rje sems dpa' de bal gyi lha'i//rnam pa kun tu sna tshogs mchog/mchod pa thams cad rnam sprul pa'o//lhag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis
240b4(rgyud): dgu gis//mdzub mo mthe'u chung mdzes par bsgyur//dpal ldan g.yon pA 'gying ba'i thabs//g.yas pa ba drani gsuM mu du bya//srid zhur bcas pa'i stag pa'i
240b5(rgyud): mchog/bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa pal//'dzum dang bces pa'i mig gi swA bA l+yA//bsam pa ga yos pa'i phyug rgyu'o//sangs rgyas rdo rje pad+mo 'dzin/rdorje
240b6(rgyud): nyi ma khams gsum pa yi//skad cig gis kyang phyag byed na//khengs pa gzhan lta ci dge smros//drug po dbang po nye dbang bcus//nyi zla ga shi ni rje tshangs par bcas/
240b7(rgyud): btud de rab tu phyag 'tshal nas//las rnams thams cad byed par 'gyur//rdo rje dpal gyi thal mo bsgyur//bsam pa g.yos pas phyag byas pa'i//sangs rgyas
241a1(rgyud): gas san//sa smras pa no /sa/snron ma gan sa//rgyu nas su sma na//

241a3(rgyud): bzhin//rgyas pa btud pa'i hU~MgaH //sa pa yon ldag thams cad ni//sal la ti phyun byug/nga kA Sh+ma dang smyi ga tsugatu//dz+wa la mi s+t+rai
241a4(rgyud): ldan rje'i rjing du'i zlags//dzum pa'i mig gis phyug byas nas//myas gsum pa 'od phyug/byi sa nas// d+hi b+hAn na
241a5(rgyud): rmyil ba'i phyi nas pa //ra gyi sbyin rnam su d+hi //na na du'i rnam snyan//dedog sems pa'o//rang ga ni mas

241a7(rgyud): 'bri pa g.yas gra mi ni gnyis dag gis//mdzum mo ma chung mdzes pasgyur to//g.yon pa'i mdzub mi ma chu bcang //grams pa byeng dru gsum pa g+sa
241b1(rgyud): rnams bta banan//s+yA sa m+b+ha kun dang sogs pa dang //das grub tsun pa mazlog sum/smrang / chen po'i grub par tsun+tu//sangs rgyas rnams cad da ts+tsha byu/
241b2(rgyud): yisprul ba bzang ba zhes bya 'i'i //bsnyem pa'i don chen por bcas pa yi//skye ba de nyid ba tigan sa//'gram du'i phyogs yongs bsgyur nas//skye ba'i mtsha
241b3(rgyud): bzhag par bya//thams cad 'bebs pa'i gang pyad pas//ga byas de nas phab nas//skal bzung hUM zhes bya ba'i glus//mchod po thaMd dbul ba bya//stang sa rgyas thams cad
241b4(rgyud): da mnyam pUr sgyu byasgral bzang po de brgyan bris byu ba'i phyug rgyu'o//'gu pa gr-ilas g.yon gnyis dog gis//mdzub sgo mtha'u che mdzes bsgyur ba'i//rdo rjerdul mo
241b5(rgyud): no//de bzhin ga yon du bsgyur shA gyi/de ni myong pos btog gonas//spyi bo'i ma m+b+ha smra bzhig par ste//rnal ba nus bya ba'is// tshad parjid dkyil ba /
241b6(rgyud): dad mardo rje thal ma sbyan pa mi rjes smin tshad bye'o//rig pa galas gi srin po nyis dag giste/rjen mo maH dung mdzes pasgyu hU~M//rdo rje rjel mo sbyin du dgrol/
241b7(rgyud): mchod pa'i gtu rimakun gyi tshul//dur khrod tshwa lugs gar byed pas//phyag rgya 'di yis gar byed cing //rnaM la bzang rdo rje drag pa dgod//mchi pa thams cad
242a1(rgyud): bar bya//dpal rdo rje he ruka'i thod pa'i thal m+bo ste//brjod pa'i gtor ma thams cad kyi tshiga'o//lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gis//mdzub mo mthe'u chung
242a2(rgyud): mdzes bsgyur te//g.yas g.yon thal mo brdegs pa yis//mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya//dpal pad+mo gar gyi dbang phyug gi thal mo'o//lag pa g.yas g.yin
242a3(rgyud): gnyis dag gis//mdzub mo mthe'u chung mdzes bsgyur te//rdo rje rin chen thal sbyar nas//mchod pa thaMd dbul bar bya//re ba thams cad yongasu rdzogs par byed dpal rje
242a4(rgyud): d+he rin chen zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//gyen du 'thor zhing thur du 'bebs//bskor zhing de bzhin nyug pa dang //me tog bdug pa mar mchog/dri yI mchod pa 'byung ba'o//gang ba'ang
242a5(rgyud): 'on te stong pa'ang rung //yang na ci 'byor pa yis kyang //dam tshig mnyam par sgrub pa yis//mchod pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur//phyag rgya 'di rnams bcings nas ni//sangs
242a6(rgyud): rgyas thams cad mchod par 'gyur//dngos grub dbang phyug grub pas kyang //kun gyi bdag nyid mchod par 'gyur//chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa//na mkha' dbyings kyi mthas
242a7(rgyud): klas pa'i//rang 'byung rnams kyi mchod pa kun//gang dag de yis ma byas shing //spel bar yang ni ma gyur pa'o//rlabs chen dam pa gang yang med//sangs rgyas tha~Md mnyam sbyor ba/
242b1(rgyud): sbyor ba'i dbang phyug bde chen dang //dngos grub las dang bde ba dag/'dri yis mi 'grub gang yang med//mchod pa rab 'byam grub pa rnams//ma lus lus med 'grub chen dpal//bcom ldan
242b2(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpas gsungs//sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las mchod pa bde dang mnyam par sbyar ba dpal skal pa bzang po dam tshig gi
242b3(rgyud): rtog pa ste brgyad pa'o////de nas gzhan yang bshad pa ni//rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha'i//kun tu sna tshogs mchog rnams kyi//phyag rgya thams cad rnam sprul pa'o//sems dpa' spangs
242b4(rgyud): rgyas kun gyi dngos//rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na//thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs//bde ba tha~Md rnam dag phyir//rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i
242b5(rgyud): mchog/zla ba nye star rtse de mar sku//'dod chags kun la chags pa'i phyir//chags pa chen po bcom ldan 'das//dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya 'di//dmar po sna tshogs 'bar ba'i
242b6(rgyud): 'od//khams gsum dag na rin chen gzhan//sangs rgyas rin chen lta bu med//sangs rgyas kun gyi rin chen che//dbu rgyan can ni bde ba'i mchog/gzhan gyi nor min mi 'phrogs pa//
242b7(rgyud): lha yo chu 'dis dag pa ste//mthu dang ngo bo nyid dag dang //rang bzhin gyis ni de 'gru bo//thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan dang //sangs rgyas gtsug gi nor bu can//kun nas nyon mongs 'jig
243a1(rgyud): mam mamam tshams sam thams mthasa.amathasamamamamasamam mam ma yamasas mam ma' mams la yang mams sa lam mal mam mamal yam ma
243a2(rgyud): / / rgyun sa gas phyug/ rnams 'a / nga dus pa sa//n+tu tshugasanas saso// gro ban+d+han/
243a3(rgyud): //rangs rgyas rje rnam ldan//nyimakhyim sa ga su mi pa//rtswa ng+gA barmongs pas dbangs nis ni//skyes rnams kun la hU~Md ba byed //rgyug N+DI 'di yis bya du /
243a4(rgyud): do ba bzhin g+h+ri ng+ge lding // mi smin ma n+tog rlupa la da ldan//rdo rjemams Sh+Ta rlu hU~M smra/A dz+ha kA dge' ba t+yI la 'i ba la dzu
243a5(rgyud): dpe'i bde pa'i mi tshig sti zhes bya'i mchog gi phyugar+b+he // ma sbyi dag ldan gyi na yi// ba ni rli/ga byud cing //sems dpa'i skye bu nga phyi /
243a6(rgyud): dbyed rnams tha rab tu 'dzums//dpal rdon sems pa'i skyel mo klo //zla ba'i khwa dag 'dzum pa'i nal//dngos grub mas nang dag pa dang //padi po'i 'dring nags
243a7(rgyud): dag phyir//bad+ma yi dbyas ni dmar la dkur//phyag mchog lam sngon po 'ang //de bzhin bde ba'i dbang phyug dang //bde bar reg pa'i dbang phyug pas//dkar zhing ser ba'i ba
243a8(rgyud): dang ldan// rjes sna tshogs kha dog mchog/'bar ba tshogs le khrigs pa'i 'od//d+mon tshigs la gnas pa//thams cad dag par rab tu gnas//sangs rgyas badz+ra
243b1(rgyud): sogs mchog/ngan rjen sna tshogs rgyun dang gos//sang sa rgyas thams cad 'dus pa yin//mi mdod pa sngogs rgyun pa btsun//bya ba dang ni bzlog pa dang //'phrog pa dag kyang lhag par mdzad//
243b2(rgyud): bdagal 'byu pa'i rgyu rgyasaso//yin lag cid 'phrog par 'thung//ga tu 'di mu gi sbyin no//'dod pa ba ni nying lding //dang lce ldan 'ad pa kun me da //na sems
243b3(rgyud): dan+d+ha pa tu 'brug//mchog dga' ba la dag ts+tsha na so yi mad byed pa'i rim po ni sa bya ba'i phyug d+hA'o//dem pa ste tshogs mi cheg ga ste//bdi ba'i
243b4(rgyud): pa'i gang byu pas//bdag le 'khyud pa'i phyog rgya mchog/dbus kyi lce mchog chen po yi//phyag rgya 'ad yis rnal 'byung ba//'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong ldang //byede chen
243b5(rgyud): dbang phyu/dpa la dang ldan//rdo rje sems dpa'i rab tu 'grug/mi chog tu dga' la rab sbyong go//skal ba dbang po dpal rdo rje sems dpaSh+Ti dam tshig bde ba'i mchog
243b6(rgyud): del b+hu ba'i smye//sa~M y-i na su~M //dzA dz+r-i Sh+ThA na ga bzung ste//bdeg lce khyung ba'i rgyun ni//pad ba rgyas
243b7(rgyud): zas mchog/phyog rgya 'dri yis btab na ni//'dod pa bzhin du 'gro //rnal 'byor ma gyi nga d+h+r-ig Na mi// rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grug//mchog tu
244a1(rgyud): rab tu sbyor ba skal pa bzang po dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor bye ba'i mchog rol pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi kham por 'grub//bdug
244a2(rgyud): la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya yi//rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba//dbus kyi lha mchog chen po'o//phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa//'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding //dpal ldan
244a3(rgyud): dang gzhon 'grub po//rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub mchog tu dga' ba la rab tu sbyor bskal pa bzong po dpal rdo rje tshe bo ba'i mchog rol pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//de la sogs
244a4(rgyud): pa mtha' yas mchog/chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa//na mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i//rang 'byung phyag rgya sna tshogs rnams//na mkha' sngon gyi skabs na dpal//
244a5(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' la gnas te//grub pa'i dbang phyug rab grub pas//thams cad bdag nyid 'bab 'grub 'gyur//sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i//mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde
244a6(rgyud): ba'i mchog gi rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'i tshogaso//gtsug lag ji lta'i rjes 'thun pa'i//dpal rdzogs rgya chen gar dag gis//mda' bzhi yongasu 'phangs na ni//bdud bzhi dag las
244a7(rgyud): rgyal bar 'gyur//tshangs po chen po'i mgo dpal rdo rje mda' zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//rkang pa 'dog cing phab pa dang //gshibs te chongs pa'i stabs dag gis//'khor lo'i phyed
244b1(rgyud): rna rgyud nas no//khanas gsam dag las chom par /du la rlon ma du zlos b+hA ts+tsha b+h+ya N+Dis+ho/byung dang na brjon pa dang //gas pa dag khyad pa dang //rtswa rdzogs smra/
244b2(rgyud): gir byed cing //khams bskum dag ni blta bar bya//dang la rdo rje gar gyi dbang phyug zhes bya ba'i kAd+hA'o//lcug ma gang yang rung bzung nas//bdag lo 'khyud pa'i phyag rgyu yis//nga
244b3(rgyud): me coms cad nadu nas ni//dad bas nis shing ltang rtag tu 'grug//dab su rdo rje dod pa'i mozhes bya'i phyug rgyu'o//ltung ba t+pU sa p+ta wA s+yA sa//dge pa dngong po na
244b4(rgyud): bcas//hrIn ga shin rje tshangs pa 'i//'jig rten gsum dag dngas par byed//dpe la rdo na d+ha ga nas bya ba'i ga d+ha'o//m+b+ha mi myung ba'i dzub po yis//drug po dang bo nyid du
244b5(rgyud): bcas//nyin gA shin rje tshangs bcas pa'i//khams gsum yang ni rjud par pyod//dpal rdo rje phag mo zhes bya ba'i phyog rgya'o//mige tshogs zheni par lta ba yis//drage po dab blon
244b6(rgyud): dbang bcas//TIthug shin rje tsha ga 'jig rten gsum yang ni ther byed //dpel rdo rje rten ti//zhes bya ba phyag rgya'o//rnams cid bdag nyid myu sa pa y-i 'i//drug po dang ngo
244b7(rgyud): de // ni shin sa ga pa phyi / la do don kyi din nyid khoms gsus 'i zhes bya phyig rgyu/ ldan pa'i tshu ldan/
245a1(rgyud): cing //de ltar 'babs pa'i gar byed pas//chungs dang nye dbang drag par bcas//'gro ba gsum dgu dbang du byed//dngul rdo rje gling bu'i dpung byed shes bya ba'i bya//
245a2(rgyud): rgya'o//pi bang len pa'i tshul ston cing //ji ltar babs pa'i gar byed pas//las rnams grub par rab 'byam dang //dngos grub mo lus myur du 'grub//dpal rdo rje pi dang ba ba
245a3(rgyud): rmongs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//cang ti'u tshul ston rnal 'byor pa//ji ltar babs pa'i gar byed pas//rims dang gdon dang dug zhen pa'i//sdug bsngal thams cad myur
245a4(rgyud): du sel//dpal rdo rje cong tre'u sdug bsngal thams cad sil bar byed pa zhes bya bya'i phyag rgya'o//rdo rje'i tshul ston rnal 'byor pa//ji ltar babs pa'i gar byed pa//gnas gsum
245a5(rgyud): dag ni ma lus pa//skad cig tsam gyis 'bebs par byed//dpal rdo rje rdza rngas myos par byed pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//phyag rgya gar gyi mchod pa yis//mchod pa thams cad
245a6(rgyud): byas nas ni//rang byung gar gyi mchod pa rnams//ma lus lus pa med par 'grub//rims dang dug dang dbyig dug byed//'phra men gdon gyi gnod pa rnams//bskor ba'i gar
245a7(rgyud): rnams sna tshogs kyis//skad cig tsam gyis zhi bar 'gyur//drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas//nyi zla ga shin rje tshangs bcas pa'i//rgyas btab rmongs byas zos pa dag/skad
245b1(rgyud): cig tsam gyis 'tsho bar byed//de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa'i//nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa//rang byung lha mo phyag rgya rnams//nam mkha'
245b2(rgyud): kun gyi skabs na dpal//rdo rje sems dpa' la gnas te//dngos grub dbang phyug rab grub pas//thams cad bdag nyid babs par 'gyur//sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba//mkha' 'gro/
245b3(rgyud): sgyu ma bde mchog gis//rab tu grub pa'i glu rnams kyis//bla med pa yi dngos grub 'thob//de nas phyag rgya ye shes 'di//dpal ldan rdo rje mchog gi glu//las rnams thams cad rab grub cing //
245b4(rgyud): srid pa shin tu sgrub pa ni//rdo rje sems dpa'i bde chen skal bzang dpal khyod la bdag la bsgrubs la rtogs par mdzad du gsol/kye de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag nyid bde ba mkha' 'gro
245b5(rgyud): sgyu ma sna tshogs bde ba'i mchog/'gro ba'i rgyud rnams rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul mchog sgrub pa bdag la grub par mdzad du gsol/a la la la ho//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sbyor ba rnam pa sna tshogs
245b6(rgyud): gar rnams bstan du gsol/dzaHhUM baM ho//kye bde mchog bde bas zung la rnam par sprul//hUM snang bar mdzad du gsol//a li la lA ho//de bzhin gshegs kun sna tshogs mkha' 'gro sgyu mas slob ma
245b7(rgyud): gzung du gsol/sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba//mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/kun tu kun nas thams cad du//'di nyid kyis ni myur du 'grub//sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par
246a1(rgyud): sbyor ba//mkha' 'gro ma'i rnal 'byor kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya zhes pa'o//rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das//rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/thar
246a2(rgyud): pa thams cad rnam dag phyir//sangs rgyas phyag rgya dpal du gnas//'dod dam rnam par dag pa'i phyir//btso mo gser gyi khwa doge bzhin//chags med la sogs cha ma byin dkar zhing sna
246a3(rgyud): tshogs gsal ba'i mdangs//chas kyi rgyal srid rab bsgrubs pas//ran chen chos las lhag pa med//de bas theg chen byang chub sems//rgyal ba rdo rje rin chen can//g.yas pa'i mthe bong grub
246a4(rgyud): mo gnyis//g.yon pa'i khu tshur bcangs pa yi//sor mo kun la reg pa ni//rtsa ba'i phyag rgya yin par grags//'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//shes rab pha rol phyin gsal yin//byang
246a5(rgyud): /chub sems chen skye ba dang //chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ste//phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni//shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i tshul//na mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas par//rab tu bsgrags par
246a6(rgyud): 'gyur ba yin//byang chub sems chen bskyed pa dang //chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ste//sangs rgyas nyid du rig par bya//mchog tu rtag pa'i sangs rgyas so//gang gis ldan pa 'di mthong zhing //
246a7(rgyud): rnam pa kun tu mchod byed pa//de yi sangs rgyas rtag pa'i mchog/mthong zhing mchod pa byed par 'gyur/sems ni bskyed ma thag tu yang //chos kyi 'khor lo legs par bskor//dpal
246b1(rgyud): ngamachog ces bya ba'i phyag d+ha'o//dmas pa'i yan lag gnon pa yis//g.yon pa'i yan lagakun las N+Dal//sems dpa' sbyor mo nyung bcas nas//bdud rnams thams cad rab tu 'a
246b2(rgyud): dpal rdo rje sems dpa' sprul gyi klung ngo // du khu chur bcangs nas su//lag pa g.yon pas bab pa ni//sangs rgyas kun thongangs grub rnams//mA lus lus pa med par 'grub//de /
246b3(rgyud): dpal ldan he ru kir//rdo rje khu tshur chen po dgeb/dpa' ba blod pa'i dngos grub rnams//ma lus lus pa med par 'grub//pad+mo'i bud med khu chur ni//de bzhin g.yon pas bkab na yang /
246b4(rgyud): byang chub skyong rab 'grub pa rnams//ma lus lus pa med par 'grub//rin chen 'dzin pa'i khu tshur yang //lag pa g.yon pas bkab na ni//sangs rgyas nor kun dngos grub pa//ma
246b5(rgyud): lus lus pa med par 'grub//sangs rgyas khu tshur brdungs nas su//lag pa g.yon pas bkab na ni//sangs rgyas kun gyi tshe 'grub pa//ma lus lus pa med par 'grub//bud med
246b6(rgyud): phyag rgya bcings nas su//lag pa g.yon pas bkab na ni//dngos grub thams cad myur 'grub pa//ma lus lus pa med par 'grub//rta gdod dpal gyi khu tshur yang //lag pa g.yon
246b7(rgyud): pas bkab na ni/thams cad 'gugs par rab grub pa//ma lus lus pa med pa 'brub//dpal grub sbyin gyi khu tshur yang /lag pa g.yon pas bka ba na ni//snang ba thams
247a1(rgyud): /cad rab grub pa//ma lus pa med par 'grub/dang po sangs rgyas kun blod pa//gnyis pa de bzhin dpa' bo yin//gsum pa kun tu bzang po'i'o//bzhi pa mi zad/
247a2(rgyud): snod yin no//sangs rgyas yan lag kun ldan dpal//de bzhin zhil bzang gzungs ma yin//sprin chen mo ni bdud pa ste//brgyad pa na mkha'i spyan yin no//gzungs ma thams cad kyi
247a3(rgyud): phyag rgya'o//phyag rgya shes pa 'di dag gi/sangs rgyas sprul pa'i glu mchog ni//'grub par 'gyur ba byed pa'i mchog/las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa//slong bar byed pa bstan
247a4(rgyud): /sgrub pa//de bzhin sna tshogs rgyas pa dag/sha rdza'i dbyangs kyi glu blangs nas//da ba ta yi glu blang ngo //'jig rten khams mang rdul phran grangs snyed khyab par 'phros pa yi//rgyal ba'i
247a5(rgyud): doni rnams rab tu phra bi'i rdul gyi grangs snyed pa//sprul pa'i sku rnams phra ba'i rdul gyi grangs steng ni//srid pa bde chen de bzhin gshegs kun rnams 'phrul sna tshogs kyis//rdul bran
247a6(rgyud): grangs snyed de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par sprul pa mdzod haM//dpal rnam par snang mdzad sbyor ba a la la la ho//de ring grub par mdzod//glu 'di dag ni blings pa yis//na mkha'
247a7(rgyud): thams cid mnyam sbyor ba//mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/grub par 'gyur ba gdon mi za//de nas bud med bzhi rnams dang //rang gi yid dag gsang ba yis//cho ga rgyas pa'i
247b1(rgyud): tshul bzhin du//mye tog la sogs mchod pa bya//de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya zhes pa'o//rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das//rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs//dam tshig lnga snang rnam
247b2(rgyud): skyeng phyir//dur khrod dpal gyi phyag rgyar gsol//shin tu gdugs cing gtum po la//zhi bar phan par mi 'gyur te//shes rab thabs kyis rnal 'byor gyis//rnal 'byor bde mchog dam
247b3(rgyud): por 'gyur//sangs rgyas khros byung khro bo ni//thal bar 'jig pa mchog yin te//sems dpa' sngon po 'bar ba rtun//'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor dmar po snang //gzhan gyis ma yin mi 'phrog/
247b4(rgyud): pa//lha rdzas nu yis dgang ba ste//'di ni rang bzhin nyid dge dang //mthu dang ngo bo nyid kyis 'grub//gos chen po dang glugs pa che//sha chen po dang sbrang rtsi che//dur khrod kun gyi 'byung po/
247b5(rgyud): yi//phyag rgya dpal ldan dbang phyug mchog/shin du khro gdug gtum pa yi//sems can khams rnams rnam sbyang phyir//'di ni dpal ldan he ru ki'i//rdo rje rgyal nan dbang phyug mchog/
