247b6(rgyud): thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan dang //sangs rgyas gtsug gi nor bu dag/rgyal srid thams cad rab sgrub pa//mu lus lus pa med pa 'grub//rdo rje kha T+wAM rdo rje bcas//dril bu dkrol ba'i sgrar
247b7(rgyud): bcas pa//dpal ldan he ru ka babs pa'o//phyag rgya sna tshogs rnam sprul bas//sangs rgyas rdo rje pad mo 'dzin//rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pa//rgyas btab rmongs byas de zos nas//
248a1(rgyud): thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed//dpal rdo rje he ru ka rdo rje 'bab pa rnam par 'phrul pa pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//se ra la kha yi tshul dag tu//
248a2(rgyud): kha T+wAM ga la rgyab rten byas//lag pa g.yon na thod pa thogs//g.yas pa ba ngan gsum par byas//na mkha'i phyag rgyas rnal 'byor pa//na mkha' kun tu 'gro bar 'gyur//bud med la sogs
248a3(rgyud): rin chen mchog/dngos po thams cad na mkha' las 'byin//phyag rgya 'di yis yongs btab nas//bde bar lhag pa'i tshul ston pas//na mkha' las ni kun lhags te//bdag gi spyong
248a4(rgyud): par de spyod do//drag po dbang po nye dbang btsas//nyi zla mkha' 'gro mi bzang tshogs//mkha' las sgyu ma kun blugs nas//lus pa med pa rnyid za'o//na mkha' thams cad mnyam sbyor bo//
248a5(rgyud): skal ba bzang po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i byed pa'i mchog ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//g.yas dang g.yon pa'i sbyor ba yis//bde bar 'bab pa'i gar byed pas//skyil mo krung ni phyed bcas
248a6(rgyud): /rkang pa rang gri brla bsdams na/ drag po dbang po'i dbyung bcos//nyi zlog shin rje tshangs bcas pa//rgyos btab rmongs byas bslangs nas so//gang dag byed cing de za'o//de nyid
248a7(rgyud): kyi ni sbyor ba yis//de nas bde bar brla bsdams pas//legs par bsdams te phyir btags nas//rab tu bkram ste btung bar bya/sgyu ma de dag nyid kyis ni//de nas bla phrag bskyo
248b1(rgyud): pa yis//skal bzang lha dang mi rnams kyi//bud med kun la de spyod do//bde bar reg pa thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba skal ba bzang po dpal rdo rje drag po gnas pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//
248b2(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa//sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor du//dpal ldan he ru ka babs pa'i//phyag rgya sna tshogs gnas pa'o//zhi dang drag po rmongs pa'i mchog/dga'
248b3(rgyud): ba'i gar byed 'gyur bar bcas//shi ba ldang ba'i sbyor ba yis//bde ba'i phyag rgya rab tu gnas//zhi dang drag po rmongs byed dang //gyen du 'bugs 'byin gar byed lus//lta ba'i phyag rgya grub pa'i
248b4(rgyud): mchog/gsang ba'i sbyor ba bde mchog gis//me tog bdug pa'i sbyor ba mchog/chang dang chu dang lcug ma dang //ras dang me gtong grub pa yas//khyed par du ni rgyas 'debs so//rtse gcig
248b5(rgyud): mnyam par sbyor ba yis//sbyor ba'i gnyer ba bde ba spyan//mngon par gtor zhing se gol rdob//du laM pus gyen du 'bugs 'byin pas//g.yon du lta zhing lag pas drangs//'o byed 'khyud pa
248b6(rgyud): de bzhin te//gAr byed rab tu rmongs pa dang //za dang gsang ba'i lus rnams dang //tsAngs pa chen po'i mgo dang ni//de bzhin 'jig rten gsum las rgal//de bzhin gzhan las 'dren
248b7(rgyud): pa dang //rang gi phyog rgya'i tshulnga dang //dur khrod dag gi gar byed dang //de bzhin rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang //rab tu 'jigs par sreg pa'i mi//las kyi phyag rlab tu gnas//dang po
249a1(rgyud): /rgyas 'a nas ma san//na ma yi gnas pa'o// snum+bu pa smin na rmongs byed pa'o//de ban gni pa d+mag d+hA ma'o//lbu bgud d+hA sar+b+ba/
249a2(rgyud): drug pa gsong ma'i yin par bshad//bdun pa zab mo yin+da//brgyad bya las kyi phyog rgya yin//de nas blo rgyu 'di sprin gyi//phyug N+DI'i len rnams the na med//phyag
249a3(rgyud): bdag nyid kun 'joms pa//khyad par du ni bai shwad par bya//dpal sngon rdo rje pad ma slong //gang dge byed cing byos na ni//rgyas btib rmongs byas zos pa dang //thal bar gyung
249a4(rgyud): pa'ang 'tsho bar byed//de nas phyag rgya shes bya 'di//dpal ldan rdo rje sbyor ba'i glu//las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa//khyad par du ni bshad par bya//gzigs pa rnam pas
249a5(rgyud): tshogs 'gyur ba'i rgyus thob lo//rnam pa sna tshogasa'i byed la khyud pas rmongs mdzad de//rnam pa sna tshogs bde ba'i mchod skyon kun gsal ba//rnam pa sna tshogs byed mchog
249a6(rgyud): mnan+ta stan du gsol//rgyus bta ba rmongs byas mngom su gsol//byed mchog da mchir bde ba zhugs//smr-is la lA l-i hi steng bar mdzod//rnal 'byir byed mchog bla mas sprul
249a7(rgyud): dam tshig dge la 'jug tu gsol//nyon mongs kun las rgyal bar mdzod//ma lus pa dag bsnams du gsil//nyon mongs thams cad gsal bar mdzod//glu 'di dag
249b1(rgyud): ni blangs pa yis//rdo rje thams cad mnyam sbyos//mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur//dpal he ru ka'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya zhes pa'o//rnal 'byor de nyid bcom
249b2(rgyud): ldan 'das//rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs//'dod chags thams cad rnam dag phyir//pad mo phyag rgya dpal du gnas//mi 'gyur dam pa grub pa'i phyir//shel sgang shin tu
249b3(rgyud): dge ba 'dra//'dod chags thams cad gsal ba'i phyir//'bar ba sna tshogs 'khrigs pa'i 'odra//sangs rgyas tshe ni rin chen spras//gos dang sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan//sangs rgyas
249b4(rgyud): thams cad 'dus pa yis//bde ba can bzhin dam par 'gyur//gari thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis//yongs su bskur zhing gar byas pas//pad+mo'i mtshan mchog pad+mor bcas//phyag ni bad+ma
249b5(rgyud): rnams 'khor lo bskor//sangs rgyas rdo rje pad+mo 'dzin//rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pa//pad+mo sgyu mas rnam sbyangs nas//sangs rgyas byang chub sgrub par mdzad//'dul ba'i thabs ni sna tshogs pa'o//
249b6(rgyud): skal pa bzang po dpa la pad+mo gar gyi dbang phyug ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//g.yas dang g.yon pa'i sbyor ba yis//skyil mo krung ni phye mar gnas//rgyal po'i skyil mo krung bcas na//sdug bsngal
249b7(rgyud): thams cad sel bar byed//dpal pad+mo rgyal po gnas pa gos bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//bsnyems po'i lag pa g.yon pa yis//pad+mo dmar po tsa bder bzung //rang gi snying kar 'dren pa'i tshul//
250a1(rgyud): pad+ma 'dub ma kha 'byed pa'o//snyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis//pad+mo sngon po ci bder bzung //rang gi snying khar 'dren tshul gyis//bud med phyag rgya bcing
250a2(rgyud): bar bya//snyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis//pad+mo dkar po ci bder bzung //'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcings nas ni//chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor//snyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis/
250a3(rgyud): pad+mo mthing kha ci bder bzung //g.yas pas rab tu gir byed pa//dpal gyi phyag rgya ba dan gsum//sems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis//pad+mo ser po ci ba der bzung //g.yas pa rab tu gang
250a4(rgyud): byed pas//chu srin tshul du bsgreng bar bya//snyems pa'i lag pa g.yon po yis//pad+mo leb rgan mchog bzung ste//rang gi snying kar 'dre ni tshul gyis//rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya//
250a5(rgyud): rnam par gzigs pa'i rnam dag dpal//sgrol ma'i byang chub mchog yin no//rgya chen ma yi 'khor lo bskor//khro gnyer ma ni phyag rgya'i lan//pad+mo gnas pa'i dpal tshon yin//'dod
250a6(rgyud): ba'i dbang mo'i 'gro ba gsum//dpal pad+ma'i rgyal po'i rig pa'i lha mo chen mo rnamaso//de nas phyag rgya shes pa 'di//pad+mo rgyal po dpal gyi glu//las rnams thams cad rab
250a7(rgyud): sgrub pa//khyad par du ni bshad par bya//de bzhin gshegs pa kun la sogs pa'i gzugs mchog sna tshogs 'dzin//sems can rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul mchog dngos grub mchog/
250b1(rgyud): mnga' ba//kyi sems dpa' pad+mo dga' mchog sgyu ma'i dka' ba bstan du gsol//a la lal ho//kye gang dbyung bar dga' dga' ba 'igang myongod no//sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin padag tshangs pa/
250b2(rgyud): 'jug sel dbang phyug bdag/nyi zla bdag lags a la la la ho//pad+me snum sna tshogs 'dul mdzad dag pa'i tshul gyis gar mdzad pa//pad+mo dam tshig dbang phyug sangs rgyas gar rnams
250b3(rgyud): mdzad du gsol//'dod chags rnam par sbyong ba thams cad dadung rnam par skyong sa//pad+mo 'dzin pa de yi spyan sngar gang mkhan gar mdzod cig/glu 'di dag ni blangs pa yis//sna tshogs pad+mo mnyam
250b4(rgyud): sbyor ba//mkha' 'gro sgyum bde ba'i mchog/gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur//dpal pad+mo gar gyi dbang phyug gi phyag rgya'o//rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das//rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin
250b5(rgyud): gshegs//nor mchog rnam par sbyang ba'i phyir//dringal ldan nyi ma phyag rgya gnas//na mkha'i snying po thams cad phyogs//rer ba thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa//bud med la sogs rin chen ma
250b6(rgyud): rin chen thams cad mkha' las 'babs//shin tu gdug cing gtum mo la//ni bas phan par mi 'gyur te//shes rab thabs kyi nyi ma ni//dam pa'i don du drug por gyur//drag pos 'dul
250b7(rgyud): ba'i 'jig rten rnams//drag po nyid kyis sgrub par byed//nyi ma'i gzugs dang spyod lam dang //tshul dang gzi brjid chen pos ston//rdo rje gzhu dang mda' mchog dag/shin tu legs par
251a1(rgyud): 'gangs pa ste//mdangs gsal 'dzum dang bcas pa'i spyad//g.yon pa byed cing gyen du 'dog/drag po dbang po gang dbang banas//nyi zla ga shin rngu tshangs bcas
251a2(rgyud): bya'i//'jig rten gsum po ma lus pas//drag shul nyid kyis 'dul bar mdzad//rnyong la khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//rdo rje dus mo gnyis bcings te/
251a3(rgyud): rdo rje skyil mo krung banas nas//bdag ni stan la 'dug nas ni//bgegs rnams thams cad gzhig par bya//dpal rdo rje skyil mo krung ngo //dbang bskur ba dang gter dag dang //rgyal ma
251a4(rgyud): mchog ldan mchod pa che//de lta'i tshul dag ston pa rje//rang kyi don rnams 'grub pa'o//de nas phyag rgya shes pa 'di//rgyal po sgrim mchog gi hU~M//las rnams thams cad dang
251a5(rgyud): bsgrub pa//khyad par du ni ba shad par bya//khams gsum kun gyi rgyal srid kyi tshigs mchog gi nor ldan pas//mdzul dum g.yul byed rnam mang khyed pang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba/
251a6(rgyud): rnami pa sna tshogs mang la dum rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan can//rdo d+hA ni mi rgyal po ba mchog sgra me bstan du gsol//sems can b+hi la byang chub mchog sbyin sna tshogs char
251a7(rgyud): 'bebs pa//bdag gi ri ba kun sgru babyur du ston//a la la la ho//mi zad gting gyi dbang bsrung khri dbang bden la sbrul du gsol//khyad pong rin chen 'di gi thams cad bud med
251b1(rgyud): don chen rnams kyi ra//don tshun tshogs kun nadun blad mod don chen gtsug pu mchog/bud med don chen dag pa dam pa'i don du thams cad 'gro//klu 'di drug no byungs pa yis//d+ham /
251b2(rgyud): thams cad mnyam sbyor ba//mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur//dpal rdo rje nyi ma'i khyeg rgyu zhes pa'o//rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das/
251b3(rgyud): sems dpa' dri banon gshegs//drag shol sbyor bas rnal 'byor dpal//d+hA yi phyog d+hArab tu gnas//thams cad dag pad mos pa yi//sdig mdo stobs kyis ngo 'bon du//rab tu gan
251b4(rgyud): pa'i rtsal dag gis//'jig rten thams cad ra 'joms//'dod rtags can lo g.yom par ston//gdug pa rnams la gdug par ston//zhi ba rnams la ni ba 'gyur//drag hU~M
251b5(rgyud): dz+nyAn la dgu shul spyod//zhalta bani la ga ga pa//nabs byan pa la smin pa pa k+ki/d+ha mgrin rgyam po ldan po ste//de phyug dpe pa grub par 'gyur//g.yon pa'i mdzub sa
251b6(rgyud): gyis//dpal ldan pad+d+ho sna tshogs 'dzin//rdo rje bcas shing slong bsgrug//g.yas pa byangan gsum par bya//phyug rgyu 'di gyis btab na rI//shin tu ltung bar gyur pa yang //de ma pan/
251b7(rgyud): kun bslang nas//ljang ba thams cad rab tu 'grub//thams cad dag pa mnyam par sbyor bskal pa bzang po dpol rdo rje slong ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//g.yas dang g.yon par sbyong ba'i
252a1(rgyud): pa dran pa nul sanas//khro ba'i skyil ma krung smrasate//'jig rten rnams dbar+b+ha b+hU sh+le//dpal rdo rje khro bo gnas bya'o//du nas phyug
252a2(rgyud): shes pa 'di'i//rta mchog dpol dang ldan pa'i glu//las rnams thams cod rab sgrub pa//khyad par du ni bshad par bya//mos byed stong pas lhag par bde ba 'dod pa'i gzugs ston
252a3(rgyud): pa//'dul ba'i dbang gis gshin rje stong pas lhag par rab tu 'jigs//zhi ba'i skur yang tshangs pa stong pas shin tu lhag par ston//dkyil 'khor kun gyi mchog tu de bzhin
252a4(rgyud): gshegs kun 'grub par mdzod//thams cad rnam par dag pas ngo 'thon stobs kyis gnon pas gnon//hi he he he he/dbang phyug thams cad rab shig rab tu shig/rab kyi rtsal
252a5(rgyud): gyis gnon pa'i stobs kyis ngo 'thon dbang phyug noni//sbyor chen hu lu hu lu mig gsum pa las gsum grub drongs//rab kyi rtsal gyis gnon pa'i stobs kyis ngo 'thon mthu chen non//
252a6(rgyud): mnyam sbyor ru TA ma Ta snying las dpal mo drongs shig rab drongs shog/rab kyi rtsal gyis gnon pa'i stobs kyis ngo 'thon tshangs pa non//sbyor chen tshangs las grol ma drongs shig
252a7(rgyud): sma ra Ta//rab kyi rtsal gyis gnon pa'i stobs kyis ngo mthon dga' dbang non//mnyam sbyor kun gyi bdag la dga' drongs a la la la he//gdug cing khro la rab tu gtum pa'i
252b1(rgyud): sems can sbrul du'i phyur//ska bzhugs a la la la haM//oM su~M b+hA na~M s+yAd d+hA ho Ta Ta//mdzu pa ma la b+hUSh+Tam mi bya stongs rtog su drug maud kyang tha//de 'dren mdza' ba mA yin pasbyang
252b2(rgyud): la mnga' bshesu zhig zor//rgol ba la yang bya 'am mi bya yongasu rtog pa med kyang bla//de 'dra'i rgol ba sgyu mo yin pas de la dpa' zhesu zhig zer//glu 'di blangs pa tsam gyis ni//rta mchog
252b3(rgyud): mnyam par sbyor ba yis//mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'grub//thams cad 'byung ba'i phyag rgya zhes pa'o//mdzub mos mthe bong mnan nas ni//rang gi mthe
252b4(rgyud): bos mdzub mo mnan//dpal grub spyan gyi phyag rgya ste//mdzub mo mig gi 'bras bur byas//rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar nas//rdo rje spyan ni gnyis dag tu//khong stong du ni sbyar bar bya//dpal grub
252b5(rgyud): rdo'i sbyin yin no//'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang //de bzhin dpa' bo thams cad dang //rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad du//tshe 'di nyid la dgrub par 'gyur//dpal grub spyan ni grub pa ste/
252b6(rgyud): sems can thams cad dbang byed pa//las kyi dngos grub rab 'byam rnams//ma lus dngos grub myur du 'grub//rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar te//mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug/mthe bo'i rtse mo
252b7(rgyud): mnyam par gzhag/khong stong mi 'gyur dam pa'o//spyi bo'i mtshamasu rab bzhag nas//'di yis bsrung ba byas na no//sangs rgyas dngos grub ma lus pa//lus pa med par 'grub par 'gyur//
253a1(rgyud): sems dpa'i gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o//rdo rje thal mo gyen du dbye//mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug/mthe bong gnyis kyi mche ba gtsigs//'jigs pa'i
253a2(rgyud): rdo rje gnod sbyin ma//'grub pa bdud la sogs pa za//de bzhin du ni rmongs par byed//dbab pa thams cad rab tu 'grub//de bzhi ni rnam par shes pa sgrub//gter rnams 'byin par byed
253a3(rgyud): pa dang //de bzhin nor kun 'phrog par byed//dalnga so po ni dpal mnan te//dpal mo dag kyang phrogs nas ni//mngag zhug mar ni byed pa dang //gnod sbyin ma dang dga' ba spyod//gnod sbyin dag gi sde dpon
253a4(rgyud): du//'dis ni myur du 'grub par 'gyur/dpal rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o//rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar nas//gung mo mnyam par rab tu sgrub//mthe bong mthe'u chung 'dab ma bzhi//pad+mo dri med rab
253a5(rgyud): tu rgyas//'dis ni sdig rnams 'byung bar 'gyur//sdig pa byang na rab tu 'grub//sangs rgyas byang chub mngon sangs rgyas//rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur//dpal ldan pad+mo'i phyag
253a6(rgyud): rgya'o//rdo rje thal mo mnyem sbyar la//mdzub mo mnyam par phyir bkug s+ho//mthe bong rdo rje g.yogs pa ni//rdo rje dpal gyi nor bu ste//phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni//na mkha' thims
253a7(rgyud): cad rab 'grub ste//bud mod la sogs rin chen mchog/mkha' las dngos rnams thams cad spyod//rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar nas//mthe'u chung srin lag mnyam par brkyang //
253b1(rgyud): mdzub mo rtso bsnams bla'ubya pa ni//dpal mchog rta zhes grags pa ste//phyag rgya 'di yi sa bya da bla na ni//sa sku rgyus byang chub rab 'brel na//thams cad dga' bar byed pa'i dpal//lha yi
253b2(rgyud): bsgril bzang blos ci dgos//dam tshig gi phyag rgya shes pa'o//lus dong dag sems rdo rje yi//mtshan mra'i phyog rgyar ldan byas te//thams cad 'byung ba'i sbyor ba yis//bdag gi ltar
253b3(rgyud): ni bdag nyid bya//'dis ni sangs rgyas thams cad dpal//de bzhin dpa' bo thams cad dang //rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad du//tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur//sangs rgyas bdag
253b4(rgyud): lnga dngos grub ni//chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa//na mkha'i dbyings kyi mthus klas pa'i//sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i//mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog 'dis//
253b5(rgyud): mi 'grub 'byor par mi 'gyur ba'i//dram pa rgya chen gang yang med//dam tshige chen po'i phyag rgya shes pa'o//rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba'i//ji lta'i gzugs dang dbyibasu ldan/
253b6(rgyud): bde ba nyid kyis kun gyi bdag kun gyi bdag la zhugs par bya//phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa//'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding //rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kun dang 'dra//rdo rje sems
253b7(rgyud): dpa' rab tu 'grub//sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor bskal ba bzang po'i dpal rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//tshogs pa med cing mtshogs med//dbu mar
254a1(rgyud): yang ni dmig su med//bung med kun gyi sgra stor 'di//gnyis su med pa'i thug pa'i mchog/phyag tu 'di yis btadanA ni//'dod pa bzhin du 'a 'ong nga /
254a2(rgyud): dpal ldan sna ma kun gyi bdag/rje sems dpa' rab tu 'gre ba//sgyu mi thams cad kyi lA mi'i phyag rgya shes pa'o//yong po ma yin med pa'ang man//dbu mer yang ni dmigasu med//
254a3(rgyud): shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba//sangs rgyas byang chub rab 'grub pa'i//thams cad na mkha'i mtshan nyid de//nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid myed//khams gsum dag ni me lus pa//
254a4(rgyud): thams cad sgyu ma lta bu ste//ji ltar sgyu ma thams cad du//mthong ba dang ni reg par 'gyur//dmigs yod pa'ang ma yin te//de bzhin 'gro ba kun gyi tshul//phyag rgya 'di yis rnal
254a5(rgyud): 'byor pa//'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding //bud med la sogs rin chen mchog/mkha' las dngos rnams thams cad spyod//dngos po med par bdag sbyor bso//nam mkha' kun dang
254a6(rgyud): mnyam sbyar ba//mkhar 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/shin tu rtag par 'grub par 'gyur//ji ltar pad+ma dmar po 'di//chags pa'i nyes pas mi gos pa//rnal 'byor ldan pa'ang de ba'i ni du//
254a7(rgyud): gnas kyi nyes pas yong mi gos//shin tu gdug cing drag pa la/zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te//shes rab thabs kyi sbyor ba ni//rnam par rgyal phyir rab tu drag/thams cad dag pa
254b1(rgyud): mos pa yis/sdig med stobs kyi ngo 'thon du//drug shul sbyor bas mnyam sbyor ba//'jig rten thams cad gzhom par bya//sbyor ba'i phyag rgya shes pa'o//sbyor ba ji skad yod kun dang //byed pa
254b2(rgyud): rnam pa sna tshogs la//rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi rgya//dngos grub thams cad rab sgrub pa'o//byed pa'i phyag rgya 'di rnams kyis//'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ang ldang //chags pa chen po dbang phyug
254b3(rgyud): dpal//rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub//kun tu sna tshogs skul ba bzang po dpal dam tshig ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'o////bya ba dang ni bzlog pa dang //khyad par du ni 'phrogs pa dang /
254b4(rgyud): yan lag kun tu byed pa yis//de ni nor rnams kun kyang phrogs//'o byed 'khyud la sogs pa yis//khams gsum pa yang rgyas 'debaso//thar par byed cing gsod par byed//shi ba'ang
254b5(rgyud): mod la sos par byed//sbyor ba'i longs spyod thams cad kyis//gnas gsum po ni ma lus par//rgyas btab rmongs byas bslangs nas su//gar byas nas ni za bar byed//sbyor ba kun gyi
254b6(rgyud): bde myong bas//khams gsum pa ni ma lus pa//rgyas btab rmongs byas zos pa dang //thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tshe bar byed//sbyor ba thams cad kyi phyag rgya shes so//lha me kun gyi bde ba'i
254b7(rgyud): mchog/mdzes pa'i zhal ni rnam bsgyur zhing //bde ba myong bar rab sbyor ba//mdzes/par rta ba'i gar byed pas//sangs rgyas rdo rje pad+mo 'dzin//rdo rje nyi mo khams gsum pa//rgyas btab rmongs
254'a1(rgyud): byas zos pa dang //thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed//bud med mkhas pa sgyu mche//mdzes pa'i bzhin ni rnam sgyur bya//rim gror bcas shing steg
254'a2(rgyud): pa'i mchog/mdzes par lta bas gar byas pa//sangs rgyas pad+mo rdo rje 'dzin//rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pa//rgyas btab rmongs byas bslang nas ni//zos nas slar yang 'tsho bar byed//
254'a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas byang chub mnyam sbyor ba//rab tu dga' bar lta zhing 'dzum//shin tu sred pa yang dag sgrub//gsang par lta la gnas na ni//drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas//nyi zla gshin
254'a4(rgyud): /rjerdo tshangs bcas pa'i//srid po kun tu kun bsgrubs nas//gnas gsum dgu ni sgrub par byed//stag la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan//mdzes pa'i gzhin ni rnam bsgyur zhing //rim
254'a5(rgyud): gro bcas shing steg pa'i mchog/stog pa'i lte bas gar byed cing //mdzes pa'i tshul dang thabs rnams kyis//drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas//nyi zla gshin rje tshangs bcas
254'a6(rgyud): pa'i//'jig rten gsum dag sgrub pang byed//mche ba chung zad gtsigs pa'i kha//khro zhing 'dzum dang bcas pa bzhin//khro la 'gyur bar bcas shing 'dzum//gsal bar
254'a7(rgyud): lta zhing legs par gnas//drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas//nyi zla gshin rje tshangs bcas pa//rgyal po sgyu mas rnam rgyal nas//khams gsum dag ni sgrub par byed//'dod
254'b1(rgyud): chags myos pas g.yem spyo ba//mdzes pa'i gzhin ni rnam par bsgyur//'di ni gzhin gyi phyag rgya mchog/khams gsum dag kyang dga' bar byed//drag po mche ba rnon po gtsigs//
254'b2(rgyud): gdug pa za ba 'jigs 'jigs lta//g.yas pa'i gzhin gyi phyag rgya yis//khams gsum dag kyang za bar byed//dngos grub kun gyi bode ba'i mchog/rab tu dgu' bar lta zhing
254'b3(rgyud): 'dzum//g.yon pa'i gzhin gyi phyag rgya yis//khams gsum dag kyang thar par byed//spyi bor rta mgrin gsang mtho ba//rta gdongs ljang ser kha dog gsal//sau gtsigs pas ni maN+Da
254'b4(rgyud): mAnan na//'jig rten thams cad 'jigs par byed//bzhin gyi phyag rgya shes pa'o//lha mo kun gyi bde ba'i mchog/mdzes ma'i mchu ni sos mnan te//'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog 'di
254'b5(rgyud): ni//sangs rgyas thams cad dgyes par byed//'dod chags bde bas g.yem spyo ba//steg pa'i ma mchu sos mnan pa'i//'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni//khams gsum dag kyang
254'b6(rgyud): dga' bar byed//sbyor ba kun gyi bde ba mchog/mdzes pa'i ma mchu g.yo bar byed//'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni//khams gsumo dag kyang dga' bar byed//sha chen gyi ni ro myong
254'b7(rgyud): zhing //ma mchu so yis mnan pa yis//'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni//khams gsum dag kyang za bar byed//bde ba kun gyi ro myong zhing //ma mchu rnam par mdzes byas pa//'dzum
255a1(rgyud): pa'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni//thal bar 'gyur ba'ang 'tsho bar byed//'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog shebya pa'o//bde ba myong ba rA rab sbyor ba//zam zim lta ba
255a2(rgyud): rnam bsgyur bas//rgyas btab rmongs byas zos pa yi//khams gsum dag kyang 'tshe ba byed//bud med mkhas pa sgyu ma'i mchog/mdzes par lta ba'i garo byas pas//rgyas btab
255a3(rgyud): rmongs byas bslangs nas ni//khams gsum dag kyang sgrub par byed//sangs rgyas gsang ba'i mnyam sbyor ba//lte ba rab zhi bde bar gnas//lte ba'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni//bud
255a4(rgyud): med thams cad dbang du byed//smin mtshams khro gnyer 'gyur bar bcas//lta ba rab 'bar rnam par bsgyur//lta ba'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni//khams gsum dag kyang 'bar bar
255a5(rgyud): bye//khro zhing 'gyur bar bcas par 'dzum//lta ba gsal la bde ba gnas//lta ba'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni//khros pa thams cad rab tu sgrub//steg la sogs pa'i ro dang ldan//
255a6(rgyud): sdig bcas lta ba'i gar byed pa//lta ba'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni//khams gsum dag kyang gar byed 'jug/lta ba'i phyag rgya shes pa'o//nu mastu sar+b+ba bud+d+he b+h+yaH/zhes pa'i
255a7(rgyud): phyag rgya la gnas na//las dang mchod pa ma lus pa//lus pa med par thams cad 'grub//rang byung rnams kyi mchod pa kun//chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/
255b1(rgyud): nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas pa//lan cig brjod pas 'grub pa'i phyir//dam pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya 'dis//gang dag byas par ma gyur cing //spel ba dag tu ma gyur pa'i//dam
255b2(rgyud): pa rgya chen de dag med//oM ru ru s+phu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha lo tsa ne sarba ung+ga snod+ha nAM sUhA//chos kyi phyag rgya mchog 'di ni//sems can thams cad dbang byed pa//stobs kyis myur du dkug
255b3(rgyud): nas ni//bran bzhin du ni byed du 'jug/su b+ha gA s+t+r-i ma hA na de bi hi ri//mi ri dzi ri tiH ni raM shr-i ye swA hA//chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa 'di//'dod pa'i bde ba kun sbyin pa'o//oM tA re tut+tA raM
255b4(rgyud): tu re swA hA//chos kyi phyag rgya la gnas pa//sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgrubs na//bud med gzhan lta ci zhig smos//traM b+ha ba nA TA/tra Ta tra Ta/re bA/re ba thams cad rab kun rdzog sa//
255b5(rgyud): chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa dang //re ba thams cad rdzogs byed pa'o//shrI badz+ra pad+ma ba Da ba mu kha yo gI shA ra hi hi ho hi hi//chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa 'di//'jig rten thams cad rab tu
255b6(rgyud): 'jig/chos kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o//skad kyi gsang ni mthon dman dang //gre sgyur bcos shing bzlas pa dang //dus su rab zhi mchog rnams kyi//hUM la sogs pa'i glu blang zhing //tshig
255b7(rgyud): rnams kun gyis ci 'dod par//ci ltar spro bar glu kun gyis//hUM gi glu yi phyag rgya dpal//rdo rje sems dpa' rab sgrub pa'o//lha mo kun gyi lha mo mchog/cha lugs bzhin du gar bya
256a1(rgyud): nA k+Shaka la sh+tsa thAlas sa//sgyurnams byangs ca dz+dzamra d+g+hang //oMSh+NI rmA la shUn//sa sa dgang drung //mA lus smra/
256a2(rgyud): myed pa ste//sems can thams cad bang par byed// shrI ba zhid ma //mdzang de'i nas kyis dang sbyin cing //brgyun gis sbyor thub pa sa//dri la byud /
256a3(rgyud): phyug rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa//khams gsum dag nying rgyas 'dengs shing //thar par byed cig gsod pang byed//shrI ba mid la'i'atsha bar byed//rdo rje drug tu band pa nas
256a4(rgyud): po'i phyag rgya'o///Te zhes bya ba'i glu ya~M d+hA//thams cad dag par rab bskyongs par//hi na sa bya ba glu yI r+g+ha//khams gsum rnam pa de rgyal bar byed//koka
256a5(rgyud): la lho dang cora'i dbyangs//de bzhin rab tu gdongs sbyin dang//ka ta sha si si rgya//'joms pa thams cad grub pa'o//glu yi phyag rgya shes pa'o//gling bu dang ni rgyud gcig dang /
256a6(rgyud): de bzhin rgyud mas rgyud sgrag dang //sil snyun byug d+he bshad pa rnam gyi//las rnams thams cad rab ba'o//tshe lugs ban du gang byed pas//me brdzis par ya
256a7(rgyud): tu 'phrug//las rnams sbyin la mchog tu no//brdungs na dpal ni ci'i 'byung 'thug//snying po phyag rgya zhis rig dang //bya ba rnam pa tshog pa dang //rnam pa'i sel las nas
256b1(rgyud): //dngan gyu mas sbya na // na // ng+ya/ nas/m+b+ha na/ sas/s+yA /
257a1(rgyud): bcings pa yi//rdo rjes gol brdabasna pa yis//sang+yas rgyas thams ca du bsdu bar bya//de yi bka' tsam gyis skrag nas//'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang
257a2(rgyud): bcas pa'i//sangs rgyas kun kyang 'du 'gyur na//gzhan lta smos kyang ci zhig smos//g.yon pa'i se gol brdobs pa dang //thal mo dal bus brdabs pas 'grub//g.yas bi'i
257a3(rgyud): thal mo yin par gsungs//gnyis ka kun tu sdud pa yin//thal mo'i sbyor ba rab sbyor bas//las kyi tshul bzhin 'brang ba dang //thal mo dal bus bsdu ba dang //glu dang sil
257a4(rgyud): stasnyan gar byed pas//steg dang dpa' dang snying rje dang //dgod dang khro dang 'jigs pa dang //mi sdug nga mtshar zhi ba yi//nyams kyi phyag rgya rang don sgrub//steg la sogs pa'i
257a5(rgyud): nyams dang ldan//sna tshogs phyag rgya'i grwar byas pas//thams cad bdag nyid rgyur sbyor bas//dbab pa thams cad rab tu 'grub//rdo rje sems dpa' steg pa la//dpal la dpa'
257a6(rgyud): bo de bzhin gshegs//rdo rje 'dzin pa snying rje la//dgod pa 'jig rten dbang phyug mchog/rdo rje nyi ma khro ba la//rdo rje drag po 'jigs pa la//shAkya thub pa mi sdug la//ngo mtshar
257a7(rgyud): la ni a ra li//rab tu zhi la sangs rgyas rtag/sdug bsngal thams cad zhi ba'i phyir//dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin gyis//nye bar gnas shing byin gyis rlob//lte bas mi ngoms pa
257b1(rgyud): yi gzugs//thams cad bdag nyid ston par mdzad//leg so zhes bya 'grub pa yi//mchog tu gyur pa'ang rab tu stsol//thams cad bdag nyid grub pa'i mchog/re ba thams cad yongs
257b2(rgyud): rdzogs pa//sangs rgyas kun tu 'gyur ba'i mchog/rnal 'byor dam po ster byer 'gyur//phyag rgya sbyor ba 'di dag gis//rang gi mchod pa rab tu sbyar//rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha//sbyor
257b3(rgyud): bi thams cad rnam 'phrul dang //phyag rgya phyag rgya'i len rnams dang //sna tshogs phyag rgya rnam sgrol pas//yid la bsams pa kun rdzogs phyir//mchod pa dam par sbyar bar bya//
257b4(rgyud): kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang po//kun gyi slob dpon bdag nyid bsgyur//kun 'byung la sogs sbyor ba yis//rgol ba bdag dang gar byas te//de nas rgol bar ci rigs par//
257b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur//de nas slar ni rgol bI yang //rdo rje 'dzin pa chen por bsgyur//rgol ba'ang de nas tshul bzhin du//pad+mo gar 'byung mchog tu bsgyur//
257b6(rgyud): de nas slong du rgol ba yang //rdo rje nyi ma mchog tu bsgyur//de nas phyir yang rgol ba ni//rta mchog 'byung ba rI bsgyur bar bya//de nas slar ni rgol ba yang //bdag nyid 'byung ba
257b7(rgyud): rab tu 'grub//de nas phyag rgya shes pa 'di//sdom pa thams cad rab ston pa//rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi glu//khyad par du ni bshad par bya//la lar dri med zla ba'i dkyil
258a1(rgyud): 'khor stong pas mdzes pa'i gzugs su rnam par snang //la lar rab tu 'jigs pa'i nyi ma bye ba phrag dgu'i 'od zer mchog pas 'jigs//la lar
258a2(rgyud): mdangs bzang gzi che ba de dang zhi bar ldan pa rgyal ba'i gzugasu snang //la lar 'gro ba thams cad mnyam par 'jog po'i gzugs ldan gsung mchog ldan par ston//rdo rje sems
258a3(rgyud): dpa' 'grub phyir 'dul la mkhas pa ma lus bde ba'i mchog rnams las//a ra li thams cad mnyam sbyor grub par mdzod ru ta me te a la la la ho//rnam pa mang po 'dul
258a4(rgyud): bar mdzad pa'i tshul la/gar mkhan mchog gis gar mdzad pa//dam tshig gar gyi dbang phyug sangs rgyas gor mdzod a la la to//rnam mang bde mchog rab tu gar mdzad pa
258a5(rgyud): yis thar pa'i bde ba'ang thob par mdzod//sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i//mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/'grub par 'gyur ba gdon mi za//de ltar rab tu gar
258a6(rgyud): byas te//de las gang zhig pham gyur pa//tshogs la de yis tshogs kyi zas//yon dang bcas par dbul bar bya//mchod pa'i cho ga 'di dag gsi//sdig pa kun las
258a7(rgyud): thar bar 'gyur//bsod nams thams cad 'phel bar 'gyur//de bzhin rtag par bsrungs par 'gyur//rims dang dug dang dbyig dug dang //mkha' 'gros gtse dang
258b1(rgyud): mamanamams sa nathamasam/a nathan/thas nathamam thas mthamams mayam khas man thas/ga'as ka ma mas ma ma thas \u0f7fsal mam
258b2(rgyud): gdon rnams dang //bdud dang sems can dmyal ba'i rnams//'di yis rab tu zhi bar 'gyur//dngos grub rnams dang phun sum tshogs//dga' dang de bzhin bdag po dang //
258b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas dam pa thams cad dang //phyag rgya'i mchog rnams 'grub par 'gyur//gar gyi phyag rgya shes pa'o//rab tu dga' ba rjes su rab chags dga' ba'i mda' gzhu rab tu phra ba'i rgyas
258b4(rgyud): btab pas//rab tu dga' bar sbyor ba'i bde bos myos pa bde ba thams cad bdag la grub par mdzod//rab tu bde mchog rnam pa sna tshog rnir rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan sgreng ba'i longs spyod dang //rab
258b5(rgyud): tu dga' ba'i dbang phyug tsho mchog grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa zhugs ho rta mchog ho//rab tu sna tshogs bde ba'i mchog la rol cig ho//bde bas slong la rnam par rol cig hUM snang mdzod//
258b6(rgyud): a la la la ho//de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mkha' 'gro sgyu ma sna tshogs kyis//slob ma rab tu gzung du gsol//kye ma'o bde ba grub par mdzod//kye ma 'o bde ba bde ba stsolo//dam
258b7(rgyud): par rab tu zhugs par mdzod//bdag la rab tu dgyes par gyur//e la la ho//e ma'o shi shi zhugs shig zhugs shig/mkha' 'gro bde mchog yongs bskor kun tu zhugs//'di dag
258b8(rgyud): glur ni blangs pa yis//sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba//mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/grub par 'gyur ba gdon mi za//rdo rje sems dpa' sdud pa dang //rdo rje rin chen bla med pa//
259a1(rgyud): rdo rje chos ni gsung ba dang //rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur//hUM rdo rje lus kyi mda' gzhu la phyag 'tshalo//dpal rdo rje chags pa'i dam tshig la phyag
259a2(rgyud): 'tshal lo//rdo rje kha T+wAM ga rab tu 'jigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo//dpal rdo rje dril bu rab tu 'khrol ba la phyag 'tshal lo//la lar rab tu drug cing skye bor drag la drag pa'i bud
259a3(rgyud): med sku ltar rab tu snang //'gro ba mtha' yas 'dul phyir la lar rab tu rno ba'i 'khor lo phyag na bsnams po'i sku//la lar rab tu nges zhing zhi ba mi 'gyur sbyin pa tshangs pa'i skur
259a4(rgyud): yang sbyin par mdzad//la lar rab tu 'bar ba'i chags pa pad+ma rgyal po'i dam tshig bdag la grub par mdzod//thams cad dbang bskur dbang phyug dam pa mi zad gter mchog
259a5(rgyud): bdag la grub par mdzad du gsol//kun mchog rgyal mtshan rnam rgyal sgreng ba'i rdo rje rin chen shin tu che ba bdag la grub par mdzod//la lar mkhas pa'i gzugs kyang 'dzin//
259a6(rgyud): la lang dus mtha'i dus ltar phra//la lcang rgyal ba'i dbang po bzhin du zhi//la lar rta mchog sbyor bas 'dod pa sgrub//rdo rje glu'i mchod pa'i phyag rgya shes pa'o//me tog da/
259a7(rgyud): dang dmar ba dang //mthing kha ser po kun bsdus pa//me tog phyag rgya mchog 'di ni//'dod pa'i yon+tan lnga li spro//rgya skyegs mthing kho ljang ku'i mdog/mtshon sna bzhi yis
259b1(rgyud): btsos bA dang //dkar po lnga yi phyag rgya dag/snga ma bzhin du mnyam par sgrug/khams las byung ba thams cad dang //srog dang rtsa ba'i de bzhin te//rnam par mdzes shing zhim dri ba//
259b2(rgyud): snga ma bzhin du mnyam par skye ba//tson dan gnyis dang gla rtsi dang //ga bur ni gu sha la ki/bdug ba bu ram dang sbyar ba//las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa'o//gan dar dri dang gu
259b3(rgyud): gul dang //sa rdzag bur glo rtsi dang //rdzas 'di dag las gtsos pa'i mar//me mar byas na snang ba skye//tsan dan gor gum smrika dang //gra bung dang ni gla rtsi dang //bcas pa bdug pa grub
259b4(rgyud): pa ste//spos kyi phyag rgya spos mchog 'gyur//ka ko la dang sug smel dang //klu skad ga bud gla rtsi dang //'di rnams zhib tu btags pa ni//seng ldeng bu ram dag dang sbyar//shing tshA pa tA lo drA dang //
259b5(rgyud): na laM sham dang gra bur sbyar//sa ha ka re shing mar gyis//spras pa kha yi spros yin no//dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya sbyor ba'o//me tog dmar po sangs rgyas la//rdo rje can la sna
259b6(rgyud): tshogs pa//'jig rten dbang la me tog dkar//ser po mkha' las byung ba la//tsan dan bdug pa sangs rgyas la//rdo rje can lA du rus ka/spyan ras gzigs dbang ka pi tani/
259b7(rgyud): ce pog rdo rje nyi ma la//mar me phreng ba sangs rgyas la//rdo rje can la mar me bdun//spyan ras gzigs la mor me brgya//stong ni rdo rje nyi ma la//sangs rgyas rnams la tsan dan sros//
260a1(rgyud): rdo rje can+da la gur gum yin//spyan ras gzigs la tsan dan dmar//ga bur rdo rje nyi ma la//me tog kun dang bdug pa kun//de bzhin mar me thams//
260a2(rgyud): cad dang //spos rnams thams cad ci snyed pa//rdo rje rta la 'dul du rung //mchod pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o//sgeg mo dang ni nI chung dang //myos dang de bzhin bdud
260a3(rgyud): rtsi dang //gcig tu dpa' dang 'dod chags sra//g.yon can blun mo de bzhin te//lan tshwa la sogs ro kun dang //kha ra la sogs bdud rtsi bzhin//bdag nyid kun gyi ro bsgrub pa//
260a4(rgyud): ma lus lus pa med par 'grub//sha dang chang du ldan pa yi//bza' ba sna tshogs grub pa ni//dga' ba'i longs spyod skal mchog ste///tshe yi dam pa rab tu 'grub//a 'bru
260a5(rgyud): sprin dang dgun 'bru dang //pa na sa drang na le kar//a ru ga la sogs 'bras bu'i//phyag rgya'i mchog ni 'di rnams te//dngos grub 'bras bu thams cad 'thob//kha ra sbrang rtsi
260a6(rgyud): byugs pa yi//a 'bra la sogs tshig gus byug/sa ha ra yi mar la sogs//mnyam pa'i dri yis bslu bar bya//yungs dang rgya skegs la sogs pa'i//tshon gyis 'thun par
260a7(rgyud): kha bsgyur nas//shun pagro ba la sogs byas//mchod pa'i tshe na 'bul bar bya//'bras bur bcas pa'i phyag rgya shes pa'o//sangs rgyas rnams la bshos 'bul lo//sha
260b1(rgyud): dang chad ni rnam par spangs//glu dang sil snyan grub pa dang //gdugs dang rgyan mtshan pa dan dang //shu dang chang du bcas pa ni//gtor ma'i mchog ste sna tshogs pa'o//bdag gi phyug
260b2(rgyud): chen skal bzang po//rdo rje'i las ni dpal grub pa'o//bshos dang gtor ma dkar po dang //pad+ma'i me tog ldan pa ni//spyan ras gzigs dbang gtso bi laM//phul na dgos pa thams cad
260b3(rgyud): 'grub//rgyal po'i kha zas sna tshogs pa//sha dang chang ngu ldan pa dang //glu dang sil snyan skal bzang dag/rdo rje nyi ma'i 'khor la dbul//kha zas kun gyi ro rnams dang //sha dang sha
260b4(rgyud): yi mchog rnams dang //sha yi sbyor dang shA skam dang //bshos dag rdo rje rta la dbul//mchod pa dang gtor ma thams cad kyi cho ga'i phyag rgya'o//mthe bong sems dpa'i skyil mo krung //
260b5(rgyud): mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug/gung mo gnyis ni mnyam par skyed/lhag ma rdo rje thal mo sbyar//sangs rgyas rin chen phyag rgya 'di//rang byung rnams kyi dbang bskur ba//rgyal srid thams
260b6(rgyud): cad ma lus pa//lus pa med pa myur du 'grub//skye bo dang ni dpral ba dang //ldan pa gnyis dang rtag par ni//sangs rgyas kun gyi rin chen mchog/dbu rgyan kun tu brgyan por bya//
260b7(rgyud): dbu rgyan bcing bas btsongs nas ni//'bying zhing mtha' nas dgrol bar bya//dar gyi mtha' mo sbyangs pa ltar//byas nas thal mo brdab par bya//sangs rgyas
261a1(rgyud): pad+mo rdo rje 'dzin//rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pa//de yis dgra med sdig med par//bdug gi longs spyod nyid du spyod//'di yis srung ba byas+thA nas ni//
261a2(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' dpal dang 'dri//sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos grub che//'khor los bsgyur ba rab tu 'grub//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nor bu rin po che'i dre'u rgyan
261a3(rgyud): mnyam par sbyor ba skal ba bzang po dpal gyi phreng ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//sor mo thams cad nang du bsnol//sor mo rtse mo kun sprad nas//mthe bong rdo rje mnan pa ni//sna
261a4(rgyud): dang mig phugs lta bu ste//pad+mo'i rin chen phyag rgya 'di//bdag nyid chen por dbang bskur ba//rgyal srid thams cad ma lus pa//lus pa med par myur du 'grub//spyi bo dang
261a5(rgyud): ni dpral ba dang //ldan pa gnyis dang lhag por sbyar//thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan te//sangs rgyas gtsug gi nor bu 'bar//dbu rgyan bcing bas bcings nas ni//'gying
261a6(rgyud): ba'i mtha' nus dgrol bar bya//dAr gyi mtha' mo sbyangs pa ltar//byas+ya nas thal mo brngub par bya//'dri yis srung ba byas nas ni//rdo rje sems dpa' dpal dang 'dra//khams
261a7(rgyud): gsum dag ni rgyal srid che//'khor los bsgyur ba rab tu 'grub//dpal rdo rje he ru ka pad+mo'i nor bu rin po che'i dbu rgyan monyam par sbyor ba skal pa bzang po dpal gyi phreng ba
261b1(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar te//lag gnyis nor bu rin chen du//ji ltar rigs par mnyam sbyar nas//mdzub mo myathe blo'i rtse mo ba ni//yongs su bsgyur te bteg/
261b2(rgyud): gnas su//dbul bar legs par bzhag nas ni//khams gsum bdag po rgyal bar 'dag/ma lus lus pa med par 'grurab//dpal rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya'o//lag pa shin tu brkyang /
261b3(rgyud): ba yis/mdzub mo gnyis pa'i mdud par bcing //gung mo mthe bo'i rtse mo can//rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongasu bsgyur te bteg nas kyang //khro gnyer du ni legs bzhog no//rgyal srid thams cad
261b4(rgyud): legs 'grub bya//mA lus lus pa med pa 'grub//'di yis srung ba byas na ni//rdo rje las kyi dpal dang 'dra//rnal 'byor dbang phyug rab bsgrubs pa//ma lus lus pa med pa
261b5(rgyud): 'grub//ma mo dang ni byad ma dang //mkha' 'gro ma yang lhag par 'grub//dur khrod dngos grub thams cad dang //las rnams thams cad byed par 'gyur//dpal rdo rje he ru ka'i phyag rgya'o//
261b6(rgyud): mthe bong dpa' bo'i skyil mo krung //mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug/gung mo gnyis ni mnyam par sbyar//lhag ma rdo rje thal mo'i 'od//rdo rje rin chen phyag rgya 'di//rang byung rnams
261b7(rgyud): dbang bskur ba'o//'jig rten dbang po dam pa kun//ma lus lus pa med par 'grub//'di yis srung ba byas na ni//rnam par snang mdzad dpal dong 'dra//sangs rgyas kun gyi tshe
262a1(rgyud): 'drub pa/mya lus pa smras pa med par 'jug/tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par nges pA zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//rdo rje thul mo mnyam sbyar la//
262a2(rgyud): mdzub mo snyam te phyi rol dgug/mthe bong gnyis ni rab tu brkyang //rdo rje nor bu zhes kyang bya//dpral bar myur du bzhag pa ni//bsgom pa thams cad yongs rdzogs shring //rgyal
262a3(rgyud): srid thams cad rab bsgrub bI//ma lus lus pa med par 'grub//dpal nor bu rin po che dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'o//sangs rgyas rin chen pad+mo dang //de bzhin rdo rje rin chen
262a4(rgyud): dang //yid bzhin nor bu rin chen mchog/rta mchog rab tu 'grub par 'gyur//phyag rgyas rab tu dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya shes pa'o//sor mo phani tshun bsnol ba ni//rdo rje thal
262a5(rgyud): mo yin par bshad//sor mo thams cad bsdams pa ni//rdo rje bsdams pa yin par bshad//rdo rje bsdams po byas nas ni//mdzub mo mthe bo'i nang dag tu//g.yas pa'i
262a6(rgyud): mthe bo'i mtshan ma 'di//rtse mo bcug la bsdam par bya//dge' chen dpal gyi phyag rgya ste//phyag rgya thams cad ring byung ba//rab 'byam las rnams dngos grub ni//ma lus
262a7(rgyud): lus pa med par 'grub//dga' ba'i rdo rje bcings nas ni//gung mo bcings pa'i nang du gzhug/mthe bong mthe'u chung rtse mo can//rdo rje'i phyog rgya yongasu bsgyur//'di yis sangs
262b1(rgyud): rgyus thams cad dang //de bzhin dpa' bo thams cad dang //rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad ni//tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur//dpal bde ba chen po rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o//de las gung mo
262b2(rgyud): lcags kyu ni//bdag gi snying kar sbyar bar bya//'di ni thams cad 'gugs pa'i rgya//de ma thag tu phyag rgya 'dis//sangs rgyas pad+mo rdo rje 'dzin//rdo rje nyi me khams gsum pa//bkug
262b3(rgyud): ste dbang du byas nas ni//las rnams kun la sbyor bar byed//dpal bde ba chen po rdo rje lcags kyu zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//rdo rje bsdams pa byas nas ni//gung mo bcings pa'i nang du
262b4(rgyud): gzhug/mthe'u chung mthe bong rtse mo can//rdo rje'i phyag rgyar yongs bsgyur na//sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpar yang //sbyor ba 'di yis mi dka' na//dngos grub gzhan dang las
262b5(rgyud): kyi mchog/rab 'byam gzhan lta ci zhig blos//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o//rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings pa las//sbyor ldan thal mo khong stong sbyar/
262b6(rgyud): khams gsum dag ni ma lus pa//de ma thag tu 'bebs par byed//dpal rdo rje dbab pa'i phyag rgya'o//rdo rje'i phyag rgya btsongs pa las//grung mo de bzhin bkug nas ni//rdo rje rdo rje
262b7(rgyud): zhes brjod de//gung mo namakha'i rdo rje mchog/phyag rgya 'di yos btab na ni//'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong ldeng //dpal ldan 'dod pa kun gyi bdag/rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub//
263a1(rgyud): dbu na d+hAka A/ rnams pa la gnas te//ma non sa//mdzub sogs kyi mod dun//'an phyug tu nga /
263a2(rgyud): bdabya//phyag rgya 'di yis rnam 'byong bya//dag pa sngon la rab tu gyen ste//byang chub sems ni mtha' yis mchog/dngos sgrub thams cad rab tu 'brug/dpal rdo rdo
263a3(rgyud): gnas pa rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o//rdo rje'i pad+mod byas pa las//grang mo bcings pa'i dbus na gnas//mthe'u chung snyam pa'i rtse ma mde'u//rdo rje mda' ni yongasu 'phang //phyag
263a4(rgyud): 'di las bya ban na//tshangs pa nyid dag byed baHsa//man+t+ra yis myur du 'argyal byas nas//khams gisum dag ni sgru pang bye //dpel rdo rje mde'i byug d+hA /
263a5(rgyud): b+hablag rgya yongs bcings na//gung mo bcings pa'i phyi rol banag+h+ra/rdo rje sna tshogs dpal g+h+r-ir+b+ha//ldang ba thams cad rab grub pa'o//rdo rje phyag rgya thams cad shes pa'o//A mi
263a6(rgyud): lci minyam byas nas//mkha' yi thing kar bsdu bad+mo bya//de yi 'og tu ri mo rnams//yi ga thams cad dgod par bya//gug skyed dag gi sgrog mad bya//yi ge ra ni myu gur byA//glang
263a7(rgyud): stong zla ba khams pa dang //cho ga gnyis zla ba ginyi su bya//'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//phyag rgya mi 'gyur dam pa ste//sangs rgyas dpal gyi ri mor bshad//yi ge dge
263b1(rgyud): kyang mi 'gyur mchog/rdo rje sems dpa' dngul gyi lha'i//bstod dang bcas pa'i mtshan bris na//sdig pa kun las thar par 'gyur//bsod nams thams cad rab tu 'grub//rdo rje sems
263b2(rgyud): dpa' dpal sbyor zhes//rab tu chags pa'i mtshan bris na//sdug bsngal kun las thar bar 'gyur//bde ba thams cad rab tu 'grub//chags chen grol ba dpal zhes pa'i/
263b3(rgyud): chags pa'i mtshan dag bris na ni//sdig pa kun las thar par 'gyur//'gro ba kun la rab tu gnas//snying rje dri med khro dpal zhes//bstod dang bcas pa'i mtshan bris na//sdig pa
263b4(rgyud): kun las thar par 'gyur//dngos grub kun gyi mchog kyang 'grub//pad+mo chags pa dpal dag ces//tshogs pa'i mtshan dag bris na ni//sdig pa kun las thar par 'gyur//dag
263b5(rgyud): pa thams cad rnam par dag/rdo rje nyi mi'i dpal mdangs zhes//bstod dang bcas pa'i mtshan bris na//sdig pa kun las thar bar 'gyur//longs spyod kun la rab tu gnas/
263b6(rgyud): rta mchog pha rol gnon dpal zhes//chags pa'i mtshan dag bris na ni//sdig pa kun las thar bar 'gyur/dbang phyug thams cad rab tu 'grub//brjod pa dag kyang de bzhin te/
263b7(rgyud): las kyi dngos grub rab 'byam dag/ma lus par ni myur du 'grub//lhag pa'i lha ni gang gang gis//slob dpon gang dang gang yin pas//de dang de yi mtshan dag ni//dpal
264a1(rgyud): / dang ldan pa spyod//sgru da m+b+ha la khyod bcun nas kyad//rgyu mchog dog smras nas ni//rdorje meng na smrang sa/
264a2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa de lung ldan//ge rgyu'i sbyor ba 'di dag bris//byang chub snying po'i bdu ni//rdo rje'i ming du rab tu gnas//de nas sengs na su yang 'gyur//snang
264a3(rgyud): pA dang bcas po'i ming gi phyag rgya zhes pa'o//spyi bo thug pa gang sbyin pa//phyag 'tshal bar ni sbyin pa yin//dpral bar reg par byed pa ni//phyug la ni len par shes par bya//
264a4(rgyud): sbyin ma sbrul bu gang dzin pa/sangs rgyas thams cad gnas pa'i //gnas pas num pa'i 'gyu byug/gzhan pa rna par/yi//deng byung rnams
264a5(rgyud): mig sa ni sa pa sgru pa b+h+yo//g.yon pa nga med parnang ma las bas pa bang po la/yon pa dag la rag pa'i drwa//gas sa g.yon gnyis klung bzhin /
264a6(rgyud): g.yon pa lags par byungs pa'i//zhems pa legs par smras pa'o//pA yi bug gnyis kyi brda//sangs rgyas thams cad gnas pa ste//ga yas pa bla dag la bdun pa slong /
264a7(rgyud): g.yon pa dadashal dri srung ba'o//skye ni sdug pa ltar byed pa//dzaM yi phyag rgyang gnas pa ste//bla yas pa shA ya~M phyag rgya la na//g.yon pa tshong gi phyag rgya yin//mche ba nas
264b1(rgyud): da gan pa ts+tsha//bad+ma mA m+b+ha n+ta mnan pa no//g.yon pa med glan po //gsus pa d+mo bzhin rgyas par//glog sar dog pa gan to//du la b+hag tu d+ha gnas pa ste/
264b2(rgyud): rten pa sbyin du'i// pa sa nga smra ba'i mchog dzin ldan ///dza sa da s+ho// na
264b3(rgyud): 'i ts+tsha b+h+ya ni//don smang //ng+gA ba ga sagan gnyis k+Sha //dag pa N+Di / sa skye po gyu kyi /gan pad+ma
264b4(rgyud): ma mo / tshu ga las kyiman ga /yig//'a chung kyis dang sa 'ad//gams pa rgyas hUM yin// yin pa mernams nga shin pa
265a1(rgyud): de bzhin to//g.yon pa 'dud pa'i phyag rgya ste//g.yas par rab tu phyag 'tsha lo//pus mo g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gis//brda yi phyag rgyar rab
265a2(rgyud): tu gnas//g.yas pa bcing ba'i phyag rgya ste//g.yon pa thams cad rnam par dkrol//rkang po gnyis kyis sa gnon pa//g.yas dang gyayon pa de bzhin te//g.yon pa thams
265a3(rgyud): cad gnod par byed//g.yas pa thams cad rab tu 'joms//dngos grub las dang bde ba dang //'di yis mi grub gang yang med//rang don las rnams rab grub pa//ma lus
265a4(rgyud): lus pa med par 'grub//brda yi phyag rgya shes pa'o//oM a ti b+hu zhes bya ba'i brda//'di ni phyag 'tshal ba zhes pa'o//pra ti oM d+hi b+hU zhes pa//phyag lan yin par shes par bya'o//
265a5(rgyud): sems dpa' sngon dang mtha' med po//rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yis//e ma'i bde ba yin par bshad//AM ma 'o bde ba dpal gyi mtshon
265a6(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' gang brjod pa//sdig pa kun las thar bar 'gyur//bdu ba thams cad rab tu 'grub//bde mchog e ma'o bde ba dang //skyon ma de bzhin shi shi dag/rgyas 'debs
265a7(rgyud): me deng rmongs byed dang //ze ba mo dang tshe 'bil ma//sangs rgyas byang chub chos 'khor lo//de bzhini khams gsum rnam par rgyal//'dod pa'i sdug ma thams cad kyang //phyag rgya
265b1(rgyud): bad+hA y-i phyag rgya'o//rta dang rdo rje snang ba dang //thal bar rnyog pa'i ro langs ma//sangs rgyas kun gyi brda yin no//gling bu dang ni rgyudang+ga rnams dang //de bzhin du ni rgyud gcig dang //stug
265b2(rgyud): po dang ni rdza rnga dag/sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya'o//me tog mchod dang bdug pa'i mchod//de bzhini mang me'i mchod pa dang //spos kyi mchod pa glang rtsi drag/longs spyod phyag rgya'i brda
265b3(rgyud): yin no//de la sogs pa mtha' yis mchog/chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa//na mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas pa'i//lha mo kun gyi brda yin no//smin mo bskyod pa mda'
265b4(rgyud): bzhi yin//b+ha gA ling ga e ma'o bde//thod ba pad+mo yin par bshad//kha T+wAM gra yang rgyal mtshan tshe//sangs rgyas phyag rgya pad+mor gnas//bde ba kun gyi bdud rtsi yin//sangs rgyas
265b5(rgyud): brda yi phyag rgya yis//shi sh+tsi sangs rgyas kun tu bshad//dkyil 'khor la ni 'khor lor bshad//de nyid dam tshig yin par bshad//lha rnams thams cad tshogs pas na//skye
265b6(rgyud): bro dam po kun tshogs pa//tshogs kyi 'khor l-i dam pa ni//mdza' ba thams cad 'dus pa ste//sangs rgyas kun gyi brda dag gis//de bzhin mdza' ba 'dus par gsungs//rdorje
265b7(rgyud): sems dpa' dpal skyong bas//dkyil 'khor thams cad yin par bshad//lha mo thams cad kun 'dus pas//thams cad sna tshogs skal pa bzang //rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor
266a1(rgyud): bang sangs rgyas kun tu bdag sbyor bas//rnam pa kun mkhyen shes pa'i phyir//kun gyi slob dpon yin par bshad//kun gyi slob dpon rab gnas pa//
266a2(rgyud): lha mo thams cad 'dus pas na//sangs rgyas kun gyi mchog dog gis//kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang po'o//de'i slob ma grub pa ni//grub pa'i rjes su grub pas na//sangs rgyas
266a3(rgyud): brda yi gsang ba yis//rgyal mtshan yin par rnam par bshad//de las gzhan pa'i slob ma kun//mchog dang 'bring dang tha ma'i rnams//sangs rgyas kun gyi brda dag gis//
266a4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' yin par bshad//sangs rgyas thams cad rin chen mchog/dbu rgyan mi 'gyur dam pa yin//sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal srid mchog/
266a5(rgyud): yin par rang byung rnams kyis gsungs//thod pa'i phyeng ba'i dbu rgyan dang //sangs rgyas gtsug gi nor bu dag/sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yi//dpal gyi pad+mo'i tshul du bshad
266a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas rang bzhin grub cig dang //de bzhin pad+mo'i rang bzhin gcig/thams cad dbang bskur dbang bskur che//yin par don kun grub pas gsungs//yin gyi dam pa
266a7(rgyud): grub pa ni//nor gyi dbyig du bshad pa ste//snying ying nor gyi mchog yin par//sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgyar bshad//ga bur tsen dan dmar po dang //sbyar ba brag chen
266b1(rgyud): yin par bshad//tshogs kyi dbus su bzhag pa dpal//thams cad ldang ba'i ras yin//bag zan las ni byas pa'i phyugs//tsan dan dmar pos bslus pa dang //bag phye'i zan//
266b2(rgyud): las byas pa'i sha/rgyal po'i zin zhes gang bshad pa'o//de nas grub pa'i mna' bsgrags pa//dam tshig ces par gnas pa'o//bde mchog bde mchog ces gsungs po//
266b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas bde mchog thams cad kyis//phyag rgya'i bde ba mchog tu gsungs//de bzhin e ma'o bde ba dang //snang ba shes pa'ang rab tu gnas//shi shi srid pa'ang srid pa'o//
266b4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis kyang //'da' bar bya ba'ang ma yin pas//sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yis//phyag rgya dam tshig yin par bshad//phyag rgya'ang sbyor ba yin par
266b5(rgyud): bshad//sbyor ba'ang phyag rgya yin par bshad//rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba//sbyor ba thams cad yin par bshad//nga ni sna tshogs dam tshig ste//rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba
266b6(rgyud): ches sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yi//sbyor ba thams cad yin par bshad//de yi nye ba'i long spyod ni//khyams gsum thams cad ma lus pa'o//de yi gzugs dang sgra dang
266b7(rgyud): dri ro dang reg pa bde mos pa'o//gzugs ni ri mo yin par gsungs//sgra ni glu yin zhes bshod do//dri ni rab tu tshim par gsungs//ro ni ra sa ya na yin//reg pa bde
267a1(rgyud): ba yin par bshad//rab tu reg pa dga' ba'i dade//sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yi//chos ni sbyor ba yin pa ShA shad//sbyor ba'i long spyod thams
267a2(rgyud): cad kyis//ji ltar bde bar bsten byed cing //bdag gi lhag pa'i lhar sbyar ba//rang gi mchod pa'i dam tshig yin//rjesu sbyor bas mchod na ni//sbyor po kun gyi bde bo'i
267a3(rgyud): mchog/sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yi//bde ba chen po yin par bshad//lha mo kun+da dang mnyam sbyor ba//sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'o//ye shes tsam la snyoms
267a4(rgyud): 'jug pa//rnal 'byor zhes ni bshad pa ya ni//sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yis//ting 'dzin rab tu sbyor ba'ang bshad//lha mo kun dang mnyam sbyor ba//sangs rgyas thams
267a5(rgyud): cad 'dus pa'o//sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba//sangs rgyas kun gyis byin rlabs pa'o//dga' bar spyod pa grub par bshad//rjes su sbyor ba rjes su sgrub//skyes
267a6(rgyud): pa ltar byed dga' spyod pa//slar yang rjes su sgrub paro mdzad//lha mo kun la bde sdug pa//sbyor ba kun la mos pa ni//kun tu sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag/ra~M sa ya na badre bar bshod//
267a7(rgyud): thams cad ldang ba kun 'gro ba//dngos grub dam par rab tu bshad//dngos grub chen po ldang po cher//sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgyar bshad//dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog/
267b1(rgyud): dbang phyug chen po bla na med//sangs rgyas dam pa kun gyi mchog/sangs rgyas kun gyi brda yis bshad//dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog/dbang phyug chen po bde ba'i mchog/sangs/
267b2(rgyud): rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba//sbyor ba'i dbang phyug bde chen no//khrag ni me tog yin par bshad//madrangs ni bdug pa yin par bshad//she chen dag ni mar me lter//thal
267b3(rgyud): mo dag ni spo su bshad//chang ni sgog mo yin par bshad//rab tu myos par sbrang rtsi'o//bu ram chang ni myos byed gsungs//rgun chang dag ni bdud rtsi yin//bdud rtsi lam gyi yan
267b4(rgyud): lag brgyad//sangs rgyas kun gyi brda yin no//rgun dang sbrang rtsi mchog tu dpe'//tshwa ni 'dod chags sro ba yon//skyur po'i khu ba g.yon can yin//kaM b+hi la ni bran mor bshad//
267b5(rgyud): chur ba zla ba nya ba yin//shA nr-i sman gyi mchog yin to//dbang phyug dam pa kun gyi mchog/sangs rgyas kun gyi brda yis bshad//dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog/chang ni ras
267b6(rgyud): ya nar bshad//zas ni tshe zhes bya bar bshad//bza' ba sna tshogs grub pa ni//sha dang chang ngu ldan pa dag/dga' ba'i long spyod skal bzang po//tshe yi dam pa yin par bshad//
267b7(rgyud): a 'bra rgun 'bru pa na sa//na li kau ra a ru ka/'bras bu che ni po'i khyad par dag/bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu yin par bshad//a mra smin pa grol bar bshad//de bzhin bde bar nyal
268a1(rgyud): ba dang //bde bas rab tu rmongs pa drug/sangs rgyas kun gyi blarda yin no//'bras bu chen po pa nas//rgun 'bru'i khu ba khu ba'i mchog/nal ge rang
268a2(rgyud): dngos grub che//dam chos 'bras bu a ru ka/glu yo tshig tu brjod par bshad//dar dring dag ni sil snyan yin//sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yis//gar ni rnam par rol
268a3(rgyud): par bshad//rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba'o//glu dang sil snyan gar byed pa//brda yi dam par bshad pa ni//sangs rgyas kun gyi rnam sprul pa'o//rab tu zhi ba'i sal
268a4(rgyud): snyan glu//dur khrod glu dang sa li snyan dang //gar ni shin tu rnam sprul pa'o//chagras bcwas glu dang sal snyan dang //gar ni shin tu rnam sprul pa'o//mi yi dbang po'i sil
268a5(rgyud): sman glu//gang ni shin tu rnam sprul pa'o//rab tu dga' ba'i sil snyen gla//rang gi rtsal gyi gar byas pa//rta mchog rnam par sprul pa ni//brda yi dmu par rab tu bshang //
268a6(rgyud): hUM zhes bya ba mkha' /khams gsum 'dir ni rnam par brtags//na mkhar 'gro ba'i phyag rgyu dag/mkha' 'gro zhes ni rab tu grags//kun tu sna tshogs drug rgya ni/
268a7(rgyud): thams cad na mkha' 'gro ba ste//sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba//mkha' 'gro ma zhes rab tu grags//sgyu ma'i gar dbang grub pa ni//a ra li zhes ming du bdagos/
268b1(rgyud): mkha' 'gro ma yAng A ra li//sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya'o//sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba//sgyu ma kun gyi gar byed pa//sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'o//
268b2(rgyud): mkha' 'phro ma yi dam tshig mchog/bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' dpal//rdo rje a ral zhes bshad do//sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba//mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'o mchog
268b3(rgyud): sems dpa' sngon dang mtha' med pa//rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba'i mchog/sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yas//de ni skal pa bzang por bshod//gang zhig rdo rje sems drapa'i mtshan//skal
268b4(rgyud): pa bzang po zhes brjod na//shin tu srid pa kun 'grub cing //de ni dbang phyug chen po 'grub//nak+ki 'dod pa yin par bshad//dga' ba ke li ki la yin//byams pa chu srin yin par bshad
268b5(rgyud): 'dod pa'i dbang po dbang phyug mchog/rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya dag/dam tshig gsum gyi dam pa yin//oM dang b+hu khaM kun bshad pa//sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yin//drangs te 'dug
268b6(rgyud): nas bcings pa dang //zhugs nas dbang du gyur pa ni//dzaHhUM baM hoHbshad pa ste//sangs rgyas kun gyi brda yin no//e hi ya hi zhes bshad pa//tshur spyon par bzhud zhes skyugs
268b7(rgyud): pa'o//ti sta ha zhes gsungs pa ni//longs la drongs shig drongs shig pa'o//kha kha khA hi zo shig pa'o//a pi zhes pa 'thung shin pa'o//da ra da ra byin zhes pa'o//ru ta ma ta re la
269a1(rgyud): cin 'o//rgyu lu d+ha lu rnams shi pa'o//a ra ra dang smra ba ts+tshida'o// mchog da man+dAr ni//al la la ho zhes bshad do//da
269a2(rgyud): mchog rgyas bdebs phyag rgya yin//e ma'o 'dre ba rmongs byed ma'o//snang ba zhes pa thob mo'o//hUM shi shi ni tshe 'phel ma'o//shin tu brtan dang rab tu brtan//kun tu brtan dang cher
269a3(rgyud): brtan pa//sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa dang //'jig rten dbang dang mkha' las skyes//shes gyur grub par 'gyur//zhugs la dbang du 'gyur bar mdzod//aM ai a aM kun
269a4(rgyud): bshad pa//sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yin//thams cad mkhyen par gyur pa dang //de bzhin bde bar mkhyen pa ni//oM sarba bid ces bshad pa ste//sangs rgyas brda yi phyag
269a5(rgyud): rgya yin//oM ru ru s+phu ru dz+wA la tiSh+Tha sa lo tsa ne sar+b+ba ar+tha sA d+ha ni swAhA//'khor ba'i dngos grub mkhyen pa dod//don dam nye ba pa ni bya'i phyir//sangs rgyus rang byung bcom ldan
269a6(rgyud): 'das//rnam snang mdzad chen gtso bo ni//sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yin//skal pa bzang po zhes bshad pa'o//ko Ta la gag+na ko Ta bo//kro Ta bag/ko Ta bA sh+tsa la/ka nI ra ke/ko
269a7(rgyud): la gu k+Sha/ko li ba/ko la ko la bash+tsa/ka la b+hasta thA//phyag na rdo rje rang don gyi//mtshan 'di rnams ni gang brjod pa//de la rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin//bran bzhin dngos grub gter bar
269b1(rgyud): 'gyur//rgyal srid dang ni long spyod dang //gter gyi rnams kyang lhag par ster//dgos pa thams cad byed par 'gyur//de bzhin dgra yang med par byed//mig dang rna ba sna dag dang //
269b2(rgyud): lce dang lus kyang de bzhin te//gzugs dang sgra dang dri dag dang //ro dang reg yang bdag gi don//rdo rje mtshon che be di dang //dgra bo dag tu rab grags pa//de yi phyag na rdo rje 'gyur//lag
269b3(rgyud): na rdo rje zhes kyang bya//nyon mongs thams cad gang zad dang //dgra rnams kyang ni gang zad pa//phyag na rdo rjes 'dul ba'i phyir//de ni yak+Sha yin par bshad//he ru dpal ni rdo rje che//
269b4(rgyud): thal bar 'jig pa'i mchog yin te//sangs rgyas kun gyi khro bo che//brda yis rab tu bshad pa yin//rdo rje 'bar ba rab tu 'jigs//kha T+wAM ga ni rgyal mtshan che//thod pa kham por
269b5(rgyud): pad+ma'i snod//khrag chen dang ni sbrang rtsi che//dkar mo rku byed rab rmongs dang //ro langs dang ni lbos byed dang //gtum mo dang ni spra ma dang //lha mo bdun ni brda yin no//bsrungs shig
269b6(rgyud): myur du rnam rgyal dpal//thal ba bzhin du rab tu lhog/ha~M haM hI hUM kun bshad pa//sangs rgyas brdo yi phyag rgya yi ni//rol cig dgongs shig de bzhin du//rol du chug shig gsod
269b7(rgyud): du chug/ma ro Ta phaT phaT ces bshad pa//sangs rgyas kun gyi brda yin te//rgyal po chen po rdo rje 'jan//dbang phyug dam pa'i rig pa ni//sangs rgyas brda' yi phyag rgya yis//skal pa
270a1(rgyud): bzang po yin par bshad//rgyal po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/'jig rten dbang phyug zhes bshad de//sangs rgyas kun gyi brda dag gis//
270a2(rgyud): yang skal ba bzang zhes bshad//dag dang grub dang de bzhin blo//rdzu 'phrul 'phel dang 'byor pa dang //rnam par lha dang sgrob ma dang //rgyal chen ma dang khro gnyer ma//pad+mor
270a3(rgyud): gnas zhes bya ba dang //rdo rje pad+mo'i dbang phyug ma//pad+mo lha mo rigs tshun te//sangs rgyas brda yis phyag rgyas bshad//na mkha'i snying po thams cad phyogs//re ba thams
270a4(rgyud): cad rdzogs mdzad pa//bskal pa bzang zhes rnam par grigs//rdo rje nyi ma nor po che//trAM khA ba Ta TA tra Ta kun tu grags pa//sangs rgyas kun gyi badz+ra yi ni te//dbang bskur
270a5(rgyud): bya dang gter dag dang //rgyal mtshan rtse mo mchod chen po//sna tshogs pad+mo thams cad spyani//de bzhin 'jig rten thams cad pa//byang chub kun gyi sems chen po//sna tshogs
270a6(rgyud): rdo rje bla na med//thams cad drag par mos pa yis//'jig rten thams cad rab 'jigs pa//rta mchog pad+ma dpal dang ldan//skal pa bzang zhes brda yis bstan//brda yi
270a7(rgyud): phyag rgya 'di rnams kyis//dkyil 'khor sbyor bas nges pa ni//grogs po mkhas par bcas pa yi//dngos grub thams cad grub par 'gyur//brda yi phyag rgya shes pa'o//rjesu
270b1(rgyud): chags par bya'o zhes//cha lugs shes pa bzhin byed cing //dngos grub kun la rjes chags pa//mi 'gyur dam pa 'grub par 'gyur//kun tu kun nas thams cad ni//bdag nyid rtag tu
270b2(rgyud): rnam pa kun//las kyi dngos grub rab 'byam dag/mo lus par ni myur du grub//rjes su chud par bya'o zhes//chu lugs shes pa bzhin byed pas//sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje mchog/che
270b3(rgyud): 'phrul dag ni ston par byed//rjes su chud par bya'o zhes//cha lugs shes pa bzhin byed pas//mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ma lus lus pa med par 'grub//rjes su sbyang bar
270b4(rgyud): bya'o zhes//cha lugs shes pa bzhin byed pas//sgrib sbyad thams cad dngos grub rnams//ma lus lus pa mau da par 'grub//rjes su yi rang bya'o zhes//cha lugs shes pa bzhin byed
270b5(rgyud): pas//bud med la sogs rin chen mchog/mchod po'i las kun myur du 'grub//rjes su gzhom par bya'o zhes//cha lugs shes pa bzhin byed pas//rtul phod las rnams
270b6(rgyud): thams cad ni//mA lus lus pa med par 'grub//ye shes kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o//rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba//dbyibs dang gzugs ni ci 'drar ldan//thams cad bdag
270b7(rgyud): nyid rgyar sbyor ba//mi 'gyur dam pa 'grub par 'gyur//kun tu kun nas thams cad ni//bdag nyid rtag tu rnam po kun//pr-i se na yi dngos grub mchog/me lus lus pa med par
270'a1(rgyud): 'grub//sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba//mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog gis//yang dag bde ba tshul bzhin du//mthong ba dang na thos par
270'a2(rgyud): byed//sa chu maM rlung na mkha' dang //khams rnams kun ni thams cad ltos//thams cad mthong zhing thos par byed//rnam par shes pa kun 'grub cing //kun tu thams cad
270'a3(rgyud): kun gyi bdag/'dod pa'i yon+tan thams cad dang //rnam par shes pa'i las kun la//thams cad mthong zhing shes par byed//pad+mor chags par rjes chags zhing //sna
270'a4(rgyud): tshogs pad+mo kha 'byed pas//pra sai nu ni sna tshogs pa//mthong ba dang ni thos par byed//me togu bdug pa mar me mchog/spos dang mchod pa thams cad la//rnam par shes pa
270'a5(rgyud): kun grub pa//thams cad mthong zhing thos par byed//reg dang ma reg rdo rje che//ral gri me long mda' gzhu dang //shing dang chu dang 'bab chu brag/gzugs brnyan byung ba'i khyim
270'a6(rgyud): dag las//bya dang de bzhin mi bya dang //stor ba dang ni ma stor drang //phrogs pa dang ni ma phrogs dang //de bzhin snyed dang ma rnyed dang //gson pa dang ni shi ba dang //de bzhi ni rgyal dang
270'a7(rgyud): pham pa dang //don yod dang ni don med dang //de bzhin grub dang mi grub dang //bde dang mi bde cho ga bzhin//lha yul dag ni don rnams dang //sangs rgyas zhing gi don rnams kyang //
270'b1(rgyud): kun tu kun nas thams cad ni//bsams pa mthong zhing thos par byed//rnam par shes pa'i phyag rgya shes pa'o//rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba//ji lta'i dbyibs dang gzugs
270'b2(rgyud): ldan pas//dur khrod lha yi gnas rnams dang //ma mo gnas kyi thal ba mchog/thams cad dpral ba'i srung ba ni//thig le sor ris gsum du bya//phyogs mtshams na mkha'
270'b3(rgyud): sa bcings na//srung ba kun gyi bla med pa'o//dpal rdo rje thal ba'i dam tshig zhes bya ba'i srung ba'o//rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba//ji lta'i dbyibs dang gzugs ldan pas//
270'b4(rgyud): rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i gzugs chu'i 'gram//lha rdzas zhi ba'i chu mchog gis//gtor ba dang ni blugs pa dang //khrus bya ba dang 'bogs pa yis//phyogs mtshams na mkha' sa
270'b5(rgyud): bcings na//srung ba kun gyi bla med pa'o//dpal rdo rje bdud rtsi dri ma med pa'i rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba//ji lta'i gzugs dang dbyibs
270'b6(rgyud): ldan pas//mi yi thod pa'i nang du ni//nyungs kar bskyed nas blang bar bya//lo mo nyungs mar zosu bza'//mgo bskus de bzhin 'bras bu yis//phyogs mtshams na mkha' so bcings/
270'b7(rgyud): ni//srung ba kun gyi bla med pa'o//dpal don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba//ma mchu so yis legs mnan nas//dpal ldan g.yon
271a1(rgyud): du 'gying dang bcas//gsal bar phyogasu 'khor lo'i tshul bla 'og du ni byin rlabs na//gnas gsum dag ni rgyus 'deb so//gzhug dkar bdag nyid
271a2(rgyud): ngan pa'i rnams//sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo bor 'grub//thams cad kyi mchog gnas kyi dbang phyug byin gyis bzlas pa dpal skal ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//rdo rje sems
271a3(rgyud): dpa' drang la sbyor ba//lha mo kun dang 'dus pa yis//kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang po//bde bong rab tu 'grub par 'gyur//rgya 'dis btab ma thug tu ni//sangs rgyas kun
271a4(rgyud): gyis byin gyis brlabs 'gyur//shin tu byin gyis brlabs pa las//sangs rgyas kun dang phrad par 'gyur//sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor bas//sangs rgyas kun dang /
271a5(rgyud): mnyam par 'gyur//sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam pas ni//sangs rgyas thams cad rab tu 'grub//sangs rgyas kun dang mnyamu sbyor ba//dpal skol bu bzang po'i dam tshig zhes
271a6(rgyud): bya ba'i srung bya'o//rdo rje sems dpa' de//lnga sbyor ba//sangs rgyas kun bdag spyod ldan pas//phyogasu legs par 'khor lo'i tshul//bla dang 'og tu byin rlabs nas//'di yis
271a7(rgyud): srung ba byas na ni//khams gsum dag ni mo lus par//gzhug dka' bdag nyi nad pa rnams//sangs rgyas kun gyi byin rlabs 'gyur//thams cad kyi mchog gnas kyi
271b1(rgyud): dbang phyug dpal zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba//he ru dpal gyis rnam sprul pasra//thams cad kun tu kun gyi bdag/thams cad srung ba mi 'gyur che//rims dang
271b2(rgyud): dug dang dbyig dug nod//mkha' 'gros gtso dang gnod rnams dang //hAd dang ngan khrid thams cad ni//mong la rab tu zhi bar 'gyur//drungal rdo rje he ru ka dbab pa rnam par sprul pa
271b3(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba//ji lta'i dbyibs dang gzugs ldan zhing //sna tshogs pad+mo kha 'byed pas//sgrib pa med par 'grub par 'gyur//sgrib pa
271b4(rgyud): kun las rnam par grol//dag pa thams cad thob par 'gyur//dag pa thams cad rnam dag ni//mi 'gyur dam pa 'grub par 'gyur//chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes
271b5(rgyud): rdo rje'i pad+mo zhes bya ba'i srung ba'o//rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba//'bar ba lta bu'i tshul zhugs na//rdo rje rab tu 'bar bA'i me//rab tu 'jigs pa mi bzod 'gyur//'di yis srung ba byas nini/
271b6(rgyud): bsgral pa yin me ltar 'bar//'di yis ngan 'gro rnam gsum dang //khas gsI dag kyong thal drang rlog/rdo rje chen po'i me rab tu 'jigs pa 'byar bA mi bzod pa'i dram tshig chen po'i dpal zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//rdo rje
271b7(rgyud): sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba//ji lta'i tshul bzhin byed pa yis//rdo rje'i khu tshur gnyis bcings nas//go cha bgo ba'i thab su bya//spyi bo dang ni dpral bar gnyis//glo gnyis dang ni rgyab tu
272a1(rgyud): gnyis du rdo rje phreng ba bcing ba dang //sangs rgyas gtsug gi nor bu dag/dar bcings thab su bcings nas ni//'gying dang bcus par mtha' nas dgrol//dar sbyang
272a2(rgyud): pA yi thabs byas nas//thal mo brdebs pas bstan par bya//'di yis srung ba byas na ni//rdo rje sems dpa' dpal dang 'dra//mchod pa dang mi phyed pa'i//rdo rje'i sku ni rab tu 'grub//
272a3(rgyud): rims nad dug dang dbyig dug nad//mkha' 'gros gtso dang gdon rnams dang //yan lag mi rungs byed pa kun//'di yis bsrungs na yong mi tshugs//dpal rdo rje go cha zhes bya ba'i
272a4(rgyud): phyag rgya'o//srung ba thams cad kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o//chos sems dpa' yi tshul ston cing //rdo rje khu tshur gnyis ngag dang //zhi ba'i lta bas bltas nas ni//rims dang dug rnams
272a5(rgyud): thams cad sel//rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas//mthe'u chung lcags kyu lta bur bcing //mdzub mo bsnyams pa'i rtse mos mnan//nang rnams thams cad bzlog par byed//yongasu
272a6(rgyud): bsgyur te bteg nas ni//dpral bar bde bar bzhag par bya//ma lus lus pa med pa yi//sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar byed//dpal rdo rje smin mtshams lus kyi nad gso ba'o//rdo rje
272a7(rgyud): bsdams pa byas pa las//mdzub mo phan tshun mngon phyogs pa//ma lus lus pa med pa yi//zug rngu kun las grol por 'gyur//bu ning lkog rgal skran dag dang //dmu rdzings la
272b1(rgyud): sogs kun la sa thar//'di nyid grub par gyur nas ni//nad rnams kun gyis gnod pa med//zug rngu thams cad med par byed pa'o//grub pa dpal gyi spyan bcings te//'di yis mag
272b2(rgyud): gnyis phyis na nI//phyag rgya'i sbyor ba mchog 'di yis//long ba dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur//bdag nyid sbyor bas ldan byas la//rdo rje khu tshur dam pa yis//drang ba'i tshul du glad pa nas//
272b3(rgyud): kha phyogaso drang zhing btung bar bya//rims dang drug dang gdon rnams kun//rdo rje khu tshung dpal gyis bzung //bdag gis lhar ni sbyor ldan pas//'thungs na thams cad med par 'gyur//klung
272b4(rgyud): pa'i sman no//ta thA ga ta gar+b+ho s+thA si ho//'di ni rna bar gazlas pa'i mchog/zug rngu med cing myur du thar//zug rngu thams cad 'byin pa po//g.yas pa yi ni lag pa yis//sems depa'i gtsug
272b5(rgyud): tor bcings na ni//byis pa nad med 'tsho bar 'gyur//thams cad bsrungs shig bde ba 'i'athob//gzhon nu gso ba'o//g.yos pa yi ni lag pa yis//klu yi gdengs ka lta bur bya//'ab
272b6(rgyud): pa'i tshul ston 'debs bcas ni//dug gi las rnams bsgrub par bya//'bar dang 'dul dang bcing ba dang //za ba'i dug rnams med par byed//bdug pas zin dang lu ta dang //shi ba sos
272b7(rgyud): par byed pa'i mchog/gdengs ka'i phyag rgya'o//g.yas pa'i mthe bong gung mo gnyis//g.yon pa'i khu tshur bcangs pa yi//gung mo la ni reg byas na//gdon rnams kun las thang
273b1(rgyud): /sbyor ba tshig gang bshad pa//rtag tu dad sa thams cad na//yod la bas skyob bzhin du 'jug/shong bskyod pa'o drug d+hA nas dru'o//'khrul 'khor gyis yangs sa
273b2(rgyud): do//de bzhin lag pas 'phangs pa dang //'phangs nas slar du brdung ba dang //stobs 'byed pa lci yin te//rang drung rnams kyi dag rnyi dpyang //phyag rgya lngal rab tu gnas/
273b3(rgyud): rdorje sems dpa'i dpal gyis bshad//dam pa de dag bshad par bya//dbyibs dang bde ga sbyor ba dang //kun tu spyir dang 'drin mer myung //'gengs 'dzin dang gsel ba/
273b4(rgyud): pagi ngas pas semanan nga // pa da seM sa ga / g+sa / me ni pa // kyi kyang gi gam pa da//dbyipas kyi /
273b5(rgyud): dang sun gzugs dang //man cing yan lag rterten pa dang //hU~M tshang 'ashes shing rnam par dag/lus kyi phyug rgyu 'ang drug can//'di mas lus la gnan po dang //rim sa dang drug dang /
273b6(rgyud): drug dang //mkha' 'gros gci dang gdon rnams kyis//nams kyang tshugs par yod mi 'gyur/ 'gas pa'i phyag d+hA'o//rang gi snying kI shAdren tshul du//bde drug ce na gyis ga
273b7(rgyud): bzung nas//g.yas pa rab tu gar byed cing //mda' 'phangs na ni 'grub par 'gyur//dpal khams gsum rnam par tshul ba'i'o//lag pa g.yon po legs bsrang la//skyon med pa
274a1(rgyud): g.yas pa dgun//glazhu rgyud dal bus drangs nas ni//'gro ba thams cad dgug par bya//thams cad dgug pa'i phyag rgya'o//rna drung bar du zlum por ni//
274a2(rgyud): ji ltar rigs par legs bkang la//yi ge oM tsam rang gi khar//gzung na 'gro ba 'dzin par 'gyur//'dzin pa'i phyag rgya'o//ji ltar rigs pas drangs nas ni//cho ga bzhin du bzung
274a3(rgyud): nas kyang //der ni cung zad dbye bar bya//'gengs pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur//'gengs pa'i phyag rgya'o//chad pas 'ben ni bsgrib par bya//'dzum dang bcas pa'i mig gis blta/
274a4(rgyud): lta ba chang pa la gtad nas//myur du 'phangs na dam pa 'grub//mda' gzhus rgyal bar bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//grub bzhi pa la rno ba dang //de bzhini kun nas bskor bar bya//g.yas phyogs
274a5(rgyud): nas ni mnga' bskor nas//smad de de bzhin bstod pa dang //rkang pas mnan cing rmig pos mnon//'bigs pa bcu yi rgya mchog gis//khams gsum rgyal srid chen po dag/bde
274a6(rgyud): bar thub nas nye bar spyod//dpal khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'o//rab tu 'phangs dang mnyam par 'phangs//de bzhin glog ltar 'phangs pa dang /glog ltar 'khrug pa de bzhin te//
274a7(rgyud): phyag rgya thabs rnams sgrub pa'o//thabs thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o//nyam nga lag dang bde phyogs dang //thad ka de bzhin gyen tu 'debs//'di dag bzlog pa'i phyag rgya ste//gnas gsum
274b1(rgyud): dag ni bzlog par bya//nges par bzlog pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o//thams cad 'debs dang nges par 'debs//kun 'debs gyen du 'debs pa'i gar//'di dag 'phrog pa'i phyag rgya ste//granas
274b2(rgyud): gsum dag kyang 'phrog par byed//'phrog pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o//kun tu kun nas thams cad kyi//rtag tu bdag nyid rnam pa kun//mda' gzhu'i dpyad kyi phyag rgya mchog/mi
274b3(rgyud): 'gyur dam pa 'grub par 'gyur//dgra cha thams cad kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o//srin lag gnyis kyi nang du ni//mthe bo legs par bzhag par bya//de nas khu tshur bcangs nas ni//mdzub mo
274b4(rgyud): legs par dgug par bya//rdo rje khu tshur dpal gyi rgya//rdo rje sems dpa' dpal la gnas//las kyi dngos grub rab 'byam rnams/ma lus par ni myur du 'grub//dpal rngo
274b5(rgyud): rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya'o//rdo rje khu tshur logs bcangs la//bdag gi mthe bo'i nang du gzhug/zhi ba'i las rnams rab grub pas//ma lus lus pa med par 'gru'o//de bzhin gshegs
274b6(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi khro tshuro//rdo rje khu tshur leg snga bcangs la//mthe'u chung gnyis nA ri ba brkyang nas//mkha' 'gro'i las rnams thams cad ni//ma lus lus pa med par 'grub//dpal
274b7(rgyud): rdo rje he ru ka'i khu tshur gyi phyag rgya'o//brdeg pa'i khu tshur bcangs pa las//mthe bong dag l-i gung mo bzhag/dpal pad+mo'i khu tshur grub pa ste//thams cad dag pa'i las la sbyar/dpal
275a1(rgyud): pad+mo'i khu tshu ro//khu tshur rdo rje rin chen mchog/'bebs pa thams cad yongs rdzogs pa//rang don las rnams grub pa ni//ma lus lus pa med
275a2(rgyud): par 'grub/dpal rdo rje rin po che'i khu tshur gyi phyag rgya'o//rdo rje khu tshur dpal bcangs la//sor mo thams cad yongasu bzung //rtul phod las rnams thams cad ni/
275a3(rgyud): ma lus lus pa med par 'grub//las thams cad kyi phyag rgya shis pa'o//rkang pa brkyang dang gnon pa dang //bsgoms nas btig pa'i stabs dag dang //g.yas dang g.yon gyi sbyor
275a4(rgyud): ba yis//gzugs rnams thams cad mnan par bya//sdig med stobs kyi ngo mthon du//rnam par snang mdzad dpal mnan nas//kun tu byang chub yongs bkug ste//bdag
275a5(rgyud): gri spyad par de spyod do//sdig mad stobs kyis ngo 'thon du//rdo rje 'dzin pa dpal mnan nas//kun tu grub pa yongs bkug ste//bdag gi spyad par de spyod do//sdig med stobs
275a6(rgyud): kyis ngo 'thon du//spyan res gzigs dbang dpal mnan nas//kun tu dpal mo yongs bkug ste//bdag gis spyad par de spyod do//sdig ming stobs kyis ngo 'thon du//rdo rje
275a7(rgyud): nyi ma dpal gnan nas//kun tu long spyod yongs bkug ste//bdag gi spyad par de spyod do//sdig mang stobs kyis ngo 'dzin du//rta mchog dam pa dpal mnan nas//thams cad dbang
275b1(rgyud): phyug yongs bkug ste//bdag byi spyad par de sbyong ngo //byang chub pa rol byin pa dang //grub dang gzugs dang sa rnams dang //rig drang phyag rgya rnams mnan nas//bdag gi sbyang bar nga
275b2(rgyud): sbyong ngo //sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du//dbang phyug dam pa mnan nas ni//mig gsum pa las gsum grub bkug/bdag gi spyad pa ra de spyod do//sdig med stobs kyi ngo 'thon du//
275b3(rgyud): mthu bo tsha yid mnan nas ni//snying las dpal mo yongs bkrug ste//bdag gi sbyang bar de spyod do//sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du//skye dgu'i bdag yo minan nas ni//mos las
275b4(rgyud): grol ma yongs bkug nas//bdag gi spyad par de spyod do//sdig med stobs kyis do mthon du//rab dga'i dbang phyug mnan nas ni//kun gyi bdag las dga' ba bkug/bdag gi spyad
275b5(rgyud): par de spyod do//'jigs la sogs pa'i lha mo dang //ma mo byed ma'i ma mo dang //mkha' 'gro ma rnams mnan nas ni//bdag gi spyad par de spyong ngo do//de bzhin ku be ra la sogs//rig
275b6(rgyud): pa 'grub pa byung ba dang //mi yi rgyal po la sogs kyang //mnan nas bdag gi spyad pa spyong //'gro ba dang ni mi 'gro de'i//dngos po thams cad mau lus pa'ang //rnal 'byor bdag nyid des
275b7(rgyud): mnan nas//bdag gi spyad pa de spyod do//dpal rdo rje gnon pa'i phyag rgya shes pa'o//khu tshur snying kar bcangs pa ni//dud med phyag rgyar de bshad do//bung ming sbyor ba ma lus pa//
276a1(rgyud): lus pa med pa'ang thams cad 'grub//g.yon pa 'gying pa'i tshul byas nas//lag g+ha yas bdag gi snying khar ni//gyen tu grang ba'i tshul byas na//brang
276a2(rgyud): med thams cad dpung du 'gyur//dpal rdo rje 'gying ba'o//dpal ldan sna tshogs pad+mo 'dzin//g.yon pa brdeg pa'i khu tshur dang //g.yas par ldang bar gyur pa dang //sangs rgyas
276a3(rgyud): dbang phyug ting 'dzin bya//sangs rgyas thams cad du 'phar bya'o//ge yin pa dril bu'i sgra sgrogs shing //g.yas pa yi ni ldeg pa yis//rdo rje gyen du gsor zhing bskor//sgyu ma
276a4(rgyud): thams cad 'byung bar bya//dpal rdo rje sgyu ma'i dbang phyug ma'o//g.yon pa g.yon pa'i ba la bzhag/lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo yis//rtse mos pad+mod de 'dzin//grAyas
276a5(rgyud): pa'i brlal lag dang po zhig/mi dge ba thams cad sol ba'i phyag rgya'o//bdag gi snying khar 'dren tshul du//g.yon pa nor bu rin tshan 'dzin//g.yas pa re ba kun rdzogs pa'i//
276a6(rgyud): bud med la sogs rin chen 'dzin//bsam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o//bdag gi sbreng kar 'dren tshul du//pad+mo sna tshogs dam pa 'dzin//g.yas pa rdo rje 'bying
276a7(rgyud): ba yis//dbang phyug dam pa thob par 'gyur//dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug gi phyag rgya shes pa'o//kun tu rnam pa sna tshogs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i rtog pa ste dgu pa'o//
276b1(rgyud): de nas kun tu sna tshogs 'di//phyag rgya shes pa'ang grub pa ni//kun tu sna tshogs sbyor ba yis//kun tu sna tshogs bshad par bya//sbyin ma mig dang so dang mchu//kha dang lus dang
276b2(rgyud): lag gis//cha lugs bzhin du gor byed pas//phyag rgya thams cing yongs su dgrol//rdo rje sems dpa' da la sbyor bas//lha mo kun dang 'dus pa ni//kun tu sna tshogs
276b3(rgyud): skal bzang po//rab tu bde bar grub par 'gyur//phyog rgya 'di yis btab na ni//sangs rgyas thams cad byin gyis rlob//legs par byin gyis brlabs na ni//sangs rgyas
276b4(rgyud): thams cad 'dus par 'gyur//sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor bas//sangs rgyas kun dong mnyam par 'gyur//sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam pas ni//sangs rgyas thams cad
276b5(rgyud): rab tu 'grub//rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba'i//mthu nyid kyis ni thams cad du//mdor na phyag rgya thams cad ni//so so dag nas grub par 'gyur//lta bas mi ngoms pa yi
276b6(rgyud): skud thams cad bdag nyid ston par mdzad//legs so la ga sngo zhes grub pa'i//dam pa dag kyang rab tu sgrol//bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs pa'i//grub pa kun mchog nyams
276b7(rgyud): dga' ba//ji ltar 'dod pa'i longs spyod du//thams cad kyi ni bdag nyid stsol//dang po kun las byung ba yi//mchod pa'i sprin chen thams cad kyi//bkod pa rab 'byam tshogs
277a1(rgyud): namas samasama.a tha/tha.a mthamasamamma sa ma ma
277a2(rgyud): rnams kyi//thams cad bdag nyid mchod pa mdzad//dpal ldan g.yon pa 'gying dang bcas//dpal ldan lag pa g.yas pa yi//pad+mo khu tshur dpral bar
277a3(rgyud): bzhag/bdag gi mig ni gyen tu lta//'di ni rdo rje sems dpa' yi//phyag rgya thams cad rab sgrub pa'o//byin tu 'phar ba'i dngos grub dang //rab 'byam las rnams myur du 'grub//
277a4(rgyud): phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni//khams gsum pa dag ma lus pa//rgyas btab rmongs byas zos pa dang //thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed//bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'as
277a5(rgyud): de skad gsungaso//kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang po//dpal rdo rje pad+mo gyen du 'phar ba'i spyan zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ste//rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad kyi phyag rgya dang //phyag rgya'i lan
277a6(rgyud): zhes pa'o//sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa yis//rtag tu dpag ming tshe dang ldan//na mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i//bden pa'i tshig ni rab tu smra//mtha' yas pa dang mu
277a7(rgyud): med pa'i//rtog pa kun dang 'di yi ni//mthu dang yon+tanA bsngags pa'i mtha'//brjod pa dag tu yod mi nus//mthu dang rang bzhin dag gis grub//ngo bo nyid kyis rtag tu grub//so so
277a8(rgyud): rjes grub bde ba ster//'di ni gsang mchog mchog gi mchog/sems can don phyir las rnams sbyong ba dang //rnam par dag par rgyal ba yong mi mdzad//'di la bgegs med
277b1(rgyud): bdud kyang yod ma yin//rtog pas mi 'grub thar bar yong mi nus//mi brtan pa dang bdud du nga mi 'gyur//brtan par bya ba'i phyir yang nga ming doms//gang zhig rang gi bde bas nga sgrub na///
