277b2(rgyud): dngos grub mchog gis de ni brtan par byed//kun tu tshogs pas ni de skad gsungs//bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs pa rtog tu dgyes//rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyis legs
277b3(rgyud): gsungs la//mngon par bstod cing rab tu dgyes par gyur//le'u bcu pa'o////rnam mang rjes chags dga' ba'i pad+mo rnam dag mchod pa dang //rta mchog rnal 'byor bde
277b4(rgyud): bas gsal bar rje su mchod na ni//rab tu bde ba'i rnal 'byor dam pa skal bzang dga' ba'i mchog/rab mchog bde ba'i rang bzhini dam tshig bde bas rjesu grub par 'gyur//bcom
277b5(rgyud): ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa'as de skad gsungaso//sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog ces bya ba'i rtog pa//rtog pa thams cad kyi
277b6(rgyud): 'khor los bskor ba chen po bde ba chen po rdzogs so///rgya gar skad du/sarba kol+la sa muts+tsha ya nA ma sarba bud+d+ha sa ma yo ga TI ki nI dz+wa la saM ba ra ut+ta ra ut+ta ra tan+ta/
277b7(rgyud): bod skad du/rtog pa thams cad 'dus pa ces bya ba sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog gi rgyud phyi mi'i phyi ma//dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag
278a1(rgyud): 'tshal lo//sangs rgyas thams cad phyag 'tshal te//ma lus lus pa med par 'grub//rnam rtog med pa'i sems la ni//de kho na nyid nges par
278a2(rgyud): gnas//sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos//rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na//thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs//'dod chags chen
278a3(rgyud): po bde chen po//bde chen rdo rje chen po pas//rdo rje 'dzin dang lhan cig pa'i//bde gshegs mgon mchog rnams kyis bzhugs//thams cad mchog 'gyur 'dod chen gyis//dngos
278a4(rgyud): grub dbang phyug rab grub phyir//sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor las//rtog pa 'dus pas bka' stsal 'tshal//rnam par mi rtog chos bdag las//rtog pa'i don nga'i gang
278a5(rgyud): la gsungs//ci yi slad du'ang rgyud phyi mo//dang po'i sa mchog ji ltar lags//gdod mya tha ma med nyid yang //rdo rje sems drapal de bzhin te//yig 'bru ji ltar gsungs pa lags//
278a6(rgyud): sngags phyung ba yang ci 'dra ste//shin tu dga' dang bzang nyid de//rdo rje snying po gtso bo gtso//sems dang sems dpa'i ting 'dzin yang //de bzhin rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin//rdo rje 'dzin nyid
278a7(rgyud): chen po yang //byang chub spyod pa rnams ji ltar//bdud dang bdud las rgyal ba yang //sangs rgyas byang chub ji ltar lags//rdo rje gtum mo thar byed dang //phyag rgya rdo rje yang
278b1(rgyud): ji ltar//dang po'i rigs bskyed ji ltar lags//'dod pa'i thar pa rnam pa ci//mgon po rnam gsum ji ltar 'tshal//thams cad yang nyid ji ltar lags//ji ltar dang po snying po 'byung //
278b2(rgyud): nye ba'i snying po de ji ltar//bde ba chen po rdo rje che//don yod dam tshig ji ltar lags//dkyil 'khor ji ltar gsungs par gyur//de yi rnam smini dri 'dra ste//thig grang ba de bzhin rtog pa yi//
278b3(rgyud): dngos grub ji ltar bshad pa lags//gsang ba lnga dang de nyid che//gang lags ci 'dra de bzhin te//dkyil 'khor gtso bo rnams dang ni//rigs rnams kyang ni ji ltar lags//thams
278b4(rgyud): cad dbang bskur de nyid dang //de nyid tshogs kyi phyag mtshan yang //thams cad dgu dang mtshon chen dang //rang gi byin rlabs sogs grub pa//de rnams de nyid gsang chen dang //dam pa
278b5(rgyud): dang ni don dma~M pA//dam pa'i yi ge grub don du//thams cad mi gsung 'os mu legs//sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las de kho na nyid
278b6(rgyud): thams cad nges tshig gi rtog pa ste bco brgyad pa'o////de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin//rtog pa kun gyi gtso chen pos//the tshom kun gyi tshogs gnas nas//don dam 'dzin pa yang
278b7(rgyud): bka' stsal//de la ji ltar rtog pa'i don rgyud yin zhe na//rnam par mi rtog chos dge las//sems can don du yongasu rtog/de phyir rtog par yang dag bshad//rtog pa yongs dag phyiraro///
279a1(rgyud): de la ji ltar rgyud phyi ma yin zhe na//rgyud ni rab tu 'brel par bshad//phyi ma gong du byung ba yin//de nyid gsang ba gsang chen rnams//da yang rgyud ni phyi mar
279a2(rgyud): 'dod//de la ji ltar dang po sa nyid kyi ye shes yin zhe na//na mkha' kun tu rab gnas pa//rdo rje kun gyi dngos po mchog/bde chen dgyes pa chen po de//dam pa'i yi ge gzhal
279a3(rgyud): yas khang //zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa'as gsungs//de la ji ltar gdong ma dang tha ma med pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' yin zhe nA//yi ge ka sogs d+ha yig mtha'//
279a4(rgyud): nganya spangs nas 'jug par bya//yi ge d+ha sogs Sha yi mtha'//phreng ba gnyis pa yang dag bri//dbus gnas par ni a yi gi phreng //zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bkad de//thig le
279a5(rgyud): zla chos dang ldan par//tshe ga drag zla ba gnyis yin te//a yig mi 'gyur bsgom par bya//dbus su rdo rje'i ngo bor gnas//de dbus rtag tu sgom pa ni//'dod chags chen po bde
279a6(rgyud): ba che rngarnga 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//sangs rgyas ri mo grags pa yin//de las 'gro ba g.yo mi g.yo//thams cad yang dag 'byung bas ni//nam mkha' las byung mtshan ma'i
279a7(rgyud): phyir gdod ma tha ma meng mchog yin//rdo rje chen po dngos sems ni//rdo rje sems dpa' zhes 'dod do//de la bcom ldan 'das de gang yin zhe na//dngos grub chen po kun gyi
279b1(rgyud): dbang phyug chen po rig pa lha//rgyal po chen po rdo rje 'dzin//dam pa yi ga shin tu dga'//de la ji ltar yi ge rtog pa yin zhe na//yi ge a sogs k+Sha ma tha ni//yi der yang dag
279b2(rgyud): bshad pa ste//mi zad dga' ba'i rdo rje can//de nyid kun don mtshan nyid phyir//de la ji ltar sngags 'byung ba yin zhe na//rdo rje sems sogs 'khor lo la//gang rnams sngags
279b3(rgyud): su cher bshad pa//de rnams byung ba'i don du ni//rdo rje can gyis yang bka' stsaste//gur gu mA la sogs byug pa la//'dri sku la sogs rnam brgyan nas//bla re la sogs bris
279b4(rgyud): nas su//rtag tu re'u mig bzhi brtsams nas//gru bzhi gzhal yas khang byas te//re'u mig phyogs bzhi ri 'bar bar byas//re mig sum cu thams pa l-i//bcu dgu dang ni
279b5(rgyud): ldan par bya//brgya phyed stan la gnas pa la//sde pa lnga mtha' thig le yiso//spyi bo gtsug la baurtag pa yi//ka dang shau zhes bya ba ni//dbus kyi re'u mi ga la br-i'o//de yi phyi/
279b6(rgyud): rel gnas brgyad dag/mtshams dang phyogs kyi re'u mig la//dang ldan la sogs rimo pa ru//ya dang sha ye sde bkod de//me mtshams la sogs re'u myig la//ma yi yig 'bru
279b7(rgyud): bzhi po dang //a yig sa bon la brten nas/sa bon bcu gnyis bkod par bya//dbang ldan la sogs re'u mig la//ka yig la sogs rim par dgod//
280a1(rgyud): de ltar bzhi la rim ni//thams cad rnam par gnas byas te//ka sogs re'u mi'i bzung nas//yig 'bru dam pa phyung ba bya//shin+da tu dga' chen nur
280a2(rgyud): po ni/ sbyor ba thams cad dbang phyug gtso//re'u mig nyi shu rtsa banI li//gnas pa zla phyed gtsug phud zhal//de 'og sum cu rtswa gnyis ni//dga' ba rdo rje can gyis byung //re'u mig
280a3(rgyud): bcu bzhi zhes pa la//gnas pa chog drug dang ldan pa//re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhir gnas//sum cu rtsa bzhi zla dang ldan//re'u mig sum cu rtsa gcig la//gnas pa nga ro thig le ldan//
280a4(rgyud): re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhi la//gnas pa tsheg drag sbyor ba bya//sum cu rtsa brgyad sbyor ba yis//de ni bzhi par rnam par bshad//bde ba chen po rgyal chen po//lha mo dam pa rtag pa'o//re'u
280a5(rgyud): mig bcu gcig la gnas pa//thig leng ror yang dag ldan//re'u mig brgyad pa la granas pa//bcu dgu dang ni ldan pa ste//de 'og sum cu rtsa bzhi dang //thig le nga ro rgyan pa'o//re'u
280a6(rgyud): mig nyi shu rtsa bzhi la//gnas pa tsheg drag sbyor ba'o//re'u mig gnyis pa lo bkod pa'i//thig le ngo ro ldan pa'i//gling bu ma la sogs btus pa'i//sngags phyung ba ni mchog yin te//
280a7(rgyud): re'u mig sum cu rtsa brgyad la//gnas pa'i thig le nga ro ldan//dbus na nyi shu rtsa gcig la//dbus nas bco lnga zla ba can//re'u mig sum cu rtsa gcig gnas//dbus nas bco
280b1(rgyud): l-I ba can//re'u mig nyi shu rtsa gcig gnas//bcu gcig zla ba dang ldan te//lha mo gling bu ma sogs kyi//sngags byung rmad du byung ba'o//re'u mig bcu pA la gnas dang //bcu
280b2(rgyud): gcig pa yang de bzhin te//re'u mig sum cu rtsa gsum gnas//bcu drug pa yang de bzhin te//me tog la sogs bsdus pa yi//'di ni sngags phyung mchog yin no//rta mgrin 'phangs
280b3(rgyud): mtho lcags kyu sogs//dang po 'byung ba'i sa bon nyid//rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi//sgo la nan tan gyis sbyor ro//zhes dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs te//dpal rdo
280b4(rgyud): rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi chos kyi yi ge 'byung ba'i phyag rgya zhes pa'o//re'u mig gnyis pa can kho na//zla tshes gtsug dang ldan pa'i zhal//rnam par snang mdzad rgyal chen po/
280b5(rgyud): kun mchogs yi dbang phyug yin//re'u mig bco lnga gnas po la//thig le nga ro ldan pa'o//re'u mig bcu dgu la gnas pa//thig le de ro rgyan pa'o//re'u mig nyi shu rtsa lngar ldan//thig
280b6(rgyud): lde nga ros rgyan pa'o//dbus nas nyi shu pa nyid la//thig le nga ro rgyan pa'o//chos gos ma tshogs bzhi dag go/sa bon 'byung ba mchog 'di yin//re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhir gnas/
280b7(rgyud): thig le nga ros rgyan pa'o//re'u mig bdun pa de bzhin yang //dbus nas bco lnga pa dang ldan//thig le nga ro ldan pa ni//byang du sil snyan cha lang ngo //dbus gnas nyi shu rtsa gcig la//
281a1(rgyud): gnas pa bcu dgu dang ldan pa//thig le nga ro ldan pa ni//rdo rje rin chen cher brjod do//dbus nas bco brgyad pa dag nyid//thig leng ro rgyan pa ste//sangs
281a2(rgyud): rgyas kun gyi dkyil 'khor la//chos kyi dung gi phyag rgya che//zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi chos kyi yi ge 'byung ba'i phyag rgya
281a3(rgyud): shes pa'o//nyi shu rtsa bzhi re'u migra la//gnos pa nyi shu pa ldan ni//khrag 'thung zhes pa'i rgyal po che//tsheg drag lhag chad gyur pa'o//re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhi la//gnas pa
281a4(rgyud): 'og na bcu dgur ldan//re'u mig nyi shu gnas pa dang //sbyor ba tsheg drag ldan pa'o//tsheg drag dang ni rtsa bzhi la//gnas pa dbus gnas bcu gcig ldan//re'u mig bcu gnyis
281a5(rgyud): basbyor ba'i//tshwag drag ldan par 'dod pa'o//re'u mig bcu bzhi la gnas pa//'og gi 'dren pa nyi shu gcig/bcu gnyis pa dang tshig drag can//gsum pa can de bshad pa'o//
281a6(rgyud): re'u mag bcu bzhi la granas pa//bcu gnyis pa dang ldan pa la//tsheg drag dang ni mnyam sbyor ba//lha mo snang chen ma yi 'dod//re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhi la//gnas pa dbus nas
281a7(rgyud): gnyis pa can//de bzhin thig le nga ror ldan//thig le 'byung nas gsum pa la//dbus nas bcu pa gang yin pa//rtag tu tsheg drag ldan pa ni//dmar chen sogs pa'i lha mo yi//
281b1(rgyud): bcu po dag ni phyung ba'o//re'u mig nyi shu rtsa lnga pa//gnas pa'i thig le bcas pa'o//dbus las drug pa gang yin pa//thig le nga ro ldan pa'o//re'u mig de bzhin bcu bdun pa/
281b2(rgyud): thig le nga ros rgyan pa'o//re'u mig bcu dgu la gnas pa//thig le nga ros rgyan pa'o//lha mo mda' rnan 'dzin sogs kyi//skya bon byung ba de ngo mtshar//lha mo me tog ma sogs kyi/
281b3(rgyud): sablon byung ba sngon bstan yin//gang dag sgo srung bstan pa yang //gzugs mI mthun pa khro na'o//zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa'as de skad gsung so//mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i
281b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi chos kyi yig 'byung ba'i phyag rgya shes pa'o//re'u mag nyi shu rtsa bzhi lnga//gnas pa bcu dgu'i gdan la gnas//nyi shu tsheg drag sbyor ba ni//pad+mo gar gyi dbang
281b5(rgyud): byu gu yin//re'u mig bcu bzhi la gnas po'i//tshig gnyis lci ba de bzhin no//re'u mig nyi shur+Na bAzhi lnga//gnas nas dbus nas dgu pa ldan//rtag par thog le dang ldan ni//gnyis pa
281b6(rgyud): yi ni yod grags pa//re'u mig sum cu rtsa gcig la//gnas par nga ra thig le rgyan//re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhi lnga//gnas pa dbus nas bcu gsum ldan//tsheg drag can ni bzhi pa yi//
281b7(rgyud): khro gnyer ma yi rgyud las grags//re'u mog nyi shu rtsa bzhir ldan//dbus nas dgu pa'i thig ler bcas//re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhir gnas//dbus nas bco lnga dang ldan no//re'u
282a1(rgyud): mig bcu bcig la gnas pa//chog drag gis ni sbyor ba'o//re'u mig nyi shu rtsa ba dir gnas//sum cu rtsa brgyad pa dang ldan//cho ga drag mnyam par
282a2(rgyud): sbyor ba ni//pad+ma grwar dbang mchog yin no//lha mo gling bu ma sogs nyid//de bzhin lha mo me tog sogs//lha mo lcags kyu ma sogs kyang //rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i//
282a3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor la ni bskyed pa yin//zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs te//pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor gyi chos kyi yi ge 'byung ba'i phyag rgya shes pa'o//
282a4(rgyud): dbus nas nyi shu rtsa gcig pa//bcug pa dang ldan pa ste//bcu dgu zla ba gtsug lnga ni//rdo rje nyi mi 'byung ba yin//dbus nas bcu gsum gang yin pa//zla tshes thig le gtsug gi zhal//re'u
282a5(rgyud): mig nyi shu rtsa bzhi la//gnas pa bcu dgu dang ldan pa//re'u mig nyi shu gnas dang sbyor//tsheg drag ldan pas gnyis pa'o//re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhir gnas//dbus nas bcu
282a6(rgyud): gsum pa dang ldan//tsheg drag ldan cig can de ni//gsum pa yi ni grags pa ya ni//ro'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhir gnas//bcu gcig dang ni thig le ldan//re'u mig bcu bzhi la
282a7(rgyud): gnas pa//chog drag ldan pa 'dod pa'o//re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhir gnas//dbus nas dgu dang zla ba'o//re'u mig sum cu rtsa gcig gnas//thig le nga ros rgyan pa'o//re'u mig
282b1(rgyud): nyi shu rtsa bzhir gnas//dbus nas bcu gsum pa dang ldan//chog drug mnyam par ldan pa ni//rdo rje nyi ma'i lha dag yin//lha mo gling bu ma sogs kun//rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor sbyor skyo
282b2(rgyud): yan//zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs te//rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi chos kyi yig 'byung ba'i phyag rgya shes pa'o//re mig nyi shu rtsa bzhir gnas//nyi shu
282b3(rgyud): rtsa bdun sbyor ba ste//zla tshes thig le gtsug can ni//yul 'khor thams cad 'dul ba'o//re'u mig bcu bzhi la gnas pa//bcu dgu pa dang ldan pa ste//nyi shu tsheg drag sbyor ba ste//sna
282b4(rgyud): tshogs pa yi brjod pa yin//re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhir gnas//gnas pa tsheg drag ldan pa 'dod//rta yi rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor la//rdo rje rgya gram zhes grags so//zhes bcom ldan
282b5(rgyud): 'das dpal rdo rje bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpas gsungs te//rta mchog gi chos kyi yi ge 'byung ba'i phyag rgya shes pa'o//sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro skya
282b6(rgyud): ma bde ba'i mchog las chos kyi yig 'byung ba'i rtog pa ste bcu dgu pa'o///ri mo gnyis kyi dkyil 'khor gyi//phyi rol pad+ma 'dab brgyad bru//de yi nang du rnal 'byor
282b7(rgyud): pas/rje.a yig tshogs kyang bri bar bya//shar phyogs mngab mar kau yi ste//lho phyogs mdab mar tsa yi ste//nub phyogs mdab mor Ta yi ste//nga yau sde ni de bzhin byang //sde po lnga
283a1(rgyud): yi dbus su ni//yi ge k+Sha dang lhan cig 'dod//dbang ldan mdab ma nas brtsams te//ya ra lu wA rnam par bzhag/dbang ldan mngag ma'i phyi rol/
283a2(rgyud): tu//yi ge Sha ni 'jug par bya//me mtshams mdab mo'i phyi rol du//yi ge sha ni 'jug par bya//bden bral mdab mi'i phyi rol du//yi ge sa ni 'jug par bya//rlung
283a3(rgyud): mtshams mdab mi'i phyi rol du//yi ge ha ni 'jug par bya//zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpaso gsungaso//dbus kyi mtha' ru gang yin pa//
283a4(rgyud): thig le dang ldan yi gau au//rlung mtshams phyi rol gnas po gang //sgra yig a ni sbyor bar bya//bden bral phyi rol gnas pa la//'og tu sgra yig u sbyor ro//shar gyi
283a5(rgyud): mdab ma gnyis pa ni//dbus las dbu ma de bzhin no//lho nas de bzhini dbu ma la//me mtshoms 'dab ma dang ldan no//bden bral phyi rol gnas pa gong //de nas byang gi
283a6(rgyud): dang po'o//dbus nas dbye ma'i sbyin gnasu//de tshe 'od kyi gong bur 'gyur//o yig tsheg drag dang ldan pa//de yi mtha' ru de tsher 'gyur//lho nas dbus ma gang yin pa//
283a7(rgyud): tsheg drag dang ni ldan pa'o//rlung mtshams phyi rol gang yin pa//u yig thig le sbyor bar bya//dbus kyi dbu ma gang yin pa//thig las mgo nas mnan pa dang //rlung
283b1(rgyud): mtshams phyi rol grang yin pa//oM yig chog drag sbyor bar bya//bdon bral mtshams kyi phyi rol du//sgra yig u ni sbyor bya ste//mo mtshams mdab mar gang yin pa//byang gi dang por
283b2(rgyud): de bzhin yong //bden bral phyi rol pa bzung nas//byang gi dang po pa yang yi ni//dbus nas dbus ma bzung nas su//'od kyi gong bu mtha' ru 'gyur//de nas thig le sbyin byas nas//
283b3(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub par 'gyur//zhes bcom ldan 'das chags pa chen po rdo rje sems dpas gsungaso//lho nas dbu ma gang yin pa//tshig drag dang ni ldan par bya//dbus nas
283b4(rgyud): dbus ma de bzhin du//lho nas dbu ma yang yin no//me mtshams mang ba ma dang ldan pa//rtag tu brjod par 'gyur ma yin//byang nas dbu ma bzung nas su//me mtshams dang ni shin
283b5(rgyud): tu sbyo nA sgra yigri a dang sgrar nus su//rtag par zhi bar 'gyur ba yin//me mtshams phyi rol bzung nas su//nub kyi dang po ljon par bya//sgra yi ge I dang skyur nas su//'od kyi gong
283b6(rgyud): bu lnga pa yin//bden bral phyi rol gnas pa la//sgra yig a dang ldan par bya//de bzhin dbang ldan mdab ma dang //sgra yig oM ni sbyor ba'o//shar gyi dang po pa dang ni//de nas
283b7(rgyud): dbu ma'i tha ma dang ni//nub kyi dang po pa bzung nas//a med rtag tu 'gyur bar bya//de dag bzlas pa byas pa yis//mda' ru rab tu grub pa yin//zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal
284a1(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpas gsungs//rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas//sgra yig un sbyor bar bya//thig le nga ro gnon nas su//de nas dbus nas dbu
284a2(rgyud): ma'o//lho nas dbu ma bzung nas su//me mtshams pa dang sbyor bar bya//shar nas dang po bzung nas su//sgra yig oM dang ldan par bya//bden bral mdab mar gnas pa gang /
284a3(rgyud): sgra yig oM ni sbyor bar bya//shwar phyi dang po bzung nas su//sgra yi go e ni sbyor ba'o//bden bral mdab mar gnas pa la//sgra yig e ni sbyor ba'o//rlung mtshams phyi rol
284a4(rgyud): po bzung nas//sgra yo ga u ni sbyor bar bya//thig le nga ros mnyam sbyor no//skal bzang skal bzang 'gyur ba yin//zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dngos gsungs
284a5(rgyud): de bzhin gnyis pa dpa' bo ma//kun tu bzong mo gsum pa ste//bzhi pa zod med snron ma'o//dpal mo sangs rgyas sku ldan ma//de bzhin gzugs ma zhal mdzes mA//sprin chen
284a6(rgyud): ma ni bdun pa ste//brgyad pa na mkha'i spyan ma'o//gling bu la sogs bsdus pa dang //sgo srung ma sogs yang bsdus te//me tog ma sogs bsdus pa ni//dang po'i dkyil 'khor la
284a7(rgyud): bskyed 'dod//cis bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs te//de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor la sngags 'byung ba'i tshogs kyi phyag
284b1(rgyud): rgyu shes pa'o//oM yig thig le dang ldan pa//yi ge e yis ldan pa yi//rlung mtshams phyi rol gnas pa dang //mye mtshams mdab ma gnas pa nyid//sgra yig u dang sbyor bar
284b2(rgyud): byo/shar las dang po de bzhin du//dbus las dbu ma yang yin te//me mtshams mdob ma dang ldan pa'i//lho las dbu ma 'gyur byas te//bden bral phyi rol pa bzung nas//
284b3(rgyud): dbus las tha ma pa yang bzung //dbang ldan mdab mar gnas pa nyid//yi ge e dang mnyam ldan pa'o//rlung mtshams phyi rol gnas pa la//tsheg drag gis ni mnyam par
284b4(rgyud): ldan/de ni bcu par yongs grags te//bden bral phyi rol gnas pa la//me mtshams mdab ma can dang ldan//dbus las dbu ma 'gyur nas su//byang las dbu ma de
284b5(rgyud): bzhin te//sgra yig u nI sbyor bar bya//me mtshams phyi rol pa de bzhin//nub las dang po pa dang ldan//bden bral phyi rol pa la yang //dbu ma'i tha ma yang yin te//dbang
284b6(rgyud): ldan 'dab mar gnas pa nyid//yi gau u dang mnyam ldan pa'i//dbus las tha ma pa 'gyur nas//me mtshams mdab mo dang ldan pa//byang las dbu ma 'gyur byas te//'dren
284b7(rgyud): pi a yig dang lhan cig/dbus las dang po bzung nas su//me mtshams stan dang ldan par bya//dbus las bzhi pa gang yin pa//thig le dang ni yang dag ldan//lho las dbu
285a1(rgyud): /ma de bzhin du//shar las dang po pa yang yin//rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas//thig lo U yig ldan par bya//dbus las gnyis pa dang ldan pa
285a2(rgyud): nub kyi dang po a med par//zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsung so//rlung mtshams phyi rol bzung na sa//thig le u yig dang ldan s+ho//dbus las dbu ma de bzhin du/
285a3(rgyud): mAM mtshams stan dang ldan pa yi//lho las debu ma pa 'gyur te//shar las gsungs pa gang yin pa//sgro yig u dang ldan par bya//rlung mtshams phyi rol gnas pa la//sgra la la/
285a4(rgyud): yis rgyun pa ste//dbade ldan mdab ma'i gdan can ni//lnga par yongs su grags pa ste//bden bral phyi rol gnas pa la//sgro yig oM dang sbyor bar bya//byang las bzhi pa gang yin
285a5(rgyud): ba sgra yig i dang sbyor bar bya//dbus las dang po bzung nas su//me mtshams mang ba ma can dang 'dra//dbus las tha ma yang yin te//dbang ldan mdab mar gnas pa
285a6(rgyud): lang sgra yig o ni sbyor bar bya//shar las gsum pa gang yin pa//sgra yig o ni sbyor bar bya//dbang ldan phyi rol gnas pa gang //dbus las dbu ma dang ldan te//me
285a7(rgyud): mtshams mdab mar gnas po la//sgra yig i ni sbyor bar bya//rlung mtshams phyi rol gnas pa ni//mi mchi mas gdan dang ldan pa ste//tshig drag yig i ldan pa//dang po
285b1(rgyud): m+bu grags pa'o//rlung mtshams phyi rol gnas pa la//thig s+ho yig u g+hor to//mkhas pas lan gnyis brjod par bya//dbus las dbus ma yang bzung ste//b+h+rU~M las dbu
285b2(rgyud): ni ni la// mtshan sa ma ba ma tshan dang ldan//b+h+yo las dang po bzung nas su//thig le dang ni mnyam par ldan//nub nos dbu mi bzung nas su//yi ge oM dang mnyam ldan d+ha/
285b3(rgyud): dbang ldan phyi rol gang yin pa//dbus las dbye ma dang ldan te//me mchims med ba mar gnas pa la//sgra yig oM ni sbyor bar bya//shas le sna gnyis pa gang yin+da pa//nun
285b4(rgyud): dang po 'i tsung nas su//dbus nas dbu ma ldan pa ste//TI ga l-i ma yig ldan par bya//bcu par yong su grags pa ste//shaM las gsum pa dang yin pa//sgra yig mi dang myur bar bya/
285b5(rgyud): darjes su tha mar bzung nas su//rlung ma mas phyi rol pA la yang //mig sngo dang ldan par bya//dbum las du ma bzung nas/skyo las gsum pa 'gyur byam+b+ha te//mi ma
285b6(rgyud): gdan ni sbyor byas nas//shur nas dang po bzung na so//yig ma yig ldan pa yi//dbus las dang po 'gyur byas te//bde ni bral mad ba mar glanas pa la//swA yig ma dang sbyor ba yi//
285b7(rgyud): dbus mis thom yang yin te//shA nas dang po chung nas su//sbru la ni yu mos sbyor bar bya//mi mtsham mo mang ba mar gnas pa la//sgra yig u dang sbyor ba ste//bangan dril ma
286a1(rgyud): gnas pa dang /sgra yig u yis rgyan byas te//me mtshams 'drab mar gnas pa yang //sgra yig u dang sbyor bar bya//bden bral mdab mar gnas pa
286a2(rgyud): la/sgra yig u yis brgyan pa ste//bden bral mdab mar gnas pa ni//gnyis brtsegs yi ge u dang ldan//rlung mtshams phyi rol gonas pa la//byang las tha ma ldan byas te//
286a3(rgyud): tsheg drag mnyam por ldan pa la//sgra yig i dang sbyor bar bya//zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungaso//rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas//thig le u
286a4(rgyud): yis sbyor bar bya//dbus las dbu mi bzung ba dang //me mtshams stan dang ldan pa yi//lho nas dbu mar 'gyur bar bya//byang las tha mo bzung nasu//sgra yig a ni sbyor

286a6(rgyud): bya/lho yi dbu mar de bzhin du//lho las bzhi pa gang yin 'byor//tsheg drag yi ge i ldan pa//'dus pa gsungs pa yin pa'o//rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas//
286a7(rgyud): thig le u yig sbyor bar bya//dbus las dbu ma de bzhin yang //me mtshams stan dang ldan pa yi//lho yi dbu ma 'gyur bar bya//dbus las dang po bzung nas su/
286b1(rgyud): sgra yig gnyis dang ldan po yi//byang gi dang po yang yin te//shar las dang po bzung ba la//sgra yig e ni sbyor bar bya//lho las dbu ma de bzhin du//tsheg drag yi ger ldan
286b2(rgyud): pa'o//zhes rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi'o//rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas//thig le u yig sbyor byas te//dbus las dbu ma bzung ba dang //me mtshams stan dang ldan
286b3(rgyud): pa yi//lho las dbu mo 'gyur bar bya//dbus las dang po bzung ba la//me mtshams stan dang ldan par bya//rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas//de 'og mi mtshams pa
286b4(rgyud): yin te//nub kyi tha ma de bzhin du//sgra yig i dang sbyor bar bya//dbus las tha ma yang yin te//nub l-is dang po bzung nasr-i//a yig med par gyur pa'o//rlung mtshams
286b5(rgyud): phyi rol pa bzung nas//thig le U yis sbyor bar bya//dbus l-is dbu ma de bzhin te//me mtshams stan dang ldan pa yi//lho las dbu mar 'gyur bar bya//dbus nas dbu
286b6(rgyud): mo bzung nas su//thig le yis ni brgyan por bya//de bzhin dbus nas dbu ma yang //lho nas dbu ma de bzhin te//me yi mtshams pa mnyam par ldan//yi ge a yi gdu
286b7(rgyud): bur bya/nub nas tha ma bzung nasu//sgra yig o ni sbyor bar bya//bden bral phyi rol pa bzung nas//dbu ma'i tha ma dang ldan par//me mtshams lan gnyis brjod nas su/

287a3(rgyud): nas dang po bzung na su//sgra yig a ni sbyor bar bya//dbus nas tha mar bzung na su//sgra yig i ni sbyor bar bya//dbang ldan phyi rol pa bzung nas//dbus las dbu ma bzung

287a6(rgyud): cha dang //rdo rje rol ma dang //rdo rje dran ma dang //rdo rje snying po me dang /rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i lha mo bzhi yin no//o yig thig le dang ldan par//e yig thig le yang dag
287a7(rgyud): ldan dbus la tha ma bzung ba dang //yi ge u dang ldan par bya//byeng nas de bzhin bzhi pa'o//dbus nas dbu ma bzung na su//lho nas dbu ma de bzhin du//me mtshams
287b1(rgyud): sang bA ma dang sbyar nas//sgra yig i dang A bsdu bya'o//shwa ra nas nga zhi pa gang yin pa//rlig lo u dang ldan bya ste//nan tan du ni lan gnyis zla//rtag tu dang po'i 'gyur ba yin/
287b2(rgyud): o yig thig le dang ldan pa//dbu ma las ni dbu mo yAng //me mtshams mdab ma dang ldan pa'i//lho nas dbu mararo 'gyur bar bya'o//dbus nas tha ma bzung byas te//sgra yig ai dang
287b3(rgyud): sbyor bar bya//shar les bzhi pa gang yin pa//sgra yig u dang sbyor ba'o//bden bral me ba ma la gnas pa//sgra yig u dang sbyor ba ste//nun tan lan gnyis bzlas pa'o//dbus
287b4(rgyud): los bzhi pa gang yin pa//u yig me mtshams pa dang ldan//tho gi le nga ro gnyis pa'o//o yig thig le dang ldan pa//rlung mtshams phyi rol la gnas pa//tshig drag dang ni

287b7(rgyud): sngags 'byung bar ni grags pa yin//oM yig thig le dang ldan pa re//shar nas gnyis pa gang yin pa//zla tshes thig le gtsug gi zhal//dbus nas dbu ma de bzhin du//lho nas
288a1(rgyud): dbu ma pa la yang //mAM mtshams mngab ma can sbyor dang //dus rnams thams cad sbyong dar bya//dbang ldan phyi rol pa deng zhin//sgra gra e ni
288a2(rgyud): sbyor bar bya//de nyid phyi rol pa bzung nas//sgra yig i dang ldan byas te//me mtshams mdab ma gnas pa yi//sgra yig I yA si brgyan par bya//rlung mtshams phyi rol pa
288a3(rgyud): bzung naso//thig le u yig sbyor byas te//lan gnyis gsum du brjod bya'o//de nas dpakra bsam shing sogs lha//rdo rje snying po ma dang /rdo rje sred med kyi bu mo dang //rdo
288a4(rgyud): rje gar gyi dbang phyug ma dang /'dod pa'i lha mo rnams zhes pa lha mo bzhi yin no//oM yig thig le dang ldan pa//yig e ye sbyor bar bya//rlung mtshams phyi rol la gnas pa/

289a1(rgyud): a ni sbyor ba bya//me mtshams mdab ma gnas pa yang //byung nas dang po pa bzung ste//sgra yig i ni ldan par bya//dbus las dbu ma de bzhin

289a5(rgyud): zhes grags pa yin//zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungaso//gling bu mi dang pi bang kun//rje chen de bzhin rje rje kun//rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor
289a6(rgyud): la dgra yi lha mos mchod 'grub pa'o//A yIge dang po byas na su//dbus m+b+ha dbu ma pa la yang //mi mtshams ma na ma can ldan pa de//lci nus dbu myi 'gyur bar bya/

289b1(rgyud): nas me tog ma phyung ngo //a yig dang por byas nas su//dbus las dbu ma pa yang ste//me mtshams mdub ma dang ldan pa'i//lho nas dbu ma yang yin te//byang las bzhi pa
289b2(rgyud): gang yin pa//sgra yig u dang sbyor bar byas//dbus las dang po bzung nas su//rdo rje spros me rnam grag so//a yo gi dang po byas nas su//dbus lus dbu mo pa yang ste/

290a1(rgyud): brjod par bya ba ste//shar las dang po bzung na su//sgra yig u ni sbyor bar bya//dbang ldan phyi rol pa bzung nas//sgra yig i ni sbyor bar bya//

291a7(rgyud): dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungaso//rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung ste//thig lo nga ro ldan par bya'o//bden bral phyi rol pa bzung ste//dbus las dbu ma dang ldan pa'i//
291b1(rgyud): byang las dang po 'gyur bar bya//dbus la sna dbu ma de bzhin du//e yige me mtshams ldan pa ste//lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya'o//zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems

292a1(rgyud): bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpas gsungaso//dang po sangs rgyas dbyangs ma dang //dbang ldan phyi rol can nyid la//sgra yig u dang sbyor bar bya//

292a7(rgyud): las dang po rtag tu ni//a yig med par 'gyur ba'o//zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa'as gsungaso//rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas//thig le e yig ldan

298b7(rgyud): yin//rta yi rgyal po'i dkyi lo 'khor la//sna tshogs rdo rje zhes drag so//gang dang gang gi dbus la ni//rta mchog 'di ni banag byan//de nyid de yi dkyi la'i khor yin//yul 'khor
299a1(rgyud): thams cad 'dul ba'o//zhes bcom ldan 'das thogs myed shin tu dga' ba dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs te//rta mchog gi dkyil 'khor la sngags
299a2(rgyud): 'byung ba'i tshegs kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o//sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las sngags 'byung ba'i rtog pa ste nyi shu pa'o//
299a3(rgyud): de la ji ltar shin tu dga' ba nyid yin zhe na/skyon mod rtag pa gtan du ni//'dod chags thams cad rjes chags phyir//de nyid gsang ba bcom ldan 'das//'dod chags chen po
299a4(rgyud): dga' che zhes so//ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po yin zhe na/gtan du dga' ba kun gyi mchog/gdod nas grol ba de bzhin gshegs//kun tu bzang po kun gyi bdag/
299a5(rgyud): byang chub sems mchog cho ga'o//de ji ltar bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i gtso bo yin zhe na/dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog/dbang phyug che mchog phyag rgya yis/
299a6(rgyud): rdo rje dbang chen thug kur bsgyur//rdo rje snying po gtso bo'i gtso//dram pa'i dang po skyes bu'o//de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi sems hr-i yin zhe na//bsgom med rgya
299a7(rgyud): chen zab pa ni//dngos grubo thams cad zad med bde//kun gyi dri ma med pa ni//byang chub sems bdag brtan pa yin//de nas de'i yongasu las kyi khyad par ni//sems
299b1(rgyud): brtan nyid kyi sems dpa' ste//ting 'dzin sems pa sgom pa'o//rnam par shes dpa' sems dpa' ste//rdo rje nyid yi rdo rje las//rdo rje 'dzin pa 'byung ba'o//rdo rje rdo rje zhes
299b2(rgyud): gsungs ni//nyon cig rdo rje gang gsungs pa//zla ba 'dra bar yang dag blo//rdo rje rgasu rnam par bshad//de lA ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po yin zhe na/ting 'dzin
299b3(rgyud): la sogs rnam bzhi yis//gang gi bskyed pa yong bsgoms na//bsgoms na thams cad bdag nyid du//tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur//sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs sbyor
299b4(rgyud): yang /rang byin slab 'di grub mchog ste//de nyid nyin re grub pa ni//rdo rje sems dpa' nyid 'thob bo//de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa yin zhe na/gsungs pa
299b5(rgyud): snying stobs rdul dang mun pa yang //ci phyir sems can don du 'gyur//de phyir kun tu bzang po yi//ci bzhin byang sems spyod ces 'gro//de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das bdud dang las
299b6(rgyud): rgyal ba yin zhe na/sems de kho na bdud yin te//sems de kho na de bzhin gshegs//rang sems 'dul ba'i don du ni//bdag gi bdug nyid nye bar 'gro//de la ji ltar bcom
299b7(rgyud): ldan 'das mngon par byang chub dang sangs rgyas yin zhe na/rang sems so sor 'bigs pa ni//byang chub sems mchog rdo rje nyid//de nyid de las de sangs rgyas//rang byin rlabs
300a1(rgyud): mchog bsgoms phyir ro//de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gtum mo man+tar byed dang //phyag na rdo rje yin nan/dbyer mdas sor 'bigs pa ni//snang
300a2(rgyud): ba thams cad nges par glanon//sangs rgyas kun dngos rdo rje ni//byang chub sems rnams bstan pa yin//brtan pa thams cad 'grub don du//rgyal ba bdag gis kun bzang gis///
300a3(rgyud): phyag la phyag mtshan de byin te//des ni phyag na rdo rje yin//de la ji ltar dang po'i rigs 'byung ba yin zhe na/ma ni shes rab pha rol phyin//pa na thebs la mkhas pa ste//'dul phyir
300a4(rgyud): rdorje sems dpa' ni//skye ba bdag ni rigs yin no//de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das 'dod par thar pa yin zhe na/dngos grub thams cad rjes chags phyir//'dod chags chen
300a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das//kun grub zad mang bang ba yin//bde ba rnyan po zhes 'dod do//gsung ba khrag 'thung zhes bya ste//phyag rgya chen po 'grub pa'i phyir//mchog ni pad+ma 'dzin rgyal
300a6(rgyud): po dam tshig dam po shes ldan phyir//dgyes pa dam pa nyi ma ste//sbyin pa la sogs mchog grub phyir//thams cad bdag nyid rtog tu bzhugs//rdo rje rta mchog las
300a7(rgyud): nyid phyir//sangs rgyas kun dngos sems dpa' ste//rdzogs sangs rgyas phyir rnam snang mdzad//rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal chen po//ye shes rdo rje 'dzin mchog phyir//de la
300b1(rgyud): ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gsum nyid yin zhe na/'jig tan gsum dag mtha' yas phyir//'dul phyir srid gsum mchog gsum bdag/thams cad nyid phyir dkon mchog gas//
300b2(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum bdag khams gsum yin//de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das thams cad nyid yin zhe na//sems can bsod nams cher 'phags phyir//mi g.yo thams cad kho
300b3(rgyud): na bdag/sems 'du bras phyir g.yo ba ste//kun byed thams cad kho na'i phyir//mkha' 'gro ma bdag lha mor gsungs pa/thams cad mdzad pas skal ba bzang //rnam par rtog pa skal
300b4(rgyud): ngan par//brda yi mtshan mdo gsungs pa'o//de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das dang po'i snying po dbyings 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyu yin zhe na/gtan tu srid pa yang dag 'grub//dbang phyug
300b5(rgyud): chen po 'grub don du//dpa' bo'i dngos grub kun don du//bskal pa'i dang po bcom ldan gsungs//'dod chags chen po'i phyir bcom ldan//dam pa zad med shin tu dga'//gsar
300b6(rgyud): nyid phyir ni snying pa'i dbyangs//hU~M yig dam pa zad med pa'o//de la ji ltar nye ba'i snying po de nyid kyi ye shes yin zhe na//dkyil 'khor dag ni dben pa dang //dam tshig dag ni spangs pa
300b7(rgyud): dang //de nyid gsang ba mo shes pas//rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub pa min//'dod pa bcom ldan sems dpa' ste//de kha na ni 'dod chags yang //rdo rje phyag na rdo rje ni//chags bral
301a1(rgyud): tshal na ngam mamacacam sa sa ma thathams mtham/ka a na thatham thas ma tham/Thas natha tan yamags tshan yam ma na am mam thamamaca mnyam yam ma tshan tham/gathams tham ma
301a2(rgyud): de dang 'grub pa man//ling ga 'greng bar rang 'byung ste//dad+me'i steng du bzhugs byas nas//'ang gA chod rten byin rlabs te//rdo rje dbyings ni rang bdag 'byung
301a3(rgyud): ling ga 'greng bar rang byung ste//baiR+Wa'i steng du bzhugs nas su//ling ga rdo rje byi ni rlabs te/khrag 'thung zhes bdug sngon skye'o//ling ga 'greng ba rang byung ste//bad+ma'i steng du bzhugs
301a4(rgyud): nas su//ling ga pAd+mar byin rlabs te//dag pa'i chos bdug sngon skye'o//ling gi 'greng bar rung byung skye//bad+ma'i steng de bzhugs nas//ling ga rin chen byin rlangs te//rdo rje nyi mar
301a5(rgyud): bdag ston bskyed//ling go 'greng bar rang byung ste//brla'i steng du bzhugs nasu//ling ga sna tshogs byin rlabs te//rta mchog dag ni sngon skye'o//b+ha gang ling ga bcug byas te//der
301a6(rgyud): ni khaM yig bsgom par bya//rnam par snang mdzad gzugs dag 'od//sku gnyis ldan pa spyo bar bya//b+ha gar ling ga bcug nas ni//de lde hU~M yig bsgom par bya//shin tu dga' 'dri
301a7(rgyud): gzugs dag ni//sku gnyis ldan pa'i spro bya'o//b+ha g+har ling ga bcug nas su//de la hrI yig bsgom par bya//khrag 'thung 'dra ba'i gzugs dag ni//sku gnyis ldan par sgo
301a8(rgyud): bya'o/b+ha gar ling gi bcug nas su/daM la b+ha yig bsgom par bya//pad+ma 'dzin 'dra'i gzugs dag ni//sku gnyis ldan par spro bya'o//b+ha gar ling ga bcu gnas su//de la
301b1(rgyud): yog bsgom par bya//nyim 'dra ba'i gzugs dag yod//sku gnyis ldan pang+ga smai byA//d+hA gar la dag bcug nas sa//de l+yA h+yA yog bsgom bA byA//hUM mdzad 'dra ba'i gzugs drag na//
301b2(rgyud): sku gnyis ldan par spro bya'o//zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs//de nyid gsang ba gseng chen yang //snying po dang su dregs pa yin//snying pos rjes su 'grub pa ni//1
301b3(rgyud): snying por yong grags//sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las gsang ba sgrub pa'i rtog pa ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o////de la ji ltar
301b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po dang //rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rgyud yin zhe na/kun 'grub zad mad bde ba ni/de ni rdo rje 'grub pa ste//don yod dam tshig 'da' dka' yin//de la
301b5(rgyud): ji ltar bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor gyi don yin zhe na/ji ltar granas su gang 'khor lo//de ltar sde dang 'gro ba bzhin//'khor dang yang dag 'jug 'gyur ba//de 'dra'i dkyil 'khor
301b6(rgyud): bskyed mchog yin//de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam smin gyi rgyu yin zhe na//rdo rje sems dpa' sogs lha yi//dkyil 'khor mngon sum mthong ba las//ci 'dra rtag pa'i bsod
301b7(rgyud): nams su//phyi ni de bzhin bri bya'o//de la ji ltar thig gdib pa'i//cho ga shes pa yin zhe na/mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri byan//mtshams kun mnyam por 'dren par bya//shar dang
302a1(rgyud): nub drang byang sogs phyogs//theg skud bzhi pa re'u mig brgyad//dkyil 'khor zlum po sangs rgyas kyi//rdo rje can gyi zla gram bzhin//pad+ma pad+ma'i tshul yin/
302a2(rgyud): te//rin tshan tshul ni rin chen gyi//sna tshogs kyi ni zlum por gsungs//ci ltar 'dod pa ci bde bas//nang gi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa//re'u mig brgyad par 'dod pa'o//phyi yi//
302a3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par//nang gi dkyil 'khor du ni 'dod//re'u mig brgyad kyi dbus gnas pas//gtso bo'i dkyil 'khor 'dod pa yin//zhes dpal rdo rje sems
302a4(rgyud): dpas gsungaso//de la ji ltar rtog pa'i dngos grub dam pa yin zhe na/ji ltar bden par dkyil 'khor bdag/gang gis rtogs par nus pa ni//gang gis yi dam lhor sbyor bas///
302a5(rgyud): grub pa'i dkyil 'khor ldog pa yan//'dri sku bris pa'i sbyor ba yi//rang sems bris par sbyor ba yin//lhag chang go gar gyur na yang //bsgrubs te skyon du mi 'gyur ro//
302a6(rgyud): de la ji ltar gsang ba lnga'i de nyid yin ne na/sems dpa' dang po gdod ma med//rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che//kun tu bzang po kun gyi bad ga/rdo rje snying po gtso bo'i gtso
302a7(rgyud): gdod ma tha ma med phyir yang //dam pa'i dang po zhes 'dod de//'khor lo kun gyi gtso phyir ni//dam pa dam pa'i dbang phyug yin//de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das gang lags
302b1(rgyud): ci 'dra ba yin zhe na//'dod pa chen po kun gyi mchog/yid bde bas na 'dzum pa che//rtag par 'dzum pa'i bde ba des//dam pa bcom ldan 'gyur ba yin//de nas de'i zla ba'i
302b2(rgyud): mdog ni//dram pa yin 'bru grub nyid phyir//chos rnams thams cad dag phyir dang //gsang ba de nyid rnam dag phyir//rdo rje 'dzin de zla ba'i mdog/de nas de'i sna tshogs dmer ba'i
302b3(rgyud): 'od 'bar ba ni//ci la phyir bcom ldan 'dod chags che//'dod chags kun la rjes chags phyir//rdo rje sems dpa' de nyid kyang //sna tshogs dmar po 'bar ba'i 'od//de la
302b4(rgyud): ji ltar dbang bsrur ba'i shes pa yin zhe na/thong phreng dbu rgyan las gzhan ni//khams gsum la ni dbu rgyan med//thod pa'i phreng de'i dbu rgyan ni//rdo rje sems dpa' bdag
302b5(rgyud): mngon bskyed//khams gsum las na rin chen gzhan//sangs rgyas rin chen 'dra ba med//sangs rgyas thams cad rin chen ces//dbu rgyan de yis rdo rje 'dzin//de nas
302b6(rgyud): ji ltar sems dpa'i skyil mo krung yin zhe na/yan lag g.yas pas mnyam gnon pas//g.yon pa'i yan lag 'azid nas su//de yi sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas//rdo rje snying
302b7(rgyud): po gtso yi gtso//de nas ji ltar rdo rje sems dpa'i lha mo la sogs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi shes pa yin zhe na/kun mchog shin tu 'bigs pas na//dngos grub thams cad bde ba'i
303a1(rgyud): /mchog/kun mchog rnam rgyal ba//shes pas//thams cad dbang phyug+sa N+Da ru 'phabs//'gyu rnams de bzhin phun sum tshogs//dga' ba bzhin
303a2(rgyud): ga mo bdag/rdo rje lha mo tshogs phyug rgya//rdo rje sems dpa' mchog gzugs yin//de nas ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung ba chen po'i de nyid lnga yin na na//
303a3(rgyud): me long khrag 'thung zhes bya rnams//mnyam pa nyid lnga gar dbang mchog/so sor rtog la nyi ma ste//bya ba la ni rta mchog dang //chos kyi dbyings la sangs rgyas ni//thub chen
303a4(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad do//ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid ni//'dod chags chen po bde ba che//gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri//ro dang reg dang de bzhin yang //rdo rje sems
303a5(rgyud): dpa' 'dra bar ni//de rnams de bzhin nyid kyis bsnyen//chos kyi dbyings la 'byung ba yis//rgya tshar dngos grub ster bar 'gyur//zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems
303a6(rgyud): dpes gsungaso//de nas ji ltar phyag rgya dang //phyag rgya'i yan lag gi shes pa yin zhe na/'phrog byed ma dang 'dzin byed ma//gzung thar ma dang cha sbyin ma//na mkhar 'gro
303a7(rgyud): dang lha mo dag/mkha' 'gro ma drug rab tu grags//gang gi/se sgra ni bstan 'gyur na//de la dpral ba bstan par bya//mig la ston pa gang yin pa//de lo lte ba bstan par bya//
303b1(rgyud): gang gis lta ba bstan pa ni//de la mthu na rab tu bstan//gang gis ma mchu rab bstan na//dul sa ni rab tu bstan//gang gis lce ni bstan+da 'gyur na//de la gsus pa bsnun par 'gyur//
303b2(rgyud): gang gis b+ha ga basbyin 'gyur na//de la ling gi bsten par bya//gang gis rje ngar bstan na ni//de la brla na bstan par bya//gang gis brla ni bsten gyur na//dral rkang mthil bstan
303b3(rgyud): par bya//gang gis rkang mthil bstanA na ni//de laM sen mo bstan par bya//gang gis mtshan khung bstan 'gyur na//de la smin ma bsten par bya//gang gis sgra sgrogs byed
303b4(rgyud): 'gyur na//de la tsheng bya ba'o//gang gis kha yang bstan na ni//de la zhugs pa bstan par bya//gang gis gsal shing bstan 'gyur na//de la mdung thung bstan par bya//gang gis
303b5(rgyud): srin mo bstar na no//de lo nu ma rab tu bstan//gang gis khu tshur bsten na ni//de la mtsham su bstan par bya//gang gis lho ni bstan 'gyur na//de la bshang gci bstan par bya//gang
303b6(rgyud): gis mi sdug gzugs byed na//de la mdzes pa'i gzugs bya'o//keng gis he skad byed 'gyur ni//nga lo lag pa bstan par bya//zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas
303b7(rgyud): gsungs//de nas jo ltar mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi mtshan ma yin zhe na/rkang pa'i mgo ga 'bras 'dra ba//dpral bar tri shul de mdung thung //phyin log mig dang khro gnyer can/

305a1(rgyud): 6\u0f7f/bzung nas//yog yo dang mnyam ldan pa//shar gyi dang po ldan pAr bya//tshog drag u yin+d+ra ldan pa yi//dud kyi tha ma ldan par bya//thams cad tu
305a2(rgyud): ni sgrub byed pa//khrag 'thung zhes pa 'byung ba'o//ji ltar 'dod pa bsgrub bya 'grub//de nas phyin ci 'dod par//cu'i 'dod 'dod pa bya ba yis//kun bzed kun byed de bzhin te//
305a3(rgyud): langs pa 'am ni 'dug pa 'am//'gro ba yis sam 'greng ba 'am//bzhad pa dang ni smra ba la//gang dpe de ru ci de bzhin//gang gang dbang po'i las nyid pas//gang da
305a4(rgyud): de de'i rang bzhin du//rang gi mnyam gzhag med sbyor bas//rang gi rig pa'i lha 'dren no//de nyid sbyor ba de yis ni//thams cad kho na 'grub pa'o//sangs rgyas kun
