305a6(rgyud): thams cad dbang phyug 'gyur//sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las rjes su sbyor ba dang ldan pa sgrub pa'i rtog pa ste nyi shu
305a7(rgyud): rtsa gnyis pa'o/////de ltar sna tshogs rje su chags pa'o//dga' ba pad+ma rnam dag che ba yis//gsal bar rjesu gtsang ba dme pa rtag par sbyin pa yis//
305b1(rgyud): dam po bI di bi'i dngos byos dam tshig bdag la bde ba rjes sgrub//dam pa'i dga' ba shin tu sbyor ba skal bzang dam pa shin tu dga'//rang bzhin gyis ni rang bzhin drag pa rtag tu rnga du/
305b2(rgyud): 'grub pa'i rang bzhin dngos//dam pa dga' ba la sogs sbyor ba'i skal bzang dam pa shin tu dga' de'i rang bzhin+de 'grub pa'o//dag pa rjes su 'grub pa'i rang bzhin khaM na so so rjesu
305b3(rgyud): grub pa bde ba las dam pa'i gsang chen rgyud phyi ma 'di yongasu rdzogs so///bdag gi 'di ni dang ba'i snying po mchog/bde ba chen po mchog gi mchog 'gyur
305b4(rgyud): mthu chen po//kun mchog 'byung ba'i sems can rtag pa ci'i phyir//kun mchog sa yi dbang po nyid ni sbyor ba blo//mtha' yas thob med thogs pa med pa'i phyir//tshul chen po
305b5(rgyud): yi chen po thams cad kyi//mkha' dang 'dra ba'i mchog gi dngos grub 'phel ba sbyin//gdod ma tha ma med gang gis//rdzogs byed med pa nus ma yin//sems can le lo can dang
305b6(rgyud): nyung tsam 'dod pa dang //mi dad pa dang lkog smra ba dang mu dag pa//rtag tu rjesu chags dang chags bral dga' ba dang //de rnams phan pa'i don rdzogs pa'i don 'di yin no//gang gi
305b7(rgyud): khyim du bzung ba gang gis gyur pa dang //bdag gis ji ltar ston pa sgrub par byed pa'am//mthu yis thams cad so sor mngon du gyur pa ste//dngos grub mchog gis rgyus pa'i las
306a1(rgyud): drag mi 'grub pa'o//gang gis grub pa rdo rje 'dzin zhes sogs pa dang //gzugs songs thams cad 'dri la ji ltar mos pa bzhin//yi ge hrI yang
306a2(rgyud): ji ltar rab tu 'dod par dris byas na//des ni 'dod pa dngos grub cho bre bzhin du 'thob//sems can don du lus rtag byed pa ma yin pas//rgyal ba drug gis rnam par dag
306a3(rgyud): 'di la//bgegs med de bzhin bdud kyang med pa ste//rtog pa yis kyang dngos grub 'phel stobs byin gyis rlobs//gang gi rtog pa mchog chen 'di sgrub byed pa la//
306a4(rgyud): bdud nyid du ni me 'gro mi brten nyid kyang man//brtan pa'i rgyu ni bdag gis ston par mi byed do//myur bar mchog gi mchog nyid 'grub phyir bstan par 'gyur byeng ngo //
306a5(rgyud): grang bris bdag gi snying pos bdag la rtag tu grub byed ni//mchog chen dngos grub dang ni rtog par bde chen dang //chags dang shin tu dgo' dang brtan dang rgyas pa dang //
306a6(rgyud): yig chen yang ni rdeg par bdag gis 'grub par byed//de nas mchog skyes rgyal ba thams cad dga' na su//'dzum pa chen po thams cad khyab par rnam par 'byed/
306a7(rgyud): kun bdag dbyings kyi rdul phra mchog chen gzugs dag gis//kun nos de la legs pa'i sgra ni dbul bar byed//bdag gis dbyings kun rje su che mchog gzugs
306b1(rgyud): kyis su//pan mdzog gyur pa sad+has dz+has+sa kun gyis legs lcogs//mchug gi rdo rje las byung legaso logaste//dam pa'i chos nyid chos kyi bdag nyid legs lags//dam rje
306b2(rgyud): lus can mchod pa'i 'dag nyid legs so legs//rtogs pa'i byin rlabs mdzad cig mnyam par byin rnams //don yong nges grub rtag tu yig 'bru chen pa yi//rtsub pas
306b3(rgyud): mi 'dul ba yi dus su ni//de dag gi yang ji ltar dam pa'i bder gyur phyir//de ltar dag chen zhus nas su//smras brgyas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//rdo rje sems dpa' chen po yos//
306b4(rgyud): gsungs pa la ni mngon par bstod//sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i mkhwa' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog ces bya ba khri brgyad stong pa las rtog pa thams cad kyi rgyal
306b5(rgyud): po brgya bcu bdun pa rdzogs so///rgya gar gyi mkhan po s+thi ti dz+nyA na kId+d+hi nyid kyis bskur //yon bdag bod kyi mkhan pa gzho du grags pas zhus nas bshad nas
306b6(rgyud): gtan la phab pa///rgya gar skad du/he badz+ra tan+d+ha rA dzi nA maM/bod skad du/kye'i rdo rje zhes bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po/kye'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad
306b7(rgyud): bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhug so//de bzhin
307a1(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po rje bcur+ya gsang ba las shin tu ches gsang ba'ang /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
307a2(rgyud): stsal pa/e ma'o byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bo snying rje chen po legs legs so//rdo rje sems dpa' dang /sems dpa' chen po dang /dam tshig
307a3(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po snying po kye'i rdo rje zhes bya ba nyon cig/rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/gang phyir rdo rje sems dpa' lags//ji ltar sems dpa' chen po lags//dang
307a4(rgyud): bris dam tshig sems dpa' lags//bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gsungs//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//rdo rje mi phyed ces byar brjod//sems dpa'
307a5(rgyud): srid pa gsum gcig pa//'dis ni shes rab rigs pa yis//rdo rje sems dpa' zhes byar brjod//ye shes chen po'i ros gang ba//sems dpa' chen por brjod par bya//
307a6(rgyud): rtag tu dam tshig la spyod phyir//dam tshig sems dbyar brjod par bye//rdo rje snying pos gsol pa//ming bsdus pa ni ji lta bu//gang gis kye'i rdo rje lags//he yi na
307a7(rgyud): pas ci zhig bshad//badz+ra yis kyang de bzhin ci//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//he ni snying rje chen po nyid//badz+ra'ang shes rab brjod par bya//thabs dang shes
307b1(rgyud): rabya bdag nyid rgyud//de ni nga yis bshad kyis nyon//lta stangs dgug dang brda chen dang //don byed rnam mang brjod pa dang //rengs par byed dang skrod pa nyid//sde rengs byed dang mngon
307b2(rgyud): spyod dang //ji ltar rigs par rnal 'byor ma'i//bskyed dang gnas drang byed rgyu dang //dron byed ye shes rnam shes dang //lha rnams ji ltar 'byung ba'o//he ru ka ni bskyed pa'i rgyu//
307b3(rgyud): dang por gcig na bsgom par bya//rdo rje snying po snying rje che//dngos po nyid kyis rnam grol zhing //dngos po'i 'ching bas 'ching bar 'gyur//de yongs shes pas grol ba yin/
307b4(rgyud): dngos po med pa'ang yongs shes pas//dngos po sgom 'gyur shes rab can//dngos po med pa yongs shes pas//de ltar he ru ka bsgom bya//lus la ye shes chen po gnas//
307b5(rgyud): rtog pa thams cad yang dag spangs//dngos po kun la khyab pa po//lus gnas lus las ma skyes pa'o//rdo rje snying pos gsol pa//kye bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i lus la rtsa du lags/
307b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//rtsa rnams ni sum cu rtsa gnyis te/byang chub kyi sems sum cu rtsa gnyis 'bab pa bde ba chen po'i gan su 'dzag pa'o//de rnams kyi nang
307b7(rgyud): nas rtsa rnam pa gsum ni gtso bo ste/brkyang ma dang /ro ma dang /kun 'dang ma'o//brkyang ma shes rab rang bzhin gyis//thabs kyis ro ma yang dag gnas//kun 'dar ma ni dbus
308a1(rgyud): gnas//gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs//brkyang ma mi bskyod 'bab pa ste//ro ma de bzhin khrad 'bab cing //shes rab zla ba 'bab bshad pa//
308a2(rgyud): de ni kun 'dar ma rab grags//mi byed ma dang /pra ba zugase ma dang /rtse ba ma dang /g.yon pa ma dang /rdzing ngum dang /dri sbal skyes ma dang /sgom pa ma dang /dbang mi dang
308a3(rgyud): skyon ma dang /'jug ma dang /mo mo dang /mtshan mo dang /bsal sbyin ma dang /tsha ba ma dang /brkyang ma dang /kun 'dar ma dang /ro ma dang /gzhol ma dang /
308a4(rgyud): rongs ma dang /shin tu gzugs can ma dang /sbyi ma dang /rgyu sbyin ma nga /spyod bral ma dang /sna bum dang /grub ma dang /'tshed ma dang /de bzhin du yid ba
308a5(rgyud): ma dang /sum bskor ma dang /'dod ma dang /khyim ma dang /gautumA mo dang /bdud dral ma'o//rdo rje snying pos gsal pa/bcom ldan 'das rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di
308a6(rgyud): rnams ji lta bu lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sring gsum yongs byur thams cad ni//gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs//yang nu thangs na thams cang
308a7(rgyud): gyis//dngos po'i mtshan nyid du ni brtag/sdom pa'i dbye ba'ang bshad par bya ste//A li kA li ni zla ba dang /nyi ma de /shes rab dang /thabs so//chos dang /long skyong
308b1(rgyud): rdzogs pa dang /stsal pa dang ni sgra dang /bsung dang /thugs so//e bA ma pA ni/e yi rnam pa lha mo spyan/ba bi rnam pa bdag myar brjod //ma ni lha mo bas dka mo//ya yi rnam
308b2(rgyud): pas sgrol mar brjod//skal pa'i 'khor lo la pad+ma mdab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi dang /chos kyi 'khor lo la mdab ma bgyid dang /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo la mdab ma bcu drug
308b3(rgyud): dang /bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo la mdab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis//'khor lo'i grangs kyi rim pas rnam par bzhag pa/skad cig ma bzhi ni rnam pa sna tshogs dang /rnam par smin paM da /
308b4(rgyud): rnam par nyed pa dang /mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o//'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi ni sdug bsngal ba dang /kun 'byung ba dang /'gog pa dang /lam mo//de kho na nyid bzhi ni bdag gi de kho
308b5(rgyud): ni dang /sngags kyi de kho na dang /lha'i de kho na dang /ye shes kyi de kho na nyid do//dga' ba bzhi ni dpa' ba dang /mchog tu dga' ba dang /dga' bral gyi dga' ba dang /lhan cig
308b6(rgyud): skyes pa'i dga' ba'o//sde pa bzhi ni gnas brtan pa dang /thams cad yod par smra ba dang /kun gyi bkur bya dang /dge 'dun phal chen no//zla ba dang /nyi ma dang /A l-i dang
308b7(rgyud): kI li dang /'pho ba bcu drug dang /dbyug gu drug cu rtsa bzhi dang /chu tshong sum cu rtse gnyis dang /thun tshong bzhi ste/de ltar thams cad bzhi'o//lte bar gtum mo 'bar ba yis/
309a1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa lta bsregs shing //spyan la sogs pa yang bsregs te//bsregs pas ri bong can haM 'dzag/rdo rje rigs kyi le'u skye dang pa'o//
309a2(rgyud): sngags kyi le'u bshad par bya'o////oM a kI mu kha~M sAr+b+ba d+hir+m+ma NAM/Ad+ya nuta pan+d+ha tAta oM AHhUM phaT swAhA/'byung po thams cad kyi gtor me'i sngag so//bruM ai dz+r-i
309a3(rgyud): khaM hUM/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sa bon no//oM d+ye ba pi nr-i badz+ri'i hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA ni/kye rdo rje'i snying po'o//sngags thams cad kyi rkang par dang po oM gyi rnam pa dang /
309a4(rgyud): mtha ni s+yASh+Tadang /hUM phaT kyi rnam pa ni nang du gzhugo/oM A ka tsa Ta ta pa yaM sha swAhA/grong khyer dkrug pa'i sngag so//A yA i I u yU/r-i r-I/l+r-i la~M/skye
309a5(rgyud): o au/au/rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis don no//o trai lokyA k+She pa huM huM huM phaT swA hA/phyag gnyis pa'i'o//oM dz+wa le dzA la b+h+yo hu~M huM huM phaT sah+ma/phyag bzhi pa'i 'o//oM ga Ti ki
309a6(rgyud): Ti badz+ra huM huM huM phata s+thuH/phyag drug pa'i 'o//oM AHhUM/sku dang gsung dang thug byin gyis brlabs pA'i sngagaso//oM rak+Sha rAk+Sha huM huM huM pheMHsah+la/sa sbyangs pa'i sngagaso//oM hUM sahA/rengs
309a7(rgyud): par byed pa'i'o//oM a~M sahA/dbang du byed pa'o//oM kha~M swA hA/skrod par byed pa'i'o//oM dzI swA hUM/sdang bar byed pa'i'o//oM bu sany+dzi/mngon spyod kyi'o//oM hUM swAH/'gugs
309b1(rgyud): ra byod pa //oMt+mAsatwA/gsod par byed nga//oM krAr+m+ma da sUn+tu/kAR+tha/ gas// \u0f7f rnams pas mna' yas ga blags brnyan b+has k+Sh+ma r+dz+dza rtsa wAn+da nA
309b2(rgyud): me tog nag pos ni mchod /klu 'dul bar byed pa'i khu bas ni byug/glang po che'i chang gos ni bug/kham phyor kha sbyar du ni bzhag/ba nag mo'i mas dag ngo //gzho nu ma na ge mos bkal//
309b3(rgyud): ba'i skud pas ni dkri/rlung gi phyogasu rdzing bu byas te mtha' yas der bzhag go//de'i 'gram du dkyil 'khor bzhengs par bya ste/dur khrod kyi sol bas ni rdul tshon nag po/skyes pa'i
309b4(rgyud): rus pa'i phye mas ni rdul tshon dkar po/ldong ros kyis ni rdul tshon ser po/dur khrod kyi so phag gis ni rdul tshon dmar po/rkun ma'i lo ma dang /skyes pa'i rus pa'i phye mo dag gis
309b5(rgyud): ni rdul tshon ljang ku ste/rdul tshon 'di rnams kyis dkyil 'khor bzhengaso//dur khrod kyi srad bus thig gdab cing dkyil 'khor khru gsum pa bya ste/de'i dbus su mtha' yas mnan
309b6(rgyud): pa'i kye'i rdo rje zhal brgyad pa/zhabs bzhi pa/phyag bcu drug gis rgyan pa//spyan nyi shu rtsa banis che ba/'jigs pa'ang 'jigs par mdzad pa bri'o//de nas slob dpon gyis nang gi
309b7(rgyud): ma rungs pa'i sems kyis dben pa'i gan su sngags bap+pa ste/oM g+hu ru g+hu ru g+ha Du g+ho Du ma sa ma sa g+ha Ta g+ha Ta g+ho Ta ya g+ho Ta ya/a nan+ta k+Sho b+ha ka rA ya nA gA d+hi pa ta ye he he ru ru kaM sap+ta pA tA
310a1(rgyud): la ga tAn nA gA nA kaR+Sha ya baR+Sha ya/gar+N+Na ya tar+dz+dza ya/phuHphuHphuHphuHpuHphuHphuHphuHhUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA//gal te char mi 'bab nu de'i tshe sngags 'di bzlog
310a2(rgyud): la bzlas te/char 'babs pa//gal te mi 'bab na de'i tshe mgo Ardza ka'i dog pa ltar 'gas so//tsher dbab bi zhes bya ba'i cho ga'o//sprin dral ba bshad de/
310a3(rgyud): dur khrod kyi ras lnga nye bar 'dug nas sngags bzlas shing dral te/oM AR+YA ya sh+ma shA naM pri yA ya hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/sbyin dral ba'i cha ga'o//pha rol gyi sde rnam par
310a4(rgyud): gzhig par bya ba'i phyir kha Ti kri'i sgrub pa bshad de kha Ti ka dang /bdud rtsi lnga dang /ku Sh+NI ra ts+tshan+d+ra dang lhan tse ga~M bitags la ril bu bya ste/sngags ni oM badz+ra ka rte ri he badz+ra
310a5(rgyud): ya hUM hUM hUM phaT/rangos grub kyi don tu phye ba bzlas shing sngon du bsnyen pa 'bum byas te/de bsgrubs la ril ba spyi blugs kyi mgrin par bskor zhing bskor nas bcad na dgra thams
310a6(rgyud): cad kyi log med par 'gyur ro//rdo rje gri bug gi tshi ga'o//lha rnams dogs par 'dod pas thig le sgrub te tshangs pa'i sa bon rgyal la bsgrubs nas/ku ThA raSh+TIn+da
310a7(rgyud): dang bsres la nyi ma gzas zin pa na mi bskyod pa dang btag cing brtags nas dgra sta byas te/de rkang pas man ni nas sngags bzlas te/oM badz+ra kuSh+ku ra pA Da ya pA Da ya hUM hUM hUM
310b1(rgyud): phaT s+yAt+ma/bye ba bzlas la thig le byas te gang la phyag byas pa de 'gas so//lha dgas pa'i cho ga'o//tshwa bas gdung bar 'dod pas ang+ga'i lo ma la dug dang ske tsho dang tsi tra ka'i khu bas
310b2(rgyud): dgra bo'i mong bri zhing 'bras phub kyi ma~M la gdungs te sngags khri bzlas so//oM haM badz+ra dzA ra dzA ra sha tAM b+h+rUM hUM hUM hUM phaT swA hA/che ba'i cho ga'o//khri bzlas pas 'grub bo//chang skyug par
310b3(rgyud): bya bar 'dod pas bsgrub bya'i lte bar yaM gaM rnam pa sgom zhing me gi rnam par gyur pa las chang lte bar rnam par bsgoms te skrag par byed par bltas na chang skrag go//rab tu myos ma dbang du bya
310b4(rgyud): bair 'dod pas mya ngan med pa'i brkyang la mya ngan med pa'i 'og tu song ste gos dmar po bgos nas myos byed kyi 'bras bu bza' zhing //ka kA ma tsi ka'i khu bas thig le byas nas sngags
310b5(rgyud): bzlas te/oM a mu ka me hrIHba swa b+ha ba tu swAhA/khra yis 'ong bar 'gyu ro//zla ba dang nyi ma dbang du bya bar 'dod pas sa lu btags pa'i 'gyur ba zla ba dang nyi ma byas nas rdo rje'i chu le gzhug
310b6(rgyud): cing sngags bzlas te/oM badz+ra ar+k+ka mA tsA la mAM tsa le tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha he badz+ra ye hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/bye ba phrag bdun bzlas te nyi mAM dang zla ba dag yang dag par gnas shong nyin mtshan bye brag med
310b7(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro//zla ba dang nyi ma rnam par 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i cho ga'o//oM na grA naM grA zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis dus me yin pa'i dus su don sgrub pa'i phyir gzhonu ma'i mig dag la brgya rtsa
311a1(rgyud): brgyad mngon par bsngags nas me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa lngas yang dag par mchod cing snyun gsun gdab bo//bcu bzhi pa 'am brgyad pa'i snga ba'i dus su bum/
311a2(rgyud): pa la sogs pa bzhag cing 'bru mar dang a lAk+Sha'i khu ba la sngags 'di nyid kyis lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsdog/de nas mngon par bsngags pa'i oM lak+ta'i khu bas bsngags
311a3(rgyud): pa'i mthe bong rgan pos bskus nas 'bru mar gyis kyang blugs la gzhon nu ma la bstan te/nga'i rdzas su khyer smos/de la nges smras pa/che ge mo zhes bya bas khyer ro//rdo rje skar ma'o//
311a4(rgyud): be Du yA be Du ya zhes brjod na glang po che 'bros par 'gyur//mar+m+ma mar+m+ma zhes brjod na stan 'bros par 'gyu ro//til+li yA til+li yA zhes brjed na bsre 'bros par 'gyur ro//i li me li puH
311a5(rgyud): puHzhes brjod ni sbrul 'bros par 'gyur ro//nor skyong 'dul ba'i phyag gis lag pa rab tu bstan na khyi 'bros par 'gyur ro//rdo rje ma dang /dkar mo dang /chu ma dang /rdo rje mkha'
311a6(rgyud): 'gro ma dang /bdag med ma dang /sa spyod ma dang /mkha' spyod mo'i rnal 'byor las rengs par byed pa la sogs pa brtul zhugs can gyis byed do//sngags kyi le'u ste gnyis
311a7(rgyud): pa'o///de nas lha'i leru bshad par bya'o//dang por byams pa bsgoms par bya//gnyis par snying rje rnam sgom zhing //gsum par dga' ba sgom pa dang //kun
311b1(rgyud): i tha ni btang snyomaso//yang ni stong pa'i byang chub ste//gnyis pa la ni sa bon bsdu//gsum pa la ni gzugs brnyan rdzogs//bzhi pa la ni yig 'bru dgod//re phas nyi ma ston
311b2(rgyud): du rnam bsgoms nas//nyo der spre byung sna tshogs rdo rje ste//rdo rje de nyid kyis ni ra bA dang //gur btsong ba yang rnam par sgom pa nyid//dang por ro ni rnam bsgoms pa//chos kyi dbyings kyi
311b3(rgyud): bdag nyid brjod//de stengs rnal 'byor pa gnas nas//he ru ka nyid rnam par sbam//rang gi snying kha ra ra phra sgom//de las byung ba'i nye dkyil 'khor//der ni hU~M gi rnam pa nyid//thabs
311b4(rgyud): dang shes rab rang bzhin can//hUM las byung ba'i rdo rje ni//kha dog nag po 'dzegs chen po//rdo rje lte ba'i dbas gnas par//yang ni hUM gi de nyid sgom//hI gi rnam par gyur bltas
311b5(rgyud): zhe sdang bdag nyid rnam par bsgom//rdo rje skye ba nag po che//'dam skyes sngon po 'dra ba'i mdog/yang na sngo dang nyi ma'i mdog/dad pas nges par rnam par sgom//na mkhar rje btsun bltas
311b6(rgyud): nas ni//rdo rje sde ba snying rje che//rgyan rnams thams cad 'dzin pa yaM//lha mo brgyad po rnams kyis mchod//dkar mo ri dgas mtshan pa 'dzin//chom rkun bdud las rgyal ba'i snang //
311b7(rgyud): ro langs ma ni chu lag ma//b+ha sma de ni sman 'dzin cing //puk+ka si ni rdo rje'i lag/de bzhin ri khrod ma ro 'jan//gdol pa mo na cang te'u rdul//'di rnams kyis ni gtso bo mchod//
312a1(rgyud): 'dod nags chen blar gas byas//gArA sa b+h+yo lta 'khyud pa nyid//A lan+na bag+h+nAm+b+ha//sa bon n+ya dranan drung ba//denyid sems dpa
312a2(rgyud): zhes byung brjod//mchog tu dge' ba'i rang bzhin can//na mkha'i dkyil 'khor khyab pa yi//rang gi lus mtshungs rnam par s+ho//bsdus nas snying kor dkrig phan//yi hA ni sdang bdag
312a3(rgyud): nyid 'gyur//sgo dang nyi ma batshungs pa'i mdog/bran du dmar po'i sman dang ldan//sgra ser gyed du 'khyil ba dang //phyag rgya lngas ni rnam par d+han//'khor lo rna cha nor bu dang /
312a4(rgyud): lag gdu dang ni sngags nyid//sangs rgyas lnga ni rnam dag pa//'di rnams phyag rgyang rab tu grags//snang mig brjod gnyis lo yaM tshul//g.yonan rdo rje thod pa dang //g.yon pa
312a5(rgyud): nas kyang kha T+wA~M ga/g.yas na rdo rje nag po nyid//hU~M gi yi ge 'don pa'i bdago//rnal 'byor ma brgyad yongs bskor nas//dur khrod du ni mgon po rol//dbugs rgya zhes de'i rigs
312a6(rgyud): pa 'das//dur khrod ces ni mngon par brjod//phyag bzhi na bdung shi las rnam par rgyal ba rnam par dag pa ste//gong du brjod pa'i gzugs dang /sku mdog dang /hU~M los byung
312a7(rgyud): pa'ong phyag g.yon gyi dang po na skyes pa'i thod pa lha dang lham den gyi khrag gis bkang ba//de bzhin du g.yas kyi phyag na rdo rje//phyag lhag ma dag des shes rab la 'khyud pa
312b1(rgyud): shes ra rdo rje bab mo ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gzugs can no//phyag drug pa/zhal gsum pa/g.yon dmar ba/g.yas zla ba dang nyam lta bu dang ma ston pa'o//tsar bu gong du
312b2(rgyud): brjod pa'i sku mdog dang gzugs can//phyag rnams ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o//phyag g.yon gyi dang po na rtse gsum pa/phyag g.yas kyi dang po na rdo rje/phyag g.yon
312b3(rgyud): g+hi gnyis pa na dril bu/phyag g.yas kyi gnyis pa na gri gug/phyog lhag ma dag gis rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma la snyams par 'jug pa/bcom ldan 'das ji lta ba de ltar shes rab
312b4(rgyud): ste/g.yas pa dang g.yon pa nA gri gug dang thod pa/khams gsum gyi bdag nyid can gyi ro mnan pa'o//lha'i le'u ste gsum pa'o///de nas lha dbang bskur ba'i
312b5(rgyud): le'u bshad par bya'o//rang gi snying khar sa bon bsam mo//sa bon las ni 'od zer nag po lcags kyu'i rnam pa'i gzugs kyis phyung nas/des khams gsum du bzhugs pa'i
312b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drangs la ma mo brgyad kyis yang dag par mchod nas gsol ba gdab par bya'o//oM a b+hi Shiny+tsan+d+ra mAM sarba ta thA ga ta zhes sangs rgyas de rnams he ru ka'i rnam
312b7(rgyud): pa'i gzugs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag nyid kyi bdud rtsi lngas gang ba'i bum pa lngas dbang bskur bar bya'o//dbang bskur pa ni me tog gi char 'bab par 'gyur ro//
313a1(rgyud): rnga'i sgyu 'byung bar 'gyur//glu bum b+hi chur 'bab par 'gyuraro//gzugs kyi rdo rje ma la stsogs pa rnams kyis mchod par bya'o//rdo rje'i sku spyan la
313a2(rgyud): sogs pa rnams kyis blang bar bya'o//dbang bskur nas spyi bor rang gi rigs kyi bdag por 'gyuraro//'dis ni he ru ka rdzogs pa nyid do//thun gsum du byin gyis brlab pa'i sgom
313a3(rgyud): pa rnam par bsgom nas langs te lha'i gzugs su bzhag go/dbang gi le'u ste bzhi pa'o////de nas de kho na nyid kyi le'u bshad par bya'o//ngo bos gzugs med mthong ba
313a4(rgyud): po sgra med thos pa po yang med//dri med snom pa po yang med//ro meng myong ba po yang med//reg med reg pa po yang med//sems med sems las byung ba'ang med//skyed
313a5(rgyud): byed ma dang sring mo nyid//rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu mchod//gar ma tshos ma rdo rje ma//gdol ma de bzhin bram ze mo//thabs dang shes rab cho ga yis//de nyid rig pas rtog tu
313a6(rgyud): mchod//ji ltar bye bar mi 'gyur bar//rab tu 'bad pas bsten pa nyid//ma gsang sbrul dang chom rkun dang //sa spyod me yis sdug bsngal byed//rigs lnga'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba//
313a7(rgyud): rdur pa'i rgyur ni brjod par bya//rdo rje 'dis ni gdab pa nyid//des na phyag rgyar brjod par bya//rdo rje pad+me de bzhin las//de bzhin gshegs dong rin chen nyid//snying rje chen po dam
313b1(rgyud): pa yi//rigs ni rnam pa lnga ru brjod//rdo rje'i phyag rgya g.yung mo nyid//de bzhin pad+ma'i gar ma nyid//las ni chos mar rab tu bshad//de bzhin gshegs pa'i bram ze mo//rin chen
313b2(rgyud): gdol mar shes par bya//phyag rgya lngar nr-i rnam par nges//'di rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs//mdor bsdus pas ni brjod par bya//dpal ldan de bzhin nyid gshegs shing //
313b3(rgyud): de bzhin slar yang gshegs pa nyid//'dis ni shes rab rigs pa yis//de bzhin gshegs zhes brjod par bya//rigs ni rnam pa drug brjod cing //mdor bsdus pas ni rnam par lnga//
313b4(rgyud): sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis//phyi nas rnam pa gsum du 'gyur//rigs dang 'byung ba lnga rnams dang //phung po lnga yi rang bzhin gyis//rigs dang bgrang ba 'di yis ni//rigs zhes
313b5(rgyud): mngon par brjod par bya//bsgom pa po med sgom pa'ang med//lha med sngags kyang yod ma ya ni//spros pa med pa'i rang bzhin las//sngags dang lha ni yang dag gnas//rnam snang mi bskyod
313b6(rgyud): don yod dang //rin chen dpag med sems dpa' po//tshangs pa khyab 'jug zhi ba dang //thams cad sangs rgyas de nyid brjod//tshangs pa sgrib bral sangs rgyas nyid//'jug phyir khyab
313b7(rgyud): 'jug brjod par bya//rtag tu dge bas zhi ba nyid//thams cad kun gyi bdag nyid gnas//dam pa'i bde ngas de nyid de//bde ba rtogs phyir rnam sangs rgyas//gang phyir lus las/
314a1(rgyud): byung ba nyid//lha zhes mngon par brjod par bya//sangs rgyas 'dri la b+ha ga mnga'//bcom ldan 'das zhes brjod par bya//b+ha ga rnam pa drug tu brjod//
314a2(rgyud): dbang phyug la sogs yon tan kun//yang na nyon mongs la sogs bdud//bcom phyir bcom ldan 'das zhes bya//gang phyir skye 'gro skyed pa yi//shes rab ma zhes brjod
314a3(rgyud): par bya//gang phyir skal pa ston pa yi//shes rab sring mo zhes bya nyid//gtso blag ma dang bu mo dang //gar mkhan ma zhes brjod par bya//sems can thams cad 'tshod pa'i phyir//
314a4(rgyud): btso brag ma zhes de bzhin brjod//yon tan 'jo phyir shes rab ni//bu mo zhes ni brjod par bya//snying rje chen po g.yo ba'i phyir//shes rab gar mar brjod par bya//gang phyir
314a5(rgyud): bcom ldan ma rig pa//de phyir g.yung mor brjod par bya//A li kI li rab brtags pas//brjod pa bzlas par yang dag bshad//rkang pa'i rjes ni dkyil 'khor nyid//nyed
314a6(rgyud): phyir dkyil 'khor brjod par bya//lag pa bsgyur ba phyag rgya yin//sor mo nyid pa'ang de bzhin no//gang phyir rnam sems bsam gtan ni//gang bsams de ni bsam gtan//
314a7(rgyud): ji ltar pha las bde thob pa//de yi bde ba rang gis bza'o//bde ba gang gis 'chi ba 'di//nga yi bde ba bsam gtan brjod//de kho na nyid kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o///
314b1(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang rab bshad bya//spyod pa pha rol phyin mchog nyid//gang gis dngos grub mthar 'gro ba//kye'i rdo rje dngos grub rgyus//sgom pa po yis rnam 'dzin pa//rna ba dag la rna cha
314b2(rgyud): bzang //spyi bor 'khor lo rnam par 'dzin//log pa dag la lag gdungab nyid//rkeng pa la yang ske rags nyid//rkang pa re de bzhin rkang gdub bo//lag pa'i rtsa bar dpung rgyan nyid//
314b3(rgyud): mgrin par rus pa'i phreng ba ste//bgo ba stag gi lpags pa nyid//bza' ba mi 'chi bcu phyed de//he ru ka sbyor skyes bu ste//kha dog lnga la rnam par gnas//rigs lnga ngag dang mnyam ldan
314b4(rgyud): partang rigs ni gcig tu rnam par brtag/kha dog du ma nyid kyis ni//gang phyir dbye ba mtshon mi bya//shing gcog dang ni dur khrod dang //me mo'i khyim dang mtshan mo dang //yang na dben
314b5(rgyud): pa 'am pas mtha' ru//sgom pa bzang por brjod par bya//cung zad drod ni thob pa no//gal te spyod pa byed 'dod pas//gal te 'grub 'gyur 'dod yod na//'dis ni spyod pa spyad pa nyid//
314b6(rgyud): shin tu bzhin bzang mig yangs ma//rang gis dbang bskur snying rje can//rdo rje'i bu mo 'di khyer nas//spyod par bya bar rtogs par bya//rdo rje rigs kyi dngos med na//rang 'dod lha yi
314b7(rgyud): rigs kyis bya//yang na gzhan gyis rigs byung ba//byang chub sa bon gdab pa dang //sbyang ba yis ni bzung por bya//gal te dga' bos glu blang ste//de tshe rdo rje mchog ldan no//gal te
315a1(rgyud): /dga' ba skyes pan//thar dwe'ud+hAr ni g+ha bya ste//don ro rka pas gang //yo gas mnyam pa gzhag pas byed//'khor bar gzugs rgyasarma
315a2(rgyud): bskyod pa//rna tsha'i bdag nyid 'od dang gi med//mgul gyi phreng ba rin chen dang //lag gdus rnam par sna mdzad badzad//sku rigs la ni drin yod gnas//khaM T+wAM ga gzug
315a3(rgyud): sa rabaste//thabs kyi gzugs kyis cang te 'u nyid //ni sdang rnam dag rnal 'byor pa//gla ni rna ma dab sngags su gnas//gar na snyam pa byas pa nyid//de yi phyir na klu dang gir
315a4(rgyud): gis rtag tu rtag tu byas//spyan ni rnam par bza' ba ste//chu ni rtag par gtong ba nyid//rga shis zil gyis m+b+ha banan cing //nAg tu srung bar 'gyur ba yin//rkun mo'i sgrulas cad pa/
315a5(rgyud): byas//daM la hU~M b+hU stAng ba //sangs rgyas lnga mi zad pa rnams//rnal 'byor spyod pas rnam par 'dzin//thod pa si lA pa yi nad//byas des cod pan 'dzin par byed//thas
315a6(rgyud): shes rab rje mi na las//sgyu y-is rigs gos du myur nyid//bral ba m+b+ha meched phyir thabs//rnal 'byur pa 'i spyod pas 'dzin//n+ya tA ru s+thA ni zlas pa/
315a7(rgyud): sgom shes rab nyid//rdo rje thong po'i spyod pa yis//'di dang bzlas dang sgom pa yin//bdom dang rmongs dang 'jigs dang khro//ngo tsha'i 'bras bu rnam par spong //bdag nyid kyi
315b1(rgyud): gnyid spangs nas//the tsom med par spyod par bya//lus kyis sbyin pa byin nas ni//phyi nas spyod pa yang dag spyad//skal dang skal min rnam spyad pas//de phyir sbyin pa sbyin mi bya//bza'
315b2(rgyud): bca' dri bzhin btung ba nyid//ji ltar rnyed po rab tu bza'//yid 'ong mi 'ong rnam rtog phyir//zhen po tsam du mi bya'o//bza' dang bza' mir spyod pa dang //de bzhin btung dang
315b3(rgyud): btung min nyid//bgrod dang bgrod min sngags pa yis//rnam rtog nyid du mi bya'o//dngos grub rnyed pa'i slob ma dang //yang dag ye shes snang ba po//mnar med skud pa'i rgyu yi phyir///
315b4(rgyud): grub pas bla ma mngon phyag btsal//bslab dang dbang las rnam par grol//de bzhin ngo tsha'i 'bras bu nyid//dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin gyi//yo gis rnam dpyid snying rje che//sbyin sreg
315b5(rgyud): mchog sbyin dka' thub 'das//sngags dang bsam gtan rnam par spangs//dam tshig sdom las rnam par grol//rnal 'byor ldan par spyod pa byed//nges por sngon du lha min gang //
315b6(rgyud): brgya byin lta bu yin na yang //de la 'jigs par mi bya ste//seng ge'i gzugs kyis rnam par rgyu//sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir//rtag tu snying rje btung bar bya//rnal 'byor
315b7(rgyud): btung dga' rnal 'byor pa//gzhan gyi btung bas bzi ba med//spyod par le'u ste drug pa'o////de nas ts+tsho ma'i leru bshad par bya'o//gang gis spun dang sring mor yang //
316a1(rgyud): the tsom med par shes par bya//gang zhig sor mo gcig ston dang //gnyis kyis legs par 'ongs pa yin//g.yon pa'i mthe bong bcangs pa las/
316a2(rgyud): bskrun gyi phyag rgyar rnam par shes//gang zhig srin log ster ba la//de yi the'u chung rnam par sbyin//gang zhig gung mo ston pa la//de yi mdzub mo rnam par sbyin//gang zhig srin
316a3(rgyud): lag ston po la//de yi mgrin par rab tu bstan//gang zhig gos ni ston pa la//de yi rtse gsum rab tu bstan//gang zhig nu ma ston pa la//de yi mtshams ni rab tu bstan//
316a4(rgyud): gang zhig so ni ston pa la//de yi kha ni rab tu bstan//gang zhig khro gnyer ston pa la//gtsug pud dgrol bar brjod par bya//grang zhig dpral ba ston pa la//de yi rgyab ni rab tu
316a5(rgyud): bstan//gang zhig rkang mthil ston pa la//lho yis rnam par rtse bar bya//phyag rgya phyag rgya'i lam gyis ni//dam tshig gis ni rnam par dbye//de la rnal 'byor mas smras pas//
316a6(rgyud): e ma bu ni snying rje che//gal te phreng ba'i lag ston na//'du bar bya zhes smra ba yin//phreng ba mngon par gtad byas na//dam tshig la gnos brtul zhugs bzong //de la phyi rol
316a7(rgyud): zhes 'du ba//bzang po'i spyod yul gnas pa ni//de la 'du bar rnal 'byor mas//gang smras de ltar thams cad bya//kye bcom ldan 'das 'du ba'i gnas du lags/bcom
316b1(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gnas dang nye ba'i gnas dang ni//zhing dang nye ba'i zhing nyid dang //ts+tshan+do nya ba'i ts+tshan+do dang //de bzhin 'du ba nye 'dra ba//'thung gcod nye ba'i 'thung/
316b2(rgyud): gcod nyid//dur khrod nye ba'i dur khrod nyid//'di rnams sa ni bcu gnyis te//sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon po nyid//'dis ni gzhan gyis brjod mi bya//kye bcom ldan 'das
316b3(rgyud): gnas la sogs pa gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gnas ni dzA lan d+ha rar bshad//de bzhin du u Di nyid//gnas ni kro l-I gi rI nyid//de bzhin du ni
316b4(rgyud): kAM rA nyid/nye gnas mA la wa zhes brjod//sin d+hu na ga ra nyid do//zhing ni mu m+ba nir bshad de//zhing ni byed pa'i brang nyid do//da wi ko Ta de bzhin zhing //zhing ni lcags pa'i brang
316b5(rgyud): nyid do//nye zhing ku lu ta zhes brjod//de bzhin arbu ta nyid dang //bA yi mchog sbyin khA ba'i //nye ba'i zhing ni mdor bsdus pa'o//ts+tshan+do ha ri ke la dang //lan tshwa rgya mtsho'i nang
316b6(rgyud): skyes dang //laM pa k+Sha dang kAny+tsi nyid//de bzhin so so raSh+Ta nyid//nye ba'i ts+tshan+do ka ling ka/gseng dang ldan pa'i gling dang ni//kong ka NA yod nye ts+tshan+dor//mdor bsdus pas ni brjod par
316b7(rgyud): bya//'thung gcod grong khyer gyi dang yang //'thung gcod grong gi mthar gnas pa//tsa ri tra ta ko sa la//bin d+he gzhon nu'i grong khyer ro//rdo rje snying po snying rje che//nye ba'i 'thung gtsang
317a1(rgyud): daMny+dza bA'o//dur khrad ba gson dge 'dun dang //dur khyod rgyu mtsha' 'gram nyid do//bskyed nul ra ba rdzing du'i 'gram//nye ba'i dur khrod brjod
317a2(rgyud): par bya//sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir//rnal 'byor ma rgyud kyi rdo rje//rnal 'byor mo yi legs 'dra ba//nyin par nyid kyang rab beshad bya//kye bcom ldan 'das nyi ma gang
317a3(rgyud): lags//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//yi dgas zla phyed bcu bzhi dang //de bzhin du yang brgyad pa nyid//rgyal mtshan dang ni mtshon bsnun nyid//lan bdun
317a4(rgyud): pa'ang bza' bar bya//'bad pas snying rje bskrad pa yis//bsang por bya bar brjod pa nyid//snying rje med na mi 'grub pas//de phyir snying rje bskyed pa nyid//thams cad bdug
317a5(rgyud): par gzhug pa ste//cho ga'i gtso bos dgag par bya//de la 'di ltar blta ba nyid//nyin mo bcom ldan rdo rje can//mtshan mo shes rab brtag par bya//mi bya cung zad yod ma
317a6(rgyud): yin//rtag tu mi bza' yod ma yin/'di la mibs ma yod ma yin//bzang ngan mi smra gang yang med//ji ltar bdag nyid de ltar gzhan//de bzhin bdag nyid nga mchog nyid//'di ltar sems dpa'i
317a7(rgyud): rnal 'byor bdag/bza' dang btung ba la sogs spyad//yan lag ji snyed bsgyur ba dang //tshig rnams rab tu rgyas pa nyid//he ru ka dpal gnas bzhugs pas//de snyed
317b1(rgyud): sngags dang phyag rgya yin//shrI na gnyis med ye shes te//ha ni rgyu sogs stong pa nyid//ru ni tshogs dang bral ba nyid//ka ni gang du'ang mi gnas pa'o//rdo rje thod pa'i sbyor ba yis/
317b2(rgyud): skye bo gang dadong gang rnams kyi//sha ni mkhas pas bza' bar bya//sems can de de dbang du 'gyur//badz+ra dang gnas gtan la phab pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o////de nas rnal
317b3(rgyud): 'byor ma'i 'khor lo bshad par bya'o//na mkha'i khams su b+ha ga bsam//dbus su rnam par sgom pa ni//'khor lo sngon du ci rigs par//lha rnams ji ltar 'byung ba nyid//'khor
317b4(rgyud): lo sa dang chu ni sngo//ji ltar rigs par byin za dang //lha rnams kyis ni rlung chen dang //ji ltar sgom pa po 'byung ba'ang //chos 'byung las skyes 'khor lo nyid//'phar mA gnyis
317b5(rgyud): dgra skyon med pa//za 'bru las ni gcig 'gyur te//gru gsum gyis ni phyi mor brjod//de dbus shi ba bco lnga yi//gdan gyi bdag nyid rnam par bsam//de yi steng du zla ba yin//zla
317b6(rgyud): ba'i snying dus bon nyid//phyi nas bdud las rgyal bas mnan//gnyis 'dus pa las bang chen po//A li zla ba'i gzugs kyis gnas//kA lI'i gzugs kyis snang byed do//
317b7(rgyud): zla ba nyi mi 'dus pa las//dkar mo li sogs rab tu grags//zla ba me long ye shes ldan//bdun gyi bdun pa mnyam nyid ldan//rang lci'i sa bon phyag mtshan no//so sor
318a1(rgyud): rtog par brjod par bya//thams cad gcig gyur nan+ta tan ny+Nid//rdzogs pa chos dbyings dag pa ste//mkhas pas tsho ga gsungs pa yis//
318a2(rgyud): rnam pa lnga po sgom pa nyid//A lIk+ShA li mnyam sbyor bas//rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyi gdan//yi ge las byung gong bu la//hUM phaT rnam pa'ang 'dod mi bya//sems dpa'i
318a3(rgyud): gzugs brnyani lngas byung ba'i//dkyil 'khor bdog po rnam par sgom//phyag mtshan zhal sogs gong ma bzhin//zla ba chu shel nor bu'i 'od//thabs dang shes rab rang
318a4(rgyud): bzhin las//'di ltar thams cad rdzogs pa nyid//zla ba nyi ma'i rab dbye bas//A li shes rab kA li thabs//'di las dkar mo la sogs pa//kha dog dbye bas so so yin///
318a5(rgyud): re shreg nang gi 'phar ma la//rnal 'byor ma lnga nges gnas pa//phung po lnga yi rang bzhini gyis//rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu sgom//dbang por rdo rje gshin rje dkor//chu bdag
318a6(rgyud): chu yi rnal 'byor mya//lus ngan rdo rje mkhyo' 'gro ma//dbus su bdag med rnal 'byor ma//phyi rol gyi ni 'phar ma l+ya//dkar mi tshum rkun ro langs ma//g+hasmai rI drang puk+ka sI/
318a7(rgyud): ro khrod ma dang gdol pa mo//brgyad pa Dom+b+hi ni ru brjod//'og ldan ma dang steng ldan nyid//mkha' spyod ma dang sa spyod brjod//srid dang zhi ba'i rang bzhin gyis//snying rje chen po
318b1(rgyud): 'di dag gnas//lha mo thams cad kha drog gnag/drag chan phyag rgya lnga yis rgyan//zhal gcig spyan ni dmar ba dang //lag par gri gug thod pas khyab//'khor lo rna cha mabul rgyan
318b2(rgyud): dang //lag par lag gdub ska rags ni//sangs rgyas lnga ni rnam dag pas//'di lnga phyag rgya dag pa'o//ji ltar bdag med rnal 'byor ma//de ltar thams cad rnam par bshad//
318b3(rgyud): lag pa gcig ni thod pas brel//g.yas pa na ni gr-i gug 'dzin//g.yon pas kha T+wA~M gA nyid do//stag gi lpags pas rnam dkr-is shing //ro la zhon zhing gzi brjid 'brar//
318b4(rgyud): phyag gnyis gyen du dbye steste ser//nga rgyal la sogs skyon drug rnams//gats+tshed phyir gri gug rnam par gnas//dngos dang ngongos med rnam rtog gi/mgo bo pad+ma'i snod du ni//
318b5(rgyud): bdud rnams rnam pa bzhi yi khrag/dngos grub phyir ni btung bar bya//stong pa'i rnam pas kha T+wA~M gA/thabs kyis ro ni rnam par brtag/'dis ni 'khor lo rnams bsgoms na//
318b6(rgyud): dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur//dang por nag po rab tu sgom//gnyis par dmar po rnam par sgom//gsum pa la ni ser po sgom//bzhi par ljang ku de bzhin no//lnga par
318b7(rgyud): kha dog sngon po dang //drug par dkar po'i lus can te//yan lag drug sgom rnal 'byor pas//dga' bral mthar yang de bzhin no//bskyed pa'i rim pa nyid dang ni//rdzogs
319a1(rgyud): pa yi yang rim pa nyid//rim gnyis mnyam pa gnas nas na//rdo rje can gyis chos 'chad do//bskyed pa yin+do cha bshud do//nA mkha'o khyams na/
319a2(rgyud): pad+ma la//b+ha ga zhes bya ye shes brjod//sgom pa zhes bya snyoms 'jug nyid//de yi bde ba 'khor lor brjod//sngon du byung ba zhu ba nyid//rig pa ji bzhin rang rig nyid//
319a3(rgyud): lha zhes bya ba byang chub sems//ji ltar 'byung ba khu ba yin//lhan cig skyes pa rnam pa gnyis//re shig btsun mo shes rab yin//skyes bu thab su brjod pa nyid//kun
319a4(rgyud): rdzob don dmo dbye bA las//phyi nas de yis rnam pa gnyis//ro shig skyes bu rnam pa gnyis//de yi khu ba'ang bde ba nyid//skyes bu ji bzhin shes rab la'ang //de yi khyu
319a5(rgyud): babade ba nyid//de nyid phyir na dga' ba nyid//bzhi yi rab tu dbye ba yis//skyes med rim pa'i phyogs las ni//'di ltar lhan cig skyes rnam bzhi//dga' ba dang po dpa' bo nyid//
319a6(rgyud): mchog tu dga' ba rnal 'byor ma//shin tu bde dga' thams cad nges//de bde'i thabs las thams cad rig/dga' ba bde ba cung zad de//mchog tu dga' ba de bas lhag/
319a7(rgyud): dga' bral dga' bas tshogs bral yin//lhag ma lhan cig skyes dga' nyid//dang po rig par 'dod pa dang //gnyis pa bde bar 'dod pa dang //gsum pa 'dod chags
319b1(rgyud): 'jig pa nyid//des na bzhi pa bsgom par bya//mchog tu dga' ba srid par brjod//dga' bral las ni mya ngan 'das//dbu ma dga' ba tsam nyid de//'dis ni lhan cig skyes pa spangs///
319b2(rgyud): 'dod chags med cing chags bral med//dbu mar dmigs par mi 'gyur ro//'di las thabs dang shes rab med//yang dag de nyid snang ba'o//gzhan gyis brjod min lhan cig skyes/
319b3(rgyud): gang du yang ni mi rnyed de//bla ma'i dus thabs bsten pa yis//bdag gis bsod nams las shes bya//dman pa 'bring dang mchog rnams dang //gzhan dang gang rnams de rnams kyang //
319b4(rgyud): ro mnyam de nyid bsgoms pa yis//'di kun mnyam pa nyid du blta//dman pa rnams ni phra ba'i don//mchog ni dngos por brjod par bya//dbu ma gnyis kyis spangs pa nyid//gzhan
319b5(rgyud): rnams zhes bya dbang po drug/gang rnams de rnams brtan dang g.yo//'di kun zhes bya ba nyid de//mnyam nyid mtshungs par 'dod pa nyid//ro mnyam de nyid bsgoms pa ni//mnyam
319b6(rgyud): zhes bya ba mtshungs par brjod//de yi 'khor lo ro zhes brjod//sgom pa ro gcig mnyam pa nyid//'dis ni don gyis brjod par bya//nga las 'gro ba thams cad 'byung //nga las
319b7(rgyud): gnas gsum po yang 'byung //nga yis 'di kun khyab pa ste//'gro ba'i rang bzhin gzhan ma mthong //de ltar rnal 'byor pas shes na//shin tu mnyam gzhag gang goms pa//
320a1(rgyud): /bsod nams chung ba'i mi yis kyang //da ni 'grub par the tsom med//bza' dang datung dang blugs pa dang //nyal dang log dang sems pa na//phyag
320a2(rgyud): rgya chen po mngon 'dod pas//de nas mngon du 'gro bar 'gyur//gang phyir yid kyis mi sgom par//'gro ba thams cad bsgom par bya//thams cad chos ni yongs shes na//
320a3(rgyud): sgom pa nyid ni sgom pa min//brtan dang g.yo ba'i dngos po gang //rtswa lcug 'khril shing la sogs pa//bdag gi dngos po'i rang bzhin las//dam pa'i de nyid nges bsgom bya//
320a4(rgyud): de rnams dam pa gcig yod min//rang rig bde ba chen po nyid//rang rig nas ni byang chub 'gyur//rang rig phyir na skom pa nyid//rang gi rig pa'i 'gyur ba las//mnan pa las
320a5(rgyud): ni las skyes te//rang gis 'phrog cing rang gis byed//rang rig rgyal po rang gtso bo//'dod chags zhe sdang phrag dog dang //de bzhin gti mug nga rgyal nyid//de kun gnas no nyams
320a6(rgyud): dga'ang ngo //bcu drug char yang mi phod do//chos 'byung las skyes ye shes ni//mkha' mnyam lhan cig thabs dang bcas//thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin las//'jig rten
320a7(rgyud): gsupa po de las skyes//khu ba'i rnam pa bcom ldan yin//de yi bde ba 'dod mar brjod//gcig dang du ma dal ba ste//skad cig gcig las mchog dga' ba//rang //
320b1(rgyud): rig pa'i ye shes 'di//drag gi lam 'das spyod yul te//'di na byin rlabs rim pa'i phyir//kun mkhyen ye shes de lta bu//sa dang chu dang rlung dang ni//me dang nA mkha' nyid dag ni//
320b2(rgyud): rang gzhan rig pa'i tshor ba yis//kun gyiso skad cig mi gnod te//mtho rasi mi yul rkang 'og gi/skad cig las ni gzugs gtsog 'gyur//rang bzhan che yi rnam rtog gis//
320b3(rgyud): gnod pa nyid ni nus pa min//thams cad rig byed grub mtha' dang //de bzhin las rgyas la sogs pra//srid pa dag pa'i dngos grub min//yang na srid mthar skye bar 'gyur//'jig
320b4(rgyud): rten 'di dang pha rol du//de med pas kyang dngos grub med//gang gis mi shes kyu'i rdo rje//de ni ngal ba don med 'gyur//chu bo'i rgyun ni rab 'bab dang //mar me'i rtse mo rab bcings ltar///
320b5(rgyud): rtag tu de nyid rnal 'byor gyis//nyin dang mtshan du mnyam par gzhag/rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba 'du ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o////de nas mchog tu rnam par dag pa'i
320b6(rgyud): ye'u bshad par bya'o//nges par dngos po than sa cad kyi//dag pa de bzhin nyid du brjod//phyi nas re re'i dbye ba yis//lha rnams kyi ni brjod par bya//phung po lnga dang dbang po drug/skye
320b7(rgyud): mched drug dang 'byung chen lnga//rang bzhin gyis ni rnam par dag/nyon mongs shes phyi'i sgrib byeng bya//rang rig bdag nyid dge pa nyid//dge ba gzhan gyis rnam zol min//mu
321a1(rgyud): dngos po dag pa'i phyir//rang gis rig pa'i bde chen mchog/gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams dang //gzhan yang rnal 'byod pas mthong ba//
321a2(rgyud): /dngos po dkun dag pa ste//'di ltar 'gro ba sangs rgyas 'gyur//kye bcom ldan 'das rnam par ma dag pa gang lags//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gzugs la
321a3(rgyud): sogs pa'o//ci'i slad du zhe na/gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dngos po'i phyiraro//rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/kye bcom ldan 'das gzung ba dang 'dzin pa grang lags//bcom ldan
321a4(rgyud): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/mig gis gzugs ni gzung bar bya//sgron rde bas mnyan par bya//dri ni sne yis tshor bar bya//lce yis ro na tshor bar bye//dngos po lus kyis reg
321a5(rgyud): par bya//yid kyis bde sogs thob pa ni//dag pas dug med byas nas ni//bsten bya 'di dag bstan pa nyid//gzugs phung rdo rje ma yin te//tshor ba la rang dkar mor brjod//'dra
321a6(rgyud): shes chu yi rnal 'byor ma//'du byed rdo rje mkha 'gro ma//rnam shes phung po'i tshul gyis ni//bdag med rnal 'byor ma gnas//rtag tu 'di dag rnam dag pas//de nyid rnal 'byor
321a7(rgyud): pas 'grub 'gyur//nang gi 'phor ma'o//de nas phyi yi 'phar ma bshad//dbang ldan du ni puk+ka sI//mir ni de bzhin ri khrod ma//bden bral gdol ba mo bzhag cing //rlung du
321b1(rgyud): g.yung mo rnam par byad /phywa ma lha mo dkar mo stsogs//dbang dkar gshin rdor tshom rkun ma//chu bdag phyog su ro langs ma//lus ngan por /ga tus spyod pa nos nga /da dus da
321b2(rgyud): bskyed pa'i rim pa nyid kyi phyogs//srid dang zhi nga'i rang bzhin gyis//lha mo 'di gnyis rnam par gnas//gzugs la dkar mor rtag tu bshad//sgra la chom rkun ma rab grags//dr-i yi
321b3(rgyud): lo ro langs ma//ro lA g+hosma rI rab grags//reg las sbyong ma zhes bshad//chos kyi dbyings la mkha' spyod ma//rtag tu 'di dag rnam dag pas//de nyid rnal 'byor pas 'grub 'gyur/
321b4(rgyud): phyag gi dag pa stong pa nyid//bdud dag pa las zhabs rnams nyid//rnam thar brgyad kyis zhal rnams nyid//rdo rje gsum gyis dag pa'i spyan//sa ni puk+ka sI zhes bshad//chu khams
321b5(rgyud): /rngon pa ma zhes brjod//me ni gtum mor shes par bya//rlung ni g.yung mor rab tu grags//zhe sdang zhes bshang rdo rje ma//'dod chags chu yi rnal 'byor ma//phrag dog rdo rje mkha 'gro ma//
321b6(rgyud): sder sna gsang ba'i dkar mo nyid//gti mug de bzhin rdo rjer bshad//zhe sdang la sogs rnam sbyong ba//bskyed pa'i rim pa'i phyogs la ni//'dis ni phung po sbyang bar bya//glang dang gang
321b7(rgyud): gis 'jig rten 'ching 'gyur ba//de dang des ni 'ching ba las grol te//de nyid mi shes 'jig rten mi grol zhing //de nyid rnam spangs dngos grub rnyed mi 'gyur//de phyir dri med sgra med
322a1(rgyud): gzugs nyid med//ro dang sems kyi rnam par dag pa med//reg med chos med thams cad rnam par dag/rang bzhin dag pa'i 'gro la 'gro bar shes//
322a2(rgyud): rnam par dag pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o///de nas ji ltar dkyil 'khor gyi//rim pa yang dag rab tu bshad//grang gis slob ma dbang bskur ba'i//cho ga'ang rab tu
322a3(rgyud): bshad par bya//dang po lha yi bdag nyid kyi//rnal 'byor pas ni nor 'dzin sbyang //'bad pas hUM las rdo rje can//byas te phyi nas dkyil 'khor bri//tshol dang skye bo med gnas
322a4(rgyud): dang //byang chub sems dpa'i khyim dang ni//dkyil 'khor khang pa'i nang du yong //dkyil 'khor dam pa rab tu bzhengs//rdul mtshon dam pa'i tshon dang ni//yang na 'bring po nyid
322a5(rgyud): kyis te//rin chen lnga yi phye ma 'am//yang na 'bras la sogs paso//de nas dkyil 'khor khru gsum dang //the bong gsum ni lhag par bya//der ni rigs lnga las byung ba'i/
322a6(rgyud): rigs ma bzang mo rnam par gzhug/yang na ji ltar gang rnyed ngapa //de ltar bcu drug lon pa nyid//ji spring khu ba ldan gyur pa//de srid phyag rgya bsten par bya//phyag rgya'i gdong
322a7(rgyud): yang bcing ba dang //thabs kyi gdong yang de bzhin no//bstan pa de las gang byung ba//slob ma'i khar ni btung bar bya//ro mnyam slob ma'i spyod yul nyid//de nyid la yang bya bar
322b1(rgyud): bya//rang rig ye shes nyid du 'gyur//rang bzhin yang dag rig pa spangs//mkha' mnyam rdul bral stong pa nyid//dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid mchog/thabs dang shes rab shin tu
322b2(rgyud): 'dres//chags dang chags dril rnam par 'dres//de nyid srog chags rnams kyi srog/de nyid yig dam pa nyid//de nyid 'gro ba'i bdag nyid de//de nyid thams cad khyab pa po//tham
322b3(rgyud): cad lus la rnam par gnas//dngos dang dngos med de las byung //gzhan dang gangang+gA rnams de rnams dang //rnam par shes pa kun gyi tshul//skyes bu sngon rabs dbang phyug dang //bdag
322b4(rgyud): dang gso ba sems can dang //dus dang gang zag nyid dang ni//dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'di//sgyu ma'i gzugs kyis yang dag gnas//dong po dga' ba tsam nyid do//gnyis pa'i
322b5(rgyud): grangs las mchog dga' nyid//gsum pa las ni dga' bral bshad//bzhi pa lhan cig skyes par brjid//de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang ni//rdo rje snying po la sogs kun//
322b6(rgyud): mkhas pas de skad nges thos nas//mchog tu ngo mtshar gyur nas ni//brgyal zhing sa la dgyel bar 'gyur//dang po dga' ba 'gro ba'i gzugs//de bzhin mchog dga' 'gro ba nyid//
322b7(rgyud): dga' bral dga' ba'ang 'gro ba nyid//gsum la lhan cig skyes pa med//bcom ldan bka' stsal kye'i rdo rje//sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gcig pa//rdo rje snying pos rtogs bya'i phyir/
323a1(rgyud): the tsom legs par spel ba ni//'dod chags med cing chags bral med//dbu mar dmigs par mi 'gyur ro//gsum po spangs pa nyid kyi phyir/
323a2(rgyud): lhan cig skyes pa byang chub brjod//yang na de nyid thams cad badrag/yang na kun gyis rnam par spangs//de yang dga' bral dang por mtshon//dga' ba gsum po rnam par spangs//
323a3(rgyud): dang po sprin drong 'dra ba yin//grub pa sgyu ma lta bur 'gyur//gnyid log sad par mi byed par//nyal dang log pa'i khyad par las//rtag tu rmi lam 'dra bar 'gyur//dngos grub
323a4(rgyud): mtshan nyid mi phyed pa'i//phyag rgya rnal 'byor pa yis 'grub//ston pas dkyil 'khor 'di skad gsungs//gru bzhi yang dag 'bar ba nyid//sgo bzhi gzi brjid chen po ste/
323a5(rgyud): do shal do shal phyed pas rgyan//phreng po sna tshogs rnga yab ldan//ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar rgyan//rdo rje srang bu mnyam par ldan//me tog sna tshogs nye bar rgyan//bdug pa
323a6(rgyud): mar me de bzhin dri//bum pa brgyad lnga sogs pas ldan//de yang yal ka la sogs ldan//mgrin pa gos kyis dgab pa dang //rin chen lnga ni yongasu gzhug/rnam par
323a7(rgyud): rgyal ba shar du sbyin//rang 'dod lha yi gzugs kyis ni//sar pa legs par bkal ba dang //shin tu tshang mar mdzes pa yi//srad bus shes rab can gyis gdab//'khor
323b1(rgyud): lo'i bdag po'i zlas pa 'bum//dkyil 'khor can gyi de bzhin khri//grong du gsungs pa'i sngags nyid kyis//mkhas pas nor 'dzin rnam par sbyang //gong gi A sobs sngags
323b2(rgyud): kyis ni//de la gtor ma rnam par sbyin//ji ltar bsam gtan de bzhin 'dir//srung ba ji ltar gsungs pa nyid//gang zhig dbang ni rab phye ba//rang gi dkyil 'khor tshogs sbyin//
323b3(rgyud): mchod dang gsol ba gdab pa nyid//ji ltar bshad pa de bzhin 'dir//'phar ma gnyis bzang rnam pas nas//myur du dkar mo la sogs bri//shar du gri gug rnam par bri//lce dang
323b4(rgyud): nub tu'ang de bzhin no//byang dang me yi mtshams dang ni//bden bral rlung du 'ang de bzhin no//dbang ldan du ni ci gsungs pa//de lta de ltar 'og dang steng //rdo rje sems dpa'i snyoms
323b5(rgyud): byas nas//rkang pa g.yas pa brgyad byas te//phyagra gnyis kye'i rdo rjer sbyor//slob dpon dkyil 'khor 'jug pa nyid//khrus dang gtsang sbra dri zhim lus//sna tshogs rgyan gyis
323b6(rgyud): rnam par brgyan//hUM hUM snyems po byas nas ni//hi hi rnam par 'jig byed dag/phyi nas de nyid yang dag bshad//rnam dag ye shes gzugs can dang //'khor ba dang ni mya ngan
323b7(rgyud): 'das//khyad par chung zad yod ma yin//mchog dgar sgom pa med cing sgom pa po 'ang med//yus kyang med cing gzung ba med dang 'dzin pa'ang med//sha dang khrag kyang med cing
324a1(rgyud): gshung dang gci 'du med//smug zo rgyangs med gtsang sgra mchod phyir rdzogs rnyed dang //rmugs med spang ba med dang rmongs med phu rA dan+ta med//srer snA
324a2(rgyud): med dang nga rgyal med cing mthong bya med//sgom dang snyom pa po med pashes dang dgra med cing //rlom sems med pa'i lhan cig skyes pa sna tshogs nyid//rdo rje snying pos 'di skad
324a3(rgyud): gsol//gzod nas rang bzhin med pa y-i//lus kyi rang bzhin dag pa ni//ci slad 'byung ba'i bdag nyid lags//de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can//mkha' gre bde ba sbyin pas
324a4(rgyud): gsungs//rlom sems med pa'i rang bzhin bdag/thams cad lus la rnam par gnas//kye bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du 'byung ba chen po las gyur pa'i phung po lags//
324a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/bo la kuk+ko la sbyor bas//reg pa sra ba'i chos kyis ni//se ni de las skye bar 'gyur//byang sems khu ba'i rnam pa las//tshul
324a6(rgyud): khams ni 'byung bar 'gyur//bskyod pa las ni drod skye ste//'gro bas rlung du rab tu grags//bde ba na mkha' nyid kyi khams//lnga po rnams kyis yongasu bskor//gang
324a7(rgyud): phyir 'byung ba tshe bde ba//de phyir bde ba de nyid min//lhan cig skyes pas gang skyes pa//lhan cig skyes par de brjod bya//rang bzhin lhan cig skyes zhes brjod//rnam pa thams
324b1(rgyud): cad sdom pa gcig/phyag rgya rgyu dang bral ba las//yo gi snying rje thab su 'gyur//stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa//byang chub sems zhes rab tu brjod//sngags kyi bzlas med dka'
324b2(rgyud): thub ming dang sbyin sreg mod//dkyil 'khor can yang med cing dkyil 'khor yang ni med//de ni sngags bzlas de dka' thub dang de sbyin sreg/de ni dkyil 'khor can dang de ni
324b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor nyid//mdor bsdus nas ni sems na 'dus pa'i gzugs can no//dbang gi le'u zhes bye ba ste bcu pa'o///mnyam par ma rungs dpral ba can//rtag tu ltung bar
324b4(rgyud): byed par brjod//dbang gi lha stangs g.yon na gnas//g.yon pa nas ni gzugs brnyan gnyis//g.yas pa'i cha la dgug pa nyid//steng nas kyang ni gzugs brnyan gnyis//
324b5(rgyud): dbu ma rengs pa'i lha stangs nyid//sna yi rtse mo'i dbus su gnyis//'byung ba nyid kyis ltung bar byed//rngub pa yis ni dbang du byed//dgang ba yis ni dgug pa nyid//zhi ba yis
324b6(rgyud): ni rangs par byed//rlom pa'i shing li ltung byed nyid//dbang ni me tog rab tu grags//rdo rje'i shing la dgug pa nyid//g.yo bcas rtsa la rengs byed nyid//zla drug goms pa'i
324b7(rgyud): sbyor ba yis//'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med//'di la 'khrul bar mi bya ste//sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul bsam mi khyab//lha stangs bzhi po bsgrubs nas ni//mkhas pas sems
325a1(rgyud): can gzhug par bya//bsad par 'di la bya ba yin//dam tshig nges par nyams par 'gyur//sems can slu ba spangs nas ni//bya ba ma yin thams/
325a2(rgyud): cad bya//sems can gnod pa tsam gyis ni//phyag rgya'i dngos grub rnyed mi 'gyur//de la dam tshig bza' bya ba//na dang ga hA dang po dang //mtha' ye shI dang dang po'i shA
325a3(rgyud): kye yi rdo rje'i dngos grub phyir//bdud rtsi lnga yang de bzhin bza'//kye rdo rjes gsungs mtshan nyid//skye ba bdun pa'ang de nas mtshon//dga' bral dga' ba la smod pa//la ni
325a4(rgyud): bdun pas ni 'grub par 'gyur//sked snyan mig dang ldan pa dang //dri lus gzi brjid chen po dang //de yi grib ma bdun du 'gyur//mthong nas rnal 'byor pa yis mtshan//
325a5(rgyud): de ni zos pa tsam gyis ni//skad cig la ni mkha' sbyor 'gyur//ku ru kul+le'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya ste//gong du brtag pa bcu gnyis par//rgyas par gsungs mdo ru
325a6(rgyud): bsdu//hrIHlas byung ba'i lha mo ni//kha dog dmar zhing phyig bzhi ma//mda' dang gzhu yi lag pa ma//ut+pa la dang lcags kyu 'dzin//'di ni bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni//
325a7(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum po dbang du byed//'bum phrag gcig gise rgyal po rnams//khri yis 'jig rten ngal pa nyid//bye bas phyugs dang gnod sbyin sogs//'bum phrag bdun
325b1(rgyud): gyis lha ma yin//'bum phrag gnyis kyis lha rnams nyid//brgya phrag gcig gis sngags pa nyid//kye'o rdo rje mkhang gro ma dra ba'i sdom pa las rdo rje snying po mngon par byang chub pa
325b2(rgyud): zhes bya ba rtag pa'i rgyal po rdzogs so//rdo rje'i stong pos gsol pa//bcom ldan rdo rje snying po bdag/sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pa//rab gnas
325b3(rgyud): mtshan nyid bzang po nyid//rem pa ji bzhin bshad du gsol//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ci gsungs sbyin sreg byas nas ni//dkyil 'khor dam pa bzhengs
325b4(rgyud): pa dang //snga bar sku gzugs sbyang ba dang //sta gon la sogs byas nas ni//namakhar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kun//sku gzugs snying khar rab tu gzhug/rang 'dod lha
325b5(rgyud): mnyam rnal 'byor pa//rab mthong sngags kyi pha rol son//oM badz+ra puSh+pe AHhUM swAhA/oM badz+ra d+hU pe AHhUM swA hUM/oM badz+ra dI pe AHhU~M swA hA/oM badz+ra gAn+d+he AHhUM swA hA
325b6(rgyud): oM badz+ra naM we d+yau AHhUM swAhA//sna tshogs hU~M ni rdzogs pa dang //me tog lnga sogs dbul ba nyid//grong ma'i rgyud kyi tshig rim pas//mcho yin 'bas bsil grang ma bzhin/
325b7(rgyud): zhi ba'i thab khung zlum po nyid//rgyas pa nyid kyi gru bzhi pa//bsad pa la ni gru gsum brjod//'di nyid la ni lhag ma sgrub//khru dang dang ni khru phyed nyid//zhi ba'i steng dang 'og tu
326a1(rgyud): yin//khru do dang ni khru gang nyid//rgyus pA'i steng dang 'og tu brjod//sor mo nyi shu 'am de yi phyed//bsnang pa'i steng dang 'og tu yang //zha bar
326a2(rgyud): kha dog dkar po 'gyur//rgyas par ser pa de bzhin no//bsad po la ni kha dog gnag/dbang la dmar por rab tu grags//dbang la ji bzhin de ltar dgug/bsang la ji ltar
326a3(rgyud): zhe sdang sogs//zhi la til dang rgyas la zho//bsrung la tsher ma de bzhin no//spang lA sogs pa'ang tsher mar brjod//dbang dang dgug la ut+pa la//oM ag+na ye ma hA te dza sarba kA
326a4(rgyud): ma pra sA d+ha kaH/ku rba Nikr-i ta satwAr+tha a smin san+ni hi to b+ha bAHme dgug pa'o//ma ma rin chen sna tshogs 'dzin//kye'i rdo rje khros mchod pa'o//lha mo khyod ni dbang du 'gyur/
326a5(rgyud): che gi bdag ni dkyil 'khor 'dri//s+'ur+b+bany+tse bA bi rarAr+yAny+dza sA d+h+r-i tAM gAr+b+ha ta bya b+hu kA/A ga mi Sh+yaM si ya thA kA le sar+b+ba sid+d+hi ku ru Sh+wa me//me dga' ba'i sngagaso//oM dzaHhUM be hrIH
326a6(rgyud): raM mchod yon gyi sngags so//oM ni ri te hU~M khAM/zhabs bsil gyi sngags so//oM d+h+waM d+h+waM lho bshos kyi sngag so//kye'i rdo rje mkha'agro ma dra ba'i sdom pa las brtag pa gnyi pa rab
326a7(rgyud): gnas kyi le'u ste dang de'o////rdo rje snying pos gsol pa//na mkha' lta bu'i chos kun la//rgya mtshor rlub ji lta bar//rang 'dod lha yi gzugs las ni//sems
326b1(rgyud): ts+tshin ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/bdag mod rnal 'byor ldan pa 'am//yang nai he ru ka dpal brtson//gzhan pa'i sems kyis skang
326b2(rgyud): TIg kyang //dngos grub 'dod pas mi gnas so//dang po goms par byed dus kyi//gi nas ni gang de sngags pa'i sems//gcig tu mnyam gzhag 'grub 'gyur ba'i//gnas
326b3(rgyud): ni bzang por nges par brtag/rang gi khyim du mtshan dus su/bdag nyid 'grub pa'i sems kyis ni//rnal 'byor ma sgom shes rab can//yang na he ru dpal gzugs/
326b4(rgyud): rkang pa 'khrud dang za ba dang //'thor 'thung so rtsi za ba dang //tsan dan gyis ni lag nyid dang //smang g.yogs kyis ni rgod 'gribs dang //'byung dang sgra dang 'gro ba dang //dru
326b5(rgyud): dang khro dang rgod pa dang //bcom ldan 'das ma bsten pa dang //shes rab brtul zhugs ni nyid kyis//rnalnga 'khyer ma ni rnam par sgom//gzhan gyi tshul gyis skad cig
326b6(rgyud): nga //'dug pa'i sems ni ma rigs byas//dngos grub 'dod pas chos zur phyed //mkhas pas 'bar bas mi gnas so//bisam gtan nyon mongs 'jigs byed pa
326b7(rgyud): snying po de yis bshad//brtse bas dngos grub don du yang //zla ba phyed du mo su rtogs//bsam pa thams cad yongs spangs nas//lha yi gi zug su sems po yis//nyi ma
327a1(rgyud): gcig tu ma chud dang //sa sa sa m+b+ha p+na AHsa//rlu rdzun don ra//la d+mo sha mas kun du yangan //
327a2(rgyud): gams byas pas//'phrul drin du nadu byud ba nyid//rdzogs kyi da na rdzu ga dang //myi rlug dang //'di zhugs ni
327a3(rgyud): ba ni nyon mo mongs//phan dang gnid 'i la so 'thung bar//de ltar nges par shes nas ni//ji stong de ni skad cig kyang //rnal 'byor ba rnams bri 'ang gnas
327a4(rgyud): med ldan byed pa dang /sgeg tshogs gisod la dga' ba dang //gzhan yang sgri ba dman gang dang //rmongs da ma nus las bye dang //ga sa dAn yan lag mtsha
327a5(rgyud): bsams pas de rnams 'grub pang 'gyur//dge ba bcul gams pa dang //tha ma la busna dang gdul//dargyal khra las rnam por bral//des ni ra shrIg ngas 'grub 'byung //
327a6(rgyud): rtag tu rnams pU rnal 'byur gyis//mnyam pa d+magazhug pas dadus sgyu thas/nA bAg ts+tsha tugs de la spyad//dz+ha sa phyag rgya ma bar//gnang brgyud 'gyur sdigs kyi/
327a7(rgyud): rnal 'byung mi mas brgyan po bya//phyag rgya tshig mo khyed la//sems can don kyis dzin//rnyed 'i ming srid so//gzugs dang ling chos rnam pa nan
327b1(rgyud): rmu ga pung yayong don ldan//byang chub sems kyis rnam par sbyang //dge ba bcu la sa brtsams nas na//de la chos ni rab tu dbye//lha yi gzugs kyi sems dang ni//dam tshig sems
327b2(rgyud): dedang gtsug pa nyid//zla ba gro tsog gis skal ldan par//'gyur ba 'di la btsom med//mchog thob pa ye byed med gang /rtog pa thams cad yang dag sbyangs//yang na bdag gis
327b3(rgyud): nus pa yis//sgra dang sgra min mi rnams dang //gnod sbyin ma 'am ci las kyang //phyag rgya bkug la rab tu brtag/de yang khyed la spyod pa spyad//bdag gI dalta ba mngon du'i phyir//
327b4(rgyud): gong bshang 'jigs pa'i gzugs can gyi//spyod pa ljongs spyod phyi ma gsus//yid ni rkyen nam gu yo ma //rlung gisams nas ser brtag/rdo rje snying pos gsam pa//
327b5(rgyud): bdag med rnal 'khyor ldan pa yis//phyen rgyu nyid ces ji lta brjod//d+h+r-ig r+b+ha phyag rgya gnyis dag des//phyad d+ha'i dngos grub ji ltar 'grub//bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' stsa
327b6(rgyud): padabud med gzugs ni spangs nas no//bcom ldan 'das kyis ga zug bya//num spru pa pa pA las 'gyur// lteng dus yang dag gnas//'gram ni nas dril bu nyid du
327b7(rgyud): 'gyur//ze 'bru ba la can du 'gyur //lhag ma bdag nyid chen po nyid//dpa' chen he ru ka yi gzugs//he ruka sbyor skyes bu nying //'bad pa med par skyes bu 'byung //gsapa
328a1(rgyud): bAr nus pa'i rnal 'byor pas//de phyir phyag rgya'i dngos grub 'gyur//'chags dang 'jig pa dag gam+b+hi kyang //thabs dang shes rab gnod mi
328a2(rgyud): 'gyur//gang phyir thabs ni 'byung ba nyid//'jig pa shes rab srid mthar byed//des na rab 'jig yod ma yin//de nyid la na tshogs pa med//lnga la 'jig pas 'jig
328a3(rgyud): par 'gyur//'jig pa'i dngos myed zad pa med//bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis//brtul zhugs can gyis spros pa sgom//spros pa rmi lam ltar byas nas//
328a4(rgyud): spros pa nyid ni spos med byed//ji ltar sgyu ma rmi lam dang //ji ltar bur ma'i srid yin pa//rtag tu goms pa'i sbyor ba las//dkyil 'khor nyid ni de bzhin 'dod//phyag
328a5(rgyud): rgya chen por dbang bskur bar//ji ltar shes pa'i bde chen po//'di ni de yi byin rlabs yin//gzhan las dkyil 'khor 'byung ba med//bde ba gnag cing bde ba se ro//
328a6(rgyud): bde ba dmar po bde ba dkar//bde ba ljang ku bde ba s+ho//bde ba rgyu dang ma rgyu kun//bde ba shes rab bde ba thabs//de bzhin kun tu ru skyes bde//bde ba dngos po dngos med
328a7(rgyud): bde//rdo rje sems dpa' bde bar brjod//rdo rje snying pos gsol po//rdzogus pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor 'di//de yi bde ba bde cheni brjod//rdzogs pa sgom pa med pa ste//
328b1(rgyud): bstod pa yis ni ci zhig 'tshal//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//e ma'o byang chub sems dpa' tshe//dad pa'i shugs kyis rab tu nyams//lus kyi dngos med gang
328b2(rgyud): los bde//bde bya smra bar myi nus so//khye dang khyab byed tshul gyis ni//bde bas 'gro ba khyab pa nyid//ji ltar mye tog la gnas dri//me tog dngos med shes mi 'gyur//
328b3(rgyud): de bzhin gzugs sogs dngos med pas//bde bo nyid kyang dngos med 'gyur//dngos dngos po med pa nga //dngos po rtogs phyir sangs rgyas nga //gang zhig le los bsnun
328b4(rgyud): pa dang //rmongs pa gang gis nga mi shes//rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha gA ni//e yi rnam pa'i cha byadang gzugs//sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog/bde ba can du rtag tu bzhugs//'chad pa
328b5(rgyud): po nga chos kyang nga //rang gi tshogs ldan nyan pa nga //'jig rten ston pa bsgrub bya nga //'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa nga //lhan cig skyes dgra'i rang bzhin nga //mchog dga'
328b6(rgyud): dga' bral dang por ni//mun pa la ni mar me ltar//de bzhin bus kyang yid chos kyis//btsun ma'i b+ha ge bde chen du//ston pa sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan//gtso bo dpe byad brgyad//
328b7(rgyud): cur ldan//khu ba zhes byi'i rnam par gnas//de med pas na dad med 'gyur//bde ba med na da med 'gyur//nus pa med phyir ltos dang bcas//lha yi rnal 'byor los bdog
329a1(rgyud): de ste sa sa rgyas blos pa min///dadangos med rdul yang med//sbrul phyug rnam+b+ha da'i gzugs can nyid//ma chog tu byeng ba gagags meng /
329a2(rgyud): der 'grogan ldan cig skyes//rang bzhin ldan cig skyes par brjod//rnam dun rnam pa'i sems cas n+de//rang sbyin myu ngan 'dis pa skyed// ste rnam pa'i ga rgyas kyis ni//
329a3(rgyud): na 'gu khe dog gnas pa ni//skyes pa kyi ma gyis rnam par gnas/ni kyang bgi chug sna la dus so//dgu gi dum thu gung nyid kyis/skye bo thas cad 'di ba 'gyu/
329a4(rgyud): drug gi de nyid shes pa des//dug gis drug hU~M 'jigs pa //d+hIm+b+hang+tha rlung gis zin pa lnga//mon sbyin sne bzla' ba sbyin//sh+log pa'i sman ni brtags pa yis/
329a5(rgyud): gis rlung la sbyin par byed//rnam rtag las ni rnam rtog dag/skyed pa nyid kyis skyid pa dag/ji ltar rna bar rgyu zhugs pa//chu gzhan dge gis 'gugs par byed//de byani na

329a7(rgyud): me yis gdung bar bya//skye bo mi bzad pa yi laso//gang dang gang gis 'ching 'gyur ba//thabs dang bcas ni de nyid kyis//srid pa'i 'ching ba las grol 'gyur//chags pas
329b1(rgyud): 'jig rten 'chang 'gyur ba//'dod chags nyid kyis rnam grol 'gyur//bzlog pa'i sgom pa 'di nyid ni//sangs rgyas mu stegs kyis mi shes//'byung ba lnga yi rang bzhin las//
329b2(rgyud): kun tu ru las lnga ru 'gyur//dga' ba chen po gcig nyid las//dbye bas lnga ru 'gro bar 'gyur//bo la kak+ko la sbyor bas//reg pa sra ba'i bag chags nyid//sra ba gti mug chos
329b3(rgyud): kyi phyir//gti mug rnam par snang mdzad brjod//grang phyir byang sems gsher ba nyid//gshwar ba chu yi khamasu brjod//chu ni mi bskyod gzugs kyi phyir//zhe sdang 'dren pa mi bskyod
329b4(rgyud): pa//gnyis kyis bskyod pa'i sbyor ba las//drod ni rtag tu skyo bar 'gyur//'dod chags dpag med rdo rje yin//'dod tshigs de de las 'byung bar 'gyur//kak+ko lA re ni gang zhig sems
329b5(rgyud): de ni rlung gi rang bzhin ston//phrog dog don yod grub pa yin//don yod rlung las 'byung ba nyid//bde ba 'did chags khrag tu 'gyur//dga' ba nam+ba pa'i mtshan nyid de//nam pa
329b6(rgyud): srer ste rdo rjer 'gyur//mAr sA na mkha' les byung nyid//sems ni chen po gcig nyid la//lnga yi gargyags kyis rnam par mchin//rigs ni lnga po de nyid las//stong phrag du ma
329b7(rgyud): skyes pa nyid//de phyir 'di dag rang bzhin gcig/bde chen mchod tu rtag pa nyid//'dod chags la songs sem mi lnga yi//dbyi ngas lnga ru 'gro bar 'gyur//gang gi klung ba'i bye
330a1(rgyud): snyed nyid//ridas gcig+sa wAnI de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs//rigs kyi spyod pa la rigs ni du ma rnams//du rnams rigs la rigs r+b+barnamA pa bad+ma//
330a2(rgyud): de rnams la yang 'bum phrag rigs chen rnams//bye ba'i rigs la grangs ni med par 'gyur//de la rigs la grangs med rigs rnams nyid//mchog tu dga' ba'i rigs la
330a3(rgyud): byung ba rnams//kye'i rdo rje ma pa 'gro ma dra ba'i sdom pa las dngos grub gtan la dbab pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o////de nas rdo rje can gyis rnal 'byor ma rnams la rgyud
330a4(rgyud): thams cad kyi gleng gzhi zhes bya ba'i thabs bka' stsal pa//sdom pa dang nu dbang dang yang /de bzhin dgongs pa'i skad nyid dang //dga' dreng skad cig dbye ba dong //gzhan yang bzer
330a5(rgyud): pab la sogs pa//de la sdom po bka' stsal pa//sangs rgyas kun gyi sdom pa ni//e bI rnam par rab tu gnas//oM bi rnam pa'i bde chen po//dbong las yang dag shes par

330a7(rgyud): e baM rnam pa ci zhes brjod//rim pa ji bzhin bshang du gsol//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//e yi cha byed bzang po gang //dbus su baM gyis rnam par rgyan/
330b1(rgyud): bde ba thams cad kyi ni gnas//sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog/skad cig dbye bas phye ba nyid//dga' ba de las skye bar 'gyur//skad cig shes nas bde shes pa//oM baM rnam
330b2(rgyud): par rab tu gnas//sna tshogs dang ni rna ma smin dang //rnam nyid de bzhin mtshan nyid bral//skad cig bzhi ni rab sheso pas//de ltar rnal 'byor pas shes 'gyur//'khyud dang 'a byung/
330b3(rgyud): la sogs pa//sna tshogs rnam pa sna tshogs bshad//rnam par smin pa de las bzlog/bde ba'i ye shes za ba nyid//bdag gi bad+ma ba zos po yi//glos ni rnam par nyed par brjod//
330b4(rgyud): mtshan nyid bral ba gsum las glan ni//chags dang chags bral rnam par spangs//sna tshogs dang po'i dga' ma nyid//rnam smin lnga ni mchog dga' nyid//rnam nyid dga' ba dang
330b5(rgyud): bral nyid//mtshan bral lhan cig skyes dga' nyid//slob dpe ni gsang ba shes rashi dang //bzhi pa de yang ni bzhin no//dbang ni bzhi yi grangs kyis ni//dga' ba la sogs rim
330b6(rgyud): shes byas//dgod pa dag pa slob dpon nyid//lta ba gsang ba de bzhin no//lag bcangs las ni shes rab nyid//gnyis gnyis 'khyud la de yang nyid//sems can rnams kyi
330b7(rgyud): dngos grub phyir//dbang ni rnam pa bzhi ru bshad//gtor dang blugs pa zhes bya 'dis//des na dbang zhes brjob par bya//shes rab bcu drug lon pa la//lag pa dag gis yang dag
331a1(rgyud): 'khyud//rdo rje dril bu mnyam sbyor bas//slob dpon dbang du ba tu brjod//shin tu bya zhing brgyad mig yangs ma//gzugs dang lang tshos rnam par
331a2(rgyud): brgyan//mthe bong srin lag dag gis ni//slob ma'i kha ru ltung ba bya//de nyid du ni mnyam pa'i ro//skyob ma'i spyod yul dag tu bya//ston pas shes rab rab tu mchod//rjed pa
331a3(rgyud): byas nas gtad bar bye//smyon pas smras pa sems dpa' che//phyag rgyu bde ba ldan pa khyer//phrag dog khro ba rnam spangs pa'i//slob ma cher gyur shes nas ni//skyon pas del
331a4(rgyud): gnang ba sbyin//kun tu ru gyis rdo rje 'dzin//ji ltar dbang bskor gsol btab pa'o//slob ma'i bya ba bshad par bya//tha ma phyag rgya ldan mthong nas//bstod dang mdzod
331a5(rgyud): pa ji bzhin bya//bcom ldan zhi ba chen po kye//rdo rje rnal 'byor gcig bzhed pa//mi phyed phyag rgya sgrub po pa//rdo rje rnal 'byor lus byung ba//ji ltar khyod ni
331a6(rgyud): bdag nyid tshe//mnga' bdag bdag la'ang de ltar mdzod//'khor ba 'dam gyi tshogs dag tu//bying ba sgribs med bdag la skyobs//zhim pa'i bza' bu btung gA dang /
331a7(rgyud): ba la tshe mchog mad na//bdug pa lha bshos phreng ba dang //dril bu rgyal mtshon byug pa yis//'di rnams mchod pa rnams kyis ni//slob mas rdo rje 'dzin pa mchod/
331b1(rgyud): mchog tu dga' ba yang dag thob//sna tshogs spangs pa'i skad cig la//ston pas smras pa sems dpa' tshe//bde ba chen po rnam par zung //ji srid byang chub bar du ni/
331b2(rgyud): sems can don gyis rdo rje 'dzin//slob ma snying rje can mthong nas//rdo rje can gyis 'di skad smras//'di ni ye shes chen po nyid//thams cad lus la rnam pa la gnas//
331b3(rgyud): dang gnyis su med pa'i tshul//dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid gtso//brtan dang g.yo ba khyab nas gnas//sgyu ma'i gzugs can nyid du 'dod//dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i
331b4(rgyud): thabs kyis ni//rtag tu nges par 'gro bar 'gyur//de nas rdo rje snying pos rnal 'byor ma rnams la bzod par ga sol nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//

331b7(rgyud): lo zhes bya na mkha'i khams//yul la sogs pa rnam par sbyong //bo la kak+ko la sbyor bas//de yi bde ba shes par 'gyur//rdo rje snying pos gsol pa//sdom pa zhes bya gas
332a1(rgyud): //dam tshig byung gis smranas par ban+d+ha//bcoM ldan 'das kyis b+hA/ThA sprul pa/srog chags b+hAsad+ma pA nga //brdzun d+harmA
332a2(rgyud): kyang smra ba dang //khyod kyis mi byin pa yang long //pha rol bud med pasbyin par gyis//sems gcig sgrog chags gsong pa nyid//gung phyir sgrog ni skyem su brjod /
332a3(rgyud): rnon sbrul zhe zhes bya'o//brdzun gyi tshig tu rab tu bsgrags//bitsun mra'i khyab ma byin par//gzhan gyi bud med rang ma tshungs mdzes//de nas rnal 'byor thams cad kyis/

332b1(rgyud): lnga ni gzugs la sogs//mthar ni rnam shes snying rje che//dbang po dang ni yul nyid dang //dbang po'i rnam par shes pa nyid//rnal 'byor ma rnams sgo tsho'i phyir//khams ni btso brgyang

332b7(rgyud): gyis brlabs pa bstan pa/kye kye rdo rje mkha 'gro ma//sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag mdzad pa//de nyid bdag gis gsang mdzad pa//rdo rje mchod pa'i byin rlangs kyis//bshad kyis
333a1(rgyud): 'dod pas rab tu nyon//lha mo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur//rangs par gyur te/dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la bcugs nas/bcom ldan

333b1(rgyud): byang chub sems kyis rab tu bza'//gnyis med ye shes sems rgyu ni//mi bza' cung zad yod ma yin//rang rgyu me tog N+DIng nas na//pad+ma snong du bzhag pa dang /

333b3(rgyud): ri sang ge nas rnyed paskye//myug sa legs par bcing bar bya//de nas rdo rje snying pos gsol pa//thams cad sprul gyi rnam dag pa//bcom ldan 'das kyis lngar gsum
333b4(rgyud): na/nges par dbang po drug gi grang s+ho//rnam par dag par ma mdzad pa//bcom ldan 'das kyis bku' stsal pa//mig la gaN+DI mug rdo rje ma//rna bA ne stang rnam//sna

333b6(rgyud): 2/ bos gsol pa//dgos po'i sna na ci'is kyi ste/bcom ldan 'das kyis nges gsung gsol//rnal 'byor ma yi ma tshunani//nyan thos la sogs
333b7(rgyud): mi shes pa//dgod dang lci bdag pos dang //'argyu dang byin do ga ni nyis kyi//rgyud kyang rnam pa po rnams kyis//dgos pa'i skad ni ma sgrungs pa//coMm
334a1(rgyud): nges par gsung du gsol//dgongs pa skad ni skang chen po//dam tshig brda ni rgya sa pa ru//rdo rje snying po ngas bshad kyis//khyod ni rtse gtsug
334a2(rgyud): sems kyis nyon//ma dan chang ba la sha/'du ba ma la ya dzi brjod//'gro ba khe Ta ro na shrA pa//rus pa'i rgyan ni ni ri sh+tsa//'ong ba pro khaN+Da ru brjod//cang te kr-i pi ta
334a3(rgyud): rA brjod//bskal med du du ra zhes brjod//skal ldan ka lany+dzi raM brjod//reg ma ni TINI ri zhes brjod//thod pa pad+ma b+ha dzA ne//bza' ba tr-i pi ta zhes bya//tshad ma mA l+ya
334a4(rgyud): tin+ta nI//bshang ba tsaM tu sa mi brjod//gci ba ka stu ri zhes brjod//rang byung sih+lar shes par bya//khu ba ku pU ra zhes brjod//sha chen shI le dzi zhes brjod//dbang po
334a5(rgyud): gnyis sbyor kun tu ru//rdo rje bo la zhes bshad de//pad+ma kak+ko la zhes zer//kha dog dbye bas phye ba las//rigs ni rnam pa lnga ru bshad//'di ni gsang ba'i skad yid//
334a6(rgyud): phyag rgya lnga ni bsdus pa nyid//ga sung mo rdo rje'i rigasu bshad//grang ma de bzhin pad+ma'i rigs//rong 'tshong ma ni rin chen rigs//skyes gnyis de bzhin gshegs par brjod//
334a7(rgyud): chos ma las kyi rigs nyid de//phyag rgya 'di rnams dngos grub sbyin//'di rnams khu ba rdo rjer 'gyur//brtul zhugs can gyis mchod nas btung //rdo rje snying po sems
334b1(rgyud): dpa' che//gsang ba'i skad ni mtshar che ga//nga yis khyod la gang bshad pa//de rnams thams cad gus pas zung //kye rdo rje 'dir dbang bskur gang //gabang ba'i skad kyi
334b2(rgyud): mi sgrub//de yi dam tshig nyams par ni//'gyur ba 'di la the tsam med//'chi ba dang ni rkun mA dang //gdon dang rims dang drug gis kyang //gal te sangs rgyas gos
334b3(rgyud): ba'i skad //mi gsung na yang 'grongs par 'gyur//rang gi dam tshig rigs rnyed na//gal te tshig 'di mi sme ba//gnas bzhi las skyes rnal 'byor pa//de yi tshe na khro bar//
334b4(rgyud): byed//kye'i rdo rje mkha 'gro ma dra ba'i sdom pa las rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi dang gsang ba'i skad ces bya ba'i li'u ste gsum pa'o///de nas rdo rje snying po la sogs
334b5(rgyud): pa'i rdo rje mkha'i gro ma thams cad the snyam du gyur/yid gnyis su gyur te bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das the tsom gsal
334b6(rgyud): du gsol/spyod pa'i le'u las gang bshad pa//glu dang gyur ni dngos grub sbyin//de la bdag ni the tsom mchis//glu ni tsi legs gar kyang ci//lha'i le'u las gang gsungs/
334b7(rgyud): ba/zhe sdang li sogs phyag rgya rnams//de la bdag ni the tsom mchis//gong gi phyag rgya phyag rgya ci//sngags btu ba las gang gsungs pa//bdag med la sogs sa bon nyid
335a1(rgyud): de la bdag ni 'khrul par 'gyur//gang gi sa bon sa bon gang //rigs kyi le'u las gang ba shad pa//bcu drug gnyis kyi bdag nyid rtsa//
335a2(rgyud): bcom ldan bdag ni 'khrul gyung byas//d+hi rnams rnam dag bshad du gsel//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//kol+la e ren+ti u bi lA mum+mu NaM re kak+ko lA/g+ha Na ki bi
335a3(rgyud): Taha dAdz+dza i ka ru Ne kaM au ai na ro lA/ta he ba la khadz+dzA a gI rau ma a NA bidz+rI i a i/he li kA liny+dza ra pa NAM a i dweng+ku ra badz+dzi a i/tsa u sa ma kAts+tsha rI sih+la kaSh+ku ra lA
335a4(rgyud): i a ai/mA la i ir+N+Na NA shA lAMny+dza ta hai b+ha r+ya khA ai a I/pheM khi Ne khe Ta ka ran+te shud+d+ha shud+d+ha ne mu Ni a i/nI r-i shu aM gaM tsa DA wI ti haM dzA sa rA ba be Ni a au/mi
335a5(rgyud): la ya dze kun+da ru bA Ta i/DiNI me hiN+Tha bA dz+yaM a au//ngan pa mi 'phrogs rnal 'bor pas//he ru ka'i gzugs kyis gAr//chags bral min goms sems kyis ni/
335a6(rgyud): 'dod chags sims kyis sgom pa nyid//rdo rje chos dang sangs rgyas dang //rnal 'byor ma dang ma ma yis//glu dang gar ni 'di dag gis//legs par glu blang gar kyang bya/
335a7(rgyud): 'di nyid kyis ni tshigs srung zhing //de bzhin bdag kyang srung ba nyid//'dis ni 'jig rten dbang du byed//'dis ni sngags kyis bzlas pa nyid//gang du guso bas
335b1(rgyud): glu lo //gang du gus baHstu gAr rnyed pa//tshongs dag pas snang byas nas//da la dran mam n+ta byu tu//rlan kyi drin dang po nyid//de nas yang dupya da do//gdu/
335b2(rgyud): mi la yang nyid//da pI d+hI nga //hUM mthu' nas mnyan par // la pa skye ni//phyir la tshul du maljon bye ba//rgyu yi byi rnams mtshan nyid do//
335b3(rgyud): dang mtshan ma /'dris ni rigs ni mtshon par bya//rigs 'tshal sgom pa'i sbyor ba las//dngos grub mod cing sgrub pa'ang myed// snying byAg d+has bdug med mi//\u0f7f
335b4(rgyud): dza rnam//skye sno byug rgyas de//ma nyid //rjegs pas dum b+hag d+hA sa nga//byug sprin phyug ma la sa/pra sa// sa
335b5(rgyud): khrid ma//se sA'i dwagi n+yamo gdal ba s+ho//'did chags phyug rgyas gsung ma nyid//yang ni da//mon sdung las//gti mug phyag rgya so tsam rku ma//sed sde'i hU~M d+ha
335b6(rgyud): la sem/'dod k+kom+b+ha d+h+r-ig r+b+ha sa dA//g+hu'i ga phyog rgyas pa stod pa//'dod nas phyag rgyus me bar spyod pa//'dodangs phyug tu shes pa /
335b7(rgyud): bdag med ma//A l-i gnyis pa rdo rje ma//A l-i gsum pa dkor mo nyid//bge pa chu yi rnal 'byor sa//wa ba rdo rje ma 'a 'gros//drug pa drug sde zhes brjod//bdun pa
336a1(rgyud): ni ri khrod ma//brgyad pa sme sha can du brjod//dgu pa yang na ga yung mo nyid//yang ni lnga gnyis dkar mo nyid//bcu gcig chom rkun ma zhes pashung //
336a2(rgyud): bcu gnyis ro langs ma zhes brjod//bcu gsum pa ni g+h+rA smA rI//bcu bzhi pa ni saM spyod ma//bco lnga pa ni mkha' spyod ma//rnal 'byor ma yis don nyid//rigs kyi
336a3(rgyud): kyi le'u las rtsa rnams gang //bcu drug gnyis kyi bdag nyid gsungs//rtsa ni gnyis rnal 'byor ma//re rI rnam po gsum du brjod//brkyang ma ro ma kun 'dar ma//
336a4(rgyud): bdag med rnal 'byor ma zhes brjod//gang phyir bcu drug cha med pas//'bad pas kun gyi lhag mo spangs//ci'i slad du zhe na/don gyi bya ba mi phyed phyir/bco lnga'i cha
336a5(rgyud): yi bdag nyid kyi//zla ba byang chub semasu 'gyuraro//bde ba chen po A li'i gzugs//rnal 'byor ma rnams dri yI cha//rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/rnal 'byor ma kun las
336a6(rgyud): byung ba//lhan cig skyes dge rang bzhin nyid//'grib med datupa mchog na mkha' nyid//ga pur nges par cis mi spang //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ji skad
336a7(rgyud): smras pa de bzhin no//rdo rje snying pos gsol ba//thabs gang gis byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa lags//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//dkyil 'khor 'khor
336b1(rgyud): lo'i thabs dang ni//rang byin rlob pa'i rim pas kyang //kun rdzob don dam gzugs can gyi//byang chub sems ni rab tu bskyed//kun rdzob kun da lta bu nyid//don dam bde bar/
336b2(rgyud): gzugs can no//bud maud k+ko la bde ba can//e baM rnam pa'i rang bzhin du//bde ba srung ba nyid kyi phyir/bde ba tsan zhes rab tu bsgrags//
336b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams kyi gnas//'di nyid 'khor ba zhes bya ste//'di nyid mya ngan 'das pa nyid//'khor ba spangs nas gzhan du ni//
336b4(rgyud): mya ngan 'das pa rtogs mi 'gyur//'khor ba gzugs dang sgra la sogs//'khor ba tshor ba la sogs pa/'khor ba dbang po rnams nyid do//'khor ba zhe sdang la sogs pa//
336b5(rgyud): 'di rnams chos ni mya ngan 'das//rmongs phyir 'khor ba'i gzugs can nyid//rmongs med 'khor ba dag pas ni//'khor ba mya ngan 'das par 'gyur//byang chub sems
336b6(rgyud): ni mya ngan 'das//kun rdzob don dam tshul can no//shin tu bzhin bzang mig yangs ma//gzugs dang lang tshos rnam par rgyan//sngo bsangs ngal la rigs bzang ma/
336b7(rgyud): si h+la ga pur 'byung ba'i gnas//rang gis dbang bskur kye'i rdo rje//skra bzang sgrub pa po la dga'//de yi chang yang btung bar bya//de nas rang yang btung ba nyid//rang gzhan
337a1(rgyud): don ni rab sgrub phyir//phyi nas phyag rgya rjes chags bya//po la kak+ko lar bcug nas//kun tu ru byed brtul zhugs can//der no sbyor ba las byung
337a2(rgyud): ba'i dag pur mkhas pas mi springasaM ste//de ni log tu mi blang zhing //nya phyis dung chos nyid du sbyin//nges par blo dang stobs kyi phyir//mi 'tshwats+tsha yis blang ba nyid//
337a3(rgyud): gla pur nyid ni bdag med ma//bde ba bdag med tshul can nyid//de yi byed pa phyag rgya che//lta bya'i dkyil 'khor nyid du gnas//drang po'i dbyangs yig rang bzhin te//
337a4(rgyud): broblo zhes sangs rgyas rnams kyis brtags//rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor las//de nyid bcom ldan shes rab ma//da ni ring min thung ba min//gru bzhi ma yin zlum
337a5(rgyud): po mini//dri drong ro dang mya ngan 'das//lhan cig skyes dga' byed pa can//de las skyes pa'i rnal 'byor pas//de yi bde ba myong ba nyid//de dang lhan cig phyag rgya che//
337a6(rgyud): bde ba sbyin pa'i dngos grub 'gyur//gzugs sgra dro bzhin dri dang ni//ro dang dri bzhin rog bya nyid//chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin yang //shes rab nyid kyis dpyod par bya/
337a7(rgyud): de nyid ston cig skyes pa'i gzugs//'di chen bzang po'i rnal 'byor ma//de nyid dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dang //ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin can//de ni me long ye shes gzugs//
337b1(rgyud): rma ma nyid po shos da sta~M bats+tshin//yang dag byur ba so sor rnyog/de nyid bya ba nan tan te//chos dbyings shin tu rnam dag ma//de nyid dkyil 'khor bdag pong //de nyid pa ba ring//
337b2(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma//chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can//rdo rje snying pos gsol pa//'khor lo bsgom pa'i lam dang ni//lha rnams ji ltar 'byung ba nyid//thams cad bcom ldan
337b3(rgyud): 'dus gsungs na//sdom pa yang dag bshad du gsol//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//rnalnga 'byor mA yi lus dbus su//a yi rnam pa'i sdom pa gnas//ji ltar
337b4(rgyud): phyi rol de bzhin nang //sdom pa de nyid rab tu phye//bo la'i bde ba phyag rgya che//rdo rje skye mchod thabs chen nyid//'dis ni gsang ba'i snyoms 'jug pas//phyi rol gnyis ni bstan
337b5(rgyud): tu med//sku gsum lus kyi nang du ni//'khor lo'i gzugs kyis brjod par bya//sku gsum yongasu shes pa ni//bde ba chen po'i 'khor lhor brjod//chos dang longs spyod sprul
337b6(rgyud): ba dang //de bzhin du yang bde chen nyid//skye gnas snying mgrin mgo bor yang //sku gsum po ni rnam par gnas//mA lus pa yi sems can gyi//skye ba grang lo brjod
337b7(rgyud): par bya//gang phyir sprul pa gnas brtan phyir//lte ba sprul pa gnas brtan phyir//gang gis bskyed dang sprul byed pa'i//sku ni sprul pa can zhes brjod//sems ni chos kyi rang
