338a1(rgyud): bzhin te//chos kyi sku yang snying khar 'gyur//ro rnams drug gi gzugs can gyi//bza' ba nges par longs spyod brjod//mgrin par ljongs
338a2(rgyud): 'khor lo'o//spyi bor bde ba chen po gnas//e baM rnam par rgyu 'thun nyid//rnam smin chos kyi 'khor lo las//longs spyod skyes bu'i byeng pa nyid//bde ba'i 'khor la
338a3(rgyud): dri med nyid//rgyu 'thun sogs par rab phye ba'i//'bras bu rnam pa bzhi zhes brjod//las kyi rlung gis bskul ba yis//laso lo bcom ldan shes rab spyod//ji ltar
338a4(rgyud): byas pa de bzhin spyod//rgyu 'thun zhes na rab tu bsgrags//las chung 'bras bu phye ba'i phyir//rnam par smin pa de las bzlog/rnal 'byor dag phyir dri med nyid//bskyed
338a5(rgyud): po skyes bu byed pa nyid/gang phyir sprul pa gnas brtan phyir//sprul pa'i 'khor lor gnas brtan nyid//chos kyi smra ba 'byung ba'i phyir//chos kyi 'khor lor thams
338a6(rgyud): cad yod//gang phyir mayin par kun bkur phyir//longs spyod 'khor lor kun bkur nyid//gang phyir bde chen mgor gnas pas//bde ba'i 'khor lor dge 'dun che//
338a7(rgyud): sde pa zhes bya sku ru brjod//lto ba gnas su brjod par bya//skye gnas 'dod chags bral bar 'gyur//mngal gyi khru ma chos gos nyid//de bzhin ma ni mkhan po nyid//man
338b1(rgyud): bor thal mo sbyar ba phyag/'gro ba'i bya ba khrims kyi gnas//sngabs kyi bzlas pa a dang haM//skyes gnas 'khor lo'i rnam pa a//bde chen gyi yang rnam pa haM//gcer bu sgra dang kha
338b2(rgyud): spu bregs//sngags 'don skyes po dge slong nyid//'di dag rkyen gyis sems can rnams//sangs rgyas nyid du the tsom med//zla ba bcu yang sa rnams yin//sems can sa bcu
338b3(rgyud): dbang phyug go//de nas rnal 'byor ma bdag med ma la sogs pa'i lha me thams cad la//'di lta ste spyan dang /mA ma ki dang /gos dkar mo dang /sgrol ma dang /khro gnyer can dang //
338b4(rgyud): tsun dA dang /par+N+Na ri khrod ma dang /'og zhal ma dang /de dag la sogs pa ri rab kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams tshig 'di dag thos nas mchog tu ngo mtshar du
338b5(rgyud): gyur cing brgyal ba dang /skrag pa dang /sa la 'gyel ba dang /'dar bar gyur to//yang rdo rje can gyis lha mo de rnams thams cad la gzigs nas bslang ba'i phyir yang dag par
338b6(rgyud): bstod pa//sa dang chu rlung byin za yi//lha mo snod can khyed nyid la//gang zhig sus kyang mi shes pa//de nyid nga yis spro yis nyon//bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rmi lam lta bu
338b7(rgyud): nye bar thos nas de rnams thams cad srog rnyed par gyur to//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//sems can rnams ni sangs rgyas nyid//'on kyang glo bur dri mas
339a1(rgyud): bsgribs//de nyid bsal na sangs rgyas nyid//lha mos gsol pa//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin te//bden pa yang ma mchis shing brdzun pa
339a2(rgyud): yang ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//grang zhig mi shes 'jig rten pa//btsan du gzos pas brgyal bar 'gyur//rmongs spangs de nyid yid kyis ni//
339a3(rgyud): de yis de nyid yongasu gcod//de bzhin zhi ba'i thabs shes shing //kye'i rdo rjer ngal bsos nas//ma rig sogs pas mi 'dzin cing //gti mug la sogs 'ching bas
339a4(rgyud): min//rang dang rang gas rtogs pa las//sangs rgyas ma yin sems can ni//gcig kyang yod pa ma yin no//dmyal ba yi dgas byol song dang //lha dang lha min mi rnams
339a5(rgyud): dang //bshang ba'i srin bu la sogs pa//lha dang lha ma yin gyi yang //bde ba gang phyir mi shes pa//rtag tu rong bzhin bde ba can//'jig rten khams ni gang du yang //
339a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas gzhan du rnyed mi 'gyur//sems ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid//sangs rgyas gzhan du bstan du myed//gdol pa sbyin mkhan la sogs pa//bsod don don
339a7(rgyud): du sems pa po//de rnams kye rdo rjer shes na//'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med//byas pa mi shes pas bsgribs pa//'di yi bzod pa mi shes pa//'gro ba drug gi srid par
339b1(rgyud): nA thar//gang zhig rmongs pa 'khor bar 'gyur//rdo rje snying po steng rje che//kye rdo rje'i thabs rnyed dus//gang shig yul rnams rnam skyong ba//de ni bla med rnyed par 'gyur//rdo rje
339b2(rgyud): snying pos gsol ba//sa ni puk+ka sIr bshad pa//gang phyir gti mug sra ba nyid//sku ni rnam snang nyi de gsungs pa//ji ltar mi bskyod phyag rgya lags//bcom ldan 'das kyis
339b3(rgyud): bka' stsal pa//sems spangs nas ni lus kyis ni//mdzes pa gzhan du mi 'gyur ro//de phyir rnam par snang mdzad sems//sku lo thugs kyi phyag rgyas gdab//rdo rje snying pos
339b4(rgyud): gsol pa/chu khams ri khrod mar bshad pa//mi bskyod khu ba'i gzugs can nyid//gtso bo mi bskyod phyag rgyas ni//ri khrod ma la phyag rgya rogs//bcom ldan 'das kyis
339b5(rgyud): 'phrul pa//rus smras nas ni sems kyis ni//gnas pa gzhan du mdzod mi 'gyur//dri phy-ir soms ni gti mug 'byung //thog stsol gti mug phyug rgyas gangag
339b6(rgyud): snying pos gsol pa//me ni gdol pa mor bshad pa//'dod chags phyag rgyas gdol pa mo//rigs te phyag rgya gzhan min+da na//ji ltar rin chen phyag rgya lags//bcom ldan
339b7(rgyud): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//gang phyir 'dod chags khrag bshad pa//khrag ni rin chen 'byung gnas nyid//drod ni khrag gi rang bzhin phyir//'dod chags ser sna phyag rgyas gangs
340a1(rgyud): rdo rje snying pos gsol pa//gang phyir g.yung mo rlung nyid de/don yod rlung gi gzugs can nyid//don yod phyag rgyas gA yung myo la//gtso bo phyag rgya
340a2(rgyud): rigs par 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po//'dod chags ma gtogs phrag dag ni//gzhan du 'byung ba ma yin te//de phyir 'dod chags phyag rgya yis/
340a3(rgyud): mkhas pas g.yung mo phyag rgya sa hrudab//gang phyir gzugs ni sra ba nyid//dkar mo snang mdzad gsungs pa nyid//sngar gsungs nyid kyi rim pa yis//sems kyi bAng/
340a4(rgyud): po phyag rgyas gdab//de nyid rim pas chomo rkun ma//de bzhin ro langs ma nyid dang //de yi rigs pas g+hAsma rI/ma log pa las phyag rgya'o//kye'i rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin//
340a5(rgyud): snyoms 'jug gnas pa'i lha nyid la//sems can don phyir gtor ma che//de la bdag med mas zhus pas//e bo rnam par bzhugs nas ni//bgegs dang log par 'dren
340a6(rgyud): paM las//sems can rnams kyi srog srung phyir//rdo rje sems dpas gtor ma bstan//oM in+da dza ma dza la dzak+Sha/b+hu da ba hI bA u rak+Sha/tsan+da sudz+dza mA da pA p+lu ta la pI tA
340a7(rgyud): le an+ma sap+pa swahA//i daM ba liM b+hun+de dzi g+ha pul+lo d+hu pa mAM sa paM g+ha/aM b+ha kadz+dza sap+pa sAM da khan+ti khu Ni phe Da gA da//oM a kA ro mu kho sarba d+harmA NAM Id+ya nut+pan+na tAta oM aHhUM phaT
340b1(rgyud): sUt+ma gdu de che dor btor mas 'byung bya thams cad mchod par byed na rnal 'byor pa rnam pa legs par 'gyur to//de rnams la bde ba dri ma med pa dang /l+h+wa ma rnamapa dang /
340b2(rgyud): ba rab tu 'byor pa rnams dga' bar 'gyur ro//gal te 'dir 'byung po'i tshogs kyi phyir rtag tu gtor ma byin na dbang dang //mngon spyod dang /dgra'i sde 'jigs pa dang /bskrad
340b3(rgyud): pa dang /bsad pa dang /dgug pa dang /zhi ba dang /rgyas par yang 'gyur ro//rdo rje snying pos gsol po/phyag rgya gang gis mkha' spyod ma//gang gis phyag rgyas sa spyod ma/
340b4(rgyud): gtso bo ba dag gis sngar ma 'tshal//bcom ldan ji ltar phyag rgya bgyi//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po/gsang gsum 'khor lo'i dbus su ni//sku gsud+yo thugasu phya
340b5(rgyud): ba las//steng dang 'og dang dbus gnas pa'i//'khor lo'i dbus su rnam par gnas//sa spyod sku yi phyag rgya can//steng zhal sku yi rdo rje ma//mkha' spyod 'dod chags phyig
340b6(rgyud): rma can//'og zhal gsung gi rdo rngam//thugs kyi rdo rje bdag me dam//sems ni bdag med tshul can nyid//sems ni dbus kyi gnas su ste//des na bdog med mra dbus skye/
340b7(rgyud): rgyas par rab tu phye ba las//rigs ni rnam pa drug tu brjod//rnam gsum rnam pa lnga nyid kyang //bshad kyis rnal 'byor ma nyid nyon//mi bskyod rnam snang rin tshon
341a1(rgyud): sna sprul das ni//phyis ris ni rnam g+ne//'dod chags na slong gti muga~M gis//nga rjesirnam pa gsum du 'gyur//mi bskyed zhe sdang gi zugs rkyen gyi
341a2(rgyud): rje sems dpa' sbyangs nas ni//phyi nas rigs ni rnam pa lnga//'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gis//de rjes rnam pa gsum du 'gyur//mi bskyod zhe sdang gzugs can gyi//
341a3(rgyud): thugs kyi bdag po rigis gcig nyid//zhe sdang rdo rje'i byin rlabs 'di//rigs ni drug dang lnga ru brjod//kye'i rdo rje las rgyud thams cad kyi phyag rgya bsdus pa'i don zhes bya
341a4(rgyud): ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o///phyag ni bcu drug zhal brgyang pa//zhabs bzhi pa dang 'jigs pa po//dpa' bo thad pa'i phreng ba can//bdag ming mas ni mgul
341a5(rgyud): nas 'khyungad //phyag rgya lnga ni 'dzin lha la//bdag med ma ni nyid kyis zhus//bco lngas yongasu bskor ba yi//bdag gis 'khor lo khyod bshad na//khyod kyi dkyil 'khor
341a6(rgyud): ji ltar legs//gtso bo bdag gis sngar ma 'tshal//bdab med tsu ma b+ha ni mdzad nas//rdo rje thod pa stsal nas ni//lha yi nu ma mnyes mdzad de//dkyil 'khor yang dag
341a7(rgyud): rab tu dbye//'khor lo ji ltar spar gsungs pa//do shal do shal phyed pas h+yan//mtshams bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa//rdo rje srad pus yang dag byin//'dod chags chen
341a8(rgyud): mAn/ ma su shA rgyud na na/lnga'ang na sung //rnam ma da
341a9(rgyud): doni nan de/pa kyi rna pan ni the rang gi dbum 'kho bamyed pa ste/
341b1(rgyud): po'i rjes chags pas//lhan cig skyes dga' rang bzhin las//khyod dang lhan cig bzhin pa dang ma//de la dbus su nga yod de//zhal brkyang ba la zhabs bzhi pa//phyag na bcu drug
341b2(rgyud): dag gis rgyan//bdud bzhi mnyam por mnan pa nyid//'jigs po yang ni 'jig pa po//mgo bo'i phreng ba'i do shal mdzad//nyi mar bzhugs shing rol mor bcas//kha dog
341b3(rgyud): nag po 'jigs pa po//sna tshogs rdo rje spyi bor 'dzin//nyid kyi zhal nas hUM sto zhing //thal bas lus la byugs pa nyid//bdag med lhan cig mnyam sbyor zhing //dga' ba gnyis
341b4(rgyud): gnyis snyoms 'jug pas//dpa' rlabs med pa'i bde ba thob//rlom sems med pa'i rang bzhin can//rtsu ba'i zhal ni nag po che//g.yas pa la ni kun de mtshungs//g.yon pa
341b5(rgyud): dmar zhing cher 'jigs pa//spyi bo'i zhil ni gnyigs pa can//spyan ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi che//lhag ma'i zhal ni bung ba bzhin//grong khyer nyams dgar khyod dang //dga' bas
341b6(rgyud): shin tu rol pa las//dkar mo dbang gi phyogs phyung nas//sha gyi spa ru yang dag gnas//srub dang srub pa'i sbyor ba las//chom rkun ma yang phyung nas ni//phyung nas lho yi sgo
341b7(rgyud): ru ni//chom rkun ma ni sgo srung ma//bo lo kak+ka li sbyor bas//ro langs ma yang phyung nas ni//phyung nas nub kyi sgo ru ni//bdud 'joms ma ni rnam par gnas//dga' ba chen
342a1(rgyud): po'i snyoms 'jug las//b+hasma rI yang phyung nas ni//phyung nas byang gi sgo la ni//'jigs pa'i gzugs can ma nyid gnas//gnyis kyis
342a2(rgyud): bskyod pa'i sbyor ba las//puk+ki sI yang phyung nas ni//phyung nas dbang ldan mtsham su ni//drag po'i gzugs can ma nyid gnas//yang ni srub pa'i sbyor ba yis//
342a3(rgyud): 'tshod pa'i mtsham su ri khrod ma//srin po'i mtshamasu gdol pa mo//rlung gi mtshamasu g.yung mo nyid//de nas rdo rje chags chen las//rig mar bcas po khu bar 'gyur//
342a4(rgyud): sna tshogs klu yi mchod pa las//de nas lha mo rnams kyis bskul//rje betsu na snying rje'i yid bzhengs shig/puk+ka sI nI bdag la skyobs//stong pa'i rang bzhin nyid spongs
342a5(rgyud): li 'i bdag la bde chen sbyor bzhed mdzod//khyod med na ni bdag 'gum pas//kye'i rdo rje khyod bzhengs shig/stong pa'i rang bzhin nyid spongs la//ri khrod ma 'bras grub
342a6(rgyud): par mdzod//dga' gtso 'jig rten 'gron gnyer po//stong pa nyid la bzhugs sam ci//khyod med phyogs ni mi 'tshal bas//gdol pa mo bdag zhu ba bgyid//bdag gis
342a7(rgyud): khyod kyi thugs 'tshal gyis//mag 'phrul mnga' ba khyod bzhengs shig/g.yung mo bdag ni dran nyams pas//snying rje rgyun chad ma mdzad cig/glang po rta bong glang rnga mo//
342b1(rgyud): mI dang sha ra b+ha byA la//g.yas pa'i thod pa brgyad rnams la//gnyis 'thung la sogs rim shes bya//swa dang chu dang rlung dang ni//mo dang zla ba nyi ma nyid//mthar byung dang /
342b2(rgyud): ni nor sbyin nyid//g.yon pa'i thod pa brgyad na'o//sgeg cing dpa' bo mi sdug pa//dgod cing drag shul 'jigs rung ba/snying rje rnga ma dang zhi ba yis//gar dbu'i r-i dang
342b3(rgyud): ldan po nyid//aM dang hUM gis rdo rje che//khu ba'i gzugs las bzhengs nas ni//zhabs rnams sA la rdebs pa dang //lha dang lha min bsdig par mdzad//gAM tsaM baM g+haM paM
342b4(rgyud): shi lai DaM//'di yi sa bon phyung ba dang //bdag po'i skye bon drag gis ni//oM hUM sngon po 'bar 'jigs pas//ma mo'i 'khor lo grong nyams dgar//ba dog nag pa
342b5(rgyud): 'jigs chen po//bdag med bde ba/sbyin pa po//gtso bo 'di ltar sgom pa nyid//dkar mo g.yas na gri gug ste//de bzhin g.yon na ro hi tita//chom rkun ma g.yas cang te'u
342b6(rgyud): ste/g.yon pa'i phyag na phag pa nyid//ro langs ma g.yas ru sbal te//g.yon pa yis ni pad+ma'i snod//g+hasma rI yi g.yas na sbrul//g.yon pas rnal 'byor lhung bzed
342b7(rgyud): nyid puk+ka sI g.yas seng ge ste//g.yon pas dgra sta de bzhin no//ri khrod ma g.yas dge slong ste//g.yon pas gsil byed de bzhin no//gdol ba mo g.yos 'khor lo
343a1(rgyud): g.yon pas thod pa de bzhin no//gsung mo g.yas na rdo nyid//g.yonan /sa mdza de bzhin na//skyi la krung da pa'i glang myos gnas//
343a2(rgyud): phyur ma lha sogs phyag gnyis brjod//spyan gsum sgran rkyen du ste//phyag rgya lce yis rnam par rgyu ni//b+hi rI kha dog dge por 'gyur//tshem rgyun man btsad dang ma
343a3(rgyud): langs ma ni gsor bcos bzhin//b+h+yas+pho rI nI mIr gang mtshungs//puk+ka sI ni dbyung stoni mtshungs//ra khrod ma ni nor 'od//gIzlum mo namakhri'i sto bas sa me//de
343a4(rgyud): mo sna tshogs pa zhes brjod//chus pa dbang po nye dpung drug/gshin rje dang ni nor ba dag dang //bden dral dang ni thabs bzang ris//gau rI la sogs pa'i gdan
343a5(rgyud): bre li gzhib par mdzad nas ni//dam du 'khyud cing 'i mdzad pas//bcom ldan gus pas mched nas ni//bdag med ma yis sngags zhus so//bud med rnams kyi
343a6(rgyud): byed sbyags//de bzhin gdug padu sdigs pa dang //klu rnams bsdigs par byed pa nyid//lha dang lha min+da rnam nyes//de ni nga yis bshad bya bas//lha mo zing ba sbyin
343a7(rgyud): me nyon//sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' la//bdag gis gzhan du mdo sbyin no//'di yi sdings kyis gang byung dang //rdo rje sems dngos gang mdzad pa//
343b1(rgyud): noSh+Tha 'jigs paste//de mtshogs pasu khyud la bshad//'bar byer phreng ba 'khrug pA yis//dazhi pa 'khor rab tu bzhengs nas ni//rdo rje snying po dbang sbyin phyir//thog pa
343b2(rgyud): mchog ni bklag pa nyid//bzlas pa khA yo sa~M sal ba dang //sgra ring ba dang bzang ba sa//rdo rje skyong ldan pas//btsun mo thams cad de jug pa de //bzlas pa 'dum
343b3(rgyud): gyis rnal 'byor bdag/kye'i rdo rje'i rnal 'byor gyis//dogs pa meng po'i sems kyis ni//'di yi su las rnams thams cad byed//rigs byed rnams kyi dang po sbyin//zla
343b4(rgyud): phyed thig les rnam par rgyun//de nas/oM ASh+TA na nA ya byA ka ung+ga ke sha bat+sA ne/tsit+ta rdi sha ti ne d+hA ya/de'i rje su Sho naSha b+hu dzA ya/kr-iSh+Ti dzi mU ta wa pu She ko pA la mU l+ya
343b5(rgyud): nr-i kaM d+hA ra Ne/A d+h+yA two krA rA tsit+tA ya ir+d+han du daMSh+Ti NI/oM mA ra ya mAM ra ya/kI ra la kA ra ya/gar+N+Na yi gar+N+Na ya/tar+dz+dza ya/taSh+Ta ya/ni ShaM ya sho Sha ya/sap+ta sA ga
343b6(rgyud): rAnra/bad+yA b+h+yAnA gArl-i kaM d+d+ha br-id+d+hi shad+d+hi/hUM hrI hI/hu hUM/hai hi/hUMhau/haM haHphan swahA//de nas lha mo de dkyis nas//srub dang srab pa'i sbyor ba las//dam d+hu
343b7(rgyud): 'khyud dnga'i byed des//dkyil 'khor yid du 'ong ba zhus//de la ston pa ye shes tshe//rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyar nas/dgyes pa'i thugs kyis mnyam gzhag pas//nyid
344a1(rgyud): rtse dkyil 'khor bri bar mdzad//'bar ma gcig dang sgrosman pa//sna tshogs 'od kyis yang dag la blugs//rgyu babs bani dang yang dang ldan//
344a2(rgyud): srad bus mnyam par rgyan//re khA lnga dang yang dag ldan//de nas bum pa brgyad po bri//rin chen lha yi phye ma 'am//yang na 'bras la sogs pa yis//dur khrod kyi ni so bab
344a3(rgyud): gem//de bzhin dur khrod sol ba yis//de dbus pad+ma mdab ma ni//brgyad pa ze bar bcas pa bri//snying por skyes pa'i thod pa nyid//mdog dkar chu ni gsum pa bri//
344a4(rgyud): dbang ldan du ni sha raH//mye yi mtshams dge slong bri//bden bral du ni 'khor lo b+h+rUM//rlung du rigs kyi bdag po zla/shar sgod de bzhin gri gug nyid//lho ruH
344a5(rgyud): bya nyid/nub tu ru sbal bri ba nyid//lto 'phye byed du de bzhin no//lha mo kha dog dbye ba yis//phyag mtshan brgyad du rab tu grags//dbus su thod pa dkar po yang //sna tshogs
344a6(rgyud): rdo rjes mtshan pa bri//de nas rnam rgyal bum pa nyid//yul gA'i rna mo gos bzang can//lci ba rin chen lngas gling ba//sA lu skyes pas yongs bkang bzhag/ming du
344a7(rgyud): rje brjod pas ci//ji ltar de nyid bsdus pa yi//dkyil 'khor cho ga de bzhin bya//bcu gnyis brgyad gnyis lon pa yi//rig mo bde chen brgyad po nyid//do shal dang
344b1(rgyud): gdub kyis rgyan nas//dkyil 'khor du ni rab tu gzhug/ma dang sring mo nyid dang yang //bu mo sring mo'i bu mo dang //de bzhin zhang po'i chung ma dang //ma yi spun dang sgyug me dang //de
344b2(rgyud): bzhin pha yi sring mo nyid//rig ma brgyad du rab tu grags//dam du 'khyud dang 'o byed pas//'di rnams rnal 'byor pa yis mchod//de las ga pur btung ba nyid//des ni dkyil
344b3(rgyud): 'khor btang gtor bya//de rnams rnal 'byor pas btung bya//dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur//de la chang yang btung ba dang //sha dang sa lu skyes pa bza'//de yang gos
344b4(rgyud): dang bral byas nas//b+ha gar 'o ni yang yang byed//des kyong po la bzhib par bya//gar bya glu yang blang bar bya//bo la kak+ko la sbyar nas//de la rtsed mo rtsa bar bya//de nas thun
344b5(rgyud): tshod gnyis pa la//gos kyis mig ni bkob nas su//der ni slob ma gzhog pa nyid//phyi nas dkyil 'khor rab tu bstano//mtshan mo skye bo med khyim du//slob dpon
344b6(rgyud): la sogs rab phye nas//dbang ni ji ltar gsungs pa nyid//de la dbang ni sbyin par bya//ji ltar mchod dang bstod pa//slob ma bzang po sngar shes bya//de la de nyid bstan
344b7(rgyud): pa ni//dga'o bral dang po mchog mtha' can//thams cad rgyud ngu sras po ste//mtha' yi mtha' yis phye ba nyid//rdo rje mchod pa rab sbyar nas//de la lha mo des zhus pa//
345a1(rgyud): /wA ni skad TIg dz+haiM wAr labs//gan pa chen po bshad du gsal//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa//der ni sgron ma dbus mtha' mang//
345a2(rgyud): srid med mya ngan 'das pa med//'di ni mchog tu bde chen nyid//bdag med gzhan yang med pa nyid//longs spyod kyi ni rlabs gnyis la//rang gi g.yas dang lag gzhan
345a3(rgyud): mtho bong dang ni srin lag gis//de ni rnal 'byor pa yis bcir//de nas ye shes skye bar 'gyur//de las ci zhig skye zhe na//gzhon nu'i dga' ba ji lta 'am//lkug
345a4(rgyud): pa'i rmi lam ji lta ba'o//mchog gi mtha' dang dga' bral dbus//stong dang stong min he ru ka/kye'i rdo rje las kye'i rdo rje mngon par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//
345a5(rgyud): lha mo la ni dam 'khyud cing //rtsol thod par bcug nas ni//dam du nu ma gzung mdzad nas//skyes pa'i sgra ni gzhibs nas kyang //tshems kyis ma mchu bci ri nas ni//
345a6(rgyud): mtshan khung srin mos rma mdzad do//mnyam sbyor badra ba myang mdzad nas//phyag rgya lnga ni rab phye ba//bla ma slob dpon 'dod lha la//phyag 'tshal don du 'khor lo 'dzin//
345a7(rgyud): bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa la//smod tshig mnyan po yi phyir//rna ba dag tu rna cha 'dzin//sngags kyis bzlas pa'ang mgul rgyan nyid//gdub bu srog chags gsod pa spangs/
345b1(rgyud): phyag rgya ston pa ske rags nyung //sangs rgyas lnga yi phyag rgyus ni//rtag tu lus la phyag rgyas gdab//de nas rab tu bzhad mdzad nas//tshoms kyis ma nA chu btsir nus ni//kyo'o//
345b2(rgyud): rdo rje zhes bya ba//lhan cig skyes pa'i gzugs can nyi//de la lha ma des zhus po//glatso bo che ga brang gis dang //de bzhin bya ba gang gis ni//kye'i rdo rje'i bris sku yi//
345b3(rgyud): byed pa bde bo chen pos gsungaso//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//'dir ni 'dri mkhan dam tshig can//sgrub po'ang dam tshig can gyis ni//bris sku 'jigs pa tri
345b4(rgyud): br-i nyid//skyes pa'i thong gnas kha drog lnga//ro yi sgra yi pir nyid kyis//bris sku bla ma bri ba nyid//gang gang srud pa mkhal ba dang //gang gang ras yug ma thag pa yang ///
345b5(rgyud): de yang dam tshig can nges pas//dam tshig byin rlabs rnal 'byor las//zla ba zla ba'i mer ngo yi//bcu bzhi pa la khyim dben par//phyed na ma rungs sems kyis ni//chang gi btung
345b6(rgyud): ba cung zad las//lus la ni raM shu bsamos nas//de bzhin gcer bur gyur pas kyang //'phags pa dang ni ma dag pas//de nas dam tshig rab tu bza'//bzhin bzang snying/
345b7(rgyud): rje ldan pa dang //gzugs dang lang tshe skal bzang ma//me tog bcas shing sgrub por dga'//rang gi phyag rgya g.yon du bzhag/kye'i rdo rje las bris sku cho ga'i le'u ste drug pa'o//
346a1(rgyud): /de nasna sgranas //sprul k+kol rgyu nas//rloms na rma/rmos na na dzam+b+ha myuk+Shad+hU ma sam//
346a2(rgyud): /dgyes pas sgyu lIs re bye bri//glegs pamang gyis pa sh-ing d+hA yas//sgyum s+t+rai b+h+yaH rkyed//snang char/ ng+ges nas hU~M//me sai ng+ges phy-i
346a3(rgyud): dus ni//glegs bam sar ni bcu gnyis pa//bri gang dam tshig can gyis bri//glegs dam dang nI dros sgra nyid//gal N+ye skul med mthong na ni//sgru ba 'di na
346a4(rgyud): blub meng //'jig rten pha rol sgyid sul med//yang dge rab kyini ldan pa la//ris 'ag tsam zhig bstan ni nyid//glags bam lam gyi spyod yul du//s+yAd mAm+b+ha/
346a5(rgyud): nyid du smra//bar sprid pa hrI T+Ta ga nas//yang deng yang du'i mdzad dus//bde chen mnyam dAr myeng mdzad de//rdo rje can gyis bzla ba sbyin/tshogs
346a6(rgyud): 'khrir brtsi ba ni//nyon cig l+h+wa mo ma yangs m+b+ha//gang du zos pas 'di don kun//sgrub pa can gyis pangs grub 'gyud//dra du khrod de yi bya sgribs dang //de banan
346a7(rgyud): mi med grong khyer dang //yang na dben pa 'am rgya mtsho'i mtha'//bza' ba 'di ni rib tu 'aze'o//de la gdan du brtag pa ni//ri ye gzugs can dgu de ni//ya ni/
346b1(rgyud): stag gi lpags pa dang //dur khrod ras ni de bzhin no//dbus su kye'i rdo rje'i gzugs//ji ltar sngar bzhin gnas shes nas//phyogs dang phyogs bral dag tu yang //
346b2(rgyud): /dri nas rnal 'byor ma rnams dgad//dam tshig mA la tin+na naM//stug gi lpags pa'i steng du bza'//'bang nas rgyal po'i sa lu yi//bza' ba dar ni bza' bya nyid//der
346b3(rgyud): ni bza' ba zos nas yang //der na me mo mchod par bya//sring mo bu mo rgyug mo dang //gal te ma sring yin na yang //de rnams rtag tu legs mchod na//tshogs kyi dkyil
346b4(rgyud): 'khor 'grub par 'gyur//skyes pa'i thong chen cha gcig par//chang ni bzang pos yongs bkang ste//bla ma la dbul sbrul chen ma//phyag mtshan nas ni rang yang btung //
346b5(rgyud): pad+ma'i lage bas blang ba dang //de nyid kyi ni lag pas dbul//yang nas yang du rab 'dud pa//de ltar bsgrub pa po yis bya//kye'i rdo rje las bza' ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//
346b6(rgyud): de nas rnal 'byor mas zhus pa//phyag rgya chen po ji lta bu//kun rdzob rnam pa'i gzugs kyis ni//bde po sbyin pa bshad du gsol//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
346b7(rgyud): pa shin tu ring min thung ba min//gnag pa ma yin dkar ba ma ni//pad+ma'i mdab ma'i rnam pa 'dra//de yi dbugs na dro zhim ldan//rdul kyang dri zhim ldan 'gyur te//
347a1(rgyud): ri dwags lce ng+ge'i dri dang mtshud ste/pad+ma la yang dbang mchub b+h+yo//s+yAd cig pad+ma lta bur 'byung //de 'azungs gu/mkhas pas dri bzang mchod/
347a2(rgyud): ba byu /ut+pa la yi d+hi de 'byung zhing //u b+hU rten nag pa mirgyus//ngal zhing myi bral ba nyid dang //sbyin pa de smra zhing yid 'a mA//skye bzang dkyus su banye ma gsu
347a3(rgyud): bal ngas pad+ma nan du 'arjod//stan ts+tshig skyes pa'i ni kri zhes can rje//de snyid nas ni ngas grub byer//de rnaM khyong ma drug ni nas gsol po//brlom
347a4(rgyud): 'das ston lam ji ltar gdab par /bcom sbyin 'das kyis b+haka'i skyil bya//rigs spyi dang dam tshig cen//sgyu 'i rdo ston//zlu mA la bus
347a5(rgyud): skye zhing snre ng+ge 'byung bar sho/lcags rje tshul bu 'azhol// man pa ni zla pa da //bdun pa ba mnyamanas can/ zhing sgribang gyu ba
347a6(rgyud): denas sgyu mo dang rjes na//smyig da //sgyum mye sems ca bdus da///gang gis 'dul bar 'gyu nas/bcom
347a7(rgyud): 'as kyis bka' stsal pa//dang po gas klung sbyin pa shwe/ rgyas bslab pa'i gnas rjen //de la dru na sgru ba basbyin//mad sde pa yang na no//
347b1(rgyud): rnal 'byor spyod pa nyid//de yi rjesu dbu ma bstan//sngags kyi rim pa kun shes nas//de rjes kye'i rdo rje badz+ram//slob mas gus pas blangs nas ni//'grub 'gyur 'di la//
347b2(rgyud): thai tsamo med//kye'i rdo rje las 'dul ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o///de nas kha sbyar 'byed pa yi//mtshan nyid yang dag rab tu bshad/gang gis rnam par
347b3(rgyud): shes tsam gyis//sgrub pos dngos grub thob 'gyur ba//bsgrub bya'i lte ba'i rtsa ba la//bortul zhugs can gyis lag pas gdon//he ru ka mnyam rnal 'byor gyis//
347b4(rgyud): nang gi ma rungs sems kyis ni//'di ni bsgoms pa tsam gyis no//sangs rgyas kyang ni nges par 'jig/bstan la gnod pa byed pa dang //bla ma sangs rgyas 'jig
347b5(rgyud): bya ni//bla ma thub pa la zhus nas//snying rjes bsad par bya ba nyid//ji ltar phyugs kyi gzugs mthong nas//khrag ni skyug pa nyid dang yang //'dar zhing mgo skyes
347b6(rgyud): grol ba dang / kha ni 'og tu rnam par sgom//de yi lam du khab na me'i//gzugs can 'jug par bsam pa ste//snying khar byin za'i sa bon nyid//dmigs nas
347b7(rgyud): skad cig gsod par byed//rgyud 'di la ni srad blugs med//phyag rgya bcing dang bya ba'ang med//rgyud chen bklags pas 'grub po nyid//bsam gtan tsam gyis 'grub
348a1(rgyud): pAr 'gyur//rtog med dngos grub sbyin pa po//sbrid pa sbyong ba nyams dpa' byur//gsang ba mchog ni bshad byA yis//nyon cig lha ma
348a2(rgyud): bzhin bzang ma//rin chen gzi brjid 'bur ba yA//phreng ba 'khrugs pa lha mo ltos//ma phug pas ni sbyor bral 'gyur//phug pas dga' bo sbyin pa po//de ltar 'khor
348a3(rgyud): bar 'dod pa yi//yon tan lnga ldan rin chen nyid//ma dag pasA ni dug du 'gro//dgra pasra bdud rtsi lto bur 'gyur//'khor bri'i rnam pa he ru ka/'gro ba sgrol ba'i
348a4(rgyud): gtso bo nyid//gang gisku gzugs kyi 'gyur pa nyid//de ni nga yis smra yis nyon//snying rje'i spyan ni dmar po la//byams pa'i thugs las yan lag gnag/bsdu
348a5(rgyud): ba'i dngos po bzhi yis ni//zhabs ni rnam pa bzhi zhes brjod//zhal brgyad rnam par thar pa brgyadado//phyag ni stong pa bcu drug nyid//gug skyes kyis ni sangs rgyas lnga//
348a6(rgyud): gdug pa 'dul phyar khro bo nyid//shwa ni puk+ka sI ru brjod//de bzhin khrag ni ri khrod ma//gdol po mo ne khu badra brjod//g.yung mo rkang dang tshil bu dag/lpags
348a7(rgyud): pa byang chub yan log bdun//rus pa bden pa bzhi po nyid//bdag med mas gsol pa//sngags btu ba ni ji ltar 'gyur//gang gi sngags kyis skye bo yi//
348b1(rgyud): las kyi dngos 'brub 'gyur ba nyid//bad bu chen pos bshad du gsol//bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can chen po rdo rje snying po gzi brjid chen pos bka' stsal pa//sngags ni khyed//
348b2(rgyud): langs bshad kyis//lha mo shes rab chen mo nyon//dang po rnam par snang mdzad sbyin//ul+le rnams kyi bani pa las//puk+ka ses n+yan+ya stod pas mnan//mngag dkar mthar
348b3(rgyud): ni swAhA sbyar//'dis ni bzlas pa 'bum gyis ni//'gro ba rtag tu rengs par byed//dang poyi ge'i bdag po bzhag/de rjes mkha' spyod ma des nas//mthar ni swA hA sbyar
348b4(rgyud): byas ni//sangs rgyas rnams kyang dbang du byed//rig byed rnams kyis dang po sbyin//dang po yi ni gnyis pa la//sdong bcas mtha' ni swA hU~M sbyar//sangs rgyas kyang skad shes/
348b5(rgyud): rob can//dang po rnam par snang mdzad sbyin//gnyis po yi nI gsum pa la//rwa dang ldan zhing chums rgyan//stong bcaswa swA hA yang dag ldan//mi rnams thams cad
348b6(rgyud): snang bar byed//dang po yi ge'i debang phyug bzhag/lnga pa nyid kyi gsum pa la//stong pa mkha' 'gro ma drang ldan//mthar ni sku hUM mngon spyod che//yang ni yi ge'i thu bo sbyin//
348b7(rgyud): hUM ni khrag dang 'dra ba la//mthar ni ste hUM thig le mchog/dga' bzang ma sogs rtag tu 'gugs//gti mug rigs ni dang por sbyin//g+hu no yang dag rab tu sbyar//mthar
349a1(rgyud): kasnang byas na//lha dang myi rnams gsod par byed//dang por rnam par snang mdzad pa dag/dang po nyid kyi dang po la//rdo rje mA' 'gro ma dang sbyar //mthung /
349a2(rgyud): granas pa yi gnyis pa la//rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang ldan//yang ni dang po'i rtse mo la//rdo rje mkha'agro ma dang ldan//mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa la//yang ni dri
349a3(rgyud): nyid yang dag ldan//steng du chom rkun ma yis rgyun//de rje sa hrIHyis rnam par sbyar//mthar yang swAhA spyod pa nyid//ku ru kul+le yi sdug s+ho//oM ni dang po bzhi pa 'i
349a4(rgyud): gsum pa rlom rkun ma yis rgyun//mthar gunas pa yi bzhi pa le//pi ts+yai badz+ra skyong ba dang //An+d+ra rnams kyi bzhi pa la//puk+ka sI yis rnam par rgyan//stong
349a5(rgyud): pas mnan cing sum 'gyur nyid//lnga pa yi ni gnyis pa dang //gsum pa'i dang po mthar satwa//kyi'i rdo rje'i stong po'o//snang mdzad dang por dz+wa la gnyis//sbyar
349a6(rgyud): nas lnga pa'i bzhi pa la//mthar gnas rnams kyi dang po ldan//g+hasma rIsI ni rnam par rgyan//uSh+ma rnams kyi bzhi pa la/rdo rje mkha 'gro ma yis rgyun//stong pas
349a7(rgyud): mnan cing sum 'gyur nyid//lnga pa yi ni gnyis pa dang //gsum pa'i dang po mtharo swA hA//phyog bzhi pa'i sngags so//dang por rnam snang dang po yi//dang po nang
349b1(rgyud): gi dkar mos rgyan//gsum pa nyid kyi dang po la//nang gi dkar mos rnam par rgyan//nyis 'gyur lnga pa'i gsum pa dang //gnyis pa'i gsum pa mye yis rgyan//hU~M gi rnam
349b2(rgyud): par gsum sbyar nas//lnga pa nyid kyi gnyis pa dang //gsum pa'i dang po mthur swA hA//phyag drug pa'i stegaso//dang po rnam snang bzhi pa yi//dang po byin za yang dag ldan///
349b3(rgyud): ro langs ma yos rnam par rgyan//mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa la//g+hasma rI yis rnam par rgyan//dang po yi ni dang po la//mthar gnas pa yi dang po dr-ing //rdo rje ma yis
349b4(rgyud): /rnam par rgyan//k+Sha ni chom rkun ma yis rgyan//lnga pa nyid kyi dang po dang //uSh+ma rnams kyi bzhi pa la//rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma yis rgyan//stong pas mnan cing sum 'gyur te//
349b5(rgyud): phaT dang mthar ni swA hA nyid//phyag gnyis pa'i sngagaso//bdag med dang po'i dang po dang //gnyis pa nyid kyi dang po dang //gsum pa nyid kyi dang po dang //bzhi pa yi ni dang
349b6(rgyud): po dang //lnga pa yi ni dang po dang //mthar gnas rnams kyi dang po dang //uSh+mA rnams kyi dang po nyid//dang por rnam snang mthar swA hA//grong khyer dkrug pa'i sngags kyi
349b7(rgyud): bzlas pa ni'i bum mo//mthar gnas rnams kyi gnyis pa dang //k+Sha yi rkang po gnyis 'gyur nyid//hUM gi rnam pa gsum dang ldan//dang po rnamo snang phan nyid kyi//rnam
350a1(rgyud): /pa nang bdug mthA hA//sa rtags so//dang byA rnam+b+ha snang de rjes su//ma yi man+da r+yAt+tha//bzla' ba dang rgyud da byin
350a2(rgyud): brlab 'o//dang pod rnam par snang mdzad nyid//de rjes oM kA ro mu khaM/uSh+ma rnams kyi gsum pa dang //mthar gnas pa yi bzhi pa ni//steng du me yi sa rnam pa
350a3(rgyud): rgyun//d+harmA NAM de rjes rdo rje ma/byin la d+ya nut+pan+na tAte//oM A hUM phaT swA hA//'byung po thams cad kyi gtor ma'i sngagaso//kye'i rdo rje las sngags btu ba'i le'u
350a4(rgyud): sto dgu pa'o///den so chom rkun sdom cig pa'i//rdo rje sems dpa'o zhes byas gsungs/bdag med ma la mdzad nas//bzlas pa'i yul ni ra
350a5(rgyud): tu dbye//shes kyis rengs pa'i bzlas pa nyid//dbang la tsan dan dmar po nyid//lung btang gis ni mngon spyod nyid//ni ro shus ni sdang ba la//rta yi rus pas skyod/
350a6(rgyud): po nyid//bram ze'i rus pas dgugu po nyid//glang po'i rus pas char bral//ma he yis kyang bsad pa la//rengs pa 'o ma'i btung ba nyid//dbang la rang gis 'dun
350a7(rgyud): pas spyad //bsad pa la ni si h+la nyid//dgug pa la ni bani mnyam nyid//sngang las lu skyes pa brjod//bskrad pa nyid la gla rtsi brjod//yang rnamathar shwa dang /
350b1(rgyud): drang po sha dang //na dang po dang /ga dang po dang /ha dang po nyid kyang de bzhin no//kye'i rdo rje las bzlas pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu pa'o///rje'i rdo rje la dmya la bya
350b2(rgyud): cing //tshems kyis me mchu btsir nas ni//lus can rnams kyi rigs kyi gzugs//de la bdag med mas zhus pa//b+ha grer ling ga bzhug nas ni//'khor lo'i 'dren
350b3(rgyud): pas 'di skad gsungs//lus can rang gi rigs bshad kyis//shes rab pa rol phyin ma nyon//bud med dam ni skyes pa yis//grang gi srin lag rtsa ba la//rdo rje rtse dag
350b4(rgyud): par gyur pa//mi bskyod pa yi rigs mchog nyid//rnam snang mdzad kyi 'khor lor 'gyur//dpag med mgon gyi 'angam skyes nyid//rin chen 'byung gi rin chen nyid
350b5(rgyud): las kyi rigs kyi ral gri nyid//rnal 'byor pa gang nag po nyid//de yi lha ni mi bskyod pa//rnal 'byor pa blang dkar po che//de yi lce ni rnam snang mdzad//rnal 'byor
350b6(rgyud): pa grang sngo bsangs che//de yi lha ni don yod nyid//rnal 'byor pa gang ser po che//rin chen bdag po rigs kyi lha//rnal 'byor pa gang dkar dmer nyid//'od dpago med
350b7(rgyud): pa rigs kyi lha//rnal 'byor pa gang dkar dang ser//de ni sems dpa'i rigasu 'gyur//skye bo rnal 'byor mthar phyin pas//nga rgyal mi gcag tho mi brtsams//kun rdzob
351a1(rgyud): gzugasas gnas nas ni//de rnams de gshegs rig su 'gyur//bud med rnams kyi mtshan nyid 'di//ji ltar skyes pa de bzhin na//k+ShAn /
351a2(rgyud): tha snyad tshul las ni//de yi rkyen suM'ang de 'gyur ro//b+haM ga rA ling ga'i'o mdzad nas//de la rdo rje che mnyes nas//bdag med ma yis go mdzad pa//lha mau rab tu
351a3(rgyud): mchod pa nyon//tshalnga dang skye bo mye du gnas dang //brang ga gi khyim gyi nang du yang //gnor bung phyug rgya che byas nas//rnal 'byor rigs pas rtag tu mchod//'o dang
351a4(rgyud): 'khyud pa byas nas ni//de bzhin b+ha gar rag par nyid//skyes pa'i sna ni gzhib pa nyid//ma mchu'i sbra rdzi btung ba nyid//rtag tu myos pa'i mtshan ma las//
351a5(rgyud): po la ldan pos lag pas bya//khyogs dang brla zhes bya ba dang //de bzhin shin tu bskal pa yis//yang yang rdo rjes 'dod pa bya//snying dang 'og tu blta ba nyid//dngos
351a6(rgyud): grub rgya sde pa thob pa ste//sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par 'gyur//dri lag pur btung bar bya//de la ga pur rgyu ba'i phyir//shA ni bana' ba nyid du 'gyur//khyud
351a7(rgyud): pa'i don chad nyi //kyai rdo rje las skyon cig skyes pa'i spyor bdon gyi le 'u zhes bya tsug cig pa //de nas rdo rje can gyis dang //zin pa 'dzin
351b1(rgyud): ni bka' stsal pa//rdo rje rab gnas rdo rje nyid//tshe dang drilta bu chun po zung //de ring rdo rje skyob dpon gyur//slob ma bsdu ba nyid du rjes//ji ltar 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyis
351b2(rgyud): byang chub sras rnams dbang bskur ba//bdag gis gsang ba'i dbang gis ni//sems kyi rgyun gyis dbang bskur to//lha mo drag la sbyin gnas sbyin ma//sna tshogs gzugs
351b3(rgyud): can yid 'ong ma//khyer cig khyer cig sems dpa' che//khyer la mchod pa dag tu gyis//ye shes khyede ni ches phra zhing //rdo rje na mkho'i dkyil lta bu//rdul
351b4(rgyud): bra la thar pa zhi ba nyid//khyod ring yang nI de yi pha//rdo rje dang pad+ma byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags ni//oM pad+ma su khyA d+hA ra NA ga kha~M dA dA tsa tu rA nan+ta sa b+h+r-i ga bi shA d+d+ha
351b5(rgyud): hUM kAr+yaM ku ru ShA maM/oM badz+rI me hA dwe Sha tsa~M tu rA nan+da dA ya kaHkhwa gi mr-i khaM ka rA so nA tha hAM hUM hUM kar+yaM ku ru ShA mai/oM AHhUM//spyi bor ni a~M gyi rnam pa//snying
351b6(rgyud): hUM gi rnam pa//ze 'bru lA ni A'i rnam pa'o//rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu ma'i brtag pa zhes bya ba brtag pa sum cu rtsa gnyis las myong ba brtag pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid/
351b7(rgyud): kyi'i rdo rje mkha'agro ma dra ba'i sdom pa rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdzogs so////rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+hA ri'i zhal snga nas/bod kyi lots+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ma
352a1(rgyud): shes kyi bsgyur cing zhus te gtan+d+ra la phab pa///rgya guR+Sha skad du/Ar+yA DA ki nI badz+ra pany+dza ra ma hA tan+d+ha rA dza kalpa nA ma/bod skad
352a2(rgyud): du 'phags pa mkha' gro ma rdo rje gur+No zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i brtag pa//kye'i rdo rje la phyaga'atshul lo//nA mkha' brims bcas dang ba dang //go
352a3(rgyud): skabs med dang 'byed pa dang //sna tshogs rdo rje'i gzhi gnas khang //sems can khams dang yid 'ong dang //sems can snong dang 'jig rten dang //sa dang sA 'og
352a4(rgyud): bar snang dang //yid dang lus dang ngag dang ni//gcig dang gnyis dang mkha' bde dang //drug dang lnga dang drug gnyis dang //bzhi dang skye 'gro rnams dang ni//
352a5(rgyud): gcig gis nyi shur ma tshangs dang //khams gsum ma lus pa dang ni//pha dang bu dang ma mo dang //phyi rol dang ni nang dang 'am//btsun mo kun dang chos dang ni///
352a6(rgyud): thams cad las dang bdag med dang //'bras bu rgyu dang bya ba zhes//bsgrub bya sgrub thabs rdo rje dang //de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes dang //chos kyi dbyings dang ma
352a7(rgyud): byung dang //na mkha'i khams dang rang dbyings dang //bdag med pa dang bdag tsos dang //dngos po med dang dngos med mni//bde ba can dang gru gsum dang //a skyes
352b1(rgyud): dang ni skyon bral dang //rdul bral dang ni sdig btsom dang //dba' rlabs med pa'i rang bzhin dang //mthar ni zhi ba'i bde rig dang //gsang dang mchog dang dgyes pa la//
352b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun khyab sems dpa' ni//mkha 'gro ma yi rdo rje gur//'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das//lha yi bdag po gcig pu nyid//thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhug
352b3(rgyud): nyebum phrag lnga bdag kye'i rdo rje//las ni dkyil 'khor lnga gsungs pa//rdo rje can dang phan pa dang //de bzhin rdo rje gzi brjid nyid//pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang //rta
352b4(rgyud): bdun rgal po lnga po'o//rdo rje mkha'agro'i dkyil 'khor du//dkar mo rkun ma ro langs ma//g+hasma rI dang pAk+ka sI//ri khrod gadrol pa gri yung mo'o//rdo rje phan pa'i
352b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du//skam pa zhags pa nyi ma dang //do la zlu ma dang lcags kyu 'dzin//me tog ma sogs mtshams kyi char//rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du//nyi lag ma
352b6(rgyud): dang mar me dang //rin chen sgo ma grog lag ma//lA s+ye la sogs mtshams char ro//pad+ma chos 'byung lcags sgrog dang //'khyung ma gar gyi dkyil 'khor du//gling
352b7(rgyud): bu ma sogs mtshams kyi char//bdag nyid cha byad sbyor bas so//rta yi rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor du//rdo rje sgo lcags lde kyog ma//sgo ma dang ni gos 'dzin ma//de bzhin
353a1(rgyud): mtsham su sbyar la sogs//rdo rje mkha'agro de rnamasmra kun//rkang pa g.yon pa brkyang bas gnas//snying khar g.yon bcangs bsdigs
353a2(rgyud): mdzub ste//kha dog sna tshogs che 'bor ba'o//shin tu zhe sdang zhe sdang che//gau rI la sogs rab tu grags//shin tu gti mug rmongs chen las//skams pa
353a3(rgyud): ma sogs char gzung //shin tu gzi brjid cher gsal ba//nyi ma la sogs rab tu grags//shin tu 'dod tshigs chen po las//pad sogs chos kyi
353a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du'o//phra dog chen po sgrub chen las//sgo lcags ma sogs myur 'gro bdag/rgyal ba mgon po phan pa ni//gti mug thams cad zad par
353a5(rgyud): mdzad//rdo rje nyi ma rgyal po che//rnam par rtog pa'i rab rib 'phrog/rta mgri na 'dod pa chen po ni//'dod chags can gyi byang chub ster//rdo rje mgyogs
353a6(rgyud): 'gro phrag dog che//theg pa gzhan ni rnam par skangs//rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che//mi bskyod ye shes 'byung ba'i gnaso//skye 'gro mi zad 'gron gnyer
353a7(rgyud): phyir//sgrib pa lnga ni 'jom pa po//de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par dag pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//zhe sdang gti mug nga rgyal dang //'dod
353b1(rgyud): chags sor sna skye bo mas//bsdu phyir rang gi 'khor lo lnga//rdo rje gzugs ni dum 'dzin//shin tu gdugs pa drag po la//zhi ba nye bar mi sbyar to//'di mkhyen rdo rje can
353b2(rgyud): chen ni//rangags kye'i rdo rjer 'gyuraro//shin tu stong par dred rnams kyi//yod min brtul zhugs 'dzin rnams kyi//sangs rgyas gti mug spyod don du//rdo rje rdzogs
353b3(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur//shin tu nga rgyal gdugs rnams kyi//skye 'gro'i nga rgyal zad par mdzad//rdo dzA nyi mi bdag nyid rgyal//nga rgyal chen po'i mun pa 'joms//
353b4(rgyud): byang chub chags bral las skyes spangs//sems can gang zhig bde byed pa//chags pas byang chub rab grub phyir//pad+ma gAr gyi dbang phyug gyur//thams cad mkhyen pa'i lus
353b5(rgyud): gnas shing //gang zhig lam gzhan nas 'phro ba//de rnams byang chub rab sbyin phyir//rdo rje mgyogs 'gro rang gtso bo//dbang po gang dang gang lam nyid//de dang de yi ngo
353b6(rgyud): bor 'gro//mchog tu phan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis//sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid 'gyur//gang dang gang gis dngos po yis//skyes pa rnams kyis yid sbyor la//nges na
353b7(rgyud): de yi rang bzhin 'gyur//sna tshogs gzugs nor ji bzhin no//gang dang gang gise 'dul ba yi//sems can 'dul bar 'gyur ba ste//de dang de yi rnam pa yis//chos kyi
354a1(rgyud): bshad pa bya ba'o//sems kyi rdo rje las byung ba'i//sems cen sna tshogs rang bzhin can//sems ni rang bri rnam rtog gis//skye bo'i dri mas
354a2(rgyud): nag por byas//de bas kun tu rabo 'bad pas//sems kyi rdo rje rnam par sbyang //sems dge ba ni bde ba yin//nyon mongs dug ni thams cad 'phrog/gral te stong
354a3(rgyud): pa thabs yin na//de tshe sangs rgyas nyid mi 'gyur//'bras bu rgyu las gzhan min phyir//thabs ni stong pa nyid ma yin//lta ba rnams la log rnams kyi//bdag
354a4(rgyud): tu lta ba tshol rnams kyi//bdag zhen bsam po bzlog pa'i phyir//stong pa rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs//de phyir dkyil 'khor 'khor lo zhes//thabs na bde ba'i
354a5(rgyud): sdom pa ste//sangs rgyas nga rgyal rnal 'byor gyi sde//sangs rgyas nyid du myur bar 'gyur//ston pa sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan//gtso bo dpe byang brgyad cur ldan//
354a6(rgyud): de phyir thabs kyis bsgrub bya dang //de ni thabs kyi gzugs can no//thams cad kyi rnam pa mchog tu zhi bya sems can 'jug pa'i le'u ste drang po'o//
354a7(rgyud): de nas rdo rje khams gsum thob//rnal 'byor ma ni rdo rje gur//dam tshig mchod pa yid 'ong ba//'khor lo rab tu bka' stsal pa//glu ni rdo rje can la dbul//
354b1(rgyud): gur ni sbyangs rgyas rnams lnga 'bul//hi rA mchog la de bzhin dro//'jig rten rje lnga bza' dang btung //gos kyis mchod pa rta mchog lnga//'di rnams dam chog dam bya/
354b2(rgyud): ste//rdo rje mchod pa byas pa yin//rdo rje can kun mnyes byer byed//Ag ru gnagak+Shi rdo //phan pa lani tsan dan dkang //dmar po 'jig d+hAnaN+Da li 'dul/
354b3(rgyud): rje snang ba la//bdun gyi rgyal po thams cad te//hUM rdo rje las byung ba'i dri//'di rnams dri yi rab sbyor bas//dam pa'i sangs rgyas nyid thob bo//tsha ba khab rdo rje
354b4(rgyud): 'bul//mdar ba rdo rje rtag pa la//sbyar ba rdo rje nyi mo le//de bzhin lan tshe 'jig rten rjer//rta yi rgyal po thams cad dam//bsku pa rab tu brtag par bya//kye'i rdo rje
354b5(rgyud): rdor can gyis//me tog mdog gnag rkang 'thung byung //ma wi kA dang ma la ti//kun de rtag tu sangs rgyas 'bul//shing gi dbang mchog dri med mdog/snang
354b6(rgyud): byed la ni sbyor bar bya//dbang mchog dmar po chu skyes dang //b+hin d+hu dmar po pa tA lar//padra gar gyi dbang la 'bul//rta mchog rdo rje can lde kun//rdo rje can
354b7(rgyud): kye khru gtsum ste//sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor khru bo zhi pa//snang byed la ni khru lnga nyid//pad+ma gar dbang drug pa ste//ljags kyi rgyal po de bzhin bdun//ba
355a1(rgyud): ba rdo rje nyi ma yi//lam du lcags kyu mchog gi dang //gnyid la sangs rgyas mgron po yi//shin tu bde la gar dbang gi/glu gar de
355a2(rgyud): bzhin rol mo'i sgra//sa gzhi yongs gzung dus su ni//rdo rje'i gzugasu bzhag nas su//bdag gi rnal 'byor rab tu sgrub//rdo rje'i dbang po sngon po ste/
355a3(rgyud): zla ba chu shel thub chen gyi//mkhar phyin skyes pa'i me tog dmar//pad+ma dmar po spyan ras gzigs//rta yi yong ma ra kA tau ste//rin lnga'i dul gyi rdul tshon mchog/
355a4(rgyud): dride nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can chen po mkha 'gro mi'i rdo rje gur 'byung po 'dul ba'i ting du 'dzin la bzhugs so//dam tshig yang dag rab phye ba//kun tu bzang
355a5(rgyud): pol sa bon bdag/dbang po sngon po lta bu'i 'ong //phyag bzhi'i jigs byed chen po ste//mdzes pa'i khro bo yi ni lus//dbang ldan 'byung po mnan pa ste//g.yas
355a6(rgyud): pas rigs kyi bdag po nyid//lag pa g.yon pas ma lpags nyid//gnyis po dag gis phyag rgyar sbyor//zhubs g.yon brkyang bas yang ngag gnas//cung zad
355a7(rgyud): mche bas 'jigs par byed//mgo bo'i phreng ba'i rgyan mchog ste//mgo 'dzings phyed du bcings par ni//ri yi rtse mor bsgom par bya//'byung po 'dul bar
355b1(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur//gnod sbyin du mA 'byung po dang //gra nod sbyin mo dang kla mo dang //mi mo lha yi mdzes ma ni//sgrub pa po yis nges par 'grub//sngags ni/oM
355b2(rgyud): b+hU tai Da ma ra b+hU ti pa ti Ak+ko b+h+yo ki r-i D+hi na sarba b+hU ta pre ta pa shI tsi sI b+ha ya hUM phaT//de nas rdo rje chen po rdo rje can mkha'i 'gro ma'i rdo rje gur stobs po che'i ting nge 'dzin la/
355b3(rgyud): bzhugs so //char chen rab tu dbab bya ste//pad+ma mdab ma brgyad pa bsame//de ni klu bIrgyad dgod par bya//stobs po cher ni rI ba sbya rI bas//de rnams rnga ma yang
355b4(rgyud): ngag men na//char med stobs po tshulas ni//chu yi tshigs ni dbab par bya//kha dog gnag cing cher gsal ba//'jigs pa yang ni la dzAgs par mdzad//phyag
355b5(rgyud): brgyad zhal ni bzhi pa ste//skar nyi rdo rje gdan mdzad pa//phyag rnams kyis ni klu bdag bsnams//phuHzhes bya ba'i sngags bzlos shing //hUM dag nang du chung byas te//
355b6(rgyud): phaT ni mtha' ru sbyar bar bya//dang po'o zhal ni nag po ste//gnyis pa zla 'od bzang po nyid//gsum pa se po'i mdog lta bu//bzhi pa dmar po nyid du badz+rod//sprul
355b7(rgyud): gyi rgyan gyis yang dog brgyan//rdo rje sems dpas rnam par rgyan//klu rnams kyis ni char dbab phyir//stobs po che ni rab bsgrub bya//de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal
356a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang bzhin 'dzin pa rdo rje gur skya ba pos sangs rgyas kyi kho na dbye bar bya'o//rdo rje pad+ma'o byas dang /
356a2(rgyud): dgas rgyan pa zos pa dang //rdo rje chu 'thung nor ldan pa//sangs rgyas de nyid 'di rig pa//dag pa'i gnas ni gnas chen po//sangs rgyus kun gyis rab
356a3(rgyud): gang ba//rdo rje rin chen kun khyab pa//gang gyur de yis bshad par bya//phan pa'i grong khyer yid 'ong bar//mkha 'gro rdo rje lu gu rgyud//zhon pa chen po sangs
356a4(rgyud): rgyus kun//lcags sgrog rdo rjes bcing bar bya//dga' ldan du ni ldog par 'gyur//sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'dod pa thob//rgyal ba mgron pa byams pa ni//
356a5(rgyud): ye shes spyan gyis rnam par gzigs//rdo rje lu gu rgyud bcings byas//rgyal po'i tshogs rnams bcings par bya//gang zhig dngos grub mi ster na//sgrog gri
356a6(rgyud): bcings nas dgug par bya//rdo rje kyo ba dkar mo che//rdo rje zhags ma chom rkun mA//rdo rje lcags sgrog ro langs mu//rdo rje dril bu g+hasma ri//sangs rgyas rnams ni
356a7(rgyud): dbang du byed//bzlas dang sgom pa mngon dga' ba'i//dngos grub gale te mi ster na//de tshe mkha 'gro ma bzhi yis//sangs rgyas rnams ni drag shul sgrub//
356b1(rgyud): dode nas rdo rje 'dzin gyi rgyal po mkha 'gro na'i rdo rje gur gyi rgyud kyi nang du 'bum phrag lnga bris pa yang dag par bshad par bya'o//sangs rgyas kyi ni dkyil 'khor 'bum/
356b2(rgyud): rdo rje can gyi de bzhi ni 'bum//'bum gyis rdo rje nyi ma tho//'bum gyis rdo rje chos kyi'o//'bum phrag phyed kyis rdo rje ste//'byung po 'dul ba stong phrag lngas//lnga
356b3(rgyud): yes las ni rab rgyas pa//lnga yis sangs rgyas gar mkhan nyid//stong phrag sum cu dag gis ni//kau ru kul+lI brdegs pa'o//lhag ma stong phrag lnga yis ni//
356b4(rgyud): cho ga'i rim pa rgyud kun gyi'o//rdo rje mkha' gro kye'i rdo rje'i//'bum phrag lnga ni bris pa'o//de nas rdo rje 'dzin po blo dang ldan pa mkha'agro ma rdo rje gur sangs rgyas kyi gang
356b5(rgyud): gyi ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs so//gang dang glu la rab zhen pa'i//sems can rnams ni bsdu ba'i phyir//sangs rgyas gar mkhan rol pa mdzad//sangs rgyas gar
356b6(rgyud): mkhan rdo rje yis//'dod chags can gyis byang chub sgrub//de nas rdo rje can 'byung ste//me tog snyim pas rab sbyor bas//sems can kun la phan ldan pa'o//ngam
356b7(rgyud): tshig der ni bshad par bya//sems can ji snyed pa rnams sems can du bstabs bsdus pa sgo nga las skyes pa 'om//mngal las skyes pa 'am//drod gsher las
357a1(rgyud): skyes pa 'am/brdzus te skyes pa 'am/gzugs can rnams sam/gzugs med rnams sam/'du shes med pa can nyid rnams snum//
357a2(rgyud): 'du shes med pa rnams sam/sems can de rnams thams cad bdag gis kyang phyag rgya chen po'i go 'phang la dgod par bya'o//dam tshig che bshad de nas ni/
357a3(rgyud): zur mig mi g.yo mgron byung ste//mi bskyod ye shes brnyes ldan pa'i//ston pA la nr-i rnam par spod//tswi khyod dam tshig hUM zhes bya//thub pa chen po gzhu can
357a4(rgyud): yani//nga ming snying rje'i stobs dpal ldan//bdag stobs bcom pa min nAm ci//ci khyod dam tshig au zhes bya//khyod ni tshangs pa thub pa rnams//ngo ming
357a5(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad dpa le//khyod ni me btsem 'dod pa bral//ci khyod dam tshig aHzhes bya/mnga' bdag mkha' lding mkhyen namA ci//nga ming pad+ma gaR+Sha dbang
357a6(rgyud): dbul//khyod ni gar mkhan nyid byi zhud mkhan//ci khyod dam chog tI zhes bya//khyod ni gdugs te tsha ba 'phrog/nga ming rdo rje nyi ma dpal//gdugs kyi rnam
357a7(rgyud): khyod ji ltar min//ci khyod dam tshig kho zhes bya//khyod ni mkha' stong rang bzhin no//nga ming rdo rje mgyogs 'gro yin//khyed ni rta ste pha rol 'gro//ci khyod
357b1(rgyud): dmachog snying rje 'chang //oM ma chung 'tshong mdzes ma'o//mi g+ha yau bdag mun mA ma ki/zhang po'i grong khyer 'dzin nam ci//ci khyod dam chog zhi ba nyid//bung
357b2(rgyud): med g.yo sgyu 'dzin nam ci//bdag ni ma yin lha mo spyan//spyan yin na ni g.yo dang bcas//ci khyod dam tshog 'dod chags che//smad 'tshong mA la smrar ci yod//
357b3(rgyud): bdag ming lha mo dkar po'o//ji ltar dri ma dkaro ba yin//ci khyod dam tshig dbang byed che//btsun mo'i pho nya min nam ci//bdag ming zur mig sgrol ma'o//
357b4(rgyud): sgrol ma mig ni bcom pa yin//ma gi yon bdag ni nor ldan dpal//de ltar ngo tsha med pas logs//ngo tsha med pas sangs rgyas min//mthong dang mi mthun myur du smos//
357b5(rgyud): de nas rdo rje mig yon po spyod pos gsungs pa//rdo rje sems dpa' zhe sdang che//thub pa rnam par snang mdzad rmongs//'dod la zhen pa 'jig rten bdag/sar sna rje rje
357b6(rgyud): snang byed do//don yod skyon ni thams cad byed//'dren pa lnga ni skyon ldan no//sgong skyes mngal nas skyes pa 'am//drod ga sher skyes dang mtha' 'khob bzhin//
357b7(rgyud): gzugs can rnams sam gzugs med dom//brdzus nas skyes pa nyid dang ni//thams cad sangs rgyas bya'o zhes//khyod kyis dang po gsungs pa ni//khyod
358a1(rgyud): nyid sangs rgyas gyur nas ni//de rnams ji ltar rgyal mu mdzad//de nyid phyir na brdzun gsungs pa//mnga' bdag ji ltar 'di ma gsungs//
358a2(rgyud): sems ca nu bslus na khyod kyi gang //sangs rgyas nyid de ngo mtshar rmad//'chi bdag tsha'am mu gi 'am//phas kyis 'khor lo'i gnod pa dang //rab gnas
358a3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor sbyin sgrog dang //char med pa dang zhi ba dang //sngags dang skoms par ldan par ni//gang zhig bdag ni rtag rol pa//de yi mdun du bdag 'dug
358a4(rgyud): ste//ded ni brdzun du mi 'gyur ro//slob dpon lha dang lha mo bzhi//mi g.yo bdag nyid smod pa'o//dkyil 'khor khang pa'i gnas nyid du//sangs rgyas gar
358a5(rgyud): mkhan rol pa mdzod//khams gsum de bzhin rtse ba 'am//mu dag pa'i yang rgyan rnams kyis//sangs rgyas rnams kyi gar mkhan gang //bde ba dga' bar byed
358a6(rgyud): dang bcas//chos 'byung grong khyer nyams dga' bar//rdo rje dam tshig glu yis dang //rdo rje rkang pa'i goms pos gar//mthar ni rdza rnga la skye sogs//phyag rgya tshon
358a7(rgyud): po rab ster ba'i//de nyid 'dir ni tsher gsang ngo //rdo rje sems dpa'i bi ka' ji bzhin//rab tu 'bad bas bsrung bar bya//glu sna tshogs dang /rol mo'i sgra dang /gar
358b1(rgyud): dang /'dul bar 'jug pa dang /char dbab pa dang /mi g.yo ba'i bdag nyid che ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o////de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po mkha' gro ma rdo rje gur
358b2(rgyud): gyi ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs te//'byung po'i gtor ma gsungs pa//na mkha' khams kyi dbus gnas par//mdab ma ni brgyad bsgom par bya//dbang po shar gyi mngab
358b3(rgyud): mar bsam//mthar byed lhor ni dgod par bya//chu bdag nub kyi mdab ma la//byang du nor sbyin dgod par bya//mer ni byin za chen po nyid//bden bral mtshams skyod de bzhi no///
358b4(rgyud): rlung du gnas med bsam par bya//dbang ldan du ni 'byung po'i gtso//zla nyi tshangs pa la sogs dang //tshangs pa'i ris ni dam pa dang //tshangs pa'i 'dun 'du nyid dang //
358b5(rgyud): dga' ldan 'thab bral gnas pa dang //rgyal po chen por gyur pa dang //gzhan 'phrul dang bsgyur nyid dang ni//gang zhig 'phrul dga'i gnas rnams dang //gcod ma'i gnas
358b6(rgyud): su gang gnas dang //bde ba can du 'dug pa dang //'og ma ni du ni gnas pa dang //'od ze ro can gyi 'jig rten khams//sum cu rtsa gsum gnas pa dang //de kun steng
358b7(rgyud): du gnas par bya//chos 'byung nang du son pa ni//stobs kyi rgyu dang dung skyong dang //de bzhin mtha' yas nor rgyas bu//'jog pa dang ni rigs ldan nyid//bde chen
359a1(rgyud): pad+ma bzang po can//lha min dmyal ba sems can rnams//chos kyi 'byung gnas 'og tu'o//oM lus tshangs pa la sogs lha//hUM las
359a2(rgyud): ma chags pa la sogs//AHlas stobs kyi rgyu la sogos//lag gnyis gdong gcig ldan pa ste//steng gi lha rnams dkar po che//dbang po la sogs nag por
359a3(rgyud): mtshungs//stobs kyi rgyu sogs dmar po che//rang mtshungs rig ma lus sprad ldan//rdo rje dril bus lag pa bral//g.yas brkyang bas ni stan la gnas//tshangs
359a4(rgyud): sogs rtag pas phyag rgyas gradab//mchod sbyin brgya sogs rdo rje yis//stobs kyi rgyu sngogs gar bdag gis//thams cad rigs gsum las skyes pa'o//dkar
359a5(rgyud): mos dgug par byas nas ni//chom rkun mos ni zhogs bcings pas//ro langs mas ni sgrog bcings pas//g+hasma rIs ni dril bus dbab//de nas mchod de zhabs
359a6(rgyud): bsil dbul//sngags ni 'di yis bsang gtor bya//oM AHhUM/phyi nas 'thor 'thung dbul bar bya//sngags ni 'di yis gshwegasu gsol//oM badz+ra satwa sa
359a7(rgyud): ma ya/ma nu pA la ye/badz+ra satwa twe no pa tiSh+Tha dr-i D+ho maM b+ha wa/su to Sh+yo maM b+ha wa/su po Sh+yo me b+ha wa/e nu rak+to me b+ha wa/hr-i da yam+me d+hiSh+Ta/sarba sid+d+him+me pra yats+tsha/
359b1(rgyud): krAR+YA Sh+Tam+b+ho shray+YA/kA ru hU hA ha h+Na ha ho/b+hA ga wa sar+b+ba ta thA ga to bAdz+ra nA mem+b+hany+dzabad+h+waM b+hU wa ma hA sA ma ya satwA AHmuN+ya de nAs rdorje'adzin pa'i rgyal bama?
359b2(rgyud): dokyi rdo rje mong gi ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs te rdo rje ming phye ba'o//ming gi dbang gi dus su ni//slob ma bdag nyid dbang bskur bya//rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba//skye ba 'dring/
359b3(rgyud): ni sangs rgyas nyid//bzhad pa'i rdo rje dang /sgeg pa'i rdo rje dang /mdzes pa'i rdo rje dang /rol pa'i rdo rje dang /shin tu dga' ba'i rdo rje dang /shin tu dga' ba'i myu gu'i
359b4(rgyud): rdo rje dang /pad+ma rdo rje dang /pad+ma myu gu rdo rje dang /a lu la rdo rje dang /pad+ma lcags kyu rdo rje dang /ye shes rdo rje dang /yid bzhin nor bu rdo rje dang /yan lag med pa'i
359b5(rgyud): rdo rje dang /shes rab myu gu'i rdo rje dang /snying rje myu gu'i rdo rje dang /dam par dga' ba'i rdo rje dang /shin tu bde bar dga' ba'i rdo rje dang /spyan ras gzigs kyi rdo rje dang /
359b6(rgyud): 'bribs pa'i rdo rje dang /na mkha'i rdo rje dang /shes rab rdo rje dang /pha rol phyin pa'i rdo rje dang /'dod chabs rdo rje ni dag pa'i gnas phyag rgya chen po grub pa rnams kyi rdo
359b7(rgyud): rje'i ming 'di rnams yin no//bud med rnams kyi 'byung ste/rdo rje snyems pa dang /rdo rje mtshon cha ma dang /rdo rje e ma'o bde ma dang /rdo rje bdag med ma dang /rdo rje spyan
360a1(rgyud): ma dang /rdorjem ma dang / dang /wA m+b+ha dang /rdo rje ba du dang /'as shod dang /rdo rje maphyogs pa dang /
360a2(rgyud): rol sam dang/ phyugs rgyas da/ sa / skyes sa dang / te/ ste dang/
360a3(rgyud): 'byung ma dang /rdo rje chen myo hU~M/rdo rje 'drid tshogs pa dang /rdo rje stel ma dang /rjede shu mi dang / skye mo dang/dwe N+Ti nga/rdo rje lA ma dang /
360a4(rgyud): dbugs dbyung pa dang /rdo rje rnam pad+ma me ni mre khre 'grom rnams //de nas de bzhin gyi shegs pa rnams kyi mtshan du gyur /rdo rje rje rje sems dpe'i dung
360a5(rgyud): sno chen po dang ni rang byung dang // d+b+hak+Sha l+le skems pa'i khyo ba dang //de bzhin du yang ngo'i bo nyid//rdo chu bdu rtsi thabs sbyang dang //de n+ya ka dang snying rje'i rnams
360a6(rgyud): nyid do//rtag pa dang ni gti smrig rdo rje dang //rnam par snang mdzad dang ni thams cad skyeb//sgyu 'phrul dang ni de nas oM mdzad dang //sku yi rdo rje rab tu grags pa dang /
360a7(rgyud): sa sbyong dang ni gti mug chen po dang //gshin rje gshed dang tho bo'i dbang phyug dang //de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dang //sangs rgyas zhes bya rab tu grags pa//
360b1(rgyud): rdo rje nyi ma de nas rin chen bdag/rin chen rgyal po nyid de bzhin du yang //rdo rje gzi brjid dang ni rgyal po che//rdo rje bdud zil gnon dang snang byed do//rta mgrin dang ni
360b2(rgyud): 'jig rten bdag po dang //rdo rje chos dang skyon ras gzigs dang ni//pad+ma gAr dbang dang ni 'dod chags dang //'jig rten mgon po rab tu grogs pa'o//dam pa'i rta
360b3(rgyud): dadang rta yi rgyal po dang //bdun gyi rgyal po do nas lcags rgyal dang /dam tshig rdo rje dang ni rta mchog dang /de bzhin du yang las kyi rdo rje nyid//don yod dang ni don grub dang /
360b4(rgyud): rdo rje mgyogs 'gror rab tu grags pa'o//rdo rje sems dpa' de nas rdo rje can//rnam par rgyal ba phyag na rdo rje dang //dpe med ro mnyam shin tu dga' ba dang //dam pa dang
360b5(rgyud): po bde ba chen po'o//'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang //dam tshig sems dpa' nor bu ni/'di rnams rigs ni drug tu brjod//'dod pa'i thar rab sgrub pa'o//
360b6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan gyi le'u ste gsum pa'o////rdo rje snying po mngon byang chub//brtag pa'i rgyal po dang po nyid//sgyu ma'i brtag pa gnyis pa
360b7(rgyud): ste//rdo rje gar gyi gsum pa'o//bzhi pa sna tshogs brtag pa ste//rdo rje brtag pa lnga pa'o//brtog pa drug pa stobs po che//brtag pa bdun pa mi g.yo mgon//brgyad
361a1(rgyud): pa gzugs kyi b+hUrtag pa ste//mkha' g+h+r-i kA ru kul+le dgu//bcu pa 'dul ba'i brtag pA ste//rnam par snang mdzad bcu gcog la/
361a2(rgyud): dngos grub brtag pa bcu gnyis pa//sgrol mi'i brtag pa bcu gsum po//rdo rje phig mo bcu bzhi pa//bcwo lnga pa ni gzi brjid che//bdag med brtag pa bcu drug
361a3(rgyud): pa//gshin rje gshed kyi bcu bdun pa//hUM mdzad la ni bco brgyad pa//dbyings can gyi ni bcu dgu pa//sbyin sreg brtag pa nyi shu pa//rab gnas nyi shu rtsa gcig
361a4(rgyud): pA//dkyil 'khor chen po'i brtag pa ni//nyi shu rtswa ni gnyis na 'dod//gtor mi brtag pa nyi shu gsum//nyi shu bzhi pa sta gon gnas//mngon par rtogs pa
361a5(rgyud): nyi shu lnga//de bzhin phyag rgya nyi shu drug/byed pa nyi shu rtswa bdun pa//klu ni nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa//grar gyi dbang phyug brtag pa ni//sum cur gcig med sum cu pa//
361a6(rgyud): brtag pa sum cu par ni bshad//steng sum cu yi grangs kyi sa ni//mkha' bri mkha'i gro mo rnams kyi//'bum phrag lnga yi rgya mtsho che//kye'i rdo rje rdor 'chang gi/rgyud
361a7(rgyud): rnam mdzes bstan pa//ma tha kyi bdan kyi rdorje//dge pa sbyong ba yang su gzung //rdo rje ma' 'bras gsungs pa s+ho//'di rgyud kyings tho'o//
361b1(rgyud): /rnal 'byor rgyud//dang por rgyal ba rnams kyis bshad//phyi nas rnal 'byor mAr+b+bad na//de nyid bud med gzung phyir ro//bcom ldan 'das rdo ltar na smyos pa mas
361b2(rgyud): bsdus pa la des//bskal pa babang po la byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang so so skye bo rnams che thong bar 'gyur ni/ji ltar na d+he rnams 'dzin par 'gyur/ji ltar
361b3(rgyud): na de rnams thos par 'gyur/ji ltar na sems par 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na skye bo phyul pa tshe thung bair 'gyur/rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal po//re shig
361b4(rgyud): gang dag slob dpon rnamasu 'gyur ba de rnams rtsu ba'i ltung ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /gang dag spyod pa po de rnams mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la spyod par 'gyur ba dang /
361b5(rgyud): gang dag so so'i smra ba de rnams srog chags gsod par 'gyur ba dang /gang dag bud med kyi chags rnams gri cig tu 'dod pa la zhen par 'gyur ba ste/de'i phyir rgyud rnams
361b6(rgyud): thams cad rgyas pa rwa bstan pa ma yin no//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rdo rje gsung thos nas mnyes par gyur cing dgyes pa
361b7(rgyud): brnyes nas tshig 'di gsungs pa/snying rje chen po kye'i rdo rje//nga ni dur khrod chu 'gram dang //nags tshel skye ba med grang du//bsnyen bkur can la dngos grub ster/
362a1(rgyud): rgya/mtsho sgros rnam pa'i 'gram yod 'ong //sku gdung zab mo'i mchod rten dang //rkang 'thung rlon pa'i 'og tu ni//nga ni sangs rgyas drangos grub stor//
362a2(rgyud): tshong ngus tshong rdal nyid dang no//tshong ngus rnam pa'i khyim du ni//rdo rje nyi ma brtan pa de//bsnyen bkur can la dngos grub ster//glu gar rab tu 'ching ba dang
362a3(rgyud): chang 'tsheng ma yi khyim du ni//'di ltar pad+ma gar mkhan //bsnyen bkur can la dngos grub ster//rtag tu 'gro mgyi gsuM zhon 'gyur dang //res 'ga' lam du
362a4(rgyud): 'gro ba na//rta ni do na yod brtan pa //dngos grub rdo rje rnams ster ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can chen po mkha'agro ma rdo rje gur phyag rgya rnam par rgyal ba'i
362a5(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/phyag rgya dang phyag mtshan yang dag par bshad pa/sku gsung thugs kyi brtag pA las//phyag rgya rnam gsum shes par
362a6(rgyud): bya//sku la lag pa'i phyag rgya yin//sngags bzlas pa las ngag phyag rgya//sems la mtshan ma'i phyag rgya yin//de nyid bsam gtan dkyil 'khor la'o//
362a7(rgyud): lag pa g.yas na skam po ste//g.yon na sdig mdzub de bzhin no//mkha' 'gro skam pa ma 'jigs mo//gdug pa rnams kyi 'khur ba 'don//g.yas pa'i lag
362b1(rgyud): ga sus+ho//dug pa rnam chub pad+ma /du sa/ gas kyu//gad smag rgyus ma thum//na //ma //
362b2(rgyud): //'din rtag tu de'i rgyu da//na med//sbyi pa sa pa gas //kau pa ma
362b3(rgyud): da pa da// //hU~Mlan sa pa ma baTIg+sas m-i b+hU m+b+ha//lag pa gis pa'i ste//m+b+ha mun ma pad+ma d+ha mi//zhe na
362b4(rgyud): ma med ni da//de ni me rjod //lag g.yas mar ma sde snod de//daduzhin g.yon par basmrig mdzub gi// du rdo rje ma myer pa shad//
362b5(rgyud): pa gi pa'i rab de 'i rnams//leg pa gas na rkyen pa//sems nan rnams laM sbyin pa snyed//gamadun pa myigs ma ba dzin /rin chen sgrol ma 'dir brjod/
362b6(rgyud): na lagru pa gams byed ste/rnam par rtag pa'i ni 'dzin 'joms//de 'di klag lag ma shes /de bzhin yon pas bsdigs mad+hUb maM//lag pa g.yas
362b7(rgyud): bai pad+ma ste//pad+ma'i 'dod tshigs brjod par bya//g.yon nges bsdigs mdzub ma nyid de//'di na mtho 'gro'i pad+mang brjod//g.yas par b+ha ga'i pad+ma ste//bde bachen
363a1(rgyud): rnam dar 'phel//g.yon na bsdigs mdzub 'dzin ma ste//'dzin chos 'byung mar ni brjod//g.yas pa'i lag nA ljags sgrog ste//
363a2(rgyud): byang chub zhen byas kun 'ching po//g.yon na bsdigs mdzub 'dzin mu ste//'di ni rdo rje sgyogs mar brjod//sangs rgyas rjes chags 'ching ba yis//bdag nyid
363a3(rgyud): 'khyud par 'dod pa ste//byang chub chags pas reb sgrub ma//de 'di rdo rje 'khyud mar bshad//g.yas pa'i lag na sgo lcags te//ye shes kun gyi srung ba mo///
363a4(rgyud): g.yon na bsdig mdzub 'dzin pa mi//'di de rdo rje sgro lci gas brjod//g.yas pa'i lag tu m+b+hi kyoH ste//ye shes blangs nas gcod pa mo//grayon nu bsdogs ma
363a5(rgyud): 'dzin pa myo//'di de rdo rje sde kyog brjod//g.yas pa'i lag tu sgo mo ni//ye shes skyes pa mo spangs pa//g.yon na bsdigs mdzub 'dzin pa mI//'di ni rdo rje
363a6(rgyud): sgro meng brjod//lag pa g.yas par yol ba ni//rang mtshungam btsun mo drung ba nyid//g.yon na bsdigs mdzub 'dzin pa mi//rdo rje yol ba mar ni brjod//de
363a7(rgyud): 'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//mkha' phro ma ni dam pa'i tshogs//mkha' bro lnga ni rab sgrub phyir//mkha 'gro ma yi rgyud gsungs//de nas byang chub sems dpa'
363b1(rgyud): dunanas rnams cad ma khan rlu rdu rdza gsung thos nas ngam tshad smos par tu/bcom ldan 'dus phyub tu zlan can na spyod dus rlog bya rlog+sa pa r+tha/
363b2(rgyud): m+mA/de com ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'di skad sa /'a stsal pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i rnams/'od na
363b3(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje nges par brjod pa zhes bya ba'i lung bstan pa yod de 'di ni de'i yin te/DoM br-i ha ya sa ge mno'i skad kyi dbyings 'dir rnam par rtogs pa ste/thams
363b4(rgyud): cad kun tu namakhar spyod par grub pas 'dri ni mkha' gro mar rab tu grags so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' de rnams thams cad tshig 'di thos nas dpa' ba dang mgu ba
363b5(rgyud): he te skyes par 'gyur ba dang tshig 'dir gsol pa/e ma mkha' gro ma yi rgyud//rgyud+mo kun las ni phyi ma dang //rtogs sgra rtogs par dka' ba dang //rig dang mi rig+sa
363b6(rgyud): pA nyid de'o//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi bskyod pa la sogs pa rdo rje de bzhin gi shugs pa thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskul
363b7(rgyud): phyir/'di skad gsungs so//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'di la rdo rje gur rgyud kyi rgyal po 'dir ji ltar rnal 'byor ma rnams dang /mkha'
364a1(rgyud): ma rnams kyi bsdu ba yin/byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gsol pa/sgo nga las skyes pa la sogs pa
364a2(rgyud): yas pa ngas srid pa las bsgral bar bya'o zhes smon lam sngon du 'gro ba'i byang chub gong du rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs na/ci'i phyir na srog tshogs rnams bsad pa dang /
364a3(rgyud): gcig tu 'dod pa'i btsun mo rnam spangs lags/lta ba rnams las log rnams dang //btsun mo rnams ni bsdu ba'i phyir//mkha' gro ma yi rgyud bshad do//bde ba'i
364a4(rgyud): thabs ni 'dir bsdus pa//gzhung nyung don ni rgyas pa ste//blo dman rab tu snang byed pa//rgyud kun gyi ni snying po rA ngas//sngags rnams kyi ni khyad par du'o//rdo rje
364a5(rgyud): nges par brjod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//'di ni bshad pa tsam gyis ni//bdag med rnal 'byor myi nyid kyis//sngon du gar gyis mchod byas te//
364a6(rgyud): gi 'khor lo 'di gsungs pa//sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' dang //gal te rdo rje chos dang ni//rta mchog rdo rje nyi ma yang //bdag gi spangs na mi'i 'grub ste/
364a7(rgyud): nga nyid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//yum gyi gzugs kyis bskyed par byed//de rnams kyi ni mdzes ma nga //de la nga ni dngos grub ste//mig sman dang ni rkang byug
364b1(rgyud): dang //ral zas 'og sgrub pa dang //rol bu mkha' la spyod pa dang //mi snang ba dang bcud kyis lan//rnyog 'dzin 'khar la bsgyur ny-id dang //bu mo dam pa dadug//
364b2(rgyud): ba ni//bdag mnyes pas ni bsgrubs pa pos//dngos grub rdo rje rnams thob bo//spros pa rnam pa mang por ni//smras pa 'dir ni ci zhig bya//bdag spangs jis
364b3(rgyud): par mi 'grub cing //byang chub med cing skem pa med//gang zhig rtag tu bdag dran zhing //rtag tu klog cing snyems dpa' dang //sngags kyi phreng ba bzlas pa dang /
364b4(rgyud): nga yi sku ni skom byed pa//gal te sgyu ma'i tshul gyis sam//gal te rmi lom 'dra ba de lta/shin tu bsgoms pa'i rim pa las//mngon sum du ni mthong bar 'gyur/
364b5(rgyud): gzugs brnyan rab tu srung ba las//dwe y-i dngos grub sbyin par bya//rdo rje pad+ma rab sbyor bas//shin tu bde chen sbyor ba las//gang zhig bdag la 'dod skyed bo//
364b6(rgyud): lus can de la smos ci dgas//gang zhig nyi ma gcig sgom po//rdo rje'i mchod pa'i sbyor ba las//shes rab pha rol phyin dngos grub//ster de 'di la the tsom med/
364b7(rgyud): bdag nyid he ru ker byas shing //rang gi btsun mo rang bsgoms nas//gang zhig rnal 'byor cher 'dod pa//de rnams lo ni nga mnyis 'gyur//'dod pa'i yon tan
365a1(rgyud): lnga ldan zhing //spro bu dga' bar ldan pa dang //glu gur rol sgra'i rnam pa dang //'dod kun bde ba spro ba dang //sna tshogs sgeg par ldan pa
365a2(rgyud): dang //sna tshogs ro yi btu de ba dang //sna tshogs gos ni ri mo can//sna tshogs 'di yo byug pa yis//gang zhig bdag dang rtag nyal bi//de yi dngos grub ster
365a3(rgyud): ba nga //phyag rgya chen po'i gnas 'dug pa//de yi 'dod pa mar gyur to//o a A i AM u A r-i r-I l-i l-I I ai au au au swAhA//gang zhig 'dis nga bskul
365a4(rgyud): par byed pa'i rgyal ba'i sras de rnams kyi lag tu bud med kyi sgyu ma'i bde ba yang dag par gnas kyi 'dug gi/rdo rje ma ni shar du sbyin par bya'o//lho phyogs su dkar mo'i
365a5(rgyud): gzugs can ma'o//nub phyogasu ni chu yi mkha 'gro ma'o//bying du ni rdo rje mkha 'gro ma'o//dbus su bzhag ste snying po dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor du gang zhig bsam
365a6(rgyud): byed pa de'i bdag mdzes mo ste/phyag gnyis ma zhal gcig ma'o//gri gug dang skyes pa'i thod pas brel ba/stag gi lpags pa bgos pa/spyan gsum pa/skra
365a7(rgyud): gyen du brdzes pa/phyag rgya lngas rlom par rgyan pa/shar gyi sgor ni dkar me tshon mo'o//lhor ni chom rkun ma'o//nub phyogs kyi sgor ni chu ma'o//de bzhin
365b1(rgyud): byung du n+dom+b+haskyu rAro//dbang ldan dunI puk+ka spyi'o//'tshod pa'i mtshams ni rI khrod mA'o//spyan mo'i phyog sa ni/dol pa mo'o//rtag tu 'gro brnya ni g.yung mo'o//'du
365b2(rgyud): rnams ni mtshams dang bral du sbyin no//gang zhig bdag rab tu sbom por byed pa de'i lag mthil du phyin pa'i dpal sus kyang dbrog par mi nus so//thams cad kyang kha
365b3(rgyud): dog nag por mtshungs pa rab tu son pa'i steng du gAr dang bcas pa khro mo chen mo dpal mo//g.yon pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin pa'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can mkha'
365b4(rgyud): 'gro ma'i rdo rje gur mchog tu dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs te/rig ma'i dbang yang dag par bshad pa/rang gi rig ma skyes bu'i chus//bum pa brgyad po
365b5(rgyud): thams cad kyis//rdo rje thugs ni rAb bsgoms pas//rdo rje can byasam dbang bskur bya//rdo rje nyi ma rab bsgoms pa//der ni dbu rgyan sbyin par bya//thams cad
365b6(rgyud): sngon sbyin de bsams nas//rdo rje'i tshigs bcad sbyor ba las//rdo rje chen po rtse dgu po//snying khar rang gi lag pa bya//slob mo'i 'jig rten dbang phyug byas//
365b7(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' dbang bskur bya//sangs rgyas rdo rje'i dbang gis ni//de ring khyod ni dbang bskur 'gyur//'di de sangs rgyas thams cad nyid//bzang sgrub byar
366a1(rgyud): ni rdo rje bzung //slob ma lcags mchog ldu man//sgrol mas 'khyud par thosam par bya//lagadus rdo rje dril 'khol zhing //dud
366a2(rgyud): byudag pos dbang bskur bya//oM badz+rA d+hi pa ti trAM/u b+hi Shin+d+ra mai tiSh+Tha/badz+ra sa mA ya s+t+wa~M/slob ma rnam snang byas nas ni//ming gis kyang ni dbang bskur bya/
366a3(rgyud): oM badz+ra sar+b+ba b+hiN+Dim+b+ha badz+rA nA mA b+hi Shi kr-i ta/kyai che ge mo rdo rje/gang gang kun gyis ni gtsor byung//de de bdag nyid he ru ka/sangs rgyas ye shes 'byung
366a4(rgyud): byabyi'i phyir//chos kyi rang bzhin dag pa'o//'di lta sangs rgyas thams cad nyid//rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag n+te ban+des//rdo rje snying po brtul zhugs brtan//
366a5(rgyud): khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu zung //oM badz+ra ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi badz+ra sau ma ya tiSh+Tha se ma ye tAM i Sho haM tA d+hA rA yA mau NI/hi hi hi hi ny+tsi/kun kyang cho ga gcig pa yis//
366a6(rgyud): rtog tu bla med mchod pas ni//slob ma rdo rje brtul zhugs sbyin//phyis ni rdo rje lag nas lag/sems dpa' thog ma tha ma med//rdo rje sems dpa' dga'
366a7(rgyud): chen po//kun tu bzang po kun gyi bdag/rdo rje snying po'i bdag po'i bod//yang ni der ni dril bu sbyin//shes rab pha rol phyin skyes pa'i//rdo rje dril bu zhes bya
366b1(rgyud): bar sems can kun gyi do rdzi rI/'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror brjod//rgyal bas byang chub mchog brjod pa//khyod kyis
366b2(rgyud): kyang ni rtag tu zung //dbugs byin thams cad byon nas ni//shAkya thub par rang gyur pas//slob mi chen po lung bstan te//sangs rgyas nyid du the tsom med//
366b3(rgyud): khyod kyis 'tsho 'jigs mya ngan med//de bzhin nad dang tsha ba med//bad chen theg pa chen po ni//'di las nga yis lung bstan bu//au e Sho hai byA ka ro mi tAM badz+ra
366b4(rgyud): saur+b+ba ta thA ga tu/srid pa'i ngan 'gro las+dza bsgral te//shin tu srid pa'i dngos grub phyir//kye 'grub 'gyur de bzhin gshegs pa yi//ming nI rdo rje zhes byar
366b5(rgyud): 'gyur//de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis rlig ma chen mo'i dbang gi dam tshig bkri'i sprul to//de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chen po ting nge 'dzin rdo rje sten po
366b6(rgyud): pos/dam tshigA rdo rje zhes bya ba bton te/tshig 'di skad bka' stsal pa//bla ma rdo rje rnams mchod cing //bdun po rnam par dag par bya//byang chub sems ni bi skyed
366b7(rgyud): nas su//chos kyi 'byung gnos rnam par sgom//de la sangs rgyas gnas bsams nas//rnam pa lnga ni bsgom par bya//dang po skyes bu bsam de nas//mkha' gro ma
367a1(rgyud): yi 'khor lo spro//dra za mnyam par zhugs pa ni//khu bar rjes su dran par bya//'tshams kyi lha mos bskul bar bya//'khor lo'i 'dren pa
367a2(rgyud): bskul naswa ni//mig la sogs pa gti mug sogs//rdo rje gsum ni gnas gsum dgod//phyi nas rjes chags rdo rje ste/ye shes rnam par gzhug pa dang //
367a3(rgyud): dbang ni rig ma brgyud rnams kyi//yang ni bdud rtsi myang ba dang //lha mo brgyad kyi mchod pa nyid//'khor lo'i 'dren pa bstod pa'o//rang byin rlabs pas byin
367a4(rgyud): /rlabs te//de la yan lag drug bsgom bya//phyi nas yang ni dam tshig gi/cho ga'i go rims rim pa yas//mtshan ma yang dag mtshon par bya//dang po sprin gyi
367a5(rgyud): rnam pa ste//gnyis pa du ba 'dra ba yin//gsum pa me khyer rnam pa yin//bzhi pa mar me nye 'bar ba//lnga pa rtag tu snang ba te//sprin me na mkha' 'dri ba nyid//
367a6(rgyud): de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyu//dngos grub nye bar 'gyur pa yin//phyi nas sgyu ma'i rnam pa ltar//rmi lam rnam par skad cig 'gyur//khams gsum rgyu dang mi
367a7(rgyud): rgyu yi//ma lus lus pa med pa 'grub//'jig rten khams ni thams cad du//ji srid rdo rje'i lus can rnams//ye shes phung po'i blo ldan pa//dI yi rjesu
367b1(rgyud): thams cad 'brang //ji srid skye gnas las byung ba//khams gsum lam ni nyams dga' bar//phyag rgya chen po rab sbyar bas//de rnams thams cad bza' bar bya//byang chub
367b2(rgyud): sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs//tshig gi rdo rje rnam thos nas//dga' zhing rangs par gyur nas ni//spro ba'i rdo rje mdzod par ldan//reg ma chen mo bdag med dang //rdo rje
367b3(rgyud): rnam snang mnga' bdag dang //rdo rje sems dpa'i rgyal chen dang //rta mchog thub pa chen po dang //rdo rje nyi ma gzi brjid che//rta mgrin mnga' bdag chen po ni//sku gsung
367b4(rgyud): thugs ni nyid dang yang //lus kyi gong bu 'gul bar 'gyur//lan cig rgyal po ston pa yis//'brel du mngon sum byed pa po//de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po sku gsu
367b5(rgyud): mchog gi rdo rje 'dzin pa po mnyam pa nyid kyi rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs te/tshig 'di skad gsungaso//ma ma'i dkyil 'khor la zhugs pa//zhal brgyad pa la stobs sde po che//
367b6(rgyud): phyag ni bcu drug rnams dang ldan//dbang po sngon po mtshungs pa'i 'od//gzi brjid chen po zhabs bzhi dang //sgeg cing khro bo'i gzugs can te//skyil krungs phye ba'i gar gyis
367b7(rgyud): gnas//rus pa'i rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan//dang po'i zhal ni nag po ste//dkar po dmar pos rngam par rgyan//lhag pa'i zhal ni bung ba bzhino//bdud bzhi mnyam par
368a1(rgyud): mnan pa ste//spyi bor rdo rje 'dzin pa mchog/de na rdo rje mdo/nug po//'od zer chen po'ang bsgom par bya//dbang bsgyur ba yi gnas
368a2(rgyud): du//sangs rgyas lngas ni rnam par d+hanI//glang po rta bong glang rnga mo//mi dang se ra b+he b+hi la//g.yas pa'i thod pa brgyad du ni//gnyis 'thung lnga stsogs rim shes bya
368a3(rgyud): sa dang chu dang rlung dang no//rnyid dang zla ba nyi ma nyid//mthar byed dang ni nor sbyin nyid//g.yon pa'i thod pa brgyad na'o//skyes bu chen po byazhengs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting
368a4(rgyud): de 'dzin te//gti mug rdo rje mig la dgong //zhe sdang rdo rje rna ba la//ser sna 'dod chags de bzhin du//reg dang bdag med bsgom par bya//phyag gnyis zhal
368a5(rgyud): ni gcig pa yin//sna tshogs gzugs ma btsun mo nyid//lag pa'i gri gu gi thod pas brel//srog spang steng du yang dag gnas//sa spyod mkha' spyod ma nyid dang //
368a6(rgyud): de bzhin chung 'og gan skye ba mo//'di nyid kyi rje ni cho ga yis//gnas gsum du ni gnas par sgom//oM mdzad rgyal po chen po ni//smyo yis rdo rje rnam par rkyen
368a7(rgyud): thugs kyi rdo rje rgyal po che//rdo rje sems de pa'i gnas na bzhugs//i n-i ma chog gi de nyid do//ngag gi lam ni bsal byed brjod//spyi gsung thugs kyi rdo /
368b1(rgyud): /chos can las ni rigs gsum 'byung //nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par//dkar mo gzugs can bsgom par bya//lcags kyu'i bsdigs mdzub 'dzin pa'o//
368b2(rgyud): kha dog dkar mo 'od chen mo//dkar mo rdo rje can zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te//dmar po dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa'o//chom rkun ma yi gzugs ca ni sgom//bcom
368b3(rgyud): gser gyi mdog 'dra ba//rdo rje zhugs pa mtshon chen po//rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par//ro langs me ni khrag dang mtshungs//rdo rje lcags sgrog nga rgyal byed//byang
368b4(rgyud): byed myed //hrIn+tu la la khyod dbus gi nas pa//de sa rnaM sbyin // pa //mad 'o/
368b5(rgyud): skyong ma rdo rje btson me zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//mtsham su lha mo bzhi rnams ni//cho ga'i sbyor bas bsgom par bya//byang sems bum bai ri rab dang //me yi tha
368b6(rgyud): khung rgyal mtshan che//phyi bcus gnyis med+ma rnal 'byor pas//mgon po de ltar bsgom par bya//'dod chags chen po rjes chags pas//dba' rlabs med pa'i
368b7(rgyud): bde ba 'thob//'byung ba bzhi'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po theg pa gsum gyi dam pa ston pa po//thams cad kyi rnam pa'i ting nge
369a1(rgyud): 'dzin la bzhugs te/dbyangs 'di gsungs pa/hUM las byung ba'i khro ba ni//rtag tu zhe sdang ldan pa'o//nang du mya rungs sems/
369a2(rgyud): kyis ni//rab tu 'bad pas bsgrub par bya//na maHsa maun+ta bud+d+he b+h+yo//na mo badz+ra mudaM gA ra haM stA ya tsaN+Da maN+Da lAk+She pa ki rA ya hUM pheT/de nas 'dir khro bo chen po
369a3(rgyud): pra shud pa tsam gyis sangs rgyas thams cad dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jigs shing 'dir bar gyur nas me' bdag rdo rje 'dzin pa dran par byed do//
369a4(rgyud): skyes pa'i pad+ma gas chags mod//bsrubs bcig pa dang bsrubs gnyis pa//rig ma bzhi yi rab sbyor bus//sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu dgang //rkang rjes rngub
369a5(rgyud): gyis sbyor ba yis//rkang pas mnan cing bsdigs par bya//sku gsum bskyed pa'i sgom pa yis//bu mo chen mo dgug par bya//grwa shrIn rjeg shed rdo rje zhes bya ba'i/
369a6(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin to//na maHsaM man+ta bud+d+he b+h+yo//me hA raN+Da d+ho ra bi r+b+he b+hai rA suM ra mdzo na b+hU tin+dar+m+ma thA hUM phaT/de nus khro bo chen po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i stobs po che bo sh+yang
369a7(rgyud): pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /de bzhin du gzhan rnams kyi pa rA re 'i rgyu cing dri dran par byed de//'byung po yi dgras shi za nyid//mkha'
369b1(rgyud): grul bum zin pa la//hU~M gis rlabs byas phyag rgyas gdab//rdo rje btsir bas bde ba nyid//gzhan gyis mi thub pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//nA myaHsa man+ta bud+d+hAn+tu/
369b2(rgyud): I hu lu hu lu/ma hA pad+me a mr-i ti ku ru mahA piSh+TAnA AHbtsan dug chen po dgug par bya'o//brgyal ba bslang ba de bzhin no//pad+ma'i dregs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba
369b3(rgyud): ting+ga nge 'dzin to//na maHsa man+ta bud+d+he b+h+yo//na mo badz+ra kro d+hA ya ma hA dr-iSh+Tota Ta bai ra wA ya/badz+ra swan+do ha dar+thA ya/oM a mri ta kuN+Da le hUM phaT/de nas khro bo bgrags
369b4(rgyud): 'joms rdo rje bshad pas sangs rgyas thams cad dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams yid mi dga' bar gyur to//rlung gis bteg pa po dang /rkang rjes kyi rdul
369b5(rgyud): blangs nas bsgrub bya de'i ming byung bzung ste/tshogs kyi bdag po'i rkang pa'i 'og tu dgod cing hU~M phaT ces bya ste/hUM gIs nga rgyal byas nas rdo rje bdud rtsi ting nge 'dzin las
369b6(rgyud): skyes pa/khro bo sngags kyis rab tu sbyor bas sangs rgyas rnams kyang skrod par byed do//rdo rje bdud rtsi zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//shin tu legs par gsang bar
369b7(rgyud): ni//bya ba 'di ni rab bskul bar//ye shes rdo rjes bya ba ste//nyi me bdun gyis 'grub par 'gyur//na mauHsa man+ta bud+d+he b+h+yo//oM ya ma dat+tA ya nI lA ya nI la
370a1(rgyud): k+Sha/kurAd+g+ha swA/s+'uR+sha m+mAr+yA/sma smra nam du dzu nas brdzu na pa pa ston pa sgyus na ldan shu dus su/
370a2(rgyud): na rnams cad dang /s+yAng sa r+b+ba sa rnams skyel ma du hU~M//bcu pAg+h+ri brgyad pa sbyim tsam gyis snang shin tu m+b+ha pa sbyong ba'i tshogs bskul ba la
370a3(rgyud): gdun pa thabaze ched 'ching bar 'gyur//dbyig pas mnan po'i rdo rjezhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//nAmaHsa m+b+han+ta prad+d+hed+d+ho/na mo mahA pa l+yA ya~M/Ar+yAH
370a4(rgyud): d+hI rArmA sa satwA nA ga nA b+he mA/de nami ga rtse po chen po b+h+rUM shang pas//drug gis gad 'jigs shing stobs dang rna ma ba dang/
370a5(rgyud): tsi 'di ba 'am+b+hi ti slebs po che dad par da de/rdo rje stobs kyu spyan ras pa thigs shes bya ba ti nge 'dzin to//na maHsa mAn+ta prad+d+he b+h+yo//nam sa tshil
370a6(rgyud): t+ta mnaman+ta/b+h+rUM b+h+rUM b+hU ta y+yag+hA ta sits+tsha \u0f7f/dri nis kha~M Sh+NI rmin po myu ga s+ho ba skyes blo chen po byA shad pas khyu dang klu dang glan sprin chen po brtul ta stsal
370a7(rgyud): la to//'di ni khri bo rgyam pa mis//sau ni non pa'i cho ga yis//rdo rje dkyil 'a kho rdul 'byor las//skyes pa dang ni skye rnams khrugs//oM
370b1(rgyud): na na/d+hA rgyun/sa rgyu na/ du smra// nas sa//zlo ba can gdun dusmra/
370b2(rgyud): //num nga sl-ing nar bsdus/ te//lcags kyu gis ni bruM nas no//sra bye sung thugs ni bsgrims
370b3(rgyud): yis//bri ma thams cad dri kun pa byar//'jig rten gas mi dgug pazhes bya ba'i ti 'dzin te// ches de cheng smi ni/ rje sems dpa' tsher mchog
