370b4(rgyud): rje 'dun te/marlob sa niHde ba da //byin pa'i man na d+hi/zhugs pa lcags kyi snum pa yis//sa s+ye rgyu sku rnams
370b5(rgyud): 'gugs parten//sa su sbyi smras hU~M dgas//rang gi bye pa skyes tha bas ste//smre sa pa rdo rje rnam par rgyun//lcags kyu la sogs snro hU~M yi/
370b6(rgyud): la bgyi'i bar bya//donas ts+tsham ldan 'das kyis rdo pas dgun pa'i 'i tshig bka sprul to//namaHsa~M mAn+naTe d+hI
370b7(rgyud): dang ni bcig la yang /rdo rje gas kyu'i sbyong ba las//zla ba nye bar chags rjes su//khar bdug rnaMs ni bsgrub par bya//mau na dris pa tsam gyis kyang /
371a1(rgyud): /byArgya ni gsal bar bzlas pa yin//sgra lhun gnas med dbang po drug/chung mar bcas pa dbug par bya//dam tshig lcags kyu
371a2(rgyud): rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te//bsam gtan sngags dang ting 'dzin gnas//rang gi rig ma skyes bu bdag/dbug bya'i gon su bzung bar bya//thub pa
371a3(rgyud): g+hazhin du mau 'gyuraro//na maHsA man+ta bud+d+ha nAM/na meHsa man+ta d+har+m+ma NAM/na maHsa man+ta saM g+hA nAM/oM si t+ta ta pa tra/oM bi ma laM/au shaM ka ra/au pra
371a4(rgyud): t+yAM gI rA/oM badz+ra uSh+NI Sha tsakrA wAn+ti sar+b+bA yain+taM man+ta mA la kar+m+ma ban+d+hi nau tai Da nAM kI la naM bA ma ma kr-i ti yai na ken+na ts+yait+ta kr-i taM tet+tata/sarba nU ts+tshin+na ts+tshin+da/b+hiR+Sha b+hiH/
371a5(rgyud): gli ni mar me / hUM la~M phaT phaT/bdag nyid snang ni /sbyor ba rgyung gzhig+sa pa /
371a6(rgyud): dpung pa'i rig mar gyur byas nas/'jig rten gsum gyis medar mi nus//khro bo chen po 'khor lo rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//
371a7(rgyud): dben pa'i nags tshal nyid du yang //yid gnyis thams cad rnam spangs la//rnal 'byor mchog ni 'di bsgrubs na//thub pa gzhan du mi 'gyur ro//
371b1(rgyud): khro brdzun pa la rA 'i phyugs la 'drab d+ma d+hA rmAgs bya ba'i sprin s+ho ///don su maldan \u0f7fdz+nyAn+da//sems can n+d+ha Sh+Ti snod la 'gas//
371b2(rgyud): na ma khyen ye shes las byung ba//yad dag nges par rab tu skye//sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan rab brnams te//rdo rje sems dpa' ra bai skri b+h+yo//
371b3(rgyud): rgyas gzugs brnyan rab bsgrims nas//rdo rje rnam snang dran pa bya//sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan rab ba sgoms te//rdo rjenyi ma rab bsgom bya//sangs rgyas
371b4(rgyud): sa rnyan gr-I bskye mA nas// chugs dri rnam ra /sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan rnam pasamasatI me dran yod dpa skye ste//s+yA
371b5(rgyud): zugs parnyani la byung //dkyil 'a khyer rnams nI nag bsgyus!//snrum sa d+hAn sa kyi sngags nyidi y-is/ khAd ye shes gan sa /
371b6(rgyud): dang bA byAs/s+yAngs rgyas byung chub / phyug /rtogs /phyag r+b+ha dang ni phrag sa rdzun rdzun/skye
371b7(rgyud): //dkyil la nas nga//skyes rnam gsus shes kyis nas//sbyi nam na ts+tsha//de nyid 'a /
372a1(rgyud): sems dpa' grags chen po//gzugs la rnam gsum shes byas nas//lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya//de nyid bcom ldan rgyal po ni//
372a2(rgyud): rdo rje rnam snang mnga' bdag nyid//dril rnam gsum rnam shes nas//lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya//de nyid bcom ldan sangs rgyas ni//rin cane phung po rab
372a3(rgyud): tu grags//ro la rnam gsum rnam shes nas//lha rnams la yang dbul bar bya//de nyid bcom ldan 'dod chags nyid//rdo rje chos ni de bzhin gshegs//
372a4(rgyud): reg la rnam gsum rnam shes nas//lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya//de nyid bcocom ldan sna tshogs pa//don yod 'bras bu ster ba po//srung ba'i dam tshig bsdus/
372a5(rgyud): pa yi//dkyil 'khor lnga ni bsgoms par bya//lnga ldi'i bdag nyid rdzogs sangs rgyas//ye shes lnga ni rnam par sgom//'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan//
372a6(rgyud): 'od zer sna tshogs kun tu khyab//sna tshogs lngas ni byed par brjod//thams cad bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor ni//nyi shu rtsa lnga'i dbye ba yis//rdul tshon gyis
372a7(rgyud): kyang bri bar bya//sangs rgyas lnga li rang bzhin gyis//phung po lngar ni rab tu grags//sangs rgyas mgon po'i dkyil 'khor ni//shar gyi che re ni rab tu gras
372b1(rgyud): g.ya bu rdo rje nyi ma yi//nub tu 'dod chags rdo rje yI//byang du rta yi rgyal po yi//dbus su rdo rje sems dpa' yi//shaR+Sha du dkar po chen po ste//lho ni sdor blo yang
372b2(rgyud): dag ldan//dmar po nub kyi cha nyid du//brtsod ni byang du yang dag ldan//'tshams kyi tsher nr-i thams cad dang //sgro yi logs dang ya phub su//rdo rje rin chen rnam
372b3(rgyud): kyis rkyen//sna tshogs snang ba rnams kyis mdzes//sangs rgyas mgon po gang nyid kyi//dkyil 'khor dbus su 'gyur ba ni//de nyid kyi ni dkyil 'khor brjod//
372b4(rgyud): snying po yongs gzung dkyil 'khor te//dkyil 'khor re rer sgom pa 'am//yang na bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor ro//brgyad brgyad dbus su gnas pa 'am//yang na nyi shu
372b5(rgyud): rtse lnga ru//gang tshe dkyil 'khor bsdus pa yI//sgor ni lcags kyu zhags pa dang //lcags sgrog de bzhin rdo rje nyid//'jug pa'i sgo srung dgod par bya//bcom ldan
372b6(rgyud): 'das kyis bsdus pa chen po'i dam tshig 'di bka' stsal to//dom dang bya rgod de bzhin pas//sdug glang dang ni stag nyid dang //sgye'u dang sna thung ba glang 'tshe//rdo rje
372b7(rgyud): chos kyi g.yas ni'o//khra 'ug chu skar seng ge dang //mtshor gnas de bzhi ni ra dang na//ri dgas pa ga dang yang dag ldan//g.yas min pari na rtag tu gnas//rma bya
373a1(rgyud): mU ho chu srin dang //nyi ma'i rgyal po ra s+ya sbrul dang //lkog gi rlung dang ngang pa dang //ri bong phan pa'i g.yas pa na//sprul pa thu bo sprin shugs kyi//
373a2(rgyud): khyA chu rmig sman mtshungs b+hi la//g.yag dang dri ldan de bzhin parnyed//ge yon bya'i thang po brgyad na'o//ka ran du dang 'khor lo dag/lug dang tsa ki ra dadi ni/bya
373a3(rgyud): ho r-i mo'i li ba dang //ku rar nyi ma'i g.yas na'o//stobs kyi rgyu dang dung skyong dang //rigs ldan pad+ma pad bzang dang //'jog po nir rgyas mtha' yas ni/
373a4(rgyud): rin chen rgyal po'i g.yon na'o//gza' lag phur bu 'jug rings dang //sgra gcan mig dam ru phye ba sangs//spen pa khyab 'jug rta rgyal nyid//g.yas pa nyid du
373a5(rgyud): rab tu grags//dbang po tshungs pa de bzhin drag/'dod lha de bzhin thod pa can//gcer bu dang ni thag bzangs ris//stobs ldan zhes bya g.yon na'o//glo dang
373a6(rgyud): dbugs dang de bzhin 'bog/khyod skam mdze dang rkang shu dang //mtshan pa mtsher ba'i rang bzhin yang //glang po la sogs rab tu grogs//lcags stegs dang
373a7(rgyud): ni brjed byed dang //khrag rdo gtsang nad rgyal po dang //gzhang 'brum sran rang bkres nad dang //mig ser dom la sogs pa'o//rdzi ma byi dang so nad dang //mkhris
373b1(rgyud): pa khrag dang de bzhin rlung //bad kan 'jug dang lus skam dang //skya rbab 'bras ni rma bya stsogs//rkang 'bab tshol nad rlig skrangs dang //rgyu ma 'phel dang g+hasud pa
373b2(rgyud): dang //tshang pa rims dang rabs gis ni//ka rAt+na sogs rab tu grags//rlung mo khris de bzhin ma zhu ba//sgrib g.yogs rab rib gtsi nA sri ba//gzhogs phyed
373b3(rgyud): na dang lkog 'bras dang //rlung rgyas gza' lag la sogs pa'o//mi yi 'gro ba dam pa ni//rab mchog de lta bu 'gro ba//thams cad nad kyis khyab mthong nas//
373b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas lder nI cher grags pa//byadag gi lus la gzhug par bya//sems can rnams la gdungs ma gyur//nad rnams zhi phyir sangs rgya ste ni//glang po
373b5(rgyud): la sogs nad 'dzin to//de ltar bsgoms par gyur pa la//nad maud ru dza trang gru med//'chi med nges par byA d+hi med//nga rgyalo med cing gti mug med//
373b6(rgyud): bkres pa med cing skom pa med//sdug bsngal dran 'gro de bzhin med//lha dang lha mri na mi rnams sam//gang gis kyang ni nad byed min//nang thams cad rab tu
373b7(rgyud): zhi ba dbugs dbyung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o////de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po lus thams cad 'dzin pa po mkha' 'gro ma'i yid 'phrog pas tshig
374a1(rgyud): 'di dka' stsal pa/snyoms k+Shi rje sma dran dmyigs nas ni//sangs rgyasar+N+No su d+hanA pa sgrom//sems kyi rin tshon pasam+b+has nas nI//chos
374a2(rgyud): ni rjes su dran pa sgom//las rjes dran pa'i rnal 'byor pas//'khor michen po rab bsgom bya//rnal 'byor 'di ni mchog rab ste//ma d+hung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro//rdorje
374a3(rgyud): sems dpa' rnam bsgoms nas//phyag rgya bzhi yis phyag rgyas gdab//rdo rje rnam snang bsams nas ni//phyag rgya bsgoms pas phyag rgyas gdab//rdo rje'i phyag
374a4(rgyud): rgya'i sbyor ba yis//rin chen phung po rab bsgom bya//chos kyi phyag rgya rab sbyor bas//las kyi rdo rje phyag rgyas god ba//zhe sdang rgyal po rgyal po che//skyon rnams
374a5(rgyud): thams cad zad par mdzad//spro zhing spyod pa /sgom par bya//bsdu bo yang ni yang dag byashad//sangs rgyas mgon po rab bsgoms na//sangs rgyas sprin gyis/
374a6(rgyud): kun tu khyab//smyo dang bsdu ba'i rnal 'byor gyis//sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgoms bya//sems kyi rin chen rin po ches//bdud kyi skyon rnams zad par
374a7(rgyud): mdzad//sems kyi char sprin sbyor ba yis//yang ni bsdu ba bstan par bya//chos kyi rgyal po gti mug che//sgro dang bsdu ba'i gzugs can de//thun chod
374b1(rgyud): ba ni byin rlabs pa//bsgoms na myur du 'grub par 'gyur//sems ni 'gro mchogs ltar bsams nas//bzhal mad 'bras bu stsol ba'o//rta mchog char sprin
374b2(rgyud): chen po yis//bsdu ba yang ni bsgom par bya//bcom ldan 'das kyi spro ba dang bslu ba'i dam tshig chen po de skad ces bka' stsal to//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas
374b3(rgyud): pUr//sems kyi rnam pad+ma bsgom+b+ha par bya//rnyog med dkyil 'khor dbus ga s+ho pUr//sku ya yis rnam pad+ma sgom//l+r-ig gi dkyil 'khor dbus brnyas pad/
374b4(rgyud): sems kyi rin chen yi ge dgod//chos kyi 'khor lo dbus gnas par//gsung gi yi ge rnam par sgom//las kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par//don yang yig
374b5(rgyud): gzugs can te//sku gsum mi phyed sgom pa yis//ye shes rdo rje bsgom par bya//rdo rje sems dpa' mi phyed pa'o//chos kyi 'khor lo rnam snang la//rin chen sems
374b6(rgyud): kyi rin po che//pad+ma bzang po mdab mar dmar//shes rab ral gri don yod kyi//shes rab rnon po'i rang bzhin gyi//rnam rtog ri bo bcang nus ni//phyag rgya chen po ldan
374b7(rgyud): par 'gyur//dpage tshad bye ba brgya par ni//rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya//phan pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid dang yang //rin chen phung po 'od chen dang //chos kyi
375a1(rgyud): phung po mngon chen dang //de bzhin gshegs pa rdo d+hA las//sna rmongs 'od zad tshwaR+Sha dadUr ba//sangs rgyas sbyin gyis rnam par rgyun//
375a2(rgyud): na mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par//ye shes dkyil 'khor bsgom par bye//'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yis blang //thams cad du ni sde tshogs gzugs//
375a3(rgyud): mchod pa kun gyis mchod par bya//mtshams kyi lha mo'i sbyor ba yis//ye shes rgya mtsho rab bsgrub bya//dam tshig 'khor lo bcug pa yi//ye shes rdo rje chen
375a4(rgyud): po'abar//sangs rgyas kun mnyam rnal 'byor pas//skad cig la ni gnyis med 'gyur//ru rak+ShaM dang dung ral gri//bu yi 'tsho ba pad 'bras dang //mu
375a5(rgyud): tig la sogs byi ru sogs//bsam gtan ldan pa sngags bzlas bya//sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' deng //mkhe 'gro ma dang rang btsun mo//mngon sum du
375a6(rgyud): ni bya ba'i phyir//sngags ni snyan gsan 'bebs par brjod//dper na skyes tshon lo la zhig/skad cig nga ros byos pa ni//thos pa tsam gyis 'ongs gyur pa/
375a7(rgyud): de ltar skad cig sangs rgyas gshegs//'jig rten khams ni stong phrag dang //na mkha'i khams kyi mkha' grong du//phyag rgya chen po'i bde gnas kyi//mkha'
375b1(rgyud): dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs//de rnams sngags rig drung ni gshegs//rdo rje spyan gyis rnam par gzigs//gang gyis sngags kyi rim thob pa//e ma de yis
375b2(rgyud): byang chub thob//sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yang //sngags kyi spyod pa dang por 'dzin//rdo rje sngags ni rab sbyor bas//mtshungs pa med pa'i ye shes
375b3(rgyud): 'thob//de ltar shes pa'i sangs rgyas te//sngags kyi spyod pa'i rim gnas pa//'bras bu nyid la mi gzigs te//de ni sangs rgyas mnyam pa brjod//sangs
375b4(rgyud): rgyas nga rgyal dmigs nas ni//chos kyi dbyings ni 'od gsol ba//gang zhig som pa de bas na//sems can sangs rgyas mnyam par gyur//'jig rten ji ltar
375b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas te//ji ltar chos kyang dge 'dun te//sems can khams ni da ltar ba shud//na mkha' lta bur dri ma med//ngan par brtags pa'i rnam rtog gis//
375b6(rgyud): rin chen sems ni dri can byas//sems dag pas ni dag par 'gyur//ji ltar na mkha' mi 'jig pa//nam mkha' ji bzhin de bzhin sems//sems kyi rin chen bskul
375b7(rgyud): ba las//sems nyid sgom pa sangs rgyas te//skye bar sangs rgyas dam pa nyid//rin chen sems las phyir gyur pa'i//sangs rgyas med cing gang zag med//
376a1(rgyud): rnam par shes pa'i gnas don nam//phyi rol gyur pa cung zad med//yid kyis sangs rgyas thams cad nyid//khams gsum dbang
376a2(rgyud): byuphyug chen po ste//'jig rten gsum gyi rgyal po che//sems gcig gis ni thob par 'gyur//gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri//ro dang reg bya'i rang
376a3(rgyud): bzhin te//chos kyi dbyings ni mchog tu zhi//'di ni rin chen mchog tu brjod//gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang //'du byed dang ni rnam shes nyid//
376a4(rgyud): 'di dag thams cad sems las skye//thub pa 'di ni gzhan mi 'gyur//yid bzhin nor bu rin po tshwa//'dod don 'bras bu rab ster ba//sems kyi de nyid rang /
376a5(rgyud): bzhin dang //sngangs rgyas byang chub 'bras bu ster//de nyid phyir na sangs rgyas kyis//sems kyi rdo rje bskul ba yis//zab mo'i rnam pa nges ldan pa'i
376a6(rgyud): phyed par dga' ba'i dngos gru bi lcer/rdo rje sems dpa'i snying po snang ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o////de nas rdo rje chen po rdo rje can mkha' gri mi'i gur
376a7(rgyud): bskyed pa'i rnal 'byor gyi ti nga nge 'dzin la bzhugs te/bdag nyid kyi rnal 'byor gsungs pa/sangs rgyas gnas ni rab rdzogs dang //rnam pa lnga po
376b1(rgyud): /bsgoms pa dang //kun tu bzang po'i rang bzhin dang //rang gi lhag pa'i wArar+ya sgrub dang //dkyil 'khor rnams kyi dgod pa dang //mchod bstod bdud rtsi la sogs pa//
376b2(rgyud): rims pas rje su bsgom par bya//rnal 'byor yan lag drug tu 'dong //oM sir+b+ba te thA ga ta a b+hi She ka d+yA dzI sa b+hA ba At+ma ko ti//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
376b3(rgyud): mi bskyod pas de skad ces bka' stsal to//oM sarba twa thA ga tA mI tA s+yA da badz+ra swA b+hA be At+ma kot+ta//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dadag med pas da skad rgyas
376b4(rgyud): bka' stsal to//oM sarba ta thA ga ta swA ti badz+rA swA b+hA ba A/bcom ldan 'das da bzhin+da gshegs pa rin chen tog gis de skad ces bka' stsal te//oM
376b5(rgyud): ta thA ga tA~M pU dzA badz+ra su~M b+hA ba At+ma/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rta mchog gis de skad ces bka' stsal to//oM sarba ta thA ga tA nu rA ga ta badz+ra swa b+hA
376b6(rgyud): At+ma ts+tsha/bcom ldan 'das rdo rje nyi ma de bzhin gshegs pas de skad ces bka' stsal to//skyo ba dang ni bsdus pa'i sku//rgyal chen rnam pa de snong mdzad/tsham
376b7(rgyud): sa yig las smras pa//ngas ni se rgyas gnas dbang bya//oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nI la yang badz+ras b+hA Ad+h+r-ika tu//rnam par snang ming rdo rje zhes bya ba ting
377a1(rgyud): 'dzin to//nu mkha khams kyi dbus gnas par//'byung ba ni'i bdag nyid dkyil 'khor nyid//de yi steng du sangs rgyas bsnam//skyes nus//
377a2(rgyud): gzhal yas gnas dgod bya//rdo rje lta bu mi byed phyir//des ni mi bskyod bsgom par bya//mye skyes rjesu dran pA las//rnam pa de snang mdzad phan pa nyid//rin chen
377a3(rgyud): rnams kyi mchog gri mchog/'di ni rin chen semasu ba sha//rdo rje chos ni rgyal po che//'dod tshogs mtshan nyid 'dzin pA las//rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas 'dug
377a4(rgyud): pa'i//sems ni 'dod chags zhes byar bshad//gang phyir 'bras bral mi 'grub ster//de phyir don yod rab tu grags//rig ma mdzes ma rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
377a5(rgyud): to//bum pa'i dbang ni dang po skye//gnyis pa la ni gsang ba'i dbang //gsum pa shes rab ye shes te//ji ltar lus ni de bzhin gshegs//dkyil 'khor dam pa
377a6(rgyud): br-in+da na sa ni//dam tshig khu bri'i cho ga yaM ste//haM dang bsam gtan bskyed byas nas//de tshe dbugs dbyung sbyin par bya//mkha' gro lnga dang ldan pa dang //dam tshig lnga
377a7(rgyud): yis bkang ba dang //mkha' phro ma yis tshogs ldan pas//rdo rje sa bon rab sbyor bas//rang gi lhag po'i lhar byas la//slob ma rtag par nges bsams te//rgyun
377b1(rgyud): sa rigs kyi mad gis na//sgrubs d+ho d+ha n+dan+da dbang bsgyur//sman drung bdab mo sbrel ma dang //dkar mya la sogs bdag gzugs kyis//rdo rje btsun ma rlab sbyang bas//rdo rje b+hU
377b2(rgyud): med bAshad par bya//bla na med pa'i de nyid 'di//gnyi su med cing yig med//chos kyi dbyings ni 'od gsal byed//bde ba bzang po la ro myang gis//sgrib pa myed pa'i rdo rje zhes
377b3(rgyud): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//ga dang ha zhes bya ba dang //dang po mthar yang shwa ldan pa'i//rab tu gsal ba dam po nyid//dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba//tshogs kyi rdo rje
377b4(rgyud): bdud rtsi myang //'di dag zos pa tsam gyis ni//sangs rgyas kun mnyam rnal 'byor pa//rdo rje dang ni mnyam par 'gyur//nad rnams thams cad rab tu zhi//de ni gzi brjid
377b5(rgyud): lus chen po//'ji/na gyi yid 'brog pa//pas kyi rgol ba kun las rgyal//'jig rten kun gyi bdag pos rgyan//lha rnams kyi ni 'dren par brjod//mkha' 'gro lnga yi
377b6(rgyud): bdag nyid 'gyur//chos kyi zas ni zab bo//dam tshig chen po'i brisam gtan zos pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te//mi bskyod brten pa'i rnal 'byor bya//nad rnams thams
377b7(rgyud): cad rnam par spangs//rtag par chu shel chen por ldan//rdo rje nyi ma rgas pa med//don yod rgyal po chen po ni//rdo rje srog gi yan laba'i byung //don kun sgrub cing dpal
378a1(rgyud): dang ldan//des ni rnal 'byor par ni brjod//mi bskyod btung ba'i sbyor ba las//stong phrag lngas ni 'tsho bar 'gyur//phan pa'i sa ni khri ru brjod//
378a2(rgyud): rdo rje nyi ma rdo rje'i 'bus tshe dpag med kyis dpag med dang //bdun gyis na mkha' ji srid ba shad//rdo rje nyi ma dpyib med dag/'khor ba'i sgrub thabs rtsa ba nyid//'di dag
378a3(rgyud): bsten pas rnal 'byor pa//kun tu bzang po 'dra bar 'gyur//shes rab pha rol phyin ye shes//'di ni rdo rje nyi mar brjod//chos rnams thams cad kyi ni gnas//
378a4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med//sangs rgyas rdo rje can nyid kyi//thabs dang shes rab zhon pa dag/khams gsum dag ni thams cad du//sa dang sa 'og par snang
378a5(rgyud): la//khrag dang khu bas khyab pa'i lus//rigs kyi dbang phyug gis 'di gsungs//sen mo ba spu de bzhin khams//khu ba la ni rnam par gzigs//lpags dang
378a6(rgyud): khrag la gzi brjid che//tshil dang rkang la rdo rje 'dzin//thams cad mgon po rnam snang mdzad//rtsa dang shwa la bdun rgyal po//'di rnams la ni sangs rgyas lngar/
378a7(rgyud): rdo rje mkha' gros rnam par bshad//sa yi khams ni rnam dag pa//spyan ni 'khor lo mdzes pa nyid//rdo rje btsun mo dang ba ste//pad+ma'i bu mo che ba nyid//sgrol ma rlung
378b1(rgyud): rnam par dag/rdo rje btsun mo ngang ba ste//rdo rje mkha' gro zhes bya'o//gur gyis de rnams bku' stsal to/sngags thams cad rnam par dag par bdud rtsi lnga mchog tu byung
378b2(rgyud): rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'adz+ra na tAM le'u bdun pa'o////khyod ni zhes sdang rdo rje yongs skyong ba//thugs dang chos ni shin tu rnam dag pas//lha yi lus ni yang dag
378b3(rgyud): rgyan mdzod pa//puk+ka sI ni bdag la myur du gzigs//dam par 'dren pa 'jig rten don gyi phyir//stong pa nyid spangs skye ba zhes par mdzod//khyod ni gti mug rdo rje yongs
378b4(rgyud): skyong ba//sku yi bdag po chos kyi gzugs brnyan gyis//lha yi lus ni yang dag rgyan mdzad po//mgon po ra khrod ma ni bdag la myur du gzigs//rnam par 'dren pa 'jig
378b5(rgyud): rten sman slad du//stong pa nyid spangs skye ba bzhes par mdzod//khyod ni 'dod chags rdo rje yongs skyong ba//gsung dag legs par so sor rtog pa yis//lha yi lus ni yang
378b6(rgyud): dag rgya ni mdzad pa//gtum par ldan pa bdag la myur du gzigs//rnam par 'dren pa 'jig rten sman slad du//stong pa nyid spangs skye ba ba zhes par mdzod//khyod ni sangs rgyas
378b7(rgyud): thams cad yongs skyong pa//gzugs kun nan tan thams cad mnyam nyid kyis//lha yi lusi ni yang dag rgyan mdzad pa//Do mo bi bdag la mgon po myur du gzigs//
379a1(rgyud): rnam par 'dre pa 'jig rten smyan skad du//stong pa nyid skas skye ba zhes par mdzod//rnams cad pags par mdzad pa rdo rje zhes d+hA ba'i
379a2(rgyud): 'dzin to//'khor lo can rnams thams cad kyi//'dis ni bskyed par 'gyur bar ni//ye shes ra rje can gyis bya//dkyil 'khyer bdag po de skad gsungs//oM sarba
379a3(rgyud): ta thA ga tA khi tsa rI badz+ra swa b+hA ba A t+ma ko haM/oM sarba ta thA gat+ta b+hU tsa ri badz+ri swa b+hA ba At+ma kau hUM//oM sarba t+ya thA ga dz+nyo pA tA la wa si nI badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM//sku gsung thugs
379a4(rgyud): kyi chos rnams kyi//byin rlabs don suM rtag par ni//ye shes rdo rje can gyis byA//'di ni byang chuste mi bstan pa'i//bcom ldan 'dres sku dang gsung dang thugs
379a5(rgyud): radabu pos de skad ces bka' stsal to//phyag rgya chen por rab sbyor ba//sku yi rin chen sbyang bar bya//bsam gtan rdo rje bsdams nas ni//sems kyi rin chen dang
379a6(rgyud): smra byed//rdo rje bzlas pa'i khyad par gyis//dgra gi rdo rje dri ma med//gti mug rdo rje rab sbyor bas//mig gi rnam par shes pa sbyang //zhe sdang rdo rje bsnams pa yis
379a7(rgyud): mi sgo yi sems pa'o//sde ni sar sna rdo rje yis//ro drug 'dod chags rdo rje yis//lus ni phrag dag rdo rje yis//yid ni kun tu bzeng po yis//de
379b1(rgyud): nyid mkha' gro bdag med ma//'di rnams kyis ni rnam par sbyang //gal te 'gal ba yod pa ma yin yang //de'i tshe rgyal ba'i dngos po blang ba yod//kun rdzob bden par
379b2(rgyud): yang dag gar sa nas nI//'khor lo gzugs kyi chos tsam rnam par sgom//chos kyi dngos po ma byung spyad pa las//gang zag thams cad rnam spangs 'jog rten pa//'jig
379b3(rgyud): 'gro bar bsam par mi nus te//chos kyi tshul gyis thabs cad rnam par dag/tshig pa rnams kyi gdud dang dug khyab pa'i//lus kyi sman ni bzhin gyi dug nyid do//
379b4(rgyud): ji ltar chu ni rna bar zhugs pa la//yang ni chu ni thab su 'gyur ba nyid//ji ltar rlung gis dkrugs pa'i sems rnams kyis//de bzhin mkhas pas mod sran gre'u bzhin//
379b5(rgyud): 'dod chags kyis kyang rmongs pa yi//skye bo 'dod chags mi yis gdung //'dod chags kyis bskyed 'jig rten pa//'dod chags smad pas zad par 'gyur//'dod
379b6(rgyud): chags rdo rje yongs shes pas//yid ni rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur//'dod chags zhags pas 'tshong ba yis//'jig rten chags yis khyab par brjod//'dod chag
379b7(rgyud): bral ba'i mngon byang chub//'dod chags mther phyin rnams mi 'dod//de nis rdo rje sgrol ma yis//sgrub thabs sbyin sred sa kyin//go chos 'dod don thams cad /
380a1(rgyud): sgrub thabs yang dag rab bshad byu/de la 'di rnams ni sngags kyi rkang pA yain+te te//oM na mo rAt+na tra yA ya/Ur+yA ba lo kI tA sh+tsA rA ya/za
380a2(rgyud): d+hi satwA ya/ma hA sa twA yau/ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/tad+ya thAM/au tA re tut+ti ri tu re sarbaM duSh+TaM ma ma kli te dzaM b+ha ya/stam+b+ha yaM/mau hA yA/ban+d+ha ya/hUMts+tsha hUM/phaT phaT
380a3(rgyud): phaT/sarba ruSh+TaM staM b+hi nA tAr+ye sahA//ma mo dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par//lha mo sgrol ma bsgom par bya//phyag brgyad zhal ni ba'i pa skye//rgyad rnams kun gyis
380a4(rgyud): rnam par brgyan//gser gyi kha dog 'dra bar sgom//gzhon nu ma yi mtshan nyid 'bar//rdo rje nyi ma'i dbyung skyes pa'i//sangs rgyas bzhi yi dbu rgyan can//lang tshol
380a5(rgyud): ni bab pa'i lus//g.yo bya gser gyi rna cham//sna tshogs pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs//'od zer dmyur pos rnam par rgyan//rdo rje zhags pa de bzhin dung //g.yas pas
380a6(rgyud): mda' ni 'gengs pa'o//rdo rje lcags kyi ud pa li//bsdigs mdzub g.yon pas 'dzin pa mo//rdo rje skyil krung sbyor ba yis//gnas gsum pa ni bsgrub par bya//
380a7(rgyud): shar du me tog sgrol ma ste//kha dog dkar zhing yid 'ong me//yi ge aM las skyes pa'o//me tog phreng bas lag pa khyab//phyag gnyis zhal ni gcig ma nyid//
380b1(rgyud): rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan//g+ha las sgra bdug skyes m+b+ha mas+ho//'dog gnas smos pa'i gzugs banas//sgros dang rlung gis lag pa bral//rgyun myus
380b2(rgyud): mi rnam pa brgyan//nub tu mor me sgrol ma ste//mar me sdong bus lag pa khyab/mdog ser rnam bi ra rgyan chen mo//g.yo ba ser gyi rna cham//byang dru dr-i yi sgrob
380b3(rgyud): ste//dri yi dung gis lug khyab pa//khrag gis mdog ltar lha mo ni//dkyil 'khor snying po bsgrim par bya//lcags kyu la sogs rab dbye bas//dIng ni sku yi srung ma
380b4(rgyud): bsam//steng du gtsug tor rnam rgyal ma//'og tu gnod mdzes ma rab sgom//'khor lo klu zhags bsnams nas no//spro zhing sngags ni bzlo bar bya//a t+tA ra tut+tA ri tu re
380b5(rgyud): swAhA//yi ge bcu yis lha mo bcu//pha rol phyen bcu la gnas ma//'bras bu thams cad rab sgrub phyir//rab tu 'bad pas sgom par bya//sngags ni mchog dang phul du
380b6(rgyud): byin//sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag mdzad pa//bklags pas 'gyur byed drag po ste//rdo rje gur gyis bshad pa'o//sngags 'dis gros kyi thu bar bdun//mngon par
380b7(rgyud): bosngags pa bya ba ste//mdud pos bcings te nags tshal du 'phro 'gro mo'ang sug kyang mi 'khyer te/stag dang /chom rkun dang \u0f7fchu srin sna 'thung dang /seng ge ngang
381a1(rgyud): sbrul dang //mche ba tsan+d+ra dang /ma he dang /dom rlung /sdug klung la stsogs dran pa tsa ma b+his nyams shing yib po/stags 'dus ud pa la
381a2(rgyud): la sbyin sreg ji srid du/lani bad+h+yartsa brgya dzI tsame bsku bar bya ste/oM tAR+Sha tut+ti re a mu kA mr-i wi Sh+TaskA na yaM sahA//yang sngags dwe ny-i daHsUSh+Ta'i sgra la len
381a3(rgyud): dumi nu rtsa gnyis yongs bzlas te/dgra'i khyim du sbas+thA na//nyi ma bdun gyis skrod par byed do//oM ta re tu tu rtsa la p+la tsa laM shIg+h+ra~M g+hA mi ni wa daMt+ta/u
381a4(rgyud): Ta ya hU~M phaT/de nas gzhan yang sbyor bar 'gyur ba/oM tA re tut+tA raM tu re/a mu kA b+hI dz+nyA na ku mA rI ma d+ya mud+h+we he na ta s+ya si ta dzA yAMts+tshin+tu mai swA hA/sgra tshil da
381a5(rgyud): baitum pa'i sa bin dang /myos byed dang a sho ka'i lo mu dang /me tog bsreg blugs bye zhing /mAr dang sbrang rtse bu ram du bcas pa stong phrag ldi'i spyan sreg ni bu
381a6(rgyud): mo'i dngos grub la rab tu bsngags te/nyi ma bdun gyis de'i tshe rnal 'byor pas ring 'dod pa'i bu mo thob pa//de nas gzhan yang rab tu sbyor bar 'gyuraro/oM tA
381a7(rgyud): tut+tA re tu re oM mu kA b+hi d+hA nAM sas+thA na ta A kaR+Sha ya ma mAn+ti ke dzaHsngags 'dis pa da ra'i tsher mo stong phrag lnga rang byung gi me tog bsreg lugs bye bar brjod pa 'di
381b1(rgyud): byubyis pas skyes pa skyong ba rnams kyi bu mo yang 'gugs par byed do//de nas gzhan yang sbyor bar 'gyur ba zla mtshan 'jug pa'i ras la bcom ldan 'das ma phyag banyis ma zhal
381b2(rgyud): gcig ma/la pa lcigs kyu dang /ud pi la dang zhigs par bcas pa rnam parara~M bris te/de'i mdun du mchod pa byas nas me tog 'di rnams dazo' zhing legs zhe
381b3(rgyud): bya ba la sogs pas mchod nas phyi nis sgom pa dang ldan par sngags bzlas so//oM tA re tut+tA rA tu re a mu kI ma me prI tau/swap+taM kra thA ya hUM phaT/stong phrag lngas 'od
381b4(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro//zhags pa dang mgron par bcings te/lcags kyur drangs nas bsgrub bya rkang pa'i 'og tu byas mis te/khol mi'i tshul gyis bze' bar bya'o//de nas gas
381b5(rgyud): yang sbyor bar 'gyur ba sgrol ma'i gzungs bdun mngon par sngags par bya //bongag gi mig gnyis mig sman gyis bslu bar bya zhing rgyal po'i rigs kyi drung du 'jug par
381b6(rgyud): bya'o//de nas rgyal po slob ma dang 'dra bar gus par byed cing 'gal bar mi byed pa dang /bka' drin rtsol zhing snyan par brjod par byed pa dang /bran du yang dag par 'gro
381b7(rgyud): zhing khros pa yang dbang du 'gyur ba te/'di ni mngon sum du mthong ba dang ngo mtshor dang bcas pa'o//de nas gzhan yang sbyor bar 'gyur ba sgrol ma'i gzungs lan brgya rtsa brgyad
382a1(rgyud): bAn+d+has te//khwa gnyis pa'i sa dug thal bar byas/ba kha dog dmar mo'i mir dang /Atad+de shing bal las sdong bu rab tu sbyar lA meg sman ban+d+ha
382a2(rgyud): bar bya'o//mig sman rdo rje nyi ma dang /rdo rje chos dgu mnyis la r+b+ha mchog gis bdug par bya'o//thal ba dang lhan cing mig la bsku bang bya ste/rdo rje mu'i gis gang lta
382a3(rgyud): bdo/gal te pad+me br-id gyi dbang phyug mo 'bab ni de'i tshe byadag sgrol ma ma lags te/bodag gis sas rgyan bcom ldan 'das rnams dkrongs pa lebaso//dra nas gzha
382a4(rgyud): yang sbyor bar 'byur ba byis pa so med pa'i lce blangs la sgrol ma'i gzungs bdun mngon par sngags par byas nas bung bya'i rgyal po'i rtsa ba dang /ba glang gi gi wang lhan cig byas pas
382a5(rgyud): dpral dang tshig la yong su bzung ste/ gang bltas pa de dbang du byed do//de nas gzhan yad sbyor bar 'gyung ba lto b+ha'i srin bu la gzungs bdun mngon par bsngags pa bya s+t+wa~M/
382a6(rgyud): byA lhan sdig byas pas dpral byer po rtsis byas la byin te/ ba mchog zos pa ni mo sbyong dzA dang /gzhan du mi dga' ba dang /gzhan du mi 'gro ba dang /rang gi bdon po
382a7(rgyud): spong ngo //de nam gzhan yang sbyor dar 'gyung ba ma go ru chen pos nye bar byugs la/sgrol ma'i gzungs ban+d+ha si la de bsgom par bya'o//bzlas par mthangs su btags pas mang
382b1(rgyud): gu'i dri ma la khu ba byas te/gung la byin pa de lnga por yang mi spong ngo //de nas gzhan yang sbyor bar 'gyur ba zla ba la ter rwa chags pa'i dus su sgrol ma'i gzungs zlos shing brtan
382b2(rgyud): bai byas la de las byung ba'i 'jig rten dbang phyug blangs te/dung gi thal ba dang mnye bar bya zhing rab tu dregs ma nyid la sbyin te//ji srid du sngar yang rjes su 'brang ngo //de nas gzhan
382b3(rgyud): yang sbyor bar 'gyur ba sgrol ma'i gzungs kyi snga ma da na pha la la ldan brgyad yongasu bzlas tau/'dod pa'i 'bras bu des rta mA grin dang /lhan ci bri bas bskul ni dbang du 'gyuraro//
382b4(rgyud): oM two re tut+tA re tu re e mu ka mya ban+d+ha naM muSh+Ti ku ru muHswAhA//zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di arka'i lo ma la bsgrub byi'i ming nang du bcug par brisA la ne'u le'i khung bur sbas na
382b5(rgyud): bcings pa las grol bar 'gyuraro//de nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'byung gnas yang dag par rab tu bshad par bya'o//gang gis bsgoms pa tsam gyis phas kyis
382b6(rgyud): rgol ba thams cad tshar gcod par 'gyur//lha mo phyag gnyis ma zhal gcig ma/sku mdog dkar bu yid 'phrog ma/sgra phyod du lci ba/chu skyes shin tu dkar ba las yang
382b7(rgyud): dag par gnas ma/lag pa gnyis par pad+ma mdog dkar ba yang dag par bsgoms shing /g.yon na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdo rje skyal krungasu gnas pa/rgyan thams cad
383a1(rgyud): kyis rnam par bad+d+hAnA pa/lte ba'i dkyil la dor du bsgom par bya'o//oM las skyes m+b+ha/mchog tu dga' bar byed ma/dam tshig sems dpa' bsgrud
383a2(rgyud): nas ye shes sems dpa' bsgom par bya zhing rnal 'byor zla ba drug tu gom+bis pas shes rab kyi pha rob tu phyin par 'gyuraro//mtshan mo bdun du sbyor bas bsten ba
383a3(rgyud): thams cad shes par byed do//'bum bzlas pa'i sbyor bas nyi me re re la tshugs bshad brgya brgya byed par 'gyu ro//rab tu 'bad pa med par gzhung brgya yang 'dzin par
383a4(rgyud): byed do//de la sngags kyi rkang par gyur pa//oM bi tsu pi tsu pradz+nyA bar+d+ha nI/dz+wa la dz+wa la me d+hA bar+d+ha ni/d+hi ri d+hi ri bud+d+ha bad+ha ni swA hA//kha mi zer bya na/sngags 'dis bdun
383a5(rgyud): dri mngon par bsdigs pa byas te/mAM bslangs pa srings blo sgyur ba ji srid zla ba drug dri gang 'thungs pa shes rang chen por 'gyur ro//de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyi//mtshan
383a6(rgyud): nyid yang dag rab bshang bya//de yis nye bar bsten pa'i sngags//sgrub pa po yis nges par 'grub//ngal zhing zab mo chos dang ldan//thams cad rig par
383a7(rgyud): mkhas dang bcas//sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor sngags shes shing //rab gnas gtor ma'i pha rol son/de nyid bcu ni rnam par rig/nyan thos spyod pa srung ba po///
383b1(rgyud): sngags spyod rim pa gus pa dang /gzugs ldan mthong na dga' ba dang //dkyil 'khor 'dri zhing bzlas par ldan//rtsu ba'i ltung ba 'joms pa po//sngags dang lus skyob sbyo
383b2(rgyud): ba yis//'jig rten rnams ni bde bar byed//de ldan bla mer bcas nas ni//gang shig zlu la slong byed cing //skye bo bra ma smod pa gang //dmyal ba chen por 'itshal por 'gyur//
383b3(rgyud): ji ltar rdo rje 'dzin rgyal ni//sangs rgyas kun gyis dang por mchod//rdo rje gur gyis 'gro ba yis//de ltar bla me'i nAn tin bya//bla mo'i grib ma bud med dang //lha ma
383b4(rgyud): spyan dang me lce stan rnams//rmongs rkyen gang zhig 'god byed na//skyes pa de ni spyi gri 'dzin//legs par dbang bskur slob ma gang //bla ma'i bka' las 'da' byed bya//'jig
383b5(rgyud): rten 'dir ni 'on par 'gyur//'jig rten pha rol dmyalo bar gnas//g.yo dang sgyu yi sbyor ba yis//brdzun gyis mi nus smra ba las//khong skam mdze nad chen po can//
383b6(rgyud): dmyal ba la sogs skye bar 'gyur//de ltar shes pa'i slob ma yis//bla ma'i bsnyen bkur pha rol phyin//bla ma'i bka' ni rab bsrungs na//dngos grub rgyas pa 'gus
383b7(rgyud): par 'gyur//tshogs kyi zas ni rtag tu bya//zhi ba la sogs rab tu bskul//sde par dge 'dun chos ston bya//bla ma sangs rgyas yang mnyes bya//bla ma la ni
384a1(rgyud): yon dbul zhing //de yi rjes su tshogs kun+da la'o//bdag gri las ni ba rnams nas ni//cho ga 'dis ni bsgrub par bya//yAn
384a2(rgyud): lag rgyun rnams kun gyis brgyan//rdo rje dril bu blangs nas ni//lam gyi bzhi mdor gtor ma btang //me tog bdug spos mar me dang //de bzhi ni dri
384a3(rgyud): dung sogs g.yas//g.yon du sngags kyi mchod yon snod//mdun du snod ni bzhag par bya//zhabs bsil grong mi'i cho ga yis//me tog spos sogs rim pa bzhin
384a4(rgyud): lA s+ye la sogs mchod pa yis//mchod par byas ni bzang por sbyin//me tog sgyur ba'i tshul gyis dang //dri ni 'thor ba'i tshul las dang //sdong pos mar me'i
384a5(rgyud): mtsho dri pa dang //byugs pa'i lus kyis rjesu dris//lA s+ye'i lag pa lA s+ye sto///phreng bas phreng ba'i mkha' gro ma//glu yis hUM gi dam tshig gle//brla bskums
384a6(rgyud): pas TI gar nyid do//mchod pa 'di rnams bla na med//sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par byed//sangs rgyas rnams ni mchod pas mchod//'dod pa'i dngos
384a7(rgyud): grung byed par 'gyur//bzlas dang sgom pa mngon dga' zhing //rtag tu 'khor ba'i pha rol 'gro//rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i bka' ji bzhin//'di rnams bla med mchod pa'o//
384b1(rgyud): mai tog spos sobs mngon sum du//'jig rten spyod par gnas pa yis//sna tshogs mchod pa mchog nyid min//de nyid byang chub yan lag min//dkar po zhi bar byed par/
384b2(rgyud): brjod//ser po rgyas pa'i sgrub thabs la//dbang dang dgug par dmar po ste//tha ma'i las la nag pa'o//zhi ba la ni me tig dkar//ser po rgyas pa'i rdo rje la/
384b3(rgyud): me tog rnag po tha ma la//dbang dang dgug la dmar po bzang //rnal 'byor pa gang dbang bskur med//dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs dang //gang zhig rab gnas
384b4(rgyud): ma mthong dang //gang zhig sbyin sreg ma byas pa//'jig rten 'di dang pha rol-I du//de yi dngos grub mchog nyid med//gang gis slob dpon gsol ma btab//
384b5(rgyud): 'dir ni rigasu skye ba med//sangs rgyas thams cad bsgom par bya//gang gis byang chub ma thob ni//'khor los bsgyur ba'i gnasu de'i//skye zhing skye bar 'gyur
384b6(rgyud): ba'o//yang na saM yi bdug po nyi//dab pa'i gnas mngon par 'gro//bde btsun dang mkha' 'gro dang //dga' ldan du ni blo ldan skye//'jig rten 'dir ni gang
384b7(rgyud): 'grub pa//sangs rgyas de ni ci zhig smos//khams gsum bdag po chen po 'di//'chi med rgas pas khyab pa med//tshangs pa de rgya byin de bzhin drag/sgra gcan
385a1(rgyud): mo dang d+ya d+yA ni//'dod pa'i sgra dang tha~Mng ldan ny-id//'di rnams 'khor du 'byung //m+b+hak+Sh+ma de btsun nod dang //dr-i Ta l+h+wam sbyin/
385a2(rgyud): dang mi//ma'am ci dang mkha'ispyong gang //de rnams 'khor 'gyur the tsam med//'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das//chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang //
385a3(rgyud): dang byang chub byed pa dang //de bzhin du nI wArA gshegs dang //khyim nus 'byung ba byed pa dang //rab tu byung ba 'dzin pa dang //skye ba yongasu len pa dang //yongasu
385a4(rgyud): mya ngan 'das pa ston//'dul ba'i 'jig rten mthong nas ni//'odi ni gzugaste ni du ma byed//srangs rgyu s+t+wa~M san+ma bsgrub bzhed pas//sangs rgyas gar ni rol
385a5(rgyud): po mdzad//ri br-id steg dang seng ge dang //glang po rnams rin su yang /snying rjes phon pa'i sems kyis ni//phyug rgyus grub pa bri bar 'gyur//bud med
385a6(rgyud): sgyu ma'i spros pa yis//'dod chags can la chos gsung ngo //bud med sgyu ma sangs rgyas nyid//sgyu ma thams cad sel bar byed//shes rab pha rol phyin
385a7(rgyud): gagazugs su//bud med rtag tu yang dag gnas//sgyu ma chen mo gan pa 'dug nas//sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu ster//g.yo zhing dang che ngo tsha med//rtag//
385b1(rgyud): tu 'dod chags pha rol 'gro//dngos grub kyang ni rab tu sbyor//gzugs dang yon tan nor la yang //'dod pa gang yang btsun mo med//rdo rje 'dod chags yid 'dod/
385b2(rgyud): pas//rang gi bde ba myang bar ldan//skyes bu tshul khrims ldan pa dang //bdor gshegs bka' las mi 'da' zhing /bla ma bsnyen bkur snying rje can//kye'i
385b3(rgyud): rdo rje rab bye ba'o//de nas rnal 'byor ma bdag med ma gtso mo dang /mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis gsol bla btab pa/zhe sdang rdo rje phyag
385b4(rgyud): 'tshal bstod//gti mug rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod//ser sna rdo rjes bdag la skyobs//'dod cha byas rdo rje bdag la stsol//yid dang phrag dog chen po dang /
385b5(rgyud): /rdo rje kun gyis dam tshig mgon//lus rnams thams cad sgrub pa paM//rdo rje can kun dgyes par mdzod//de nas bcom ldan 'das mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi
385b6(rgyud): dam tshig la gnas te/dbyangs 'di gsungs pa/thig sku da sar pa mdzes par ldan//shin tu tshad ma gtsang ma yis//he zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi//shes
385b7(rgyud): rab can gyis thig gdab bya//de la 'di ni slob ma chen po'i gsol ba gdab pa'i dmi tshig go/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zhi//de bzhin gshegs pa kun
386a1(rgyud): gyi gnas//rdo rje sems dpa' las byung ba'i//dkyil 'khor 'dren pa sa ba shud du gsol//dkyil 'khor gyi rdo rje la gsol ba gdab
386a2(rgyud): pa rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//nga ni snying rje stobs dpal ldan//srung ba'i 'khor lo sbyor hUM po//rdo rje yis ni gsal ba'i lus//sku gsu
386a3(rgyud): las ni skyes pa sgro//gal te la la 'da' byed na//'jig ste 'di la the tshom med//lus srul po dang kha TIg gang //bde chen ye shes 'byung ba dang //
386a4(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin skyes//zur cig byalegs ni chen po rnams//'khor lo yis ni brgyad nyid kyi//chu yis sgo ni rab tu grags//stong khang lha
386a5(rgyud): yi snyam bu ni//sgo yi tshad kyi ched du bya//sgo yi byed kyi cha ru ni//ya phubs dang ni 'gram nyid do//rigs byed nyid kyang de bzhin bya//dra ba'i snam bu rig
386a6(rgyud): byed byed//dang por tshangs pa'i thig dang ni//gnyis par 'tshams kyi thig dang yang //gsum par ngos ni bzhi yi bzhi//theg ni rab tu gdab par bya//tshungs
386a7(rgyud): thig cha gnyis bor nas ni//cha drag du ni gdab par bya//de nas sgo yi tshad bor nas//dgu yi char ni rab tu gdab//de la 'di ni sa sbyang ba'i dam tshig go/oM
386b1(rgyud): b+hU/dril 'dun ye shes stan+d+ha drung pa ste/oM ma daM nI badz+rI b+hA ba badz+ra dan+ta hU/de la 'di ni thig gdang pa'i dam tshig ste/oM sa ma yA s+yA trA mU ti kra mA hA/drul
386b2(rgyud): ni rdul chen ngani ste/'din ches dr-Ings dag jisems kyi ni khyams ni th+ya per byed/ rdo rje rgyal po ches//dkyil 'a
386b3(rgyud): dam pa bzhengs par bya//pAd+yA wAn+da dwe ni sa ra b+he//mo yi mtshams dge slong bri//chos kyi 'khor lo bden b+h+yol du//rlung du rdo rje bri bar bya//sngags kyu
386b4(rgyud): shar du bri bar bya//lho yi skor no zhigs pa nyid//nub sgor de bzhin lcags sgrog ste//byang du rdo rje dril bu'o//dbus su thod pa dkar pa ni//sna tshogs
386b5(rgyud): rjes mtshan badri//de ni/rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal bas sbyin sreg gi grong khyer rab tu phye ba rdo rje thob khung spyod mos//dza n+d+ha'i srog rjes sbyong ba las//zlum po
386b6(rgyud): zhibar byed par brjod//rgyus dbang d+hI bI brgyu//dbang ni rlob byed pa 'ang //dab pa m+b+ha ni lpags pa'i dngab sa//bsod dang zhe snang la si A nA~M//
386b7(rgyud): rnam kho'i'o khams dang mtshus pa'o//de bzhin spyod byed du la ma dzu//yin la na nyam ma skye ba mas//can dani e kA ru shing dang //gzhan yang du
387a1(rgyud): rkAd+hA 'thung gis//sbyin sreg yan+tha lag mAM sbyar nas//phyis ni yang ni dgug pUr byA//au e h+ye he ma hA b+hU ta dwe bA r-i ShI dI dza sad+d+ha ma rga/
387a2(rgyud): tA A hra tirmA tA ra~M Am+b+ha d+hI hU~M hi ta b+ha \u0f7flcags kyu ny-id kyis dgug par//zhags pa nyid kyis go zhug bya zhing //lcags skra ga gis ni zhags dang
387a3(rgyud): dril bu 'khol bas dbang du byas//lU s+yai mi sngogs mchod pa brjod//mchod yon chog byas nas no//mar l-I sogs pa'i sbyor ba las
387a4(rgyud): yung ni me na mnyes par bya//de la 'di ni rdo rje mchod yon gyi dam tshig ste/oM pra ba ra sat+kA da pra tIts+tsha swA hA//de la 'di ni zhabs bsil gyi dam tshig ste/
387a5(rgyud): oM sarba pA pa da hA na badz+ro ya satwa s+ya sarba pA paM da hA swAh+ma//de la 'di ni sreg rdzas thams cad che bo'i dam tshig gi sngags te/oM badz+rA na la mya hA b+hU ta dz+dza
387a6(rgyud): pal ya/serba b+hAsl-i ku ru sair+b+bA duSh+TaM ni hUM prAnra//dwi sh+tse dzaHhUM br-i hoHsa ma y+Ya b+h+yAM A haM/phyi nas rlung 'dod phyi'i khyA sbyin drang ba ste/oM i h+ye hi b+hA ga
387a7(rgyud): ha k+Sha Ne sa ma yau nai tsa a gan+ti sa mI dai ti tsi pU dza dz+nyA dA pra sid+d+ha me//de la 'di ni dgyes pa'i ngom tshig ste/aukr-ito baHsarba satwad+b+haHsaud+d+hid+hA yaM tA
387b1(rgyud): nA g+h+nAts+tshaT+Ta d+ha blun drug rdzun sa smra//bzhod smra ba dang /las sna tshogs kyi snod byA nga /skyon ldog gi 'u skye gtad // de nas
387b2(rgyud): rdorje sems da'i nga gnas ni//'jig rten tha snyad la gnas te//myadang bsdus nis ni bstan pa byA//hA ga rerA shIgA rig m+b+ha 'dzin//
387b3(rgyud): tshul bar la ba dang //de g.yas / ba las//galas dur rdo rje gusang ba dang //sing+ge thA na skyed ni cho bla ni//gsuM kyis mgrin pa tu sa pa
387b4(rgyud): na chen+da skru b+hAm+b+ha seMngs gang 'aM//bum+b+ha pA s+t+wa~M ga nA~M gnas pa //A~Md la b+h+yo ts+tsha badz+ra sad+g+ha/mai n+te a/oM d+deShA oMd+d+he
387b5(rgyud): rA ga ra tI oM d+ha tiSh+Tha/a~M dz+ra tI ya d+hIti/ dzin dz+ra rI dwo \u0f7f sha ya hU~M/oM badz+re/tA lA~M ban+d+ha ya baM/oM badz+ra g+has+sa r+yA wAM sh+yaM kuR+Sha ha~MH//'di ni ye shes
387b6(rgyud): /kun pa sna k+kA'o//byung bar nga yi b+h+ya nga//lus shes sbyin gas Sh+Ta//mched yin ma sogs sna banin b+h+ya/
387b7(rgyud): ni dri nyid byung ba bya//sdebang rmugs shing byin gyis brlog//ma~Mg le segs par gti mug sogaso//rdo rje gsum ni gnas gsum dgang //des ni ri gis
388a1(rgyud): da s+ho///mchod pa la sngags rlom+b+ha pas brtsam//rang gi spyod nas ye shes byas ma//sangs rgyas bzhugs par gas na tu
388a2(rgyud): ye shes rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis//rim pas mchod pa'i lha mo s+ho//byang chub sems mchog bsems nas ni//sangs rgyas bstod pa yang dag brtsam//das
388a3(rgyud): po kun gyi rang bzhin gyis//stong pa snying rje tha dad med//khyod ni rnal 'byor ma tshegs yongasu bskor//khyod ni nyid kyi thugs kyi mchog mnyes pa//khyod kyi rgyu
388a4(rgyud): dang mi rgyu'i 'gro ba kun bsgrubs shing //snying rje'i thugs kyi sems can sad mdzad pa//sgyu ma'i spros pas rdo rje 'phel mdzad pa//he ru ka dpal rdo rje yid
388a5(rgyud): kyim+bu gyis/gal steng ba yis//rdo rje snyam pa bsgom par bya//rdo rje mi blangs nas ni//rdo rje dkyil 'khor bsgom pa b+he//
388a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par//rdo rje phung po rnam par sgom//de nas rdo rje mchod pa bsam//rdo rje lce yis sbyor ba las//sangs rgyas rdo rje'i rjes bcug
388a7(rgyud): nyid//rdo rje'i sngags kyi bsang gtor bya//bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje'i bdud rtsi'i ro myang ba'i rdo rje de skad ces bka' stsal to//na mkha'i khams kyi dbus
388b1(rgyud): sbyin par//rngo mo lnga pa dris pa yis//sbyangs rgyas dngos grub 'dod pa'is//stobs kyis sangs rgyasmra phung dus gang na//rjes 'byung grong khyer yid 'ong bar//
388b2(rgyud): rdorje mdzu mo'i sbyor ba las//gal te dngos thub mi gter ni//rdo rje sems pa'i bsad par bya//maM duM ru rdzo/d+hin+nad+hIn+da//bcom ldan 'das kyis
388b3(rgyud): phur bus gdab po chen po rdo rje de skad ces bka' stsal to//ma mo'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par//rta mgrin rnam par bsgom par bya//dbu rgyan la ni rdo rje chos
388b4(rgyud): phyag rgya chen por brjod pa las//pad+ma dmar po spyi bor 'dzin//skye mdog dmar po stobs po che//gos dkar gnyis med sbyor ba las//bcu drug phyug gi
388b5(rgyud): rnam par rgyan//g.yas pa'i zhal nI nag po ste//g.yon pa zla mdzes dri ma med//dang po dbar po shes par bya//lhag ma'i zhol ni bung bu mtshungs//zhal brgyad
388b6(rgyud): pa lnga zhabs bzhi pa//rdo rje chos ni gzi brjod //'dod chags chen po'i rjes chags pas//bdud ba ni mnyam por mnan pa'o//ma ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas
388b7(rgyud): par//rdo rje rnam snang dran par bya//dbu rkyen rdo rje 'dzin pa bsam//sku mdog dkar po gzi brjid che//phyag ni bcu drug zhal brgyad pa//zhabs bzhi pa ste 'jig
389a1(rgyud): pag/s+yAd+d+hi la po hU~M snod 'dzin//'dod rmugs rgyun po d+d+has chags pa//smyan dang ga sa myed ts+tsho ba s+ho//'jigs pa/
389a2(rgyud): 'di 'jigs par mdzad//dang po'o na la ni dka bo ste//drug pa da mar bas rnam par rkyen//lkug pa'i zhal ni bung ba mArmyangs//snas la
389a3(rgyud): da gnas byung //rdo rje nyi ma rnam pad+ma s+hom//tsad pan ran chen 'din par bsam//rdo rje ga badz+rod 'ad pa che//phyug ni ban+d+ha d+hAg zhal brgyad bya//zhangs
389a4(rgyud): bzhi pa ste 'jigs bya ba//sems kyis rin chen skye bos 'dzin//gtso ma gser ltar g+ha Ti brjid che//dang por zhi la ni sar pos+t+wa~M//g.yab pa sngon pa 'dra
389a5(rgyud): bar//g.yon+d+ra ba zla rjod bzang ba ste//lcug mi'i zhal ni zung ba mtshungs//ma mo dam 'khor dbus gnas par//rnamached rnam par bsgom pa /
389a6(rgyud): da nu ma nr-i 'dzin pa bsam//mang ga u pa lta mtshungs pa'o//yA brgyad pa/bas pazhi pa//ts+tsha g+hu phyug gi rnam d+h+yad/
389a7(rgyud): zhal ni sngo bsengs te//rta yi gzugs te 'jigs pa po//gams pa kha dog nag bo ste//g.yon pa zla mdzes dri mi medo//rab gri dngos grub spyi mo
389b1(rgyud): ba stan sa s+yA s+ho//rgyu nasgyul gags// smra/ rgyugs gad//blo glu ngan na //
