389b3(rgyud): ni 'gro mgyogs te//mchog du phan pa nyid kyi yon//sangs rgyas 'bras bu 'dod pa yis//bla ma la rtag rgyun tu dbul//skal bzang rdo rje sems dpa' bdag/
389b4(rgyud): ba nang thub pa rnam sbyang mdzad//skal bzung dang lnga ldan 'jog rten debang //sbrel bzang nyi me bdun rgya mi 'o//de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po sgra gsum mcho
389b5(rgyud): gr-I rdo rje 'dzin pa sa mig bdag rdo rje 'dzin da'i dam tshig mchog gsungs pa/oM d+hA ra d+hAr+ya/d+hA re ye d+hA ra yA/mdzu mdza/badz+ra d+h+r-i ka paT sar+b+ba//de nas
389b6(rgyud): na bshud pa nA//rdo rje skye bar snying rje che//jigs shing skrag par gyur nas ni//rdo rje'i dngos bA rab dru ste la//de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyi rnam pa
389b7(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pa zhugs te/rta mgrin gyi sngags 'di gsungs pa/oM badz+ra d+hed+g+ha sa ma ya~M s+t+wa~M/buM l+r-i rba wa/oM yU ra li ke phaT//de nas 'di ni bshad
390a1(rgyud): tsam na//rdo rje chos ni grabs chen po//'jigs shing skyug par gyur nas ni//chos kyi dngos grub rab du stsol//de nas
390a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'dus rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin lnga snyoms par zhugs te/phan pa'i sngags 'di gsungs pa/oM swa shwe taM pa
390a3(rgyud): raM sA shA ta e h+ye hi dzo na dzi ki phaT swA hA//de nas 'di ni bshad tsam gyis//sangs rgyasra kun dang de bzhin gshegs//brgyal zhing 'jigs par gyur
390a4(rgyud): nas no//de nas sangs rgyas dngos grub stsol//de nas bcom ldan 'das rin chen nyi mA zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/rdo rje
390a5(rgyud): gzi brjid kyi sngags 'di gsungs pa/oM badz+ra sUr+ya ta mo bi d+ha ma nA se ma ya s+t+waM e haM rat+na d+h+r-ika phaT swAhA//de nas 'di ni bshud tsam gyis//rdo rje
390a6(rgyud): gzi brjid 'od po che//'jigs shing brgyal bar gyur nas ni//nyi ma'i dngos grub rab tu skyil//de nas bcom ldan 'das don yod rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting
390a7(rgyud): nge 'dzin la zhugs te//rta mchog rdo rje'i sngags 'di gsung so//suHphuHduHhi ti ha~M/pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika~M phaT swAt+ma//de nas 'di ni bshad tsam gyis//
390b1(rgyud): don yod rigs byung bya//'jigs shing byargyal bar gyur nus no//de rnams don yod dngos grub stsol//sangs rgyas dkyil 'a bor+ya de nyid dro//rdo rje can gyi zla phyed
390b2(rgyud): mtshungs//rdo rje chos kyi pad+ma 'dra//nyi ma'i yid bzhin nor bu sbyin//rta mchog zhes bya de yi ni//thams cad du ni gru gsum mo//rdo rje sems dpa' phyag rgya
390b3(rgyud): che phan paSh+Ti byug rgyu nyid dang ni//rdo rje chos kyi phyag rgya rgya//rin chen tog gi 'od byed mya//don yod grub pa'i phyag rgya che//rus d+ma'i rgyan gyis brgyan por
390b4(rgyud): ldan//stag gi lcogs pa bsnams pa deng //dbu skra thod pa phyed pa ste//mchod par brtson pa'i sems dpa' yis//chags pa mig dmad mthong nas ni//
390b5(rgyud): phyag rgya chen po'i sbyor ba las//chags pa'i sbyor bas bsgom par bya//lus sna tshogs sgrub pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o///de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal gyis//
390b6(rgyud): spyod pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya//rdo rje spyod pa'i sbyor ba yis//rdo rje phyag rgya yang dag brtsams/me togra 'bras sogs kyis rgyan pa//nags chen
390b7(rgyud): pa yi mtha' nyid du//sems dpa' chen po 'gro bar bya//nags tshal du ni slong mo rgyu//zas ni bzang po rgyan pa nyid//de rnams 'jigs shing skrag nas ster/
391a1(rgyud): nags tshwal+la bAdag blo'i rigs kun ni//rdo rje can ni 'khor du 'gyur//skyes pa dang ni skye ba kun//skye blo gang zhig skye 'gyur ba//
391a2(rgyud): gti mug rdo rje'i sbyor ba las//rdo rje'i mig gis mthong bar 'gyur//khams gsum la mr-i ni nyams dga' bar//skye ni gang zhig rab grags pa//rna ba'i
391a3(rgyud): drung du gnas pa bzhin//zhe sdang rdo rje'i sbyor ba lAs//drang srong mngon par shes pas thos//sems can kun gyi sems chen po//mtshon kra lta bu'i mtshan
391a4(rgyud): nyid ni//lag mthil skyu ru rA lnga bzhin//rdo rje'i sems kyis shes par 'gyur//skyes pa bye ba stong phrug du//rang gi rigs ni stong phyag gcig/rdo rje
391a5(rgyud): sbyor bas dran 'gyur te//nyi ma gsum bzhin dran par 'gyur//sgyu 'phrul dra ba du ma yis//'dis ni snang bar byed par 'gyur//mngon shes lnga yi sbyor
391a6(rgyud): gis//sangs tshus mngon shes thong par 'byed//rnam par dag pa nA /na pa nyid kyi ke ste/
391a7(rgyud): mas rgyas pa'o//rdo rje chos kyis dbang zhes bya//rdo rje sems dpas bsad par bya//zhi ba'i sems kyis zhi ba ste//dbang ni yang dag brtsams par bya/
391b1(rgyud): rgyurgyas pa'i sems kyi sgra rgyas pa ste//rdo rje char sprin rab bsgom+bu bya//rjes su chags pa'i sems kyis ni//bu mo bkug nas bza' bar bya//me yi cha sprin 'dab pa dang /
391b2(rgyud): godug pa'i sems kyis bsad par bya//'phrog pa las ni dkur myo ste//skye gnyis pa las tshangs pa nyid//dpal ni sred med bu los kyang //mA bi cag pa las
391b3(rgyud): raM b+ha nyid//rga ma chu srin rgyal mtshon las//phyag rgya chen po'i sbyor ba yis//de rnams thams cad nye bar bza'//shin tu dga' ba'i sems kyi rtse//'dod pa
391b4(rgyud): gos pAr mi 'gyur ro//mthar ni swA hAs zhi ba ste//rgyas pa'i dus su bau ShaT//mthar ni hUM phaT bA sa pa la//dbang dang dgug la dzuHdang hriH//las tham
391b5(rgyud): cad pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig bya'o///de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal nI//mkha' 'gro mo ni rdo rje gur//rdo rje ma/'gro rub sgrub phyir//thub pas tshig
391b6(rgyud): 'di bka' stsal to//me tog 'bras bus rgyun byas pa'i//ri khrod dang ni snyun ljongs su//rdo rje skyil krungs bcas nas ni//blo ma sangs rgyas mchod par
391b7(rgyud): bya//dkon mchog gsum la bdag skyangs mchi//sdig pa thams cad so sor bshigs//'gro ba'o dag la rjes yi rang //sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyi
392a1(rgyud): /gzung //sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs mchog la//byang chub bang du skya su maN+Di//rang gzhan don ni rab sgru phyir//byang chub sad+ma//
392a2(rgyud): ni skyed par bgyi//byang chub mchog gi semos ni bskyed bgyis nas//sems can thams rnyeng+ge bdag gi 'gron du gnyer//byang chub spyod mtshan yid
392a3(rgyud): skyed por bgyi//'gro lo phani phyi sangs rgyas 'grub pa shog/tshangs pa'i gnas ni bzhi po das//sems kyi ngal ni gso byangar b+h+yo//phyi nas byang chub sems
392a4(rgyud): goganas te//rdo rje srung ba nye dam tshig go//bden dang rdzun par spyad pa yis//brtag pas nye bar mi dgos te//ma skyes pa yi sbyor ba yis//skye ba 'dir ni rag
392a5(rgyud): tu brjod//oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma kro haM//na mkho'i khams kyi dbus gnas par//sna tshogs rdo rje bosgom par bya//hUM ni bcu yi sbyor ba las//
392a6(rgyud): khro bo bin+de na re me bas dag //gshin rje mdzar byed shes rab mthar//pad+ma mthar byed bgegs mthur byid//Tak+ki khro bo dbyug pa sngon//mi g.yo bo dang stobs
392a7(rgyud): chen dang //gtsug tor gdugs ni dkar po dang //rdo rje zhabs 'og gnas pa dang //bdud rtsi zhabs 'og gnas pa ni//bdud rtsi sbyor bas thams cad du//
392b1(rgyud): khro byA'i sgom pas bsgom par bya//dpag chung brgyar ro khyab pa ru//bsams nas bgogs ni bskyed par bya//nam+ba/dro khams kyi dbus glan pa par//rdo rje
392b2(rgyud): 'khor bsgom par bya//'od kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya//mi yid kyi 'khor dbus gnas pa'o//yang ni chu ni bsgom par bya//chu yi dkyil 'khor dbus
392b3(rgyud): gnas pa de//brtul zhugs can gyis dbang chen sgrom//dbang chen dkyil 'khor steng du ni//bdag nyid kyang ni bskam par bya//bru las gnas ni bsams nas/
392b4(rgyud): rnam pa rtswa ni rab brdeg bya//ye shes lnga las byung ba yis//sems dpa'i gzugs bad+hA ni bsgomya par bya//rdo rje sems dpa' las byung ba'i//rig ma'i skyes bu
392b5(rgyud): bsgom par bya//oM d+harma tu badz+rA swa b+hA be At+ma kau haM//rdo rje bzhengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//mig la sogs pad+ma gti mug sogs//rdo rje gsum ni
392b6(rgyud): gnas gsum byed//hU~Mgis kyi rdo rje mkha rA d+ha ma?//blasre sha rdo rjes spyad mo//sbrul zhu ban+de 'og gnas mam+b+ha/oMhrIHhU~M las byung bya'o//rdo rje pa/ rmi
392b7(rgyud): badzin su//rdod me gri bdag ming ma// rje rje'i gnas ma nim 'khong byung bar bsgom par bya//dkyi mi cham rkyen ri langs so// //
393a1(rgyud): ni sgo srung ma//puk+ka sI dang ri khrod ma//rdol pa ba yung mau mtsham su dgod//stang du mkha' spyod ma zhes ba shad//'og tu bzhin//
393a2(rgyud): sa spyod ma//dbus su bdag ming mkha' gro ma//mkha' 'gro dkyil 'khor nyid du bsgom//byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la//ji ltar mchod pa tshe stsal pa//
393a3(rgyud): bdog kyang rab tu bskyab pa'i phyir//nam mkha'i rdo rje bdag la stsol//dbang skur rdo rje chen po ni//khams gsum gyis ni phyag byas pa//spangs rgyas kun gyi
393a4(rgyud): gsang gsum gyi//gnas lngas byung ba stsol bar mdzad//ye shes kyi dbang lnga gsol bya gdab pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//rig mi'i skyes bu
393a5(rgyud): dbang chen la//cod pan rang gi lhag pa'i lha//des ni dkyil 'khor dbang dang ni//bstod dang mchod pa la sogs bya//ye shes gzhug pa de bzhin
393a6(rgyud): yang //lce yis rdo rje bdud rtsi myang //nang du brjod pa'i sbyor ba las//brtul zhugs can gyi sngags bzlas kyang //rnal 'byor ma 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i
393a7(rgyud): le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o///de nas byams po la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rang rang gi rnam par rtog pa skyes par gyur te/
393b1(rgyud): sgyu ltu sgra da Sh+mA b+ba Sh+tsa N+ya nas rmad pang dz+nyA na/'dzin smras pa mA ga//shAsbya ba pa sa/spyor du glugs//nam sbyong ban
393b2(rgyud): yi nI pa d+h-i /ba rab las/nga myur tung na y-i//ral 'ab+h+ring maSh+Tas dzA d+hA krUr//rdol 'byor mA ya~M d+h+ya
393b3(rgyud): phyi ste//blasas kaud+hA rlob bye //da mings mgu ma yis m-i/mkha gas
393b4(rgyud): rnam ma da sa /na kyis rol gas dag 'dzin/rmi 'i 'gro na rgyu nga /rdorjes sA rgyas //gsad sa d+habadu
393b5(rgyud): dang //'kho ma sngams gyur gyi 'byung gnas ni//rnam 'bru m+b+hi rgyud du ni ra tu grags//skyes bu rnams ni 'dul ba'i phyir//rnaMl+le'i byed rgyu ni yang dag/
393b6(rgyud): bishad //btsun mo rnams ni bats+tsha ba'i phyir//rnal 'byor mo yo TI shed de//dman pa rnams la byAb+hI N+yad//b+h+yo bo rnal 'a zlog lo//sems
393b7(rgyud): rkyenas rlom 'byor mchog/rnal 'byor gli'i med de stsag lo//de nas byang chub sems das ma ma ldan 'das lo ga /
394a1(rgyud): bdag cag gi yul rnams ni 'tshal na//sems can gan du rnams sa ji ltar sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa 'tshal ba lags
394a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/stong pa snying rje tha dad med//gang du sems ni rab bsgoms pa//'di ni sangs rgyas chos dang nI//dge 'dun
394a3(rgyud): yang bsten pa'o//mu stegs can sun dbyung ba dang //rgol ba rnams tshad gcod pa dang //rang gi sde'i gzhung mngon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//
394a4(rgyud): bdag gi byang chub thob byer phyir//gang phyir gzhan dag bsgral ba'i phyir//des ni sangs rgyas chos dang ni//dge 'dun gyi yang bstan pa'o//bdag
394a5(rgyud): 'dzin zhen pa bzlog pa'i phyir//chos dbyings bdag nyid sgrub thabs ni//thabs dang shes rab 'dus pa yis//des ni sangs rgyas bstan pa'o//de nas
394a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /rgyal ba'i sras po rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung 'di thos nas dga' bar gyur te/tshig 'di snod smras pa/e ma kun tu
394a7(rgyud): bzang po yi//bstan pa namakha' las byung ba//na mkha'i dbus su sbyor ba yis//ye shes rgya mtsho nyan par 'gyur//de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal ni//bde ba chen po
394b1(rgyud): rnam 'bol+la bsdu//du ma chog thams cad bshad par bya//sangs rgyas 'bras bu 'dod pa yis//bde dang rangs shing gar dang ni//glu gang rol mo smra byed pas//dri dang phyong
394b2(rgyud): byug pa yis//rig pa'i rgyal po rab tu 'grub//ji ltar bde ba bde bzung nas//ji ltar 'dod pa spyad par bya//ji ltar gan su gnas nas kyang //yi go dam pa 'grub par 'gyur/
394b3(rgyud): bza' dang btung ba'i sbyor ba dang //bzang po'i rgyun gyis brgyan pa yis//nyi ma gcig tu bskul ba yis//dam pa de nyid 'grub par 'gyur//rtag tu rang gi dam tshig mdo//
394b4(rgyud): rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa mchod//rtag tu bla ma la yang dbu la//bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam//dzaM ltar mgon pa rnam snang mdzad//rdo rje 'dzin sbyin byas nyid/
394b5(rgyud): ji ltar na mkhar rgya mtsha //ji ltar thub pa rgya mtsho chos//ji ltar mgon po bdun rgyal po//de ltar rdo rje sgrub dpon brjod//des ni 'bad pa thams cad kyis//rdo rje sku
394b6(rgyud): dpon bla ma che//dag pa mchog tu gsal ba po//nam yang smad par mi bya'o//rdo rje sdom pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o///de nas bcom ldan 'das
394b7(rgyud): rdo rje chen po rdo rje gsor bar bzhed pa'o//mkha 'gro bdab med mas 'khyud pas//bzang po spyang po dbye bar bya//rdo rje'i gzugs bzhag nas ni//ji ltar 'dod par 'dod pa
395a1(rgyud): yaiste//rig 'dzin 'khor lo sa? dastAr b+ha nyid//dogs pa med par 'grub par 'gyur//dri lnga yang dag blangs nas su//dzA sU wA dang ni bsro bar bya//
395a2(rgyud): lcags gsum gyis nA dkris nas ni//ril bu'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur//gur gum+ba A~M ga ru ldan pa//nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog 'dra ba'i//rnyil bu kha ru bcug byas
395a3(rgyud): nas//nyi ma'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur//sha lnga dang ni ldan pa ru//lcags gsum gyis ni dkris nas ni//rdo rje nyi ma rab sbyor bas//nyi ma gcig gis dgrub par 'gyur//
395a4(rgyud): tsan+da dran dmar po kha che dang //dga' ba sbas par sbyar ba ni//lcags gsum gyis ni dkri byas pa//rta yi rig ma 'dzin par 'gyur//'jig rten mgon po rnam bsgoms nas//
395a5(rgyud): tsanaM'i rus pa'i tshad tsam las//gu gul lcags kyis dkris pa ni//mgon po'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur//ril bu sgrub thabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//
395a6(rgyud): klu yi rgyal po'i mgo bsregs nas//rang byung khrag gis bsgo bar bya//rdo rje phan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis//mig sman rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur//ba bli'i sa bon ldan pa dang //stug
395a7(rgyud): lpags pa'i tshil bu ma te//sku yi rdo rje'i rnal 'byor gyis//rkang pa'i byug pa 'grub par 'gyur//yan lag med pa'i dkyil 'khor dbus//dbang po'i breg phug 'gru
395b1(rgyud): dun//nang 'og rnal 'byod gyis//U yi bu mo rab bslab bya//o D+Da'i skal rgyu nya byan//a m+b+ha 'bru rtenA bo y-i ri//rdo rje gnod mdzes sbyor ba yis//rkang 'og rig pa 'dzin
395b2(rgyud): par 'gyur//rdo rje sems dpo' rgyal po che//yang nas yang dro bskul bar bya//de nyid dngos grub thams cad kyis//yid bzhin nor bu lci bur mtshungs//rdo rje gnod mdzes sku chen po//
395b3(rgyud): phyag gnyis zhal ni gcig pa can//sdig mdzub klu yi zhags pa dang //kho drog nag por bsgom par bya//rdo rje mdzod ni blangs nas ni//rnam pa thams cad bsgom par bya//mi bskyod
395b4(rgyud): /po yi yang dag mnan//phuHzhes bya ba'i sngags brjod do//rab tu byung ba dang mig sman rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bcom ldan 'dra/
395b5(rgyud): kyi gsung thos nas/dga' zhing mgu ba skyes par gyur te tshig 'di skad smras so//e mA ho rdo rje//e ma rdo rje'i bstan pa ni//chos rnams thams cad stong pa la//gang byir dngos
395b6(rgyud): /grub rab gnas pa//snying po med pa'i chu shod la//ji ltar snying po'i 'bras zhim pa//de ltar snying po med lus la//dngos grub 'bras zhim de bzhin no//nu mkha' 'byung po thoms
395b7(rgyud): cid dang //chos rnams kun gyi gnas yin te//sems ni nam mkha' lte bur dag/dag pa'i sems ni mchog tu bde//don dam dbang po'i rang bzhin gyis//sems las phyi rol
396a1(rgyud): 'gyur ba med//gzugs sogs so sor 'dod pa yi//sems nyid du ni 'dod par bya//de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes bcom
396a2(rgyud): ldan 'das la gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ji ltar sems stong la//sems los phyi rol gyi don sems mi stong pa rab tu 'byung
396a3(rgyud): zhes bgyi/de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa//thog med srid pa'i bag chags kyis//phyi rol don ni rnam par brtags//sems kyis thams cad rnam par brtags/
396a4(rgyud): sems ni kun tu 'gro bar brjod//byang chub sems rab tu 'byung ba bstan pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//shin tu gzhin mdzes mig yangs ma//si la ga bur
396a5(rgyud): 'byung ba'i gnas//dbang du gzhug par byas nas ni//sgra nas bzung bar yang dag brtsam//rdo rje'o yis 'o byas shing //rdo rje nyid pas mnye bar bya//rdo rje 'khyud pas yang dag blang/
396a6(rgyud): rdorje ma mchu rab brtser bya//rdo rje mdzub mo'i sbyor ba yos//rdo rje gnas ni rab bskul bya//rdo rje sems ni phyung ba yis//rdo rje lce yis yang dag bza'//phyi nas de yi byed can du//
396a7(rgyud): /rdo rje sems dpa' gzhug par bya//rdo rje 'cha' bo'i sbyor ba yis//rdo rje mchod pa yang dge brtsam//rdo rje sems dpa' 'byung ba la//sems ni brtul zhugs can gyi dbrog/pad+ma
396b1(rgyud): me tog ldan pa yis//pad+ma dmar pos mchod par bya//pad+mas mnyes pa'i rdo rje can//pad+ma dmar pos khyad par du'o//dri nga'i rab tu sbyor ba yis//rgyal mtshan
396b2(rgyud): ga bur mchod pa ni//'di ni brtson 'grus bde tshon dang //stobs dang rgyas par 'gyur ba dang //mthong ba nyid kyis bskul ba yis//'jig rten 'di ni dbang
396b3(rgyud): du byed//gang gis dkon mchog gsum bsad dang //gang gis sems can bsad byas pa dang //gang gis slob dpon smod pa dang //sangs rgyas lam la 'phya ba
396b4(rgyud): rnams//lcags kyu yis ni yang dag dgug/lcags sgrog gis ni rkang pa bcing //zhags pas mgrin pa dam par bcing //rdo rje bdag gis dgug par bya/
396b5(rgyud): mkha' 'gro sangs rgyas pa sems nas ni//de rnams dbang por gsol bar bya/'dis ni sangs rgyas dpal ba dang /rdo rje sems
396b6(rgyud): dpa' bkrongs pa s+ho/'di ste sdig pa chen po ste//mnar med 'gro ba'i bdag nyid de//'di ni dmyal ba chen por ltung //de ltar bsams nas bsad pa
396b7(rgyud): bya//rdo rje'i gzugs ni bsams nas su//nam mkha'i dbyings ni bsgom par bya//rdo rje dbyigs pas brjod byas nas//rdo rje can gyi gnas su skye//lcags kyu la
397a1(rgyud): sogs mi nus na//zan gyis kyang ni 'du bya zhing //de nyid kyis ni gzugs bsams nas//rdo rje dkyil 'khor nyid du bzhag/Tak+ki rgyal po lcags kyu ste//dbyug sngon
397a2(rgyud): can la rang gi ming //stobs kyi rgyal po rtse gsum pa//mo g.yo gri rtsa'i dkyil 'bar can//rnam par rtog pa chen po gsod pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to//de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal
397a3(rgyud): gyis//thams cad dbugs dbyung rab gsol bas//dam tshig rdo rje srung don du//sbas pa'i spyod yul 'di gsungs pa//rdo rje khro bo'i skyes bu che//thams cad zhal
397a4(rgyud): cig phyag gnyis pa//snying khar g.yon pa'i khu tshur mdzub///g.yas nA rang gi mtshon cha 'byor//gra shin rje gsod pa'i dbyig to cano//gzhan gyi mi thub rdo rje dbyig/
397a5(rgyud): rta mgron lnga ni dbang mchog dmar//mi phyed bdud rtsi'i thab sbyor las//Tak+ki rgyal po lcags kyu ste//dbyig sngon can lnga rang gi maung //stobs kyi rgyal po rtse gsum po//
397a6(rgyud): mi g.yo yi ge'i dkyil 'khor rtse//tshad skyob rgyal po rgyal po la//chos kyi 'khor lo rnam par sgom//ge tun shing rdo rje rkang 'og la//zhabs g.yon brkyang byas
397a7(rgyud): gnas pa'o//dbang po sngon po'i rnam pa ltar//mthar byed rnam par bsgom par bya//gzhan gyis mi thub rdo rje ni//'jigs byung zla ba'i nor bu 'dra//pad+ma'i khro bo
397b1(rgyud): dang bar//rdo rje dud d+hA'i bdag nyid gnag/mtshams kyi khro ba cher gnag cing //skye bor rdo rje 'dzin pas mtshan//gshin rje rnam snang nyid kyis te//rdo rje sems dang
397b2(rgyud): dbyig bcan//baid+d+hi khri ba rnams gzigs rjes//rdo rje sems dpa' la sbyar ba/rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par//rdo rje nyi mi bsgom par bya//rig tu pad+ma gdun
397b3(rgyud): bsams nas/khri bo bcu rnams rab bskum b+ha//ye shes rdo rje rang ngos su//bcu byed dkyil 'khor bdag nyid de//bdun rnams zhabs kyi 'og bsams nas//dkyil 'gyur
397b4(rgyud): lnga po bsgom par bya//srung ba'i 'khor lo gzi brjid che//bstsal pa'i ma ltar 'bar ba ste//'khor zhing rab tu mi g.yo bar//dpag tshad lnga brgya'i tshad tsamo//smyung ba'i//
397b5(rgyud): dam tshig stobs kyi rnam par rgyal bu'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to//de nas bcom ldan dpa' chen po//rlung gi byin rlabyas rims gnas te//rang gi byin rlabs rnal 'byor gyis/
397b6(rgyud): nyid lus ni shod bye \u0f7f//snying gi dngos su zlo bar 'gyur//gzugs ban+d+han+da zla bA de ma bcos pa//sna tshogs 'ad kyis yang dgu byug/de las rdo rje bsgrim b+he g+ho/
397b7(rgyud): bdag med mkha' 'gro mo//tshogs bskyil bas bsgom par bya//mkha' 'ag sa yi mthar gnas pa//yungs kar tsam du rnam par sbrum//yungs ker la ni 'gro bsu
398a1(rgyud): /khams gsum rgyud mi r+g+ha ga/de ltar sgom par spyod pa po//ra gi rkyen rlangs rab tu 'gru//gzugs sgro dbezhin du dang ni//ro dang dog bya mngon 'dod pa/
398a2(rgyud): nirnam gyu na// da gan da/ dz+wA li s+yA t+yA /na pa'i rnaMm d-i//d+hAn sa mau cing steng ba med
398a3(rgyud): rnam rtag medo cing yig med//myos byed cung zud raba'i thungs pa'i//bdag gi bdag nyid mi chog/dgu' bral dag ba dag gi mthung//rtog pa'i dru rnam par snangs//
398a4(rgyud): byu med 'khrul pa las 'das shing //kyai'i rdo rje rnam par gsal//khams min+ta rnam pa de ru//rnam pa rnams kyi sku ying su bskor//rang nyid mgon pa he dra kaM/de yis
398a5(rgyud): bdog nyid ma rig cid//de yis dus nA rnam sna tsade rig/'byung po 'gro dang 'od bA ni//ra ga kun khyen ste bur gzigs//sangs rgyas spangs rgyas sras po dang /
398a6(rgyud): na du bug /smin bye pa'i skyed par shA so//skyes ni khyong min ltu sa slong// skye gang+gA m+b+ha 'ad+hi/ ba
398a7(rgyud): mi gzigs shing //mtshan ma med cing me byu ri //gas pa med cing 'khyil ba med//sgrib pa lnga ni rnam par spangs//ji ste ma mong gzugs ba na/
398b1(rgyud): rtogs nas bde ba rnam spangs pa//de bzhin bdag nyid he ru ka'o//rnam+b+ha pA lta bru gastsal par mthong //de nyid don drang dbang po dang //phung po na mkha' lta bur yod//lus ni bde ba
398b2(rgyud): nyid brjod cing //'du byed rnams kyis zil mi gnon//gzugs ni mig gi mi 'dzin te//sgra ni zos pa po yi min//lce yis ro ni mi tshor te//dra na sna yis yang ma yin//
398b3(rgyud): reg bya lus kyi gong bus min//'on kyang bde chen tshul las ni//bud med bzang mo reg pas bde//rna bas glu yis bde bas bzang //snum pas dri yisde bde ba che//skye
398b4(rgyud): gnas rig pa'i bde chen dang //ro yis btung ba'i sbyor ba las//gang gis bde ba 'gog par byed//bde bo chen pos 'gro ba khyab//bde ba ma rtogs mi sheso//sangs
398b5(rgyud): rgyas byang chub sems dpa' lta//mkha' 'gro ma dang btsun mo bzung //sangs rgyas lnga dang du ma ni//bde bar phyin cing rnam par bsad//de nas byang chub sems dpa'
398b6(rgyud): chen po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi bde ba chen po'i tshi gro 'di skad smras pa/phal pa'i rnam rtog gzhom po'i phyir//sgom pa yang dag rab tu bsgrags//phal pa'i
398b7(rgyud): gnas skabs gzhol ba'i phyir//sgom pa yang ni sgom pa min//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rtogs pa de bzhin de/'on kyang mi gtsang ba'i tshad mnyam par sbyang ba'i
399a1(rgyud): phyir/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs bsgom par bya'o//phyag ni rdo rjes gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das lus can sgom pa'i thabs kyis dgos pa
399a2(rgyud): tetid ci lugs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gsang ba'i bdag po dgas pa yod//bcom ldan 'das ming ci lags/rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/sangs
399a3(rgyud): rgyas nyid//sangs rgyas nyid ci lags/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//de ci lags/lus can 'di ni bden pa'o//de ci'i slad zhe na/rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal/
399a4(rgyud): pa/'di ltar nga ni mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan zhing dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus rgyan pa'o//de ci'i sladadu zhe na/mi 'dra ba'i phyir sgrub pa yin//phyag na rdo rje saM
399a5(rgyud): gsol pa/ci bcom ldan 'das bems po lags sam/rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/nga nyid me long lta bu'i ye shes so//mau long lta bu'i ye sheso+o de ci lags//
399a6(rgyud): rdorje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/bden pa ma yin pa dang /brdzun pa ma yin pa dang /rgyu ma yin pa dang /skyes pa ma yin pa ste/de ltar nga nyid mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /
399a7(rgyud): nyid sa sor rtogs pa'i ye shes dang /nga nyid bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes dang /de ltar chos kyi dbyingaso shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' chen//
399b1(rgyud): rnam pa dang bral ba'i byang chub de skad ma slu shog/nga nyid dngos dang dngos mong ngo //dang po'i de bzhin gshegs par brjod//gzugs dang gzugs med ldan pa'i mchog/zab ma na
399b2(rgyud): ba'i chos dang ldan//sems dpa' chen po he ru//bdage med lhan cig mnyam sbyor ba//bde chen las ni bems men nga//'jig rten ku ni rdzob bams po nga//skyes pa bung ring
399b3(rgyud): ma ning dang //'gro ba d+ma yis yang dag khyag//de phyir 'dus pa zhes bya nyid//rgol ba rgya mtsho bdag gis ba shut+tha//rdo rje can dang byang sems rnams/mA ning ston su yang dag
399b4(rgyud): grub//gang zhig lha mo bdag meng //rang bzhin gyis ni btsun mo yin//sangs rgyas ho rA kA nga yin//de nyid phyir na ma ning ste//'gro ba'i dngos po gnyis mthong nas//
399b5(rgyud): thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid nga //shin tu mnyam sbyor rnal 'byor gyis//mi bskyod med cing bdag ma'ang med//dam pa'i rang bzhin bde ba chen po'i gnas rdo rje zhes bya ba'i
399b6(rgyud): nga 'dzin to//de nas bcom ldan 'das dpa' bo chen po rdo rje 'dod pa bde ba chen po rdo rje yan lag med pa shin tu dga' ba chen pos tshig 'di dag bka' stsal pa/phyag drug pa
399b7(rgyud): dang skrag par bcas//zhal cig ral pa 'dzid pa dang //brgyad gnyis lo dang sa me ni//rdo rje yan lag med pa 'grub//dpa' bo'i g.yas par mnga' dzid//l-ig+sa/
400a1(rgyud): pa gnyis par ral bri nyid//gsum par me long rig par bya//lag pu g.yon par gzhu nyid//gnyis pa la ni dbang mchog nyid//kaM kil+li yul ga ste/
400a2(rgyud): phyag drug nyid du bsgom par bya//zhabs g.yon brkyang pas gnas pa rI nr-i//bu mo'i snying khar bsams nas ni//rdo rje btsun mo 'grub par 'gyur//mAda' yis 'o ma 'dzin
400a3(rgyud): pau 'bigs//a sho ka yis snying khar brab//ral gris skyes ma bsdigs par bya//de nas me ldong bstan par bya//gzhu yIs rkang pa bcings nas ni//ud pa la
400a4(rgyud): zhags pas dgug par bya//skra grol 'ong bar 'dod pa dang //snyan pa'i skad ni rab tu smra//ha dang si ni byed pa mo//rangs shing yan lag tshed mas rgyan//kha ni so rtsis
400a5(rgyud): gang ba dang //'dod pa stobs dang bral ba bsams//rdo rje mchod pa'i sbyor ba yis//mi 'gyur sems kyis rjes chags bya//'dod pa'i sngags ni ma bcos pas//
400a6(rgyud): de yi snying ni bskul bar bya//oM a mu kI mye U ra ya nAny+tse g+ho Sha hrIHdzaHde ltar bsgom pa byas pa yis//'jam pa'i mgon po'i btsun+da mo ni//sgrub pa po lnga 'dod pa dang /
400a7(rgyud): dbang du byed cing 'ong bar 'gyur//zla ba phyed kyi sbyor ba yis//bzlas pa khri yis sbyor ba las//g.yo ba gser gyi rna cha ma//shin tu dag pa'i sems kyis sgrub/
400b1(rgyud): haMho gi sa don las skyes pa//thams cad rgyun gyimya rnam par brgyun//chang gis btung pa'i rab sbyor bas//rdo rje yan lag med pa spyad//ma bcos mchog gi sa blon ni//byed
400b2(rgyud): dang sdug bsngal rong bzhin can//bde bo chen po mchog tu zhi//sems can thams cad dga' bor byed//'di ni srog ni chen po ste//mchog tu dga' ba mdzes ma nyid//bri dang /
400b3(rgyud): sdug bsngal rtag tu de'i//dran pa de ltar rab tu grags//mya ngan 'dod chags de bzhin gdungs//dga' dang dga' bral de bzhin no//rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che//de nyid
400b4(rgyud): dbyungs yig drug par brjod//zla ba phyed pas yang dag ldan//thig les mgo bo nyid du mchod//sems can gyi ni kun gzhi ste//rgyud rnams kyi ni khyad par du'o//
400b5(rgyud): nos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshogs pa thams cad kyi bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub kyi sems chen po rdo rje sa bon gyi yi ge thos nas sems sgrub pa gsal ba nye bar bya
400b6(rgyud): nas tshig 'di dag gsungs /sems dpa' med cing sgom pa ste//rmugs mod lha yang med pa ste//sems kyi rdo rje las byung ba//'di ni byang chub rim brtan pa'o//
400b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to//bsod nams med cing sdig pa med//byang chub med cing sangs rgyas med//ye shes lnga yi sbyor ba yi//
401a1(rgyud): byang chub sems ni brtan pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'khor lo'i rnam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to//sngags snyed bzlas pa lang yod ma yin//'gro/
401a2(rgyud): ba gsum po thams cad med//chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis//sgom pa dang ni sgom pa med //bcom ldan 'dres rin po che'i dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to//
401a3(rgyud): kun rdzob 'jig rten pa yang yod//dpyad na grong du 'jig rten pa//rtag tu 'jig rten pa nyid 'khor/'di ni byang chub rim bskrun pa'o//bcom ldan 'das pad+ma dam tshig
401a4(rgyud): de skad ces bka' stsal to//ma skyes po dang mi dmigs pa//mi phyeng na mkha' lta bu ste//zab cing zhi ba'i rang bzhin ni//'di ni byang chub rim bstan pa'o//bcom ldan 'das
401a5(rgyud): ral bri'i dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to//sgyu ma ji lhor me long ltar//na mkha' ji ltar bde ji ltar//ji ltar dngos po yongs shes pa//'di ni byang chub rim
401a6(rgyud): bstan pa'o//bcom ldan 'das ma mkha' 'gro ma bdag med mas dri skad ces bka' stsal to//stong nyid dri mang dam pa'i gnas//rmi lam sgyu mA'i rang bzhin nyid//ji srid
401a7(rgyud): ma zhig bar du ni//sems kyi rang bzhin sgom par gyis//ma mA ki'o//srid med mya ngan 'das pa med//'di de bde chen rdo rje ste//ge nga zhig yid kyis sgom pas sla
401b1(rgyud): na mchog pas sgom pas sgyum//snyun gyihU~M//sngags dang yi ga rnam pUr sna sa//'di ni seMn sa med thig lo mang//'di dngam pa'i da tshun ste//bro ba mod rnyong gang ba da/
401b2(rgyud): gis d+ma/ mo'i'o//gzugs brtan rang bzhin ji lta bar//de ltar dngos pa brlam+b+ha par bya//ting nyid dri med mtshig gisuM gnas//da ni bsad nams sdig pa med//
401b3(rgyud): mo'i'o//ji lta rdzun zla ba ste//bye na min brdzun pa min de sbyar//de ltar dkyil 'o khor 'khor lo yis//lus kyi rang bzhin rnyog pa med//'khor thams cad kyi
401b4(rgyud): skad ces bka' stsal te//de nis bcom ldan 'das sna tshogs byed pa rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te//mda' ga'u char 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsu
401b5(rgyud): dang thugs rdo rje las byung //myAHd+hIT+Ti dang ser rna yis//tshad gzungs khu tshur bzung ba yis//g.yon ni 'dod pa'i khu tshur gyis//bsdams pas dag rnams bsdigs pa gyi
401b6(rgyud): smin lag ka rdzunas rnaM/mngon pa l+le b+h+yadz+dza rgyu sa ni/ ma n+de t+yA sh+tha //'adz+raHhU~M ma sdugapa pa dag/ na pa
401b7(rgyud): ni//lus ni thugs kyis dgang ba skye//rdzas la//khri rjer bzung na na//nga ni rgyas /sangs de dmigs ni la rnaM //rdzogs/di dagling ba dag
402a1(rgyud): grA yas kyang la stsogs sbyor ba yis//ga shInr-i r+No srin po bsad par bya//'o dang mA brjod pas ci zhig bya//kun+da rdzob du n+yo spyos pa tsam//gAzhu yi rag byed
402a2(rgyud): rtsa ba gang //de ni rdo rje 'dzin spyod//de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje la mo'i sgra zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin la sti masna par zhugs te/rol mo'i sgo'i skyeg pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung
402a3(rgyud): dang thugs rdo rje las phyeng ngo //thAM hiHhrI/thaka the ka/thu thai thu tha/b+hU hrIHhi/ba hi ba hi/u d+haM mr-id+h+waM/kr-i kaM kaM ka/tha ka thaka/n+ti tin+ti/ta Da wa~M ti Ni lId+d+hi/
402a4(rgyud): lang dang ni rnga dang yang //rdza rngu kha cig pa wang rgyas//mngar ba can dang gling bu dang //rgyud gsum ka ra ta ka ni//rnam gsum brdungs pas brdungs par bya//chung ngur
402a5(rgyud): brdungs pas rgyal bas te//dkyil 'khor gsol gdab la sogs pa//mchod pa 'di ni bla na med//rang gi tshigs bcad mang po ni//bstan pa 'odis ni ci zhig bya
402a6(rgyud): ji skyid rol mo'o bstan bcos su//de ni rdo rje rol mo'i sgra//de nas bcom ldan 'das dri bzang po'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/bdug smos kyi
402a7(rgyud): mchod pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang //gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung //tsan dan nyid dang gu re gum dang //brag zhon de bzhin 'dod ma ni//'di rnams rdzas ni bdug spos che//
402b1(rgyud): hU~M //lA rab tu dngul//kats+tshe dang mAn+ta/de bzhin du yang sgyu sgra nyid//dadug khyong snying po 'di rnams no//phan pa la ni sbyar bar bya//kun du ru dang po la klu/ dwags myu/
402b2(rgyud): sen ma ni//rin chen rgyal po'i bdug pa 'di//kun la ma 'dzegs gur gum dang //shrat+tha'i yi sha b+hI dang //shab+da dzi dang sho la ka/'jig rten mgon gyi bdug pa'idi//
402b3(rgyud): rtag tu rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs//sna tshogs dri ni khyad par du//sna tshogs rdo rje mchod pa ltas//bdun gyi rgyal po mchod pa 'di//kun tu stobs kyi bsgrubs pa ste//
402b4(rgyud): s+yAd dri yi bstan bac+doM su//gong bu'i drim bu'i bdug po mchog/de kun phyug na rdo rje'o//rdo rje'i mchod pa rab tu grags//de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gom pa rnam par dgod pa
402b5(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/rdo rje gang 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung //gus bcas dang por sgeg par ldan//drang po rtse bcas rjes
402b6(rgyud): rgyu bsngo//rkang stabs brgyad du cho ga yis//rdo rje gam pas rol pa bya//me tog skom pa'i sbyor ba dang //spos kyi yul ga'i sbyor ba dang //mAr me ldeng po'i lag tshul dang //
402b7(rgyud): yang ni byug pa'i lugs dang ni//mig lag de bzhin brla nang dang //rkang pa'i ngos su bskor ba ni//gdung ba'i sbyor bas rol ba bya//de bzhin du yang g.yon paso//de
403a1(rgyud): nas rgyun gyi glar byas nas//g.yon pas yang ni blar bya zhing //myur du rdungs pas de bzhin gyur//byas nas 'khor lho sgyu bur bskor//phyi nas gru ba ni dag/
403a2(rgyud): bar bya//phyi nas la dod pa'i log pas bskor//sa la pus ni gnyis btsugos nas//lag pas mchod rten logs par bya//rje snying gar gyi bstan btsa su//byed
403a3(rgyud): pa'i tshe lugs brjod pa ni//de snyed rdo rje sems dpa' yi//sgeg pas byang chub sgrub pa'i thabs//de nas bcom ldan 'das dam tshig rdo rje mnyes par byed pa zhes bya ba'i
403a4(rgyud): ting 'dzin lnga snyoms par zhugs te//tshogs kyi 'khor lo 'di nyid kyi//sku dang gsung dang /thugs rdo rje las phyung //rang gi lhag pa'i lhar dmigs nas//bzang
403a5(rgyud): po'i rgyan gyis rnam par brgyun//thams cad 'byor pa 'am dmigs nas ni//bems pa'i gnas su sreg lugs bya//shar lho byang dang nub phyogasu//phyogs gnas
403a6(rgyud): rnams ni dga' bar bya//phyogs bral rnams su lha mo rnams//dam pa'i tshe yis mchod par bya//yid kyi mar khu bsdams pa dang //'bras so chags mdo 'bras drang ni//
403a7(rgyud): 'bru dang zho ye zan dang ni//til dang de bzhin mnyam pa'i shing //dung ba rab tu gzhon pa nyid//bsam gtan rdo rje sbyin bsreg bya//de la 'di ni sngags kyi rkang pa yin
403b1(rgyud): te/oM ug+na ye swA hA/mar gyi'o//oM sarba pA pyA da ha na badz+rA ya badz+rI satwa s+ya sar+b+ba pA pAM da ha swA hA/til nag po'i 'o//oM badz+ra puSh+pa ye swA hA/'bras ma chags pa'i 'o//oM
403b2(rgyud): s+yarbas pa swA hA/zho dang zan dam pa'i'o//oM badz+re b+h+ridz+nyA ya swA hU~M/'bros so pa'i /oM mAhA gA ya swAhA/nas kyi'o//oM mu hA ba lA yA swAhA/men sman gra
403b3(rgyud): 'o/oM badz+ra g+ha sma re swA hA/gre'i 'o//oM badz+ra A yu She swA hA/dur bu gzhon nu'i 'o//oM badz+ra a pra tiM he ta badz+ra ya swA hA/ku sha'i 'o//oM badz+ra yadz+nyA ya swA hA/u/
403b4(rgyud): dum bA ra'i'o//oM ba[:]d+hi tauk+ShA ya swA hA/byang chub kyi shing gi'o//oM badz+ra la tAM ya swA hA/pa lak+Sha'i 'o//oM badz+ra ku bai rA ya swA hA/n+ya gro da'i 'o//oM sa ha kAR+Shar+Ya/
403b5(rgyud): ya swA hA/A mra'i 'o//tsam pa a sho kA yau klu/ka dam pa dang srid sgrub nyid//ji ltar rnyed pa bzlas byas nas//me tog 'dis ni sbyin bsreg bya//dgun 'brum
403b6(rgyud): a mr-i sbrul 'jig dang //khwa 'dzag skyes ma brtse mA ni//'khor lo lnga yI mchog rim pas//'bras bu rnams kyi sbyin sreg bya//shau lha dang ni bdud rtsi nyid//
403b7(rgyud): dkyila'akhor lnga yi sgom pa yis//'odis ni rdo rje mnyes par 'gyur//ye shes me ni rab dgyes bya//rgyal ba phan po mnyes po dang //gser gyi mnga' bdag mnyes pa
404a1(rgyud): dang //pad+mo gar dbang mnyes pa dang //lcags sgroglu bdag po many+dzus pa dang //tshangs pa brgya byin dbang tshon dang //khyab 'jug rlung dang tshon dang //thung
404a2(rgyud): ldan nyid dang 'dod lha dang //zla ba nyi ma gdong gzhan dang //sde ni zhags pa 'dzin pa dang //lus ngan de bzhin mtshams skyong dang //chos rgyal dang ni klu dang nI//dri za
404a3(rgyud): lce min mi 'am ci//sum cu rtsa gsum gnas pa'i lha//'og min du ni gnas pa dang //gang zhig rgyal chen gnas pa dang //gzhan 'phrul dbang sgyur nyid dang ni//'phrul//
404a4(rgyud): dgra' yi ni lha rnams dang //gang zhig dag pa'i gnas son dang //'od zer 'jig rten khams gnas dang //mi 'byed khams su gnas pa dang //gling bzhir gnas///
404a5(rgyud): pa'i sems can dang //gang zhig khams gsum gnas pa dang //snod ldan sems can 'jig rten dang //lcag ma'i tshogs dang rtsa sogs dang //gang zhig rab dga'i
404a6(rgyud): ser gnas dang //pha rol dri med gang phyin dang //'od 'phro can du gnas pa dang //mi g.yo'i gnas su byas pa dang //gang zhig chos sprin rjes song dang //gang zhig
404a7(rgyud): sbyang dkar son pa dang //gang zhig ring song thob pa dang //'od byed du ni gnas pa ste//sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon po dang //'phags pa'i gang zag brgyad po dang //
404b1(rgyud): rdzogs sangs rgyas dang nyan thos nyid//rA ni ral gri'i gzugs can dang //rang gi lhag pa'i lha sbyor ba da//shAkya song ge mnyes byas nus//dmyal ba yi dwags byol song dang /
404b2(rgyud): lce dang lha min mi rnams ni//sbyin sreg tshegs dgyes pa nyid//de nyid tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor ro//bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po rgya mtsho rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting
404b3(rgyud): 'dzin to//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rjesu chags pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/dam tshig la gsol ba gdadub
404b4(rgyud): pa gsungs so//rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed pa ni//rdo rje pad+ma'i sgom pa ste//de yi mgro bo'i sna rtsel//phyag 'tshal yid bzhin nor bu ste//sbu gu'i nang du phaT kyi ni//ye
404b5(rgyud): shes ma lhung yang dgra gnas//rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi dgyes par mdzod//'di ni phyag rgya'i tshi ga las//rang gi lhag pa'i lhar sbyor bas//rdo rje sems dpa' snyems
404b6(rgyud): byas nas//gnas ni thams cad bsgrub par bya//phyag rgya chen po'i gnas 'dug nas//rang gi lhag pa'i lhar sbyor ba dag/shAkya sing ge snyoms byas nas//rgyal po
404b7(rgyud): thams cad thob par 'gyur//las kyi phyag rgya'i gnas 'dug nas//rang gi lhag pa'i lhar sbyor bdag/kun gyi rgyal po thob par 'gyur//rdo rje gauzi brjid ting 'dzin
405a1(rgyud): ldan//dam tshig phyag rgya sbyor ba yis//gnas gsum po yang bsgrub par bya//rang gi lhag pa'i lhar sbyor bas//pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug bdag/chos
405a2(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya'i ting 'dzin gnas//rdo rje chos ni bsgom par bya//rang gi lhag pa'i lhar sbyor bas//rta mchog rim pas gnas nas ni//dam tshig phyag rgyu sbyor ba yis//
405a3(rgyud): sgrol ma'i dngos grub rab bsgrub bya//de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gar gyi 'dod pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te//rdo rje'i gar mdzad pa 'odi nyid kyiso sku dang gsung
405a4(rgyud): dang thugs rdo rje las phyung //g.yon pa brkyang ba dang /g.yas brkyang ba dang /mnyam pa'i rkang stabs dang /rdo rje'i rkang stabs dang /dkyil 'khor dang /sna tshogs tha~Md dang
405a5(rgyud): rus sbrul gyi rkang stabs dang /bung ba'i dra ba dang /rgya mtsho'i bskyod po dang /ri bo'i mchog dang /mdzes pa'i gom pa dang /khro bo'i gom pa ste/rkang stabs kyi dgod pa'o//
405a6(rgyud): ral gri'i lus dang /'khor lo'i tshul dang /rin po che'i tshul dang /pad+ma'i lag pa dang /ral gri'i tshul dang /mdung gi tshul dang /gzhu'i tshul dang /dbyig pa'i
405a7(rgyud): tshul dang /dbyig ti'i tshul dang /gtun shing gi tshul dang /rdo rje rtse gicig pa'i tshul dang /kha bcu pa'i tshul dang /ral gri bu mo'i tshul dang /sna tshogs
405b1(rgyud): byugs pa'i tshul dang /mdung thung gi tshul dang /gong bu skyong ba'i tshul dang /'phan gnyis pa dang /'phen lce gsum pa dang /me tog gi tshul dang /dadug smyos kyi tshul dang /
405b2(rgyud): mor me'i tshul dang /dri'i tshul dang /lha s+ye'i lag pa dang /phreng ba'i lag pa dang /klu'i lag pa dang /glar gyi lag pa dang /gling bu'i lag pa dang /pi brang gi log
405b3(rgyud): dang /rdza rje'i lag pa dang /mu kun da'i lag pa ste/lag pa'i dgod pa'o//rdo rje skyil krung dang /pad+ma'i skyi la krung dang /pad+ma'i 'dug stangs dang /bzang po'i 'dug stangs
405b4(rgyud): dang /skyil krungs phyed pa dang /bkra shis kyi 'dug stangs te 'dug stangs kyi dgod po'o//sgeg pa'i nga ro dang /dpa' ba'i nga ro dang /myi gdug pa'i nga ro dang /dgong pa'i
405b5(rgyud): nga ro dang /drag po'i nga ro dang /'jig su rung ba'i nga ro dang /zhi ba'i da rau dang /rngam pa'i nga ro dang /snying rje'i nga ro dang /drug gi rje su skyes pa'i glu dang /drang srong gi rjes kyi
405b6(rgyud): glu dang /dri za'i rjes kyi glu dang /bar ma'i rjes kyi glu dang /blo gsal gyi rjes kyi glu dang /'khor nyan pa'i glu'o//nyung ngu'i dbye ba dang /sgrol ma'i dbye ba dang /'jigs
405b7(rgyud): po'i dbye ba dang /gang ba dang /phyed phyi ba dang /rnam par 'dre ba dang /'dod tshogs gnyis mtshungs par byed pa dang /'dod chags gsum mtshungs par byed pa dang /
406a1(rgyud): lkog mu nyed pa dang /rkan nyed pa dang /lce nyed pa dang /so nyid pa ste/glu dgod pa'o//sa gzhi yongs gzung dus su ni//dam tshig 'di ni rab bskul ba//ye shes//
406a2(rgyud): rdo rje can gyi bya//'di ni dam tshig rim po'i mchog/me tog 'di rnams bza zhing dge/dag pa'i skye gnas las dag po//bdag gi da pas 'bul lags kyis//banas
406a3(rgyud): des bdag lho dgyes par mdzod//tshul bdag ro yi phan pa dang //gang zhig dri dang bdug spos mchog/bdag gi dad pas 'bul lags kyi//bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par/
406a4(rgyud): mdzod//srin po 'joms zhing dag byed pa//dge zhing mun pa rnam sel ba//bdag klu dad pas 'bul lags kyus//bzhes nus bdag lha dgyes par mdzod//'dri ni dri bzung
406a5(rgyud): dge ba ste//dag pa'i skye gnas las dag par//bdag gi dad pas 'bul ljags kyis//bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod//oM badz+ra g+har+b+he a dril bu blang ba'i sngagaso//
406a6(rgyud): oM ma hA badz+ra hU~M/rdo rje bzung ba'i sngag s+ho//dngos po sna tshogs rnam par dbye ba'i lde'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o////de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po//rnal 'byor me yi rdo rje'i gur/
406a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun dang sangs rgyas la//tshig ni 'di dag bka' stsal pa//phyog gnyis pa la zhal gcig pa//rdo rje las skyes rang bzhin can//lag par thod pa kha T+wAM ga/bsam
406b1(rgyud): nas s+ho sbyong bzlas pa'o//phyag gsum rdo rje las byung ba//dkar po dmar po de bzhin sngo//phag mo lhan cig mnyam sbyor ba'o//phyag drug pa la kha dog gnag/lcags sgrog ma
406b2(rgyud): dang lhan cig sbyor//sangs rgyas lnga yi thaMd pA ts+tsha no//zhal gsum nyid du sbyor bar bya//mdog dmar phyag ni bzhi pa dang //zhal cig mA dang dbang byed ma//rdo rje chos kyi gnas
406b3(rgyud): mnan pa//'od nI ku ru ku l+lor brjid//'di ni sngags ni brjod pa'o//btsun mo chos la gnas pa ni//khyod kyi spyan sngar bdag gis ni//dus gcig pa yi dus su ni//
406b4(rgyud): bdag nyid kyis ni 'di thos nas//rgyas pa nyid du rab tu dbye//'di skad bdag gis thos pa ste//dus gcig dus ni gcig na'o//bdag gis bcom ldan spyan sngar ni//
406b5(rgyud): btsun mo'i chosu rnam rgyas pas//lta stangs dgug dang brdo chen dang //don byang nus dang char sogs dang //lam gyi de nyid las skyes pa//thub pa chen po 'jig rten mgon//
406b6(rgyud): phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig pa//mchod sbyin dang ni pad+mas rgyan//pad+ma'i gdan la yang dag gnas//dbu rgyan rdo rje chos dang ldan//mA~M gyi de nyid las skyes pa//'jam
406b7(rgyud): pa'i dbyangs kyi ser po ste//yan lag mchod sbyin ud pa la rgyan//mi bskyod rdo rje spyi bor 'dzin//hU~M gi ye shes las byung ba//lag pa ral gri bsdigs mdzub nyid//ma
407a1(rgyud): ho chen po'i rgyab du ni//dpa' bo g.yon+da N+yang pa yis gnas//khro bo'i gzugs can 'jigs byed pa//kha sbyar 'dun du mi bskyod 'dzin//hU gi ye shes
407a2(rgyud): lngas byung ba//rdo rje hUM mdzad rdo rje can//rdo rje dril bu'i sbyor ba yis//lag pa gnyis kyi phyag rgya bcings//rkang pa g.yon nyid rkyang pa yis//'jigs byed mnan pa
407a3(rgyud): yi ni lus//spyi bor rdo rje'i rigs bsams nas//'jig rten gsum rgyal dran par bya//tAM gi yi ge las byung ba//mchod sbyin dbang mchog mtshon cha ste//lha
407a4(rgyud): mo ljang ku lta bu nyid//rtag tu bzang po'i 'dug blangs gnas//sna tshogs pad+mar yod dag bzhugs//spyi bor don yod 'dzin pa po//sgeg mo chen mo skul bzang ma//
407a5(rgyud): sgrol ma'i gzugs can bsgom par bya//mAM gaM yi ge las byung ba//mchod sbyin a sh+lo ka 'dzin ma///nyi ma sha ra ba lta bu ste//rnam snang dpal ni spyi bor skyes//
407a6(rgyud): g.yon+da brkyang ba yi sbyor ba yis//'gro mgyogs bdun gyi shIng rta mnan//yan lag sgeg pa'i ro yis rgyan//'od zer can ni bsgom par bya//tsuM gau yi go las
407a7(rgyud): byung ba'i//ston ka'i zla ba lta bu'i 'od//snying khar rin chen snyim par gnas//mdzes pa'i tshul gyi yang dge bzhugs//lha mo sna tshogs pad gdon can//phan
407b1(rgyud): bris mgo bo mnan pa ste//byang chub sems ni 'dzag 'bab pa'i//lha mo stabs dang bral ba sgom//biM gi yi ge las byung ba//nor 'dzin shin tu kha dog ser//lag pa mchod
407b2(rgyud): sbyin 'bras sgyu ma//rdo rje spyi l-I klungs sbyor ba las//yan lag rin chen 'byung gnas rgyan//spyan nA shin tu sgeg par ni//gnod sbyin rgyal mo bsgom par bya//nor gyi bdag gi
407b3(rgyud): motshungs par 'gyur//dzaM ga yau gI las byung ba//na mkha' mdzod ces bya ba sgom//kha dog sor zhing g.yas pa na//mchod sbyin rini chen ne'u le ste//rin chen 'byung gnas
407b4(rgyud): /rdo rje yis//spyi bor dkyil 'khor rnaM rgyan//rin chen char ni byasam pa bya//skyor gang rdo rje chur gzhug bya//praM gi yi ge los skyes pa//lus ni dkar zhing yid 'ong ba//
407b5(rgyud): lha mo ral gro'i 'khor lo 'dzin//spyi bor phan pas mnan pa'o//rang gi mang po'odus lta bur//dkyil 'khor gnas su yang dag 'dug/nA mkha'i gnas nas 'jam
407b6(rgyud): pa'i dbyangs//'byung bar rnam par bsam par bya//de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chun po sngags sna tshogs nang du chud pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin la snyoms par
407b7(rgyud): zhuthugs te/sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gsal bar mdzad pa/oM ma Ni pad+me hUM phaT swA hA/oM maM dzu badz+rA ya muHswA hA//oM hrIHSh+T+r-iHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/oM hUM/
408a1(rgyud): bAn+d+ha swAhA/oM t+ta rA tut+ta ra tu re swAhA/oM m+bA ra n+ya sahA//oM tsa lA tsu lA tsud swAhA/oM ba su d+hA ra ma hA bidz+dzi ni prA ta ni bA su swAhA/oM m+b+ha lA dza wan+d+rA ya/
408a2(rgyud): swA hA/oM ma Ni d+ha ri dz+r-i Ni ma hA pr-i tri si re hUM hU~M phaT phaT swA hI/'jig rten mgon gyis nad rnams zhi//'jim pa'i dbyings kyis blo gros bzang //gshin rje ga shed
408a3(rgyud): kyis yi dwags srung //lha dang lha min hUM mdzad kyis//sgrol mas 'jig rten dbang du mdzad//'od zer can gyis chom rkun 'jig/tsun+d+ra sems can thams cad ni//
408a4(rgyud): dgug pa yi ni tshig rjod//dzam+b+ha la dang nod sbyin bdag/nor gyi sgrub pa'i thabs su 'dod//dud med gang zhig pu shi bso//so sor 'bring ma rtag dran b+hu/
408a5(rgyud): mkha' 'gros gsungs pa'o//sngags kyis rkang pas thams cad 'grub//bzlas pa 'bum gyi sbyor ba yis//lus rnams thams cad rab tu 'grub//snying gi
408a6(rgyud): bde ba bskul ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin te//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyu/
408a7(rgyud): hUM gi yi ge las skyes pa//phyag gnyis pa dang zhal cig ldan//kha dog gnag cing cher 'bar ba//gri gu gzod pa 'dzin pa'o//mgo bo'i phreng bas donal
408b1(rgyud): sa//mche ba chen pos 'jigs par byed//gzugs thung gzi brjid chen po nyid//kha nas khrag ni 'dzag pa ste//slob dpon la rtag gang sngang dang //gang zhig da//na
408b2(rgyud): mcho ga gsum khri dang //sems can du ma gsong byed pa//nag po che nubs za bad byed//rang gi lag g.yas shag cing byed//khrag gi rten ni 'jung ba byed//
408b3(rgyud): nas spyi bor 'di 'dug nas//de ni tal tsim gcod par byed//mon sran gre dang 'dzum bu ni//me tog bdug pa byug lnga chang //sha lnga nyid dang bdud rtsi yis//nag
408b4(rgyud): de tshe l-i gtor mo sbyin//sngags ni oM shrI ma hA kA lA yo//sha sa ne u pa hA ri Ne e Sha a pe sh+tsa mi kA lai a yau i daM rat+na tra yA a pak+Sha ri Na ya di pre ti dz+nyAM sma ra si tat+ta i/
408b5(rgyud): duduSh+TAM kha kha khA hi khA hi mar me ra gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ban+d+ha bin+d+ha/ha na hA na/dA ha dA ha/pa tsa pa tsa/di na me kau na hU~M phaT hUM/che ba gsum gyi gzugs baR+Sha ni//byas nis lus le
408b6(rgyud): tshe rims dgang //drug dang /kye+e kyis bris nas/de ni gang gi ming gis ni//de nas me la gdung bar bya//de yi dus na mI snang 'byung //de nas gzhan yang rab po shad pa
408b7(rgyud): phyag rgya'i dngos grub skam pa nyid//phyag rgya'i dngos grub dngos grungab che//dngos grub kun gyi spyod yul mo ni//de dus de yi lus 'thab cing //skad cig na ni bde chen chus
409a1(rgyud): skad cig na ni de 'khor ldan//sbrum pa dud ni sngags nyid dang //skad cig sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad//spyan gyi 'phrag nas 'khyud pa'o//skad cig lnga ni gnyis/
409a2(rgyud): med ldan//dga' ba chen po mchog du dga'//rdo rje 'dzin rgyal skad cig gis//mA ma ki dang byed bsdom//rdo rje pad+ma'i rtse mchod pas//skad cig gis na glonyis mud/
409a3(rgyud): ldan//rdo rje pad+ma rab sbyar bas//rdo rje gus pa'i pha rol son//rdo rje pad+ma mchod bya zhing //pad+ma'i 'dod pa spang bar bya//bdag nyid rang bdag bsams nas ni//
409a4(rgyud): rje pad+ma rab sbyor bas//rdo rje bu mo cher grags pa//rdo rje nag po lta bre mchod//rang gi skyes bu bsams nas ni//rdo rje pad+ma'i rtse mchod pas//bu mo de bzhin
409a5(rgyud): ge shegs mya mchog/phyag rgya'i dngos grub don du mchod//rang gi rig ma skyes bu bas mos//rdo rje pad+ma'i rtse mchod pas//godrol pa chen po las byung ba/
409a6(rgyud): phyag rgya'i dngos grub don du mchod//phyag rgya chen po rab bsgrub pa//rnam por rgyal ba'i stobs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//nyi ma mig gis 'grub par 'gyur
409a7(rgyud): nyi ma gnyis kyi cho ga dang //nyi ma gsum gyi sbyor ba dang //de bzhin du ni nyi ma bzhi//nyi ma lnga pa'i sbyor ba yis//'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshomo med//
409b1(rgyud): tI la sogs mchod byas nas//bras ma gtan gnas su 'dug pa dang //phyag rgya lhan cig cugs nas ni//rdo rje sbyor ba yang dag brtsam//rdo rje nyi ma nub pa na//sbyor ba nga/
409b2(rgyud): ni yang dag brtsam//nyi ma shwar ba'i dus su ni//'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsam med//'dod chags chen pos rjes chags pas//'dod chags chen po'i rang bzhin
409b3(rgyud): las//chags chen ting 'dzin gnas nas ni//phyag rgya chen po 'bru bsgrub bya//shin tu dga' ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to//pad+mar rdo rje can bcug nas//rang gi
409b4(rgyud): rig ma bdag mar bya//de dung lhan cig 'grub par 'gyur//'di ni phyag rgya chen por brjod//mi yi phyag rgya blang ste nas ni//de la'i khor la rab tu dbye//dri dang me to/
409b5(rgyud): 'thun byas nas//'khor lo goms par yang dag brtsam//spyan drang bdag ma sgrol ma dang //dkar mo shin tu yid 'phrog ma//me tog dri yis 'thun byas nas//
409b6(rgyud): rdo rje mchod pa yang dag brtsam//sngags pas phan pa 'grub 'gyur zhing //phyag na rdo rje 'grub pa dang //rdo rje nyi mi 'grub pa dang //dam pa'i yi ge 'grub pa dang //
409b7(rgyud): bdun pa'i rgyal po 'grub pa dang //thams cad 'dren pa 'grub par 'gyur//chu yi dbang ni dang po ste//cod pon dbang la gnyis pa'o//rdo rje'i dbang gi sum pa ste//
410a1(rgyud): rlung gi bdag po sbyin pa nyid//ming gis dbang bsgyur lbu pa ste//drug pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas n+d+ha//bdun pa bum pa'i dbang gis twe/
410a2(rgyud): glagasang ba'i dbang gis brgyad pa'o//shes rab dbang las dgu po ste//de nyid rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis//kun gyi de nyid brtul zhugs brjod//ston pa rang
410a3(rgyud): gis lung bstan te//de 'dir dbang gi cho ga'o//slob dpo ni smad par mi bya ste//bde gshegs bka' las 'da' mi bya//spun la smad pa nyid mi bya//
410a4(rgyud): sems can rnams la gdug byams dang //skal me de nyid gtim mi bya//skal lda ni sems can smad mi bya//bdag gi lus la nges mi smad//chos nyid
410a5(rgyud): tshad ni bzung mi bya//gzhan gyis chos la slad mi bya//bud med nyid la'ang smad mi bya//rtsa ba'i ltung ba rab du sbyang ba mdor bstan pa zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin
410a6(rgyud): to/ji srid byang chub snying po'i bar//dkon mchog gsum ni spang mi bya//rtag tu dam tshig bsrung bar bya//rdo rje dril bu'ang bzung bar bya//gtsug tor//
410a7(rgyud): rtag tu bzung bar bya//rtag tu sbyin sreg dgang bar bya//rtag tu dkyil 'khor bzhengs par bya//rtog tu bde gshigs rab gnas bya//'byung
410b1(rgyud): tshu la gtor ma sbyin//phyag rgya bcing ba rnam sbyang zhing //mchod rten las ni mi bya ste//rdo rje gsum mchog phyag mi bya//dkyil 'khor lnga sogs lus kyi las//
410b2(rgyud): rmi lam du yang mi bya zhing //slob dpon gzhan la phyag mi bya//bla ma'i rgan+da rabs phyag 'tshal lo//rtag por rgyun du sngags bzla zhing //bsam gtan
410b3(rgyud): nyid kyang 'bral mi bya//rtag tu slob ma bsdu bya zhing //rtag pa ru ni bshud par gyis//rtag tu sems can bskyang bar bya//rtag du sangs rgyas tshar gnyis bya//
410b4(rgyud): dzi b+he la la chu sbyin zhing //las rnams thams cad yang dag spyad//bye ma'i mchod rten las la yang //mkhas pos cho ga bzhin du bya//de nas bcom
410b5(rgyud): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /pho nya ma thams cad dang //de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje nges par brjod pa 'di thos nas tshig 'di
410b6(rgyud): dge gsungs pa/sems can kun gyi thams cad khyod//sdig pa thams cad rnam skyong ba//chos rnams thams cad yongs su rtogs//rdo rje mkha' 'a
410b7(rgyud): phyag 'tshol bstod//sdang bas mnan pa'i 'gro gzigs nas//gti mug thams cad zad bya'i phyir//rgyal ba mgon po rnam snang mdzad//gti mug rdorje
411a1(rgyud): phyag 'tshal bstad//klo ba bud med 'dul gzugs nas//bdag mod rnal 'byor mar gyur gang //phyag 'tshal pha rol phyin thub la//rgya
411a2(rgyud): ma'i phyag rgya phyag 'tshal bstod//gti mug mnan pa'i 'gro gzigs nas//zhe sdang thams cad zad mdzad pa//rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che//zhe sdang
411a3(rgyud): rdo rje phyog 'tshal bstod//nga rgyal mnan pa'i 'gro gzigs nas//nga rgyal thams cad zed mdzad pa'i//rdo rje nyi ma rgyal po che//'dod chags rdo rje phyag 'tshal
411a4(rgyud): bstod//chags pas mnon pa'i 'gro gzigs nas//'dod chags tham cad zad mdzad pa//rta mgrin+da rgyal po chen po ste//ser sna rdo rje phyug 'tshal
411a5(rgyud): bstod//'gro ba phrag dag mnan gzigs nas//phrag dag thams cad zad mdzad pa/bdun gyi rgyal po rgyal po che/thams cad gzugs
411a6(rgyud): la phyag 'tshalnga bstod/de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol pa/bcom
411a7(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dpel kye'i rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i slob dpon ji ltar blta bar bgyi/de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal
411b1(rgyud): slob dadon tan pad+ma m+WA bA ni//sa sa rgyas kun+na b+hag mdzad pa//bdag+sa cagu rnams kyi ba dang ma//'di nyid yong la smrasam par bya//
411b2(rgyud): da du na pas / /rjesems da sa sa rgyas d+ma/sa gzi
411b3(rgyud): sman gyi rgyam ba ngos phyub rnams//glung phyir de yi ge/ med/mig+na smyan dang ni nang byug dang /

412a1(rgyud): mi gnas pa//skyes pa glen zhing rmongs pa gang //de 'dri shri zhes smra bar brjod//'chi ba zhes bya'i rnam rtog go/dag
412a2(rgyud): ba'i gnas su khye ba byed/yang na bde ba cani dunges//'dod pa'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur//me tog sna tshogs lag g+sas

412a4(rgyud): sgra dang sil snyan che//bkra shis tshigs bcad sna tshogs dang //dbang gi gnas rnams nyid kyis ni//lus las lus gzhan gro
412a5(rgyud): bar 'gyur//rdo rje dril bu leg byin te//mgo bo'i gtsug tor mnan nas ni/rdo rje'i sdom pa byin nas su/dbum pa'i
