412b2(rgyud): thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin dang /dri zad bces pa'i 'jig rten yi rangasabatsum
412b3(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga'o//'phags pa mkha' 'gro ma'i dra ba'i rdo rje gurgyud kyi rgyal po'i
412b4(rgyud): brtag pa'o//rdzogs s+ho////rgya gar gyi mkhan d+h+r-i ga ya d+hA ra dang /lo ts+tsha ba dge slongashAkya ye shes
412b5(rgyud): kyis bsgyur ba'o////rgya gar skad du/shrI ma hA mu drA ti la kr-i nA ma maM hA yau gI ni tan+d+hi rA dzA a b+hI rAH/
412b6(rgyud): bod na dang/dpal phyag rgya chen de'i thig le zhesabye ba rnal 'byor mtshan mo'i rgyu 'i/kyi rgyal po'i minga'i bdag
412b7(rgyud): dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig lelo//phyag 'tshal lo//bcom ldan mkha'agro ye shes te ni//gsang bad snying po'i
413a1(rgyud): 'byed pa//gsang pad lte bu'i nang na bzhugs//bdag gi zhu ba khyod gson cig/ye shes rgya mtsho'i kye rdo rje//'bum lnga yi ni bdag nyid
413a2(rgyud): rgyud//gang zhig khyod kyis de nyid gsungs//sbyor drug rnal 'byor ma yi gzhung //thams cad mkhyen pa dbang phyug mchog/de ni dpa' bo bdag gis shes//
413a3(rgyud): don dam pa ni ji lta bu//de ru bdag ni the tshomo skyes//char yang thig le tshul dang ni//tshul tsom mchog mtsho gzhan yin//sbyor ba drug gis rnam par shre/
413a4(rgyud): de yi gnas ni nang na yod//srog ni gang nas 'byung ba yin//rdo rje 'dzin pa gang du brlag/rdor sems mtshan mo gang nyid ci//mtshams gang shar ba gang
413a5(rgyud): zhig lags//gang na nub pa'i dus dang rtsa//mchog gi dbang phyug du tsam mchis//dus kyi mtshan nyid gang lags gsungs//de yi dus kyis don ci
413a6(rgyud): byed//A li kA li bya ba gang //mnga' bdag gang nas 'byung ba legs//ro yi bye brag du zhig bstan//dga' ba yang ni de bzhino//gang gi dus kyi
413a7(rgyud): dga' ba rnam//rdo rje dbang phyug 'byung ba gsungs//ches kyi dbyings ni ji ltar bshad//rdo rje yang ni ji ltar bstan//bdag gi sgra ni ji ltar gsungs//
413b1(rgyud): gsang ba zhes bgyi ji ltar lags//mchog ces bgyi ba ji ltar bshad//dgyes pa'i don ni gsal bar mdzod//rigs kyi bye brag du tsam bstan//phung po la srog
413b2(rgyud): skye mched ci//tshangs dang khyab 'jug drag po dang //dbang phyug rtag tu zhi ba dang //gang nas skyes shing gang du gnas//chen po'i chen po de ji ltar//phyag rgya'i
413b3(rgyud): bye brag du zhig bshad//phyag rgya chen po ji ltar lag/mgon pA mchod pa'i bye brag ci//de ru me toge ji ltar yin//mgon po chen po mchod sbyin ni//
413b4(rgyud): ji lta bu zhig 'tshal ba lags//mchog gri dngos po'i dkyil 'khor ni//bcom ldan 'das de lta bu//dA ru lha mo ci 'dra ba//lha mo bgyi ba gang lags gsungs
413b5(rgyud): bcom ldan dur khrod du zhig mchis//de ru shing ni ji ltar bshad//dur khrod dang ni shing rnams ni//rgyal bi'i dbang phyug de gnas gsungs//mgon po nang
413b6(rgyud): gi sbyin sreglai dang //bdud rtsi lnga yi tshe ga dang //rnal 'byor ma yi 'du shes dang //de ru skad ni ji lta bu//bdag nyid kyi ni rang ngo bo//mgon po chen
413b7(rgyud): khyod kyis gsungs//dpal phyag rgya chen po theg le los rgyud thams cad kyi rgyu zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dang po'o////bcom ldan 'das
414a1(rgyud): kyis bka' stsal pa//dris pa yang dag gting dpag dka'//snying po yi ni snying po mchog/sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang chen po//mchog
414a2(rgyud): las mchog gi yang dag mchog/lha chen po ni la sogs pa//bzang mo de ru byol song yin//don dam de ni khyod gcig pu//zhal bzang mo yi snod
414a3(rgyud): yin no//gsang ba'i gsang ba yang dag rlab//nyon cig yang dag bdag gis bshad//dang po re sheg slob ma lA//dbang rnams lan gcig bskur
414a4(rgyud): ba yis//de tshe gsang chen bshad pa yi//nges par snang du gyur pa'o//dbang med de ni dngos grub med//bye ma bcir yang mar med ltar//gang TIg
414a5(rgyud): rgyud lung ra rgyal gyis dbang bskur med la gsali byed pa//slob dpon slob ma shi mu thag/dngos grub thob kyang myal bar 'gro/de bas 'ber gyi
414a6(rgyud): thams cad kyis//bla ma la ni dab nga don zhu//dbang bskur yod dang de nyid shes//ye shes shis dang thugs rje che//yang dag rlabs chen dang
414a7(rgyud): po dang //seng sna med dang rang bzhin bzang //skal ldan me tshan nyid thams cad rdzogs//phrag dog yul ni rnam par spangs//rtag tu dga' ba'i yid
414b1(rgyud): ldan pa 'dod chags chen po gcig du'i yid//sdom pa de ni shes pan//bram do lta bu la bya//rdo lta bu yi zlu ma y-iH//'bad pas slong ma brtag par bya/
414b2(rgyud): ji ltar bsregs la sogs pas gsor//ji ltar mkhas pas rin po che//ci ltar bde ldan bu mi n+do//de ltar slob ma brtag par bya//de bras thams cad rab
414b3(rgyud): 'bad de//dran tshun so ser brtag par bya//de ltar min na skyon du 'gyur //nam yang dngos grub thib mi 'gyur//ji ltar dug lnga rang sngags kyis//dag pa byas
414b4(rgyud): nas bdud cir 'gyur//de bzhin slob ma dbang sogs kyis//lus ni dri ma med par 'gyur//gang zhig dbang bskur sbyin byed pa//de ni rdor sems lta
414b5(rgyud): bur blta//bla ma sprul rgya lnga lta bur chelta//dpal ni bla ma me 'drang ba lta//bla mya ston pa bris lhag bam+b+ha//yid bzhin rin chen mnyam par bas+t+ra//
414b6(rgyud): ltar rab sbyor dang ste bas kyis//sbrul gyi rgyal po'i spyi bo las//tshad med pa yi rin chen snyed//dbulci ba thams cad med par byed//rab sbyor ldog dang
414b7(rgyud): sngags logs gis//dpa' ma nges par tshig par byed//de lta bu yi cho ga yi//khrims la sogs pa'i spyod pa yis//dpa' zhal de nyid rin dbang
415a1(rgyud): phyug/tshe 'di nyid kyis rnyed par 'gyur//de ltar min te ma busnu na//bdud bri mo yis de sna tshig rnyed//ji ltar me yis shing tshig pa//skad
415a2(rgyud): TIg gis nirtul bar byeng //gal te de bzhin dpal bla ma//mnyes na skad cig+sa gis sdiga'i tshig/rgyud 'di lin mchog gi ni//bcom ldan dbang bsgyur du
415a3(rgyud): zhig mchis//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dbang bskur bzhi yi rim pa la//'bras bu yis ni gsum du bstan//dang por slob de pon
415a4(rgyud): dbang cigu ste//gnyis pa gsang ba'i dbang mchog go/gsum pa shes rab ye shes dbang //de ltar de bzhin bzhi pa'o//slob dpon dbang la bcu
415a5(rgyud): gcig dbye//gsang ba'i dbang dang bcu gnyis mchog/shes rab ye shes bcu gsum pa//de lta de bzhin bcu bzhi'o//dbang ri la ni sa re ste/
415a6(rgyud): de rnam sa yi da dang phyug bdag/rgyu rtswa gsum b+his shes par bya//de yi 'bras bu bani pa'o//yang na 'bras bu gsum dang bral//yang na bdag
415a7(rgyud): nyid gsum po yin//dga' ba'i bye brog shes par bya//'khor lo rnams kyi rim pas so//yang ngong yi ni gsum pa'i tshe//slob ma rab la
415b1(rgyud): dbyung bsrad bya//na baH rmug gis /sa ring gu/gzugs bzlang lung na rgyun+da pa pos//n+d+ha gnyis yang na ban+d+ha drug gas//sa ldan pa'o/
415b2(rgyud): rlung nyi shu yin chung phyag rgyu gzhan//des ni dngos grub thug ring byed//sring mo yang na bu mo 'am//chung ma bla ma lnga dbul bya//de nas smre tshegs rdzas
415b3(rgyud): kyis ni//bla ma dad pas mchod par bya//sna tshogs raswa ni brgya sogs dang //rin chen sna tshogs rgyal mtshan mchog//mu tig phreng ba rini thang mid//grangs
415b4(rgyud): ming gi ser gyis mchod bya'o//de ring nga ni chad bdag ni 'bangs//chen po'i chen po mched pa bzhis//de lta bu yi cho ga yis//'bring de bla mi mchod par bya//
415b5(rgyud): bla ma'i gzugs ni bdag rang yin//bdag mchod byas na dngos grub thob//de yis skud cing phyug rgyu che//mchod pa byas nas bsnyen par bya//bsnyen
415b6(rgyud): pi las ni gang zhig 'byung //slob ma'i khu ru dbab par bya//sbom po mtha' ltag sbyar ba yis//longs spyod nang du gzhug par bya//de tshe yang dag
415b7(rgyud): ye shes skye//bu mo'i bde ba tsa lta bu//srog dang rtsol po mnyam byas nas//shin tu legs dgyes kyis mchod bya//rin chen kha la hUM phaT
416a1(rgyud): sngags//bkod nas mda' la bskyon par bya//de yi dus su dka' skad cig/ji ltar rang bzhin skye bar 'gyur//de ltar phyag rgya la bshad bya//
416a2(rgyud): 'di ni dga' bya'i mtshan nyid do//de nas slob mi'o lag du ni//byin nas 'di skad smra bar bya//nga yi bka' lung rtog med pas//pad+mo'i donA la ji bzhin gyis//
416a3(rgyud): pad+mo'i snying po'i dbus na ni//rdor dbyings dbang phyug mi ni bzhugs//de mu rnyed pa'i bar du ni//thabs gzhan la ni byang chub med//de ni rang bzhin dga'
416a4(rgyud): bi'i gzugs//phra mo'i phra mo yang dag mchod//dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las slob ma brtag pa dang //yon dbul ba dang dbang bskur ba zhes bya
416a5(rgyud): ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o////de nas gsang ba bshang byi ba//mchog dang rab mchog mchog gi mchog/phung po lnga yi bdag nyid sku//legs
416a6(rgyud): dgyes dbang po 'khor la drug/zla phyed byang gzugs char yang ni//rlung gi 'khor lo'i nang na bzhugs//phyed min gang ba yang ma yani//chu yi zla ba
416a7(rgyud): bzhin du mthong //sgyu 'phrul chen po 'gro ba'i ma//char yang grangs med rten pa yin//de ni mchog dang gzhon mchog phra//skye med gnyis med bsam
416b1(rgyud): /du myad //rlung gi 'khor la spyod byung ma//sangs rgyas kyis kyang rnyod dka' ba'o//mo stso 'khor l-i'o nang nA no//thog pa gcig pa yi ge med//khams cad nang
416b2(rgyud): yid yig kun yin//thams cad khyab dang bde ba 'byung //bde ba 'phel bar byed pa'o//dbyangs dang dpe byad dang bral lo//grangs med pa yi khams gsum
416b3(rgyud): ninargyu dang skye bar byed pa'o//tshul ni blo bur pa yi gnas//rnam pa thams cad dang bral po//dngos po sprul sku 'dra ba yin//mtha ris su ni bskyed bying
416b4(rgyud): 'i//yig ma yon khams kyang meng //zla nas theg la rgyun dang bral//skye myed grangs med mi zad pa//da ni daMn dam+b+ha tshul yin//sgrub pa ye ni 'kha la'i gas
416b5(rgyud): lte ba'i snyoms pa zhesu grags//chos kyi 'khor lo'i tshul tsam ni//dri mo med pa'i sbrul me 'dra//dri med mi bcos pa ye gnas//gnas med rnam pa med
416b6(rgyud): pa'o//g.yo ba med dang brjod nga med//dbugs kyi rgyu ba med pa'o//mchog gi ye shes tshul tsam ni//bcug sam+b+ha dbang phyug glos ma shes//mchog gi ljongs spyad
416b7(rgyud): 'khor lar gnas rnaM mchog gi rnam pa bdud rtsi mchog/theg mi chog mchog gi me sa ni yod//ji ltar chang gi mthu bzhin//thams
417a1(rgyud): cad bdag nyid byad gzugs bral//gzugs med bdag nyid kyisnga bzhug so//gzhan mchog bde chen 'khor lo la//thams cad mtha' yi mtha' na bzhug/
417a2(rgyud): lta bar byed dang blta bya med//mtshon dran thams cad med pa'o//brjed med mi zeng zhi ba ste//rang dga' nyams myong rnam pa'o//bla ma yis ni bka' drin gyi//legs dgyes//
417a3(rgyud): dbang mo rnyed par 'gyur//de lta bu yi ye shes che//rnam par shes drug rang bzhin can//'khor lo drug gi dbus su ni//don dam par ni bshad pa'o//steng dang
417a4(rgyud): 'og gi sbyor ba yis//kha sbyar byad gzugs kyis ni yod//bcu gnyis phyeng dang drug gi phyed//drug cu rtsa bzhi de bzhin brgyad//brgyad gnyis dang ni brgyad bzhi ni//'di
417a5(rgyud): ni 'khor lo chu skyes drug/dpel phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las sbyor ba drug gi mtshan nyid dang 'khor lo drug gi rang gI ngo bo zhes bya ba'i leny+tsa ste gsum pa'o//
417a6(rgyud): nyon cig lho mo skal chen mo//rtsa yi 'khor lo 'byung ba mchog/stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis te//rtswa rnams kyi ni rigs pa shad//rigs chen po yi rgyud chen
417a7(rgyud): por/rgyas par bdag gis gsal bar byas//'di ru 'khor lo drug gis grangs//mdor bsdus pa ni bshad par bya//rlung gi 'khor lo'i rtsa drug ni//g.yo
417b1(rgyud): rnamakha' mod dang skyabs//rab bskod dang ni 'jig chen po//rtswade rlung gi 'khor ma'i glanas//'dzin ma dang ni rim dang //rnyog mang ma ni gru gsum gnas//me ye la
417b2(rgyud): lo'i nang du ni//rdza yi dbang mo lngar shes bya//mgyogs ma dang ni yang dag mgyog/shin tu bzang dang bzang 'gro dang //stobs chen ma dang 'jigs chen ma//nga rgyal che
417b3(rgyud): dang 'dzegs byed che//mthus myur ma dang mthu yi chu//mthu yi chu dang mthu dri dang //mthu mo dang ni mthus 'bab mo//rtsub drang nur dang mthu du ma//rngam pa za ba na ma khar
417b4(rgyud): 'gro//bya yi yan lag bye 'gromA//phyug mo 'jigs ma nga ro dang //btul m+b+ha mchod ma myos ma dang //sgyu ma sgra 'byung sdig can ma//bad+ma'i sdong bu ma sngon mo//
417b5(rgyud): zil bu zil 'byung sku ma dang //phyin phyogs kha dang dbyigs pa dang //dbyig pa'i nga rgyal dang po ma//che'u lha ma dang che'u drug ma//tshe'u bdud ma dang brtson 'grus ma/
417b6(rgyud): tsheru khyim mngatshe' kham/tshe'u 'dam dang tshe'u lug/'bud mo bdag ma 'od ma dang //dri med deng ni de sreg dang //thAg lto me dang theg dga' ma//
417b7(rgyud): dang ni thag dus ma//phug ron phum smra ba ma dang //lo ma dang ni tsher lo dang //gos gyon ma dang gsal byed ma//rtsa 'di brgyad po brgyad du dran//drug tu rtsa bzhi chu
418a1(rgyud): nA~M/ 'a sa/ nas da na du thA ga smya na/smras sgyu
418a2(rgyud): m-iSh+Ti kA chen na m+b+hi g+sa nubargyu rgyas lakhru 'dim smras na//zhwal pa ny-ing m+b+hi ra/nags sa
418a3(rgyud): /su ma na~M oM ga sa/ /sgrogs mi dang/ nArA sbyi ma// hU~M ga dAn dang //b+hU sa smid kyi
418a4(rgyud): nas/brgyu gas 'dam skyes 'dam man//mthun pa yi ni rim pa'i rigs//dudu m+b+ha 'dang byung chu masnyam/'a Tam+b+hi mang ma //
418a5(rgyud): sbyin lugs ma durab+hA s+ya//hU~M klung baN+DI ma sbrum pa s+ya//me mdzun mA zla bam//gang ba gnyid mi gnyis smros ma/de'atshong rgyud spyir bdud rtsi /
418a6(rgyud): sa// /sa pU g+sa na dang sa//ma mangs dang mang+gA dus /sa mA ni sbyin ma
418a7(rgyud): thong po'i mas/ ma tha yang //des ni la ba sa rnams mi khyes//thams cid tha ma rig gyi med//gtsang 'i na
418b1(rgyud): par spangs//bde chen brade ba'i rnam pa can//bde chen la sogs sbyin par byed//de yi rtsa ba'i 'byung ba ni//yang dag thar 'dod pras shes bya//lha mo rtsa 'byung med gyur//
418b2(rgyud): na//phung po'i 'byung ba ji ltar 'gyur//phung po med na ye shes che//rnal 'byor rnams kyis ji ltar rnyeng //phung po lnga ni bdag nyid sku//mkha' 'gro lngar ni rab tu//
418b3(rgyud): grags//mkha' 'gro lnga ni ye shes lnga//'byung ba lnga ni rang bzhin can//rtsa nyid 'byung ba med 'gyur na//phung po rnams ni 'byung ba med///phung po med na dngos grub ni//rnal
418b4(rgyud): 'byor chen pos rnyed mi 'gyur//de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis//rtsa yi 'khor lo btsal bar bya//ji ltar sprin gyi char gyis ni//rtag par de ni cher bar 'phel//'bras
418b5(rgyud): bu mang zhing mtha' yas ni//the tsom med par sbyin par byed//de ltar phung po'i shing zhes bya//rtsa yi chu yis che bar 'phel//cher gyur 'bras bu thar pa ni//the tshom med
418b6(rgyud): par sbyin par byed//lha mo'i dngos po gzugs ni//rtsi yi byad gzugs yin par 'gyur//rag khams rgyal mtshan sbyor ba yis//me 'khor nang du chu skyes pa//
418b7(rgyud): gang tshe rdo rjes bskyod par byed//de tshe me ni khong du chud//'khor lo chu skyes thams cad ni//je gsal je gsal kha 'byor 'gyur//de nas rtsa kun 'jog 'gyur te//
419a1(rgyud): smod 'jog pa chu thig bzhin//de nas sprul pa'i 'du ltar ni//'dus nas gcig tu gyur pa'o//rtsa gnyis kha yi rtse mo las//zla bo dang ni nyi ma
419a2(rgyud): 'dzag/mngal gyi dbus na rtsa gnas pa//theg pa'i rnam pa'i gzugasu yod//de ni gcig pu rgyu zhes bya//'bras bu'i bye brag gnyi su 'gyur//g.yon nas khu ba/
419a3(rgyud): 'byung ba dang //g.yas nas khrag ni 'byung ba'o//gang tshe ga yas phyogs nyi ma ni//da tshe bde byed maro por 'gyur//g.yon nas zla ba 'byung ba'i phyir//de ni bde
419a4(rgyud): bi dra kar por 'gyur//de gnyis nang nA me gnas pa//sgod skyes go nyid ldog ji bzhin no//sngon gyi las rlung rnams shes ni//gang tshwa 'khor bar gyur puna?//
419a5(rgyud): de yi tshe na b+ha gi'i nang //'dod chags chen pos yid 'gyuraro//gang tshem yi zla mtshan 'byung //mi dang nyi ma ga silwa bar 'byung //de tshe 'dod chags chen po'i yid//
419a6(rgyud): reg bya 'dun pa mchog tu 'gyur//bo la kak+ko la zhugs nas//ji ltar chu la chu bzhag bzhin//de tshe sa bon 'byung ba yin//sa bon las ni grong bu 'byung //lha mo de lba
419a7(rgyud): rtsa rnams 'byung //'bras bu nges par 'byung ba'o//dpal phyag rgya chen pa'o thig le las 'khor lo drug gi rtse 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi po'o///
419b1(rgyud): srog ni 'byung bar thim pa'i tshul//nyon cig lha mo bdag gis bshad//ma skyes pa yi chur yang ni//gsang ba'i mngal gyi nang du bzhugs//da ni rnam shes med pa dang /
419b2(rgyud): bdag nyid med pa'i ye shes sku//de yi gnas nas srog 'byung ste//srog can rnams kyi srog ni mchog/rtag tu bdag nyid srog chen po//gnas lnga'i gnasA nA bzhu
419b3(rgyud): pa'o//na mkha' lnga zhes bya bar grags//na mkha' lnga yi nang du thim//'byung ba chen po bzhi po ni//srog gi rten du shes par bya//yang na srog ni de rnam
419b4(rgyud): rtanaH legs dgyes dbang mo shes par 'gyur//rnam shes las ni rlung skye'o//de lngas me ni skye bar 'gyur//de las chu ni skye 'gyur to//de was ni skye ba'o//de rnam
419b5(rgyud): kun lasra phung po 'byung //de nas skye mched 'byung bar 'gyur//de nas ye shes rang bzhin skye//brgya rtsa brgyad kyi rim pas sngo//rdo rje phreng ba'i rgyud chen los//sngar ni
419b6(rgyud): bdag gis bstan pa'o//man mo gang yin nyin gang yin//mtshan mo bdag gris bshad par bya//mtshan mo shes rab du ni grags//shes rab mtshan mo yin
419b7(rgyud): par 'gyur//mtshan mo'i rnam pa zla bar 'gyur//zla ba mya ngan 'das rang bzhin//kun rdzob dang ni don dam par//shes rab gnyis kyis shes par bya//kun ts+tshe//
420a1(rgyud): reg byar shes par bya//gang zhig reg bya med par byede//blta bar dka' ba'i mtshan nyid do//rang bzhin med pa'i rang bzhin can//de ni bdug/
420a2(rgyud): gis mtshan mor bshad//nyin mo thabs grags pa ste//thongs ni nyi mu yin par 'gyur//b+ha gri'i 'byung ba nyi ma yin//nyi ma b+ha gu'i bdag por 'gyur//srid pa'i
420a3(rgyud): rnam pa nyi ma yin//zla ba mya ngan 'das pa'i gzugs//srid pa de ni rigs zhes bstan//nyi las 'byung ba zla ba rigs//dri ma med phyir nyi ma ste//rtog pa'i
420a4(rgyud): dri ba med pa'o//dri ma med pa mchog phra ba//shin tu gsal ba stong sku'o//yang dag dri med gnas zhi ba/thams cad kun na bzhugs pa'o//rgyud rnams kun tu
420a5(rgyud): sbas pa yi//de lta'i nyin mo bdag gis bshad//mtshams ni gnyis ka phrad pa ste//rdo rje pad+ma nyi zla 'byung //lte ba gnyis ka phrin pa ni//phra ltar skad cig
420a6(rgyud): mtshan nyid do//nyon mongs las grol mtshams yin te//rnam pa med pa mchog gi mchog/sbyor gnyis dbus na yod pa ste//byug pa dang ni sred pa med/
420a7(rgyud): de mtshams sems can thams cad kyi//'khor ba'i lam rab dag par byed//shar ni mchog tu grogs pa ste//dga' bral la sogs dang bral ba//mdud
420b1(rgyud): pa'i rtse mo mchog gi gnas//tsa na ka yi rus rnams gzugs//shar ni zla ba'i bdag por shes//zla bu gyen du 'gro ba'i phyir//zla ba thig le mnyam par grags//
420b2(rgyud): thig le bzhir gyis bstan pa'o//thog ma tha ma'i dbus gnas nA//bzhi pa gadra na'ang med pa'o//rang gi rig pa'i bdag nyid phyir//de bas brjod du med pa'o//de ni
420b3(rgyud): gsang bar bstan pa ste//shar ba'i don ni 'dus pa'o//nyon cig lha mo bde sbyin ma//nub pa'i yang dag bdag gis bstan//gang tshe sems ni nub pa na//sngar ni//
420b4(rgyud): zla ba'i rnam par 'gyur//de tshe nub pa'i gan su 'gro/mi 'gro ba ni 'gro bar 'gyur//gang tsha thog ma tha mar 'gro/de tshe nub par bstan pa'o//tha ma nub par bsten
420b5(rgyud): pa ni rma rten pa'i gnas las rten med gnas//bsten pa yis ni mchog bde las//brtan med bde ba ga la yod//dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le/las srog dang //
420b6(rgyud): mtshan mo dang /nyin mo dang /mtshams dang /shar pha dang /nub pa bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o///rtsa yu~M 'byung ba thog mur bstan//dus ni
420b7(rgyud): nyon cig bdag gis bshad//dus ni tshod ces bstan pa ste//dus la bye brag gnyis dbye//dus ni bsam du med pa dang //shin tu'i dus ni dus yin no//shin tu dus/
421a1(rgyud): drang ngan du pa dang //sna yi 'phar ma bu ga gnyis//'ong ba de ni bzang dus bstan//bzang bla min dus chud ce bru bya//bzung po de ni mchog tu dran//gnyi ga/
421a2(rgyud): dang dral de kho nyid//de ni sngar mid 'di ru dris//lta ba med dang blta ru med//mtshan ngan thams cad dang bralo//dra lta'i dus ni bdag gis gzhan//zhal bzang yang
421a3(rgyud): dag bshad pa yin//de yi dus su gzhan du yid//rnal 'byor pa de mi bgyid na//dam tshig dbang mo bdag ji ltar//gzhan mi ni rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur//A li
421a4(rgyud): kA li gang las 'byung //nyan cig de ni bdag gis bshad//yang drag dri med gnas nas 'byung //snang ba mchod pa'i gzugs can no//dpe byadang sum cu gsum
421a5(rgyud): dang ldan//kA li'i dkyil 'khor shin tu gsal//snang ba mched pa'i gnas nas twa//snang ba de ni gsil byar 'byung //dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug sde na//rgyas pa
421a6(rgyud): A li'i dkyil 'khor ro//de gnyis mnyam par sbyor ba yis//ngal bus ro chen skye ba 'gyur//mchog gi bdud rtsi rnam pa ni//bde ba chen po'i bde ba'o gan/
421a7(rgyud): rigs ma'i sna rtse'i gnas na bzhugs//chu skyes 'khor lo drug gsal byed//de yi reg bya bde sbyin pa//ro tshon brgyad ni shes par bya//'dar dang rdul
421b1(rgyud): dang ba smra langs//skad 'gag pa dang mdog gsal dang //kha dog 'gyur zhing ra tshi mu myos//de ni slong pa'i ra brgyad//ro yis dgug byas dga' ba rnams//shin tu bzang
421b2(rgyud): po skye bar 'gyur//dga' dang mchog gi dga' ba dang //dpra' bral lhan skyes de bzhin//dga' bo zhes bya snang po yin//mchog dge'i snang ba mched par bstan//dga' dral//
421b3(rgyud): snang ba thob ces bya//lhan skyes de ni yang dag 'ong //de yi dus na skad cog skye//sna tshogs la sogs mtshan nyid do//snang ba zla ba zhi su bstan//snang ba mched pa nyi
421b4(rgyud): mi'o//mtshams ni snang ba thob par brags//gsum dang bral ba yang dag 'ong //gang tshe mdud pa'i nang du sems//de tshe dga' ba 'byung bar 'gyur//mdud pa'i mtsham
421b5(rgyud): nas nas gsum tsam//mchog gi dga' ba 'byung bar 'gyur//gsum gyi gnas nas gsum du 'gro/dga' bral 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o//gang zhig gsum dang
421b6(rgyud): gsum spangs pa//de kho na nyid rang bzhin shar//de ni gsang ba chen po'i mchog/gsang ba'i gsang ba yang dag mchog/'dus pa la sogs rgyud rnams//leg dgyes
421b7(rgyud): dbang mi skyes pa bya//sdom pa 'am ni rkye rdo rje//der yang gsal bar ma byas//khyod kyi ngor mdzad mchog de ni//gas chen ba dashrI gis gsal ba ri byis//sangs rgyas
422a1(rgyud): /byang chub sems dpa' drung //gzhan ma shrI mr-ing kun nyan myong smra//de lta mchu byu bi d+h+r-i khAn//bdag min na nI de mi shes//bAn+dan yad rgyas
422a2(rgyud): kyi dbyings grags pa// nyin cig dadrug gisashid //namA kha'i chos kyi dbyengs yin k+Sha/dbyu sa ni sa ban zhes dran//chos rnams kun gyi na na yod/
422a3(rgyud): chub mchog gi gnas yin no// ltar ti lA la myur yod dang //de ltar shing lda ma yod pa//de bzhin chos rnams kun la yod //chos kyi dbyes kyis khyab pa ni/
422a4(rgyud): na yang ni mthong mye 'gyuras dbying sa ni b+ha gar grags//b+h+ya/rinanan yin no//dbang phyug la sogs yon tanA ldan//daM ni b+hu gA kun tu
422a5(rgyud): rgyus ni b+ha grA zhes byung ba stu na//dbyings ni som su shes par dran//'anam gsum gyi ni mtha' yas lnga//sems ni de yi rgyu yin nI//kun rje hUM rnam pa'i gzug
422a6(rgyud): ni/ zla lta bu ma bIr 'gyur//don myi doni mthong ba med//mthong mau ma yin dA ste myed min//rang rlig pa ni mchog zhi pa//dang sa dang dadus mdo
422a7(rgyud): bral bo//de ni mchog gi de kha na/ chos kyi dbyis bdag zhi ba'i//dpal phyag rgya chen pa'i thig le las A li kA li 'byung ba dang /dus kyi mtshan nyid dang/
422b1(rgyud): ngas pardzu na pa zhes y-ib+h+yo glu dgaganan rgyu tan ga ga slob sh+tsa//d+hAn d+hA mtshan n+dan+da//m+b+ha prA rda d+hA/
422b2(rgyud): /shes y-i bdag nyid //nAm+b+ha b+ha lA yi dngas suM mi//rnam yi dag nyid//Sh+Ti skye de na ni bzhugs//thig ga
422b3(rgyud): skye med//rnam pa rnams pad rnam pa med//de na / ldan tu glegs//bdag gi sgyus sa pa ni/cig bdag gis de nyid shad//a ni
422b4(rgyud): bru gzugs kyi mchog/thams cad kun gyi sas nad yo//rnam pa thams cad mjug ni rdzogs//kun yang maskyes thams cad ma khyen//rtag tu stong /
422b5(rgyud): sa /mas ng+ge na ng+ge ng+geH/skyed ba skyed mdo gzhin mi ni// da//lus ni de zhin gyi shas smra/
422b6(rgyud): byams cad don ni byung nus pa ni//gi phyogasa' gzugs dang brel//lus sbyinas lus la m+b+ha skyes pa//rnam kun las rnam par grol
422b7(rgyud): bya sa su byang kun //dus pa ngas mi na /so ma'i byung ba po//dngos kyi thams cad na ze /
423a1(rgyud): kye sku yi rang bzhin can//sems ni rdo rje 'dzin skyabs sbyin//yi ge thams cad dang bral la//stong pa'i rnab mya ngan 'das//ye shes sku yi rang bzhin//
423a2(rgyud): can//dri med brjod med zhi ba ste//de ni haM du kun tu grags//bdag ni thams cad kun gyi nang //thams cidang bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs//drangs po kun gyi bdag nyid la//
423a3(rgyud): de ni khyab par yod pa ste//bdag ni med na 'gro ba kun//ji ltar rtsa bcad shing bzhin//haM gi yi 'bru 'tshams kyi mthar//a ni yig 'bru mgo ba'i rtse ra/
423a4(rgyud): a nau yig 'bru zla ba dag/haM gi yig 'bru nyi ma'i 'od//a ni yig 'bru rten yin te//he ge yig 'bru rten pa'o//a yi yig 'bru srog zhes ba shad//haM gi yig
423a5(rgyud): 'bru rtsol bar dran//gang zhig gan su de gnyis sbyor//de ni bdag nyid gsal bar 'gyur//rgyud rnams kun las rnyed dka' ba//de ni yang dag bdag sgrar
423a6(rgyud): bshad//dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las rdo rjerje'i mtshan nyid dang //bdag sgra'i nges pa'i don zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o////gsang ba'i
423a7(rgyud): don ni bshad bya ba//gsang ba zhes bya ci zhes brjid//gsang ba zhes bya dga' bar bstan//mchog ces bya ba mchog yino//dgyes pa zhes bya dga'
423b1(rgyud): bral bstan//thams cad bdag nyid lhan skyes dran//gsang ba nyid ni gsang ba yin//gsang ba khu bar bskrun pa'o//khu ba sgrog cesu bstan pa ste//skyog ni rten
423b2(rgyud): du dran pa'o//rten ni sar ni shes par bya//khams gsum kun ni 'byung ba'o//mchog ni chu zhes bstan pa ste//chu ni srog gri tshe yino//cha ngal de ni 'od ces
423b3(rgyud): bstan//'od ni rnam pa drag ces dran//rnam par dag pa bde chen dngos//de ni rang bzhin bstan pa'o//rnam par dag pa 'byung min gnas//babs pa rnam dag brjod pa
423b4(rgyud): yin/babs pa dngos mi nu zhes byar bstan//dngos min rnam dgra brjod ma yin//rnam dag phra ba'i phra mo ste//phra mo'i rnam dag gzhan na gnas//phra mo'i rang bzhin zhes
423b5(rgyud): byar bsten//gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs//rang dngos bde ba chen po ni//ye shes rlung du rab tu grags//de ni na mkha' zhesu bshad//na mkha' stong par bstan
423b6(rgyud): pa'o//stong pa las ni thams cad 'byung //stong pa'i nang du thams cad thim//stong pa yang dag dri med ga nas//rnam pa thams cad dang bral ba//mchog gi rnam pa skye
423b7(rgyud): med dag/rang dga'i nyam su myong ba dngos/de ni rang bzhin zhesu bshad//thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs//rigs lnga yi ni mtshan nyid de//nyon cig bdag
424a1(rgyud): gis bshad par bya//rigs ni ka pA la zhes brjod//ka pA la ni ka ru bshud//kra ni rtsa ba zhes byar grags//rtsa ba bye brag lnga ru dran//de bzhin
424a2(rgyud): gshegs pa lnga yi sku//de ni phung po lnga zhes dran//phung po lnga ni grub pa'i sku//'byung ba lnga yi rang bzhin can//tshangs pa khyab 'jug drag po dang //dbang phyug
424a3(rgyud): rtag tu zhi ba la//lnga la khyab pa gcig pu ste//bdag ni don dam pa yi pha//thams cad khyab pa'i stong chen po//bdag ni 'pho med mA skyes pa//ka ni gang
424a4(rgyud): zhig thugs rje 'thung //pA ni dam tshig skyong ba yin//la ni ngan 'gro'i pha rol phyin//dI nau ka pA la ru bshud//ka yi sgra ni rang bzhin yin//ka ni gang du'ang mi
424a5(rgyud): gnas pa'o//dngos po thams cad khyab pa'o//des nA kA zhes bstan pa'o//de bdag he ru ka'i dngos//chos kyi 'khor lo'i gnas na bzhugs//rtag tu zhi ba longs
424a6(rgyud): spyod 'khor//dbang phyug bde chen 'khor lo'o//drag pa lte ba'i 'khor lor gnas//khyab 'jug mye yi 'khor lo'o//tshangs pa rlung gi 'khor lor te//rlung ni
424a7(rgyud): thams cad nang yod che//bdag ni 'khor lo drug gi dbus//kun la de ni khyab par bzhugs//stong nyid gzhan mchog stong pa nyid//bdag dpal
424b1(rgyud): mjug/mkha' khri lnga yo gaNaza ste//ye shes mkha' 'gro dbang phyug bdag/'byung ba lha yi rang bzhin can//mkha' 'gro ma yis kun tu bskor//dpal phyag n+d+ha nan/
424b2(rgyud): po'i thig la las//gsung bdung /dga' ba bzhi dang /rigs lnga'i mtshan nyid rnaMs bya ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o///de nas gzhan yang bshad
424b3(rgyud): bArgya phyag brgya'i brda ni rab yin te/rna cha gdu bu 'khor lo dang //'gul ngo de bzhin thal ba dang //tshongs pa'i skud pa phyag rgya drug/pha rol phyin drug dran pa'o//
424b4(rgyud): sbyin po tshul khrims bzod brtan 'grus//byasam gtan shes rab drug yin//sbyin pa chos zhes bstan pa ste//tshul khrims laso zhes dran pa'o//bzod pa dam
424b5(rgyud): //zhe su dran//brtson 'grus ting 'dzin shes par bya//bsam gtan ye shes zhes byur dran//shes rab zhes b+h+rUM phyag rgya che//dan dam par ni shes par bya/
424b6(rgyud): skye mched drug ni dag par bya//phyag rgyu drug du rab tu grags//rigs drug rlom par shes par bya//sgyu mo'i bdag nyid phyag rgyu drugo/sa~M r-i l-i khaM aM d+hi ste//lha mo yi
424b7(rgyud): rim pas//de ru mchod po rab tu bya//mchod po ri mnyam rim pa'o//thim dang longs spyod dbang gis ni//gnas kun gyi ni de bzhin no//gtum mo btso blag Na ba dang /
425a1(rgyud): /gar mkhan thod pa bram ze mo//gtumA mo pad+ma'i rigs yin te//bcwa zlag rin tshun rigs dran//Du byA rdo rje'i rigs zhes bya//gar
425a2(rgyud): mkhan ral gri'i rigasu dran//thod pa tsAn+da ni 'khor lo'i rigs//de lnga dag pa phyag rgya'o//ye shes phyag rgya bram ze mo//rdo rje sems dpa'i rigasu
425a3(rgyud): dran//bram ze mo ni ma yin te//thod pa ma ni srang mor dran//gar mkhan bu mor shes par bya//DoM bi chung maur rab tu grags//btso blag mkhan ni mna' ma
425a4(rgyud): yin//gtum mo skyug mor dran pa'o//shes rab thabs kyis cho ga yis//rtog pa med pas mchod par bya//rnam rtog med pas dang sa grub 'grub//ji ltar
425a5(rgyud): bsnyen pa/skad ci tog gis//ma ni sems zhes bstan pa ste//gsung ni 'de ru sring mor dran//bu mo sU ru rnam par grags//chung ma srog ces bya ba dran//
425a6(rgyud): mna' ma rtsel bar dran pa ste//skyug mo mnyam par dran pa'o//ma nr-i mthu yi rgyu yin te//sngangs rgyas rin po che yI snod//sring mo khu ba'i rtsa yin te//mtshogs//
425a7(rgyud): mi'i gnas na yod pa'o//bu mo khrag gi rtsa yin te//khu ba'i rtsa yi 'og na yod//chung ma dri chu'i rtse yin te//gnyis kyi bar na yod pa'o//mna' ma mchi ma'i
425b1(rgyud): rtsa yin te//mgrin pa'i gnas na yod pa'o//sgyug mo snrubs kyi rtswa yin te//dpral ba'i gnas na yod pa'o//ma ni sa ru shes par bya//sring mo chu ru dran pa'o//
425b2(rgyud): bu mo me ni yin par dran//chung ma rlung du rab tu grag/mna'i ma de ni na mkha' ste//sgyug mo na mkha' ma yino//ma ni mngar ba yin par 'gyur//sring mo de ni skyur bar
425b3(rgyud): dran//bu ma kha bar shes bya ste//chung ma lon tshur 'di ru dran//tsha ba dr-i nI man 'am ste//sgyug mo bsko bar dran pa'o//de rnams 'brang pas mchod par bya//rgyur du
425b4(rgyud): dngos grub theb par 'gyur//rnal 'byor rgyud las rnyed dka' ba//phyag rgya'i rigasu bdag gis bshad/dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig la las phyag rgya'i baji dang
425b5(rgyud): mchod pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba'i le ste dgu pa'o////de nas mchod pa'i cha gra nI//phyi dang nang de byadag gi so bstan//saM rdo la sogs mchod rten la//nam
425b6(rgyud): yang de la phyag mi bya//rab gnasde dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg rnams//nam yang de ni mi bya'o//dri tshun rdor chu sa bon sogs//rtag tu bdag nyid mchod par bya//
425b7(rgyud): 'gro dang mi 'ag gang zhig ni//de ni thams cad sems yin no//de yi gzugs grub sems ma yin//sems ni stong pa'i rang bzhino//ngo bo nyid bral stong pa ste//
426a1(rgyud): de bas 'gro ba sems su grub//de lta bu yi dag byas na//rtsasogs la yang mdzod pa bya//nyid na mnga' bdag rdo rje sems//sems ni bdan
426a2(rgyud): nyid dran pa'o//sems ma yin pa lha yi dngos//phyi rol gzhan ma med pa'o//de ltar shes nas bdag nyid ni//dang po de nyid mchod par bya//rigs lha dag tu kun
426a3(rgyud): spyod pa//rigs gcig tu ni rnam par brtag/byams dang sdang ba'i bye brag dang //btung dang mi btung spang bar bya//bud med gang yang snod min med//dog
426a4(rgyud): dang mi dge sgra mi bya//dngas grub rnal 'byor med pa dang //sdigs med sngags pa med par ni//dngangosra grub chen po thob 'dod na//de lta bu yi sems mi bya//
426a5(rgyud): rlurlabs che gi ting rnying yang dag pa'i//skyes bu chen pos sems de bya//nyan thos rnams dang mnyam pa'i sems//nam yang de ltar mi bya'o//bstan med nyan
426a6(rgyud): thos skal ldan min//lags pa'i mun pas ye shes g.yogs//de rnams la ni gtam tsam yang //skyes bu chen pos mi sbyi no//smod par yang ni yod mi bya//
426a7(rgyud): de la nam yang phyag mi bya//phyi dang nang gi sbyor ba yi//'di ru gnas ni bdag gis bshad//rdo rje'i gnas ni ur+yan dang //gnas ni dzA lan d+ha ra ra dran//
426b1(rgyud): nasan+de pul+lI ma dang //gnas ni kAmA rA nga'o//nywa b+ha'i gnas ni mA lang bstan//smi d+hA nA garaR+sha sing kha la//da na musu nI du glags//de bzhin da wI ko Ta dang //
426b2(rgyud): nye bu'i zhing nr-i ku lu ta//ar bu dar ni de bani nAd+han//ha rIkI la chen da har//go dI bi ri de bzhin no//lA pa ka dang kI ts+yai ste/nye ba'i tshan dang bstan pa'o//'dus pa/
426b3(rgyud): da ni krA mar te//de bzhin du ni gser gling ngo //kong ka dang nI b+hinA da ste//nye ba'i 'dus par dran pa'o//yi dgas 'dus pa'i dur khrod dang //dur khrod rgya mtsho'i dag slo
426b4(rgyud): nyi'i dur khrod tsi rIt+tha//de bzhin kau mar ba ra'o//kausl-i pA lI rda ru grags//de bzhin ke rung yul yin no//nye ba'i pA lAn pa la//nye baiSh+To pA la kur nA dza//
426b5(rgyud): u Di yai na spyi bo'i gnas//dz+wa lan d+hA ri spyi gtsug /prem+b+hir ni tshigs ma ste//kA mA n+ti sming+ge brag dbus//mU la bai ni sA d+hi ste//srin d+ha smrig gnyis min
426b6(rgyud): par grags//na bAr rU ba gnyi su d+ha naM//si gun mkhi'i pad+mar gnas//mum+bu nai ni kaMs ka/de b+h+ri kr-i Ti mAgrin gling du//ku l+r-i tA ne rgyu'i gling du//Ar b+hU
426b7(rgyud): dA rI bu gnyis//hi ri ke la snying khe'o//go dI ba ri lAM ba'i gnas//lAM pa kaMnA~Mgasang bar ro//kI tsi ling ka'i dbus su gnas//kar mo ling ki'i rtse mor ro//
427a1(rgyud): bste gli bzhung kwa'i gnas te//klo kAn nI bAR+Sha gnyis dran//b+hinA sa mo d+hanyis sbyin no//yi dwags 'dus pa byin pa ste//rkang byol gnyis su/
427a2(rgyud): rgya mtsho ngogs//kau mA rin mithe bong ste//tsa r-i tI ni sor mor ro//kha tshor yul ni lus rnams du na//kai rA ta ni rkang mthil lo//ne po la ni lto ga ba ste/kaM bo dzi nI rke pa'i
427a3(rgyud): de ni don dam pa yi gnas//ri bong can 'od me tog dang //me tog dmar po nyi mnyam gyis//mchod pa'i dus su mchod par bya//srog gcod pa yi mchod sbyin ni//
427a4(rgyud): 'bad pas de ru dbul bar bya//pad+ma chen po mchog nas su//srog ni gcad par bya ba'o//chad pa nAm yang mi bya ste//de la brtson 'grus chen po bya//srog gcod pa
427a5(rgyud): yi bsod nams bya//mchog gi mchog ni yung drag rnyed//gru gsum dri myed dag par ni//de ru dkyil 'khor 'phyar ma gnyis//nang gi 'phar mar dpalnga bcom
427a6(rgyud): ldan//byang chub sems nyid ldan pa'o//phyi rol rigs gsum rnal 'byor ma//'dzin ma la sogs mchog che no//lus kyi nang nas 'byung ba'i phyir//de ni lha mo zhes
427a7(rgyud): bstan//dkyil 'khor lus su bstan pa dang //b+ha ga dkyil 'khor yin par bshad//dkyil 'khor byang chub kyi ni sems//dkyil 'khor gsum ni rtogs
427b1(rgyud): 'o//dur khrod brgyud kyi dbus gnas//dkyil 'khor gsum ni smras pa'o//dbugs 'byung dur khrod zhesu bla shad//blo dgu dang ni ldan pa'o//yang dag nyon cig/
427b2(rgyud): zhal bzang mo//de yis 'byung ba bdag gis bshad//gtum drag gzhung ka'i dbyibs can ni//gsang be'i tshad cheng kha ru'o//'bar be zhes bya'i dur khrod ni//sna
427b3(rgyud): yi bu ga gnyis na gnas//dmyal sogs de bzhin mi bzang pa//mig gnyis la ni gnas pa'o//ha ha ra dgod drang g.yer ka can//rna bA gnyis la gnas
427b4(rgyud): pa'o//dur khrod re re'i shing ro ni//dbang byed pa ni de na yod//gtum+ba drag pA ta la yi shing //dbyibs can nang na shi ka ra'o//tshang tshing sa li shing yin no//
427b5(rgyud): 'bar ba zhes bya so ri sha'o//dmyal sogos u dum ba ra ste//mi zad pa ni 'ba' ti'i shing //ha ha dgod na a shwad tha//ga yer ka'i nang na ge sar shing //shing
427b6(rgyud): gi rnam pa rtswa brgyad ni//yan lag mang po yod pa'o//gzhung mthu rtse mo mthus byed ma//ro yi rtse myor ro lus ma//ne mkha' ma dang char sbyin ma//rul pa ma dang
427b7(rgyud): lhogs ma ste//bye brag brgyad du dgyes par dran//shing gi sgra ni rtsa yin te//shing ni me tog yod phyiraro//mchog gi dkyil 'khor stong du ni//me tog med
428a1(rgyud): na dri ltar mchod//dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig lo las/dkyil 'khor dang /lha mo dang /gnas dang /dur khrod dang /shing dang /
428a2(rgyud): mchod pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//nyon mongs thams cad med byed pa//nyan cig sbyin sreg bdag gis bai shred//lte ba'i gnas nA/
428a3(rgyud): tshul yod pa//tshul gyi mtha' na gsung byung do//de ru rang 'bar gyi ni rlung //bskor ba byas nas ngal so ste//dbang po gnyis shing sbyar ba yis//rlung
428a4(rgyud): me ni sbyar ba'o//mar yang lAn+di sted 'khor lo//da ni mar snod zhe su dra nA~M//ha ni blugs gzar zhesu bshung //dgrang gzar 'di ru rdo rjer bstunra//ho mthu
428a5(rgyud): b+ha ga zhesu bshad//'bru ni dbang po lnga ru dran//ya mi shing phung po zhes byar bstan//byang chub sems ni mar du bsreg/mer nga yi ni man chad du//
428a6(rgyud): nyal thug nAs gshegs su gsol//theg pa phyeng tsam dgang gzar las//ha~M l+r-ing phyi rol yang mi bya//sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang /
428a7(rgyud): bya dang lha min srin pa dang //'jig rten skyong ba 'i byed rnams la//bsreg bya yis ni rang tshim bya//mchod pa gang zhig rding sems la//sreg
428b1(rgyud): rdzas gang bas dbul bar bya//hUM phaT rnam pa'i sngags kyis ni//mkhas pas sreg rdzas sbyin par bya//de yis mkha' 'gro ma rnams dang //gzhan yang rnal 'byor ma mo/
428b2(rgyud): mnyes//gang zhig yid la ci bsam pa//dngos grub chen po mtha' yas ster//re ba thams cad 'grub byed pa//de lta'i sbyin sreg bdag gis bshad//dpal phyag
428b3(rgyud): rgya chen po'i thig le las don dam pa'i sbyin sreg gi tshig zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o///bdud rtsi lnga yi cho ga'i rab//mdor bsdus pa
428b4(rgyud): ni bdag gis bshad//rnam snang mi bskyod don yod grub//dpag med ran 'byung zhes sngar bstan//rin chen 'byung ldan khrag ces bstan//snang ba mtha' yas
428b5(rgyud): khu bar brjod//don yod grub pa sha chen te//mi bskyod pa ni rdo rje chu'o//rnam par snang mdzad dri chen bshad//da ni bdud rtsi lnga yin//dben dang mI med dges
428b6(rgyud): pa yis//gnod pa thams meng dang bral ba'i//de ru khang pa rab tu bya//nyes rtseg dang ni sgo dang ldan//gcig ni sa yi 'og tu bya//de yi steng ni gnyis pa'o//
428b7(rgyud): 'jig rten pa yis gcig tu shes//de ltar mkhas pas khang po bya//re shig sgrub dbang skal ldan pa//thos pa che shing sor sna med//snying rje chen po'i rlan/
429a1(rgyud): dang ldan//zhe sdang phrag dog bral ba dang //dpa' ba che dang rlabs che ba//bsgrubs pa'i grogs dang de bzhin te//'dod chags chags
429a2(rgyud): bral gnyis med pa//ser sna med cing brtson 'grus ldan//khro ba med cing dpa' chen po//zla ma laM gus thos pa che//'bras bu gsum la sogs pasna lus//
429a3(rgyud): dang por yang dag des drug bya//de nas sngags ras 'bum phrag gcig/su~Md+ha'i sgra blas ni gastal bar bzlas/s+yA b+hA nI suM d+hA n+d+re h+na phaT/oMhrId+d+ha
429a4(rgyud): gr-ih+NA d+hU hUM phaT/oM gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ye hUM hUM phaT/oM A na ya ho b+ha gA bAn badz+ra bid+yA rA dza hUM hUM phaT/de ni yi ge gsum gyi sngags//sgrub pa'i dang
429a5(rgyud): pos yid kyis bzlas//rmi la maHnI ni 'di ltar mthang //rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs kyi 'dus//dri yi gsungs gi sbyin pa ni//yid 'phro ga ma yi bu mo
429a6(rgyud): khyar//sems can don ni tshad med kyis//ji ltar rdo rje 'dzin pas mdzad//mig mdzes bu mo rnyed pa ni//gzugs dang lang che rgyan dang ldan//'dod chags
429a7(rgyud): tshon pos rgyags pa dang //legs dgyes rengs par g.yo ba dang //sngo bsangs nu sra dpa' mi dang //rdog med pa dang thos pa che//de 'dri'i bu mo chen mo la//
429b1(rgyud): glang na mtshan 'byung bar 'gyur//de la grong pa'i sbyor ba yis//shes rab thabs kyi chog bya//gang cha ro ni 'byung bar 'gyur//de tsam de tsam rab tu bya//da cha//
429b2(rgyud): khA ye pad+ma yis//zhag bdun bar du blang bar bya//shin tu gsal ba'i pad snod du//rin chen 'dra ba'i rak+Sha bzhag/nyi ma gsum du kha yis ni//dag
429b3(rgyud): ba'i pad rgyal bzhi pa par bya//shes rab thabs kyi cho ga ni//yang ni rnal 'byor pa yas brtsams//de ru chang ni btung bar bya//stobs kyi sa lu bza'
429b4(rgyud): par bya//yang na ra yi 'o mo 'am//yang na na mkha' stobs bza'o//mtshan mo nyin mo sbyar ba yis//bsrubs thobs chen po dpyad par bya//glang tshe khu
429b5(rgyud): chan 'od 'gyur bas//bu mo myos par gyur pa na//de che kha yis blang bar bya//lce la sogs pa'i gtsags bu yis//skyon med po yi gan su ni//pad+mi'i
429b6(rgyud): snod du bzhag par bya//brgyad dzat+te yang na bcu bzhi dang //yang na bcu ni mar gyi ngo //mdung rtse yang ni ral gres busad//rIgos lnga'i nang na rigs gcig gi/
429b7(rgyud): ni che med dang bde ba 'grub//gzugs dang lang cha ldan pa dang //skye ba bdun nam yang na gsum//sgrub pa'i grogs kyis khyer nas 'ong //sna tshogs mchod
430a1(rgyud): sbyin mchod pa yis//rtse gcig gis ni mchod par bya//de yi yan lhag rab ni blang //pad+ma'i snod ni du la bya//shes rab dang ldan
430a2(rgyud): thabs kyis ni//de yi snod du chad btung bya//stobs chen rlung nyid cung zad tsam//dngos grub phyir ni bza'i' bAr b+ha//pad+ma'i snod du bsrubs pa las//cung
430a3(rgyud): zad 'bad de bzhag par bya//gzhan ma sman gyis 'bad de ni//grogs kyis dbang pos btso bor bya//ra yi 'o mo til ma ri dang //mar ni sha ka ra dang bcas///
430a4(rgyud): kha ra la sogs mnyam pa'i cha//stobs nI lA ru gyur dran pa'o//kha ru tsha dang tsha ba gsum//sug sbrel nA ga ge sar dang //dza ti pa la dA tsa dang //ga pur
430a5(rgyud): rim par che bar bya//shin tu 'dzam pa'i dri med snod//a ga ru sogs kyis bdug bya//'bad nga gzhon gyi snod du btso//bdug pa byas par gzhug par
430a6(rgyud): bya'o//nyi ma bdun gyi bar du ni//stobs che ni sa lu bza' bar bya//de ni zos pa tsam gyis ni//gang zhig mi bskyod sngar 'od 'gyuraro//de ni pad+ma'i slong du
430a7(rgyud): blong //steng dang 'og ni mkhas pas bor//tho rangs cung zad tsam no btung //cung zad tsam ni snod du bzhag/shes rab thabs kyi gnyis 'byung ba//de yi
430b1(rgyud): slad mdzad 'dud pa ni//rnal 'byor pa yi s+ya rtse gcig bya//rnal 'byor grogs po'i sgrub pa'o//'bras bu ur shing man+ta shrid dang //tA kar kAr+N+Na pus ku ram//'o ma
430b2(rgyud): ding ni chang ro ro ldan//rtse gcig gis ni btso ba ni//lcags kyi snod du btso bar bya//ma rnyed na ni rdza snong du//dag pa'i rigs kyi me tog gis//nyi ma bdun du
430b3(rgyud): bdug par bya//de nas snying po'i sman de ni//rim pas che bar blugs par bya//li shi ga bur la ta dang //gla rtsi tsan+dan dza ti dang //dza ti pha la sug smel dang //
430b4(rgyud): dra cha tsha ba gsum dang ro//dkar po'i sha kar dang ldan pa'i// mar dang bcas nasra btso bar bya//me ni 'jam par smin pa yis//grogs kyi dbang pos partsa
430b5(rgyud): bar bya//u ga ru sogs kyis da dug gis//rdo yi snod du bzhag par bya//nyin re zhing ni zho gnyis/ni//zhu ba yin na bza' bar bya//zhu ba yin na zho bzhi
430b6(rgyud): dang D+hau/de nas rko dug rtag tu bza'o//bdud rtsi lnga yi tshig de//gsang chen bdag gis bshad pa'o//gzhan ma yan lag lnga yau sman//mkhas pas de
430b7(rgyud): la ril bu bya//sgyu ru ra tsam du byas te//grib ma la ni bskam par bya//ras dang yan lag bkru byas te//de bzhin thig le bya ba'o//'bad de kha la bzhag par bya//
431a1(rgyud): tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor spong dang bya//zho dang rgyus dang dbang byed dang //drag po dregs la sogs pa yin//ril bu yis ni byas
431a2(rgyud): tsam na//the tsom med par 'grub par 'gyur//dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le la so bdud rtsi lnga bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o///

431a4(rgyud): gr-i cig gis//de ni yang dag bdag giso bshad//mu dun chang ba la shi/a me la a tsu 'dus par dran//'gro ba khe Ta ro shA ba//ni rI shu ka rus
431a5(rgyud): pa'i rgyun//phreng kha na ni 'ong ba yin//kun tu ru ni dbang po sbyor//du dur+ya skal ldan+da min bA bA shu daM//kA liny+dzar skal ldan gzhung ngo //DiNI reg+sa bya min/
431a6(rgyud): papar bstan//thod pa pap+pa brA dz+nyA na//dri chen bzhi mnyam yin por bstan//dri chu gla rtsib dran pa'o//khu ba ga bur bstan pa ste//sha chenau sA li dzI ru
431a7(rgyud): dran//b+ha ha ka ni chu zhes bya//b+h+yo ni yan lag zhes byar dran//shaM ka bzang po zhi su bshad//ho zhes bya ba 'grangs par ba shang //dze g+h+r-i k+Shi ba laM kar
431b1(rgyud): bskos//'byu m+b+hag+han tshogs 'khor lo//kA bo li ni gyo du 'gyur//nA gar ni bdag byin bshad//b+hU tA ka ni khyod lhur 'gyur//ag+na blor ba zlas bstan//
431b2(rgyud): bseng ba rin che no zhe suM dran//bza' bdud du shes par bya//sha dag bza' bu min du dran//drug pa zhes bya stegasu bshid//dag pa min pa nyi mer brjid/
431b3(rgyud): rib tshangs pa grags pa ste//rgyal rigs lus su bstan+do pa'o//chags bral rje zhes bstan pa ste//chags pa de mangs rigs zhes bya 'dran//tsaN+Da li na ga
431b4(rgyud): shes bshad//shrA pa tsan mdor ru bshad//tsarma ka ra srid 'khor lo//puk+ka sI ni ral grir bstan//'da' ba ka ni stong zhes bshad//ha re ka ni'athal bar
431b5(rgyud): bshad//ra tsa rgya mtsho zhesu bshad//mi ni shi bar bstan pa'o//rgyus phyug ces bya bar dran//pak+ka ni bram zer bstan pa'o//nya nI pa la sha zhes bstan/
431b6(rgyud): ra ni nyin mong bstan pa'o//lu na mtshan mor shes par bya//bya la sogs pa nyim byed//me tog gsar ni zhes bstan//spros ni shar dul ru brjod//dri ni
431b7(rgyud): ma la te ru bshang //ma par shok+ko ni kar dran//gos ni ka shi ko ru bshad//bod ba ko ma la ru bstan//dpral po chu zhes bya bar brjod//sprin ma phreng de
432a1(rgyud): dra /mig ni At+pal shes par bya//s+yA nI yA da na ru bstustan//rbu ni pa la wA ru shes//mgrin pa gling bu bstan pa'o//phung po dpra zhes
432a2(rgyud): bstan//lag dar myu gur bstan pa'o//lag pa mtsho skyes bstan par grags//nu ma dpal 'bras brjod pa'o//dbus nI re byung shes par bya//lte ba rmi
432a3(rgyud): da na ru bstAr+Ya//baR+YA nI kai tam pa ru grags//pad+ma dza gA no ru ran//byin pa dza na bI ru brjod//rkang pa a tsa shi rA ra dAn//sen mo yan la khi sar rab//smra ni
432a4(rgyud): mad shrI ba ri//s+thAn nI shA t+yA ku sum ste//nus pa pu ni zhe sa dran//mi nus pa ni pud+ma'i sbyong //thams cad ming gi rje mar dran//gzhon nu rdzid zhes bya bar
432a5(rgyud): grags//bar mi mtsho zhes bya bar dran//rgan po rgya mtsho zhes par dran//myong ba mr-i smra zhesu 'gyur//myong ba ma yin gang le bar dran//mi sme ri dwagos nA
432a6(rgyud): su brjod//glu ni bag chags zhus bshad//gar nau grags po zhes par dran//sgra ni tshul la chos zhesu bo shad//reg bya zhugs pa zhesu dran//ra ni skrag
432a7(rgyud): bzhi su bstan//gzugs ni ri zhes brjod pa'o//gsod pa smra ni zhes badz+ra ni phug ron ngan pa'o//grong ni ti li'i me tog ste//grong khyer 'dris
432b1(rgyud): bu yin par brjod//ljongs na 'dod pa zhes byar bstan//'dod pa srog ces bya bar dran//ma shrIs de ni 'dul bar dran//shes pa spyang par shes par bya//dgong
432b2(rgyud): bri nas bya byis par bsten//du bi khrag tu dran pa'o//nyin mo gzhon nur shes par bya//mtshan maM bu mer rab tu grags//mas ni bud med shes par bya
432b3(rgyud): nyin byeng bran du bstun pa'o//'dus pa yi ni dbus gnasu//rnal 'byor ma ni rtag tu brjod//dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las rnal 'byor ma 'dus pa'i
432b4(rgyud): gnasuM gas te'i skad bsnun pa zhes byA baiSh+Ti le'u ste bicu gsum pa'o/de na sa kunan yang bshad bya ba//yin lag phyag rgya sogs
432b5(rgyud): mtshan nyid/gang zhig sor mo gcig ni ston//basbyin rmed pa zhes spyan 'dren no//sor mo gnyis ni bstan pa yis//legs par bstun lan ldan pa
432b6(rgyud): yin//gang zhig gung mo ston byed pa//nga la srin lag bstan par bya//gong zhig srin lag ston byed pa//de la lce ni bstan par bya//gang zhig gzhi bas pa
432b7(rgyud): sbyin byed pa//de la rtse gsum bstan par bya//gang zhig gcig sung ston byed pa//de la mtshogs ma bstan par bya//gang zhig dpral ba ston byed pa/
433a1(rgyud): de la khrur chos bstan par d+ha//gang+gA TIkA wA m+bu khAd ston byed pa//de las gzhi bA/na par bya//gang zhig lag gnyis n+d+hu
433a2(rgyud): ga/de la lag ngade bsnun paraSh+Ta//gang zhig mgrin pa sti byed de//de la lto bi bsnun par gyi//gung zhig ma mur+tha snron byed po//dem
433a3(rgyud): kos ko bstan par bya//gang zhig so ni ston byed pa//de la b+h+yo ni bstan par bya//gang zhig nu mo ston byed pa//de la kas khur bstan par

433a7(rgyud): sbron byed pa//de la nyi ma bstan par bya//gang zhig sa ni ston byed pa//de la nam mkha'o bstan par bya//gang zhig khro gnyer ston byed pa//
433b1(rgyud): la mtshams ni bstan pa d+ma///gang nags nan byadag/duladz+nyAn bstan par na//gang shog sa gron pa na ga/dum+b+ha/

433b3(rgyud): rgya sogs mtshan nyid do//dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig lo las rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi yan lag gi phyag rgyu la sogs pa zhes bya

433b7(rgyud): rtag tu mchod pa'i cho ga byed//pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug rigs//pad+ma'i gtso mor de shes bya//smin mtshams bar na
434a1(rgyud): rtse gsum yod//lus ni bsngo ba sangs smra ba dang //de yi khyim na rdo rje yod//tang ku dmar pos

434a3(rgyud): nA shrak+ti gsal 'gyur ba//mig du mar gdong ni dmar bla dang //de bzhin rkang pa lag pa dmer//rtag tu phug ron la

434a5(rgyud): ldan rje rje'i rigs su byung /mkha' 'gro ma yin dpa' bo'i ces//sprin sngo dag dang 'dra ba ni//rtag tu dpral bor thod yod pa
434a6(rgyud): khyim du 'khor lo 'dri byed cing //rtag tu de la mchod byed pa//rdo rje phag mo'i rigs 'byung ba'i//mkha' 'gro mra ni stobs kyis dregs//mig
434a7(rgyud): smon nam mkha' sngon po'i mdog/sa ni mtho ba drag mo dang //rtag tu khrus la dga' ba dang //mang du smra bar mi byed cing //khyim du rdo rje 'dra ba dang /
434b1(rgyud): tshunA mAM phyed na mchod pa byed//rdo rje phag mo'i rigasgra 'byung ba'i//dpal ldan rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma//bcoMm gu sor dang mnyam pa'i 'od//mig
434b2(rgyud): mi g.yo zhing ba spu meng/rdo rje gang gi dbrel ba 'am//khyim du yang ni gsal 'gyur ba/rgyal po'i btsun mo rtag tu skyeg/skal ldan mchog
434b3(rgyud): bden smra dang //mA la ki yi 'dra 'byung zhing //khyim du rdo rje mchod byed pa//khaN+Da ro hi'i rigs 'byung ba'o//mkha' 'gro ma ni ye shes rgyal//shin
434b4(rgyud): tu sha li dga' ba dang //mig smra ni nag po 'am num mkha' 'dra//rtse gsum rnam pA phra ba ru//gdug pa'i las lce rtag tu dga'//dur khrod/

435a1(rgyud): ni thams cad kyi//mdog dang mtshan ma rigs 'byung ba//mdor bsdus pa ni 'di ru bshang //rgyas par ye shes snying por ro//dpal phyag rgya chen po'i
435a2(rgyud): thig le las mkha' 'gro ma'i gzungs dang /mtshan nyid dang /rigs 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o///gang zhig bzhon min bdag
435a3(rgyud): nyid bzhugs//nyon cig dkyil 'khor rgyal dbang po//hUM gi rnam pa'i rnam pa can//bdag nyid hU~Mg dngos po yin//hUM gi rnam pa la gzugs 'byung //mtshan dang
435a4(rgyud): dpe byad ldan pa dag/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor steng na bzhu gas//nyi ma bye ba'i 'od dang mnyam//khyod dang lhan cig sbyor ba yis//chu skyes sngon pa'i gzugs dang ldan///
435a5(rgyud): zhal bzhi spyan gsum phyag brgyad de//g.yas brkyangs bas ni gnas na bzhugs//rdo rje dril bu nyi zla drong //mnga' gzhu dag ni 'gengs po drang //kha TI ga dang ka pA li//
435a6(rgyud): khrag chen po yis gang ba'o//bde ba'i gnasu bdag dang khyod//legs dgyes dgyes pa rol bgyid de//de nas dang po'i ro langs ni//spro nis rdo rje ro langs ma///
435a7(rgyud): gzugs gnag pa la phyag bzhi pa//mda' gzhu lag na 'gengs pa dang //chu srin g.yas na thogs pa dang //ka pA la dang kha T+wAM ga/g.yon gyi lag na thogs
435b1(rgyud): bsto//shar gyi sgo nA gnas pa ste//yang ni srab thabs sbyor ba yis//gnyis pa yi no ro rab las//rdo rje dra bA 'bros pa ni//gtsor bu dang ni spyan gsum pa//'dzin//
435b2(rgyud): dmar lag na nya thogs te//byang ga sgo yi gnas na bzhug so//yang ni ra ni gsum pa las//rdo rje rtse mo smras pa ni//mdog ser lag na seng ge thogs//nub sgra sa
435b3(rgyud): ni gnas na bzhugs//yang ni ra ni bzhi pa las//rdo rje zlum po 'phros pa ni//mdog dkar ldeg na byA khyud ste//lho yi sgron bzhugs pa'o//ro lnga de ni rnyed pA yis//
435b4(rgyud): rdo rje ska rags me ni spos//rdza rnga gling bu lkug na thogs//shar lho mtshams na gzugs gnyis pa'o//yang ni drug pa'i 'byung ba las//rdo rje ser mo smra ba ni//rgyung
435b5(rgyud): mangs rnga chen lag na thogs//m+b+ha nung mtshams na bzhugs pa'o//yang dag bdun bris rnyed pa ni//rdo rje rgod mi 'phro ba ste//rdza rnga dang ni cha lang thogs//nub byung
435b6(rgyud): mtshams na bzhugs pa'o//ro brgyad pa ni rnyed pa yis//rdo rje nyi ma spro ba~M ni//tam bu radang ka ra thogs//phyag gnyis rtag tu 'dzin pa'o//smras
435b7(rgyud): nas byang shar 'tshams su ni//bdud kun bcom nas bzhugs pa'o//yang ni srub dang bsrub thabs las//dang po dga' ba 'byung ba yis//rdo rje legs
436a1(rgyud): dgyes 'phros pa ni//ro yI snod ni lag na 'dzin//spros nas shar gyi phyogs kyi glung //chos 'byung gi ni grwan bzhugs//b+ha ga'i phyag rgya spyi bor
436a2(rgyud): ni//mdzub mo tshangs pa'i bu gi'i gnas//yang ni mchog gi dga' ba lngas//rdo rje mtsho mu 'phros pa ni//khrag gi snod ni lag ni brel//lho nub grA na bzhugs pa'o//
436a3(rgyud): yang ni dga' bral 'byung ba las//rdo rje glang chen ma 'phros pa//khu ba'i snod ni lag na thogs//nub byang phyogs kyi gre na bzhugs//de rnams gnag dang ser dang
436a4(rgyud): dmar//g.yon brkyang pas ni bzhugs pa'o//yang ni yang dag srub thabs las//lhan cig skyes dga'o 'byung ba ste//lhan cig skyes dga' 'dod tshugs che//
436a5(rgyud): me chen rab tu 'bar bya'o//khyod dang lhan cig de ru bdag/rang bzhin gyis ni yongasu 'gyur//dngos po med par bdag mi 'gyur//bdag ni rang bzhin gan su
436a6(rgyud): bzhugs//bdag gi ngo bo brjod mo nus//sangs rgyas kun gyis kyang rnyed dka'//yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis//gal te kun rdzob gzug su snyeng
436a7(rgyud): 'jig rten khams ni grangs med pa//gzhan ni ma yin bdag gis khyab//khyod dang lhan cig kun rdzob tu//'byung po'i rgyu phyir rol pa byed//bdag ni rol po mi
436b1(rgyud): byed na//sangs rgyas thams cad 'byung mi 'gyur//'di ni thams cad mi g.yo bar//'gro 'gyur bar ni the tshom med//rang bzhin las ni mchog gnasu//de dus bdag ni cang /
436b2(rgyud): mi smra//bdo chen legs dgyes mgon po bzhengs//rdo rje bzang dgyes bdag dga' mdzod//mgon po khyod min bdag ro 'dra//thugs rje ro yis bdag skye mdzod//kye mgon
436b3(rgyud): chad pa'i stong pa'i min//mgon po stong pa'i rang bzhin min//rdo rje mtsho ma bdag dga' mdzod//pad+ma kha phye rol cig ro pa//e la la la a la la/A lo la la legs dgyes
436b4(rgyud): mgon//rdo rje glang chen ma dga' mdzad//khyed rang gi gsungs bdag min na//sangs rgyas 'byung por mI 'gyur ro//ye shes sku las oM hUM 'dir//bdag dang khyod ni
436b5(rgyud): lhan cig bzhi ste//'khor lo drung bcas khro sku mchog/sum cu rtsa gnyis yan lag ldan//bde badri gan su bdag dang khyod//dur khrod te rgyud kyi dbus su ni//skye ba'i
436b6(rgyud): rgyu yi don phyir rol//bskyed pa'i rim pa yi ni phyogs//mdog gnag pa la 'od che ba//dbu skra me bzhin 'bar ba dang //zhal ni bcu drug spyan gsum pa//phyag ni
436b7(rgyud): bcu drug ldan pa dang //zhabs ni rnam pa bzhi yis ni//bdud bzhi yi ni steng na bzhugs//legs dgyes dbang phyug ma khyod bcas//ye shes mkha' 'gro dbang phyug bdag/
437a1(rgyud): khyod kyang nga yi gzugs dang mnyam//'jigs byed chung myur bcas pa'i steng //gru gsum dbus su nyi ma'i gdan//gyen pa zhabs ni gar dwang ldan//
437a2(rgyud): 'jigs ma dpa' mo chang 'thung ma//'jigs byed po nya stobs ma dang //rta 'brin ma dang rta rnamAM//glang chen sna dang lte ba ma//me ma dang ni chu rgyan mo//zla ba ma dang nye 'di ma/
437a3(rgyud): dung rnam dang dung gtsugs ma//dung lte ma dang stobs chen ma//bya rgod rgod kha hor pa ma//hor mig ma dang hi ri mgo ma//mig dmar skra dmar rin chen ma//phug ron dmar
437a4(rgyud): mA na ge mo ma//rI ming re dgus rA ma maM//phyag bzhi ma la sna tshogs gzugs//spyan gsum phul bzhin yang 'jigs//phyag gnyis mda' gzhu 'gadus par ldan//bzhan
437a5(rgyud): gyis gre dang zad pa 'dzin//rdo rje phreng ba dpral ba ru//phyag brgya lnga yis yan log brgyan//de lta bu yis 'khor lo che//khyod dang bcas pa bdag gi gnas//ga
437a6(rgyud): nyi shu rtsa brgyad gnas//de ni phyogs kyi gan su dran//rdor del rin rgyun 'khor lo drA 'aM/ral the rtse gsum mda' nyer//zla ga pra sta Dam+b+ha r+yA//gzhu dang thai ba ka pA la/
437a7(rgyud): b+hU ti'o lpags pa gyen du 'phyar//gshin rdo'i lpags pa rnyed la dkris//zhes gcig pa la phyag gnyis te//khyod kyang bdag gi mdog yi no//thams cad rgyan gyis
437b1(rgyud): brgyan pa dang //phyag gnyis mda' gzhu 'gengs pa'o//de nas rdzogs pa'i rim pa ni//rtswa yi 'byung ba rim pa mchog/lha mo re ro rtsa re ste//dwe yi bde ba bdag dang khyod//'dzum pa
437b2(rgyud): dang ni 'byed pa yiso//rlung gis me ni khang du chud//yang dag pa yi dbang po'i shing //de yis gtum mo 'bar bya'o//rnam par rtog pa'i phung po'i gzugs//thams cad lus
437b3(rgyud): ni sreg pa'o//dwe yi mAM'i bar yang dag gis//byed chen 'khor lo bzhu bar 'gyur//zhu pas rtswa ni thams cad ltos//mchog gi bdud rtsi 'dzag pa'o//yang ni lus ni skyes
437b4(rgyud): 'gyur te//lha ye sku ni thob par 'gyur//de ni gom pa'i sbyor ba yis//rtse gcig gis ni goms par bya//phyi yi phyug brgya med na yong //bde ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba yod//
437b5(rgyud): blta ba tsam ni dgos pa ste//de bzhin thams cad thams cad min//phyi nas rnam par rtog pa skyes//de la dngos grub med par 'gyur//ji ltar mun pa'i snod rnams ni//
437b6(rgyud): mar ma med nA mthong mi 'gyur//mar mes mthong bar gyur tsa mar+tha//phyi nang mar me dor bar bya//snod ni 'bad de bsrung bya ste//ma ro mes don bye me dgo so//mar me'i
437b7(rgyud): mtshan nyid 'di ru rtse//rtsa ni shes rab mtshan nyid do//thabs ni bde ba zhe su bstan//bde ba ye shes zhes byar dran//bde ba'i ye shes rang bzhin ni//gang zhig shes

438a5(rgyud): dad pas reg bya yod gyur na//de tshe mchog gi dga' ba ni//dri ma med pa 'byung bar 'gyur //yang ni dbang po gnyis phrad lasu//gang tshe de dang lhan cig sbyor//de yi tshe/
438a6(rgyud): na dga' bral ni//gsal bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o//gang tshe dbang po gnyis shing las//yang dag pa ye me 'bar na//de tshe lhan cig skyes dga' ni//srid pa myed
438a7(rgyud): pa 'byung bar 'gyur//nu mas reg pas blta ba ni//'dod pa de ni dang por dga'//byi nas de dngos rgyas pa ni//gang tshe nges par yin par 'gyur//de tshe skad cig gis
438b1(rgyud): de rgyas//mchog gi dga' ba byed pa'o//gang tshe de nyid shin tu yis//'dod chags mo ni 'bar 'gyur na//de tsha 'bar bya'i thig le ni//dga' bral dga' ba 'bab pa'o//
438b2(rgyud): rdo rje pad+ma rol byung ba//de bzhin dga' bral dga' ba'o//de ni skyes pa'i rim pa yin//u ti'i ye shes dang bra'o//yang ni gang tsha u ta ne//skad cig gcig las
438b3(rgyud): gcig tu 'gro/de tshe u ti'i thig le ni//gsum gyi rnam par dog par 'gro/de nas der ni lhan cig skyes//rdo rje ltar bu'i bde ba byed//de ni bcom ldan shes rab

438b5(rgyud): gyis bshad par bya//'dod dang 'drar dang 'gro ba dang //dga' bla ni bzhi yin te//rI ni dang po sbyor ba yin//de ni dga' ba'i don yin no//rgyas dang 'dun dang 'byung /

438b7(rgyud): ni bzhi yin te//de ni sbyor ba gsum pa yin//dgo' bral dga' ba'i don yino//u te dang ni tshul dang gnyid//lhan cig skyes dga' bzhi pa'o//de ni sbyor ba
439a1(rgyud): bzhi pa yin//dga' ba'i bye brag bcu drug go//bzhi rnams gzhan min 'dri ru ni//rab kyi don ni 'di ltar 'gyur//'dod pa 'dun pa yin pAr ba shad//dang ldan//
439a2(rgyud): shes rab mas sprul lo//de ni 'dun pa las ni do krug/rang gi yid kyis byed pa'o//'dod pa'i sgras ni dga' ba yin//mthong ba las ni byed pa'o//de nyid bcom ldan shes
439a3(rgyud): rab ma//'dod tshogs chen pos rgyas pa na//dri tshe rgyas pa yin par 'gyur//mchog gi dga' bo gnyis pa'o//rgyas pa'i dus su phyi dang nang //gang tshe shin tu 'bar
439a4(rgyud): 'gyur na//de tshe yan lag rab de ni//skud cig gis ni zhu bar 'gyur//de ni 'bar ba'i thig les ni//ming ni gsal bar gyur pa'o//de ni dga' bral dga' ba ste//
439a5(rgyud): gsum pa zhes bya ba shad pa'o//yang ni de nyid kla tso mo ni//mchog gri rnam pa rab brade ba//de tshe u ti'i dgug pa ni//srid pa dang bral byed pa'o//de ni bzhi pa yang dag

439a7(rgyud): bye brag gis//lhan cig skyes rims shes par bya//bde ba chen po'i gtsug tor nas//sman phrag 'khor lo'i dbuso yan chad//de tsam dga' ba'i gnas yin
439b1(rgyud): ta//thog lo gcig pu'i mtshan nyid do//skyon phrag 'khor los mgrin 'khor lo//de nam mchog gi dga' ba'o//mgrin pa'i gnas nas snyi 'khor lo//de namra dga'//
439b2(rgyud): bral dga' ba'o//de nas yang ni rim pa yis//rim pa'i gnas ni rab tu bshad//lte ba'i 'khor nas rgyu zhabs su//de tsam du ni dga' ba yin//rgyu zhub su ni mdung
439b3(rgyud): pa'i rtsar//de tsam mchog gri dga' ba'o//mdud pa'i gnas nas rin chen khar//de tsam dga' bral dga' bri'o//rdo rje rin chen rtse nang yod//lhan skyes de ni don dam pa'o//
439b4(rgyud): dpal phyag brgya chen po'i thig le lus dkyil 'khor dang /dga' ba'i bye brag dang /thig le'i mtshan nyid dang /bskyed pa dang /rdzogs pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba'i

439b7(rgyud): su shes//ye shes lte ba'i gnas su bzhugs//rtog pa las ni rtog pa med//gang du phyin nas 'gro ba na//de ni de rnams rang bzhin gnas//lte ba'i gnasu
440a1(rgyud): rab tu grags//brang tsho bdud rtsi gan su 'gro//de tshe yo shes zhesu dran//bdud rtsi byang chub semasu grogs//tshul la so byas pa'i thig lo gzhi//
440a2(rgyud): de yi gnas ni bzhi yin te//dga' ba'i bye brag 'gro bar 'gyur//dpral bar dga' ba'i thig le dang //mgrin par mchog tu dran pa'o//snying kha ru ni dga' bral te//

440a5(rgyud): byud gzugs gas pa//gsu mi dngos gnasan rtsa rnams kyi//yang dag mchog gi gnas yin no//no ma 'dzin ma gnyis yin te//gsum po de ni rtog med na//

440b1(rgyud): thugs te daHb+h+yo//mgrin pa bAs g-i rdo rje'o//dngulta bA sku yi dang b+h+yo//rgyas par bdag gis rab tu gsal//de mi dbus su srog yod pa//de bzhin du ni lto ba'i srog/snying /

440b3(rgyud): lam du 'gro ba'o//gsuM rlung lci ba'i gan su ni//nges pa yi sgo ni gnas byed do//yang ni gang tshe srog gi rlung //gtsug tor las ni phyir 'gro na//de tshi gus po'i rlung du ni//

441a2(rgyud): srub 'di//skad cig gis ni gyen du 'gyur//de yi lte ba'i dbus su ni//sems ni brtan par 'gyur ba'o//de tshe thur du 'gro bar 'gyur//ji ltar ma rdol snong
441a3(rgyud): dru ni//tshun 'jig pa med par gnas//de bzhin nges par sems 'gyur//de ni skad cig sgom byed//sangs rgyas nyid 'gyur the tshom med//dpal phyag rgya chen po'i

441b1(rgyud): kyi ni dbang phyug ma//'di slob dpan dbang gi rab//yang ni gsang ba'i dbang 'di ni//dad pas nyon cig bdag gis bshad//gang tshe gsang gnas na snyoms yod//de ni

441b7(rgyud): dang yid//snying po zla nyi mun pa dang //mchog dang sgra dang raM dang glog/de ni bcu drug shes par bya//bde ba'i thig le dri med do//tshangs bug nas ni mgrin gnas//de tsam du/

442a7(rgyud): dbang bzhi ste//legs dgyes dbang mor shes par bya//rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rim pa yis//mdor bsdus pa ni bzhi yin te//sprul dang chos dang long spyod dang //

444a7(rgyud): dan dang ni gur gum mi chog/sna tshogs mchog gi mo tog dang //sna tshogs mchod pa la sogs kyis//mkhas pas sa la mchod par bya//bu mo yod 'phrog
444b1(rgyud): lha yi gzugs//nyi shu lon pa gra yo ba med//gnas ni gang du sngags brgyal bad+ma//re shig drang pa dA ru gzhug/mchog gi dga' ba'i sbyor ba yis//rtswa gcig gis nA

444b7(rgyud): yig bcu gsum pa dang ldan//gti mug thams cad mtshon cha'o//bzhi pa yi ni bzhi pa dang //dbyings yig bcu gcig pa dang ldan//uSh+mA Sha yi dang po dang //oMts+tsha
445a1(rgyud): yau bzhi par ldan//dri nus me yi sa bon dang //gnyis pra yi ni gsum pa dang //an+ta s+tha yi dang po dang //an+ta s+tha yi bzhi pa drang //dbyangs
445a2(rgyud): yig gsum pa dang ldan pa//thams cad k+Shi ni snying po bcomA//gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa dang //de nas brgyad pa'i dang po dang //dbyings yig gnyis pa dang
445a3(rgyud): ldan pa//yi ge mchog nyid gnas yin no//gsum pa yi ni dang po dang //de nyid kyi ni 'og tu rgya//yang na de nyid bri bar bya//auSh+Ta yi ni bzhi pa dang //dbyang/
445a4(rgyud): yig gnyis pa dang ldan pa//rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin can//uSh+ma yi ni gsum pa dang //lnga pa yi ni lnga pa dang //uSh+TaM yi ni bzhi pa dang //dbyangs yaug
445a5(rgyud): gnyis pas rgyan pa'o//dang po yi ni dang po dang //an+ta s+tha yi gsum pa dang //lnga pa yi ni dang po dang //dbyangs yig gnyis pas rgyan pa'o//dang po yi ni gsu/
445a6(rgyud): pa drang //nyi shu pa yis rgyan pa'o//dbyangs yig gsum pa dang ldan pa//khro bo yi ni gzugs chen che//uSh+mA ya ni gsum pa dang //bzhi pa yi ni lnga p+ta dang //
445a7(rgyud): de nyid 'og tu ldan par bya//dbyangs yig gsum pas brgyan pa'o//lha rnams kun gyi byed pa'o//lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang //dbyangs yig gnyis pas rgyan
445b1(rgyud): pASh+Ta/ban+d+ha pa yon drung po dang //thams cad kun gru pa yin no//ASh+Ta yi ni bzhi pa dang //dbyangs yig drug pas dargyan du ni//rgyu chos theg pa dang ldan pa//sems
445b2(rgyud): kyi dbang phyug yi ge mchog/de nyid yang ni bri bar b+he//de nas lnga pa'i gnyis pa dang //gsum pa yo ni dang po dang //uSh+mA yai nI gsum pa dang //un+tas+t+rai yi bzhi par ldan//
445b3(rgyud): dbyangs yig gnyis pas rgyun pa'o//ya yi sde tshan brgyad pa dang //dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang ldan pa//thams cad don grub mchog yin te//bdag gi snying po
445b4(rgyud): bsngags rgyal la//drang po gzugs nye badrug po dang //on+d+ra m+b+ha yi bzhi po dang //gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa dang //mye yi 'og tu rgyun pa'o//bashrI pA yi ni dang po dang /
445b5(rgyud): dbyings yog bcu gan+d+he dang ldan pa//gnyis pa yin gsum pa dang //dbyangs yig bcu gsum pas rgyan po//dang po yi ni gsum pa dang //mi yA 'og tu rkyen lda
445b6(rgyud): po//uSh+ma yi ni bzhi pa dang //ra yig 'og tu rgyun po nI//dbyangs yig bzhi pa dang ldan pa//sems can thams cad dbang du byed//yang ni de nyid bri bar bya//de bzhin
445b7(rgyud): lnga pa'i gnyis pa dang //gsum pa yi ni dang po dang //nye ba'i snying po mchog gi sngags//dang por rnam par sdu mjed dang //de nas ut+pa'i gsum pa dang //dbyings yi
446a1(rgyud): lnga pa dang ldan pa//lha rnams kyi sems gti mug byeng //de nas me yi sa bon dang //de nas bzhi pa'i dang po dang //uSh+ma yi ni gsum pa dang //
446a2(rgyud): de nas nyi shu rtsa lnga pa//de nas rlung gi sa boni bri//dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa dang ldan//gzhan gyi phyag rgya rab tu 'joms//uSh+ma ye ni dang po dang //an+tas+tha
446a3(rgyud): yi bzhi par ldan//de nas nyi mi'i sa bon dang //dbyangs yig gsum pas rgyan pa'o//uSh+Ta yi ni bzhi pa dang //dbyangs yig drug pa dang ldan pa//zla tshes
446a4(rgyud): thig les rgyan pa'o//yang ni de nyid bris pa ni//gzhan gyi sngags ni 'joms pa'o//lnga pa yi ni gnyis pa dang //de nas gsum pa'i dang po dang //uSh+Ta yi ni gsuM
446a5(rgyud): pA dang //an+ta sgra yi bzhi par ldan//dbyangs yig gnyis par ldan pa ni//sdug bsngal thams cad med byed pa//ya yi snga mtshan brgyad pa dang //dbyangs
446a6(rgyud): yig gnyis pa dang ldan pa//dngos grub thams cad 'grub pa ste//khyod kyi snying po'i sdigs rgyal lo//dang po lha yi bdag po dang //de nas dang po'i dang po
446a7(rgyud): dang \u0f85tra'og tu sa yige dang ldan pa//dbyangs yag gi ni bzhi pas rgyan//zla tshes thig le yis ni rgyan//thams cad kun gyis byed pa po//an+tas+tha yi bzhi pa dang //
446b1(rgyud): sa yi 'og tu ldan pa dang //dbyangs yig gi ni bzhi pa ldan//zla chos thig le yis ni rgyun+da//gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa dang //sU yi yi ge 'og tu ldan//dbyangs yig
446b2(rgyud): bzhi pa dang ldan pa//zla tshes thig les rgyan pa'o//lnga pA yi ni gnyis pa dang //gsum po yi ni dang po dang //swA hA tha mar ldan pa ni//khyod kyi nye ba'i snying po'o//de nas sngag
446b3(rgyud): kyi gsang chen po//su la yang ni mi sbyin te//lha mo de bzhin man ngag 'di//su la yang ni mi sbyin no//bye ba 'bum gyi nang nas gcig/de ni man ngagra gi ni snod//sngags sem//
446b4(rgyud): yang na man ngag 'ang //brtag par byos te de nas sbyin//bskal pa bye ba brgya yis kyang //de ltar min na 'grub pa med//bla ma'i kha las man ngag 'di//legs dgyes
446b5(rgyud): dbang mo rnyed par 'gyur//bstan bcos lung la sr-i yang dag ni//nam yang rnyed par mi 'gyur ro//man dag don du bla ma mchog/yang dang yang ngu zhu mi bya//bla ma mAnya
446b6(rgyud): na yang dag nyid//ma ni ngag dri l-i sbyin+da par byed //ji ltar bu ma yang tsho bab//phi la zhu bar mi byed na//pha rang nyid kyis shes nas ni//da ni bu mo sbyin dus snyam//traM hU~M khaM gi
446b7(rgyud): sngags rgyal gyis//bdud rtse lnga ni sbyang bar bya//saM chu mo rlung rnams kyi ni//sa bon gyis ni bza' bar bya//dngal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las 'khor lo drug gi sa bon dang //
447a1(rgyud): sngags btu ba dang /bdud rtsi lnga bza' ba dang /spyad pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste ny-i shu gtsug pa'o///'byung po rnams ni srung dan du//nyon cig/
447a2(rgyud): gter ma bdag gis bshad//dur khrad yod na chu ngog sam//yul gyi mtha' 'am yang na ni//shing gcig dang ni khang skad du//gter ma 'bod de sbyin par bya//
447a3(rgyud): tshangs pa ma dang /drag mo dang /dbang phyug chen ma dang /khyab 'jug ma dang /phag mo dang /mi'i seng ge mo dang /brgya byin ma dang /me mo dang /chu lha mo
447a4(rgyud): gzhon nu ma dang /gnod sbyin mo dang /mkhang lding mo dang /sbrul mo dang /glang chen me dang /gshin rje mo dang /nor sbyin ma dang /nyi ma mo dang /gtum
447a5(rgyud): ma dang /de lta bu'i rnal 'byer ma'i khar dang bcas thams cad rnal 'byor pas 'dir phyag rgya 'dis dgug par bya'o//rdo rje khu tshur gnyis byas te//rgyab dang rgyub
447a6(rgyud): tu bsnol bar bya//mthe'u chung phu gu rgyud du sbrel//mdzub mo drang por sbreng byas te//g.yos dang g.yon gyi phyag gnyis ni//cung zad tsam ni dgug par bya//rnal
447a7(rgyud): 'byo rim thams cad dang 'byung po dang /yi dgas dang /sha za dang /dreg pa chen po dang /brjed byed rnams tshur shog/tshur shog/nya dang sha dang /khrag chen
447b1(rgyud): po dang /bza' ba sna tshogs dang ldan pa/me tog dang /spos dang /mar me dang /dri dang /bdud rtsi lnga dang /chang dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan la sogs pa dang /gdug
447b2(rgyud): dang rdus yab kyis rgyan pa'i gtor ma 'di snoms shig/dam tshig 'di srungs shig/bdag gi don thams cad kyi grogs gyis shig/rgyud 'di la gang zhig dad pa yang
447b3(rgyud): pra de rnams srung ba'i don du gsol cig 'thung cig/rol cig/hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA//b+ha ga'i phyag rgya mgo steng bca'//phyag rgya 'di yis gtor ma sbyin//rkang pa mnan
447b4(rgyud): cing steng du blta//ha hi skra ni sgrogs byed cing //rus pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa yi//he ru kar nau bdag nyid bsam//brgya byin 'dra ba'i lha ma yin//mdun du byung bar gyur na
447b5(rgyud): yang //de la 'jigs par mo bya ste//gzhan rnams smos kyang ci zhig dgos//dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las gtor ma'i las zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis/
447b6(rgyud): pa'o///tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga ni//nyin cig lha mo spyan bzang mo//gsong ba mchog gi dgyes pa yi//de ru 'khor lo rab tu bskor//thams cad dam tshig
447b7(rgyud): gcig pa dang //thams cad rtog pa med pa dang //ser sna nga rgyal spangs pa dang //'dod chags zhe sdang bral ba dang //bla ma la gus bsam gtan ldan//phra dog med cing
448a1(rgyud): rtse gcig pa//de ltar dgyes pa tshogs 'khor lo//mkhas pas 'bad de gzhug par bya//de ltar min na spyan yod de//'khor lo ya na
448a2(rgyud): 'grub mi 'gyur//thabs dang mnyam pa shes rab ma//nyi shu rtsa lnga yan chad sbyangs//thabs re shes rab rI rer ldan//kun la gcig ni mi mdzes so//drang po
448a3(rgyud): yid 'phrog dgyes pa yi//me tog dkyil 'khor bri bar bya//de ru sna tshogs mchod pa ni//rtse gtsug gis ni legs par bya//bla mu dngos po thams cad kyis//
448a4(rgyud): dad pa yis ni mchod par bya//tshogs pa la yang 'bad mchod//mnyam nyid blta ba sems kyi so//ji ltar bla mas phyag rgya 'dzin//tshogs kyis kyang ni de
448a5(rgyud): ltar ro//rtse gsum yang ni ral gIs bsad//nam phyed na ni blang bar bya//sna tshogs mchod pa'i mchod sprin gyiskye//mchod nus bla ma'i gdan bya'o//dbus
448a6(rgyud): bdag nyid ce ru ka ra//phyag rgya chen po dang ldan pa//dri ni bla ma zhe su bstan//legs dgyes dbang mo bdag nyid do//tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i dbus su ni//mitshul
448a7(rgyud): ma la sogs dar mi bya//gtam kyang smra bar mi bya ste//rkang pa la sogs brkyang mi bya//phyag rgya'i brda' dang gsang ba'i skad//de la 'bad pas bya ba'o//
448b1(rgyud): chu 'is bkung 'du//sku tshugs margyad pa'i mdzod sbyi kyiste//slad dul nam da gas kyi 'a khor ming dud gzhan ni//me tig rkyen gyis btsun/
448b2(rgyud): ba ma tshogs na pa//du ba dzizhen/ na 'gyur/ //yang du yang du phyug rgyan//
