449a1(rgyud): kyis dbus su ni//dpa' blo kun gyi mchog gi gnas//dpa' byo rnams kyi mchog gi don//dpa' bo de kun mi shes na//de yi sna tshogs kyi 'khor lo//
449a2(rgyud): ni//nam yang thob par mi 'gyur//gang ci de lta'i rim pa yis//phyi dang nang gi bya ba'o//de ltar byas na dngos grub 'thob//mkha' 'gro ma yang lhan cig 'dus//gal te
449a3(rgyud): gzhan ma'i rnal 'byor ma//brtag pa'i don du 'ong 'gyur na//de la re shig the tshom ni//mkhas pas/nam yang mi bya'o//gtam ni smra bar mi bya ste//phyag rgyas bsnun
449a4(rgyud): ni gsol bar bya//gang zhig dre ru bla ma yis//gsung ba dang ni mdzad pa'ang de//yang na las kyi rdo rjes ni//thams cad don kun byed pa 'ang rung //ji ltar rdo rje
449a5(rgyud): sems dpas rol//las kyi rdo rjes de ltararo//sna tshogs gzugs kyis rnal 'byor ma//song dang yang ni 'od 'gyur na//de ru re shig 'jigs mi bya//dpa' bo yi ni
449a6(rgyud): gzugasu sbyong //bsdam pa lnga lar byed pa ni//de la chad pa rab rtogs bya//yang dag dga' ba byung gyur na//thar pa'i rgyu phyir grwar bya'o//'on kyang rdo rje rkang pa'i gar//
449a7(rgyud): ji ltar rnal 'byor ma mnyes 'ong //ma 'am sring mo chung ma dang //sgyug mo dang ni mna' ma la//shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yiso//'bad de de la mchod par bya//
449b1(rgyud): /do rnams mchod pas dngas grub no//gang zhog sems la bsams pa yod//lhag pa'i gtor ma bzung nas ni//dkon pa rdzun par btang bar bya//gal te du rnal 'byor ma/
449b2(rgyud): blta ba de ni stan byed na//de rnams mtshan nyid 'di lta bu//mkhas pas 'bad pas shes par bya//gang zhig bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor ni//kun tu zlum por snang 'gyur zhing /
449b3(rgyud): kha ni s+tha ra rtags par yod//spu dang smin ma ring ba dang //gos bzang gtsang zhing zhi ba dang //mi g.yo bden par smra ba dang //rtag tu dam pa'i chos lu dga'i//dpa' bo'i
449b4(rgyud): sring mo de ni dran//pad+ma'i phyag rgyu sbyin par bya//de bzhin rus sbrul phyag rgya'o//spags pa bum pa spyi blugs nyid/phyag rgya'i len du shes par bya'o//de ni tshes bcu'i
449b5(rgyud): res dga' la//khyim du pad+mo 'dri bar 'gyur//lA ma yi na bud med kyi//mtshan nyid gyur pa 'dra nyidani//ma muchu/phyong zhing mig dkyus ring //mig ni dmar zhing ser
449b6(rgyud): rgyu gnas//phyug cing skal bzang yon tan can+te//ser zhing tsam pa lta bur snang //shin tu ring dang thung ba'ang min//sna tshogs pa yi gos la dga'//dpral bar
449b7(rgyud): mo gsum yod cing //mtshan ngan gyon du bltas pa las//rgod cing dga' ba nyid dag dang //lam ni rnam par mnan cing gnas//g.yul du shi ba rnams kyi ni//gti
450a1(rgyud): dag la ni rtag tu dba'//de ltar rab dregs mthong na ni//rtse gsum phyag rgyu bstan par bya//rkang pa glu yon pa bskum pA yis//gar nyid kyang
450a2(rgyud): ni bstan par bya//g.yon pa dag ni yongs bzlog pa//phyag brgya'i lan ni yin par bshad//chos bcu dang ni bco brgyad ni//de yi dus tshigs yin par bstan//
450a3(rgyud): khyim du mdung rtse gsum pa yang //bris nas de ni rtag tu mchod//'jig rten dbang phyug lA mu yi//mtshan nyid gyur pa 'di dgra yin//gang gi khur tshor
450a4(rgyud): dag tu nI//khung bur snang bar gnas gyur cing //de bzhin dmar ser lag pa dmar//mig ni lde ngas ser dag tu snang //sgra ni de bzhin 'khyil pa dang //mgo la
450a5(rgyud): dari ni cings pa dang //dpral ba la ni gsal bar ni//gzhu yi dngos por rab tu gnas//de bzhin mgrini ring sna ring ba//rtag tu glos dmar la dga' zhing //dgod cing
450a6(rgyud): glu ni len pa dang //lan dge' zhig ni khro ba dang //sems ni rnam par g.yo ba dang //rtsod pa la ni dga' ba ste//'di 'dri'i rab dregs mthong nas ni//sha ga ti'i
450a7(rgyud): phyag brgya bstan par bya//gnyis pa nyid ni 'bang ba yis//dril bu'i phyag rgya bstan par bya//g.yon gyi phyogasu log pa ni//phyag rgya'i lan ni yin par bstan//
450b1(rgyud): zung shod don la rlom pa dang//rtag tu smos sor sa dga' zhing //drug pa dag nas gas byung //de 'ad+mo thad mo mthong nas no//'khor ma'i phyag rgyu bstun b+hU/
450b2(rgyud): 'dred pa yis ni gre sa pa yang //dring gi byab rgyu bstan par bya//g.yon nas yongs su bzlog po ni//phyag rgya'i lan ni yin par bshang //bcu bzhi de yos dus yin te//
450b3(rgyud): d+his ng+ga// ma mo/ bya di dag yin//lus n+de na skyo yod//mig na gnag ci sa shA nga //sdom zhing rnam
450b4(rgyud): myi 'dapa/ la ni ba ste//sman ni 'byung zhi 'i dog gin//mig rgyumi ni nyams da/tu k+Sh+ma d+hA gar la ma'as//sbyin gyi gzugs sbyin
450b5(rgyud): slus pa che//'di 'dra'i rab rjegs mthong nas ni//glu yi phyag rgya bstan par bya//gta~M/u pi yid ni 'dru pa yis//midung gi phyag rgyu bstan par bye//g.yan nus yong
450b6(rgyud): sgrib pa ni//p+lagA rgyu'i len ni sbyin ba ba shed//hUMs zla sna rgyu de lA~M m+b+ha//mAng+ga mAr+g+haM 'di byed pa//rdorje dag mo ldag sa//mnan nyid gyu ba 'di
450b7(rgyud): yin//mtshan mo'i dus su la mdun//de ltar 'bad de shes par bya//de kun 'jigs por yongs mi bya//phyog rgyu rnams kyis mnyes par bya//ji myur bsems pa bzhin/
451a1(rgyud): du na//mAnyos nas dngos grub ster ba'o//dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las tshogs kyi 'khor mar tsho ga dang //mkha' gro ma'i yan lag ga
451a2(rgyud): mtshan nyid ces bya ba'i le ru ste nyi shu rta gsum pa'o///de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba//de ru las ni rab min te//gang zhig bsten pa tsam gyis ni//myur du dngos
451a3(rgyud): grub la 'jug bo//yan lag dri zhim shin tu 'jam//rdul ni dri zhim gyur pa dang //ngo tsha che zhing bden par smra//yun rings mgu ni mi 'dzum pa//khro ba med cing snying rje che//
451a4(rgyud): skad cig 'jam par smra ba dang //skye ba bdun nam yang na gsum//'bad pa yis ni btsal bar bya//bsod nams dang ldan sems pa yi//des ni lag tu rnyed par 'gyur
451a5(rgyud): de yang zos par byas nus ni//de yi snying khang ro tsa na//rtse gcig pa ye sems kyis ni//he ru ka yaM sngags lan bdun//bzlas nas 'bad pas thig le bya//'phral
451a6(rgyud): du steng du ldi 'gyor zhing //dpag tshad bya bar 'gro ba'o//de ni zos pa tsam gyis ni//khams gsum ye shes can du 'gyur//dpag tshad bye ba lnga bcur ne/nyin
451a7(rgyud): mtshan kun tu 'gro ba'o//lha yis lus kyang thob 'gyur te//bskal pa stong du gnas par 'gyur//brgya byin gyi ni stobs 'dra'o//bud med bltos pa tsam gyis ni/
451b1(rgyud): ji ltar mo skyes mar bcu ltar//dpal phyug rgya chen po'i thig le las las kyi cho ga zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o///bcom ldan ye shes rgyal dpung po//
451b2(rgyud): bdag la the tshom skyes pa mchis//sngags pa sngags rnams 'grub don du//bzlas brjod na da ltar lags//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//rnal 'byor rnams kyis
451b3(rgyud): bzlas dang sgo ba//nyon cig lha mo 'gro ba ma//sreg dang rtsol ba mnyam byas nas//srog dang rtsol ba gza' bar bya//srog dang rtsol bar 'gog byas te//srog dang rtsol ba
451b4(rgyud): la blta'o//pad+ma'i kha sbyar sbyor ba las//shes thabs ni sbyang bar bya//lte ba gnyis kyi na mkha' las//khyab rtse dbye ba med pa yi//yi ge shel gyi 'od ldan pa//a li'i phreng
451b5(rgyud): ba dran par bya//yi ge re re yid kyis ni//rtag tu rgyun mI 'chad par bzlas//'khor lo rnams kyi lte ba'i nang //bzlog pa byas nasau drang ba bya//ha ha'i sgra ni 'jam pa yis//mgrin pa/
451b6(rgyud): yar rkan mgul med pas//nang gi reg bya 'jam pa yi//snying kha khi na'i gan su bya//shes rab gtum mo'i gzugasuM grags//rnam pa dang bral bde sbyin mA//de lci'i shes rab
451b7(rgyud): dang ldan gcig/rdo rje skyil krung sems kyis ni//sems ni g.yo ba med par bya//thigs tshul char yang dang bral ba//thig tshul char yang bdag nyid dang //thig le tshul dang char
452a1(rgyud): yang nang //rnal 'byor gyis ni der sems bya//char yang gi zhi nang du sems//yang ni tshul gyi nang du sems//tshul ni thig lar 'gro bad+ma sgom//thig le yang
452a2(rgyud): ni stong par 'gro/stong pa rang bzhin zhesu bstan//gsum dang bral ba ma skyes mchog/'di yi cho ga'i thabs kyi na//gang zhig rtse gcig gis ni bzlas//des ni dngos grub chen po
452a3(rgyud): 'thob//zla ba gcig gis gdon mi zla//dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las rang bzhin gyi bzlas pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o///bcom ldan dpa'//
452a4(rgyud): bo dpa' dbang phyug/sngar ni khyod kyis dus bka' stsal//thams cad mkhyen pa mchog dbang phyug/de yi don+da ni bshad du gsol//de yi dus kyi don 'di ni//spyan rang
452a5(rgyud): lha mo khyod nyin cig/dus ni char yang zhes su bshad//de rnams kyi ni sbyor ba'i don//sbyor ba bzhi yang bzhi bzhir gyis//yan lag gcig ni spangs pa'o//rgyal ba rnams
452a6(rgyud): kyis rnyed dka' ba//de yi skye ba bdag gis bshad//rten gyi srog gi dbyigs pa la//de ru sbyor ba bstan pa'o//srog gi dbyig pa dbus na gnas//phra bi'i phra ba yang
452a7(rgyud): dag mchog/sum cu rtsa gnyis mdud dang ldan//de ni phyi rol nang du mi no//mdud pa yi ni gan su sbyor//de ni char yang rnams kyi don//char yang sbyor ba nang du min//nang du
452b1(rgyud): de ni rtog med ma//mdud pa'i nang du gAyas dang gra yon//ro mya dang ni brkyang ma glanas//mdud pa gnyis dbus gcig gcig ste//sum cu gnyis kyis ban+d+ha drug dran//
452b2(rgyud): bde chen 'khor lo mgrin pa granas//lte ba'i steng ni yan chad do//sor bcu gnyis kyi skud pa ni//mdud pa med pa gcig pu'o//de 'og mdud pa dang ldan pa//rlung gi
452b3(rgyud): 'khar lo yang chod do//spyi bo nas ni mgrin yan chad//de tsam sbyor ba bzhi yin no//mgrin pa'i 'og nas snying kha'i gnas//de tsam gzhan ni bzhi yin//snying kha'i gnas
452b4(rgyud): nas lte ba'i bar//de tsam gzhan yang bzhi yin no//lte ba nas ni nor bu'i mgrin//de tsam gzhan ni bzhi yin no//de ni sbyor ba bzhi ru bshad//char yang dga' ba/
452b5(rgyud): dang ldan pa//'dod dang rdul dang 'dar dang stobs//'gro dang bdud rtsi yang yin te//dgu' dang pad+ma de bzhin te//de ni drang po'i sbyor ba bzhi//rgyus dang rdul dang mdung
452b6(rgyud): dang myis//'byung ba dang ni mtshan mo dang /mchog gi dga' dang ro yin te//de ni gnyis pa'i sbyor ba'o//'bar dang zhi dang thig le gnas//myos dang 'og ma de bzhin//
452b7(rgyud): no// gang bral dga' ba 'gug pa ste//do na gsum pa'i sbyor ba'o//u ta 'bad ma tshul rlung mo//gnyid dang me ma de bzhin no//lhan cig skyes dga' ma skyes pa//
453a1(rgyud): ts+tshan+ya/de ni sbyor ba bzhi pa'o//drin chen spre ru phyir tsam+b+ha na//de ni zla ba gang bar dran//dga' ba yod pa'i sbyor ba ni//de ni shar bar shes par bya//coM lnga pa
453a2(rgyud): ni 'byung ba'i rgyu//bcu drug pa la rtog mi byed//skye dang 'jig pa med pa'i phyir//de la sbyor ba med pa'o//tshur yang rnam skyed sbyor ba ni//rtse gcig gis ni khyod nyon cig/bcu
453a3(rgyud): drug de bzhin nyi ma dang //gang du gnyis ka sbyor bar 'gyur//de la ma skyes che zhes bya//de rang ngo bo rang bzhi no//bcu drug de bzhin nyi ma dang //char yang 'byung ba rgyu yin no//
453a4(rgyud): de ni 'byung ba kun gyi pha//thabs dang shes rab mnyam par ldan//bcu drug pa ni shes rab yin//nyi mthabrasu bstan pa'o//bcu drug phun chad shes par bya//de gnyis
453a5(rgyud): dbus bzhu gyis rang bzhin ni//ngag gi lam gyis rnyed par dkang //de lta bu yi dus kyi don//yang dag par ni byedag gus bshad//'di las gzhan mchog gsang ba ni//
453a6(rgyud): zhal bzang yang dag med pa'o//'bad pa yis ni spo bar bya//su la yang ni mi sbyin no//dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las dus kyi don gyi rang bzhin gyi don zhes bya ba'i le'u ste
453a7(rgyud): nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o////sngar sras sngags kyi gsal ba de//nyon cig lha mo bdag gis bshad//dad ldan rnams kyis shes don du//dad pa med la nam yang
453b1(rgyud): n+yon+tan+tasmA hwATapU hU~M hUM yA b+hA nAMso+o g+h+rAr+dz+dzak+Sha hA mya swA hA na? T+TA rA ya dza bi dza ya R+YA shra d+haM kr-i hA ma au//gsang chen po yaM sngags 'di ni//thamyas cad don kun grub byed pa//rba pa d+h+r-i Sh+To rmi
453b2(rgyud): dzaM te rje ba oM//nye ba'i snying po'i sngags chen po/2/thams cad kun gyi dbang du byed//hA sU Ta pha hUM hUM ri shwo yai myAt+tA ra su yaM//khyod kyi snying po'i sdigs dbang po//grangs med
453b3(rgyud): yon tan dang ldan no//sngags pa'i ye shes grub don du//gsang ba'i sngags ni gsol byas//hA sA wi pheM dzI bI kaM aM//khyod kyi nye ba'i snying po 'di//sangs rgyas kyis kyang rnyed
453b4(rgyud): dka' ba//bdag gis de yi sngags kyis ni//grangs med dbang du byas pa'o//dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las sbas pa'i sngags gsal ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi
453b5(rgyud): shu bdun pa'o////yang dam du mkhyud pa byas nas skud snyan pa yis/bcom ldan 'das ma legs dgyes dbang phyug mas 'di skad ces zhus//bcom ldan ye
453b6(rgyud): shes mkha 'gro nyi//mi shes mun pa 'jigs byed pa//gsang ba kun ni gsungs pa las//phyag rgya chen po de ma gsungs//phyag rgya chen po ji ltar lags//rgyal ba'i dbang phyug yang
453b7(rgyud): ngag gsungs//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//rab tu bde ba'i rnam pa mchog/nyon cig lha mo phyag rgya che//phyag rgya chen po gsang ba che//brjod med mi zad ma skyes pa//
454a1(rgyud): thams cad gzugs can gzugs dang bral//gzugs modu gzugs kyi bdag nyid mchog/sbom phra la sog dang bral ba//gzhal du med pa'i rang bzhin no//
454a2(rgyud): yang dag d+hi med rnam pa'i 'od//gang du yang ni gnas med pa//shar ba ma yin nub pa min//rtag tu shar ba cher yang mchog/dus dang gnas skabs grol ba ste//skye drung
454a3(rgyud): 'jig par byed pa'o//rnal 'byor ma rnams rnyed mi dka'//rnal 'byor cung zad rnyed dka' ba//thabs mchog gis ni rnyed 'gyur te//thabs mchog med na nam yod min//
454a4(rgyud): dpa' bo chen po bcom ldan 'das//de la thabs ni bka' stsol cig/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//rtswa yI kun spyod sbyor ba yis//slob dpan khA las rnyed
454a5(rgyud): par 'gyur//rlung 'khor char yang gnas na ni//rlung ma nyid ma yod pa'o//g.yu pa dang ni g.yon gyi cha//char yang la ni shin tu bskor//de gnyis khong du chud pa yis//de la
454a6(rgyud): mchog bde ba 'byung //bde ba'i nang nas phyag rgya ni//the tshom med par rnyed par 'gyur//char yad dbus na rtsa yi gnas//phra mo'i rgyu mi yang dag mchog/rtswa yi gnas
454a7(rgyud): na rtsa yi gnas//de tsam la ni des khyab bo//phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin ni//lha mo chen mo de ni khyod//nga yi 'di ni yang dag khyod//phyi dang nang na yod pa'o//
454b1(rgyud): gang zhig phyag rgya mi shes pa//sangs rgyas yin yang rnal 'byor min//phyag rgya chen po'i thig le 'dri//gang zhig dri med shes pa min//rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma sa rgyud//
454b2(rgyud): 'bum gcig rnal 'byor des shes kyang //de lta mod kyi 'bras rab deso//nam yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur//thams cad chos kun rab shes na//de ni nges par sangs
454b3(rgyud): rgyas yin//phyag rgya chen po rab shes na//de ni dpal rdor sems dpar 'gyur//de yi rang bzhin ye shes ni//phyag rgya chen po'i mtshan nyid do//de skad ces thos nas bcom
454b4(rgyud): ldan 'das mo bye ba 'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi mkha' 'gro ma dang bcas pas bskor ba ldan gsum byas nasra phyag 'tshal te/khrag dron mos mchod do//bcom
454b5(rgyud): ldan 'das la mkha 'gro ma thams cad kyis phyag rgya chen po thig le'i rgyud thos nas dga' mgu yi rangs te//cang mi spro bar bzhugaso//yang dam du mkhyud pa byas nas

454b7(rgyud): dang gzhan gyi gnas de ni//sngar ni bdag gis mo sheso//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//bdag gi gnas dang gzhan de bzhin//nyon cig yang dag bdag gis
455a1(rgyud): ba shad//gzhan gyi gnas ni b+hA glar brjod//bdag gis gnas ni snying po'o//sgo yi phyi rol gzhan gyi gnas//bdag gi gnas ni dkyil 'khor ro//

455a3(rgyud): sbyor ba ri rab rtse//mr-i yul lte ba'i lte ba'o//sa 'og sprul pa'i snying po ste//ri rab rtse mos gsong sna'o//de lhor gzhan ni gsang chen po//yang dag gzhan du ngas ma

455b3(rgyud): skad du/dngul ye shes snying po zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i rgyal po//dngul rdo rje sems dpa'i la phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis

461a1(rgyud): de'i phyi rol tu rdo phreng dang //sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba'i nang du hU~M gi rnam pa yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po zhal gsum pa/spyan//

463b1(rgyud): 'dag byed ma ser ma'i mdog go/nub skor rnga rje sgyu ma dumar mo chen mo'i mdog rga/b+h+yo sbyor dzAn+daHrtswa ka ljang ku'i mdog go/blag bzhi//zhal gcig pa/spyan gas

464a7(rgyud): na 'od chen nye ba'i snying po'o//bac+doMs mas gsol pa/sngag 'di la nus pa'i mthu ci tsam zhig mchis la bla/bac+doMs kyis bka' stsal pa/grub pa tsam gyis khams gsum thang dbang du byed par

465b5(rgyud): dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug la mos te/kye byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po lha'i dbang phyug de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi dang /zla de'i bde ba mchog dang /

466a2(rgyud): nyi ma'i 'od mnyam dang /chu skyesau dang /pu na ka dang /aM sho kla dang /tsam pa ka dang /a rdzu na dang //nA gu ge sar la sogs pa dri zhim pa'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs
466a3(rgyud): pa dang /rin po che'i char du mau bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi drung du babs so//yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang
466a4(rgyud): phyug la bos te/khyod ci zhig lnga ma mtshan du gyur/lha'i dbang phyug gis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'da'i ni kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi dang /zla ba bde ba mchog
466a5(rgyud): deng /phyag rgya chen po'i mthu' deng/de la rang gi ngo bo dang /che dang /rnam pa yod dmu ci lags zhes bad gA ya mtshan du gyur lags so//dpa' bo chen po lha'i nga
466a6(rgyud): phyag lo rdo rje 'dzin pa'i mchog gis 'di skad ces bka' sprul te//e ma hA de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdug nyid kyi dang /zla ba'i bde ba mchog dang /phyag rgya chen po'i
466a7(rgyud): mtha' la de'i rang gi ngo bo dang /rnam pa dang /tshad med dam ci/de ltar ma yin na chos thams cad kyi ngo bo stong pa nyid 'di ga la shes/mig yor tsam gyi rgyu'i
466b1(rgyud): nani chos thams cad do//de ltar glu rtsal tenA nas dri 'byung ba bla rtsi'i dngos po med na dri ji ltar rnyed par 'gyur/de bzhin du rang gi ngo bo dang /chos kyi chad dang /rnam pa drug/
466b2(rgyud): med par gyur na/de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid dang /zla ba'i dadre ba mchog dang /phyag rgya chen po'i sku'i rnyed pa med do//de bas na khyab dang khyab byed bye drug tu//gnyis
466b3(rgyud): su med pa'i bde ba che//badri ba sku la rten pa'i phyir//bde la dz+nyAn na de nyid 'gyur//bde sgo rnam par shes yin no//thams cad gnyis su med pa'i dang s+ho//drug gi bde ba ye shes
466b4(rgyud): mchog/bde dang sku ni gnyis las 'byung //'khor lo drug gi dbus nA bzhugs//de nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid mchog/zla ba la sogs 'bral bdag nyid//de nyid gsum
466b5(rgyud): bdag rgyu ru grag se//lus rten srog gi dbyug pa la//sbyor ba drug gi ye shes bzhugs//'khor lo drug gi lte ba'i dbus//phra mo'i lus ldan rtsa ni drug/thig le dang
466b6(rgyud): bcas de rnams sbyor//srog go dbyug pa 'i nang du'o//bde chen 'khor lo'i lte ba yi//zla mo tshwa dang ldan pa ste//de ni srog dbyug rtsa ba yin//zur gsum gyi ni rnam pa'i
466b7(rgyud): tshul//longs spyod rdzogs pa'i lte bo yi//lce ma bde ba ldan pa ni//de na srog gi dbyug pa'i ske//rigs kyi me tog dang 'dre ba//chos kyi 'khor lo'i lte ba la//na mkha'
467a1(rgyud): man+ta ye shos ldan//den+da sreg gi dbyug pa'i snong //ba yi l+ye gra grI rnam pa'i gzugs//lta ba'i stsal pa'i 'khor lnga'i nang //'od mya dang ni dus ldan ma//
467a2(rgyud): de ni srog gi dbyug pa'i lte//pad+ma rgyas pa'i rnam pa ba zhin//me yi 'khor lo'i snying klu yi//'od pa dang ldan rab 'di mA//da ni srog gi dbyug pa'i 'doms//rdo rje'i rnam pa
467a3(rgyud): bzhin du gas 'o//rlung gi 'khor lo'i lte ba la//stobs ni brtson 'grus ma dang ldan//srog gi dbyug pa de yi mtha'//til gyi me tog rgyas pa bzhin//de ni sbyor drug gi rnam
467a4(rgyud): shes//rtse dang thig le dang ldan no//rtog med mas ni 'khyud yin phyir//de tshe tshangs pa'i dbyug pa yin//de yi dus ni bdag gis bshad//shar dang nu pa rnam gnyis so/
467a5(rgyud): gang gi cha tshangs pa'i dru byug pa lha mdung bya sum cu rtsa gnyis yod de/de la lte ba'i 'og tu 'gro ba bcu rdul steng du 'pho ba bcu drug/byang chub kyi sems dang
467a6(rgyud): gnyis phrad pa'i phyir mi basbyin snying 'og gcig pu'i dngos po sbyor ba'i rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis so//bya chub kyi sems dga' bo ldan pa'i gdur bu'i rnam pa sku
467a7(rgyud): gsung dang thugs kyi ngo bo gcil bu'i rtog med bde logs yid mos tshangs pa'i dbyug pa 'khyud nas khade ba chen po'i gtsug tor nes gsang bi bde ba chen po nor
467b1(rgyud): bu'i kha rlung gi 'khor lo yun chud/ji ltar tsan dun gau shIR+Sha'i shing la sbrul chen po yod pa lta bu'o//lha'i dbang phyug de la ji ltar rang gri ngo bo bshad par bya ste/tshangs pa'i
467b2(rgyud): rus pa'i dbyug pa'i snying po'i dang po zur gsum gyi rnam pa mdud pa lte ba'i srog gi rlung dang ldan pa'i byang chub kyi sems 'od kyi thig le shes rlab mo'i lte bas zla ba
467b3(rgyud): yar ngo'i tshes dang po'i chu tshod gcig gi bar du 'dod pa'i dga' ba shar ba'o//pad+ma'i 'bras bu'i 'dod pa las 'drar ba'i nye ba dang ldan pa tshes gnyis kyi bar du stobs
467b4(rgyud): nub pa'o//drag po'i mig gi 'dus pa las 'gro bya mnyam pa dang ldan pa tshes gsum gyi chu tshod gsum gyi bar du sprin gyi thig le shwar ba'i dus su'o//rigs kyi bu ma
467b5(rgyud): tig gi nu ma reg pa las dga' ba gyen du 'gro ba drang ldan pa'i tshes bzhi'i chu tshod bzhi'i bar du nub pa'o//tshangs po'i mig ma mchu'i bdud rtsi btung ba sbyin pa la su rgyas
467b6(rgyud): / thur du byung ba dang ldan pa tshes lnga'i chu tsho lde'i b.re dbugs shwa ra bA'i dus so//dung gi mig gi swa sen mo btab pho las drag po 'jigs pa'i tshul dang ldan pa'i chos/
467b7(rgyud): drug gi chu tshod drug go bar du ut+pa la'i nub pa'i duso//rna ba'i mig gi sbyor ba las byung ba'i khyab byed dang ldan pa'i tshes bdun gyi chu tshod bdun gyi bar du mgo ka la
468a1(rgyud): shAr ba'i dus so//de'i mig gos 'bras bu'i bskyod pa las mA drug go dga' ba ban dang ldan pa rgyas brgyad kyi rgyu tshad brgyud kyi bar du mad nub p+ta
468a2(rgyud): dus so//rlung gi lte ba'i nam dpe blor 'khyud pa las khyab 'i spyod pa dang ldan pa'i rjes dbu'i chu tshod dgu'i bar du snying ba shA ba'i dus so//glang ba che'i lci bani
468a3(rgyud): sgra las thig le mtha' dang ldan pa'i chos bcu'i chu rgod btsu'i bar du zla bi nub pa'i dus so//ut+pa la'i lci ba'i mig gI lo las myos pa khrung khyung dang ldan pa'i chus
468a4(rgyud): bcu gcig gi tshod bcu gcig bar du nyi mu shwang ba'i dus so//pad+ma'i lci bo'i sprug cing bsregs pa las dga' bral gyi dga' ba kro d+ha dang ldan pa'i rgyu sa bcu gnyis
468a5(rgyud): kyi bar du drug po nub pa'i dus so//phung ba'i kha'i grong khyed las ud mi rim pa dang ldan pa'i tshes bcu gsum gyi chu tshod bcu gsum gyi bar du mchog gi shar
468a6(rgyud): ba'i dus so/d+harma byi'i kha'i bye snum pa las tshul 'dred pa dang ldan pa'i tshes bcu bzhi'i byung du sgra nu pa'i dus so//rdo rje'i khu dro mnyam pad+ma spyor byi las gnyid ldan
468a7(rgyud): ba dang ldan pa'i nya'o chu tshod bco lnga'i bar du ri'i shor ba'i dus so//rnam par rgyas pa'i gyi me tog te brjod pa las tshes bcu drug gi chu tshad bcu drug go
468b1(rgyud): bang du lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' bA gsal ba dang ldan pa'i thog ni nub pa'i dus so//thog ni sngags 'jigs byed pa ste//de la nub pa bcu drug yin/shar dang nub pa gang la
468b2(rgyud): la /lhan cig skyes la de yod min//yon po'i gdub bu'i rnam par 'byed//rtsa yi lte dbus thig le dang //dga' ba la sogs shar ba dang //de ni nub pa'i dus su'o//de ltar
468b3(rgyud): bde chen rnam pa ni//'pho ba ru ni bdag gis bshad//dngos dang rten dang rnam par 'byed//ye shes dga' brul lhan rtag bya zhugs//dngos po ro mnyam lta ba yin//'dod pa chag
468b4(rgyud): ba'i rnam dag byed//'dus pa reg bya byed pa yi//dngos ni sred pa med par byed//'o dang 'khyud pa longs spyod rnams//dngos ni dngos por rab gon byed//puN+Da ri ka'i 'byung
468b5(rgyud): sa yi//zur gsum lnga sogs rten pa yis//rten ni bsam du med pa ste//chos dbyings rang gi ngo bo yin//steng dang 'og ni mnyam pa'i rten/mya ngan las pa rtog med byed//
468b6(rgyud): bde ba chen po'i bdud rtsi'i rten//rigs lnga yi ni mchog gi gzhi//ye shes 'dod pa lhun gyis grub//'dar ba dga' ba mchog gi dga'//ye shes shes pa lhun gyis grub//
468b7(rgyud): gzhi med pa yi lhan cig skyes//gzhi dang bcas pa dga' bral dga'a'o//ye shes nga rgyal med par byed//chos kun rnam par shes pa ste//ye shes shes bya don grub byed/
469a1(rgyud): rnam par 'byed pa 'od gzugs grags//tshul dang sprin dang stobs bdag nyid//rnam par 'byed pa dngos kun du//rnam pa'i gzhi dang bcas
469a2(rgyud): pa thim//skye dang gnas pa sgyu 'phrul gyi//rnam par 'byed pa gti mug gsong //'khor lo sngags dang bya ba lA//'joms byed de ni rnam par 'byed//rtsa yi snying po
469a3(rgyud): thams cad ni//bcom pa'i phyir ni rnam par 'byed//ye shes kyi ni snying po'i mtha'//rnam par 'byed pa gsol ba yin//ye shes shin tu bde byed phyir//rnam par 'byed par
469a4(rgyud): de phyir brjod//gnyis su med pa mchog zhi ba//chags pa dang ni chags bral mi//dri ma med pa bcos med pa//rgyud dang sngags dang rim pa bral//rang rigs pa dang brjod du
469a5(rgyud): medo//thams cad khyab cing dpe byad med//de lta bu ni don dam pa//lha yi dbang phyug rnam par 'byed//sangs rgyas byang chub sems kun gyi//thugs khar rtag tu bzhugs
469a6(rgyud): pa'o//rnam par 'byed la sgom po med//phung po khams la sogs dang bral//sgra la sogs pa'i chos kyis stong //stod dang snying rje'i bdag nyid yin//tshangs pa khyab 'jug
469a7(rgyud): drag po dang //dbang phyug rtag tu zhi ba dang //de rnams kun gyi yab yin no//'byed pa dang ni mchog rmad 'byung //de nyid ye shes thag le 'dir//mchog rnams grub po'i mnga'//
469b1(rgyud): bdagag/'byung ba kun gyi nang rnyed pa//sku m+bu'i bdang /da pa mchog yin//mkha' 'gro bang phyug lnga ba dag po//nu mkha' bdag nyid skye med do//namakha' sgra y-i na duSh+TAm//
469b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag byas pa//de lta'i bsang chen ye shes ni//ye shes dbang po rnyed dka'o ba//ji ltar nor ni rkun mo yis//ma rnyed byed ltar 'bad pas sde//dpal la
469b3(rgyud): shes thig le las 'pho ba'i dus shar ba dang nub pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drang po'o///lha'i dbang phyug gis gsol pa//kye bcom ldan 'das de nyid gsum
469b4(rgyud): bdag nga ro rI//de bzhin zla ba bde ba mchog/phyag rgya chen po'i rnam pa ci//de yi mtha' ni ji ltar lags//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//de nyid gsum ni sku gsung
469b5(rgyud): thugs//rdo rje gsung nI ye shes mchod//zla ba bde ba mchog ces pa//de yi phung po dbang po khams//phyag rgya chen po rdor snying po//de yi mtha' ni b+ha gar dran//mtha' dang snang ba
469b6(rgyud): rnam par shes//chu yi zla ba bzhin du mthong //chos kun rang bzhin dri ma med//snang ba las ni thams cad 'byung //skye ba dang ni 'gag pa med//yang dag 'od las thums cad
469b7(rgyud): 'byung //de'i phyi rol chos thams cad kyi bdag nyid ni bcom ldan 'das dpal ye shes thig le'o//de la dang po rnam pa dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i bskyed pa
470a1(rgyud): sgom pa dang /sngags dang /bzlas pa dang /sbyin sreg dang /mchod sbyin dang /gtor ma dang /mchod pa dang /gnas kyi brjod pa dang /dbang bskur gyi
470a2(rgyud): rim pa de dag bshad do//dpal ye shes thig le las de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid dang /zla ba mchog gi bde ba dang /phyag rgya chen po'i mtha' la sogs pa'i phyogs
470a3(rgyud): tsam bstun pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o////lha'i dbang phyug gis gsol pa//tshangs pa'i rus pa srog gi dbyug pa'i steng dang 'og gi 'pho ba cha gnyis sum
470a4(rgyud): cu rtsa gnyis kyi rang bzhin las le'u dang por gang gsungs pa ni de rnams kyi nang nas gcig tu rtog med bde legs yid ma gcig pu nges par bstan par mdzad kyi//
470a5(rgyud): bobacom ldan 'das rtswa gzhan rnams ci'i don phyir 'dir ma gsungs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gcig pu rtog med pang lags ma de ni bye ba phrag bdun///
470a6(rgyud): cu rtsa gnyis kyi phra mo'i dra ba rnams rol mo'i don du byas nas/sna tshogs kyi bdud rtsi bsnam gyis mi khyab pa chos kyi 'byung gnas chen po'i sa steng su 'byung zhing sbyi'i
470a7(rgyud): char 'bab pa'i don du bstan pa'o//lha'i dbang phyug gos gsol ba/de ltar lags mod kyis kyang /rtsa sum cu rtsa gcig po rnams kyi mtshan dang grangs 'dir mchog
470b1(rgyud): gi dbang phyug la bka' drin zhu'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/lha'i dbang phyug sum cu rtsa gcig gi ming rnams nyon cig/gsang ba dang /zab pa dang /sred pa dang /
470b2(rgyud): phra mo dang /bdud rtsi ma dang /bdud rtsi khri me dang /dag pa ma dang /bde ba ma dang /stobs ma dang /thabs ma dang /hu da hrud ma dang /ser ma dang /Sha rgyun ma dang /dga' ma dang /
470b3(rgyud): snum ma dang /khro ma dang /mngar ma dang /skyur ma dang /kha ba ma dang /bska ba ma dang /tsha ma dang /lan tshwa ma dang /rtsub ma dang /dang ma dang /stobs ma dang /dga' byed ma
470b4(rgyud): dang rtswa dga' sbyin ma dang /gnyid ma dang /bcad skyed ma dang /khong chud ma dang /tshe ma ste/de dag ni rtsa sum cu r+ya gcig te/steng dang 'og tu 'pho ba gnyis kyi zla ba dang nyi ma
470b5(rgyud): bzas zin pa'i dus su tshigs rgyas pa'o//de nas dbong gi rim pa bshad te/ji lta yi n+di go rimasu//dbang bskur mchog ni rnyed pa grang //thams cad du ni nus par 'gyur//
470b6(rgyud): yon tan tshul khrims ldan pa'i bu//bla mas dang por dbang bskur byas//khrus byas mig dag ras kyis dag bo//snyim pa me tog gis bkang ldan//yon phul nas ni dga'
470b7(rgyud): dang bcas//lha yi dbang phyug dbang bskur byas//dbang bskur nas ni sangs rgyas sa//the tshom med par rnyed par 'gyur//de bas kun tu rab 'bad de//dpal ldan dbang rgyal
471a1(rgyud): blang bar bya//dbang dUr baTI ru phye ba ni//slob dpon la sogs dbye bA da na//dang por slob dngon gyi ni dbang //gnyis pa de ni gsang ba'i dbang //
471a2(rgyud): gsum pa shes rab ye shes dbang //de ltar de bzhin bzhi pa'o//bzhi gnyis rab tu dbye ba ni//slob dpon dbang la sogs par bskur//rdo rje slob dpon dbang gsum du//
471a3(rgyud): na mkha' mnyam du bdag gis bshad//de gnyis la ni bcu gcig phye//rdo rje slob dpon dbang rgyal lo//dbang bskur de ni rin po che//khams gsum gyi ni phyag byas pa//
471a4(rgyud): thar par 'phro ba 'gru ba na du//'di ru rim pas bdag gis bshad//chu dang dbu rgyan rdo rje dang //dril bu ming dang brtul zhugs dang //lung bstan pa drang skyob sr-i sbyin dang //
471a5(rgyud): phyag rgya sngags dang ye shes so//rnal 'byor rgyud la mos pa la//dbang brgyad phye la sbyin par bya ki/rnal 'byor bla ma la mos la//bcu gcig bdag nyid sbyin mar bya//
471a6(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma la mos pa rnams//gsang ba'i dbang ni sbyin pa'o//gsang po grinyis su dbye b.ro gsung //do ni phyi dang nang gis so//rnal 'byor rnal 'byor blo mu'i phyir//
471a7(rgyud): dbang bskur shes pas sbyin par bya//nang gi rnal 'byor mo ye rgyud//gsang ba'i dbang ni rab tu sbyin//de ni gsang ba gsum du dbye//skye dang mdud dang de bzhin song //
471b1(rgyud): shes rab rnam pa gnyis su dbye//bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i bye brag go/shes rab brgyad gnyis lo dang ldan//spyan rings cha la mkhas pa dang //yan lag tsan dan sar pa'i dri//shin tu
471b2(rgyud): 'jam pa'i khu bas tshim//gzugs bzang sngo la skal ldan ma//'o 'dzin 'khrong zhing 'jam la mtho//ngo sam gtan sngags la dad cing zhi//dbang bskur dang ldan thugs rje grub
471b3(rgyud): de lha'i rab grags 'bad de btsal//dbang gi don du bla ma zhu//de kun mtshan nyid dang ldan pa//chung ma yang na sring mo 'am//bu mo yang na mna' ma 'am//mkhas pas 'bad de
471b4(rgyud): blang bar bya//rang gi rigs ni ji bzhin rnyed//rgyu ba dang bcus gzhon nu ma//sna tshogs rgyan gyis legs par brgyan//mkhas pas bla ma la ni dbul//dbang gi man ngag gsum
471b5(rgyud): du bzhugs//nang gi yi ni brda byed pa//bzhi pa 'bras bu'i ngo bor grags//gi sum dang bral ba'i gsum bdag nyid//dag ba la sogs bye brag tu//rdo rje gzhon nu mas gsal
471b6(rgyud): /dbye//dbang bskur gyis ni 'khor los bsgyur//the tshom med par yin par 'gyur//dbang gis dri ma med par byed//chu la sogs pas ras bkrus bzhin//cho ga thams cad rdzogs
471b7(rgyud): pa'i dbang //yan lag de nyid dang ni bcas//gcig nas gcig tu rim pas brgyad//bla ma rab kyi zhal nas blang //gzhan du rtog ge'i tshegs la mkhas//sgra yi bstan bcos/
472a1(rgyud): rtag mos la//dbang gi mchog ni rnam pa gsum//blang bar mi bya sbyin mi bya//yang dag 'bras bu 'dod pa ni//de ni ring du blang bar bya//de ltar yang bye ma
472a2(rgyud): du ma bsdus pa'i phung po la 'bad de rnam par btsir bas mar khu'i thigs pa phyed kyang myi 'byung ngo //de bzhin du rtog ge mang po dang /ngag gi dra bo dang ldan pa bstanA~M pA
472a3(rgyud): 'am/nyan pa las ni de la nyon mongs pa 'ba' zhig las gzhan 'bras bu ni rnyed pa med do//de bas na gcig nas gcig tu rim pas brgyud de rnyid pa'i dbang shes pa de ni rdo /
472a4(rgyud): rje slob dpon bla ma chen po'o//mi bskul mchog gi bkris can//sangs rgyas 'bras bu sbyin pa'i sbyin//bla ma'i gzugs so gzhan mo yin//bsod nams thams cad
472a5(rgyud): kyekyi ni gnas//sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //tshangs pa brgya byin khyab 'jug la//de kun gyis ni bdug mchod 'os//ma grags kyang ni grags gzugs yin//
472a6(rgyud): de ltar shes nas sgrub pa pos//'bad bya yis ni mchod par bya//bla ma'i zhal spu mched byas ni//ci 'dod pa yi 'bras bu rnyed//rgyud kyi don dam drabang gi don//shes nas///
472a7(rgyud): bla ma mi mchod pa//sa stengs nyi zla yod par du//de ni mnar med pa ru 'gro//de bas kun tu 'bad pa yis//gus pas bla ma mchod par bya//rin chen sna tshogs
472b1(rgyud): bzod byas legs//gsor gyi pad+ma dri ma med//mu tig do shal rin thang med//sna tshogs du ma yi ni gros//gces pa'i btsun mo bu dang ban+d+ha sa//blung pa rta dang bran la srogs//
472b2(rgyud): dpal ldan bla ma'i spyan snga ru//dad gus brtan pas dbul bar bya//dpal ye shes thig lI las yon dbul ba dang bcas pa'i dbang gi rim pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste
472b3(rgyud): gsum pa'o////de nas gzhan yang rab bshad nyon//gnas kyi rnyed pa ji bzhin don//ka ba gcig dang sgo dgur ldan//rdo rje rtsig pa'i rgyan dang ldan//rdo
472b4(rgyud): /rje'i thig drang bla ra ni//kun tu yongs su bskor ba yin//rlung la sogs pa'i rig pas dbye//'byung ba bzhi dang ldan pa yini//ji snyed na myekha'i mtha' kun tu//thams
472b5(rgyud): cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs//rdo rje gur gyi dbus su ni//srung ba'i 'khor lo 'khor bzhon pa//rtsibs bcu pa le gser gyi mdog/khro bo bcu dang bcas pa'o//khro bo
472b6(rgyud): thams cad zhal gsum pa//spyan gsum pa la phyag drug pa//g.yas brkyang pas bzhugs pa/gsus pa slo ba/sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ljags 'gril ba/
472b7(rgyud): mche ba 'jigs pa gtsigs po/dbu skra ser po gyen du 'greng ba/ag tshoms dang sprin ma che zhing ring ba ste/shar gyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs la gshen rje gsheng sku
473a1(rgyud): mdog nag po b.las dang /g.yon pa'i zhal gnyis ni ser ba dang dmar po/byug g.yas gnyis na ral gri dang rtse gsum pA/phyag g.yon gnyis/
473a2(rgyud): nathod pa dang dbyug pa'o//lho phyogs kyi rtsibs la shes rab mthar byed//dkar po g.yas kyi zhal dmar ba//g.yon sngo ba/phyag g.yas pa gnyis kyis dbyug pa dang /
473a3(rgyud): ral gri/phyag g.yon pa gnyis na mtshon rtse gcig dang mgo bo'o//nub tu pad+ma mthar byed dmar po zhal g.yas dkar zhing ge yon sngon po//g.yas dang g.yon gyi bzhin
473a4(rgyud): ral gri dang /'khor lo dang /zla ba phyed pa dang /ri rab zur brgyad pa'o//byang du bgegs mthar byed sngon po g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhal gnyis ni dkar po dang dmar po'o//
473a5(rgyud): grayas dang g.yon gyi phyag bzhin rdo rje rgyu gram dang /ral gri dang /mdung tha~Mng dang /so'i mtsham su 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i gzugs can g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhal gnyis
473a6(rgyud): ni kar ba dad dmar ba/g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyag gnyis na ral gri dang rin po che/phyag g.yon na ster dang mdung thung ngo //srin po'i mtshams su dbyug pa sngon po/
473a7(rgyud): chu srin 'dzin ser po'i gzugs/g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhal ldang ba dang dmar ba/phyag ba yas gnyis ni rgya gram rtse gsum dang ral gri/phyag g.yon gnyis na
473b1(rgyud): sa la'i shing chen po dang /de bzhin du me'o//rlung mtsham su stobs po che ngu ba'i mdog/g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i zhal gnyis ni ser ba dang dmar po//phyag bzhi la ral gri dang dung /
473b2(rgyud): dang 'ga' ta dang rnga ma'o//dbang ljin gyi mchi masu mi g.yo mgon dkaraM nag zhal g.yon dmar po dang /g.yas sngon po/g.yas g.yon gyi phyag bzhin ral gri dang lcags
473b3(rgyud): kyu dang pi wang drang rde'u chung ngo //steng du gtsug tor 'khor los bskur bu sku mdob ser po g.yas dang g.yon pa'i zhal gnyis ni sngo bu dkar ba/phyag bzhi na 'khor
473b4(rgyud): lo dang /ral gri dang /ka pA la dang /kha T+wAM ga'o//'og tu suM b+ha'i rgyal po sku mdog na mkha' ltar spo ba/g.yas kyi zhal 'thon 'thing chen po'i 'od can+da/gla yon pa ni
473b5(rgyud): nyi ma gzhon nu'i 'od can/gra yas kyi phyag gnyis na ral gri dang lcags kyu//g.yon gnyis ni gri gug drang thod pa'o//thams cad kyi rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje
473b6(rgyud): dang pad+ma bsnams pa/rang gi 'od kyi shes rab ma lnga 'khyud pa'o//'dod pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa ni 'jig rten skyong ba brgyad kyi steng du'o//gtsug tor 'khor

474a1(rgyud): 'byung gnas so//de'i dbus su sngar bstan+da pA'i 'byung ba bzhi ji lta bu'i rim pas/rnam par snang mdzad yongs su gyur pa las dur khrod brgyud dang
474a2(rgyud): ldan pa'i bzha pA yas khang yang swA pa chen po'i 'bar ma gnyis nyi ma'i gdan du sna tshogs pad+ma mdab ma brgyad kyi lte bar 'jigs byed dang dus mtshan gyi bde byed ma'i
474a3(rgyud): snying du tshub dang thigs pa'i rang gi ngo bo A li dang ka laM gnyis las byung ba/ma hUM las dpral ye shes thig le phyag rgya chen pos 'khyud cing zhal brgyad pa/byig brgyad
474a4(rgyud): las brkyang ba/zhal bzhi ni gnab pa dang /ser ba dper ba dang /ljang ku'o//gzhan bzhi ni ut+pa la sngon po'i mdab ma lta bu'o//rdo rje dang /dril bu dang /hUM'u chu

474b1(rgyud): brlag par mdzad pa/mI bzad pa dang /mi sdug pa dang /lce spyang gi tshogs 'jigs su rung ba dang /sha za'i rgyags ha har dpyod pa dang /nag po'i me can gyi dur khrod chen po
474b2(rgyud): brgyad na 'jigs byed kyi nyams dgu dang ldan pa'i gar byed pa'o//dpal ye shes thig la las dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o///

474b5(rgyud): reg bya 'jam//dang po mkhas pas 'jug par bya//sngags kyi gnas kyi lugs ji bzhin//legs dgyes shin tu sbyor bar byi//de yi sbyor ba gang zhig
474b6(rgyud): 'byung //kha dang sa sogs mchod par bya//pad+ma 'dab me brgyad pa bya//rdo rje yi ni phur bu bcu//mkhas pas khro blo'i sngags kyis gdab//A l-i ka li mnyam byas na//
474b7(rgyud): 'dab makun la rim pas dgod//A lo ye shes 'dab ma gcig/kA li 'dab ma mdun du dran//'dab ma re ri yi ge l+le//lnga pa l-I ni lnga la'o//'dab ma gnyis su
475a1(rgyud): bzhi gnyis te//klu yi yig 'bru ste nang ngo //dbyangs yig gsal yig bye brag tu//A li kA lI 'du shes yin//gnyis kyi yi bre 'dab ma yI sa/
475a2(rgyud): sngags kyi rgyal po de nyid dran//dang po'i gzugs kyis rgyal po'i dbang //de nas 'dab gnyis kyi dbang por//bzhi pa'i dbyangs yig dang bcas pa//'og tu re pha yis ni
475a3(rgyud): rkyen//de nas nyi shu rtsa lnga ni//'dab ma gnyis pa'i bzhi pa'o//dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang ldan pa//khro bo ngan 'gro dag byed pa//'dab gnyis dang po bzhi pa yin//

475a5(rgyud): ldan pa'o//dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa yis//lha yi dbang phyug rgyan pa'o//bzhi pa'i lnga pa gang yin dang //de nas de yi dang po'o//bcu drug pa la gsum pas ldan//

475a7(rgyud): ldan//thams cad kyi ni 'byung ba'i gzhi//zla tshes thig le rnam par rgyan//de ni de dang nye bar gnas//sems kyi dbang phyug yi ge mchog/gang zhig lnga pa'i
475b1(rgyud): gnyis pa dang //gsum pa'i dang po dang ldan pa//mthar ni swA hA ldan pa ste//snying po'i sngags ni rmad byung mchog/dang po ru ni gzugs kyi mchog/'dab ma gnyis pa'i
475b2(rgyud): bzhi pa'o//'og tu ri phywa yang dgra ldan//dbyangs kyi yi ge bzhi pas sbyar//rigs pa'i rgyal po'i yi ge mchog/thig le yis ni mgo bo mnan//de ring du ni nye bar
475b3(rgyud): gnas//thams cad zhi ba zhi ba'i mchog/thigs pa mnan pas sum cu gsum//bcu drug pa ni gnyis par ldan//yang ni de nyid yi ge mchog/khams gsum mun pa
475b4(rgyud): sel bar byed//hUM phaT de ni gnyis ka sbyar//tha mAr swA hA yis ni ldan//nye bI'i snying po'i sngags zhes bya//bcom ldan 'das ye shes ka les so//dang por rnam par snang
475b5(rgyud): mdzad dag/nyi shu rtsa dgu de nas so//gsal byed pa ni gzhi gnyis pa//nyi shu rtsa bdun pas ni ldan//nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa yi gzhan//dbyangs kyi yi ge bdun pas bdun//
475b6(rgyud): bzhi pa las ni gsum pa'o//de dang nye bar rlung yin no//dbyangs yig bcu gAcig pa dang ldan//'bras bu thams cad don sbyin no//lnga pa yi ni lnga pa dang //yi yi ge 'bru
475b7(rgyud): deyang nye//lnga pa yi ni gsum pa dang //nyi shu rtsa brgyad de gnas so//lnga pa yi ni dang po dang //nyi shu rtsa bdun de nas so//dbyings yig gi ni gnyis pas ldan//khams
476a1(rgyud): gsum dgugs par nus pa'o//gsal byed kyi ni dang po dang //nyi shu rtsa bdun pa ni ldan//nyi shu rtsa lnga pa dag dang //dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis
476a2(rgyud): pas ldan//nyi shu rtsa drug yi ge mchog/dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu gcig ldan//swA hA mtha' ru ldan paM ni//hUM hUM phaT gyis spel bar bya//de ni phyag rgya che snying po//yid
476a3(rgyud): bzhin rin chen mnyam pa'i'o//dang po yi ni phra na pa/de nas 'drab gnyis pa yi ge sum//ya yi sde chen gnyis pa dang //nyi shu rtsa dgu de nas so//dbyangs kyi yi ge

478a2(rgyud): ka le ye shes yig mchog sbyin//phyi dang nang du bya ba'o//mchod sbyin byas na sbyin pa che//'bras bu bkris ldan pa skye//sems can rnams kyi bye brag tu//sna tshogs

478b3(rgyud): pa/yid 'phrog lha yi me tog gis//zla ba nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan//mo dang sgron ma rmed du byung //mchod sbyin du kyil 'khor la mchod bya//dbade ni mar ngo'i dang po yi//

478b5(rgyud): zhi pa yi ni thim pa 'byung //gsum pa sngon 'og mus so//lnga pa yi ni longs spyod yin//bcu drug pa yi lnga pas so//drug pA yi ni thim pa 'byung //bcu drug pa yi dran/

479a1(rgyud): 'byung //dbyA s+ya lag bcu gnyis po yis so//bcu ga m+b+ha pa yi ljongs spyod na//de gnyis kyis ni mchod par bya//bcu dran mes na rtsom par rgya
479a2(rgyud): dbyangs yig bdun pa gnyis kyi mchod//nya gang ba la dbang yin te//dbyung po yig bco lnga po yis so//byang chub sems 'byung ma chad ba yin//yang ngo mar

479a7(rgyud): stong //sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag mdzad pa//shes rab thabs kyis rang bzhin grags//'gro med 'gro la bdag nyid rol//mchog gi na mkha' mtha' med pa//
479b1(rgyud): nyid dang bral gzhi dang bral//lha yi dbang rnams thub dbang rnams//rdo rje can yang rnyed dka' ba//chos dang longs spyod bdag gis mtha'//ye shes rnam shes ngo bo dgra/

479b5(rgyud): /rgya mtsho me dang mi ga zla ba//lha yi dbang phyug tshad yin no//gzhan kun gyi ni rim pas gcig/sngar grub kyis ni gzhan ma 'grub//hom khung re rer snying khar pad//rigs kyi las
479b6(rgyud): kye go rims so//de steng sna tshogs rdo rje ste//'od zer lnga dang ldan pa'o//lte ba'i nang du me lha ni//zhal gsum pa dang phyag bzhi pa//sku mdog ser po spyan zlum pa//ral pa'i
479b7(rgyud): cad pan gyis ni rgyan//'bar ba'i mche ba 'jigs pa che//rdo rje skyil krung du ni bzhugs//bi ngan gsum dang 'grang phred g.yas//g.yon na dbyig gu spyi blugs so//snying
480a1(rgyud): kha ru ni mye yi l+yA//lce bdun 'od ldan+d+ha gsal bar 'byung //cod pan rin rkyen 'byung ldan mgon+ta//de bra ngos dbus su me yin no//tshur gshegs 'od
480a2(rgyud): zer char ldan pa//'dod pa don ku ni grub dbang po/oM b+hu r+b+hu ba swA hA//rang byung chen po bcom ldan 'das//'dod pa'i dbang phyug 'dod pa ster//me lha las kun sgrub
480a3(rgyud): byed pa//'dir ni bdag la nye byer bzhugs//me lha spyan drang po'i sngags so//de nas mchod yon dang nyaM rAg dang /'thor 'thung ngo //oM hri hi/mchod yon gyi sngagaso//
480a4(rgyud): oM b+hI b+hi he reg gi sngags s+ho//oM b+ho k+Sha a b+ho k+kha 'o thor 'thung gi sngagaso//de nas gradan dbul ba ni//mdzub mo lu gu rgyud byas nas/nadar ma sbyar byad kyi ni gzugs//
480a5(rgyud): srinalag mig po byaM drug tu//mthi chung mthe bor zlum po ste//gdan dbul ba yi phyag rgya'o//mkhas pa yis ni yo byad kun//drang po nye ba nyid du bya//dka' ba med/
480a6(rgyud): par ji ltar rnyed//de ni de nyid rab grub bya//sgrub pa'i dbang po yon tan ldan//sngags dang rgyud kyi thos pa che//sngags kyi bzlas la gcig tu mos//yid mi 'phrogs
480a7(rgyud): shing gsal ba'o//thig le tshul ni ye shes che//bye drag shes pa rin chen rigs//rigs lnga'i gzhon nu ma yi lnga//yid dga'i khu ba yis ni tshim//spyan rings ma
480b1(rgyud): dang dag pa ma//'o 'dzin sra zhing 'jam pa mtho//sbyin srog gnas su gar dang ldan//gcer bu dang ni skra grol ra//sbyin sreg lasa? su don+ta sgrub phyir//rigs lnga'i bu mo gzhug par

487b1(rgyud): //d+ham+b+ha rgyu dang ston//sku rmugs mag da'i grong bas mdzes//sna tshogs gyur gyur dang snyan//sna chogs ga mug gnod par mdzad//sna tshogs sgyu/'phrul bdag nyid nan na/
487b2(rgyud): sna tshogs sgyu 'phrulI 'joms par mdzad//dur khrod brgyud kyi dbus su ni//dpa' bo rnal 'byung ma yis bskor//'jig rten skyong ba byi rgyud dang nga ni//shrId+tha gi rgyal po bad
487b3(rgyud): kyis bskoraro//dkyil 'khor bgyes pa 'pher ma gnyis//lha yi dbang phyug 'dir 'dreg ro lo//dpa' bo rnal 'byor myed dkyil 'khor//ji ltar bdag gis rol pa'i 'dor//
487b4(rgyud): dwe ru re shig rim par dgyes//rtse gcig sems kyis khyod nyon cig/dang por re shig 'phar ma gcig/sgo la sogs pa ka bas rgyan//gnas dang nye ba'i gnas kyi
487b5(rgyud): rim//lha yi dbang phyug bdag gis bshad//sna tshogs pad+d+hi'i ba ma'i shar g+hi ur+yan gyi gnas sun mkhyu dri med dang /zla ba kha dog nag po'o//byung du dza lan d+hA shin
487b6(rgyud): tu stabs chen dung gro yin pa ma dkar ba'o//nub tu bul+lI rAng lci'i dbang phyug dang nyi mnya mo m+b+ha sgra mni/de mar mo'o// r+ya k+ki mche ba dgasang ba'i bdagA 'o dang /rlung zim
487b7(rgyud): uSh+NI la smin pa'i dri dgag/me mtsham su ma 'i l+r-i nye bar gnas su 'od drug dang gis mi sbyin ma srung 'o//gi nod sbyin gyi mtsham su si d+ha'i yul dro bru
488a1(rgyud): du sa na rgyun na/ ts+tsha na dang /dun yang ba mA r+b+ba bam+b+ha smra //dU /
488a2(rgyud): spun gyi mtsha mas+tha mAMs cad+ma kyi byud po 'i de hU~M 'dul mnya ma'i 'di lta dri ma//shA m+b+hi m+me m+b+ha de ning du ut+pa la'i ltung ba dang //zhi ba'i rgyu ba'i phyi nya mi sbyin mchen
488a3(rgyud): mi'o//byang di baik+ko n+d+har zhi ba chen po'i bdag pa dang ljang btsun ma~M gung gum m+b+hi ming gi gi/nub n+ti zh-ing ku l+r-i t+yA nig po 'dul ma dang 'od mdun medu pa
488a4(rgyud): nag rlo ma na/ hUM yang bu da rmad du byung ba dpyi po tshangs pa'i ma ba'i bdage so/gir m+b+ha'i mnam su che sh+tsa kI lI bar drug chen dang skye ba'i du
488a5(rgyud): sbyin gyi ma ngon go//mams ta pa de da gros 'jomasna dang /kham gser skye me ge ge/rlung rgyus su nye ba'i chen da he de lA~M sa kAr rI dag rten me dang thoms
488a6(rgyud): sgyid byed ma ma nag s+ho/b+h+yo mchi mas su kA TI ka ra na mkha'i lnga dang dpa ba'i yum gas myi mdog go/thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba'i 'gyung
488a7(rgyud): po dang /sku mdog dang bzhugs thabs 'dra ba'o//dpa' 'o rnams ni zhal bzhi dang phyag bzhin kha T+wA~M ga dang /ka pA la dang /dril bu dang /rje'u chung bsnams pad //
488b1(rgyud): /sna tshogs rdo rje'i gdan pad+ma'i steng du 'jigs byed kyi gdan la rgyal po'i bzhugs thabs kyis zla ba dang nyi ma zhabs kyis mnan pa/me'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang na nyi ma bye ba'i 'od
488b2(rgyud): pas gsal ba snang bar spro bri'o//'phar mo gnyis par sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab me brgyad pa dang /sgro drang rta babs la sogs pa dang /dur khrod brgyad dang ldan pa'o//de'i
488b3(rgyud): shar gyi 'dab mir 'dus bya'i gnas las kyi yul du skam pa ma sprin mdog go//byang du gseri gyi gling du 'jigs ma kha dog dmar mo chen mo'o//nub tu nye ba'i 'dus
488b4(rgyud): pA ku lu tang 'od ma dmar mo'o//lhor bin dur mchu 'phyang ma lA pa sha'i mdog go//ma'i mtshams su nur khrod du yi dwagasu 'dus par ri rab so ma zla ba'i mdog go/gnod
488b5(rgyud): sbyin gyi mtshams chu ngogs su dus kyi bde ba mya ra me'i 'od kyi mdog go/rlung mtshams nye ba'i dur khrod du tsi ri tA re nyi mig ma bser mdog go//dbang ldan gyi mtshams
488b6(rgyud): gzhon nu'i grong khyer du me'i zhal ma gser btso ma'i mdog go/shar sgor pi la ba ka me rar 'dod pa'i maM ser mo'o//byang sgor ke ra ta ra lce rings ma dkar mo'o//nub
488b7(rgyud): /sgor nye ba'i pi lor chos dkar ma zla ba ltar dkar mo'o//lho sgor ku nu 'jar bden mdog ma ma ra ka da'i mdog go/shar mtshams lam gnas shar gyi lus 'phagasu
489a1(rgyud): mig spyod pa rdo rje sa la'i mdog blo byang mtsham su byung gi sgra mi snyan du stag myo bai DUr+ya'i mdog go/nub mtshams pa lang+ga spyod du gtum mo mu sa ra ba'i
489a2(rgyud): mdog go/lho mtsham su nye ba'i lam 'dzam bu'i gling du 'dod pa'i gzugs me sna tshigs mdog go/rnal 'byor ma thams cad zhal bzhi ma//spyan gsum gsum//
489a3(rgyud): phyag bzhi ma/sku dang na bza' grol ba/ral gri dang /ka pA la dang /kha T+wAM ga dang Ti rde'u chung bsnams pa'o//r-i'i stengs du gAyon brkyang bas bzhugs pa'o//
489a4(rgyud): yang na rgyal po 'i bzhugs thabs su rang 'od kyi thubs la 'khyud pa//rus pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa sgom par bya'o//de lha'i dkyil 'khor rgyal dbang po/rgyud
489a5(rgyud): /kun du ni rnyed pa dka'//lus dang b+ha ga byang chub sems//dkyil 'khor gru sum ni rab mchog go/yAng nr-i snying po dkyil 'khor bstan//mu yi yig 'bru 'deb
489a6(rgyud): mar brjod//Na ya yig 'bru lte bar dran//Da yi yig 'bru ge sar dag/a yI yig 'bru de bde 'dra//ma yi yig 'bru rin chen grags//Na yi yig 'bru bdud par/
489a7(rgyud): brjod//Da yi yig 'bru ring po'i dngos//la yi yig 'bru khang brjod do//ma yi yig 'a pra shu kra'i gzugs/Na ya yig 'bru zhu ba'i dngos//Da yi yig 'bru
489b1(rgyud): 'od dang ldan//la yi yig 'bru bde ba'i gzugs//ma ni snang ba'i 'du shes grags//Na ni yig 'bru snang ba mched//DA ni snang bu snang 'thob//la nr-in yang dag dri mod mchog
489b2(rgyud): mA yi yig 'bru dga' bar glegs//Na li yig 'bru mAM rtog tu dra ni//DA yi yig 'bru dga' bral+la dga'//la ni lan cig skyes par dran+ta//mun+bi yig 'brus zhes bya//NA mI
489b3(rgyud): smig 'bru tsu ru bsten/DA yi yig 'bru de ni me//lA yi yig 'bru rlung gi gzugs//g.yo ba'i phyir ni rlung du brjod//yang na khyab pa'i phyir ni dran//ye shes rnyed pa yi na/
489b4(rgyud): phyir//bde ba yi ni chen po len//ye shes ngo bo bde ba che//dkyil 'khor du ni yang dag bzhugs//dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas rin chen gtso//thig le'i ngo bo yi ge bral//
489b5(rgyud): rnam pa thams cad rnam pa med//phyag rgya dang ni sngags dang bral//sngags tshon kun dga' re ba'i lam//dbyangs dang gsal byed dang bral ba//dri ma med pa bcos ma med//
489b6(rgyud): rgyu mtshan dang ni gzhi med bya//yong dag dri med gnas dag pa/rang bzhin grags pa skyed med mkha'//dpa' bo'i ngo bor grags pa dang/rnam pa kun tu yang dag bzhugs/
489b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor ba dang bdag/dkyil 'khor gyi ni bdag po bdag/dpa' bo 'chad dang nyan pa bdag/byed dang 'phrog dang mnga' bdage bdag/chos kun gyi ni rang ngo
490a1(rgyud): bdag/snong dang snying rje gnyis su myed//stong pa chen po rad blugs//gang du mi dmigs pa ni bad+mag//dngos po ma yin bsam mi khyab//dngas byu ga
490a2(rgyud): yang de nyid min//dngos dang dngos min rnam par grol//dngos drang dngos med bdag nyid bdag/dngos dang dngos med gnyis las 'byung //dngos dang dngos med nang yod do//
490a3(rgyud): bur shing gyi ni ro rje bzhin//ji ltar til gyi nang gi myur//ji ltar shing gi nang gi me//de bzhin thams cad bdag nyid bzhugs//'on kyang ye shes sems dpa' yis//
490a4(rgyud): dadag tu 'dzin par mi bya'o//byung gi 'dzin pa ni nyon mongs che//sems can don las nye bar nyams//sems can don las bsod nams gzhan//che ba gang na yang ni
490a5(rgyud): med//rang don sgrub lo bsod na myas min//skye skye bu chen pos 'di lta bu//rlung dran ma rungs pa ni dor//gzhan la skyed nyams nyan thos sems//rang don gti mug
490a6(rgyud): 'dzin pas nan//sems can don la rgyub kyis phyogs//grub po chen po 'dod pa yis//de dang lhan cig gnas mi bya//de la gtam yung mi bya ste//thabs dang mi
490a7(rgyud): ldan 'jigs pa yis//mgo la nor bus rgyuni yang ni//sbrul nag bzhin du dor bar bya//nyan thos de dang nam yang min//de bso mu stegs 'dus pa mchog
490b1(rgyud): ji ltar 'thing shing snod chags pa//de ni gang du'ang dgos pa med//de bzhin nyan thos tshul khrims nyams//gang tshe rang gi chos kyis ni//lta ba bstan kyang dri ma can//
490b2(rgyud): de de la dgos pa med//byang chub sems dpa'i khrums nyams kyang //de la lhung ba 'byung ba min//yang dag lta dang gzhan don can//de 'dra'i thabs dang ldan pas na//
490b3(rgyud): nyes pas gos par miny+dzam+b+ha /rgyu yis pad+ma dri bzhin no//muste gas pa'am nyin thos la//dman yang de la smad mi ts+tsha/ye shes dkyil 'khor mthar phyin+de sa/
490b4(rgyud): da pas de dag mchod mi bya//phyi yi 'phar ma gcig gnas su//dkyil 'khor 'dir bzhugs rnal 'byor ma//rtag tu me tog smos la sogs//sngags 'di yis
490b5(rgyud): mchod par bya//oM ni dang po rau hUM phaT mthar//bar du mring ni spel bar bya//sna tshogs lnga yi mchod sbyin gyis//dkyil 'khor sa la rab tu mchod//mchod na the tshom
490b6(rgyud): med par ni//grub pa chen po rnyed par 'gyur//dpal ye shes thig le las rnam pa dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor sgom pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//
490b7(rgyud): de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to//ye
491a1(rgyud): /shes nyi ma bcom ldan 'das//snying kha'i pad+ma kha 'byed pa//gang zhig bdag ni ci zhu ba//bdag la thugs rje chen pos gsungs//sngags kyi bzlas
491a2(rgyud): pa dang /mchod sbyin dang /mchod pa dang /dbang bskur ba dang /gnas kyi mdor bstan pa dang /sbyin sreg dang /gtor mtshan po'i rimu pas 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyis
491a3(rgyud): bdag la nges pa'i don bstan pa bka' stsal du gsolnga//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po//sngags kyi bzlas pa'i nges pa'i don//nyon cig yang dag bdag gis
491a4(rgyud): bshad//dga' ba la sogs pa las 'byung //yid ni sngags zhes brjod pa yin//yang ni srub dang bsrub pa'i sngags//sngags ni bdud rtsir bstan pa'o//lam g+hi thar
491a5(rgyud): pa de ni sngags// tshigs rgyas pa ni de bzhin no//phrad pa gnyis kyi dbus na gnas//de ni don dam pa yi sngags//sngags ni A li ka li yin//brjod pa de ni bzlas
491a6(rgyud): pa'o//bskyed dang rdzogs dang bye brag tu//sngags kyi bzlas pA rab tu grags//gang du ske dang rkan ni gnyis//bskyed pa glang du mi 'byung ba//srog gi rtse ba'i nang yod pa//
491a7(rgyud): lugs dang lugs min rgyu ni mi 'chad//thig le gsum dang yig gsum dang //rang nged ma bcos brjod pa bya//rkan gyi nang du lce 'jug pa//ro ma yis ni mnad par
491b1(rgyud): bya//yang d+hI mo'i cha yis reg/mnyam sbyor rnam pa'i bsam gtan gyis//grags pa yod pa'i bdud rtsi bzhin//de nas tshul ni 'byung bar 'gyur//sprul pa'i rim pa'i
491b2(rgyud): brag tu//thig le drungs pa bde ba'i sku//mchod sbyin dkyil 'khor gyis ni rgyun//de yi bskyed rims bdag gris bshad//dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa yi sa//dgyes pa'i gan
491b3(rgyud): bsten mchod sbyin no//mchod dga' 'byung ba'i mchod sbyin no//rab kyi dkyil 'khor de ru bya/mchog gi dga' bya 'khor baR+Sha bes+thAn//ka li ye shes mtshan nyid do//
491b4(rgyud): sku brgyad bdag nyid mchod sbyin ni//gnas brgyad par ni mchod par bya//ji bzhin rnal 'byor ma yi 'byung //de yi don ni bdag gis bshad//sum cu rtsa gnyis yig gzug
491b5(rgyud): kyis//ku lI'i thig le swA gtso bo'i phyir//sgom pa'i dbang pos gnas la sogs//lha mo bcas pas mchod par bya//lha mo kun dang gnas la sogs//lha yi dbang phyug
491b6(rgyud): skyabs yin no//lha mo 'di ru rtswa yin te//'byung ba dang ni gnas su byed//skyabs las rnam par rdzogs pa smye//mtshan dang dpe byad ldan pa'o//gru gsum dbus
491b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das//ut+pa la sngon po'i ma dog dang 'dra//sna tshogs pad+mo'i gdan dbus su//bdud bzhi yi ni steng na bzhugaso//zhal ni bcu drug phyag bcu drug
492a1(rgyud): zhal ni so sor spyan gsum mo//ser po dmar po ljang ku'i zhal//ri bong can ni g.yon bskor zhing //rgyal gzhan kun ni pung pa yin//steng gi zhal ni 'jig
492a2(rgyud): pa'o//gashrIn+daN+ye'i lpags pas rnam dkris byas//dam bcas de ni phyir brtul zhugs don//sangs rgyas phreng ba'i do shal byas//mgo bro yi ni chu ni 'phyangs brgyan//
492a3(rgyud): gur dgu yi ni ro dang ldan/ sku ni phyag rgya drug gis mdzes//sna tshogs rus pa'i rgyan dang ldan//sna tshogs 'od kyi snang bas 'bar//ye shes mkha' 'gro bde ba che//
492a4(rgyud): legs dgyes dbang mo gnyis myed sbyor//dur khrod kyi ni thul bas byugs//steng du babrad pas bde ltar bzhugs//ga yAs brkyang ba yi gar dang ldan//gsang ba'i don
492a5(rgyud): gnas brda' byed pa//mkha' 'gro mo yi tshogs kyis bskor//dur khrod brgyad kyi de bus na bzhugaso//rdo rje dril bu gnyis med sbyor//tshangs pa yi ni lpags pas
492a6(rgyud): khebs//menga'i gzhu 'khor oM rin po che//ral gri rtse gsum rje chung dang //zla ba nyi ma ste re snod//khaMT+wAM ga dang thod pa'o//bcom ldan 'das ma du dang 'dra//ya na phyag
492a7(rgyud): ni gnyis ma'o//rdzi rje gri gug 'dzin pas 'khyud//zhi ba sbyin ni gsum pa'o//nang gi 'pha rim dgyes pa ni//zla ba gang ba bzhin du bdag/sna tshogs pad+ma yi ni gau ni//
492b1(rgyud): 'dab ma brgyad kyis rnam par mdzes//phyi ma gru bzhi ru ni grags//sna tshogs rdo rje'i ster du'o//yi dwags chen po phreng bas ldan//sna tshogs dpa' bos nye bar mangs//
492b2(rgyud): sna tshogs pa yi shing gis bskor//sna tshogs rnal 'byor ma dang ldan//de'i nang du gsum gyi phyag rgya'i grA ni dpal ur+ya ne dang /dz+wa lan d+ha ra dang /pu lI ra ste/mgo
492b3(rgyud): dading /gtsug pud dang /spyi bor legasde dgyes rdo rje mdong /rdo rje 'tshed ma dang /rdo r+N+Na glang chen ma bcom ldan 'das la skul bar byed cing phyag gi 'phar ma 'bar ro
492b4(rgyud): mchog chen po'i snod kyis mchod sbyin 'bul bar byed tshangs pa'i bu gar rtse spyir gyi phyag rgya byed pa ste/mthe'u chung lu gu rgyud du sgrol te lhag mas mthe bong mnan nas
492b5(rgyud): mdzub mo sbyar ba 'og tu bcings po'i sku yi dwags chen po'i steng nu g.yon brkyang bas gnas pa/spyan gsum pa/skra grol zhing ni bzla'i grol ba/chu skyes rgyas pa/bcom
492b6(rgyud): ldan 'das/la lta zhing bzhugs pa'o//shA gyi phyogs su sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pali lte ba ra k+Sha ma ru paM ste//smin ma'i dbus su 'jigs mo'o//de'i shar gyi
492b7(rgyud): 'deb mar mA la waM ste sna'i rtse mor dpa' me'o//byong gi 'dab mer sin d+hu sti mig gnyis su chang 'thung ma'o//nub kyi 'dab mi na ga ra ste rna ba gnyis su 'jigs bad ma'o//
493a1(rgyud): lho yi 'dab mar sing gA lA ste kha'i pad+mar po nya ma'o//byang mtsham su sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i lte bar mum+mu NI ste/kos kror stobs chen ma'o//
493a2(rgyud): de'i shar gyi 'dab mar de bi ko Te ste/ske'i gling burAr+d+ha ma~Mgrin ma'o//byang gi 'dab ma ra~M ku lu tA ste/rgyub kyi gling bur rta rna ma'o//nub kyi 'dab ma'i A ra bu ta ra nu ma
493a3(rgyud): gnyis su glang chen sna ma'o//m+b+ha'i 'dab mar ta li ki lo bste/snying khar glang chen ldo ba ma'o//nub phyogs kyi sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab ma brgyud pa'i lte bar gong bai ri
493a4(rgyud): te/lte ba'i gnas su ma'o//de'i shar gyi 'dab mar laM pra ka s+t+waM//gsang ba'i pad+mar chu rgyun ma'o//bya shi 'dab mar kAny+tsi ka ste//mtshan gyis dbus su ri bong can
493a5(rgyud): ma'o//nub kyi 'dab mar las kyi yum te/mtshan rtse nyi ma'i 'od ma'o//lho'i 'dab mar gser gling ste//bshang kha'i gnas su dung sna ma'o//lho phyogs kyi partA
493a6(rgyud): 'dab ma brgad pa'i lte bAr kong kA na ste//brla gnyis su dung bcug ma'o//shar gyi 'dab mar bin du ste//dbus mo gnyis su dung sti ma'o//byang gi 'drib mar yi dwagis
493a7(rgyud): 'dus pa ste/rje ngar gnyis su stobs chen ma'o//nub kyi 'dab mar rgya mtsho'i ngogs te//rkang pa gnyis su bya rgod ma'o//lce'i 'dab mar tsa ri tra ste//sor mo
493b1(rgyud): rgod la ma'o//de'i sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bzhi'i 'dab ma la dgod do//'dab ma lhagra ma kun la khrag chen pos shin tu gang ba'i ka pA la dang ldan pa'i sna tshogs chen/
493b2(rgyud): po'i bum pa kha rgya ni brtsugs pa//bdud rtsi chen pos lto ba gang ba//dar sna tshogs kyis mgrin pa mtho bar bskor ba'o//shar mtsham su ku mar pu ri dang /kas+pha ra
493b3(rgyud): lte mthe bong dang lus thams cad la hor pa ma dang hor mig ma'o//byang mtshims su ke ra ta dang /ne pa la te rkang pa gnyis la lhag par her mgo ma dang de bzhin du dmar
493b4(rgyud): moma'o//nub mtshams su kar pu dza dang /shar gyi lus 'phags te rgod pa dang /snying khar mig dmar dang srog ma'o//lto mtsham su byang gi sgra mi snyan drang ba lAng sbrid de lte
493b5(rgyud): ba'i lte ba dang /sprul pa'i snying por 'dzin ma dang ro ma'o//'dzam bu'i gling du gdags pa'i pang+ka'i sngar bcom ldan 'das dang d+ho te'o//de lta bu ni nang gi 'o phar mas
493b6(rgyud): bde ba chen po'i ji 'khor lan yod pa'i rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis rnam par dag par phyi ma phyi mar rgyud kyi go rims rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi nang gi dag pa'o//byang chub sems
493b7(rgyud): dpal sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i dbang phyug phyi rol du mtshan dang dpe byad dang ldan pa rnam pa dang bcas pa brgyad gnyis kyi ma'o//byad gzugs mdzes pa chen po'i
494a1(rgyud): shA sa pas drangs pa//lu 'du rgyu smyanan/phyug na pa/spyan gas pa/sman ma ba'i su ma da /rmum+b+ha pa sna chags kyi rgyun gyis pargya
494a2(rgyud): phyug rgya lnga 'dzin pa/ yon brgyang bas ra'i steng nananas pa//b+h+rUM la dang / dang /mda' gang+gA khe pa par 'gengs pa/bdud grangs med pa 'ja
494a3(rgyud): khaM na/sku mdag sna tshogs pa mdzes pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa/thugs rje chen po sa sems can 'grogs ma/sems can gyi don mdzad pa la brtson pa
494a4(rgyud): bral ba dang mi mkhyen pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o//phyi'i 'phar ma shar dang byang nub dang lho mtshams re rer nang gi lha mo bzhin du lha mo gnyis gnyis te
494a5(rgyud): skyed par ma dang /rin chen ma dang /phug ron me dang /ser mo dang /nAg mo dang /rI pod ma dang /rnye dgas mo dang /rA mi rmo'o//shir dang /byang dang /nub
494a6(rgyud): dang /lho'i sgro re rer sgra skyong ma gnyis te//de dag kyang dregs pa chen po 'jigs pa chen mo mjug gi legs dkyus kyi sgra rings pu/sna tshogs kyi nyams kyi
494a7(rgyud): sku khyab pa'i/shar sgor rdo rje las ma dang /rdo rje dri ba ma sru mdag nag po//phyag bzhi ma mnga' gzhu 'gyings shing chu srin dang nya bsnams pa//
494b1(rgyud): la dang /khaT+wAM ga 'dzin pa/spyan gsum pa/phyag rgya lngas pargyun pa/gcer bu skra grol ba/mi'i rus pa sna tshogs kyi rgyun gyis brgyan pa//g.yan brkyang ba/mgo ba'i chun
494b2(rgyud): rjeska rags mA da~Md+ya /rdo rje sa rA mA mA so+o m+b+ha dag dmar me//gling bu dang /rdzu rje chenaba'i sgra khon ni// rdo rje dag myedardo rje nyi ma ma sgyu mdag ltung
494b3(rgyud): kuM/rje rnga dang pi wang gi rol mo'i sgra kho na ste/ji ltar shAr skor bzhugs pa'i rnal 'byor ma de ltar thams cad kyang rus pa la sogs pa'i rgyan dang /bzhugs thabs
494b4(rgyud): dang /phyug mtshan dang ldan pa'o//longs spyod kyi 'khor lo'i nang na yod pa'i rtsa brgyad gnyis kyi grangs ni de dag kun gyi rnam par dag pa'o//sku brgyad bdag nyid kyi ni
494b5(rgyud): m+le na//mchod sbyin sgyu yos kun tu brtag ste//mchod par ni mchod sbyin brjod//tsan kun+da g+hi gnas rab mchog/gnus nA gdan la stsogs pa'i bus//gnas kun
494b6(rgyud): gyi ni bla na med//gsong chen dag paM pad+ma yi//'dab ma brgyad pa lte bair bces//'di be ya~M ni yangs pa'i sar//rtsa yi dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan no//gnas ni gdanas/
495a1(rgyud): b+habad+d+ha grags//gnas ni rten du brjod pa'o//bde ba 'byung ba'i dus solda no//dusmai zhing ni don dam par/de ba'i ye skyes 'drung ba ste//rgyun
495a2(rgyud): d+hai ha ra nI 'di ru bshad//thig le gsum gyi yuM shrI saM bA de//gcig byed pa yi gtan tshigs kyis//de mi 'dus ser bstan pa yin//rnal 'byur rgyu de dra rnyed dka' ba//
495a3(rgyud): gang du tsho ru ba yod pa ste//bde ba 'byung ba'i thim de bzhin//de ni 'dri ru dur khrod brjod//yang na bde ba'i rnam shes so//gang du bde ba yang dag rnyed//de ni pe la ba ru/
495a4(rgyud): grags//skye dang zam pa'i ye shes te//gang du bde ba'i zla ba ste//de ni la ma rab tu ni bstan//'gro ba'i bdag nyid lam yin no//bde ba'i rgyal po gang zhig 'gog/de ni
495a5(rgyud): sbyor ba'i ma shes rAH//de ni gnas brgyad dgyes pa yin//sku brgyad rang gri ngo bo can//ye shes brgyad kyi bdag nyid bdag/sangs rgyas kun gyis rnyed dka' ba
495a6(rgyud): kun gyi ni dag pa'i gzhi//de la yang ni rtse kun gnas//nye bye'i gnas ni thams cad kun//lha yi dbang phyug rnam parar+ya sprin//bskyed dang rdzogus pa'i sbyar ba yis//
495a7(rgyud): zag le drug ni rab tu grags//thig le'i dbus na ye shes yod//ngag gi las gyis rnyed par dka'//bskye pa dang ni rdzogs pa mo de//drug men de bzhi na gsum
495b1(rgyud): ba ma na//gsum dang bral ba gsum par grags//ye shes rang bzhin de skyed med//nyi mA'i thig le'i ye shes shu rA//'bad pa yis ni mchod sbyin bya//gang tshe mchog byung
495b2(rgyud): mA shar bar//de tshe nyi ma 'byung mo 'gyur//zla ba de ni dga' bral dka'//chags pa 'di ru thim par byed//nyi ma'i dbus nas zla ba 'byung //zla ba'i dbus nas nyi ma 'char/
495b3(rgyud): dri ma med phyir yangs par 'gro//shes rab bdag nyid gzugs kyi phyir//thams cad la ni tshim par byed//thams cad kyi ni skye ba'i rgyu//'bras bu byed pa'i bdag nyid zla//
495b4(rgyud): ts+tsha byed bdog nyid zla ba ste//'bras bu byed bdag nyi ma'o//rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis med pa'i//bya do ba chags chen bdag nyid do//chags pa chen po dngos med na//ji ltar
495b5(rgyud): bai de ba 'byung bar 'gyur//bde ba ye shr-is dri med grags//the ma lnga bde nyid bde ba min//byol song bag chags rab rmongs pa//dbang po gnyis kyi bde bar 'dod//bde ba
495b6(rgyud): mchog gi rang rig pa//chags pa dang ni chags bral med//badre ba thig le'i nang du ni//char yang nang du bde ba che//de gnyis ye shes tshul gyi nang //rnam par shes pa'i tshul
495b7(rgyud): can dang //rnam par shes dang ye shes bral//gzhan dang gzhan min nang yod po'o//sbyor drug gyes pa rnam par shes//char yang rtsa ba kun brtag bral//rtog pa spangs pa de
496a1(rgyud): nyid ni//bsam gtan 'dzin pa med pa'o//tshor bya tshor byed gnyis las grol/snyid dang mya ngan 'das dag pa'i//de ni gsang chen de nyid do//grang du/
496a2(rgyud): yang ni gsal ma byas//'bad pa yis ni sba bar bya//smra bar mi bya gang la lar//rnal 'byor rgyud du mos gyur pa//lha yi dbang phyug gas la mi bya//dpal ye shes ldan
496a3(rgyud): le las sngags kyi bzlas pa'i rim pa dang mchod sbyin gyi cho ga dang /dkyil 'khor bskyed pa 'i rim pa dang //bAnas kyi don dang /rtsa'i 'khor lo 'byung ba dang /de kho na
496a4(rgyud): nyid kyi don bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o///de nas mchod pa'i tshe ga 'di'i//nges par bstan pa bdag gis bshad//thi ma dang longs spyod dag
496a5(rgyud): gis ni//yid 'phrog yang dag mchod pa'o//zla ba nyi ma me tog gis//sku yi rgyal po nyid la mchod//'dod pa chedi ni dpral ba ru//mar ngo tshes kyi dang po dbang //yid
496a6(rgyud): las dwe ru 'dod par 'gyur//nges par a yi thig le las//thim pa 'i di ni smin phrag tu//dga' bas de las 'da' bAr 'gyur//A li'i thig le gnyis pas so//
496a7(rgyud): bde ba'i khur chos gnyis nas su//ches gsum pa la longs spyod 'gyur//de la rnam par smin pas 'gro//A li'i thigs pa gsum pas so//bdud rtsi kos ka'i
496b1(rgyud): gnas su no//chos bzhi pa la thim pa 'byung //de la mgu ba las dga' ba//bzhi pa'i ye shes thig les so//bde ba yI ni mgrin gnas su//chos lnga pa la longs spyod 'byung //
496b2(rgyud): de la dgyes pas rgyas par 'gyur//thig le lnga pa'i khengs pas so//'dod pa brang gi gnas su ni//tshes drug pa la thim pa 'byung //de la bas ma ge tan lhas drag po/
496b3(rgyud): thig le drug la gang bas so//bde ba'i nu ma'i gnas su ni//ches bdun pA la dbang ni 'byung //de la bdun pas 'byung ba yin//thigs pa bdun pas khengs pas so//
496b4(rgyud): 'dod pa'i rtse ba logs gnas su ni//chos brgyad pa la thim pa 'byung //de la chags pas mchog gi dka'//thig le brgyad pa gang bas so//bde ba'i lte ba'i gnas su ni//
496b5(rgyud): ches dgu pa la longs spyod 'byung //de la rnam smon las 'bar 'byung/thig le dgu pa khengs pas so//'dod pa'i mdoms kyi gnas su ni//chos bcu pa la thim pa 'byung //
496b6(rgyud): de la brten lngas thig ler 'gyur//thig mer bcu pa gang bas so//bde ba'i spyi bu'i gnas su ni//bcu gcig pa yi dbang ni 'byung //de'i stobs las myos par 'gyur/
496b7(rgyud): bcu gcig thig le khengs pas so//bde ba'i rdo rje'i rtsa gnas su//bcu gnyis tshes la thim pa 'byung //de la 'od las dga' bral dga'//bcu gnyis thig le ga bas//
497a1(rgyud): rgyas pa'i rdo rje'i dbus gnas su//bcu gsum chos la longs spyod 'byung //de las snang dras ung+ga tAr 'byung /A li'i bcu gsum thig les so//
497a2(rgyud): bde ba'i bdud pa'i gnas su ni//bcu bzhi pa la thim pa shar//de la reg bya las tshur 'gyur//bcu ri zhi'i zla ba'i thig las so//bde ba'i nor bu'i dbus su ni//
497a3(rgyud): nya gang ba las dbang nI shwa ra//dri las phrad las grwanyid du 'gyur//bco lnga po yi thig las so//dbang po bcu drug pa yi cha//gzhan ni gang du 'dra ma dmigs so//de bzhin
497a4(rgyud): du ni so sor gzugs//rang bzhin de ni yod pa yin//dga' ba'i bye brag lhan skyes dga'//bcu drug pa yi don du yod//char yang bcu drug 'di ru ni//yon ma yinA
497a5(rgyud): med pa mIn//de bzhin du ni ye shes che//lha yi dbang phyug rang bzhin no//g.yas g.yon yan lag gnyis su ni//khu ba ye ni 'byung bar drag/mar ngo de bzhin ya ra nga yi///
497a6(rgyud): 'dod pa yis ni 'byung ba'i tshe//bcu dang lnga yis gnyis med sbyor//bde ba 'di yi 'byung ba min//de nyid gsum shes bcu dang lnga//shes rab dang bral bde ba che//bla ma'o/
497a7(rgyud): ba sna'i bka' drin gyis//gnyis su med pa'i bde ba shes//rtag tu mos pa yis ni shar//bsam gtan gyis ni shes pa'o//bcu drug gi ni yi ge'i gzugs/
497b1(rgyud): a l-i'i thig le rang ngo bo//A sogs yigA 'bru'i char yang 'byung //A li'i ye shes bde bdag nyid//ka sngogs yig 'bru'i char yang 'byung //kA li'i ye shes bde ba che//A la?
497b2(rgyud): ka li gnyis sbyar las//mchod sbyin gyis ni rab mchod bya//me chud pa yang ni de bzhin te//gsung ba'i pad+ma'i snying khar ro//gsang ba de nyid gsumra zhes bya//lnga la 'da' la gnyis
497b3(rgyud): sbyor las//mchod sbyin gyis ni rab mchog bya//mchod pa yang ni de bzhin te//gsang ba'i pad+ma'i snying khar ro//gsang ba de nyid gsum zhes bya//thim dang longs spyod sogs byed
497b4(rgyud): brog/tham pa dang ni longs spyod dbang //dga' ba gsum du bstan pa'o//de yi thig le gsum zhes bya//sku gsum yig gsum bdag nyid do//tshangs pa'i bu ga de bzhin
497b5(rgyud): 'grin//snying kha ru ni thig le gsum//de yis bskyed pa'i rim shes bya//mdud pa'i nang ni man chad do//bzlog pa yi ni thig le gsum//gyen du rdzogs pa'i rim pa yin//
497b6(rgyud): rgyu 'bras rnam dag bye brag tu//thig le drug ni rab tu grags//dri med ye shes char yang drug/de ni rnam shes sbyor drug bshad//dA yi dbus su de nyid bzhugs//lcen skyes
497b7(rgyud): dgar ba'i bde ba che//michod pa'i las sbyor che bo yis//tha tshom med par snyed par 'gyur//mchod pa'i dam tshig dus su ni//gsang ba'i sgra ni 'bad pa yis/
498a1(rgyud): gang zhig 'dod pa grub pa //dam rdzog sems dpas brjod par bya//ma dzAdzA dz+ha lA pad//A lon draka liny-i//ro bong can ni khu ba'o//ny-im+b+ha zhwad
498a2(rgyud): turA tu grags//nub ga shes bya ste//khrig dus twA nas skye dUn/snrel nonag pa gnyis ka yin// sa thung bar brjod pam+b+ha/nA reg kA b+hU l+rar+tha dza/
498a3(rgyud): chags pa tshang du rab tu grags// na te//gat+te muhrIHdr-i mdzin dra//dza rtul ru sha chen po//DUn+da nI pA ga ny-id du d+hA //gr-iste 'khor 'a
498a4(rgyud): pa mya ngan 'das//mtho ris bA rlugs zhes drang pa'o/ma ye yul ni sgra nas bskyed//sa dpa'o//drin re rab kyi mo'o//gleng bzhi po ni rag
498a5(rgyud): san pa nu rab+hU tu grags//hUM ni srung ma yi par dran//m+b+hin pra mo stu hU~M ma nA~M//rlung du rab tu grags pa'o// mkha' skrag sna shes par bya//bcings pa me

498b2(rgyud): dbyug pa bde ba nyid//thal ba men dga' dga' stobs so//de dag tshogs kyi mchod sbyin gyi//dus su 'bad pas brjod par bya//khrung khrung la sogs 'jug min phyir/

498b5(rgyud): dbang drug dbye ba bla ston pa'o//chu yi dbang bskur dbu rgyan dag/bye ba'i rgyud las rab tu grags//rdo rje dril bu de bzhin ming //spyod pa'i rgyud las rab tu gsal//
