498b7(rgyud): bo yi ni dbang rgyal bshad//shes rab ye shes bla na med//bo zhi ba de ltar de bzhin no//dbu yi bye brag dbang la sogs//'bras bu'i phyir na brgyad dbyer 'gyur//bzhi
499a1(rgyud): pA da ltar de bzhin 'arjopa//shes rab ye shes de yi 'bras//dang skabs sor shrIs mi bya//de ltar zhes ni tshad med do//de bas 'bras bu'i cho ga don no//
499a2(rgyud): rigs pa ma yin pa yi snrums//de bzhin re shig dga' ba'i sems//de bzhin re shig dga' bu'i rim//ji ltar bur ni yod par 'gyur//dga' ba lus su grags pa
499a3(rgyud): ste//mchog tu dga' ba 'di ru gang //yid ni dga' dral shes par bya//lhan skyes de de 'dra gang na yod//kun na yod pa'i ye shes sems//sems las gzhan ni yod
499a4(rgyud): pa min//gang zhig tsA zhib 'a thams cad//de ni thams cad sems yin no//sems las thams cad 'byung ba ste//sems kyis yongs su 'das pa'i'o//lus
499a5(rgyud): kyi mgo bo 'ga' ba'i glanas/dgra ni mgrin pa mchog tu dga'//sems ni snying khar shes bya ba//chags pa'i dga' ba rtag tu shar//lus rgyu 'bras bu de ni ngag
499a6(rgyud): ngag ni rgyu ste 'bras bu yid//yid nyid yongs su shes pa ni//'bras bu de ni don dam par//de nyid gsum bdag ye shes gang //rtsa gsum nang gi dbus na bzhugs/
499a7(rgyud): gnas gsum khyab pa skye ba med//'od gsum srid pa gsum dang bral//'odi rab gnas ni rab kyi mchog/de ni bzhi pa mchog gi dbang //bdun gnyis bye brag tu ni
499b1(rgyud): yod//yan lag rab kyi mdor bsdus la//chu ya dbang bskur dga' ba'o//gsang ba'i dbang bskur mgrin pa ru//mchog tu dga' ba'i bdag nyid mchog/shAsA rab ye
499b2(rgyud): shes kyi ni dbang //snying kha ru ni dag 'bral dga'//gsing ba pad+ma'i lte ba ru//bzhi pa'i rang bzhin bdag nyid do//de ltar dbang ni bzhi ru dbye//bskyed pa'i rim pa'i
499b3(rgyud): phyogs yin no//chu yi dbang ni mngoms su ste//sna tshogs 'bras bu sbyin pa'o//gsang ba'i dbang ni gnyis pa ste//rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ste ro//rdo rje yi nI rtsa
499b4(rgyud): ba'i gnas//rtsa ba dang ni mdoms kyi 'og/shes rab ye shes kyi ni dbong //mdud pa'i gnas su rtag tu dran//dbang rnams kyi bla ma'i bla//rnam par 'joms pa'i 'bras
499b5(rgyud): bu ste//shes rab ye shes nor bu'i khA//shes rab pad+ma'i yid 'gro'i phyir//rlung mi dang ni gnyid skyed rtsa//gau rtis ka rgyas pa yis ni bde//gyen gyi lam gyis bzlog par
499b6(rgyud): byin/mdud pa'i nang gi gnas su 'gro//de ltar bzhi pa rib tu bstan//mo chen nyid dang brel 'bras bu grags//mdud pa'i gnas su rim pa yis//tshangs pa'i sprul pa snying
499b7(rgyud): man chad//de tsam du ni lhan skyes dga'//rlabs dang bral ba dpe med do//de ni de kun don dam par//dbang gi ye shes ngas bstan to//rdo rje ka ba de bzhin gsang //sdom
500a1(rgyud): dang sdoms bya'i rgya mtsho dang //rigs chen ye shes snying po dang //kye rdor 'jigs byed rdo rje dang //mtshan dang gsang ba 'dus pa ru//lha yi dbang phyug
500a2(rgyud): bdag gis spras//khyod kyis dor mdzad dbang gi don//rgyud 'di ru ni rab tu gsal//rtog gro ba dang rgan pa dang //dge slong mos par gnas pa la//yang dag lam shes
500a3(rgyud): slob dpon gyis//de rnams de nyid bshad mi bya//a yau yig 'bru dga' ba yin//b+hi yi yig 'bru mchog tu dga'//She yi yig 'bru dga' bral dga'//ka yi yig
500a4(rgyud): 'bru lhan skyes so//gang du yang ni mi dmigs shing //a ni skye med rang bzhin te//kun gyi rgyu ni yin phyir ro//She yi yig 'brur yang dgra brjod//gtsug tor
500a5(rgyud): gsang ba'i pad+ma ra b+hi//ba skur dang khrus ni byed pa'i phyir//kau ni rnam rtog dngos por grags//'gro ba chod pa'i bdag nyid do//gsang ba'i pad+ma'i snying kha a//rtsa kun
500a6(rgyud): gyis ni 'bigs pa gang //de phyir mngon par dga' bo mchog/b+hI yi yig 'bru thig le 'bigs//She bde ye shes kun brtags bral//yang dag don gyis gsal
500a7(rgyud): bar byed//dang po'i dga' ba rgyu yi dngos//a yi yig 'bru mchog gi gnas//mchog dga' dga' bral dga' bar grags//dbang skur rab tu grags pa'o//de gnyis
500b1(rgyud): dbus su de nyid bzhugs//rang bzhin dga' ba bzhi dang bral//mngon par dga' dang dga' bral dga'i//gang zhig rang bzhin mi shes na//dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' yis//
500b2(rgyud): spangs rgyas yin yang mi bstod do//rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi//thams cad khyab par mnga' bdag bdag/sangs rgyas thams cad rgyal chen po//sangs rgyas thams cad
500b3(rgyud): yid ltar mgyogs//thams cad kun gyi dbang phyug bdag/'byung ba'i kun gyi bdag nyid do//dpal yo shes thig le los dbang bskur ba'i nges pa bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ba
500b4(rgyud): ste bcu gsum pa'o//de nas yang ni bshad bya ba//nang gi mtshan nyid sbyin sreg go//kha ni hom khung dgang gzar legs//tshul ni rang byung me yin no//
500b5(rgyud): nga rgyal phrag dog sreg rdzas yin//bzlas pa de ni kham du brjod//sa 'og dang ni sring mo mA ra//de yi sreg rdzas rab tu dbul//ye shes bdud rtsi rnam dag pas//phrag dog la
500b6(rgyud): sesogs bsang gtor bya//dum bu gsum pa'i snod mdun du//phrag dog bdud rtsis rab tu tshim//rdor gsum ye shes sa bon+da gyi//dag byas dkar byas rims kyis so//
500b7(rgyud): rlung mar bskul byas 'bari bas byas//bdud rtsi ma tshig ni zhu bar byed//ha yi ma mo'i sngags kyis ni//'khor lo drug ni rab tshim bya//ri bo'i ma mo dang bral bas//phyi
501a1(rgyud): nang rtag tu rang ni ma bya//de ltani sbyin bsreg las kyis ni//lUp+ti s+phu ru nges par 'gyur//g+hA yi sgra ni bde chen po//don dam par ni shes pa'o//
501a2(rgyud): lha mi yig 'bru yis 'byung gang //don don dam sbyin sreg go//dpa' bo gnyis kyi me nyam sbyor ba//rjes kyi gang du stong dbang po//lte snying bde ba'i pad+ma yo//rtag par shes
501a3(rgyud): rlob mas ni brjod//de ni sbyin smrig sreg rjes ljin//mngon par dga' las 'byung bar//kun rjeb rnam pa'i gzugs su ni//shes rab thabs ni phrad buM las/
501a4(rgyud): sbyin sreg gyis kyi 'bras bu mchog/myur ba ru ni rnyed pa'o//hem khrung d+ha la dgyes pa che//la lo 'di ru de//nga gzar dran//blugs gzer gsad pad s+t+wa sI n+ya//ma
501a5(rgyud): khro bo zla 'od mnyam//grasang pad+ma zlum po'i rnam pa bzhin//mar gyi snod du rnam par grags//thugs gzar dgang gzer mor gyi snod//rtsa gsuMm+bu du mI brjid po
501a6(rgyud): bsrub dang btsugs pa'i sbyor ba yis//rlung me dang ni gnyid ma gnyis//gau cig pa'i dngos po yang dag pas//ye shes me ni mchog tu 'bar//pad+ma'i 'khor lo drug
501a7(rgyud): rim pas//gzhan min bde chen man chad do//mchog gi bdud rtsi rgyun ni 'dzag/ji ltar mkha' las chu 'bab pa//rtsa yi dra ba du ma yis//'khor lo drug
501b1(rgyud): snying khyab pa'o//sku gsum ye shrIs rdo rje mchog/rtag tu sreg rdzas mchod par bya//mo yi kha ru dgang gzar ni//mar gyis bkadra pa dbul bar bya//mo ni mchog tu
501b2(rgyud): dga' ba ste//rnam d+h+r-i gi hom shing tshig par byed//mdud pa'i hum khung gi ni me//de ni mchog tu dga' rang bzhin//zhi ba'i zlum po'i rnam pa bzhin//longs spyod dang ni
501b3(rgyud): grol ba bzhin/sku yi rdo rje rin chen khang //gsung gi rdo rje dbus kyi dkyil//thugs kyi rdo rje mdud snying po//dga' ba yis ni mchod par bya//gsung gi rdo rdo rje blugs
501b4(rgyud): gzar mchog/dga' bral dga' ba skud+mo rje//lhan skyes dga' ba'i ye shes kyi/dgang blugs kyis ni mchod par bya//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal
501b5(rgyud): pas/bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi glengs kun brgyal ba dang sa la 'gyel bar gyur to//de nas yun ring po zhig nus 'di skad ces gsol to//lhan cig skyes pa'i dga'
501b6(rgyud): ba la 'dir ye shes yod dmo tsa zhes yang ya mtshan du gyur to//yang de'i dus su bcom ldan 'das mas phyag rgya chen pos dam por 'khyud nas ma mchu btung ba'i bdud
501b7(rgyud): rtsi'i mchod sbyin phul te//gsang ba'i pad+ma'i bskor ba dam po'i snyim pa mnyam par sbyor ba bcings nas gus pas zhus pa//sangs rgyas kun gyi bla ma mgon//yi
502a1(rgyud): shes zab mo dri ma med//ci yi don phyir de'i lha'i tshig/'khor kun gyi ni nang du gsungs//lhan cig skyes dga'i ye shes gang //dgang blugs kyis ni
502a2(rgyud): mchod pa la//bdag kyang 'dir ni bcom ldan 'das//the tshom chen po skyes par gyur//gsang na yi ni gas ba mchog/rnal 'byor ma rgyud du ma rung //mgon pos
502a3(rgyud): gang du 'ang ma gsungs so//de tsam yang ni brder ma mdzad//lhan cig la ni ye shes yod//ma gsungs bdag gis thos ma lags//do ring de ltar the tshom dag/mnga'
502a4(rgyud): bdag chen pos gcad du gsol//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//a la la rab tu ngo mtshar to//lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba la//ci'i phyir ye shes med//
502a5(rgyud): da pa chen po dang brtson 'grus can dang ye she sde dang ldan pa yang rmongs par 'gyur la/ye shes mod pas lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba ji ltar rnyed/de bzhin du ya
502a6(rgyud): 'dir gzhan pa de ma yin byo'i dper nyon cig/ji ltar du ba las ni mAr shes te//chu skyar las ni chu yin no//byang chub sems dpa'i blo ldan gyi//rigs ni mtshan mi
502a7(rgyud): rnams las shes//de bzhin du lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba rnyed pa'i don gyi phyir skyabs sprin gyi ngo bo ye shes so//ye shes ni tshor bar yongs su shes pas spyod pa'i
502b1(rgyud): bdag nyid kyi thabs de ni ye shes su bdag gis bshad de/de bzhin du ji ltar mun nag tu rin po che phra mo'i phra mo yod pa de ni rin po che mar me mA yin pa sa rnyed par mi 'gyur ba/
502b2(rgyud): de bas na blo gros can gyis rin po che mar me khyer nas tshol bar byed le/gal te de rnyed na de ci mar mo las rin po che skye 'am//'on kyang mar me'i thabs kyi mthong ba dang rnyed pa
502b3(rgyud): de bzhin du ye shes kyi mar mes lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i rin po che'i rgyal po mthong zhing rnyed kyi ye shes las skya bo ni ma yin no//de bas na ye shes kyi sgra 'di ni don mi shes
502b4(rgyud): pa'i phyir mkhas pas 'dir the tshom mi bya'o//dpal ye shes thig le las mchod pa sna tshogs nges par bstan pa drong /nang gi sbyin sreg ces bya ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//
502b5(rgyud): de nas gtor ma chen po'i las kyi nges par bstan pa'i don bshad do//sems can thams cad srung don du//'bad pa yis ni gtor mo sbyin//b+ha yi yi gra 'bru b+ha gar brjod//li gi/
502b6(rgyud): yigA 'bru li glar bstan//ling ga b+ha gar mnyam sbyor bas/sems can thams cad kyi ni tshogs//de las 'byung bar 'gyur ba te//lha mo de nyid shes bya ste//thams cad
502b7(rgyud): sgra ni dga' ba yin//sems can don ni mchog tu 'gyur//tshogs pa de ni dga' bral dgar//gtor ma de yis srung ba'i don//dur khrod yang ni chu'i ngogs//ye shes ldan pas
503a1(rgyud): /smyon par bya//dung rjod dbugs byung ni gnas//gsang ba'i pud+ma'i byA gdong //sha yi yi ga d+hA pad+ma dag/wa mo yig 'phrul bar yin//sa yI yi
503a2(rgyud): 'bru bde dobo//na ya~M yug 'bru ban+d+ha saM ba med//dri med ma yi zhu ba'i dka'//thig le'i nga bi yi ge bral//dur khrod dbugs 'byung du ni grabs//zhal bzang bdag gis
503a3(rgyud): bshad pa yin//chu yi ngogs ni rin chen khwa//yang na de ni rtog med ma//'byung ba rnams ni srung ba'i phyir//de la gtor ma sbyin par bya//'byung ba khu ba ru ni grags//khu
503a4(rgyud): sems can 'di ru bstan/samyas can snying po ye shes bde//b+ha ga l-i ga gnyis lasa'ibyung //de la sa srung ba'i don du ni//gtor mo kun tu 'bad de sbyin//dpal
503a5(rgyud): ye shes thig le las 'byung ba srung ba'i don du gtor ma chen po nges par bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bco lnga ba'o////dri nas bcom ldan 'das ma phyag rgya chen
503a6(rgyud): bos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lnga'i dbang phyug la bos lta//kye dpa' bo chen po lha'i dbang phyug 'dir de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid dang /zlo ba'i
503a7(rgyud): bde ba mchog dang //phyag rgya chen po'i mtha'i rgyas pa nges por bstan pa'i don du rang gi ngo bo nyid dang /tshad dang /rnam pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du legs
503b1(rgyud): ra nus sho//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' nanub lha'i dbang phyug gis gsalnga pa//mchog gi dbang phyug ma mchog go bde ba chen po'i 'od kyi rang gong bu sangs
503b2(rgyud): rgyas thams cad kyi yu ma/sdig pa thams cad zad par byed maM//bdud thams cad 'joms par byed ma/dga' ba thams cad dang /skad cig dang /ror-i dang /yaM shes
503b3(rgyud): mthar khyad pa lte ba'i pad+ma'i dbus nas bzhengs nas bad ba chen po rab tu tshim par mdzad ma/thecom ldan 'das ma bzang mo mchog dri ma med pa'i sku na mkha' ngo
503b4(rgyud): legs so le gas so//yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das mas gsungs pa khong du chud pas mi tshig tu dga'ab
503b5(rgyud): chen po'i sems kyis rdzu 'phrul da rdzu 'phrul rmad du byung ba chen po sprul te//rnam pa du ma sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa chen pos mchod pa byas nas sngar gyi dri ba de dag zhum/
503b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid dang /zla ba'i bde ba mchog dang /phyag rgya chen po'i maH'i rgyas pa nges par bstan pa'i don du rang gi ngo bo nyid dang
503b7(rgyud): tshad dang /rnam pa de dag bdag la bka' stsal du gsol//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dri ba shin tu zab las zab//thams cad mkhyen pas rnyed dka' ba/
504a1(rgyud): ji ltar nga nyid mtshan nyid ni//nyon cig nga yos bshad par bya//mtshan nyid las spros de nyid no//de lta min na mi mthun no//rang rig pa ni bdag nyid phyir//
504a2(rgyud): de bas brjod par me nus so//de nyi gsum bdag de snang ba//mtshan mo'i 'du shes rang ngobo/zla ba'i bde mchog snang ba mched//nyin mo'i 'du shes rangang ba//phyag rgya
504a3(rgyud): chen po snang ba thong//mtshams kyi 'du shes rang ngo bo//mtha' yi de ni 'od kyi rab/nyin mo mtshan mo sogs dang bral//de ni gnas mchog ye shes te//bltab
504a4(rgyud): bka' ba'i mtshan nyid do//char yang de ni theg le'i tshul//de nyid gsum bdag brjod pa'o//'khor lo gsum yod ma rlung chu//dngos po'i 'du shes rang ngo bo//tshul tsam
504a5(rgyud): zla ba yi ni bde/sA yi 'khor lor ba de ni mchog/de ni rten gyi 'du shes can//lha yi dbang phyug shes pa bya//phyag rgya chen po 'di ni mA tshig/na mkhar ye shes
504a6(rgyud): 'di shes so//nga ye mtha' yi gzhan gyi mchog/bde chen mchog gi na mkhar //da ni rnal 'byor dpor grags//gnyis su med pa'i ye shes rag//dA ni ma
504a7(rgyud): lo drug dbus gnas//rnam shes drug gi rang po//dngos po rten la sogs bye brag/bzhir ni dbye bar yod pa'o//de nyid gsum bdag bya brag gis//de ni rnam pa
504b1(rgyud): sum du dbye//mtshan ma nyin mo mtshams bral phyir//gtsug pu yi ni bde ba che//rang bzhin bstan pa ga la lar//mchog go na mkha' gang la la pA/la lar 'ad ba
504b2(rgyud): ni gai na sa//lA lAr dga' bar dran pa'o//la lar mchog gi dga' ba ste//la lar dka' bral dgra' bA'o//sna tshogs du mA la sogs dbye//lhan skyes gcig pu rtag tu shar//
504b3(rgyud): du mar skye bas ci zhig bya//'di kun bdag nyid lhan cig skyes//kun rdzob rnam pa'i gzugs kyi sa ni//chu yi zla ba bzhin du mthong //don dam pa yi rang bzhin na//yang
504b4(rgyud): dge rtog pa'i gnas med do//thabs la sogs pa'i rim pa yis//bla mra'i zhal nas rnyed par 'gyur//bla ma mtho ris thar pa'i blo//bla ma ye shes bla ma bde//bla ma
504b5(rgyud): ston pa bla ma mgrin//bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid//bla mi'i zhal snga'i bya ka'i drin las//mchog gi gnas ni rnyed par 'gyur//tshe 'di yis ni phyag rgya che//dngos grub rnyed
504b6(rgyud): per the tshim med//sa bcu yi ni dbang phyug bdag/de yi bka' drin gyis ni bla//de bas bla ma las lhag gzhan//ston pa chen po ga la yod//gang zhig bla mas bste n+da
504b7(rgyud): bcas ni//mdzad dam bshad pa gang yi ni yang //da ni bstan bcos de tshad ma//de ni de nyid 'khrul pa med//slob dpon gsung dang bdag gis smras//de la bye brag mi
505a1(rgyud): dbye'o//rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma rgyud shos//bla mas mdzad pa'i bstan bcos gang //de lu skye dang sgra ngan du//lha yi dbang phyug brtag mi bya//snyun
505a2(rgyud): dag zlos gar bstan bcos las//sgra dang sgra ngon pa gr-i b+hA yi//sngags kyi bstan bac+doMs gtan la ban+d+ha/ci yoM phyir ni brtag par bya//bcug par byed pas gti mug
505a3(rgyud): byed//rtsa ba'i don ni zad par song //de phyir sgra dang rtog ge shes//de la de nyid bshad mi bya//de kun la ni dbang mi bskur//phyi yi don la mos pa'i phyir//thabs da
505a4(rgyud): thobs las byung mtshan nyid//'bras bu sbyin pa gang zhig phyi//de rI thams cad dngos rigs pa//mchog gi don ni ste ra phyir ro//de ltar yang de kho na nyid gsum gyi
505a5(rgyud): bdag nyid dang /zla ba dang /'di mcho gro dang /phyag rgya chen po'i mtha' rnyed don du//rnam pa dang /tshod dang /rang gi ngo bo ngas smras so//yang 'dir de kho na nyid kyi
505a6(rgyud): bdag nyid ni kun gA'i rnam par shes pa ste rnam pa'o//zla ba bde ba mchog ni tshogs kyi rnam par shes pa ste mtha'i tshad do//phyag rgya chen po ni yid rnam par shes
505a7(rgyud): bsnang ba ste//de ni rang gi ngo bo'i de'i mtha' la rnam pa med pa'i rnam par shes pa na mkha'o//yang na sprul pa dang /chos dang /longs spyod dang /bde ba chen po'i rnam pa'i
505b1(rgyud): dodan khong du chud par bya'o//yang na rtsa bzhi'i don du rnam pa la stsogs par shes par bya'o//dpal ye shes thig le las de kho na nyid gsum la sogs pa'i rgyas pa nges par
505b2(rgyud): bstan pa'i rang bzhin gyi don zhes bya ba'i la'u sti bcu drug pa'o////de nas lha mo rab dgyes nas//rang bzhin don ni gsal ba'i phyir//dam po ru ni 'khyud byas
505b3(rgyud): nas//pad+ma dam por rab tu bskor//dur khrod la sogs pa yi don//rdo rje rgyal po la ni zhus//srub dang bsrub pa'i sbyor ba las//dpal bdag dgyes nas bka' stsol to//
505b4(rgyud): dur khrod la sogs pa yi dr-im+ba/skal ldan lha mo khyod nyon cig/mi bzad 'di ru rnam khyab pa//lha mo khyA la rab tu glegs//g.yas pa'i swA yI bu ga ni//mi sdug pa ni shin tu/
505b5(rgyud): tshig/lce spyang tshogs ni phyed tshig pa//skye bug g.yon pa ru ni dran//rna ba g.yas pa 'jigs su rung NAM/swa swa dang ni tsog tsog go/shra zi'i khwa ni rno ba g.yono//dum bu ma/
505b6(rgyud): bo la sogs rgyan//lha mtsho/g.yas pa yi ni mig/hA hAr dgod pa rab tu grags//rnam pa dang bcas yid dga' ldan//'jigs pa shin tu 'jigs par byed//g.yon pa po/
505b7(rgyud): nya nag po me//me lce 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab//rdo rje'i kha ru 'jigs par byed//rus pa dkar bas rab khyab pa//khu ba gzhan min rus dkar 'di//nges par lha mo shes
506a1(rgyud): par b+ha//de ni shin tu chub ste//de tshe 'bar khrong khyab par tshe//byang chub sems ni bde ba rgya//me brtan ma yin pa ru bzhugs//de rgyu rnam pas
506a2(rgyud): yi dwags kyis//ldan par rab tu grags pa'o//gsum dbye bzhir dbye drug dbye 'am//mchog gi bdud rtsi gang du gshegs//de ni du ma mgo la sngags bstam
506a3(rgyud): gang tshe them las longs spyod 'gro//de tshe sA swa tseg cog go/gong gi tshe ni dbang ma'o grub//da phyed tshig ldan dra nu pa'o//srog gi rlung ni nub pa'i phyir//shin tu tshig/
506a4(rgyud): par brtag pa'o//khu bo nye ba'i sha ma thag/bkram par bdag gis bshad pa'o//lha mo shin tu gse po che//dur khrod brgya de ni rab mchog ge/de ni shing
506a5(rgyud): brgyad dang ldan pa//nang gi bdag sbyor mtshan nyid do//dpal gyi me tog mig rtsi dang //nA ga ge sar wa tA dang /pa la shing dang sha ra shing //khar+ya ba dang nI sha mi
506a6(rgyud): yi/yal gA du ma la sogs dang ldan brgyad//'bras bus dud pa'i gzugs kyis shin tu rgyun//'dod ma rgyus mu glu stobs ma dngas//mtsho skyes snying po
506a7(rgyud): 'dzin ma bya gtong ma//mgyogs dang bral ma zhig gnyis kun tu brtags//shing mchog chen po rtsa brgyad kyi ni gzugs//yang ni dur khrod chen po ni sprul
506b1(rgyud): po'i 'khor lo'i chu skyes chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi nang gsang bya chen po 'dus pa'i gnas dang nye ba'i gnas la sogs pa'i gnas nas rnal 'byor myu re res shing ro khyer nas song ngo //
506b2(rgyud): lha mos gsol po/bcom ldan 'das 'dir ni rnal 'byor ma ni gang lags shing rnams kyi ming ni ci lags//ji ltar ni sgrub pa'i 'khor lo'i chu skyes de kun gyi 'dus
506b3(rgyud): pi lags pa bka' stsal du gsol//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/yan lag cha ma dang /drag mig ma dang /'jigs ma dang /khro gdong ma dang /zlum
506b4(rgyud): mig mA dang /sna nyams ma dang /lce bskyod ma dpa/s+thUl gdong ma dang /bya rgod gdong ma dang /srer mig ma dang /mche gcigs ma dang /so rings mang nya gdong ma dang //
506b5(rgyud): mgrin rings ma dang /rna 'phyang ma dang /sgor mo dang /dz+ha byin chen ma dang /spu ldan ma dang /se nA rings ma dang /yan lag nag maM dang /sdo ma dang /yan lag dmar mo dang //
506b6(rgyud): gru zlum 'ang mnyam ma dang /r+N+Na gdong ma dang /glang rkyen ma dang /ral gtsog ma dung /rAny+dza rings ma dang /bong rnams dang /glang chen lte ba ma dang /bung mig ma
506b7(rgyud): me tog dga' ma dang /sna rengs ma dang /rma bya'i mgrin ma dang /sbrul lce ma dang /ne'u le'i gdong ma dang /nu 'phyangs ma dang /gsus 'phyangs ma dang /smad che ma dang /
507a1(rgyud): gdong skam ma dang /rlung mgugs ma dang /dul 'gro ma dang /spyan rings ma dang /dgod gdong mA dang /du ma dang /'thub dga' ma dang /gar mya dang /
507a2(rgyud): dga' 'gro ma dang /chog med ma dang /mang za ma dang /chang dga' ma dang / dga' ma dang /bar 'gro tshu 'gro ma dang /bram ze mo dang /rgyal po'i sras mo dang /
507a3(rgyud): chang 'tshong ma dang /thod pa ma dang /lto bi dang /gtum mo dang /khrus mkhan mo dang /chosnga ma dang /sha ba ri dang /legs ma dang /khrag dga' ma dang /skyabs sbyin ma'o//
507a4(rgyud): de kun lha mo rnal 'byor mo//shin tu drag la yang dag 'jigs//de kun lag na gang zhig shing /khyer nas 'ong ba khyod nyon cig/tsam pa kra dang /pa ti li dang /
507a5(rgyud): thun ci dang /pa ta dang /pad+mA dang /shir dang /shi myA dang /pA la shri dang /na ga gle sar dang /sa l-i dang /A ro d+ha ka dang /g+ha na dang /pi sa lA dang /bung ba'i dra ba
507a6(rgyud): dang /a shwang ba dang /atAM pr-i ta dang /ta y+ya dang /sa ha ka ra dang /'o ma'i shing dang /chu shing dang /na li gIng dang /u dumaM bA ra dang /ai rin dang /ka pi ta dang /am+ba dang /
507a7(rgyud): 'dzemar dang /kha di ra dang /tsan dan dmar po dang /pad+ma ka dang /tsan dan dang /li shi dang /dza ti shing dang /gu ra shing sha dang /bil ba dang /skyu ru ra dang /ba ru ra dang /rgun 'brum
507b1(rgyud): du//khar dzu ra dang /dgar dang /kr-i bo la dang /don ti kar dang /ga yu'i shing dang /'dod pa'i mang gcu dang /phra mo lam dang /gum+b+hal dang /s+yAD+ga du rnga dang /ba la ka dang /mdun
507b2(rgyud): shing dang /kai na smai ri dang /pun da ri ka dang /'bras bu che ba dang /tsher 'bras dang /klu'i mgo shing dang /su 'dar shA na dang /ta la'i shing dang /chos kyi rgyal mtshan dang /bshin rje
507b3(rgyud): gdugs dang /a sho ka dang /arga dang /ka rI bi ra dang /ru rag sha dang /A na dang /rdo rje'i mig dang /shing de dag kun ni chu zhing gab pa/me tog dang /'bras bu dang ldan pa ste/
507b4(rgyud): 'dus pa chen po'i gnas su rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis khyer te 'ongs nas//dam tshig gi spyod pa chen pa byed do//'dus pa chenI klo'i gnas brgyad pa//brgyad kyi 'dabri mA dang ldan no//
507b5(rgyud): 'dab ma re re la rnal 'byor ma de dag dang gnyis pa ni shing ste//de gnyis gcig la gcig mnyam par gnas so//de ltar shaud+tha gi rnam pa nyid kyi rtsa la bzhugs pa'i phyir ro//rnam
507b6(rgyud): 'byor ma dang shing gi sgras rtsa drug cu rtsa ba'i khong du chud pa'o//'di la rtsa'i 'khor lo'i lte bar srog gi rtsa ba'i nang dang lhan cig rtsa gsum dang ldan pa'i 'dab ma gsum gyi
507b7(rgyud): g.yas ngos su ping ge la'o//g.yon ngos su i de'o//dbus su bde legs yid ma dang /'jug pa dang /gnas pa dang /'gro ba 'grub par byed do//de dag gis dngos po dang /rten da//
508a1(rgyud): ye shes dang /rnam par 'byed pa las zhal bzang mo de ru shes par bya'o//shar ba dang nub pa'i dus su rtsa'i 'khor lo'i 'byung ba thams cad 'bad pas btsal
508a2(rgyud): bar bya'o//gang gi phyir rtsa'i 'byung ba med par gyur na//byang chub kyi sems kyi bdud rtsi bde ba'i ye shes 'di 'dzub pa dang /gnas pa dang /'gro ba'i skye ba shes pa ma yin no//
508a3(rgyud): ma shis na ji ltar phyag rgya chen po'i grub pa rnyed par 'gyur ro//de bas na phyag rgya chen po'i grub pa'i don 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gis bsam gtan la mi ga yang
508a4(rgyud): bas brtson par bya'o//lha mos gsol pa//bcom ldan rnal 'byor dbang phyug gis//bsam gtan 'dir ni ji lta bu//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//rnal 'byong//
508a5(rgyud): dbang phyug bsam gr-itA na ni//nyon cig lha ma ngas rab bshad//kun rdzo ba ye shes brten pa las//gnyis su med pa'i gnas rab rnyed//nyer 'gro bsam gtan mchog
508a6(rgyud): gos ni//grub pa rnyed par 'gyur//skyon ni thams cad bral ba yi//yid dang 'thun pa'i rang gnas su//lus ni ma bsgrims pa yis ni//spros pa med par stan pa de
508a7(rgyud): bsdad//lte bo'i dbus na yod pa'i tshulo//hUM gi yig 'bru grags chen grags//rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba//bskal pa'i me yi 'od dang mnyam//langs nas rjes
508b1(rgyud): kyi 'khor lo yi//mkha' 'gro sreg nas smin mtshams kyi//dbus na gang zhig 'khor lo yod//rang gi ngo bo srog gi rlung //snying khar 'das nas de gnas su//rtag tu de ni bzhugs
508b2(rgyud): pa'o//de ni aM yig ngo bor brags//sku yi rgyal ba rnam par shes//srog dang rngub pa 'gog pa yis//srog dang rngub pa'i bza' ba gsol//srog dang rngub pa gnyis zos nas//
508b3(rgyud): das ni rdzogs par 'gyur ba yin//de nas de la rtags ni kun//mtshan ma 'di lta bu dag 'byung //'dar dang rdul dang ba spu langs//dbyangs kyi bye brag de nas mdangs//kha dog
508b4(rgyud): 'gyur dang mchi ma dang //lha mo de las de nyid skye'o//de nas rnal 'byor dbang shes nas//rnam par shes pa'i yi ge mchog/nang du lte ba byas pas na//steng mtshams rtse mo
508b5(rgyud): zab pa ru//mchog gi na mkha' bde chen du//yi ge mchog ni shesau byas nas//tshangs pa'i pad+mar byon te rgyas//chags pa dang bral gnas su 'gro//dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin
508b6(rgyud): pa yi//lha mo gnas der shes par bya//'di lta bu ye 'dus pa yi//sau yi dur khrod chen po ni//chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi ni gzhir//grangs med pa yi rnal 'byor pa//phyag rgya
508b7(rgyud): chen po'i dngos grub zog/nye bar 'phro bo'o bsam gtan las//nges par 'grub pa'i dbang po mchog/spros med 'od kyi gnas rnyed do//dpal ye shis thig l-i las dur khrod
509a1(rgyud): mahA/kyi nges par bstan pa'i don dang /nAng bi bsam gtan gyi nye bar 'gro ba pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o///bcom ldan 'das ma phyag rgya chen po pad+ma
509a2(rgyud): mchog bskyed cing shin tu dga' bas yang zhus pa/kye bcom ldan 'das dpal ye shes thig le'i rgyud 'di chad ni ci lags/gnas ni gang lags/mchog gi dbang
509a3(rgyud): phyag bdag la bka' stsal cig/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//gang zhig dri ba mchog byas pa//spyan bzang ma ni khyod nyon cig/dpal ldan ye shes thig le
509a4(rgyud): yis//de yi tshad ni don dam par//sus kyang smras par nus ma yin//zhal bzang de ni bden ma yin//'on kyang cung zad skal ldan mo//gsang ba'i ye shes rab mchog ni///
509a5(rgyud): gang zhig rgyal bas yang mI shes//khyod kyi ngar byas bdag gis bshad//srog gi dbyug pa'i gang zhig ste//sor bcu gnyis ni mdud pa med//'og gi cha ni bcu gnyis phyed//

509a7(rgyud): pa'i ngo bor grags//bu ga phra mo nang na ldan//de ni srog brtsa nyid yin//khams gsum gyi ni rten yin no//rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis med pa'i//rtsa dang 'bras bu rgya yis
509b1(rgyud): rtag/drug phyod rtsa ba dang ldan ni//rtsa ba'i skud pa byad gzugs gsal//bcu drug phyed byed bye brag d+ha//rtswa bu'i slad bu gcig tu'o//rtsa ba gsum da skal ldan na//

509b3(rgyud): shes thig sdud yod//rnam shes drug po'i rten mchog go/char yang dang ni thig le tshul//rgyal rtsam mchog dang gzhan mchog go//shrI ni gzhan min 'di ru Na re//thig le

509b5(rgyud): yungs kar che ba'i sbom po d+ha mnyis su med pa'i ye shes dpal//tshar yang du grags mcho ba dbang drug/de yi snying khA'i dbus su ni//ye shes thig le grub
509b6(rgyud): 'azhugs//tshul ni mdud pa'i mgrin par gnas//na yi yi ge mtshan zhes mchog g.yon glo yi ni 'dag ma'i nang //ti ni thig le'i tshul tsam gnas//g.yos su

510a1(rgyud): ga yi rnam pa'i yi ge mchog/bde ba chen po'i rang ngor grags//rang gi dro bo'i mtshan nyid can//dpral ldan ye shes thig ye 'di//mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor//

510a3(rgyud): gi gnas su ste//rang bzhin de ni mchog gzhan mchog/g.yon gyi glo ru e Da'i rtsa//pi gaM la ni g.yas su gnas//rtog med ma ni steng du gnas//phyag rgya chen pa'i

511a1(rgyud): lha mos gsolnga pa/rdo rje sems dpa' mnga' bdag chu//sku ni 'di ru tsi ru grags//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sku ni de bzhin gshegs
511a2(rgyud): skyabs sbyin//sems ni rdo rje 'dzin par drin//phung po lnga lus grub pa'i sku//rigs lnga y-i ni bdag nyid mchog/rigs ni drug pa thugs rdo rje//grangs med rigs kyi

512b7(rgyud): le//de yi phyi ma'i rgyud du dran//ye shes snying por bregs pa'i rgyud//de yi phyi ma'i phyi ma'o//dga' mo ye shes thig le'i sgra//bshad pa'i rgyud ni gsong ba che/

516a6(rgyud): thams cad len no//kye sku rab mchog gi ngo bo'i mtshan nyid ni//gang na bzhugs pa mya dran 'das mtshan nyid//de nyid dang bral chad pa'i stong du ni//gnyis myed bde bas
516a7(rgyud): mkhyen par mi 'gyur ram//rdo rje mtsho skyes mchog sbyor yongs su gzigs//gang zhig dngos med dngos de spyad par mdzod//de nas rang bzhin las bcom ldan//
516b1(rgyud): chu las nyan bzhin du bzhengs//mchog gi dga' ba'i gzugs bdag nyid//mchog gi dga' ba'i sbyin pa'i bdag/dngos dang dngos min gnyis kyi steng //gyen bltas pad+ma'i
516b2(rgyud): lte bar ni//zhal bzhi dang ni phyag bzhi pa//shin tu ngo mcher sku dang ldan//rgyal po yi ni bzhugs thabs bzhugs//brgyad gnyis blo ldan byung gzugs can//spyan gsum
516b3(rgyud): mchog gi rnam pa can//zla ba nyi ma zhabs kyis mnan//rje chung thod pa kha T+wA~M ga/rdo rje 'bar ba phyag na bsnams//de lta bu'i rmad du byung ba'i gzugs mthong nas 'khor
516b4(rgyud): thams cad lhan cig bcom ldan 'das ma phyag rgya chen mo langs nas lan ge sum du bskor ba byas te/dam por 'khyud nas bstod pa//mchog tu rmad byung chen po'i sku ni/
516b5(rgyud): rgyal gyur cig/ye shes zab mo rgya mtsho'i snying po rgyal gyur cig/brjod bral bltar med dngos med sku mi mnga'o//gti mug chen po 'joms de rgyal gyur cig
516b6(rgyud): mchog dang gzhan mchog de ni mchog gzhan mchog/mkha' mchog 'od mchog mchog gi ye shes snad//mchog gi bdud rtsi'i snying po gang ba'i rgyun//mi 'chad
516b7(rgyud): rgyun 'bab byed pa rgyal gyur cig/shin tu lkog gyur dbang pos bltar med pa//skye 'gag 'du byed mtshani med rgyal gyur cig/de lta bu'i bstod pa'i rgyal po byas nas
517a1(rgyud): yang phyag rgya chen mo ldu mo chen mos bcom ldan 'das la dad pas zhu ba zhus pa/kye bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams ci'i phyir ma
517a2(rgyud): gsungs lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/sreb dang bsrub pa'i sbyor ba las//lha rnams 'byung ba'i rim pa'o//dang po rtsom pa shin tu 'drar//rnam
517a3(rgyud): par shes pas lha mo skye//de ni grongs las kha dog dkar//'dod pa'i gti mug rnam por thos//grong khyer las ni longs spyod yin//spyod lam lha mo rgyal ba'i 'od//
517a4(rgyud): bskum pa las ni snang po mched//snang ba mched las ye shes 'od//bgrang pa las ni skye ba sbyor//sbyor los dga' ba'i skye mo skye//mnyam sbyor las ni ye shes skye//
517a5(rgyud): ye shes las ni dngos zad ma//khyed las 'di ru dngos po ste//dngos po longs spyod zla ba ma//dkar po las ni rten shesngo bya//rten las pad+ma'i lte ba ma//blang brdag/
517a6(rgyud): las ni rnam par 'byed//rnam par 'byed las pad mig ma//gnag dang ljang dang gu re gum mdog/dmar dang sngon po yi ni gzugs//zla ba dkar dang dmar gyi sngon//
517a7(rgyud): sgo la sogs dang mtshams na bzhugs//zhal gcig par spyan gsum pa//phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par rgyan//snod dang gri gug gis phyag brel//na bza' grol ba
517b1(rgyud): blag gnyas pa//de nI hU~M zla' gdan la brtags//rus pa sna tshogs rgyun dang ldan//rgyud kyi bzhugs tha sa dza m+b+ha bad+ma//sgyu ma rnams kyang de bzhin no//de rnams thungs/
517b2(rgyud): ni bzhi gnyis kyi ni grangs//mnyam pa'i bzhugs thabasde phyag dang zhabs la sogaso//rab tu dga' ba'i yid ldan zhi ba'i gzugs//rtag tu sems can don byed
517b3(rgyud): kho na brtson//lha mos gsol bya/dpa' bo rnams kyi ming gi brdal//de bzhin nyid kyi rdo rjes gsungs//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//khyod kyis nga la gang
517b4(rgyud): nus pa/na r+m+ma nani non//'di'i rgyud la ba la gawAn//sna chen ni yod pa gde le lar/in nI ste ba b+hAs de de'i dang //dpa' bra'i dga' blo sbyin par/
517b5(rgyud): ma zhes nor bu bsrub pa ni//mchog gi dga' 'i sbyin pa'o//gang zhig de yi dbus nas langs//de ni bdag gi rang bzhin mtshan//dpa' bo rnams ni bdag gi sra bshAng //
517b6(rgyud): shes rab pha rol phyin ma nyon//lha chen po dang khyod dejug dang //pad+ma'i lte ba shin tu blta//lha yi dbang dang 'drod pa'i lha//pad+ma'i mig dang gzhon nu ma//re shig de ni dkyis
517b7(rgyud): 'khor ba//rang gi phyag rgya mtshon cha 'dzin//dpal ye shes thig le las//bskul ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o///bcom ldan 'das
518a1(rgyud): mus gsol pa//kye bcom ldan 'das dbang bskur ba'i dus su dkyil 'khor rnams ji lta bu lcags/cho ga gang gis dbang bskur ba sbyin zhing blang /
518a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bkral sprul pa/chu la sogs pa'i dbang dus su//rdul tshon lnga sogs dkyil 'khor mdzes//gsang ba'i dbang ba skur dus su ni/
518a3(rgyud): me tog sna tshogs mchog gis so//shes rab ye shes dbang bskur dus//sna tshogs dri zhim po yis rgyan//las dang po yi dang po la//nges pa 'i don gyi chu la
518a4(rgyud): sogs//dbang bskur shes pas sbyin bya ste//de ltar min na skyon du 'gyur//shes rab can gyis drang don der//sbyin no de nas dam tshig sbyin//nor bu mgrin par byang chub
518a5(rgyud): sems//bla ma nyid kyis rang rig byed//shes rab lha na cig gnas las langs//slob ma'i kha yi pad+ma ro//nyid kyi rdo rje rab tu sbyin//de nas bde ba'i bdud rtsis
518a6(rgyud): dkrol//mgrin pa'i dbus su rgyu gnyis ni//g.yas dang g.yon na yod pa'o//sgom mi yungs mar 'di ru grags//srog dang nye ba'i ring ngo go//g.yon ni srog tu shes
518a7(rgyud): bar bya//nye ba'i srog ni gnas ni'o//de ru bde bar 'jug par bya//mthe bong srin lag gnyis kyis man ni//de nas ye shes 'byung bar 'gyur//dri mos rnyed pa'i
518b1(rgyud): de bzhin//reg bya chen pos dga' ba che//dga' ba chen pos bde ba che//bde ba chen pos byang chub sems//shes rlab bya gdong ma yi khar//nor bu'i kha las thigs pa
518b2(rgyud): gcig/shes rab ye shes zhal bzang mo//shes rab bya gdong las bde ba//rdo rje rin chen kha ru 'gro//de ni dbang gi mchog rang yin//sangs rgyas grub pa'i 'bras sbyin
518b3(rgyud): bdag/shes rab gzugs bzang b+ha ga rab//shin tu long tshe dbang bskur ldan//dga' sngogs bye brag mgu bar byas//de na slob ma la sbyin bya//sems dpa' tshon
518b4(rgyud): shes rab 'di//yang dag ye shes rab tu ste re//gang zhig bka' lung skyibs sbyin te//de ni bu khyod dad par bya//de yi mngal gyi g.yon legs na//i Ta byA gdong ma ni
518b5(rgyud): bzhugs//de rnyed tsam gyis rang bzhin ni//shes rab bsnyen pas rnyed por 'gyur//de ni gzhan min yongs su shes//bzhi pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo yin//rang rig pa dang
518b6(rgyud): mchog ye shes//ngag gi lam gyis rlud dang bral//de ni lha mo skal ldan no//gsang ba las ni shin tu gsang //rgyud kun du ni bdag gis sbas//mtha' yi mtha' ru
518b7(rgyud): rab tu gsal//bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa//mtha' dang mtha'i don ni ci//mchog gi dbang phyug bdag la gsungs//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
519a1(rgyud): mtha' ni rnam par 'byad bar shos//rnam par 'byung ba bcom pa'i phyir//rnam par 'byung ba bcom pa'i maH//rnam par 'byung bu mthur gsal 'gyur
519a2(rgyud): rnam par 'byed mthar ye shes che//de rAngangango po'i rang bzhin no//lha mos gsol pa/dwagyos rdul chen dkyil 'khor ni//mnga' bdag ji lta'i rnam pos bri//bcom+bu ldan 'das
519a3(rgyud): kyis bka' stsal pa//bang zhig khyod kyis yongs su zhus//nyon cig lha mo bdag gis bshad//phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'di ru ni//lus la mkhas pas bri bar+ye byA//
519a4(rgyud): pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad par k+Sha//pad+ma'i nang du char yang bya//char yang drang ldan sna tshogs 'dab//char yang gi nang thig le ste//de yi steng du rdo rje bri//sna tshogs pad+ma'i d+hI 'bru ldan
519a5(rgyud): rdo rje gri gug gis ni bskoR+ShA//gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi po//rta babs bzhi yis rnam par rgyan//sna tshogs bum pa dang ldan na//dkyil 'khor rab kyi mchog ni bya//shir gyi 'dab
519a6(rgyud): memar 'khor lo bri//byang bu de bzhin pad+ma'o//nub kyi 'dab mar rin po che//lho ru ral gri sgreng ba'o//pad+ma gzhan rnams thod pa ni//bdud rtsi lnga yis rab tu gang //dung //zhu
519a7(rgyud): de bzhin ri rab dang //rab tu 'bar ba yin mo//mi mtshams la sogs rim bzhin bya//'bad pa yis ni yongs su bskor//shar gyi sgor ni dpag bsam shing //byang du
519b1(rgyud): 'bras bu sa bon dang //nub tu rin chen+da sdong bu dang //lho ru sna tshogs rdo rje'o//sgo yi phyi rol rdo rje'i phreng //'od dang ldan par bskor bar bya//lha mo tshan mo de lta bu'i//dkyil
519b2(rgyud): 'khor ye shes sbyin bdag po//dam tshig chen po dang ldan pas//rab tu 'bad pa yos ni bya//dkyil 'khor gyi ni bdag po'i phyir//des na bdag ni rab che ma bya//dpal/
519b3(rgyud): ye shes thig los dbang bskur ba blang ba dang //phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o///bcom ldan 'das mas gsol
519b4(rgyud): pa/kye bcom ldan 'das/dga' ba bzhi yi ngo bo dang //bskyed pa'i rim pa ji ltar lags//bcom ldan tudus kyis bka' stsal pa/dga' ba las ni mchog
519b5(rgyud): dga' ba//mchog dga' ba las dga' bral dga'//dga' bral las ni lhan cig skyes//dga' ba kun gyi de nyid //bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa//
519b6(rgyud): de lta'i rig pa mgon chen po//rig pa sngar gyi gzhung dram ci//mngon sum dang ni rjes su dpag/sa bon dang 'dra 'bras bu yin//go tra ba las sa lu ni//
519b7(rgyud): gang du yang ni mthong mi 'gyur//dga'i bral las ni lhan cig skyes//bde min dga' bral sdug bsngal des//dga' ba kun ni 'joms par byed//
520a1(rgyud): mchog gi dbang phyug dga' bral 'di//dga' ba kun dang myi mthun no//dga' ba las ni mchog dga' ba//mchog dga' ba las shin

520a3(rgyud): mkha' 'gro ma de bden//dgra' byub las ni lhan skyes min//'od kyang de bsrung ba las yod//d+he min+da lhan skyes gang du gnas//dga' ba kun dang
520a4(rgyud): mi mnyam ste//dga' ba kun m+b+hi 'dzunas byed pa//'di skad smra ba shin tu mchog/don dam pa yi jig yin no//dga' kun 'gro ba yang gcig pu/
520a5(rgyud): yid 'phrog lhan cig skyes pa'o// sprin med snying kha'i nam mkhrar ru//ye shes nyi ma rab mdzes shing //dpal ldan ye shes thig le rgyud/
520a6(rgyud): nam yang de ni thos ma yin//de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas ni mchog/lha mo de ni gang las rnyed//rnal 'byor ma dang lhan cig tu//du ma tsho'i rgyud du
520a7(rgyud): bshad na yang //de lta mod kyi rgyud 'di yi//bcu drug char yang mi bod do//de skad smra ba'i rgyud gzhan ku ni//dge ba'i yid dang ldan yang yi ni//'di ru deng
520b1(rgyud): pamyed b+har na//dmyal ba la sogs 'gro byar 'gyur//mdo lA sogs gsung da kun//dang sto dgus pa kho na yin//glang pyir d+hang kun gyi sbyong go//de phyir rgyud 'di rab tu
520b2(rgyud): mchog/bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa//sbas pa'i yi blo drang ba gang //snying po ye shes 'bras bu ste//nye ba'i stong pa de ni mgo ni//de ni de rang gsal bar
520b3(rgyud): mdzod//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa//sngags ni shin tu gsal bya mchog/de lta na yang gsal bar byas//sngags kyi bzla stsa las 'grub par 'gyur/
520b4(rgyud): grub pa rnyed pas sangs rgyas sras//hA stA Te ba hUM d+h+r-i ka la ti na dz+nyA dzA ba hA ma shrI oM//trA srA Ta pheM hUM b+h+rUM ye mA kA la ba ma~M d+hA mA ye da ma dzubi oM//hA sA rba pa hUM hU~M rA sa
520b5(rgyud): ras oM//bcom ldam nus kyis bka' stsa'i skye dang //'jig rten gyi khams bring se med pa ni dazhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i grangs

521a1(rgyud): byung ba'i chos gos dang /rin po che rnam pa sna chags dang /gser dang /nam mkha' las nor bu'i chur bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi rtsar
521a2(rgyud): babs par gyur to//de nas nam mkha' las de bzhin gshegasde pa dang /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis stong pas bstod pa//sangs rgyas
521a3(rgyud): kun gyi sku gla cig pu//legaso legs so bcom ldan 'das//shin tu rmad byung ye shes tshe//mchog gi dbang phyug gtan la phab//'di yI 'khor ni dge byed
521a4(rgyud): dwadagyes//sdig pa thams cad 'jigs par byed//yang drug mchog gi gsang ba 'di//rnyed par dka' ba don dam pa//dpal ldan ye shes thig le'i rgyud//
521a5(rgyud): ye shes rgya mtsho gtan la phab//de lta'i bu'o tshogs mchod pa byas nas//na mkha' la gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la stsogs pa rnams de kho nu nyid
521a6(rgyud): kyi bsam gtan la bzhugs so//bcom ldan 'das mes gsol pa//kye bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po gcig pu'i sku//tshig rgyas pa yi snying po'i don//
521a7(rgyud): mchog gi dbang phyug bdag la gsungs//mchog gi dbang phyug gis bka' spel pa//nyen cig lha mo gsang ba'i mchog/rgyud kun du ni rnyed
521b1(rgyud): ba/bsung sna pad+ma'i snying pa ni//tshogs kyi gnas su 'dri ru brjod//rdo rje'i rtse mo kha 'i phyir//d+ha ni rgyas par brjod pa'o//yang na thams cad kyi ni tshogs//
521b2(rgyud): snying po byA ye gdod med drin//de la rdo rje rtse mo yis//phye ba de ni rgyas par brjod//i Da ping gol gnyis kyi dbus//rtog med ye shes ngo bo nyid//srub dang bsrub pa'i
521b3(rgyud): sbyor ba yisra//rdo rje'i mthe chung rtse mo las//reg byas gang gis bde bar 'dzag/zhal bzang de ni tshig rgyus pa'o//lce ba'i gnas nas smin 'khor lo//de nas
521b4(rgyud): gonas pa'i rna bA'o//spyi rtse che nges pa'i bu ba ni//tshigra rgyas pa ni gsum du dran//mA nI srub dang bsrub pa ste//ra ni dga' ba yin par brjed//mu ni lha mo sgrol
521b5(rgyud): ma yin//nga yi yig 'bru zhu ba'i gzugs//g+ha yi yi go 'bru sgra ru grags//tA yi ye ga 'bru gsal bas byed//na ni lte ba'i gas dra ba'i mthar//de
521b6(rgyud): dbus su rtag tu shar//zla ba'i sku dang 'dra ba gsal//nyi mo bye ba'i mnyam pa'i 'od//rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che//byang chub kyi ni lam rab ster//de ni
521b7(rgyud): gsang ba yaM shos che//rang bzhin tshig gis rab gsal byas//'bad pa yis ni sba bar bya//su la'ang sbyin par mi bya'o//dpal ye shes thig le las
522a1(rgyud): tshig rgyas par bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o////de nas gzhan nyon bdag gis bshad//ye shes rab mchog
522a2(rgyud): gang gis smras//de kho na nyid bdag den zab//des bstan la sogs bye brag tu//srog gi dbyug pa bzhugs thabs nas//rtsa dang ldan pa'i sbyor ba drug/thig le
522a3(rgyud): shar ba nub pa dang //'pho ba sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid dang //rtse yi 'khor lo 'byung ba dgyes//dbang gi rim pa de bzhin no//srung ba'i 'khor lha mo che///snying
522a4(rgyud): bo sngags kyi rgyal po nyid//sku brgyad bdag nyid mchod sbyin dang //thim dang lodes spyod dang ni da'ang //rdo rje lha mo ye shes sku//gsang ba'i sgra yang de bzhin no//

522a6(rgyud): brgyad sku yi ngo bo dang //dga' ba la sogs pa pha mchog/dur khrod rnam rtag med par grags//chu ngogs rtogs pa med pa dang //snang ba la sogs mchog ye shes
522a7(rgyud): dngos po la sogs bde ba che//thog ma tha ma dur khrod pargyad//zhing la sogs pa bstan pa dang //rlung gi de nyid snying po'i don//'jug pa gnas pa 'gro ba dang /
522b1(rgyud): nyer 'gro sbyar ba rab mchog dang //nyid ni ye shes theg le dang //rang gi ngo bo rnam pa mchog/sa la sogs pa'i bdag po dang //de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku skyabs dang //
522b2(rgyud): rgyud kyi rim pa bstan pa dang /phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin ne/gsang ba yi ni den dam par//de nyid mchod pas bskul ba dang //shes rab ye shes ji bzhin no//
522b3(rgyud): gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'khor lo sogs//zhal bzang tshig rgyas bstan pa'o//gtor ma 'byung la phan don du//sdig pa thams cad 'jigs par byed//de
522b4(rgyud): ni bde ba chen po'i mtha'//de nyid bsdus pa'i snying po'i don//bzhi bcu'i b+h+yag nyid de nyid don//gsang chen bdag gis rab tu bshad//de nyid sum cu drug
522b5(rgyud): dag po//char yang ye kaMs tshor byed do//thig le ye shes bdag nyid tshor//de ni sum cu bdun dbang phyug/tshul gyis ye shes bdag nyid tshor//
522b6(rgyud): de ni sumA cu brgya dbang phyugatshul tsam ye shes tshor byed pa//dgu lhag sum cu de nyid do//mchog shes pa yi rnal 'byor gang //bzhi bcu'i mnga'
522b7(rgyud): bdag chen po'o//gzhan mchog gsungs lam brjod du medo//rnam par dag pa de nyid mchog/thams cad de kho'i bdag nyid phyir//de bas bye brag mi
523a1(rgyud): bya'o//dpala? yo shrIs thig le las de kho na nyid snying po bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste ny+Ni shU r+Na drug pa'o///lA myos
523a2(rgyud): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ni mchog dga' ba//kun dga' ba yi rnam pa ste//de kho na nyid zhal brgyad pa'i//rnam par dag pa ji ltar lags//bcom
523a3(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//de nyid sgom pa rnam par dag/skal ldan lha mo khyod nyon cig/zhalo brgyad rnam par thar pa brgyad//nang gi stong pa de nyid do///
523a4(rgyud): sbyin ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni//sa dang stobs dang ye shes so//phyag rnams stong nyid rnam par dag/brgyad gnyis phyag ni stong pa nyid//sbyangs pa'i yon tan spre da ldan//
523a5(rgyud): thod pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid//srungs rgyas chos ni ma 'dres pa//'jigs byed ma ni brgyad gnyis dbye//bsdu bo'i dngos po bzhi pa ni//zhabs bzhi ru ni dran pa'o//
523a6(rgyud): chags sdang de bzhin gti mug ni/legs dgyes zla nyi 'jigs byed do//gang zhig srid pa'i gnas su bzhugs//zhal bzang de phyir g.yas brkyang bA//lho mo g.yon
523a7(rgyud): bskum mye ngan 'das//ye shes skye nyid bzhugs pa'o//srid dang mya ngan 'das min phyir//lha mo de phyir bzhengs pa'o//gzugs brgyad rnam par dag pa yis//sna tshogs
523b1(rgyud): ba 'dab ma brgyud//gzugs med gnyis kyi 'du shes phyir//shes rab thangs gnyis bdag nyid do//grwar dbu'oro dang ldan pa'i phyir//zhal bzung ma n+ti sna tshogs gzugs//
523b2(rgyud): lha mos gsol pa/thams cad mkhyen pa mchog dbang phyug/bcom ldan bdag gis rnam dag shes//gsang ba'i don gyis 'di ltar mgon//rdo rje 'dzin pa
523b3(rgyud): bka' drin gsol//bcom ldan 'das kyis bAkA sprul pa//gsang ba'i sgom pa rnam par drug/lha mo shes rab chen mo nyon//shApa dang lhan cig pA yi spyan//
523b4(rgyud): zhal bzeng gnas la sogs pa'o//longs spyod rdzogs par yod pa'irtsa/bcu drug phyug ni bcu drug ma'o//A li thig le rnam dag pa'o//thod pa yin pa'i 'ang
523b5(rgyud): bstan//'jigs byed rnam par 'jigs byed mya//legs dgyes dga' ba bcu drug go/skad cig bzhi yi spyo rdzab yis//zhabs ni bzhi ru dran pa'o//g.yas brgyud pa ni mchig
523b6(rgyud): gi dpa'//g.yon bat+yang dga' ba duH'a ba yin//bzhengs pa lhan skyes dga' ba'o//phyag rgya pha rolo phyin par dran//da bdA gi rang gi ngo bo'o//thim pa slad kyi
523b7(rgyud): tshangs pa'i ras//longs spyod zhi ba'i lpags pa'i gos//legs dgyes dbang phyug yang na gnas//bskyed po tshangs pa'i lpags pa'i grags//bong bu'i zhal ni 'jigs
524a1(rgyud): ba'i m+b+ha/g+hur+b+ha shrIs rab bas na//thang slad du shes shAg sgyu me dran//byung chub sems kyi rnam dag pas//rus pa s+thA
524a2(rgyud): tshogs rgyun la sogs//nA mkha' ru ni 'gro ba'i phyir//gyen du 'dar da'i dbu skyes so//rang gi ngo bo bde chen phyir//sku mdog nug po mkha' dang mtshungs//dga'
524a3(rgyud): bral gyi ni bdud chen po//'jigs pa byed phyir 'jigs pa che//dpal ye shes thig le las rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o///
524a4(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das mas ma mchu'i bdud rtsi'i ro phul te//nyi ma dang zla ba'i me tog gris mchod nas//bcom ldan 'das rab tu tshim par mdzad nas/'di skad ces
524a5(rgyud): gsol to//kye bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i dus su yang dag par gsang ba'i rgyud 'di skal ba dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams la sus 'chud par 'gyur//btsam
524a6(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal padapal phyug nu rdo rje mgon pos bashrad par byed do//bcom ldan 'dase mas gsol ba/ye shes bdud rtsi'i char ba che//mgon po
524a7(rgyud): khyod kyis rmad 'byung sbyin//phyag na rdo rje mgon po che//de yi bskyed pa ji ltar lags//rgyal ba'i mnga' bdag ye shes rgyal//de ni tshig gcig bka' stsol cig/bcom
524b1(rgyud): ldan+da 'das kyisau bka' sprul pa/brang zhig khyod kyis yongs zhus pa//bcom ldan ma de yang dgra nyon//phyag na rdo rje mgon chen po//rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi bdag/mtha' yas pa yi/
524b2(rgyud): 'jig rten khams//skye dang 'jig pa'i rgyu yin no//de las skye ba gang yang med//rang byung mchog gi dbang phyubya go/de yi phyag gi rdo rje ni//ye shes bcu gnyis skye ba med//thogs
524b3(rgyud): yI ni ris lnga las//de bzhin gshegs pa lnga 'byung ngo //mtha' nas 'byung ba chen po lnga//dbus nas 'gro ba'i rigs drug 'byung //lta ba kun ni srung don phyir//sna tshogs pa
524b4(rgyud): yi gzugs su spyod//la lar rdo rje 'dzin pa dang //lce lar sangs rgyas kyi ni gzugs//le lar he ru ka yi gzugs//la lar de bzhin gshegs pa dang //la lar byang chub sem/
524b5(rgyud): dpa'i gzugs//la lar nyan pa lta bur bzhugs//la lar 'chad do dgyes pad+ma//la lar klog pa'i tshul du bzhugs//la lar rgyud dang bstan bcos ni//mdzad dang ni la ltar
524b6(rgyud): 'dzin//myung du brjod lta ci zhig dngos//de skyon phyug na rdo rje rgyu la//lha mos gsol pa//dkyil 'khor dang ni 'khor la sogs//de la mdor bsdus ji ltar lags//bcom
524b7(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//dkyil 'khor rdo rje 'dzin pa yi//mkha' 'gro dbang phyug ma dgyes mdzod//gru bzhi la sogs dang ldan pa//dur khrod kyis ni rkyen gyis brgyan//
525a1(rgyud): shing brgyad kyi ni cha la bar bkram//rdzing brgyad kyis ni rgyun du'o//de dbus sna tshogs chu skyes ni//'dab ma dang ni ge sar bcas//de yi dbus su lta thod pa/
525a2(rgyud): dum bu gsum pa kun dang bzhi//rang gi ngo bo chos kyi dbyings//bdud rtsi lngas ni shin tu gang //hUM gi yig 'bru de dbus gnas//ye shes ma yi 'od dang mnyam//zla ba
525a3(rgyud): nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs//sdig pa thams cad 'jigs par byed//hUM la sogs pa yongs gyur las//skad cig glacig gis rmad du 'byung //lha mo bcu gnyis dang ldan pa/
525a4(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje rgyal po bzhings//zhal gcig pa la spyan gsum pa//char sprin gyi ni mdog dang mnyam//phyag bzhi pa ni rta la bcings//nyi ma'i 'od dang mnyam pa'i spyan//
525a5(rgyud): bskal pa chen po'i me dang 'dra//nyi ma bye ba'i 'od dang mnyam//gdul dka' chen po 'dul bar mdzad//snying rje'i brnyan gyis brnyan par mdzad//phyag rgya lnga 'dzin dpa' bo tshe//8
525a6(rgyud): ba'i dbu rgyan gyis ni brgyan//ral pa sna tshogs rgyan dang ldan+da//sna tshogs rdo rje zla cod pa na//phyag g.yas pa ni rdo rje 'dzin/sna tshogs kyi ni 'od zer 'phro//g.yon ni thod pa kha
525a7(rgyud): T+wAM ga/gzhan pas rdo rje'i mnga' dang gzhu//rta ni 'di ru sngon pa'i gzugs//spyan gsum pa la drag po'i 'od//zhi ba'i lpags pas sga cha byas//dgod pa'i nga ro bshog pa can/
525b1(rgyud): sna tshogs pad+ma'i 'dab ma la//shar dang lho dang nub dang byang du rdo rje 'jigs byed ma dang /rdo rje drug myo dang /rdo rje gtum mo dang /rdo rje nag mAM ste/gnag pu dang /dmar ba
525b2(rgyud): dang /ldang ba dang /dkar po ste ngang pa la btsu ngas bya'o//phyag dang mtshon cha la sogs pa ni gtso bo bzhin ni//mtshams kyi 'dab ma bzhir bdud rtsi sna tshogs pas gang
525b3(rgyud): ba'i bum pa'i snying na thod pa'o//mtshams su rdo rje 'dod ma dang //rdo rje gtsugs bu ma dang /rdo rje phreng ba ma dang /rdo rje brtson ma ma rnams ni gzugs gnyis pa'i sku
525b4(rgyud): nam mkha' lhung la bcibs phya gtso bo lta bu'o//shar sgo la sogs par rdo rje sha ba ri dang //rdo rje ro la snga ma dang /rdo rje rab tu gtum ma dardo rje Dom bi ni ste/
525b5(rgyud): na mkha' sngon po dang /nyi mya'i 'od dang /me'i kha dog dang /du ba'i mdog bya rgod la bcibs pa mtshams kyi bzhin no//dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs bzhi'i snam bu la tshangs bya
525b6(rgyud): dang /brgya byin dang /drag po dang /mi mchog la sogs pa 'dre'i rgyal po rang rang gi mtshon cha phyag na bsnams pa du ma bya'o//lha mos gsol pa/phyag na rdo rje gtso bo'i/
525b7(rgyud): gsang sngags ni gang //sems can rnams kyis ji ltar sgom par bgyi//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/lha mo sngags ni yi ge drug/thams cad 'dod pa'i don
526a1(rgyud): /grub byed//gdagu pa rnams cad 'jig byed cing //nad rnams kAd+hA ni zang par byed//dngos grub thams cad ra tu sbyin//thams cad mkhyen pas ma/

526a3(rgyud): nid ni byed//mchod sbyin yang dag cher byis nas//sngon du bsnyen pa bye ba bya//zhi ba la sogs sbyin bsreg rgyu//ji ltar sngar ni bdag gis smras//dur khrod yang na chu ngogs
526a4(rgyud): su phyag na rdo rje bsgrub par bya//rlung chen gyi ni phreng ba yis//'grub pa'i don phyir bye ba bzlas//zhi bzhi nga snyoms kyis ni//drag po drag po sgrub par draka'//dbang gyur
526a5(rgyud): meng pa'i sems can la//stegs 'di sbyin par mi bya ste//mkhas pas bris spyi glegs bam+b+ha ni//nam yang de la bstan mi bya//de lta min ni grub mi 'gyur//
526a6(rgyud): nas kun du rab tu blta//gas pa yis ni 'grub par 'gyur//kun nas kun tu zhol bzang mo//pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad gyes pa//'dab ma sna tshogs pa yis mdzes//nyi ma

526b1(rgyud): /spyan gsum pa la zhi ba'i gzugs//g.yas dang g.yon pa'i phyag gnyis ni//rdo rje thod pa kha T+wAM ga/chos kyi don ni 'chad pa'i byar//phyag gnyis chos kyi phyag rgyu'o//'a shAm+b+ha
526b2(rgyud): bdud mi sangs rgya sa bdun//brgyad pa yA ni byams pa'o//pa ti la sogs shing le brten//thams cad zla ba'i bdan du dran//gshin rje gshed la sogs pa byazhi//
526b3(rgyud): gzhan min sgo la sogs par dgod//rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs bzhi//sgo yi mtsham su gnas pa'o//sgo yi phyi rol snam bu'i gnas//yang dag lha chen la spo ba'o///
526b4(rgyud): rdo rje phreng bas kun tu mchog/mkhas pas yongs su bskor bya'o//dpal ye shes thig le las dpal phyag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'i sgom pa zhes bya ba'i le'u
526b5(rgyud): ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o// nas de'i dus su 'khor thams cad stan las langs te/lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs le mgo/
526b6(rgyud): bas phyag 'tshal te/tshigs su brjod pa 'di dag brjod do//mgon khyod bka'i drin gyis ni bdag cag dag/gzhan dang mi mnyam rgyal bas rnyed dka' ba//blta bar da

527a1(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal lo//dang po'i sangs rgyas mchog char glagasnga la 'dud//yig bral thig le skyo med lnga phyag 'tshal//na mkha' rang bzhin tshul//

527a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das mo la bos te//kye bcom ldan 'das mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma sbyor drug gis glags pa bcu dang bral ba bcu gsum gyi bdag nyid//drapal

527b1(rgyud): /rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po shrI pradz+nyA gub+hAs bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la pab pa//slad kyis dpal sa skye'i dben pan su zhu sgrib dbyar khras bgyi so//

528a1(rgyud): dpal ldan bla na med pa'i rgyung //rnal 'byor ma zhes rab grags pa//e baM mA ya la sogs sgra'i//don ni ji lta bur+ya ni brjod//bcom ldan 'das/

528a3(rgyud): rab thabs kyi rang bzhin gyis//thams cad rgyas btAb gzhan gyis min//de kho ni nyid sgron mar grags//dri med rdzogs pa'i 'bras bu'i gzugs//e baM mA yA de nyid gsum//

528a6(rgyud): thams cad ye shes gsum stong nyid//de nyid de nyid kyis ni spangs//de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'byeng grags//dang po'i gnas ni rab grub byed//sku ni dgo' ba'i gzug
528a7(rgyud): su grags//dbang po gnyis byung dang bral ba//gsung ni mngon par dga' zhes bya/dam tshig las byung gis ni spangs//thugs ni dga' bral dga' zhes bya//ye shes las byu

528b2(rgyud): bdud rtsi las skyes so//yan lag kun gyis yang dag bskor//khyab pa srog gi pad+ma bzhin//shes rab tshangs pa'i sgro lnga'i khyim//tshangs pa'i ye shes 'dzin phyir ro//

528b5(rgyud): /don phyir te/gnyis su dbye ba'i rgyud rab bstan//'bras bu ye shes chen po'i ro//rang gis nyams myong ngo bo nyid//rang rig rag gis mi rnyed pas//rtog pa thams cad rnam par
528b6(rgyud): spangs//lha mos gsol pa//bcom ldan ye shes rgyal po nyid//log pa'i ye shes mun 'joms pa//de nyid nyi shu gnyis bdag nyid//gang zhig ye shes thig ler gsungs//
528b7(rgyud): de la yang ni nges pa'i don//mchog gi dbang phyug bdag la gsungs//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gang zhig de nyid nges don du//zhal bzang de ni gsang ba'o//khyod/
529a1(rgyud): kyi dror byas pa dgrags byA shad//de lta min na smras pa'o//a ng+ku na pa'i dbus su ni dang zhig drug cu rtsa bzhi ni mAdab ma'i dbyibs kyi rtsa'i shA
529a2(rgyud): de ni rnam pa dang bcas pa'i rnam par shes pa'o//de'i nang du gang du rtse sum cu cu gnyis kyi bdug nyid ut+pa lnga'i rnam pa'i 'khor lo de ni mtha ste/de la gang zhig zlar
529a3(rgyud): brgyad pa'i rnam pa'i lte ba de ni snang ba'o//gung zhig lte ba'i dbus yangs pa de ni na mkha'o//deng ni lnga gnyis nas bzung ste//bco lnga'i bar gyis 'am/dbang phyug gi

529a5(rgyud): ma rig pa'i gzugs kyis gsum du ts+tsha ba cung nga po mthun ts+tshed gaN+DIg grI bar du 'brar ba'o//gang shig srog gi dbyig pa de ni su gu rgyud kyi rnam pa'i mdud pa sgom cu rtsa
529a6(rgyud): gnyis su sgom pa dang phra ba'i thig la gcig pa'i gzugs kyis dbyig pa'i bdud rtsi zung gnyis pA la blun rjod gnyis kyi bar du ni de nI//drug po de ni bsgyid pa dang drug
529a7(rgyud): pa'i grags pa dga' ba drug zur gsum pa la thun tshod gsum gyi bar du 'dzeg pa'o//gang zhig thig le shar ba dang nub po de ni thim pa dang longs spyod du grags
529b1(rgyud): pa'i srog de ni zur bzhi pa la thun tshod bzhi'i bar du 'bar ba'o//gang zhig 'pho ba'i sbyor ba de ni steng dang 'og gi mdab ma yod par byang chub kyi sems 'dus pa'i dbang ni zur lnga
529b2(rgyud): ba la thun tshod lnga'i bar du zhu'o//gang zhig rtsa'i 'khor lo 'byung ba de ni yan lag thams cad la bdud rtsi rgyas zur drug pa la thun tshod drug gi bar du 'jug pa'o//glang
529b3(rgyud): zhig dbang gi rim pa de ni gcig nyid srog gi kha ru srog la 'bab pa dang /'phur ba dang khyab pa de yang zur bdun pa la thun tshod bdun pa'i bar du 'bar ba'o//gang zhig
529b4(rgyud): srung ba'i 'khor lo de ni mthe'u chung gi mdud pa'i nang du bdud rtsi la bskor ba zur brgyad pa la thun tshod brgyad kyi bar du zhu ba'o//de dag ni g.yon du bskor ba'i srog gi rlung la
529b5(rgyud): zhin pa nyi ma skye ba la mtshan mo dang /nyin mo'i bar du sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi cha rgyas par 'gyur ro//sum cu rtswa gnyis kyi nang na bcu drug bral ba'i mtshan nyid mo
529b6(rgyud): brasal ba dang /dga' ba'i mtshan nyid bcu drug gsal ba dri'i don gyi phyir dga' bral gyi dga' ba'i mtshan nyid A li'i rang gi ngo bo zla ba'o//phyi dang phyi'i don rnams kyis
529b7(rgyud): ni nang dang nang gi don gnas par shes par bya'o//de yang phyi'i chos kyi grangs kyis so//nang srog gi rlung gi grangs kyis po/lha mos gsol pa/sum cu rtsa gsum
530a1(rgyud): gyi cha skyes kyi ut+pa lA'i rnam pa la bde ba chen po'i kun tu spyod pa nges pa'i don gyis gnas bA de mchog gi dbang phyug bri dka' drin bskyab du gsal//
530a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol pa/nyin+da TIg lha mo skal ldan mo//gsing po chen po ye shes mchog/gang zhig shes pa tsam+ba gyis ni//thams cad sA yaM dbang
530a3(rgyud): phyug 'gyur//gang zhig snying po'i sngags ni nyid//de ni bdag nyid bcu drug bde//kun rdzob ri bong can gyi 'od//don dam par ni na mkha' bzhin//gang khrig sku brgya
530a4(rgyud): mchog sbyin ni//de ni mtshan mo bre rgyud mchog go//lha mo yang na ye shes brgyad//mu rgan mo nyin mo gnyis lus 'byung //gang zhig thim drang longs spyod dngang+ge//
530a5(rgyud): de ni nges par bskyed rims so//lha mo bskyed rims gsal ba ste//rim las byung ba'i bde ba che//skal sngon mo gang ye shes sku//de ni rims sogs yan lag/
530a6(rgyud): spangs//yan y-ik+tA bzhir dbye drug dbye 'am//bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o//lha mo grang zhig gsang ba'i sgra//de ni ye shes gsum dang bral/yang na gzhan min
530a7(rgyud): bdag nyid gsum//mtshams kyi ye shes yod pa'i phyir//lha mo gang zhig dam tshig ni//srung ba las la legs nges par ro//de ni bde ba dbus gnas su//
530b1(rgyud): gzung bya ldan grang nang du//gang zhig sbyin sreg don dam paR+sha//dre ni ha zhes glo bur ste//char yang dbus yod thig le ni//gang du skad cig gis thim mo//gang khrig srub dang
530b2(rgyud): bsrab thobs ni//de ni thog ma'i dga' ba spangs//lha mo de bzhin tha ma'ang myoni/thog ma tha ma gnyis dang bral//skal ldan mo gang sngags kyi bzlas//de ni srid pa 'das
530b3(rgyud): pa'i yid//mya ngan 'das pa'i gnas kyang min//gnyis kyi ngo bo gnyis dang bral//gang zhig gnas ni brgyad du bstan//de ni nyi skyes ma rgyas pa//gnas ni dbang gis shar ba
530b4(rgyud): la nye bas myung du rgyas pa'o//gang zhig dga' ba la sogs rim//de ni rim pa gnyis su dbye//rnam bcas las ni dang po po//rnam bral bcu yi ribang phyug go//gang zhig/
530b5(rgyud): dur khrod rnam rtog bral//dbugs dbyung la sogs rnam par spangs//byang chub kyi ni sems ro la//rnam par zhu ba dam tshig phyir//lha mo gang zhig chu yi ngogs//de ni
530b6(rgyud): d+h+r-ig med ma yi mthar//yang na de rA srog gi rtswa//bde ba'i chu bo 'bab pa'i phyir//gang zhig snang ba sogs ye shrIs+t+ra//de ni dga' ba dang ldan yid//sa drang chu dang 'od kyi gzug
530b7(rgyud): de bzhin rlung gi ngo ba dang //gang zhig dngos po rten la sogs//de ni po de ba'i dang por rig//rang gi rnam pa'i bye brag ga mi//rnam par dpyod pas nges par spyod/
531a1(rgyud): nag zhig drung khrod brgyad//de ni bde bul tham nas//rnam par rtog pa 'dzin pa'i sku/del rjem dang them pa'o//glang zhan
531a2(rgyud): shrI lnga sogs pa'i don//de ni dang po'i bdud rtsi rgyu//rtsa dri rten pa'i gzugs su gragasathams cang rnam pa'i bde sbyin ma//gang rlung de nyid snying po
531a3(rgyud): don//de ni rin chen gdu bu'i drang//'dzums pa yis ni yAng dag pr-i ra//pad+ma'i zhal dro myong ba'o//lha mo gang zhib mdzub la sogs//doni gyen du
531a4(rgyud): gzungs pa'i rlung //ya na rtsa yi kun spyod las//'gro ba'i bdud rtsi 'dzin pa'o//gang ni T+wA~M nyer 'gro'i bsam gtan sbyor//de ni zla ba gyen du byed//yang
531a5(rgyud): mchings bzhi rnam dbye byas//rnam par shes pa las gshegs gsol//gang nyid ye shes thig le ni//de ni drug phyed gsum dang bral//bcu dang lnga yi sa
531a6(rgyud): rnams ni//dbang phyug 'pho med skye med do//gang zhig bradagu gI rang ngo mchog/de ni nges par bzhi pa'i 'bras//yang nA tror ya nyams su myong //'bras
531a7(rgyud): bu'i sgras ni brjod pa'o//gang zhig sa yi dbang byed pa//de ni de nyid drug rang bzhin//de nyid drug las de nyid gsum//de nyid gsum las rang ba zhin gcig
531b1(rgyud): gang shog rabazhin gshegs pa'i sku//de ni mya ngan 'das man+dan nyid//yang na dga' ba dang ni d+ha la//dga' bral dga' min rlu dang ga/la ma gang zhig+sa r+b+ha
531b2(rgyud): bstan pa//de ni bde ba shin tu 'de dang bral ba'i bde ba ni//yang na de nyid rnyed pa'o//byang zhig phyug rgya che rang bzhin//de ni thim sogs yid las
531b3(rgyud): des//rang gis nyams myong ring ngo bo//bsam gtan 'dzin pa spangs pa'o//gang zhig gsang ba don dam por//de ni dga' ba dga' dang bral//dan ma
531b4(rgyud): gi reg bya ste//reg bya nga bral rtog pa med//gang zhig bskul ba'i mchod pa'i don//den+ti dI myong bdeb 'byung /'das pa las nI yang skye ba//skye ba de la 'phrul pa'o//
531b5(rgyud): lha mo gos rab ye shes rlung //de ni kha la snying khur bde//kha ni rtag tu shes rab yin//snying kha ye shes brjod pa'o//gang zhig gsang ba'i dkyil
531b6(rgyud): 'khor 'khor//de ni khyab po med dge/yang ni bde chen rnyed de //bde po'i rnam par rtog dang bral//lha mo tshogs rgyas gang zhig ni//bya gdodang mu de khyang pa
531b7(rgyud): chu yang na tshigs ni zhu med khri//dga' ma rgyas pa mchog yin no//'byung ba srung den gtor ma gang //de ni sreg tshogs bsad pa'o//bcod pa de ni mchog gis
532a1(rgyud): grwa nas//'gro ba 'gog par byed pa'o//de dag ni mchog gi gsang ba chen po'i glusang chen bcom ldan 'das ma bzhi bcu'i bdag nyid kyi
532a2(rgyud): de kho na nyid bde ba chen po'i rgyal po'i bdud rtsi'i gter lo nges pa'i don to//lha mos gsol pa/bzhi bcu'i bdag nyid de nyid ni//shin tu reg med bzung bar dka'//
532a3(rgyud): sa yi dbang phyug du tsam zhig/mchog gi dbang phyug gis mkhyen lags//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//sna tshogs rnyed pa sum cu drug
532a4(rgyud): bcu gcig su yi bdag po'o//dga' ba rnyed pa sum cu bdun//bcu gnyis sa yi bdag por brjod//mchog dga' rnyed pa sum cu brgyad//dI ni bcu
532a5(rgyud): gsum pa yis//sum cu dgu lhag mthar thug pa//sa ni bcu bzhi rnyed pa'o//bzhi ba tu de ni lhan skyes so//bco lnga rnyed de'i mnga' ba dag go/gang zhig bcu
532a6(rgyud): drug pa yi sa//brjod du med pa na mkha' bzhin//de la dbang phyug mu chog gi mkha'//thams cad mkhyen pa rnyed dka' bya//zag med 'phro med zhi ba ste/
532a7(rgyud): skye med rmad byung bas rmad byung //kye bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtse gnyis kyi bdag nyid bde ba chen po'i bdud rtsi'i rgyal po bdud rtsi'i gter de kho na nyid de la kun tu spyod pa
532b1(rgyud): dus ni gang lags/'dus pa ni ci zhig lags/nyams su myong ba ni gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//sum nu rtsa gnyis kyi bdag nyid
532b2(rgyud): yi sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi chu tshod kyi bar du srog dang rtsol ba'i rlung gnyis shar ba ni kun tu spyod pa'o//snre le ba'i rlung 'byung ba'i dus su gang zhig yan lag thams cad la
532b3(rgyud): khyab pa'i srog de g.yon bskor du 'byung po yis ut+pa lA'i rnam pa 'dzums shing nr-ing gau lte ba'i snying po rtsa ba'i sdong bus 'jug pa'o//'jug pa tsam gyis zung
532b4(rgyud): borgyud pa'i nang na yong pa'i bde ba chen po'i srog gi rgyal po la gang zhig ro gra cig pa'i mtshan nyid de ni 'dus pa'o//de'i dus su gang zhig bdag dang guzhin
532b5(rgyud): gyi bye brag med pa gnyis su med pa'i spros pa dang brab ba'i ye shes kyis thams cad gzigs pa de nyams su myong ba'o//lha mos gsol pa/gang zhig nyams myong las/
532b6(rgyud): rnyed do//mnga' bdag do ni ji ltar legs//nyams su myong bas gang rnyed pa//de nyid mdor bsdus bka' stsol cig/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//dris
532b7(rgyud): pa de ni rmad byung mchog/nyon cig lha mo spyan bzang ring //nyams su myong bas gang rnyed pa//dga' ba'i dbang mo de brjod med//bla ma'i zhal nas nyams su myong //
533a1(rgyud): dbang bskur las ni rnyed pa'o//lha mos gsol pa/dbang bskuraShA ni du ma zhig/rgyud rgyud nang du rab tu gus lnga/'di ru bye brag ci 'drag
533a2(rgyud): su la sbyin par bgyi ba lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//dga' ba'i 'bras bu bye brag tu//dbang ni re shig bzhi ru dbye//dang po dgal
533a3(rgyud): pab dang ljon pa//las dang po la sbyin par bya//gnyis pa mchog dga' dang ldan pa//snang ba gsum ni thob pa la//dga' ba gsum pa dang ldan po//chos kyi sprin rnyed
533a4(rgyud): nges pas so//kun tu 'ong sde zhes bya ba//rnyed pa bzhi la sbyin par bya//lha mos gsol pa/kye bcom ldan 'das snang ba la sogs pa dang chos kyi smon
533a5(rgyud): dung kun tu 'od rnyed pa la de lta bu'i dbang gi rim pa legs na//sa la sogs pa ma rnyed pa la ji ltar lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sa lus
533a6(rgyud): sogs pa ma rnyed pa rnams la thog mar rang gi ngo bos so//sa la sogs pa rnyed bu rnams la thar thug pa'i rang gi ngo byos s+ho//gang gri phyir zhe nA/dri rnams la
533a7(rgyud): brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis shin tu bsod nams kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis bya ba la sogs pa dang bral ba'i ye shes chen po mthong ba tsam gyis thob bo//ji ltar pad+ma yod/
533b1(rgyud): masmin pa nyi ma 'di kyis reg pa tsam gyis rgyas so//ma smin pa de bzhin du ma sbyin no//lha momo gsol pa/masmon pa rnams la yongs su sbyin paSh+Ti m+b+ha bud lugs/
533b2(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sbyin sogs bapod nams baphags pa yin//mchog gi bla mus gtan la phab//sbru la dz+nyAn mod smin+de pa'i dus//de las rma
533b3(rgyud): ming byang chub ni//bla med gnas ni thob pa gang //phyi nas ci yang bslab mi dgos//bla med ye shes chen po'i gnas//'bad min de ni mthong ba'o//ji ltar nyi ma shar tsam
533b4(rgyud): gyis ngar sna tshogs gzugs ni mthong bar 'gyur//de bzhin bla med 'od kyis ni//ye shes chen po mthong bar 'gyur//ye shes chen po sku nga bral//gnyis su med pa
533b5(rgyud): na mkha' bzhin//lus dang ngag dang mid gzugs min//sgra la sogs pa rnam par spangs//dpe med na mkha' dang bral ba//srid dang mya ngan 'das pa spangs//spom dang phra
533b6(rgyud): kha sogs las 'das//nar yang thig le dang bral ba/rdul dang tshul tsam ma yin te//mchog dang gzhan mchog glanas las grol//skye ba med dang 'chi med pa//rmad byung chen po'i 'du shes so//
533b7(rgyud): lha mos gsol pa/kye bcom ldan 'das ye shes chen po'i dbang phyug bla na med pa'i yang dag pa'i byang chub rnyed pa la ye shes chen po brjod du med pa'i gnas gzhan rnyed pa yod dam
534a1(rgyud): ni//bcom ldan 'das bku' sprul pa/grangs med paSh+T+ri sa sar+b+ba m+b+ha rnams kyi yum khyod kyi la de lta bu dI//brjod du myed paSh+Ti ye shes chen
534a2(rgyud): po khyed kyis ci phyir mi shes de wArar+ya yin ni bdag gi rang gi ngo bo yang dag par khyod mi shes so//sgyu myos gsol pa/khyed kyis bye bo bdag gis shes/
534a3(rgyud): 'on kyang bdag gis gzhan zhig zhus//sems n+dan byang chub las gzhan gyi/mchog gi dbyung phyug rnyed pa'am/bcom ldan 'das kyis
534a4(rgyud): bka' stsal pa//byung chub rnyed las gzhan ci zhig/zhal bzang mo de rnyed yod dam/'on kya nga la mthong ba yod//tshi le la bdud rtsi nga
534a5(rgyud): sgyu mos gsol pabacom ldan dpa' bo'i dpa' dbang phyug/rang bzhin ye shes sbyin nogo//bdug gis gzhan zhig zhu byu bgyid//
534a6(rgyud): //'dun dadag sprul/dbang gi rim pa'i ye shes gang+ge/ hU~M pa de rang bzhin no//de la re shi zhin dun/dzin pa bdag
534a7(rgyud): gsungs//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//bzhi pa de nyid bar grags//de ltar ye shes 'dus shes so//de bzhin mi shes las byung zhes/
534b1(rgyud): shos sa na snro m+bA // zlu sa /khyAl+lA da/ sgyu rgyu/8/ sa byud ba gags//rmyi shAn da nas d+ha/
534b2(rgyud): na s+t+wa~M Sh+T+r-IH/ pa'i rlom+b+ha pa mi na phyogs//yang ni de bzhin gyi ts+tshin+da/basbyin shes rIshrI le /
534b3(rgyud): nas shrIN+Di // m+b+hing 'i bdaganas/byas nas nyid sbyi rnams su spyod// mi m+bu ga shes //skye ba
534b4(rgyud): //sems kyis thams cad mthong naste smra//nam khye bzhin du sa m+b+ha bA bya//de yong byas ma pa brlanas su//d+hI ngas pasam+b+ha pA ts+tsha yang men/
534b5(rgyud): ni de rten du shes te// 'aM ba bzhin du m+bA d+ma//maud ni rdzus //don dum pa ni shrI nA~M/ mas gre hU~M
534b6(rgyud): rdo pa'i stso //snang ba bzhi la go rims gnas//semis dang sems byung 'du shes so//de dgu las ni ma rig 'byung //mi mas kyi
535a1(rgyud): /zlos myu ldan//sbyin+d+ra 'i rang bzhin snyoms las byung //se sa nomargyun tshwa'ang ba nyid//yang dag 'di ni gsu ma dung sh+thag//rgyun/
535a2(rgyud): sa ye shes mtshan nyid do//gang tshe tshangs pa'i tshigs su sems//lha mode ni nyin mor 'gyur//gang tshe de las srog 'phro bri//de tshe man blo 'og na gaN+DI//
535a3(rgyud): snying yang ma yin 'og ma min//de tshe mtshams shes dran par bya//de yang me yi radwa bzhin grags/nyi ma lha ni stsog 'dzin ma//gang gis nyi ma yod pa ni//
535a4(rgyud): snang ba las ni shar du su 'gyur//snang ba zla ba zhes par bstan//yongs su zhu ba'i bdud rtsig yo//lha mo chen mo g.yo ba'i phyir//dga' bral dga' bar rab tu grags
535a5(rgyud): gang du chad pa las ni thom+b+ha//mchog gi dga' ba shar ba'i dus//de ni snang ba dang po'i dge'//de las mchog ni gsal bar 'gyur//gsang phyir snang ba mched bar gra
535a6(rgyud): zhu ma g.yo med smra ba'o//ska ba lnga ni phra mo'i dngos//bdo sbyin yang na kun spyod do//kun spyod lasra ni tshemam yin//zhal bzang mo ni snang bas so//de ni mtshams
535a7(rgyud): gis grags pa ste//dbus kyi gnas su yod pa'i phyir//dbus kyi gnas na mod pa ni//de phyir kun tu spyod byed pa'o//dbus ni dngos po thams cad la//'du
535b1(rgyud): spyod pa 'o//yang na gang du mtshan me ni//ma byung nyi ma nub pa'o//de ni A marnams zhes glags//rang bzhin dga' ba sbyin b+h+yo ma//do nyid snang na
535b2(rgyud): thob pa yin//thams cad skye ba'i rgyu yin no//gang du dngus mtshams snang TIg+sa gis//dade ba'i ra sa ma shes na/spel ldan mo de rA ni/da
535b3(rgyud): bral gsal bar 'gyur ba'o//de yi nyams su myong shes pa//skyon ni chung zad mi byed do//mi shes pas ni skal ldan mr-i//rtsa ba dang bcas med par byed//rtsab
535b4(rgyud): smyung ba zhes byar dran//khu ba'i gzugs ni zla dra'o//bde ba chen po'i bdud rtsi'i gter//bsrubs las skye pa phyin pa'i phyir//lha mo me tog snang ba mchod//dam
535b5(rgyud): ba'i phyir na nyi ma brjod//b+hade chen rnam par smin pa'i phyir//dmar ba'i gzugs ni sngar 'gyur ro//'bras bu thob pa'i grogs pa ste//mtshan dang dpe byed pa
535b6(rgyud): ldan no//dngos dang dngos min bral bar phyir//zhal bzang mtshams kyi ye shes so//nyin mo snang ba mchod 'khor grags//mtshan mo snang ba mya ngan las//
535b7(rgyud): srid dang mya ngan 'das bral ba//mtshams ni snang ba thob pa'o//de lta bu yi gsang chen mchog/gang du yang ni gsal ma byas//skam ldan khyod kyi ngor byos pas//
536a1(rgyud): shos rin chen gsal byas so//lha mos gsol pa/'bras blo de nyid rin chen grung //mdor badrug de ni ji ltar rnyed//bcom ldan las skyes pa/
536a2(rgyud): stsal pa/'bras bu de ni rin chen glang //de ni gnyis su dbye bar gnas//mchog gi dga' ba'i ngo bo gcig/mchog gi dga' ba dang bral ba//mchog dga' ngo bor grags/
536a3(rgyud): pa ni//nyam su myong bas rnyed pa yin//mchog gi dga' bo dang bral ba//rang las rab tu gsal bar 'gyur//skal ldan mo gang nyams su myong //de ni rdzogs pa'i
536a4(rgyud): rang bzhin no//nyams su myong min rdzogs pa ni//gang du sus kyang mi shes so//ji ltar bu myo lang tshe bab/skyes bu med na nam yang myin//legs dbus kyi ni
536a5(rgyud): bde myong ba//legs dgyes dbang mo myi shes so//gang zhig bsam pa la sogs kyis//de ni bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid do//bskyed pa dang ni rdzogs bral ba//de ni 'bras bu
536a6(rgyud): mchog rang bzhin no//de ru gar zhig sgom pa ni//phra mo'i phra mo yang dag mchog/gang gis bla na mod pa rnyepa//'gro bo'i ma de yod pa min//bla na med pa'i ye shes /
536a7(rgyud): bzhi dang bral po rtag tu shar//rtag tu shar ba las gzhan ci//gang du yang na sgom yod dam//gal te gong gis sgom pa de//khyad par can du phongs mi skye//mi skye'i
536b1(rgyud): d+hirAn bsam glatanA dul//grwal te khyad par 'ong 'gyur na//de ni de nyid rang bzhin min//de nyid ni nu pAr the tsom med//de nyid mi sgom de nyid ni//su zhig de la rnyed par 'dod//
536b2(rgyud): de ni mkha' la ri ma ni//mchog gi dpyod mo 'dri ba'o//lha mos gsol pa/gsang ba chen po'i rgyud 'di ni/ke shes pa dang ni bshad pa su//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'/
536b3(rgyud): stsal pa//byang phyogs su dpal rdo rje'i gnas ur+yan du rgya lnga po in+d+ra b+hU ti zhes bya bas shes pa dang shad pa dang /sems can la gsol bar byed do//
536b4(rgyud): /mos gsol pa/kye ban+de mI ldan 'das rgyal ba chun po in+d+ra b+h+r-i ti zhes bya ba dI swa dri'i dbang phyug lagasr-i bka' stsol cig/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol pa
536b5(rgyud): dpal ye shes thig le'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las glang zhig ngas bsten pa'i phyog nu rdo rje'i rgyal po de nyid in+d+ra b+hU ti sprul pa'i skus sa bcu'i dbang phyug ye shes kyi skus
536b6(rgyud): bAcu'i dag phyug gocom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dbya'aM ba kyis nye rdul gyi grang sra bcom ldan 'dres ma dang lhan cig tu sten/lis langs te/len
536b7(rgyud): gsu dri sbyor ba byas nas zhab sel mgo bos phyag 'tshal to/rang rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyis sna tshogs pa'i mchod pas mchod sbyin byas nas bstod pa/de'i
537a1(rgyud): na nyid bdud rnyi'i rgya mtsho'i snying po rab tu mchog rgyal gyur cig/ye shes na mkha' skye myed gzugs med brjod med sku dbang
537a2(rgyud): gyur cig/dngos dang dngos sbyin ro gcig ngo bo'i rmad byung de nyid rab gat+ter rgyal gyur cig/stong nyid stong pa nyid min mchog dang gzhan
537a3(rgyud): mchog 'od kyis grub pa rgyal gyur cig/de lta bu'i bstod pa'i rgyal pos bstod nos/'khor thams cad bco myi ldan 'das dang bcas par
537a4(rgyud): mi snang bar gyur to//dpalnga rnal 'byor ma chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rma du byung zhing /rmad du byung ba de na nyid kyi sgron me zhes bya ba rdzogs s+ho///
537a5(rgyud): rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po pradz+nyA shrI gup+tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan lnga phab pa/dus phyis dpal sku skya'i dben gnas su bsgyur cing zhus dag par byas
